Uretse kuba ikoranabuhanga ryo guhererekanya amafaranga hakoreshejwe telefone riri kugira uruhare mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19, Minisiteri y’ubuzima yavuze ko riri no gufasha mu gukurikirana abo ikeka ko bandujwe iki cyorezo n’abamotari, isaba abanyarwanda gukomeza kurikoresha.
Uretse kuba ikoranabuhanga ryo guhererekanya amafaranga hakoreshejwe telefone riri kugira uruhare mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19, Minisiteri y’ubuzima yavuze ko riri no gufasha mu gukurikirana abo ikeka ko bandujwe iki cyorezo n’abamotari, isaba abanyarwanda gukomeza kurikoresha.
Ubwo Covid-19 yageraga mu Rwanda, zimwe mu ngamba Leta yashyizeho mu kwirinda ko ikomeza gukwirakwira hirya no hino ni ukwishyura hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga cyangwa mobile money.
Gusa nyuma y’uko iki cyorezo kigeze muba motari, Minisiteri y’ubuzima yavuze ko iri koranabuhanga riri gufasha cyane mu gukurikirana abo bakekaho kwanduzwa n’aba bamotari.
Mu kiganiro urubuga rw’itangazamakuru cyo ku wa 28 Kamena, Minisitiri w’ubuzima Dr Ngamije Daniel yagarutse ku kamaro k’iri koranabuhanga mu gukurikirana abakekwaho kwandura.
Yagize ati “Dufite uko dukurikirana abantu bagiye batwara turebye cyane cyane iyo bakoresheje mobile money kugira ngo bishyure, bigatuma tugera kuri abo bantu tukabasuzuma"
Minisitiri w’ubuzima yakomeje asaba abanyarwanda kurushaho kwishyura abamotari bakoresheje telefone kuko bibafitiye akamaro.
Ati “Twifuza ngo abantu bajye bakoresha mobile money kuko uba ufite amahirwe yo kugira ngo umuntu amenye ngo motari kanaka yaragutwaye kandi yaje kugaragaraho uburwayi, nawe ngwino tugusuzume tumenye niba utarwaye aho kugira ngo ugume iyo ngiyo wanduza umuryango wawe.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ivuga ko kuva abamotari bagaruka mu kazi ku wa 3 Kamena, nyuma y’iminsi mike bahise bagaragara mu banduye iki cyorezo kandi bari kugikwirakwiza.
Kugeza ubu mu umubare w’abamaze kwandura covid-19 mu Rwanda ni 900 harimo 22 banduye ku wa 29 Kamena, mu gihe abamaze kuyikira ari 443, naho abo imaze guhitana ni babiri.
Abanyarwanda basabwa guhamagara ku 114 igihe biyumvisemo ibimenyetso bya Covid-19 birimo inkorora, guhumeka nabi, gucika intege n’ibindi.
Basabwa kandi gukomeza kwitwararika muri iki gihe serivisi nyinshi zikomeje gufungurwa, bibuka kwambara neza agapfukamunwa buri gihe bavuye mu ngo, bakaraba intoki kenshi, birinda amakoraniro n’ibindi bintu byose bishobora guhuriza hamwe abantu benshi.
Steve Bing wamamaye mu ruganda rwa sinema i Hollywood muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yapfuye yiyahuye.
Steve Bing wamamaye mu ruganda rwa sinema i Hollywood muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yapfuye yiyahuye.
Iby’uko uyu mugabo wari ufite imyaka 55 yiyahuye byemejwe n’Ubuyobozi bwa Los Angeles bushinzwe gukurikirana abantu basanzwe bapfuye hagakorwa isuzumwa ku cyateye urupfu rwe.
Bwavuze ko yari yari afite ihungabana ryinshi’ ari naryo ryatumye ahitamo kwiyambura ubuzima.
Uyu mugabo wari usanzwe afitanye umwana w’umuhungu n’umukinnyi wa Filime Elizabeth Hurley, yasanzwe yapfuye ku wa Mbere w’iki Cyumweru.
Muri Hollywood Bing yari azwi cyane kubera filime yagize uruhare mu iyandikwa ryayo mu 2003 ya Kangaroo Jack, kuba yarateye inkunga mu buryo bw’amafaranga filime ya The Polar Express yagiye hanze mu 2004 n’ibindi bikorwa byinshi byatumye aba umwe mu nkingi za mwamba muri Hollywood.
Steve Bing ni we wakoze ‘Shine a Light’, yayobowe na Martin Scorsese ivuga ku itsinda rya Rolling Stones ryamamaye cyane mu Bwongereza.
Hurley babyaranye yanditse kuri Instagram agaragaza ko atewe agahinda n’urupfu rwa Steve Bing.
Yagize ati “Mbabajwe birenze n’uko uwahoze ari umukunzi wanjye Steve Bing atakiri kumwe natwe.
Ni iherezo riteye ubwoba.
Ku myaka 18 Steve Bing yarazwe umutungo wa Miliyoni $600 na sekuru Leo Bing.
Azajya yibukirwa ku kuntu yashyigiye bikomeye Bill Clinton wigeze kuba Perezida wa Amerika, agatanga nibura miliyoni $10 mu muryango we ndetse akanishyura urugendo yigeze kugirira muri Koreya ya Ruguru mu 2009 agiye mu biganiro byo gufunguza abanyamakuru babiri b’Abanyamerika bari bahafungiwe.
Stephen Leo Bing [Steve Bing] yavutse ku wa 31 Werurwe 1965.
Yakundanye n’abagore babiri; Elizabeth Hurley na Lisa Bonder.
Asize abana babiri Damian Hurley na Kira Bonder.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yatangije ikigega kigamije gufasha inzego zitandukanye z’abikorera zagizweho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho ku ikubitiro kirimo imari ingana na miliyari 100 Frw ariko intumbero ni uko cyagera kuri miliyari 200 Frw.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yatangije ikigega kigamije gufasha inzego zitandukanye z’abikorera zagizweho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho ku ikubitiro kirimo imari ingana na miliyari 100 Frw ariko intumbero ni uko cyagera kuri miliyari 200 Frw.
Kizamara imyaka ibiri gifasha ubucuruzi bwazahajwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus hafashwa by’umwihariko ibigo byahungabanye ku buryo nibura ibyo byinjizaga byagabanutse bikagera kuri 50% by’agaciro k’ibyacurujwe ugereranyije n’umwaka ushize.
Amafaranga arimo akubiye mu ngengo y’imari ya 2019/2020 n’iya 2020/2021.
Ni ikigega cyemejwe n’Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye tariki 30 Mata uyu mwaka.
Abasaba ubufasha muri iki kigega bagomba kuba bari basanzwe bahagaze neza mbere y’icyorezo, ku buryo bibaha umurongo wo kuba bazishyura, icyo bakeneye ari ukugira ngo bongere bazamure ibikorwa.
Amabanki 16 n’ibigo by’imari niyo azajya atanga inguzanyo ku bashaka amafaranga muri iki kigega, ku nyungu izaba iri hagati ya 5% kugera ku 8% ku mwaka, naho kwishyura bikaba biri hagati y’imyaka ibiri kugera kuri 15 ku mahoteli.
Mu mafaranga ari muri iki kigega, yagabanyijwe mu byiciro aho buri rwego rugenewe inkunga rwagize ayo rugenerwa mu buryo bwihariye.
Urugero, miliyari 50 Frw niyo yagenwe nk’agomba gufasha urwego rw’amabanki kuzahura ibikorwa, miliyari 30 Frw zigenerwa ibigo binini nk’igishoro cyo kuzahura ibikorwa byabyo.
Miliyari 15 Frw zo zagenwe nk’igishoro ku bigo bito n’ibiciriritse mu gihe miliyari eshatu yo yagenwe nk’ingwate yo kwishingira ibyo bigo.
Hari miliyari imwe yagenwe nk’amafaranga y’igishoro ku bigo by’imari na miliyari ebyiri y’igishoro cyagenewe za Sacco.
Umuntu ufashe iyi nguzanyo azajya yishyura inyungu bitewe n’icyiciro abarizwamo.
Urugero nko ku mahoteli, umuntu azajya yishyura amafaranga yahawe ku nyungu ya 5% ariko mu gihe cy’imyaka 15, utabariyemo imyaka itatu ya mbere azajya asonerwa kwishyura.
Ku bandi bashaka igishoro cyo kuzahura ibikorwa, bo inyungu ni 8% ariko bishyure ideni mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu utabariyemo umwaka umwe basonerwa.
Mu bizibandwaho kugira ngo izi nguzanyo zitangwe, harimo kugenzura ingaruka COVID-19 yagize ku bikorwa byabo ku buryo nibura inyungu yabo yaba yaragabanutse ku kigero cya 50% hashingiwe ku musoro ku nyungu bagaragaje mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro.
Abasaba inguzanyo kandi berekana icyo izabafasha mu kuzahura ubucuruzi bwabo nibura bukagera ku kigero cya 75% ugereranyije n’uko bwari bumeze mbere y’uko COVID-19 ibugiraho ingaruka.
Abasaba inguzanyo kandi bagomba kugaragaza icyo izabafasha mu gutanga akazi no guhanga imirimpo mishya.
Basabwa kwerekana neza imibare y’abakozi bari bafite mbere ya COVID-19, igihamya kikaba abatangirwaga ubwishingizi muri RSSB.
Niba kandi usaba inguzanyo yari asanganywe indi muri banki, asabwa kugaragaza mu buryo butomoye ko yishyuraga neza nibura kugera mu mpera za Gashyantare.
Usaba kugurizwa muri iki kigega kandi yerekana icyangombwa cya RRA cy’uko yishyura imisoro nibura cyo muri Gashyantare 2020.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, atangaza ko sosiyete isaba ubufasha muri iki kigega, igomba kuba yari ihagaze neza mbere y’iki cyorezo kuko amafaranga azatangwa ari ayo gukemura ibibazo byatewe n’icyorezo, aho gukemura ibibazo yari isanganywe.
Ati “Igomba kugaragaza ko mu gihe gito yaba imaze kugera kuri 75% by’ubucuruzi yari ifite mbere y’icyorezo, ni amafaranga yo kugira ngo uve mu kibazo watewe n’icyorezo ugaruke ku gipimo cyiza wari uriho ndetse no kurenzaho.
Banki n’Ibigo by’imari bishinzwe kugenzura ubusabe bw’abashaka amafaranga, bikareba ko bujuje ibisabwa, gahunda bafite yo kuzahura umusaruro n’ubukungu bw’ikigo n’igihugu muri rusange.
Iyo Banki zimaze gusuzuma, raporo ishyikirizwa Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu akaba ariyo itanga amafaranga.
BNR ni yo ibitse aya mafaranga, ni yo yemeza ko atangwa.
Ku rwego rw’igihugu hari amatsinda yashyizweho azakurikirana iki gikorwa, akareba ko ibikorwa byagenewe gufashwa biyabona ndetse ko nta biyabona bitayakwiye.
Urwego rw’ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse byahawe umwihariko muri iki kigega, bishyirirwaho ubufasha mu buryo bubiri: harimo guhabwa inguzanyo iciriritse ndetse n’ingwate.
Minisitiri Dr Ndagijimana, asobanura ko “Iki kigega cyafashe ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi ku nzego zose, kuva kuri bya bindi bito bifite ubucuruzi ku mwaka buri munsi ya miliyoni 20 Frw kuzamuka kugera masosiyete manini.
By’umwihariko, hari amafaranga azava muri BNR akanyura muri BDF kugira ngo agere kuri bya bikorwa bito cyane.
Ikindi ni uko bo bazabona imfashanyo y’ubwoko bubiri, harimo inguzanyo n’ingwate.
Kuri ibi bigo, BDF izishingira inguzanyo yabyo mu mabanki ku kigero cya 75% aho komisiyo izajya ikura ku mukiliya itagomba kurenga 0.

Imijyi myinshi muri Amerika no hanze yayo irimo imyigaragambyo ikomeye yamagana irondaruhu nyuma y’urupfu rwa Floyd wishwe mu Cyumweru gishize, bikozwe n’umupolisi wamushikamiye akoresheje ivi kugeza aheze umwuka.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu Papa Francis yavuze ko irondaruhu atari iryo kwihanganira, ariko yongeraho ko ubugizi bwa nabi nabwo ari inzira yo kwiyangiza no gusenya.
Yavuze ko urupfu rwa Floyd rubabaje ndetse ko ari kumusengera n’abandi bose bapfuye bazize “icyaha cy’ivanguramoko’.
Yagize ati “Nshuti zanjye ntabwo twakwihanganira cyangwa ngo twirengagize irondaruhu n’ihezwa ry’ubwoko bwose, hanyuma ngo tuvuge ko turengera igitinyiro cy’ubuzima bwa muntu.

Nta na kimwe wageraho ukoresheje ubugizi bwa nabi ahubwo wangiza byinshi.

Minisitiri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Rosemary Mbabazi, yatangije imurikabitabo ry’Igihugu mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga rizakorerwa ku mbuga za internet, asaba Abanyarwanda kugira umuco wo gusoma no kwandika kuko ariwo nkingi ikomeye y’iterambere ry’igihugu.
Minisitiri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Rosemary Mbabazi, yatangije imurikabitabo ry’Igihugu mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga rizakorerwa ku mbuga za internet, asaba Abanyarwanda kugira umuco wo gusoma no kwandika kuko ariwo nkingi ikomeye y’iterambere ry’igihugu.
Iri murikabitabo ryateguwe na Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco ndetse n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ishyinguranyandiko na Serivisi z’Inkoranyabitabo, RALSA.
Muri uyu mwaka rifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Twandike ibitabo, bimenywe, bigurishwe mu Isi y’ikoranabuhanga".
Minisitiri Mbabazi yagize ati “Gusoma no kwandika ni inkingi ikomeye y’iterambere ry’igihugu cyacu, niyo mpamvu leta y’u Rwanda ishyira imbaraga mu gukundisha abanyarwanda uwo muco, hategurwa ibikorwa bitandukanye harimo ubukangurambaga bwo gusoma no kumurika ibitabo.
“Igikorwa cyo kumurika ibitabo ni igikorwa ngarukamwaka guhera mu 2017 kandi uko gikozwe hari intambwe iterwa mu ruganda rw’ibitabo, aho usanga abitabira kumurika bagenda biyongera.
Yavuze ko ibitabo byandikwa bikwiriye kuba bijyanye n’igihe kandi bifite ireme ku buryo bigira icyo byungura ababisoma.
Yavuze ko iri murikabitabo ari iry’abanyarwanda bose, ko bakwiye kuryitabira kugira ngo umuco wo gusoma no kwandika bawugire uwabo.
Yagize ati “Igitabo ntigisanza kandi n’ubumenyi ntibusaza, ni uburyo bwiza bwo kugeza ubumenyi ku bariho n’abazaza tubagezaho ubumenyi n’ibitekeerzo byubaka.
Iri murikabitabo ry’igihugu 2020 riri mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga rizakorwa kuva tariki 15 Kamena kugeza tariki 15 Kanama uyu mwaka.
Iri murikabitabo ry’Igihugu mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga rizakorerwa ku mbuga za Internet zitandukanye.
Ushobora kurigeraho unyuza aha.
Imurikabitabo ni igikorwa ngarukamwaka gitoza umuco wo gusoma no kwandika by’umwihariko mu bana.

Papa Francis yanze kwemeza icyifuzo cyo kwemerera abagabo bafite abagore kuba abapadiri mu gace ka Amazon, mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ubuke bw’abapadiri.
Abasenyeri bo muri ako gace bari bashyigikiye uwo mwanzuro umwaka ushize, ariko byagombaga kwemezwa na Papa.
Ubusanzwe abapadiri ba Kiliziya Gatolika basabwa gukomeza kuba imanzi igihe cyose bahamagariwe uwo murimo.
Ubwo abagabo muri Amazon basabirwaga kwemererwa kuba abapadiri bafite abagore, byararwanyijwe cyane mu bice by’Uburayi na Amerika, bavuga ko byaba biganisha ku kwemerera abapadiri bose ku isi gushaka abagore ari umwe mu myihariko Kiliziya yari ifite.
Itangazo ryavuye i Vatikani rigira riti “Amazon yaduhaye umukoro, Papa arandika, agamije ko tuva mu kibazo gihari bya nyabyo aho kwinezeza mu bisubizo bitanga umuti w’ikibazo igice.
Papa yavuze ko hakenewe abapadiri bumva neza ikibazo kiri muri Amazon n’umuco wo muri ako gace.
Yasabye abashumba gusengera abantu ngo bagire umuhamagaro w’ubupadiri ku bwinshi.
Umwaka ushize abasenyeri 184 bahuriye i Vatikani biga ku hazaza ha Kiliziya mu gace ka Amazon.
Hanaganiriwe niba abagabo bakuze n’abashatse abagore bakwemererwa kuba abapadiri.
Bivugwa ko nibura 85 % by’uduce two muri Amazon batabasha guhimbaza misa buri cyumweru kubera ko nta bapadiri bahagije bahari.

Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangiye gupima abamotari icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mbere y’uko tariki 1 Kamena 2020 igera ngo basubukure umurimo wabo wo gutwara abagenzi.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangiye gupima abamotari icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mbere y’uko tariki 1 Kamena 2020 igera ngo basubukure umurimo wabo wo gutwara abagenzi.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yo ku wa 18 Gicurasi 2020 yemeje ko ingendo zihuza Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali zizongera gusubukurwa ku wa 1 Kamena, ndetse ko ari na wo munsi moto zitwara abantu zizemererwa kongera gukora.
Mu gihe habura iminsi ibarirwa ku ntoki ngo moto zongere gutwara abagenzi, kuri uyu wa Kabiri bamwe mu bamotari bapimwe Coronavirus, kugira ngo hirindwe ko bazaba intandaro yo gukwirakwiza iki cyorezo.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Ngamije Daniel, yavugiye kuri televiziyo y’igihugu ko igituma abamotari bari gusuzumwa ari uko bizwi ko bazahura n’abantu benshi, bityo akaba ari ngombwa ko hamenywa uko bahagaze mbere yo gutangira imirimo yabo.
Ati “Turashaka rero kugira itsinda risaga nka 1000 banyanyagiye mu mujyi ahangaha, buri gihe tuzajya dusuzuma turebe muri bo niba nta wanduye kuko bazaduha amakuru niba nta cyorezo cyaba kiri mu baturage, kuko ukuntu bagenda bahura n’abantu babatwara, nihagira umumotari wandura bizaduha amakuru y’uko hari ikibazo kiri mu baturage".
Yakomeje agira ati “Twabasuzumye, ubu twabifashe nk’igipimo fatizo muri kiriya cyiciro cy’abamotari, tuzabikurikirana buri gihe kugira ngo turebe uko icyorezo cyaba gihagaze mu Mujyi wa Kigali ndetse n’ahandi.
Minisitiri Ngamije avuga ko gusuzuma abamotari kandi bigamije kumenya uko ubwandu buhagaze muri bo, aho hafashwe ibipimo bimwe hagendewe ku myaka, aho batuye, ku buryo bizatanga ishusho y’uko icyorezo cyaba gihagaze mu bamotari.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP Kabera Jean Bosco, yavuze ko hari umuco abamotari bakwiye kujyana ku itariki ya 1 Kamena 2020, wo gukaraba intoki, kwambara agapfukamunwa no kubahiriza intera.
Ati “Bagomba kumva ko uwo muti wo gukaraba intoki bawufite, icya kabiri ni uguhana intera.
kumva ko bagomba kwambara agapfukamunwa.
Nibajyane umuco wo kumva ko amasaha yashyizweho ntarengwa yo kuba bavuye mu muhanda ari umuco".
Umuyobozi wa Ferwacotamo, Ngarambe Daniel, yavuze ko abamotari biteguye yaba mu buryo bazahagarara neza muri metero imwe, gukaraba ndetse no kugendana umuti wo gukaraba ‘alcohol’, ku buryo umugenzi ashobora gukaraba ndetse ugapuriza muri casque.
Ati “Ibyo byose turi kubitegura ku buryo uzatega moto azaba yumva ko ubwirinzi buhari kandi ntagire impungenge ko ashobora kwandura ari kuri moto, kubigisha uburyo bashobora kuzaba bafite agapfukamunwa n’umugenzi utagafite ntibamutware".
Ngarambe yavuze ko hari uburyo buzakoreshwa mu kwishyura moto bwa ‘cashless’, aho hari uburyo bwo gushyira mubazi kuri moto ku buryo izajya yereka umugenzi amafaranga agiye kwishyura noneho hagakoreshwa ikoranabuhanga umuntu adafata amafaranga mu ntoki.
Imibare yo kuri uyu wa Kabiri yerekana ko mu Rwanda abanduye Coronavirus ari 339, abakize ari 244, abakirwaye ari 95, nta muntu uritaba Imana.
Ibipimo bimaze gufatwa ni 60 443.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, cyashyizeho amabwiriza agiye kuzajya yifashishwa n’abafite Hotel na Restaurant, aho bategetswe kuzajya bandika umwirondoro w’umuntu wese ubagannye nka bumwe mu buryo bushobora koroshya kubona amakuru mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, cyashyizeho amabwiriza agiye kuzajya yifashishwa n’abafite Hotel na Restaurant, aho bategetswe kuzajya bandika umwirondoro w’umuntu wese ubagannye nka bumwe mu buryo bushobora koroshya kubona amakuru mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Aya mabwiriza yashyizweho mu rwego rwo gukaza ingamba mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Hotel na Restaurant ni zimwe muri serivisi zemerewe gufungura ibikorwa nyuma y’iminsi 43 zifunze, ariko zisabwa ko zajya zifunga saa moya z’ijoro.
RDB yatangaje ko mu rwego rwo gukomeza gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19 “abayobozi b’ama-hotel, ama-restaurant n’ahandi hafatirwa amafunguro n’ibyo kunywa, basabwa guhita batangira kujya bandika umwirondoro w’ababagana.
Hazajya handikwa amazina yombi y’umuntu, nimero ya telefoni, isaha n’umunota yinjiriye aho hantu n’akarere atuyemo.
Umwirondoro uzajya ubikwa mu buryo bw’ibanga gusa RDB ivuga ko “aho bizaba ngombwa uzakoreshwa mu gushaka amakuru ajyanye na COVID-19".
Urwego rw’ama-hotel no kwakira abantu, ni zimwe mu zashegeshwe bikomeye n’ingamba zo gufunga ibikorwa mu kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19, ndetse bisaba ingufu nyinshi mu kuzahura ubukungu bwarwo.

9 Frw mu kugoboka ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo no kwakira abantu, mu gihe cy’umwaka wose nyuma ya Coronavirus.

Ibiranga ba Gedeon
Ni abantu uzasanga barangwa no kutagira ubwoba ndetse barwana intambara y’inkundura igamije kugera ku byiza.
Iyi myitwarire ituma banga urunuka akarengane cyane ko bakunda no kugirira igishyika bagenzi babo.
Bagira urukundo rwinshi kandi bahora baharanira gusiga isi ari nziza kurusha uko bayisanze.
Ba Gedeon barahindagurika, bakunda kwinezeza, ikindi ni uko bagira ukwizera kwinshi.
Ba Gedeon ntibakunda gutwarwa n’amategeko cyangwa amahame runaka, ni abanyembaraga, abanyabwenge kandi biraborohera cyane kugirana ubucuti n’abandi.
Bakunda kuba bari ahantu hatuje bagerageza gusesengura no kumva neza ibintu bitandukanye kugira ngo bamenye ukuri.

Iran yatanze impapuro mpuzamahanga zisaba itabwa muri yombi rya Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, ashinjwa uruhare mu gitero cyahitanye umusirikare mukuru wa Iran wari muri Iraq.
Iran yatanze impapuro mpuzamahanga zisaba itabwa muri yombi rya Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, ashinjwa uruhare mu gitero cyahitanye umusirikare mukuru wa Iran wari muri Iraq.
Izo mpapuro zatanzwe zinareba abandi bayobozi 12 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Umushinjacyaha mukuru wa Iran, Ali Alqasimehr yavuze ko Trump we n’abandi bantu 30 aribo bagize uruhare mu gitero cya drone cyahitanye General Qassem Soleimani, tariki 3 Mutarama 2020.
Ali Alqasimehr yavuze ko icyo gikorwa Amerika yakoze kigize icyaha cy’iterabwoba.
Uwo mushinjacyaha ntabwo yavuze abandi baregwa hamwe na Trump, gusa yavuze ko bazakomeza kumushakisha n’igihe azaba atakiri Perezida.
Iran yasabye kandi Polisi mpuzamahanga, Interpol, ubufasha mu kugeza Trump imbere y’ubutabera.
Interpol ntacyo iratangaza kuri ubwo busabe.
Alqasimehr yasabye ko Trump na bagenzi be bashyirwa ku rutonde rw’abashakishwa cyane.
Ubusanzwe uwashyize kuri urwo rutonde rwitwa ‘urutukura’ aba agomba gufatwa n’igihugu aherereyemo, nubwo atari itegeko ko igihugu kibikora.
Icyakora bituma uwashyizwe ku rutonde atangira kwigengesera mu gukora ingendo mpuzamahanga.
Nyuma y’uko Interpol yakiriye ubusabe bw’igihugu, ibiganiraho igafata umwanzuro niba ari ngombwa kubimenyesha ibindi bihugu binyamuryango cyangwa niba atari ngombwa.
Aljazeera yatangaje ko bigoye ngo Interpol yemere ubusabe bwa Iran kuko amahame igenderaho atayemerera kwivanga mu bibazo bya Politiki.
Qasem Soleimani yafatwaga nk’uwa kabiri mu bantu bakomeye muri Iran nyuma y’umuyobozi w’ikirenga w’iki gihugu, Ali Khamenei.
Yari umuyobozi w’umutwe wa Quds wari ushinzwe ibikorwa bya gisirikare n’iby’ubutasi byo hanze y’igihugu, gusa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zawufataga nk’umutwe w’iterabwoba.
Yiciwe mu bitero bya drones byagabwe n’Ingabo za Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ku modoka yari arimo, ubwo yari avuye ku kibuga cy’indege cy’i Baghdad.
Kurumika no kurasaga, imyotso no kugombora, ni imigenzo nyarwanda yakorwaga mu buvuzi gakondo no kurinda ibyago Abanyarwanda, bityo uwabikoraga akaba afite imyerere y’uko iyo bikozwe byanze bikunze birinda kandi bikanavura.
Kurumika no kurasaga, imyotso no kugombora, ni imigenzo nyarwanda yakorwaga mu buvuzi gakondo no kurinda ibyago Abanyarwanda, bityo uwabikoraga akaba afite imyerere y’uko iyo bikozwe byanze bikunze birinda kandi bikanavura.
Gusa kuri ubu Abanyarwanda benshi ntibabyemera, ndetse bavuga ko ari imihango ya gipagani, n’ubwo hari abaganga bemeza ko iyo migenzo yabaga ari ingirakamaro.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Umuco mu Buvanganzo’’ cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, Inzobere ku muco, amateka n’ubuvanganzo nyarwanda, tugiye kubataturira imwe mu mihango n’imigenzo yakorwaga mu kuvura no kurinda indwara mu muco w’Abanyarwanda.
Kurasaga (Guca indasago, gukeba gahoro gahoro ku mubiri) umuntu byaterwaga n’uko bashaka nko kumushyiramo imiti yo kumuvura ikintu arwaye, cyangwa kumutsirika bavuga ngo batazamuroga, bakarasaga rero bagashyiramo iyo miti.
Hari n’aho bikengeraga ko umwana wavutse azahura n’akaga, nako bakagatsirika bakoresheje kumuca indasago, ukazasanga koko bibaye impamo, ibyago baketse, akabicika.
Hari kandi n’indasago bacaga ku mugore ugiye gushaka cyangwa umugabo, bagashyiramo imiti ituma bahamya umubano uzira kidobya.
Niyo mpamvu uzasanga abantu bakuru benshi bafite indasago ku mubiri, ku gikanu, mu gatuza, ku bibero ku gahanga, mu biganza n’ahandi.
Umumaro w’indasago ahanini, wari uwo gutsirika ushyiramo umuti aho barasaze, bakungikanya n’imitongero runaka yo kuvura, imitongero igakurwa n’indi maze umuntu akaba mutaraga.
Kurumika ho bacaga indasago nko mu gikanu cyangwa mu mugongo , bagashyiraho ikintu bita ingunga.
Ingunga kari agacuma bakebye katagira ijosi.
Kurumika babikoraga bashaka gusohora amaraso mabi ari mu mubiri.
Hari nk’ubwo imitsi yipfundikaga ikabuza umuntu kuba yagenda, ugasanga aho yipfunditse habaye nk’umukara, uwo byabayeho agakunda kugira ibinya bimufata bya hato na hato.
Barasagaga ya maraso agasohoka, nyuma bagasigamo imiti yo kugira ngo homoke hasubirane, ariko na none igakiza ubwo burwayi ntibuzagaruke.
Hari n’aho barumikaga bakoresheje ihembe rikiyomeka ku mubiri rikajya rikurura amaraso, ryamara kuzura bakarikuraho bakayamena bakongera bagasubizaho.
Kurasaga no kurumika, bifite itandukaniro benshi badakunze kumenya.
Kurasaga byakorerwaga ku ruhu inyuma , basharuragaho gato, hakava amaraso makeya.
Naho kurumika, byakorwaga binjiye mu mubiri imbere ku buryo bashyikira umutsi ujyana amaraso mu mubiri, akaba ariwo bakomeretsa amaraso bashaka kumena akava.
Ubuvuzi gakondo bwo kotsa ( imyotso) amateka atugaragariza ko bwaba bukomoka mu Gisaka, aho bwadutse ku ngoma y’umwami waho Kimenyi II Shumbusho, watway I Gisaka ahasaga mu wa 1312.
Muri icyo kibariro, mu Gisaka hadutse indwara y’amaso yafataga abana bakiri bato bakundaga kuvukana bitewe n’uburwayi bwafataga Ababyeyi batwite, urukingo rukaba gufata abo bana bakabotsa ku gahanga no mu misaya, bagahita bakira.
Noneho biba nk’umugenzo wo muri ako gace, abantu babona ari byiza, uvutse wese kabone n’ubwo yaba atarwaye amaso bakamwotsa.
Gushyira imyotso ku gahanga no mu misaya, nibwo buvuzi gakondo bw’Abanyarwanda bifashishaga bavura icyorezo cy’uburwayi bw’amaso, haba ku bana no ku bantu bakuru
Uwo mugenzo wo guca imyotso ku bana b’Abanyagisaka, wageze aho uba ikirango mwihariko wabo, uhinduka umugenzo wo guca imanzi z’ubwiza ku mwana uwo ariwe wese uvukiye mu Gisaka, ku buryo byabaye n’ikimenyetso cyakoreshwaga mu ntambara y’I Gisaka n’u Rwanda kugira ngo Abanyagisaka babashe gutandukanya abaturage babo n’Abanyarwanda.
Ubuvuzi gakondo bw’Abanyarwanda bugombora uwakomwe ( uwarumwe) n’inzoka, akabasha kuyirokoka, ni bumwe mu buvuzi gakondo bumaze igihe kirekire mu Rwanda, kuko bwahanganywe n’u Rwanda rukiri amashyamba y’inzitane adapfa kwisukirwa.
Kugombora, hakoreshwaga uburyo bwo gushyira umuti witwa : ‘’Umukubayoka’’ ahakomwe ( aharumwe) n’inzoka, cyangwa se bagashyira ifu y’inzoka y’inkazi babaga baraseye ( nk’impiri, uruziramire n’izindi) mu gikomere cy’aharumwe n’inzoka.
Kugombora byaherekezwaga n’imitongero ivugwa muri ubu buryo :
Ndakugombora impiri , ndakugombora idubi, Ndakugombora insana n’inkomyi, Habyimbirwa imbwa, habyimbirwa impyisi, Ubwo bugomboro nabugomboje Ruganzu, Bwagomboye Rwabugili na Rudahigwa.
Ndakugombora byunga na barihuta, N’inyenzi na buhoma ! Murahura , ntikurya ! urajye kuvoma , Ntikurya ! urajya ku ryama!ntikurya ! Murahura , ikaraba , ikarabirana , ikabura ubwenge, Ikabura ubwinyo , ikaba imbwa biseseme !
Ubuvuzi gakondo bw’Abanyarwanda bushingiye ku kurumika, kotsa, guca indasago no kugombora, bwari bwuje igenantekerezo zisobetse rwose, ku buryo ritabashaga kugerurwa n’abahisi.
Ku buryo na n’ubu hari aho bugikoreshwa mu kuvura indwara zimwe na zimwe.

Umwaka ushize muri Werurwe nibwo u Rwanda na Tanzania byemeranyije ubufatanye mu kugeza ibicuruzwa ku masoko akomeye, arimo ayo muri Tanzania ndetse no ku mugabane w’u Burayi.
Ibihugu byombi byemeranyije ishyirwaho ry’ndege z’imizigo zizajya ziva ku kibuga cy’Indege cya Mwanza zijya ku masoko y’i Burayi, bikaba byaragombaga gutangira kuwa 1 Nyakanga 2019.
Gutwara amafi yo muri Tanzania akagezwa mu Burayi, ni amahirwe ku barobyi n’abacuruzi b’amafi bo muri icyo gihugu bari bamaze igihe bifuza uburyo buborohereye bwo kugeza umusaruro wabo ku masoko yo mu mahanga, bakagorwa n’igiciro cy’urugendo.
Ubusanzwe abacuruzi b’amafi bajyaga babanza kugeza umusaruro wabo ku bibuga by’indege bya Entebbe muri Uganda na Nairobi muri Kenya, kugira ngo indege ziwugeze ku masoko yo hanze, ibintu bavuga ko byabahendaga.
Ihuriro ry’abarobyi muri Tanzania ritangaza ko hari umusaruro w’amafi wangirikaga kubera kubura uko bawugeza ku isoko mpuzamahanga.
Nko muri Werurwe umwaka ushize, hari umusaruro w’amafi ufite agaciro gasaga miliyari eshanu z’amashilingi ya Tanzania bagombaga kugeza ku masoko ya Israel no mu Buyapani, babuze uko bagezayo kubera guhenda k’urugendo.

Aya masengesho yatangijwe mu 1995 agamije gushyira hamwe abayobozi bakuru mu kwiyegereza Imana, bagasangira, hakabaho gusengera igihugu n’abayobozi bacyo ndetse bagasangira ijambo ry’Imana.
Ku nshuro ya mbere yabereye muri Hotel Hotel des Mille Collines tariki 1 Nzeri 1995, kuva icyo gihe iki gikorwa kitabirwa n’abayobozi batandukanye n’abandi.
Ay’uyu mwaka azaba ari ayo gushimira ibyo Imana yakoreye Igihugu ariko no gusengera abayobozi bacyo bagashyirwa mu maboko y’Imana.
Aya masengesho abaye ahurirana kandi n’igihe u Rwanda rurimo kwishimira ibyo rwagezeho mu cyerekezo 2020 rwari rwarihaye no gutangira icyerekezo 2020.
Hagendewe kuri iyi nsanganyamatsiko, aya masengesho afite intego yo kureba ibyakozwe no gushimira urugendo rwagenzwe, ariko no kureba aho baganisha igihugu.
Agamije kandi kugira umuco wo gushimira bitari gusa Imana ahubwo n’abo yakoresheje ngo babe bagejeje aho igihugu kiri uyu munsi, kwiga ibyakozwe n’indangagaciro z’Imana yashyize mu bantu, ibi bigafasha kubaha inzira nziza yo gukomeza imbere.
Mu masengesho y’umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko bidakwiye ko umuyobozi abaho neza mu gihe abo areberera bafite ibibazo, ashimangira ko biteye isoni kumubona ashyiriye Imana abaturage yamuhaye kuyobora barwaye bwaki.
Yagize ati “Njye rwose mpora mfite impungenge ku kuzashorera abantu barwaye bwaki, bashonje, bameze nabi nkavuga nti ‘Mana ng’aba abantu bawe wanshinze’.
Ntabwo umutima wanjye ujyanye na byo.
Numva bidakwiye.
Kugira ngo utazashorera abantu bameze batyo, ikintu cya mbere ni uko buri muyobozi bikwiye kumutera isoni.
Mugomba kugira isoni.
Iyo wemera indangagaciro ukazibura bikwiriye kugutera isoni.
Yakomeje avuga ko iterambere rirambye rikwiye gushingira ku ndangagaciro y’imikorere hagati y’abayobozi n’abayoborwa.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moses
Ku wa Kabiri tariki 19 Nyakanga 1994 nibwo hagiyeho Guverinoma y’Ubumwe.
Imyaka 25 irashize!
Ku wa Kabiri tariki 19 Nyakanga 1994 nibwo hagiyeho Guverinoma y’Ubumwe.
Imyaka 25 irashize!
Ni Guverinoma yagiyeho nyuma y’iminsi ibiri gusa ingabo zari iza FPR Inkotanyi zimaze kubohora imijyi ya Ruhengeri na Gisenyi, zinahagarika Jenoside yari imaze guhitana Abatutsi basaga miliyoni imwe.
Nubwo intambara y’amasasu yasaga n’irangiye, umutima ntiwari hamwe kuko abanyapolitiki benshi n’ibikomerezwa bya Leta ishinjwa gutegura no gukora Jenoside, bari hakurya gato muri Zaire bisuganya ngo bagaruke ku butegetsi bari bamaze kwirukanwaho.
Tariki 17 Nyakanga nyuma yo kubohoza ibice byose by’igihugu, FPR Inkotanyi yasohoye itangazo riteguza Guverinoma y’inzibacyuho yari igiye kujyaho, rinashimangira ko muri iyo Guverinoma hatazabonekamo abo mu mashyaka ya MRND, CDR n’andi yagize uruhare muri Jenoside.
Guverinoma y’Ubumwe yari igizwe n’abaminisitiri 17 ariko tariki 19 harahiye 14, abandi bongerwamo tariki 20 Nyakanga.
Mu ijambo Paul Kagame yavuze kuri uwo munsi wo gushyiraho Guverinoma nshya, yavuze ko akazi kakiri kose bityo ko bisaba Guverinoma nshya gukoresha ingufu.
Yagize ati “Turebye aho tuva n’aho tugana, ndabona ko nta n’umwe wari ukwiye kuvuga ko twasoje inshingano zacu, ngo ajyeho yicare hasi atekereze ko ibibazo byose byarangiye.
Ni igihe cyo guhaguruka tugakorera hamwe, nk’uko twabikoze mu bihe byashize bigatuma tugera aho tugeze uyu munsi, tugashyiraho guverinoma dufitiye icyizere ko izayobora igihugu ikakigeza mu nzira y’iterambere.
Guverinoma yo ku wa 19 Nyakanga, imyanya umunani yahawe FPR Inkotanyi, itatu ihabwa ishyaka MDR, itatu ihabwa PL, PSD ihabwa imyanya ibiri naho umwe uhabwa PDC.
Abari bagize Guverinoma ya mbere y’Ubumwe
Perezida: Pasteur Bizimungu
Pasteur Bizimungu ni we wahise agirwa Perezida w’inzibacyuho.
Uyu mugabo uvuka muri Gisenyi, yari umunyamuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi wigeze no kuyobora ikigo cya Electrogaz cyahoze gishinzwe ingufu ku butegetsi bwa Perezida Juvenal Habyarimana.
Bizimungu ubu ufite imyaka 69 yabaye Perezida kugeza kuwa 23 Werurwe 2000 ubwo yeguraga ku mwanya wa Perezida.
Bizimungu yaje gushinga ishyaka PDR Ubuyanja ritemewe n’amategeko, mu 2002 aza gutabwa muri yombi ashinjwa kurema umutwe utemewe no kunyereza umutungo wa Leta, umwaka wakurikiyeho akatirwa gufungwa imyaka 15.
Mu 2006 Bizimungu yandikiye ibaruwa Perezida Kagame asaba imbabazi, azihabwa mu 2007 ahita arekurwa.
Ubu aba mu Rwanda mu bikorwa bye bwite.
2 : Visi Perezida & Minisitiri w’Ingabo: Paul Kagame
Muri Guverinoma y’Ubumwe, Minisitiri w’Ingabo yagizwe Général-Major Paul Kagame anaba Visi Perezida.
Paul Kagame yagumye kuri uwo mwanya kugeza muri Werurwe 2000 ubwo yatorerwaga gusimbura Bizimungu ku mwanya wa Perezida.
Ni inshingano yakoze neza ndetse aza gutorerwa izindi manda, kugeza uyu munsi.
Minisitiri w’Intebe: Faustin Twagiramungu
Guverinoma ya mbere yagiyeho nyuma ya Jenoside yari iyobowe na Faustin Twagiramungu nka Minisitiri w’Intebe.
Twagiramungu w’ishyaka MDR ni umwe mu banyepolitiki bari barahanganye n’ingoma ya Habyarimana, bashyigikiye imigambi y’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge mu banyarwanda.
Uyu mugabo uvuka mu yahoze ari perefegitura ya Cyangugu, yaje kwegura tariki 28 Kanama 1995, ahita afata iy’ubuhungiro agana mu Bubuligi ari naho akiba.
Asigaye agaragara mu bikorwa birwanya Leta y’u Rwanda ndetse aherutse kwifatanya n’Ihuriro P5 ry’amashyaka aba hanze y’u Rwanda, atavuga rumwe na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda.
Minisitiri w’Intebe wungirije & Minisitiri w’umurimo : Alexis Kanyarengwe
Kanyarengwe Alexis wo mu Muryango FPR Inkotanyi ni we wahawe umwanya wa Minisitiri w’umurimo akaba na Minisitiri w’Intebe wungirije.
Uyu mugabo ukomoka mu yahoze ari Ruhengeri (Amajyaruguru), ni umwe mu bahoze ari ibikomerezwa ku ngoma ya Habyarimana dore ko ari umwe mu basirikare 11 bafatanyije na Habyarimana guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Grégoire Kayibanda kuwa 5 Nyakanga 1973.
Kanyarengwe wafatwaga nka nimero ya kabiri ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, baje gushwana mu 1980 ashinjwa gushaka kumuhirika, nyuma aza guhunga igihugu ari nabwo yifatanyaga na FPR mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.
Kanyarengwe wabaye umuyobozi w’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi kugeza mu 1998, yaje kuvanwa muri Guverinoma mu 1997.
Alexis Kanyarengwe yitabye Imana tariki 13 Ugushyingo 2006 azize uburwayi, ashyingurwa mu irimbi rya Remera mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga: Jean Marie Ndagijimana
Nk’igihugu cyari kimaze kuva muri Jenoside, ibihugu byinshi bigifata nk’ikitariho, ntabwo byashobokaga kwisubiza ikuzo hatabayeho kugira Minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga kandi ikora cyane.
Ndagijimana wari mu ishyaka MDR ni we wahawe uwo mwanya atamazeho kabiri.
Uyu mugabo uvuka mu yahoze ari Cyangugu yamaze amezi ane kuri uwo mwanya, aza guhungira mu Bufaransa atwaye amafaranga yari yahawe ngo ajye gufunguza za ambasade.
Perezida Paul Kagame aherutse kubikomozaho ati “Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga wa mbere wagiyeho icyo gihe yagambanye n’abandi bayobozi muri Guverinoma nka Minisitiri w’Intebe icyo gihe, ahabwa amafaranga mu ntoki, ibihumbi amagana by’amadolari, ngo ajye mu mahanga asubukure ibikorwa bya za ambasade cyangwa afunguze inshya.
Uyu mugabo ntabwo yagarutse! Kandi yari amaze amezi angahe mu kazi, iyo yari guverinoma ya mbere y’inzibacyuho.
Minisitiri w’Umutekano: Seth Sendashonga
Guverinoma y’inzibacyuho yashyizwe kuwa 19 Nyakanga 1994, ntiyasize n’umwanya wa Minisitiri w’Umutekano.
Uwo mwanya wahawe Seth Sendashonga wakomokaga mu yahoze ari Perefegitura ya Kibuye, wari impunzi muri Kenya ku butegetsi bwa Perezida Habyarimana.
Sendashonga wari umunyamuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi, yavuye muri Guverinoma mu 1995 ahita ajya mu buhungiro muri Kenya.
Aho niho yaje kurasirwa tariki 16 Gicurasi 1998.
Perezida Paul Kagame aherutse kuvuga ko Sendashonga nyuma yo guhunga igihugu yakoranye n’abashakaga guhungabanya umutekano ku buryo yari yatangiye ‘kurenga umurongo’.
Minisitiri w’Ubutabera : Alphonse Marie Nkubito
Minisiteri y’ubutabera yahawe umunya-Cyangugu, Alphonse Marie Nkubito wari impirimbanyi y’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Nkubito yayoboye iyo Minisiteri kugeza mu 1995.
Yaje kwitaba Imana kuwa 13 Gashyantare 1996 azize uburwayi.
Minisitiri w’Uburezi: Pierre-Célestin RWIGEMA
Pierre-Célestin Rwigema uvuka i Gitarama mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo ubu, ni we wagizwe Minisitiri wa mbere w’Uburezi bw’amashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye nyuma ya Jenoside.
Rwigema wari mu ishyaka MDR, yaje kuva kuri uwo mwanya aba Minisitiri w’Intebe asimbuye Faustin Twagiramungu.
Umwanya wa Minisitiri w’Intebe yawuvuyeho muri Werurwe 2000, aza guhungira muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Yagarutse mu gihugu mu mwaka wa 2011, aza no gutorerwa kuba umudepite uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EALA) ari nawo akiriho kugeza ubu.
Minisitiri w’Amashuri Makuru n’ubushakashatsi : Dr Joseph Nsengimana
Dr Nsengimana ni we wagizwe Minisitiri w’amashuri makuru n’ubushakashatsi.
Uyu mugabo wavukiye i Busogo muri Musanze yashyizwe kuri uyu mwanya kubera ko yari asanzwe ari inzobere mu bijyanye n’uburezi, dore ko yabaye umwarimu muri Kaminuza zirimo iy’u Rwanda n’iya Lubumbashi.
Nyuma yahawe indi myanya ikomeye irimo kuba minisitiri w’abakozi ba Leta n’umurimo, Minisitiri w’ubutaka, gutuza abantu no kurengera ibidukikije ndetse aba umujyanama wihariye wa Perezida Paul Kagame.
Guhera mu 2006 yagiye mu kazi ko kuba ambasaderi, agasoza mu 2014 ubwo yari ahagarariye u Rwanda muri Ethiopia no mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe.
Ubu Nsengimana aba mu Rwanda aho akorera imirimo itandukanye.
Minisitiri w’Imari: Marc Rugenera
Ibigega n’isanduku by’igihugu muri Guverinoma ya mbere byaragijwe Marc Rugenera, umunya-Gitarama wo mu ishyaka PSD.
Uwo mwanya Rugenera yawuvuyeho mu 1997 aba Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi nyuma aba Minisitiri w’ubukerarugendo.
Ubu Rugenera yashinze ndetse ayobora ikigo cy’ubwishingizi cya Radiant.
Minisitiri w’Inganda: Prosper Higiro
Minisitiri w’inganda wa mbere nyuma ya Jenoside yabaye Prosper Higiro, umurwanashyaka wa PL ukomoka mu yahoze ari Kibungo.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 58, nyuma yo kuva muri Guverinoma yabaye umusenateri ndetse n’umwe mu bakandida biyamamaje ku mwanya wa Perezida wa Repubulika mu matora yo mu 2010.
Higiro aherutse kugirwa ambasaderi muri Canada.
Uyu yabaye umuyobozi mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo kuba Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Ihuriro ry’Inteko zishinga Amategeko z’Umuryango uhuza ibihugu byo mu Karere k’Ibiyaga Bigari (FP-ICGRL).
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima: Dr Joseph Karemera
Karemera wahoze ari impunzi muri Uganda, ni umunyarwanda ukomoka mu yahoze ari Perefegitura ya Byumba, wabaye Minisitiri wa mbere w’ubuzima w’u Rwanda rwa nyuma ya Jenoside.
Uwo mwanya yawuvuyeho agirwa Minisitiri w’Uburezi.
Ntakivugwa cyane ariko ni umwe mu bagitanga ibitekerezo bihamye mu muryango wa politiki akomokamo ari wo FPR Inkotanyi.
Minisitiri ushinzwe itumanaho no gutwara abantu n’ibintu: Immaculée Gahima Kayumba
Gahima wo mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi, ni umunya-Butare wabaye mu buhungiro mu gihugu cy’u Burundi mbere ya Jenoside.
Nubwo atakivugwa cyane, Madamu Gahima wanabaye umusenateri ubu ari mu Rwanda aho akorera imirimo itandukanye.
Minisitiri w’imibereho myiza: Mugabo Pie
Mugabo Pie yabaye Minisitiri w’imibereho myiza y’abaturage muri Guverinoma ya mbere y’ubumwe, ari umuyoboke w’ishyaka PL.
Uyu mugabo w’inzobere mu mategeko yanabaye umucamanza na Perezida w’Urukiko rukuru.
Aba mu Rwanda aho atanga serivisi zitandukanye zijyanye n’iby’amategeko.
Minisitiri ushinzwe impunzi: Dr Jacques Bihozagara
Nk’igihugu cyari kivuye muri Jenoside n’intambara yo kubohora igihugu, hari abaturage basaga miliyoni ebyiri bahunze kandi bakenewe mu kongera kubaka igihugu.
Byari ngombwa gushyiraho Minisiteri ishinzwe gucyura impunzi, cyane ko ubuhunzi bwari mu bibazo byatumye FPR Inkotanyi ishingwa.
Dr Bihozagara yitabye Imana muri Werurwe 2016, agwa muri Gereza ya Mpimba mu Burundi aho yari amaze umwaka afungiwe kubera impamvu za politiki.
Minisitiri w’Umuryango n’Iterambere ry’umugore: Inyumba Aloysia
Inyumba wakomokaga mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi ni we wagizwe Minisitiri ushinzwe iterambere ry’umuryango n’umugore.
Nk’uwaturukaga mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi, Inyumba yatangije urugamba rwo gutinyura no gushishikariza abagore kumva ko bashoboye, nyuma y’uko bari bamaze no kugira uruhare mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.
Yitabye Imana tariki 6 Ukuboza 2012 azize uburwayi.
Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko n’amashyirahamwe: Patrick Mazimhaka
Uyu mugabo wabaye umuyobozi wungirije wa FPR Inkotanyi mbere gato y’urugamba rwo guhagarika Jenoside, ni we wahawe kuyobora urubyiruko muri Guverinoma ya mbere yabayeho nyuma ya Jenoside.
Muri 2003 yatorewe kuba umuyobozi wungirije muri Komisiyo y’Akanama ka Afurika yunze Ubumwe.
Yitabye Imana ku wa 25 Mutarama 2018 azize uburwayi.
Minisitiri w’ingufu n’imirimo rusange: Charles Ntakirutinka
Charles Ntakirutinka yabaye Minisitiri w’ingufu n’imirimo rusange nk’umunyamuryango w’ishyaka PSD.
Ntakirutinka uvuka ku Gikongoro, mu 2001 afatanyije na Pasteur Bizimungu wahoze ari Perezida bashinze ishyaka PDR Ubuyanja ritari ryemewe n’amategeko.
Yatawe muri yombi mu gihe kimwe na Bizimungu mu 2002, ahamywa ibyaha birimo gukangurira abaturage kwigumura no kurema umutwe w’abagizi ba nabi.
Yakatiwe igifungo cy’imyaka icumi, ayirangiza mu 2012.
Ubu yasubiye mu buzima busanzwe ariko ntakigaragara mu bikorwa bya Politiki.
Minisitiri w’ubukerarugendo n’ibidukikije: Nayinzira Jean-Népomuscène
Nayinzira yabaye Minisitiri w’Ibidukikije n’ubukerarugendo muri guverinoma yaguye y’inzibacyuho yatangajwe ku wa 19 Nyakanga 1994, yari iyobowe na Faustin Twagiramungu.
Yaje kuba umudepite ariko mu 2002 aza kwegura mu nteko ishinga Amategeko ashinjwa imyitwarire idahwitse.
Nayinzira yagarutse mu ruhando rwa politiki ahatanira kuba Perezida wa Repubulika nk’umukandida wigenga, mu matora ya Perezida yo mu 2003.
Uyu mugabo wavukiye mu yahoze ari Perefegitura ya Gisenyi ku wa 10 Werurwe 1943, yitabye Imana kuwa 13 Kanama 2014.
Minisitiri w’Ubuhinzi, Ubworozi n’Amashyamba: Dr Iyamuremye Augustin
Iyamuremye wo mu ishyaka PSD ni we wabaye Minisitiri Minisitiri w’Ubuhinzi, Ubworozi n’amashyamba muri Guverinoma ya mbere y’Ubumwe, icyakora we yashyizweho tariki 18 Kanama 1994 hashize ukwezi abandi bari mu mirimo.
Yabaye Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga kuva mu 1999 kugeza muri 2000.
Yanabaye kandi Minisitiri w’Itangazamakuru.
Iyamuremye ni we wayoboye Komisiyo yashinzwe kwiga ku ngingo z’Itegeko Nshinga ryavuguruwe mu 2015.
Kuri ubu Iyamuremye ni umuyobozi w’Urwego rw’Igihugu Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye.
Minisitiri w’Igenamigambi, Birara Jean-Berchmas
Birara yagizwe Minisitiri tariki 2 Nzeri 1994 nyuma y’amezi asaga abiri Guverinoma nshya igiyeho.
Ni umunyapoliti uvuka mu yahoze ari Perefegitura ya Gisenyi.
Yirukanywe muri Guverinoma mu Ukwakira 1997.
Ubu ari mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru, aba mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Minisitiri w’Itangazamakuru: Nkuliyingoma Jean Baptiste
Nkuliyingoma yagizwe Minisitiri ahagarariye ishyaka MDR.
Akomoka mu yahoze ari Perefegitura ya Byumba.
Yavuye muri Guverinoma muri Kanama 1995 ubwo Twagiramungu wari Minisitiri w’Intebe yeguraga, bombi bafata iy’ubuhungiro.
Urebye urutonde rw’abaminisitiri ba Guverinoma ya mbere yagiyeho nyuma ya Jenoside, nta n’umwe ukiri muri Guverinoma.
Bake baracyari mu mirimo ya leta, abandi bari mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru kubera imyaka bagezeho; bahunze igihugu kubera amakosa bakoze abandi bakomeje imirimo mu rwego rw’abikorera.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, cyabeshyuje amakuru y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bigiye gusubukurwa, kivuga ko ibiri gukorwa ari kureba ingamba zazakurikizwa mu gihe kiri imbere ubwo gusubukura ubukerarugendo byaba byemejwe.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, cyabeshyuje amakuru y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bigiye gusubukurwa, kivuga ko ibiri gukorwa ari kureba ingamba zazakurikizwa mu gihe kiri imbere ubwo gusubukura ubukerarugendo byaba byemejwe.
Mu butumwa RDB yashyize ku rukuta rwayo rwa Twitter, yanditse ko amakuru ari gucaracara ajyanye n’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bigiye gufungurwa nyuma yo gufungwa kubera Coronavirus, ahabanye n’ukuri.
Iti “RDB iri kugisha inama Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, urwego rw’ubukerarugendo, n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa ku bitekerezo bijyanye no kuzafungura ibikorwa mu gihe kiri imbere.
Gahunda izemezwa izatangazwa binyuze mu nzira zemewe ndetse izanamenyekanishwa binyuzwe mu itangazamakuru.
Ubukerarugendo ni rumwe mu nzego zifatiye runini u Rwanda kuko mu 2019 mu musaruro mbumbe wose w’igihugu, bwari bufitemo 10% mu gihe na mbere yaho umusaruro w’ibyo igihugu cyinjiza biturutse mu bukerarugendo wagiye wiyongera ku kigero cya 11% na 9% kuva mu 2008 kugera mu 2019.
Kimwe n’ahandi ku Isi, ubukerugendo bw’u Rwanda bwagizweho ingaruka zikomeye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
By’umwihariko ibikorwa bikomeye byari byitezweho kwinjiriza igihugu amafaranga menshi nk’inama ya Commonwealth byarasubitswe, ndetse na ba mukerarugendo basuraga igihugu baragabanuka ku kigero cyo hejuru.
Muri Werurwe ubwo Coronavirus yagaragaraga mu Rwanda, habarurwaga ko abasura u Rwanda bagabanutseho 54% ndetse ibikorwa birenga 45% by’inama byari kuzakirwa mu gihugu byari byarasubitswe ndetse icyo gihe habarwaga igihombo gitewe na Coronavirus cya miliyoni 42 z’amadolari.
Mu mwaka ushize, ubukerarugendo bwinjiriye igihugu amafaranga menshi kuva mu 2011, kuko yageze kuri miliyoni 498 z’amadolari.
Sena ya Gabon kuri uyu wa Mbere yatoye ivana ubutinganyi mu byaha bihanwa n’amategeko y’icyo gihugu, nyuma y’icyumweru abadepite nabo batoye bashyigikira uwo mwanzuro.
Sena ya Gabon kuri uyu wa Mbere yatoye ivana ubutinganyi mu byaha bihanwa n’amategeko y’icyo gihugu, nyuma y’icyumweru abadepite nabo batoye bashyigikira uwo mwanzuro.
Iryo tegeko niriramuka risinywe na Perezida, Gabon izaba ibaye igihugu cya mbere muri Afurika cyemera abaryamana bahuje ibitsina mu mategeko yacyo.
Abanyamadini bagaragaje uburakari kuri iryo tegeko bavuga ko rigamije gushimisha abaterankunga b’abanyamahanga kurusha akamaro rifitiye abaturage ba Gabon.
Umwaka ushize nibwo muri Gabon hari hashyizweho igihano gihana ubutinganyi, aho ubufatiwemo yashoboraga gufungwa amezi atandatu cyangwa arenga.
Abaryamana bahuje ibitsina bararyamaganye bavuga ko rigamije gutuma bibasirwa.
Haracyari ibihugu byinshi muri Afurika aho ubutinganyi ari icyaha gikomeye ndetse gishobora no guhanishwa igihano cy’urupfu.
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, n’Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, n’Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE aravuga ko abo bagabo barwaniye imbere y’abayoboke b’ishami ry’Itorero Inkuru Nziza, riherereye mu Murenge wa Ngarama mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Abakristu bahise batabaza inzego z’umutekano, ubu abo bagabo bombi bacumbikiwe kuri Sitasiyo y’Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha ya Ngarama.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Ngarama Rugaravu Jean Claude yabwiye IGIHE ko basanze bapfa amakimbirane bari bafitanye ashingiye ku kutubahana nubwo hari amakuru avuga ko baba bapfuye amaturo.

Umujyi wa Kigali wemeje Ingengo y’imari uzakoresha mu 2020/2021 ingana na miliyari 100 Frw, yagabanutseho 19% ugereranyije n’iy’umwaka ushize yanganaga na miliyari 124 Frw.
Ni ingengo y’imari irimo amafaranga azaturuka mu kigega cya leta agera kuri 40%, azava mu misoro n’amahoro yinjizwa n’Umujyi wa Kigali nayo agera kuri 40% mu gihe andi akazava mu baterankunga batandukanye.
Imishinga y’ibikorwa remezo niyo izatwara ingengo y’imari nini igera kuri 51%, ibindi bikorwa bitware 49%.
Irimo imihanda na za ruhurura bizabanza kuzuzwa, kunoza ibyo gutwara abantu mu Mujyi wa Kigali, gucanira imihanda itandukanye no kubaka imihanda mishya ya kilometero zirenga 30.
Mu miturire biteganyijwe ko muri uyu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari, Umujyi wa Kigali uzakora inyigo kandi ugatangira kubakira abatuye mu manegeka harimo abo kuri ruhurura ya Mpazi n’abatuye ahashyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga muri Nyabisindu, Gatenga na Nyagatovu.
Harimo kandi kubaka inzu z’abatishoboye n’abasanzwe bafashwa n’Ikigega gifasha Abacitse ku icumu, FARG.
Muri gahunda zo gukura abantu mu bukene ziziharira 4.
9% by’ingengo y’imari hazabaho guhanga imirimo mishya ibihumbi 49 ndetse hafashwe n’amakoperative agamije kuzamura abayagize.
Mu yindi mishinga, iyi ngengo y’imari izasiga hubatswe ibyumba by’amashuri 1634 n’ubwiherero 2263 ndetse n’ibigo nderabuzima bishya bitatu.
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Pudence Rubingisa, yavuze ko igabanuka rya 19% rishingiye ku nguzanyo n’amafaranga y’abaterankunga ataragarutse mu ngengo y’imari y’uyu mwaka.
Mu mwaka ushize harimo umushinga minini wo kubaka imihanda ireshya n’ibilometero 54 yari yihariye miliyari 29 Frw.
Yavuze ko muri rusange amafaranga Umujyi wa Kigali winjiza n’azava muri leta yo aziyongera.
Ati “Kugabanuka kw’ingengo y’imari, urebye iyo tuzakoresha ni izava mu misoro n’amahoro iziyongera ku kigereranyo cya 10% n’izava mu kigega cya leta iziyongeraho 10%.
Izagabanuka ni izava mu baterankunga, ku buryo ariyo ituma tugabanukaho 19% ariko ni ayabaga yarafashwe mu gukora ibikorwa remezo nk’inkunga cyangwa umwenda ayo rero ntabwo ahari.
Rubingisa yagaragaje ko ingengo y’imari ikiri ntoya, atanga ingero avuga ko Umujyi wa Kigali ufite ruhurura 40 zo gukora ariko ukaba ufite gusa iyo gukora enye ndetse hakiri abagituye mu manegeka bakeneye gutuzwa neza n’imihanda ikeneye kubakwa n’ibindi.

Yubatswe mu 1975 n’Umuryango wahuzaga Ibihugu bya Afurika cyane cyane ibyakolonijwe n’u Bufaransa n’ibikoresha Igifaransa, Organization Commune Africaine et Malgache (OCAM).
Uwo muryango kuri ubu wazimye, u Rwanda rwawinjiyemo mu 1965.
Mu 1975, nibwo rwari kwakira inama yawo yagombaga kwitabirwa n’abakuru b’ibihugu bagera kuri 15.
Byari ihurizo rikomeye ku gihugu nk’u Rwanda cyari gifite hoteli nke zitwa ko zikomeye nka Mille Collines na Diplomate zari zigezweho icyo gihe ariko zifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abashyitsi baringaniye.
Muri icyo gihe u Rwanda rwiteguraga kwakira inama, inyubako za mbere za Village Urugwiro zubatswe ku mafaranga ya OCAM nkuko Rucagu Boniface, umwe mu bagize Urwego Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye yabibwiye IGIHE.
Inama ya OCAM irangiye, inyubako za Village Urugwiro zeguriwe Leta y’u Rwanda nayo izihinduramo hoteli yakiraga abifite muri ibyo bihe.
Nubwo Village Urugwiro yabaye hoteli, mu gihe u Rwanda rwabaga rwakiriye inama zikomeye yakomezaga kwifashishwa mu kwakira abashyitsi ba Leta.
Urugero ni tariki 21 na 22 Gicurasi 1979 ubwo u Rwanda rwakiraga inama ya Gatandatu ihuza u Bufaransa na Afurika yanitabiriwe na Perezida wari uyoboye u Bufaransa icyo gihe, Valéry Marie René Georges Giscard d’Estaing.
Mbere y’uko iyo nama iba, u Bufaransa bwari bwatanze amafaranga yo kwagura Village Urugwiro no kuyivugurura kugira ngo ijye ku rwego rwo kwakira inama ikomeye nk’iyo, nkuko biri mu nyandiko z’ibanga za Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda muri icyo gihe, zashyizwe hanze na WikiLeaks.
Uwo mwaka ni nabwo hubatswe hoteli Novotel Umubano (Marasa Umubano Hotel kuri ubu) nabwo ku mafaranga yatanzwe n’u Bufaransa.
Rucagu avuga ko nyuma yo kwagura Village Urugwiro, yasigaye igizwe n’inyubako (appartments) zisaga 20 zirimo amacumbi agezweho, ibyumba by’inama n’ibindi.
Amacumbi y’abadepite, ibiro bidahoraho bya Perezida
Juvénal Habyarimana amaze gufata ubutegetsi mu 1973, yahise asesa Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Yongeye kuyisubizaho mu 1981, abadepite ba mbere 70 b’inzibacyuho batangira imirimo mu 1982.
Kubera ubuke bw’amacumbi muri Kigali, Leta yemereye buri mudepite icumbi muri Village Urugwiro dore ko abenshi babaga baturuka mu bice bya kure badashobora gukora bataha iwabo.
Mu 1983 habaye amatora y’abadepite, Rucagu Boniface aba umwe muri bo ubwo yatangiraga imirimo mu 1984 na we ahabwa icumbi muri Village Urugwiro.
Umudepite yahabwaga icumbi gusa, ibyo kurya akimenya.
Rucagu avuga ko mu badepite 70, abasaga 40 babaga muri Village Urugwiro kuko babaga baturuka mu bice bya kure.
Uwabaga yifitiye inzu i Kigali, yayibagamo Leta ikamugenera amafaranga y’icumbi.
Rucagu ati “Uwabaga yifitiye inzu ye bamuhaga amafaranga ariko babanje kubyanga bavuga bati kuki mushaka kurara mu nzu zanyu kandi twarabageneye iza Leta, baraburana ariko byaje gukemuka nyuma.
Icyo gihe abadepite babamo, inzu zasagukaga zakomezaga kuba ibyumba bya hoteli bisanzwe, abashaka kubiraramo bakaza kwishyura.
Nubwo hari hoteli n’amacumbi y’abadepite, Perezida Habyarimana na we yahashyize ibiro ariko akajya abizamo rimwe na rimwe kuko ibiro nyamukuru byari mu mujyi rwagati, ahubatse Ibiro by’Umujyi wa Kigali ubu.
Rucagu ati “Iruhande rw’izo nzu haruguru y’ahahoze reception niho hari Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu.
Muri izo nzu zose ahagana ku rwinjiriro yari yarafashemo inzu y’ibiro bye, izindi zose zikomeza kuba hoteli.
Yari ibiro bya kabiri yazagamo nka rimwe cyangwa kabiri mu kwezi.
Buri nyubako (apartment) muri izo zari zigize Hotel Village Urugwiro yabaga ifite icyiciro runaka ibarizwamo.
Rucagu wahabaye mu gihe cy’imyaka 10 ari umudepite, avuga ko buri nyubako yabaga ifite ibyumba bitatu, ni ukuvuga A, B na C.
Icyumba A, cyabaga gifite ibyangombwa nkenerwa byose birimo uruganiriro, uburiri, ubwiherero, igikoni, harimo frigo n’ibindi, kikaba kigenewe Umukuru w’Igihugu mu gihe habaye inama cyangwa undi muntu wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wakirayemo.
Hafi y’icyo cyumba nyamukuru, habaga ikindi bise B, kikararamo umuganga w’umuntu mukuru waraye muri A.
Ni ukuvuga ko niba haraye Perezida, muri B hararaga umuganga we naho muri C hakarara abarinzi be.
Mu gihe habaga habaye inama zikomeye, abadepite bari barahawe amacumbi muri Village Urugwiro basabwaga kuvamo bakazagaruka inama yarangiye.
Rucagu ati “Batumenyeshaga mbere y’ukwezi, tukavamo bakahakoropa, bakahasukura bakavanamo umwanda wose, tukazagaruka baragiye.
Ubwo mu mirimo y’Inteko twariyeranjaga.

Jenoside imaze guhagarikwa, muri Nyakanga uwo mwaka Leta y’Ubumwe imaze kurahira Village Urugwiro aho kuba ibiro bidahoraho by’Umukuru w’Igihugu, yahindutse Ibiro byuzuye by’iminsi yose by’Umukuru w’Igihugu kugeza ubu.

“Tujye twirinda kumera nk’isenene aho uwazifashe yazishyize kandi mu kanya zitegereje gukarangirwa hamwe" ni impanuro Perezida Kagame yatanze tariki 5 Ugushyingo 2016 ubwo hizihizwaga imyaka 20 yari ishize umuryango Unity Club ushinzwe.
Izo mpanuro ni zimwe mu zikubiye mu gitabo gishya “Isoko tuvomaho Impanuro’’ Mutaganzwa Charles agiye gusohora, kigaruka mu buryo buvunaguye ku mbwiraruhame za Perezida Kagame, zagize uruhare mu kubaka igihugu nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994.
Ni igitabo gikubiyemo uduce tw’impanuro Perezida Kagame yagiye atanga mu bihe bitandukanye.
Ni igitabo kirimo izo mpanuro gusa, nta bindi bitekerezo by’umwanditsi byiyongeraho.
Mutaganzwa avuga ko impanuro za Perezida Kagame zagize uruhare rukomeye mu kongera kubaka igihugu haba mu bumwe n’ubwiyunge, iterambere, kwihesha agaciro, kurinda igihugu n’ibindi.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yatangiye kwandika icyo gitabo, yifuza ko izo mpanuro zikomeza kuba umusemburo w’impinduka nziza mu Rwanda ku bariho ubu n’abazaza nyuma.
Yagize ati “Narebye inama yatanze tukazishingiraho twubaka igihugu nyuma ya Jenoside n’uburyo yabanishije Abanyarwanda, mbona atari byiza ko twajya dukurikira imbwiraruhame ze bisanzwe ngo azivuge zigende zitambuke gusa […] Ndavuga nti nubwo nta kwandika impanuro zose yavuze, ariko najya ntoranya amagambo y’ingenzi yagirira abantu akamaro ku buryo abantu basigarana impanuro ze biyubaka ubwabo banubaka igihugu mu gihe kizaza.
Mutaganzwa yavuze ko impanuro za Perezida Kagame zifitemo ubushobozi bwo gufasha ushaka kubaka igihugu cyangwa umuryango muri rusange ndetse n’umuntu ku giti cye, by’umwihariko urubyiruko.
Ati “Ushaka kubaka igihugu mu buryo bwose cyangwa kwiyubaka ubwawe, iki gitabo cyagufasha ugendeye ku mpanuro za Perezida wa Repubulika.
Urubyiruko nirwo Rwanda rw’ejo, rushingiye rero kuri izi mpanuro za nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika, rwaba ari u Rwanda rumeze nkuko turwifuza.
Iki gitabo kigabanyijemo ibice 12 bivuga ko ngingo zitandukanye Perezida Kagame yagiye agarukaho mu mbwirarwaruhame ze nko kwihesha agaciro icyo ari cyo, kurinda igihugu, guteza imbere igihugu bishingiye kuri ba nyiracyo, inyungo n’isomo ryo guca mu ngorane n’ibindi.
Mutaganzwa yavuze ko igitabo cye “Isoko tuvomaho Impanuro" kizasohoka mu minsi ya vuba ari nabwo kizatangira kuboneka mu maguriro y’ibitabo hirya no hino mu gihugu.

Ikigo cy’Itumanaho MTN Rwanda cyatangaje ko guhera ku wa 1 Nyakanga kizahagarika kugurisha internet ya 4 G umuntu yajyaga akoresha ikarangira gusa bijyanye n’itariki yahawe, izwi nka 4G unlimited internet.
Iki kigo cyatangaje ko ariko abakiliya bari bayiguze bazakomeza kuyikoresha, kugeza iminsi 30 bahawe ubwo bayiguraga, irangiye.
Ni internet iyo umuntu yayiguze, yayikoreshaga yisanzuye nta mpungenge z’uko ishobora gushira ibyo ashaka gukora bitarangiye.
Mu butumwa yashyize ahagaragara, MTN Rwanda yakomeje iti "Ariko, nugura iyo internet yawe mbere y’iyo tariki yavuzwe, ushobora kuyikoresha kugeza irangiye nyuma y’iminsi 30 uhereye igihe wayiguriye.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko izindi bundle za 4G zizakomeza kugurwa abantu bakanze *345# nk’uko bisanzwe, bagakurikiza ibisabwa.
Imibare y’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere, RURA, yo kugeza ku wa 31 Werurwe 2020, igaragaza ko abakoreshaga internet mu Rwanda bari miliyoni 7.
MTN Rwanda niyo ifitemo benshi kurusha ibindi kigo kuko bari miliyoni 4.
Muri abo, abakoreshaga internet ya 4G bari 387,430, bivuze ko benshi bari ku muyoboro wa 2G na 3G.
RURA igaragaza ko muri icyo gihe ikoranabuhanga rya 4G LTE ryageraga kuri 97.
6% by’ubusobwose bw’igihugu, naho urebye aho abatrage batuye, rigera kuri 98.
Dear esteemed customers, we are sorry to announce that the 4G unlimited bundle will be discontinued as from 1st of July 2020.
The customers who had bought it will still use it until the end of their 30 days.
For more information call us on 100.

Kuri uyu wa 26 Kamena 2020 nibwo hitezwe umuhango wo gushyikiriza ibihembo by’ababashije gutsinda mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya MNI bigiye gutangirwa kuri Televiziyo Rwanda.
Kuri uyu wa 26 Kamena 2020 nibwo hitezwe umuhango wo gushyikiriza ibihembo by’ababashije gutsinda mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya MNI bigiye gutangirwa kuri Televiziyo Rwanda.
Ibi bihembo byatangiye bitangwa n’urubyiruko rwihurije hamwe, kuri ubu byatangiye kubona abaterankunga aho ku isonga RALC, yamaze kwinjiramo mu rwego rwo gushyigikira ubuhanzi nka kimwe mu biranga umuco.
Ibi bihembo bigiye gutangwa bwa kabiri bizashyikirizwa abahanzi babitsindiye mu minsi ishize, ibirori byo kubahemba bigakomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Nyuma y’ibiganiro binyuranye, ubuyobozi bw’iri rushanwa bwemeje ko ibi bihembo bizashyikirizwa abahanzi binyuze kuri Televiziyo Rwanda ku wa 26 Kamena 2020.
MNI yatangaje ko ibihembo bitangirwa kuri RTV kuri uyu wa Gatanu saa tanu z’amanywa aho kuba ku wa Gatandatu nk’uko byari byatangajwe mbere kubera gahunda zo Kwibohora ziteganijwe ku matariki yari yatangajwe mbere.
Igihembwe cya kabiri cyo gutora indirimbo eshatu cyatangiye tariki ya 1 Gashyantare 2020 kugeza tariki 30 Mata 2020.
Ni umuhango uzatangirwamo ibihembo bya Muzika (Music Awards) ndetse bigaherekezwa n’ishimwe ry’amafaranga ku ndirimbo eshatu zaje imbere ku rutonde mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, aho indirimbo ya mbere izahabwa 2,000,000 Frw, iya kabiri igahabwa 700,000 Frw, iya gatatu igahabwa 300,000 Frw.
Indirimbo ya Tonzi niyo yabashije kuza ku mwanya wa mbere, yegukana igihembo.
Usibye miliyoni agiye guhabwa nk’igihembo cy’indirimbo yatowe cyane, yanashyikirijwe 60% by’amafaranga abakunzi be bakoresheje bamutora.
Usibye Tonzi wabaye uwa mbere, Mutimawurugo Claire yegukanye 700 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje kubera indirimbo ye "Umunyenga w’intsinzi" mu gihe Bryan Lead we yabashije kuba uwa gatatu yegukana 300 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje ku ndirimbo ye "Open my eyes".
Ni ubwa kabiri igikorwa cyo gutora umuhanzi watsinze iri rushanwa kibaye.
Ubwa mbere cyabaye muri Mutarama 2020, ubwo igihembo cyegukanwaga n’itsinda ‘Umuti Mu nganzo’.
Umuhanzi Ganza yabaye uwa kabiri ahembwa ibihumbi 700 Frw naho umuhanzi Sam Muvunyi aba uwa Gatatu ahembwa ibihumbi 300 Frw.
rw ni urubuga rwa internet rushyirwaho indirimbo z’abahanzi batandukanye b’abanyarwanda maze abakunzi b’umuziki bagatora izo bakunze, ihize izindi nyuma y’amezi atatu igahabwa igihembo.
Umuhanzi ubwe ni we ufata iya mbere kugira ngo indirimbo ye igaragare kuri uru rubuga ashyiraho umubare w’indirimbo yifuza zose.
Ubuyobozi bw’uru rubuga ni bwo bwemeza ko indirimbo ijya ku rutonde rw’izihatanira igihembo nyuma yo kureba niba yujuje ibisabwa birimo no kuba uwayitanze ari nawe nyirayo.
Gutora bikorerwa ku rubuga rwa internet ariko utoye inshuro imwe acibwa amafaranga mirongo itanu (50Frw) yishyura akoresheje telefone ngendanwa akanze *611#.
Umuhanzi ahabwa 60% by’amafaranga yinjiye bitewe n’abamutoye naho 40% agasigarana ba nyir’umushinga.

8 z’amadolari ya Amerika winjizaga biturutse mu kohereza mu mahanga umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi.
Umugabane wa Afurika ushobora guhomba akayabo kangana na miliyari 4.
8 z’amadolari ya Amerika winjizaga biturutse mu kohereza mu mahanga umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi.
Imibare y’Ikigo McKinsey & Co.
igaragaza ko guhagarikwa kw’ingendo z’indege ndetse no gufunga kw’inganda zitunganya umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi mu bihugu by’u Burayi, byagize ingaruka zikomeye ku bahinzi ku buryo imibereho yabo izahinduka bakabura imirimo ndetse n’ibiciro bikagabanuka.
Muri Afurika, ubuhinzi bwihariye 23% by’umusaruro mbumbe wose w’ibihugu n’imirimo ku kigero cya 60% muri Afurika yo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara.
Ibyoherezwa mu mahanga kuri uyu mugabane biba biri hagati ya miliyari 35 z’amadolari ku mwaka na miliyari 40 z’amadolari.
Imibare ya McKinsey & Co igaragaza ko imboga n’imbuto zifite agaciro ka miliyoni ziri hagati ya 500 z’amadolari na miliyari ebyiri z’amadolari arizo zoherezwaga mu mahanga zivuye mu bihugu birimo Afurika y’Epfo.
Nko mu bihugu bya Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, byoherezaga mu mahanga ibicuruzwa birimo ikawa ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 200 z’amadolari, ku buryo amafaranga yavagamo yafashaga abahinzi barenga miliyoni 6.
Hose ubu ingano y’ibyoherezwaga mu mahanga yaragabanutse ku buryo hari ubwoba ko uyu mugabane uzahura n’igihombo gikabije.
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze guhindura uburyo abantu babaho, uko bakoraga n’uko bitwaraga, kuko mu rwego rwo gukumira iki cyorezo, bakangurirwa kwirinda kwegerana, bakagendera kure igikorwa cyatuma bahurira ahantu hamwe ari benshi.
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze guhindura uburyo abantu babaho, uko bakoraga n’uko bitwaraga, kuko mu rwego rwo gukumira iki cyorezo, bakangurirwa kwirinda kwegerana, bakagendera kure igikorwa cyatuma bahurira ahantu hamwe ari benshi.
Ubwo icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyari kimaze kugera mu Rwanda, mu ngamba Guverinoma yatangaje ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, harimo gufunga amashuri n’insengero, bitangazwa ko “amahuriro y’abantu benshi nk’imikino ndetse n’ubukwe bibaye bisubitswe.
Ni icyemezo gikomeye kuko abaturarwanda baha agaciro gakomeye insengero n’ubukwe.
Mu bindi bihugu aho abantu bagiye basanga batategereza ko Coronavirus iva mu nzira, aho amategeko yabo abyemera bagenda basezerana mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga.
Nko muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, Minisiteri y’Ubutabera yemeje ko ababishaka bashobora kugena itariki y’ubukwe, bagatanga ibyangombwa byabo mu ikoranabuhanga, umukuru w’idini akabasezeranya bidasabye ngo bamusange aho ari, abagomba kwitabira ubukwe bagahabwa ihuzanzira (link) banyuraho, nabo bakagaragara ku mashusho, ubukwe bugataha buri muntu atavuye aho ari.
Umukwe n’umugeni bo baba bari kumwe, abandi bose bari iwabo, kandi ntibibuze ko basangira icyo kunywa, umuziki, ibyishimo byose muri rusange.
Iki cyemezo muri UAE cyafashwe ubwo Dubai yari imaze gutangaza ko ihagaritse kugeza mu gihe kitazwi, ibikorwa binyuranye birimo ubukwe cyangwa gatanya.
Mu bindi bihugu nka Korea y’Epfo, mbere y’uko ibikorwa bifungwa kubera Coronavirus, abantu basezeranye mu kivunge bambaye udupfukamunwa, baba abasezeranye bwa mbere cyangwa abifuza gusubiramo isezerano ryabo.
Ni icyemezo gishoboka?
Kugira ngo ubu buryo bushoboke, bivuze ko umukwe n’umugeni baba bari ukwabo bakereye ubukwe, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge cyangwa Pasiteri, Padiri se, nabo bari ukwabo, imbere ya camera n’aho barebera ku mashusho.
Buri wese watumiwe mu bukwe yaba ari iwe, bakarebana mu buryo bw’amashusho bumva n’ubutumwa butangwa, nka kumwe abantu bakorana inama hifashishijwe uburyo bw’amashusho.
Minisitiri w’Ubutabera akaba n’Intumwa Nkuru ya Leta, Busingye Johnston, aheruka kubwira itangazamakuru ko ikoranabuhanga rimaze kugaragaza ko hari ibintu byinshi bishoboka, uhereye ku buryo imanza zatangiye kuburanishwa ndetse zigasomwa mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga, ababuranyi batavuye aho bari.
Yagize ati “Icyo ni igitekerezo cyiza […], Mineduc yatangiye gahunda yo kwigisha abana mu rugo, indege zatangiye gutwara ibintu atari abantu, natwe twatangiye kuburanisha dukoresheje iyakure, inama ya Guverinoma imaze guterana rimwe, ndakeka ko n’ubwa kabiri n’ubwa gatatu izaterana [mu ikoranabuhanga], turandika urwandiko tugasinya ntumenye ko nticaye ku meza ngo ndusinye, ubu twarabikoze.
Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu (Minaloc) ari nayo ishinzwe ibijyanye n’irangamimerere, ivuga ko kugira ngo ubu buryo bwo gusezeranya abantu mu iyakure bushoboke, hari amategeko byaba ngombwa ko ahinduka.
Umuyobozi Mukuru muri Minaloc Ushinzwe imiyoborere y’Inzego z’ibanze, Gakire Bob, yabwiye IGIHE ko ikoranabuhanga ryifashishwa n’abashaka gushyingiranwa mu bijyanye n’ibyemezo nkenerwa banyuze ku Irembo, ridakoreshwa ku munsi nyirizina wo gusezerana.
Ibyo ngo bigaterwa n’uko itegeko rigenderwaho uyu munsi rigenga abantu n’umuryango, rivuga ko "ugushyingiranwa k’umugabo umwe n’umugore umwe gukorewe mu butegetsi bwa leta ku bushake bwabo ni ko kwemewe", kandi gukorerwa "ku mugaragaro, imbere y’umwanditsi w’irangamimerere.
Ngo byasaba ko rihindurwa, ku buryo gusezerana mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga nabyo byakwinjizwa mu itegeko.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Gitega mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, Innocent Nyamutera, avuga ko abasezerana mu mategeko hari indahiro basoma bafashe ku ibendera ry’igihugu, abitabira uyu muhango bagahabwa umwanya mu kugaragaza niba hari impamvu zatuma batemererwa gushakana.
Ibyo ngo bikiyongeraho ko hari igihe nk’abantu basezeranye hambere mu kivunge, hari ubwo usanga batagaragara mu bitabo by’irangamimerere nk’abashyingiranwe, ku buryo hari ushobora kubikora kabiri.
Ati "Nk’indahiro wenda mu ikoranabuhanga bayisoma, ariko ku gufata ibendera sinzi uko byagenda.
Ikindi hari nk’uwaba yarabyaye umwana hanze ataramwandikisha, hari uwaba yarasezeranye akihisha mu gihe yabikoze ntibimenyekane, ashobora kuba yarabeshye nk’umukobwa akamwubakira inzu azi ko bazabana hari n’ibimenyetso bifatika, cyangwa umuhungu hari umukobwa bafitanye amakimbirane.
“Ibyo byose rero iyo baje urimo kubasezeranya, ubaza niba nta muntu ufite ikibazo kuri abo bagiye gushyingiranwa.
Nk’aho rero bishobora kuzagorana kuko ni ibintu bizaba bibereye mu ibanga.
Gusa nta we uhakana ko bitazashoboka bijyanye n’aho ibihe bigana, n’uburyo ikoranabuhanga rigenda ritera imbere.
Nyamutera yakomeje ati “Ikindi ni uko ubwo buryo bwaba bukoreshwa hifashishijwe ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, ariko hari imiryango ushobora gusanga itabifite.
Gusezerana mu itorero cyangwa idini
Uretse mu bijyanye no mu nzego za Leta, gusezerana mu buryo bw’idini ni ikindi kirebwaho, kuko abantu basezeranira mu rusengero baravuye mu Umurenge.
Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev Ephrem Karuranga, avuga ko muri ibi bihe nk’uko Leta yabisabye, abakirisitu basabwa kuba bitonze kuko ubukwe butemewe, gusa ngo mu buryo bw’igihe kirekire, gusezeranya abantu hakoreshejwe ikoranabunahanga ni ibintu byasuzumwa n’abakirisitu ubwabo bakabifataho icyemezo.
Ikindi ngo mu nyigisho bahabwa ni uko kugira ngo abantu babiri bashyingiranwe, hagomba kuha hari umukozi w’Imana ubaramburiraho ibiganza.
Yakomeje ati “Ikindi Bibiliya ivuga ko mu gusezeranya abantu bagomba kurambikwaho ibiganza, ubwo rero twareba icyo Bibiliya ivuga n’icyo ibihe bidusaba.
Kugeza ubu abaturarwanda bakomeje gusabwa kuguma mu rugo, ingamba zirimo gushyirwa mu bikorwa kugeza ku itariki 30 Mata 2020.
Kugeza ubu abamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Rwanda ni abantu 154 mu gihe 87 bamaze gukira, bivuze ko abakirwaye aria bantu 67.
Komisiyo y’Uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda (NCHR) yashyize hanze raporo y’agateganyo yerekana uko u Rwanda ruhagaze mu bijyanye n’iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19.
Komisiyo y’Uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda (NCHR) yashyize hanze raporo y’agateganyo yerekana uko u Rwanda ruhagaze mu bijyanye n’iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19.
Ibikubiye muri raporo ya NCHR bishingiye ku bugenzuzi iyi komisiyo yakoze muri ibi bihe igihugu gihanganye na COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus.
Iri genzura ryakozwe hagamijwe kureba uburyo iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu rihagaze, ibyavuyemo NCHR ikazabigenderaho igira inama inzego zitandukanye kugira ngo ibitanoze bizarusheho kunozwa.
NCHR mu gukusanya amakuru yibanze mu nguni zose z’ingingo zigize uburenganzira bwa muntu harimo uburenganzira bwo kubaho, ubwo kwishyira ukizana, ubwo gutanga ibitekerezo, ubwo kubona iby’ibanze mu buzima, ubwo kudateshwa agaciro hashingiwe ku miterere n’ibitekerezo byawe n’uburenganzira ku byo wemerewe n’amategeko.
Ku bijyanye n’uburenganzira bwo kubaho iyi komisiyo yasuzumye ibijyanye n’urupfu rw’abantu babiri bo mu Karere ka Nyanza, Umurenge wa Nyagisozi barashwe n’umupolisi muri Werurwe.
Muri iyi raporo NCHR igaragaza ko yakurikiranye iki kibazo isanga cyarageze mu Rwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha ndetse dosiye ikaba yaragejejwe mu Bushinjacyaha.
Ku bijyanye n’uburyo Abanyarwanda babasha kubona iby’ibanze mu buzima mu bihe bya COVID-19, iyi raporo igaragaza ko mu igenzura NCHR yakoreye mu bice bitandukanye by’Umujyi wa Kigali no mu Turere twa Nyanza, Kirehe na Rubavu, mu bihe bya guma mu rugo yasanze uburenganzira bwo kubona ibyo kurya bwarubahirijwe ndetse abatishoboye bakagenda bagobokwa na Leta, abaturanyi babo bifashije n’imiryango nterankunga.
NCHR yashimye iyi gahunda ivuga ko yafashije ba nyakabyizi babashaga kurya ari uko bakoze kuticwa n’inzara.
Mu bugenzuzi bw’iyi komisiyo yasanze mu Mujyi wa Kigali honyine mu bantu 215 052 bagombaga kugerwaho n’iyi nkunga y’ibiribwa abagera kuri 99% barayibonye kandi ikabasha kubagoboka.
Muri iyi raporo Umujyi wa Kigali kandi washimiwe gahunda washyizeho yo gutanga nimero ya telefoni ishobora kwifashishwa n’ufite ikibazo cy’ibyo kurya, gahunda yatumye abagera kuri 9432 bagobokwa.
Inerekana ko kandi hari imbaraga zashyizwe mu gukurikirana abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze bagaragaweho amakosa yo kunyereza inkunga.
Indi ngingo yasuzumwe na NCHR mu bijyanye n’iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda ni ikibazo cy’abasirikare b’u Rwanda bahohoteye abaturage bo mu Karere ka Gasabo, Umurenge wa Remera, Akagali ka Nyarutarama, Umudugudu wa Kangondo II.
Mu igenzura NCHR yakoze yashimye ko aba basirikare bakurikiranyweho gufata ku ngufu abagore batatu, kwiba no gukubita bagejejwe mu butabera ubu ikibazo cyabo kikaba kiri mu rukiko.
Uretse guhana abakoze amakosa, iyi raporo igaragaza ko Minisiteri y’Ingabo yanakoze ibishoboka byose mu gufasha abahohotewe ibajyana muri Isange One stop ndetse n’abagize ihungabana baraganirizwa n’ibyangijwe birarihwa.
Iyi komisiyo kandi yagaragaje ko uburengazira bwa muntu bwagiye bwubahirizwa mu buryo bwose bushoboka burimo gufasha abari mu nkiko gukomeza kuburana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, korohereza Abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga gutaha n’abanyamahanga bakoroherezwa gusubira iwabo.
Mu minsi ya vuba NCHR izashyira hanze indi raporo ivuga mu buryo bwuzuye ibijyanye n’igenzura yakoze ryerekana uko uburenganzira bw’ikiremwamuntu bwubahirijwe mu bihe cya Coronavirus.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko abantu 11 basanganywe Coronavirus mu bipimo 1217 byafashwe uyu munsi mu gihe abagera kuri batandatu basezerewe mu bitaro.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko abantu 11 basanganywe Coronavirus mu bipimo 1217 byafashwe uyu munsi mu gihe abagera kuri batandatu basezerewe mu bitaro.
Itangazo rya Minisante ryo ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki ya 19 Gicurasi 2020, rigaragaza ko mu ‘bipimo 1217 byafashwe, habonetse abarwayi bashya 11, batandatu bakize mu gihe nta wari wapfa.
Abarwayi bashya bagaragaye ni abashoferi b’amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka n’abo bakorana.
Kuva mu minsi ishize iki cyiciro cyatangiye kubonekamo abarwayi benshi ndetse byanatumye hakazwa ingamba zo gupima no kwita ku bakora mu bwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa n’ibikoresho byambukiranya imipaka.
Kuva umurwayi wa mbere agaragayeho Coronavirus mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, abantu 308 bamaze kuyisanganwa mu bipimo 52 335 bimaze gufatwa, muri bo abagera kuri 209 basezerewe mu bitaro.
Kuri ubu ibitaro byita ku barwayi ba Coronavirus biri kubarizwamo abantu 99 bakiri kwitabwaho n’abaganga.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri kandi Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yakiriye robots eshanu zahawe amazina ya Akazuba, Ikirezi, Mwiza, Ngabo n’Urumuri, zizakoreshwa by’umwihariko mu gupima umuriro no gukurikirana abarwaye Coronavirus no kubika amakuru yabo.
Ni uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwiyongera ku bundi u Rwanda rurimo kwifashisha mu rwego rw’ubuvuzi, nko gukoresha indege nto za drones mu kugeza amaraso ahabwa indembe mu bitaro bitandukanye, kuzifashisha mu gutera imiti yica imibu itera malaria no gutanga amakuru ajyanye no kwirinda Coronavirus.
Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Mujyi wa Wuhan mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019; kuri ubu 4 956 725 bamaze kuyandura ku Isi yose, barimo 323 095 yahitanye na 1 941 288 bamaze kuyikira.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro.
Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune cyangwa gukoresha alukoro yabugenewe, kwambara udupfukamunwa n’amazuru igihe cyose umuntu agiye aho ahurira n’abandi.
Padiri Amerika Victor, uyobora Paruwasi ya Nyabinyenga muri Diyosezi Gatolika ya Kabgayi agiye kumurika igitabo yise ‘Nzi uwo Nemeye’ gishishikariza abakiristu mu madini yose kumenya imvano y’ibyo bemera aho kuba imbata z’idini.
Padiri Amerika Victor, uyobora Paruwasi ya Nyabinyenga muri Diyosezi Gatolika ya Kabgayi agiye kumurika igitabo yise ‘Nzi uwo Nemeye’ gishishikariza abakiristu mu madini yose kumenya imvano y’ibyo bemera aho kuba imbata z’idini.
Muri iki gitabo, Padiri Amerika yashyizemo ibice bitandukanye bishingiye ku bushakashatsi na Bibiliya, bigaragaza ukuri kw’imyererere abantu bajya bibazaho.
Avugamo inzira ikwiriye abanyamadini kuri ubu basa n’abarajwe ishinga no kurwana intambara zishingiye ku myemerere, ugasanga barwanira abayoboke kurusha uko bwaranira kwigisha ukuri kw’ijambo ry’Imana.
Agaruka no ku bibazo bigaragara mu muryango ariko bitavugwaho rumwe, nk’ibijyanye no kwihorera, gusenda abagore, kuboneza urubyaro n’ibindi.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Padiri Amerika yavuze ko yagize igitekerezo cyo kwandika iki gitabo nyuma yo kwegerwa na bamwe mu bakiristu ayoboye akumva ibibazo bakunze kumubaza bigaragaza ko hari ibyo badasobanukiwe.
Yabihereye kandi mu gace paruwasi ayobora iherereyemo kabonekamo amadini menshi ariko ugasanga ashishikajwe no gushaka abayoboke asebya andi aho kwigisha ukuri kw’ijambo ry’Imana kuboneka muri Bibiliya.

Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu zigiye kohereza kuri Mars icyogajuru cya mbere kizahaguruka ku Isi ku wa 14 Nyakanga 2020, mu butumwa bwahawe izina ryitwa “Hope" cyangwa se “Icyizere" mu Kinyarwanda.
Icyogajuru kizajya kuri Mars muri ubu butumwa, byitezwe ko kizakora urugendo rw’ibilometero miliyoni 493 kugira ngo kigere kuri uyu mubumbe.
Nibura igihe cya hafi kizagererayo ni muri Gashyantare umwaka utaha.
Ni umushinga umaze igihe kuko watangiye gutegurwa mu 2014, abahanga bazagenzura urwo rugendo batangira kwitoza, ndetse n’icyogajuru gitangira guteranywa, hakorwa n’amasuzuma atandukanye hitegurwa ibibazo by’ikirere bishobora kuzavuka mu nzira.
Intego y’ingenzi ni ukugera kuri Mars hanyuma abahanga mu by’isanzure bakagenzura ibijyanye n’ikirere cyaho.
Barashaka kuzamenya impamvu kuri uyu mubumbe haba ikibazo cy’umwuka wa hydrogène na oxygène mu gihe uyu mubumbe ufite byinshi uhuriyeho n’isi dutuye.
Ibizava muri ubwo bushakashatsi bizahabwa ibigo 200 bikora ubushakashatsi mu by’isanzure birimo na NASA, kugira ngo bizitabweho mu zindi ngendo zigana kuri uyu mubumbe.
Icyogajuru kizoherezwa kuri Mars kizaba gifite camera zakozwe n’Abayapani zifite ubushobozi buhambaye bwo gufata amakuru n’amashusho y’umukungugu ugaragara kuri Mars.
Kizaba gifite kandi irindi koranabuhanga rihambaye ryakozwe n’abahanga bo muri Kaminuza ya leta ya Arizona muri Amerika, rizifashishwa mu gufata ibipimo by’umwuka biri hejuru n’ibiri hasi bigaragara kuri uyu mubumbe.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, BNR, yakuyeho amabwiriza yari yashyizeho agena amafaranga ntarengwa amakoperative yo kubitsa no kugurizanya (SACCOs) yemerewe kubikuriza abanyamuryango bayo.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, BNR, yakuyeho amabwiriza yari yashyizeho agena amafaranga ntarengwa amakoperative yo kubitsa no kugurizanya (SACCOs) yemerewe kubikuriza abanyamuryango bayo.
Izo ngamba zari zashyizweho ku wa 24 Werurwe 2020 nyuma y’iminsi ibiri ibikorwa byinshi bihagaritswe, abaturage bagasabwa kuguma mu ngo hirindwa ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Izo ngamba zavugaga ko nta SACCO yemerewe kurenza amafaranga ibihumbi 150, abikuzwa n’umunyamuryango umwe usanzwe, mu cyumweru.
SACCO kandi ntabwo yari yemerewe kubikuriza arenze ibihumbi 500 Frw mu cyumweru ku mucuruzi w’ibiribwa cyangwa ucuruza ibikoresho by’ibanze mu gihe aho SACCO ikorana n’amatsinda, buri tsinda ryari ryemerewe kubikuza amafaranga yo kugabana ku buryo buri munyamuryango w’itsinda atarenza ibihumbi 50 mu cyumweru.
Nyuma y’uko inama y’abaminisitiri yateranye kuwa 30 Mata 2020 yemereye bimwe mu bikorwa gukomeza, BNR yakuyeho ayo mabwiriza.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Guverineri wa BNR, John Rwangombwa rigira riti “Ibipimo ntarengwa byihariye byo kubikuza byari byashyizweho n’itangazo ryo kuwa 24 Werurwe 2020 bikuweho kugira ngo abanyamuryango b’ayo makoperative babashe gukora imirimo yabo nta nzitizi.
BNR yasabye SACCO gukomeza gukurikiza amategeko n’amabwiriza asanzwe agenga urwego rw’imari iciriritse.
