Habiyaremye Zacharie wamenyekanye nka Bishop Gafaranga yatangiye gusohora filime “Bavakure" ishingiye ku nkuru y’ubuzima bushaririye yanyuzemo kuva mu bwana kugeza aho ari ubungubu nk’umugabo wubatse unafite abana.
Habiyaremye Zacharie wamenyekanye nka Bishop Gafaranga yatangiye gusohora filime “Bavakure" ishingiye ku nkuru y’ubuzima bushaririye yanyuzemo kuva mu bwana kugeza aho ari ubungubu nk’umugabo wubatse unafite abana.
Iyi filime ishingiye ku buzima bushaririye Bishop Gafaranga yanyuzemo ari gushyira hanze igaragaza abasore babiri bavuka mu muryango utishoboye ariko papa wabo akaba umusinzi ku buryo n’utwo binjizaga yaturyaga.
Iyi ihuye n’ubuzima bw’uyu musore uvuka mu bana 12, akaba yaravukiye mu cyahoze ari Cyangugu.
Iyo muganiriye akubwira ko atazi neza itariki yavukiyeho.
Ati “Isabukuru yanjye yo nayihawe n’inshuti yanjye yahisemo kumfasha kwizihiza umunsi navukiyeho, nakuze ntabasha kubaza umubyeyi wanjye igihe navukiye kuko nari umwana.
Nubwo aterura ngo abivuge neza, Bishop Gafaranga ahamya ko yavukiye mu muryango urimo abana badahuje ababyeyi bose byatumye bakurira mu buzima bubi.
Bishop Gafaranga ati “Ku myaka icumi y’amavuko ndibuka neza ko nari naratangiye kujya njya gupagasa, iwacu bajyaga kwisuma nko kwikorera ibishyimbo ugasanga nanjye nagiye ndetse bampemba bagakuraho ayo bifashisha mu guhaha n’ibindi.
Bishop Gafaranga avuga ko yize amashuri abanza yagera mu wa gatatu akarivamo kubera kunanirwa ahanini kwabaga gutewe n’inzara yatumaga asinzira mu ishuri.
Nyuma yo kuva mu ishuri yakoze imirimo itandukanye irimo kujya gushaka akazi ko kuba umushumba, aha akaba yarahahuriye n’umubyeyi wamuvanye mu bushumba amujyana gukora amasambusa mu isoko ari naho yavanye ubwenge bwo gucuruza.
Uyu mubyeyi bakoranye mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri yamuvuyeho yerekeza mu mujyi wa Kigali aho yari arangiwe akazi ko kudaha ibirayi mu iduka ry’umuntu wari utuye i Nyamirambo.
Aha ntabwo Bishop Gafaranga yahamaze igihe ahubwo yahise ajya kubana na mukuru we wacuruzaga imyenda ayizunguza, uyu yamwinjije mu mwuga wo kuzunguza imyenda kugeza ubwo bananiranywe.
Yagize ati “Byaje gucamo bigenda neza, twaracuruzanyije tugera ubwo dufungura akabari k’ikigage n’izindi nzoga ngeze mu makesi 47 mukuru wanjye yaranyambuye mpita njya kubana n’undi muvandimwe wari umuyede.
Bishop Gafaranga avuga ko yakoranye ikiyede n’uyu mukuru we wundi ariko biza kwanga bitewe n’ubuzima butari bwiza, byatumye uyu munyarwenya akaba n’umukinnyi wa filime asubira mu buzunguzayi ariko noneho yinjira mu bucuruzi bw’inkweto.
Uyu mugabo wari warihebeye ubuzunguzayi umunsi umwe yaje gufatwa arafungwa, nyuma y’icyumweru kirenga ari muri gereza yafashe icyemezo cyo kubivamo atangira kujya gushakishiriza mu masoko.
Yakoreye i Remera, akorera Nyabugogo, Kimisagara n’ahandi, kuri ubu uyu ni umucuruzi w’inkweto ufite iduka rikomeye mu mujyi wa Kigali ahazwi nko ku Muteremuko.
Nyuma yo kwisuganya mu bucuruzi, Bishop Gafaranga wari ufite impano yo gutebya yisanze ari ibintu abashije kubyaza umusaruro ndetse bituma aba ikimenyabose.
Bishop Gafaranga kandi yatangiye kwandika igitabo kirekire cy’ubuzima yanyuzemo ariko byinshi mu bigikubiyemo akaba yifuza kubikina muri iyi filime ye nshya yise “Bavakure".
Iyi ayikinanamo n’abandi bakinnyi banyuranye barimo na Muhutukazi Marie Mediatrice wamenyekanye mu ikinamico Urunana nka Kankwanzi.
Bishop Gafaranga iyi filime y’uruhererekane yatangiye kuyisohora abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Youtube, kuri ubu amaze gusohora uduce tubiri twayo.

Uduce twa Filimi ’Bavakure’ Bishop Gafaranga amaze gusohora
Iyo witegereje neza, ibibera mu isi ya none, ubona ibintu byinshi bitera kwibaza cyane! Turi mu isi yihuta cyane muri byinshi, turi mu isi irimo byinshi by’amayobera, turi mu isi irimo byinshi byarenze ubwenge bwa muntu.
Iyo witegereje neza, ibibera mu isi ya none, ubona ibintu byinshi bitera kwibaza cyane! Turi mu isi yihuta cyane muri byinshi, turi mu isi irimo byinshi by’amayobera, turi mu isi irimo byinshi byarenze ubwenge bwa muntu.
Muri urwo ruvangavange rw’ibishimisha, n’ibiteye ubwoba, ibibabaje ni iby’amayobera.
Abantu bagenda bishakira ibisubizo byabafasha kurenga ibyo byose, bakabishaka ku bubi na bwiza nubwo byabasaba kurenga cyangwa kwica nkana amategeko y’Imana cyangwa ayashyizweho kubera ineza y’abantu.
Nk’uko tubisanga mu gitabo cy’Abamakabe, ibyo babigereranije no guhatira abantu kurya inyama z’ingurube kandi zarabuzwaga n’amategeko(2Makabe7,1).
Twibuke ko kuva mu ntangiriro ubwo umuntu yiteshaga umubano mwiza yari afitanye n’Imana, icyaha cyahise gikwira isi, ni uko isi iba igushije ishyano guhera ubwo, amakuba, ibiza n’ibindi bizazane bigera ku kitwa icyaremwe cyose.
Uko muntu azarushaho kugenda atera Imana umugongo, abatuye isi ntituzabura kugenda duhura n’ingaruka z’uko kwivumbura no kwikorera ibyo twishakiye, uko ibihe bizahora bisimburana.
Pawulo Mutagatifu ati ibi ‘twabyongeraho iki’?
Twabishaka tutabishaka, ingaruka z’imigirire n’imyitwarire mibi ya muntu zigera kandi zizakomeza kugera ku cyaremwe cyose.
Abahatira abandi cyangwa bihatira ubwabo kurya kubyo bise inyama z’ingurube bazahoraho; ibintu bizayobya abantu n’ibizabagusha mu cyaha ntibizabura muri iyi si.
Niyo mpamvu Pawulo ahamagarira buri wese kubibona, kubyumva kandi akabyakira ariko ntihagire na kimwe kimukura mu mubano mwiza we n’Imana.
Aradushishikariza gukomeza guhanga amaso Imana ishobora byose.
Nimurebe namwe ukuntu ubutunzi burimo gutuma abantu bibagirwa Imana bakibagirwa n’abavandimwe.
Nimurebe ukuntu abantu bamaranira ikuzo n’icyubahiro nyamara tuzi neza ko ikuzo, icyubahiro ari iby’Imana !Mutagatifu Thérèse w’Umwana Yezu ati"Imbere y’Imana usumba abandi ni upfukamye".
Yezu Kristu nawe yabiduhayemo urugero, ubwo yacaga bugufi akoza ibirenge by’abigishwa be kuwa kane Mutagatifu.
Arongera ati: “ushaka kuba mukuru yigire umugaragu w’abandi".
Ibyago by’amoko yose ,uburwayi budakira, inzara n’ibindi bitagira ingano hirya no hino ku isi, biteye ubwoba, birahangayikishije ku buryo hari abafashe ibyemezo byo kwigira ku Mana ivuga y’ibitangaza ibabeshya umukiro w’akanya gato, nuko bitandukanya burundu na nyagasani Imana isumba byose, umuremyi w’ijuru n’isi.
Bamwe byabateye kwishyira hejuru, abandi batera Imana n’ibyayo umugongo, nuko bihimbira Imana zindi barazisenga ndetse bagahatira n’abandi kuziyoboka no kuzisenga.
Pawulo Mutagatifu we amaze kubibona, amurikiwe na Roho Mutagatifu, yateruye ashize amanga aburira abantu bo mugihe cye ndetse nabo mu gihe kizaza.
Ati “niba Imana turi kumwe ninde waduhangara"?
Kuri we kubana n’Imana mu buzima bwacu, tukayizirikaho, nicyo cyadutsindira ibi byose.
Pawulo arahamya ashize amanga, ko nubwo ibyo byose biba, bikatugwirira rimwe na rimwe nta ruhare tubigizemo, Imana idukunda ihorana umugambi wo kudukiza no kuturengera, igihe cyose.
Cyane cyane kubayemera n’abayikomeyeho, kandi yarabigaragaje, ubwo yatangaga Yezu kristu ngo acungure muntu.
(Rom 8,32).
Ntacyo tuzayiburana, ntacyo itazadukorera nidukomeza kubana nayo, amizero yacu yose tukayashyira muri yo.
Ibiteye ubwoba bizaza, ibyorezo bize, inzara, n’ibindi.
Ati“Nyamara muri ibi byose, turatsinda kakahava tubikesha uwadukunze kandi ukomeza kudukunda" (Rm8,39).
Bakristu bavandimwe, baca umugani mu kinyarwanda ngo "Uwigiza nkana arara butunda areba ikirago".
Yezu yaravuze ati “Imbuto y’ingano iyo itaguye mu gitaka ngo ihugute ikomeza kuba yonyine".
Kuki twakwirengagiza ingero nziza z’abantu cyagwa abakurambere bacu mu kwemera babayeho mu bihe bitandukanye, bagahura na byinshi bibarenze, nyamara nti ‘bateshuke inzira nziza, yo gukomeza kubaha no kumvira Imana muri byose.
Nk’uko tubisanga mu Ivanjili ya Yohani, Yezu Kristu aratubwira kandi atwereka ko ibitubaho byose, atari ukugira ngo bitubere impamvu yo gucumura, cyangwa guhunga Imana, ahubwo arifuza ko byatuma turushaho gukomera no kwera imbuto, mu bukristu bwacu, kandi zikagirira bose akamaro.
Ati “imbuto y’ingano iyo itaguye mu gitaka ngo ihugute, ikomeza kuba yonyine" (Yoh 12, 24).
Ingero ni nyinshi, mu gitabo cy’Abamakabe batubwiye uko abavandimwe barindwi banze rwose kwica amategeko, no guhemukira Imana y’abasekuruza, maze bagahitamo gupfa bababaye ariko bafite icyizere cy’ubuzima buzahoraho.
Urundi rugero, ni urw’abavandimwe bahowe Imana i Bugande, bakemera kuzira kumvira Imana, aho kuyisuzugura no kuyisimbuza amakuzo y’isi.
Twibuke kandi tuzirikane ubutumwa bw’Umubyeyi Bikiramariya i Kibeho, yaravuze ati “Umwana wa Bikiramariya ntatana n’Umusaraba".
None se bavandimwe, ni iki koko mubona cyadutandukanya n’Imana, n’urukundo idukunda?
Nituzirakane ko habaho ijoro hakabaho n’amanywa, tureke gushaka ko hahoraho amanywa gusa, ibihe biha ibindi; imvura iragwa, izuba rikava.
Tuzirikane ko nta cyasimbura Imana, mu buzima bwa muntu.
Twihatire kubana nayo, tuvugurura amasezerano atandukanye twagiye tugirana nayo mu bwicishe bugufi, nk’uko bavuga mu Kinyarwanda ngo “uwicisha bugufi ahinga itongo ry’inkuba".
Ibihinda, ibyorezo, ibiza, ibintu byinshi by’amayobera, bizaza kandi bigende uko byaje.
Mu kinyarwanda baravuga kandi bati“agasozi kanyerera ugatega Kamena na Nyakanga".
Nti mukuke umutima uwo ni Nyagasani Yezu ubivuga, ati “nimwemere Imana nanjye munyemere".
Dusenge: Nyagasani Yezu Kristu, Wahoraga ubwira intumwa zawe uti ‘mwigira ubwoba, ntihakagire ikibahagarika umutima kuko muri kumwe’.
Uhe abatuye isi imbaraga, zo kukugarukira no kubana nawe mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Muri iyi si yuzuye byinshi bishaka kutujyana kure yawe, kuko tutari kumwe twarindagira tukayoba, kuko tutifuza ko hari na kimwe cyadutangukanya nawe, wowe ubaho ugategeka iteka ryose.

Iki kigega kigamije gutera inkunga ibikorwa by’abikorera byahungabanyijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, aherutse gutangaza ko ari ikigega kizafasha amabanki gutanga inguzanyo iciriritse ibyo byiciro byose kugira ngo bigaruke mu kazi byongere bikore, bibyare umusaruro uzagire ingaruka mu kuzamuka k’ubukungu muri rusange.
Muri iki kigega hashyizwemo ingamba zihariye zifasha amahoteli kuvugurura amasezerano y’inguzanyo afite mu mabanki akaba igihe kirekire n’inyungu zikagabanuka, ndetse ku buryo mu gihe yatangiye gufungura, abona amafaranga aciriritse kugira ngo imirimo yongere ikore.
Imikorere y’iki kigega ireba amabanki 16 y’ubucuruzi n’ibigo by’imari biciriritse.
Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu niyo izagicunga, gusa amafaranga ku bakiliya azajya atangwa n’amabanki.
Ku ikubitiro leta yemeye gushyiramo miliyari 100 Frw ariko hagakomeza gushakwa abandi bashyiramo amafaranga kugira ngo cyaguke.
Usibye ku mahoteli, kizafasha mu gutanga igishoro ku bucuruzi bwagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus kugira ngo bukomeze gukora no kudahagarika abakozi, hari kandi inguzanyo ku bucuruzi buto n’ubuciriritse nabwo bwibasiwe na COVID-19.
Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu izacunga imikorere yacyo, izaguriza amabanki kugira ngo nayo agurize abakiliya bayakeneye.
Gusaba inguzanyo bizakorwa binyuze muri banki zibishinzwe, nazo zizajya zikurikirana ikibazo, nyuma zohereza kuri BNR ibyifuzo by’abasabye gufashwa kugira ngo bisuzumwe biganishe no ku cyemezo cya nyuma.
Nyuma yo kwemezwa, amabanki azatanga amafaranga kuri konte y’uwayasabye hanyuma ibyakozwe bigaragarizwe BNR ari nayo izatuma amafaranga agera kuwasabye.

Umuvunyi Mukuru, Anastase Murekezi, yatangaje ko hari abayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta 15 bari gukurikiranwa mu butabera kubera kunanirwa gusobanura inkomoko y’umutungo wabo nk’uko biteganywa n’amategeko.
Umuvunyi Mukuru, Anastase Murekezi, yatangaje ko hari abayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta 15 bari gukurikiranwa mu butabera kubera kunanirwa gusobanura inkomoko y’umutungo wabo nk’uko biteganywa n’amategeko.
Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 29 Kamena 2020, ubwo biro ya Sena y’u Rwanda yakiraga Inyandiko z’Imenyekanishamutungo y’Umuvunyi Mukuru n’Abavunyi Bungirije n’iy’abandi bakozi b’Urwego rw’Umuvunyi.
Kwakira, kubika no gukurikirana buri mwaka amakuru agaragaza imitungo nyakuri y’abayobozi b’igihugu kuva ku rwego rwo hejuru kugera ku rwo hasi n’abandi bakozi bateganywa n’Itegeko, ni imwe mu shingano nyamukuru Urwego rw’Umuvunyi.
Muri uyu mwaka wa 2020, abagomba kumenyekanisha imitungo yabo mu gihugu ni ibihumbi 13.
Tariki ya nyuma yo kumenyekanisha imitungo ikaba ari 30 Kamena 2020.
Nyuma yo gushyikiriza Sena inyandiko z’imenyekanishamutungo, Umuvunyi mukuru Anastase Murekezi yavuze ko mu bayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta basabwa kumenyekanisha umutungo wabo, abamaze kubikora bagera ku 11000.
Yavuze ko hari abantu 15 bari gukorwaho iperereza n’abashyikirijwe ubutabera kubera ko bananiwe gusobanura inkomoko y’umutungo wabo.
Yavuze ko muri abo 15, dosiye za batandatu zohererejwe inkiko, barindwi baracyakorwaho iperereza mu bugenzacyaha naho babiri baracyakorwa iperereza n’Umuvunyi.
Ahanini kumenyekanisha umutungo ku bayobozi n’abakozi ba Leta, bigamije kwirinda ko hari abayobozi bigwizaho imitungo bayikomoye ku kunyereza ibyagenewe rubanda.
Ku bakunda kwandikisha imitungo ku bandi bantu ngo batazavumburwa, Umuvunyi Mukuru Murekezi yabihanangirije, abasaba kubireka kuko ari igikorwa kigayitse, kandi abafatwa bibagiraho ingaruka zikomeye.
Yasabye kandi abataramenyekanisha imitungo yabo kubikora vuba bitarenze kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 30 Kamena, bitaba ibyo bagahanwa.
Bimwe mu bihano bishobora guhabwa umuyobozi cyangwa umukozi utamenyekanishije umutungo harimo kugawa ku mugaragaro mu nyandiko cyangwa bagakatwa ¼ cy’umushara n’ibindi.

U Rwanda ruritegura kwifatanya n’Isi mu birori by’Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Ingoro Ndangamurage uzizihizwa hatangizwa imurika ry’ibihangano by’ubugeni by’abahanzi b’abari n’abategarugori.
Buri mwaka tariki 18 Gicurasi Isi yizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Ingoro Ndangamurage, hazirikanwa umuco, amateka n’imibereho gakondo by’abatuye Isi.
U Rwanda narwo rwifatanya n’amahanga mu kwizihiza uwo munsi ushimangira agaciro ko guhererekanya amateka no guteza imbere umuco ufatwa nk’umusingi w’imibereho y’igihugu.
Urwa Gasabo rubarizwa mu Muryango Mpuzamahanga w’Ingoro Ndangamurage (ICOM) uhuriyemo abanyamuryango basaga 44 000 bakora mu ngoro ndangamurage 20 000 zo mu bihugu 138.
Muri uyu mwaka, uyu munsi wahawe insanganyamatsiko ivuga ku kugira “Ingoro ndangamurage zigamije uburinganire, ubudasa no kudaheza’’.
Kuri iyi nshuro iki gikorwa cyateguwe mu buryo bwihariye aho hazifashishwa ikoranabuhanga bitewe n’ingamba zashyizweho zo guhangana n’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Ni muri urwo rwego Ingoro ndangamurage zo mu bihugu binyamuryango bya ICOM zasabwe kucyizihiza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda (INMR) cyizizihiza ibi birori hafungurwa ku mugaragaro imurika rishya mu Ngoro y’Ubugeni n’Ubuhanzi iherereye i Kanombe, ku wa 18 Gicurasi 2020.
Iri murika ry’ibihangano by’ubugeni ryahawe insanganyamatsiko ivuga iti “Ubutumwa bw’abanyabugeni b’Abanyarwandakazi: Uburinganire kuri bose.
Ni insanganyamatsiko yari yagenwe ku Munsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abari n’Abategarugori [yasubitswe kubera ingamba zo guhangana na Coronavirus], ariko inahurirana n’iyatanzwe na ICOM uyu mwaka wa 2020.
Iyo urebye mu byiciro bitandukanye bibarizwamo abari n’abategarugori mu Rwanda, usanga baragize uruhare mu bikorwa by’iterambere ry’ubukungu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994; ariko basigara inyuma mu bijyanye n’ubugeni bitewe n’impamvu zirimo ubushobozi buke, kubura amahugurwa ahagije mu bijyanye n’ubugeni n’izindi mbogamizi zo mu buzima busanzwe.
Ushingiye no ku bihangano bimuritse mu Ngoro y’Ubugeni n’Ubuhanzi y’i Kanombe “Hari icyuho kinini hagati y’ibihangano by’abagore n’abagabo.
Ibi ntibisobanuye ko badashoboye, bafite impano muri bo kuko na bake bari muri uwo mwuga bakora ibihangano byiza cyane, bimwe muri byo bifite ubwiza burenze ibya basaza babo.
Imurika rizakorwa nk’uburyo bwo gukora ubukangurambaga mu bari n’abategarugori, binyuze mu butumwa bukubiye mu nsanganyamatsiko y’imurika no mu bihangano byabo byateguwe kandi bizamurikwa, bakangurirwa kwigirira icyizere, gutinyuka no kugaragaza impano bafite mu by’ubugeni.
Iri murika ryateguwe hagamijwe gufasha abahanzikazi bato no kubaharurira inzira zo kungukira mu bikorwa byabo; gufasha abanyabugeni b’abagore gutegura ibikorwa byo kumurika ibihangano byabo; kwerekana agaciro ko gushora mu bushobozi bw’umugore no kubafasha kugeza imishinga yabo ku rwego mpuzamahanga, byanafasha abandi kubigiraho.
Rizahuza abanyabugeni b’abari n’abategarugori 35 bo mu bihugu bitandatu birimo u Rwanda, Amerika, u Bufaransa, u Bubiligi, Serbia na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
INMR yateguye iri murika ifatanyije n’Ikigo Ndangamuco cy’Abadage Goethe Institut-Kigali.
Ibyo bigo byombi byafashije abari n’abategarugori b’abanyabugeni mu kuritegura, kubaha amahugurwa n’ubushobozi bwo gukora ibihangano byabo no gutunganya imurika riboneye.

Biteganyijwe ko umukozi w’Ingoro ndangamurage azasobanurira abazakurikira iki gikorwa ibijyanye n’imurika, ababwira ubutumwa bukubiye mu bihangano bigize imurika nkuko bigenda mu gihe bari gusura bisanzwe.
U Rwanda rufite Ingoro z’Umurage umunani zimuritse umurage n’amateka by’igihugu ku mibereho y’abagituye, imyemerere, imyidagaduro, imyambarire, imiziro n’imiziririzo, amateka yacyo.
Nyuma ya gahunda ya Guma mu rugo yashyizweho mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, ibikorwa byo gufungura imiryango ku basura ingoro ndangamurage byarasubukuwe ku wa 5 Gicurasi 2020.
Ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 28 Mata nibwo hagiye hanze amakuru y’uko kapiteni w’Amavubi, Niyonzima Haruna, aherutse gukora ubukwe n’umugore wa kabiri, Niyitegeka Consolée ’Cassa Rayaan’, bwabaye mu ibanga muri Tanzania.
Ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 28 Mata nibwo hagiye hanze amakuru y’uko kapiteni w’Amavubi, Niyonzima Haruna, aherutse gukora ubukwe n’umugore wa kabiri, Niyitegeka Consolée ’Cassa Rayaan’, bwabaye mu ibanga muri Tanzania.
Haruna Niyonzima yari amaze imyaka ibiri akundana n’uyu mukobwa ndetse kuri ubu babana muri Tanzania kuva asubiyeyo mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka, aho yasubiye muri Yanga SC.
Inshuti za hafi z’aba bombi, zatangarije IGIHE ko mbere yuko Igisibo cy’idini ya Islam gitangira aribwo Haruna na Niyitegeka biyemeje kurushinga kugira ngo binjire muri iki gihe biyejeje imbere y’Imana.
Andi makuru agera kuri IGIHE ahamya ko ubwo Haruna Niyonzima yakiniraga AS Kigali, yabanaga na Niyitegeka Consolée mu Karere ka Kicukiro, rimwe akajya ku mugore we mukuru i Nyamata.
Icyakora nubwo impande zombi bitaradukundira ko tuzivugisha ngo hari igihe umugore mukuru yababazwaga no kuba Haruna Niyonzima acuditse n’iyi nkumi ndetse byagiye bibyara intonganya hagati yabo.
Ubwo Haruna Niyonzima yagurwaga na Yanga SC, agomba kwerekeza muri Tanzania, byabaye ngombwa ko ajyana n’iyi nkumi bari bacuditse asiga umugore wa mbere.
Hari kandi amakuru avuga ko uyu mugore mukuru yagiye Dar Es Salam mu minsi ishize, ariko ntibiramenyekana ko yaba yari agiye kugirana ibiganiro n’umugabo we nubwo na none aribyo bikekwa, gusa byarangiye umugore mukuru wa Haruna Niyonzima agarutse mu Rwanda ubu akaba atuye i Nyamata mu karere ka Bugesera.
Niyitegeka Consolée wasezeranye na kapiteni w’Amavubi, azwi nka Cassa Rayaan, amazina akoresha ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ze zirimo Instagram.
Azwi cyane nk’umwe mu bakobwa b’abanyamujyi w’umushabitsi cyane ko yigeze gushinga iduka ry’inkweto mu Biryogo h’i Nyamirambo mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu minsi yashize, ariko amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko ubu yamaze kubivamo.
Cassa wanashyize hanze amafoto y’ubukwe, kuri Instagram ye yashyizeho ko yashyingiranywe na Niyonzima Haruna akoresheje ijambo NH.
Mu Ukwakira 2015 nibwo Niyonzima Haruna yasezeranye mu mategeko n’umugore we mukuru, Uwineza Consolée, nyuma y’imyaka 12 babana ndetse kuri ubu bakaba bafitanye abana.
Niyonzima Haruna w’imyaka 30 (nk’uko ibyangombwa akiniraho bibigaragaza), yamenyekanye akinira Etincelles mu 2004, ari nabwo yatangiye guhamagarwa mu Ikipe y’Igihugu y’Abato.
Mu 2006 yerekeje muri Rayon Sports, gusa ntiyayitinzemo kuko yahise yerekeza muri APR FC mu 2007, ahava ajya muri Yanga SC mu 2011, iyi yavuyemo mu 2017 yerekeza muri mukeba Simba SC.
Mu mpeshyi ya 2019 nibwo yatandukanye na Simba SC, agaruka mu Rwanda, nyuma y’amezi atandatu akinira AS Kigali, yongera kugurwa na Yanga SC.
Mu gihe imyiteguro y’ibirori ngarukamwaka byo kwerekana imideli ‘Kigali Fashion Week’ ku nshuro ya karindwi irimbanyije, abanyamideli 60 baziyerekana bateye intambwe igana mu cyiciro cya nyuma.
Mu gihe imyiteguro y’ibirori ngarukamwaka byo kwerekana imideli ‘Kigali Fashion Week’ ku nshuro ya karindwi irimbanyije, abanyamideli 60 baziyerekana bateye intambwe igana mu cyiciro cya nyuma.
Amajonjora y’ibanze yahuje abanyamideli bagera kuri 300 baturutse mu bihugu birimo Kenya, u Bwongereza, Uganda, u Buhinde na Congo mu muhango wabaye ku Cyumweru tariki ya 14 Gicurasi 2017.
Iki gikorwa cyamaze amasaha arenga atandatu cyabereye One Love ahazwi nko kwa Rasta ku Kimihurura.
Ndayishimiye Daniel uri gutegura iki gikorwa yatangarije IGIHE ko Kigali Fashion Week izitabirwa n’abakora imideli baturuka ku migabane yose.
Yagize ati “Kigali Fashion Week ni kimwe mu bikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu bo mu ngeri zose bava mu bihugu bitandukanye bakaza kureba intera ikomeye abanyamideli bo mu Rwanda bamaze kugeraho ugereranyije n’abo mu bindi bihugu.
Muri uyu mwaka abakora imideli barimo n’Abanyarwanda bari kuzamuka bazagaragaza ibikorwa byabo.
Abanyamahanga bazabyitabira bazerekana ibikorwa byabo mu gihugu bambika abanyamideli b’Abanyarwanda.
Ibirori bya Kigali Fashion Week biteganyijwe kuva kuya 25 kugeza ku ya 27 Gicurasi 2017, bizabera muri Serena Hotel.
Igihe Yezu yari agiye kuva kuri iyi si ngo asange Se, yasezeye ku Ntumwa ze, arababwira ati “Mbasigiye amahoro, mbahaye amahoro yanjye.
Ngiye kwa Data, kandi ngiye kubategurira imyanya, kwa Data hari imyanya myinshi".
Igihe Yezu yari agiye kuva kuri iyi si ngo asange Se, yasezeye ku Ntumwa ze, arababwira ati “Mbasigiye amahoro, mbahaye amahoro yanjye.
Ngiye kwa Data, kandi ngiye kubategurira imyanya, kwa Data hari imyanya myinshi".
Mbere y’uko agenda yasize abasezeranyije kuzaboherereza Roho Mutagatifu, uzabafasha muri uru rugendo.
Nuko arababwira ati “Namwe rero muzambere abagabo kuko twabanye kuva mu ntangiriro" (Yh 15, 26-27).
Kuva na kera Imana yagiye igendana n’abayo ngo bazaronke umukiro w’iteka.
Uhoraho abwira umuryango we ati“ Dore nzohereza umumalayika wanjye imbere yawe, kugira ngo akurinde mu rugendo, maze azakwinjize mu gihugu naguteguriye" (Iyim 23, 20-21).
Uwo Malayika w’Imana niwe ukuza ingabire za Roho Mutagatifu muri twe, zituma tumenya gutandukanya ikibi n’’icyiza.
Gukora icyiza cyonyine ni yo nzira nyayo izatugeza mu ijuru.
Ni inzira itoroshye kuko kuyisoza ari ubutwari.
Ijambo ry’Imana rigira riti “Nimwihatire kwinjira mu muryango ufunganye, kuko umuryango wagutse n’inzira y’igihogere ari byo bijyana mu cyorezo, kandi abahanyura ni benshi.
Mbega ukuntu umuryango ugana mu bugingo ufunganye, n’inzira ijyayo ikaba impatanwa, maze bikabonwa na bake" (Mt 7, 13-14).
Erega ijuru si “ahantu" ahubwo ni “ukuntu".
Ijuru ni ukuntu tuzabana n’Imana mu munezero Udakama.
Ab’Imana ijuru baritangirira hano ku isi.
Bamwe bati“Twaremewe kuzajya mu ijuru, niho twese tuzishima iteka" ! Abandi bati: “umubare w’abagomba kujya mu ijuru waruzuye ni 144.
Abandi turaruhira ubusa"! Abavuga gutya bashingira ku Ijambo ry’Imana dusanga mu gitabo cy’Ibyahishuriwe Yohani Intumwa, ahanditse ngo “Nuko numva umubare w’abashyizweho ikimenyetso: abantu ibihumbi ijana na mirongo ine na bine bo mu miryango yose y’Abayisiraheli" (Hish 7, 4).
Igisobanuro cy’umubare 144.
Tugendeye kuri Bibiliya, nk’uko twabisomye haruguru, uyu mubare ushushanya abagaragu b’Imana bashyizweho ikimenyetso ku gahanga.
Bakaba bahagarariye imiryango yose ya Isiraheli (umuryango mugari w’abana b’Imana): Isiraheli igizwe n’imiryango 12 yo mu Isezerano rya Kera n’imiryango 12 yo mu isezerano Rishya, ihagarariwe n’Intumwa 12 za Yezu.
Nkuko tubisanga henshi muri Bibiliya, iyo bashaka kuvuga abantu benshi baravuga ngo “Abantu igihumbi n’ibihumbagiza"! Niyo mpamvu ku buryo buhinnye umubare 144.
000 wavuye aha: (12x12) x 1000 = 144.
Ibi kandi bigashimangirwa n’ibyo benshi birengagiza gusoma nkana ku murongo wa cyenda, ahanditse ngo “Nyuma y’ibyo, mbona imbaga nyamwinshi y’abantu, umuntu atabashaga kubarura, iturutse mu mahanga yose, mu miryango yose, mu bihugu byose no mu ndimi zose.
Bari bahagaze imbere y’ubwami n’imbere ya Ntama, bambaye amakanzu yererana kandi bafashe imikindo mu ntoki " (Hish 7, 9-10).
N’ubwo abantu bazaronka ijuru ari benshi, ijuru riraharanirwa nk’uko twabibonye mu ntangiriro.
Bityo rizinjiramo abazaba bararikoreye, barangwa n’ibikorwa byiza n’imirimo yo gukiranuka.
Iki gihe turimo cyo guhangana n’ibyorezo bitandukanye, kitubere akanya keza ko kwitagatifuza ngo natwe tuzabarirwe muri abo bazinjira mu bwami bw’ijuru.
Baba bake cyangwa benshi, duharanire kuzabarirwa muri bo.
Igihembo cy’abeza
Ababaye kuri iyi si neza, bakera imbuto nziza kandi nyinshi igihembo cyabo kirateguwe: Nyagasani azababwira ati “Nimuze abahawe umugisha na Data, muhabwe Ingoma mwateguriwe kuva isi ikiremwa" (Mt 25, 34).
Maze bahabwe ubugingo bw’iteka.
Nyagasani azahanagura icyitwa amarira cyose ku maso yabo.
Nk’uko Ijambo ry’Imana ribihamya: Abazaba indahemuka kugeza ku ndunduro, Uhoraho azabambika ikamba ry’ubugingo (reba Hish 2, 10).
Kumvira amategeko y’Imana ni byo bizadukiza, ariko twiringire impuhwe z’Imana kuko n’ubundi ibikorwa byacu bitihagije.
Nta wajya aho ngo avuge ko ibikorwa bye byonyine bihagije ngo azaronke ubugingo bw’iteka.
Icy’ingenzi ni ukugira ukwemera ukwizera n’urukundo bishingiye ku kubana n’Imana igihe cyose.
Pawulo Mutagatifu ati “Bavandimwe muri Kristu Yezu, ndabinginze nimureke Imana ibigarurire" (2 Kor 5, 17-21).
Mva imbere sinakumenye
Igihe Yezu yanyuraga mu nsisiro yigisha yerekeza i Yeruzalemu, haje umuntu aramubaza ati “Mwigisha, koko abantu bake ni bo bazarokoka"?
Nuko aramusubiza ati “Muharanire kwinjira mu muryango ufunganye; ndabibabwiye: benshi bazagerageza kwinjira, ariko boye kubishobora" (Lk 13, 22-24).
Ngo abatarakiranutse ku isi bazakomanga bati “Shobuja, dukingurire, azabasubize ati: Sinzi iyo muturutse, nimumve imbere sinabamenye".
Bati: “Koko ntabwo utuzi! N’ukuntu twaririye kandi tukanywera imbere yawe, twitabiriye amasengesho n’amateraniro kenshi! Ndetse twigishije Ijambo ry’Imana mu izina ryawe! Kandi twafashaga abakene uko bitegetswe" (reba Lk 13, 25-28).
Nyamara uko dutakamba kube imfabusa kuko n’ubwo bibwira ko bakoze neza mu maso y’abantu, bitigeze binyura Imana.
Nyagasani, uzandinde iri jambo ngo: “Mva imbere sinakumenye"!
Isi izashira ryari?
Hari benshi birirwa bashyushya abantu imitwe ngo: “ibi byorezo kanaka yarabihanuye! Ngo isi irarangiye"! Ijambo ry’Imana riravuga riti “ Si mwe mugenewe kumenya ibihe n’amagingo Data yageneye ubutegetsi bwe bwite, ahubwo mugiye guhabwa imbaraga za Roho Mutagatifu uzabazamo, bityo muzambere abahamya hose kuko muzahabwa Roho ubamara ubwoba (reba Intu 1, 7-8; .
Ubwo abigishwa babazaga Yezu igihe isi izashirira, maze Imana igakora umurimo wayo wo guca imanza, yarabasubije ngo: “Uwo munsi cyangwa iyo saha, nta we ubizi, habe n’abamalayika habe ndetse na Mwana; bizwi n’Imana Data wenyine.
Mwe rero, nimwitonde kandi mube maso, kuko mutazi igihe bizabera" (Mk 13, 32-33).
Bavandimwe, ni byo koko isi izashira, ariko gusesengura iby’uko bizagenda tubiharire Imana kuko nta wasobanura ibikorwa byayo byose: “Nasanze ibyo yaremye byose biberanye n’igihe cyabyo; yahaye abantu kumenya ibyahise n’ibizaza, ariko badashobora gusesengura ibikorwa by’Imana byose uko bingana" (Umubw 3,11).
Tube maso kandi duhore twiteguye.
Dushakishe ubutungane mu gukora ibyiza bityo tuzaronke ubugingo bw’iteka, aho kubushakira mu nyigisho z’iterabwoba zishobora kuturangaza, tukazaburira aho abandi baronkeye (reba Sir 28, 6-7).
Dusenge: Nyagasani Mana, turi mu bihe bikomeye byo kwiheba no gucika intege, ibihe byo guhangana n’ingaruka z’ibyorezo bikomeye, turakwinginze bana natwe.
Wadusezeranyije kugendana natwe kandi utwoherereza Roho Mutagatifu ngo adutoze gukora ugushaka kwawe maze natwe tuzabarirwe mu bo wagize abawe.
Kuri wa munsi w’urubanza uzaturinde iri jambo ngo: “Nimumve imbere sinabamenye"! Turashaka kukumenya kurushaho ngo natwe uzatwibuke, maze utugabire ubugingo bw’iteka ukurikije n’ubundi impuhwe usanzwe utugirira.
Ku bwa Yezu Kristu umwami wacu, wazutse mu bapfuye maze igihe kigeze agasubira mu ijuru ngo ajye kudutegurira imyanya iwawe Dawe.
Padiri Victor AMERIKA
Waba warigeze urira nyuma yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina?
Waba warigeze se ugira agahinda utazi ikigateye urangije iki gikorwa?
Icyo wamenya ni uko atari wowe wenyine ibi byabayeho.
Waba warigeze urira nyuma yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina?
Waba warigeze se ugira agahinda utazi ikigateye urangije iki gikorwa?
Icyo wamenya ni uko atari wowe wenyine ibi byabayeho.
Ni agahinda gashobora kumara iminota iri hagati y’itanu n’amasaha abiri.
Abahanga mu mibereho ya muntu basobanura ko agahinda ka nyuma yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina gasanzwe ku bantu benshi, kitwa mu Cyongereza Post-coital Dysphoria (PCD).
Ni ibyiyumviro umuntu agira amaze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina aho aganzwa n’agahinda, umujinya cyangwa se kumva acitse intege atari ukubera umunaniro.
Abaganga bazobereye ibijyanye n’ubujyanama mu by’imibonano mpuzabitsina basobanura ko ako gahinda katabaho nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina gusa ahubwo ko gashobora no kubaho nyuma yo kwikinisha.
Kugeza ubu, nta bushakashatsi buhambaye buragaragaza imvano y’aka gahinda, ariko hari iby’ibanze abahanga babashije kubona.
Basobanura ko aka gahinda kaza nubwo igikorwa nyir’izina waba wakigiranye n’umuntu ukunda, wihebeye mu buzima bwawe bwose, ndetse nubwo cyaba cyakunyuze bitagira urugero wagabye Isi n’ijuru, ariko bikarangira ubabaye.
Hari ubwo ngo usanga niba umugore ari kurira nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina, umugabo aba ari kwicira imanza mu mutima yibwira ko ariwe watumye agira agahinda.
Mu 2015, hari ubushakashatsi bwakorewe ku itsinda ry’abagore 230 b’abanyeshuri muri Australie bari hagati y’imyaka 18 na 55, ariko ikigereranyo cy’imyaka yabo bose cyari 26.
Muribo 46% bavuze ko mu bihe byari byaratambutse bahuye n’aya marangamutima y’agahinda nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina ariko 5% bo bavuze ko mu mezi make yari ashize aribwo bakagize.
Abagera kuri 2% bavuze ko nibura buri gihe bagira agahinda iyo bamaze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko ibyo babonye bidakwiriye kwitirirwa abagore bose cyane ko ababajijwe bari abanyeshuri.
Mu 2018, ikinyamakuru cyandika inkuru zijyanye n’imibonano mpuzabitsina n’inama ku mibereho ya muntu, cyatangaje ubushakashatsi kuri aka gahinda ariko by’umwihariko ku bagabo.
Mu bagabo 1208 babajijwe, 41% basubije ko bagize aka gahinda inshuro zitari nke mu buzima bwabo.
20% bo bavuze ko mu byumweru bine byari bishize bakagize, naho hagati ya 3% na 4% bo bavuze ko bakagira buri gihe.
Ntabwo abahanga muri siyansi kugera n’ubu baremeza inkomoko y’aka gahinda, gusa hari bimwe bagiye bahurizaho.
Birimo ko ibyiyumviro by’abantu bari gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina biba bikomeye cyane, ku buryo umwe aba yiyumvamo mugenzi we ku rugero ruhambaye, basoza icyo gikorwa agahinda kakabarenga.
Ikindi bahurizaho ni uko ibibazo umuntu yagize bijyanye n’ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina mu bihe byahise nko mu bwana, bishobora gutuma agira agahinda mu gihe arangije gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Ikindi kigaragazwa ni amakimbirane mu mibanire ashobora kuba imbata y’ibibazo byatera agahinda umuntu mu gihe arangije gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Abakundana bakunze guhura n’iki kibazo bagirwa inama yo guhora baganira mu gihe bibayeho, umwe agahumuriza mugenzi we cyangwa byaba na ngombwa bakajya kwa muganga bagahura n’umujyanama mu by’imibonano mpuzabitsina wabafasha gukira iryo hungabana.
Abantu 1214 nibo bamaze kwandura COVID-19 muri Kenya nyuma y’uko iyi mibare yiyongereye kuri iki cyumweru kubera abantu bashya 22 bagaragaweho iki cyorezo bituma iki gihugu kiba icyibasiwe cyane muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.
Abantu 1214 nibo bamaze kwandura COVID-19 muri Kenya nyuma y’uko iyi mibare yiyongereye kuri iki cyumweru kubera abantu bashya 22 bagaragaweho iki cyorezo bituma iki gihugu kiba icyibasiwe cyane muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.
Abo 22 bagaragaweho Coronavirus bari hagati y’imyaka 24 na 73, muri bo 17 ni abagabo mu gihe batanu ari abagore.
Umubare munini ni abaturuka i Nairobi.
Abamaze gukira iki cyorezo muri iki gihugu ni 383 mu gihe abamaze gupfa bo biyongereyemo umuntu umwe bakagera kuri 51.
Mu bindi bihugu byo mu Karere, u Rwanda rumaze kugira abantu 327 banduye na 237 bakize.
Tanzania yo imaze ibyumweru bibiri idatangaza amakuru mashya kur iyi ndwara ariko imibare iheruka ku wa 8 Gicurasi yagaragazaga ko abanduye ari 509 mu gihe abapfuye bari 21 naho abakize ari 183.
Mu Burundi naho imibare iheruka ku wa 18 Gicurasi, igaragaza ko abantu 42 aribo banduye Coronavirus, umwe agapfa naho abakize bari 20.
Muri Uganda ho abamaze kwandura ni 198, abakize ni 68, nta n’umwe urapfa.
Muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ho imibare y’abamaze kwandura ni 2141, abapfuye ni 63 mu gihe abamaze gukira ari 317, bituma kiba igihugu cyibasiwe cyane n’iki cyorezo mu bihana imbibi n’u Rwanda.
Isoko ryo guhahira kuri internet rirarushaho kwaguka mu Rwanda, abaranga n’abagura ibicuruzwa kuva ku biribwa kugera ku myambaro banyuze kuri internet bagenda biyongera.
Isoko ryo guhahira kuri internet rirarushaho kwaguka mu Rwanda, abaranga n’abagura ibicuruzwa kuva ku biribwa kugera ku myambaro banyuze kuri internet bagenda biyongera.
Mu kwagura ubu bucuruzi, Lorcan Cathain ukomoka muri Ireland yatangije urubuga Ronkos.
rw rugiye guhuza inzu zikora imyenda mu Rwanda n’abakiriya bazo bagahahirana nta nkomyi.
rw igamije kwita ku igurisha n’igura ry’imyambaro izatuma uyikora akomeza akazi ke gasanzwe, bikamworohereza kubona isoko n’uyifuza akabona aho ayigura; Uru rubuga rushyiraho imyambaro yose rwerekana n’inzu ziyikora.
Mu mezi atandatu ashize uru rubuga rwegereye inzu zikora imyenda zirenga icumi ruri mu igeragezwa, muri zo hari izakunze imikorere yarwo n’uburyo rucuruza.
rw yafunguye ku mugaragaro ku ya 5 Gicurasi 2017.
Kuva icyo gihe nyuma y’iminsi itatu gusa ibikorwa byarwo byageze ku bantu barenga ibihumbi mirongo ine, rwakira ubusabe bufite agaciro k’amafaranga miliyoni imwe n’igice.
Igitekerezo cyo gutangiza uru rubuga Lorcan Cathain yakigize ubwo yari agiye guhahira mu isoko rya Kimironko akabona uburyo ryuzuye abantu benshi bifuza imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda, bamwe ntibayibone.
Cathain ukomoka muri Ireland yatangarije IGIHE ko yahise atekereza ku gutangiza isoko rimwe ryahuza inzu zose zikora imyambaro mu Rwanda bikazorohereza kwerekana imyambaro yazo n’umuguzi akagira amahitamo.
Lorcan Cathain ateganya kwagura ibikorwa by’uru rubuga hanze y’u Rwanda mu kurushaho kwamamaza imyenda ikorerwa mu gihugu.
rw yita ku igurisha n’igura, kwamamaza, guhuza abadozi n’abaguzi, kuganira n’abaguzi, gufotora imyambaro, kwakira amafaranga no kugeza imyambaro kuri nyirayo.
Ku rubuga rwa Ronkos.
rw hari imyambaro myinshi aho umukiliya ahitamo uwo ahaka akawugura hanyuma bakawumushyira aho aherereye.
Umukiriya ni we wihitiramo ingano y’umwenda yifuza ndetse ashobora no gutanga uko awifuza, bakamwoherereza abadozi bo gufata ibipimo, bakamudodera ibimukwiriye.
Intego nyamukuru ya Ronkos.
rw ni ugushyiraho ahantu hahurira ibikorwa byinshi byo kugura no kugurisha imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda bityo bikorohereza ababibamo binateza imbere uruganda rw’imideli.
Shamah ni izina ry’abahungu rikomoka mu rurimi rw’Icyarabu rivuga ngo “Urumuri rwa buji".
Iri zina rigaragara no mu Giheburayo rikaba riniganje cyane muri Bibiliya cyane cyane mu Isezerano rishya.
Shamah ni izina ry’abahungu rikomoka mu rurimi rw’Icyarabu rivuga ngo “Urumuri rwa buji".
Iri zina rigaragara no mu Giheburayo rikaba riniganje cyane muri Bibiliya cyane cyane mu Isezerano rishya.
Nubwo izina Shamah ryamamaye mu bihugu nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika usanga ryihariye cyane kuko ridafitwe n’abantu benshi.
Ibiranga ba Shamah
Ba Shamah usanga bahamye mu myizerere, bakagira n’urukundo.
Mu bucuruzi ni abahanga cyane kubera ibitekerezo by’inyamibwa bagira bigatuma banahirwa ifaranga rikabayoboka.
Ni abantu badasahinda, usanga batuje batajarajara, bakanakunda ubwisanzure muri byose.
Gukora ubushakashatsi ku bintu bitandukanye biza imbere kuri ba Shamah.
Ibyo bakora byose baba bazi neza icyo bashaka n’impamvu nyakuri bagishaka.
Bakunda gutembera ahantu nyaburanga hatandukanye, kunezeza ubuzima binatuma bamenyana n’abantu benshi.
Ba Shamah barangwa n’ukuri no gushyira mu gaciro kuko bazi ko ngo ariyo nzira yonyine yatuma babona ubutabera n’ukuri guturuka mu bandi.
Mu buzima bakunda gufata ibyemezo bikakaye ariko bakagera ku byo biyemeje.
Ntibahwema bataragera ku byo bashaka gusa iyo bagiye gushaka imirimo yo gukora babanza kureba ko bitazabangamira kamere yabo yo gutembera.
Usanga ba Shamah bakunze kurangwa no gukorera ku gitsure amahame runaka n’amabwiriza.
Ba Shamah bagira urukundo rwinshi kandi no kurwisangamo biraborohera cyane ariko nanone bababara vuba cyane bya bindi Abanyarwanda bita kuvoma hafi.
Mu gihe umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda utifashe neza, Uganda ikomeje ibikorwa byayo byo gushyigikira imitwe ibangamiye umutekano w’u Rwanda, aho ibinyamakuru bya Kampala bikomeje ubuvugizi ku mitwe y’iterabwoba irimo na RNC.
Mu gihe umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda utifashe neza, Uganda ikomeje ibikorwa byayo byo gushyigikira imitwe ibangamiye umutekano w’u Rwanda, aho ibinyamakuru bya Kampala bikomeje ubuvugizi ku mitwe y’iterabwoba irimo na RNC.
Kimwe mu bikorwa bishya, ni ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor kuri uyu wa 2 Kanama cyateruye kivuganira abarwanashyaka ba RNC baba mu Bwongereza, ko bashaka gutaha iwabo nubwo bashinjwa ibyaha bikomeye by’iterabwoba, ariko iki kinyamakuru cyagaragaje ko uyu mutwe ugizwe n’impirimbanyi za demokarasi zishaka impinduka.
Ni ibikorwa bidasiba kandi byiyongera ku kuba Perezida Yoweri Museveni aheruka kwiyemerera ko yahuye n’umwe mu barwanashyaka ba RNC, Charlotte Mukankusi ushinzwe dipolomasi muri uwo mutwe.
Iyi mikoranire ya Uganda ishyigikiye abagamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda yagarutsweho kenshi, ko Uganda yahaye rugari umutwe wa RNC ari naho ukorera ibikorwa byo gushaka abayoboke mu banyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu, ku bufatanye n’urwego rwa gisirikare rushinzwe ubutasi, CMI, abatemeranyije n’uwo mugambi bagakorerwa iyicarubozo rikomeye.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Uganda, Maj Gen Frank Mugambage, yavuze ko RNC ari umutwe w’iterabwoba, ku buryo ibyo uvuga byose bidakwiye guhabwa agaciro.
Ni mu gihe abawugize bakabaye bakurikiranwa ku bikorwa uyu mutwe wakoze n’indi migambi mibisha ufite ku Rwanda.
Mu banenze iyi mikorere yo gukeza RNC kandi harimo Yolande Makolo, wibajije niba ubu ari uburyo bushya Uganda izanye nyuma y’imigambi iheruka kuyipfubana yo gushyigikira umutwe witwaje intwaro wagabaga ibitero unyuze mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe.

Uganda ikomeje ibikorwa bibangamiye abanyarwanda, byanatumye u Rwanda rubuza abaturage barwo kujya muri icyo gihugu kubera iyicarubozo bakorerwayo, kugeza igihe ikibazo cy’umutekano wabo kizakemukira.
Ku wa 22 CMI yataye muri yombi abakirisitu ba ADEPR Kibuye bagera kuri 40 mu murwa mukuru Kampala, ubu bafunzwe mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko kuko bataragezwa imbere y’inkiko ngo bamenyeshe ibyo baregwa, banisobanure.
Ni abanyarwanda biyongera ku bandi bafungiwe muri icyo gihugu, banangiwe gusurwa n’abahagarariye u Rwanda muri Uganda.
Ni mu gihe Itegeko Nshinga rya Uganda riteganya ko nta muntu ugomba gufungwa igihe kirenze amasaha 48 uhereye igihe yafatiwe, ataragezwa imbere y’urukiko.
Abahanga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe berekana ko kubura akazi ari kimwe mu bitera guhangayika, cyane iyo umuntu akabuze bitunguranye nkuko byabaye kuri bamwe muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Abahanga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe berekana ko kubura akazi ari kimwe mu bitera guhangayika, cyane iyo umuntu akabuze bitunguranye nkuko byabaye kuri bamwe muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Iyo umuntu atakaje akazi ntabwo aba abuze icyo yinjiza mu buryo bw’ubukungu gusa.
Abahanga berekana ko umuntu ashobora no gutakaza intego ku byo yari agamije kugeraho ndetse ko bishobora no kugira ingaruka ku mubiri we.
Umuhanga ku buzima bwo mu mutwe, Lisa Orbé-Austin, yabwiye Huffpost ko abantu baba batekereza ibitandukanye igihe babuze akazi.
Iyo umuntu abuze akazi ibyiyumviro agira bigira ingaruka ku buzima bwe muri rusange.
Abahanga bagaragaza ingaruka zitandukanye umuntu ashobora kugira mu buzima bwe.
Kubura ibitotsi cyangwa gusinzira cyane
Ibibazo mu gusinzira ni kimwe mu byerekana ko kubura akazi biri kugira ingaruka ku buzima bw’umuntu.
Umuhanga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe wo muri leta ya Maryland muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Kristin Bianchi, avuga ko "ushobora kugira ibibazo byo kubura ibitotsi, gusinzira igihe kirekire cyangwa ugasanga uri kubyuka kare kurusha uko biteganyijwe.
Mu busanzwe kuba wabura ibitotsi umunsi umwe cyangwa ibiri ngo ntacyo bitwaye ariko iyo bikomeje biba ikibazo.
Ku rundi ruhande, Umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya Arizona mu ishami ry’ubuzima, Patricia Haynes, avuga ko imihangayiko umuntu yagiraga mu kazi ishobora gukomeza nyuma yo kukabura.
Mu bushakashatsi yakoze, we na bagenzi berekanye ko umuntu wari ufite ibibazo by’umutekano mu kazi abangamiwe na politiki y’ikigo akoramo agira ibibazo byo kubura ibitotsi nyuma yo kukabura.
Ati “Imbogamizi nyinshi, zirimo iza politiki cyangwa izerekeye kuzamurwa mu kazi, ibintu bituma abantu badakora neza.
Twabonye ko bituma abahuye nabyo bakomeza kubura ibitotsi nyuma yo kubura akazi.
Guhungabana
Ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko uko umuntu amara igihe kinini nta kazi ariko arushaho guhungabana.
Umwe mu Banyamerika batanu badafite akazi mu gihe kigera ku mwaka byagaragaye baba bafite uburwayi ku buryo benshi bafata imiti ibarinda kugira ihungabana.
Batangira kubihirwa n’ibyabaryoheraga, bakagira kwishima guke kurusha uko bari basanzwe.
Ibyishimo biragabanyuka
Inyigo yo mu 2015 yasohotse muri Journal of Applied Psychology yerekana ko kubura akazi bihindura umuntu.
Mu Badage bakuze 6 769 bakoreweho iyo nyigo, bamaze imyaka ine basuzumwa, ababuze akazi mu gihe cy’iyo nyigo bahinduye ku buryo bukomeye imyitwarire kurusha abagumye mu kazi.
Yerekanye ko abagore bagiye batakaza ibyishimo gake gake buri mwaka naho abagabo biba mu myaka ibiri ya mbere bikagenda bishira nyuma yayo.
Muri rusange ariko mu minsi ya mbere abantu baba batarahinduka bashaka ikindi bakora.
Kumva umubiri utameze neza, kuribwa umutwe w’uruhande rumwe n’igifu
Iyo umubiri wawe uhangayitse, imikaya yishakamo imbaraga kugira ngo ihangane n’icyo kibazo.
Abahanga bakavuga ko ari uburyo bw’umubiri bwo gushaka igisubizo.
Iyo ubwo buryo bubaye igihe kirekire bitera kuribwa umutwe w’uruhande rumwe.
Umuryango w’Abanyamerika wita ku buzima bwo mu mutwe, uvuga ko kubabara umugongo wo hasi n’igice cyo hejuru uhereye mu bitugu bifite aho bihuriye n’imihangayiko y’akazi.
Ubushake bwo kurya burahinduka cyane
Guhangayika bishobora kongera cyangwa kugabanya ubushobozi bwo kurya.
Ibyo bigira ingaruka ku igabanyuka ry’ibiro cyangwa bikiyongera.
Ibyo wakora mu gihe udafite akazi
Kugira ngo umuntu abashe kunyura muri ibyo bihe; yashyiraho gahunda y’umunsi kandi akayubahiriza, akumva ko ibyabaye atabihindura agashyiraho igikorwa kimushimisha yajya akora no gutekereza ku bikorwa byiza yakoze kurusha ibyamugoye.
Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, yandikiye abapadiri n’abakirisitu ayoboye abagaragariza ingingo zimwe zakurikizwa mu gihe amakoraniro mu Kiliziya yaba asubukuwe nyuma y’iminsi mike hakomorewe gusezerana ariko harimo abantu batarenze 30.
Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, yandikiye abapadiri n’abakirisitu ayoboye abagaragariza ingingo zimwe zakurikizwa mu gihe amakoraniro mu Kiliziya yaba asubukuwe nyuma y’iminsi mike hakomorewe gusezerana ariko harimo abantu batarenze 30.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena 2020, yahaye icyizere insengero cyo kongera gufungura mu minsi 15 iri imbere, nyuma y’amezi atatu zidasengerwamo kubera ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umwanzuro w’inama y’abaminisitiri uvuga ko “Insengero zizakomeza gufunga, abanyamadini barashishikarizwa gukomeza gushyiraho ingamba zo gukumira no kwirinda Covid-19, mu rwego rwo kwitegura kuba insengero zafungurwa mu minsi 15 iri imbere hashingiwe ku bizava mu isesengura ry’ubuzima".
Magingo aya, Abasenyeri n’abayobozi b’amadini batangiye kwitegura uko bashyira mu bikorwa ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus, kugira ngo nibaramuka bakomorewe bazabe bariteguye ku buryo amasengesho azakorwa hanirindwa ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo,
Mu ibaruwa Musenyeri Rukamba yandikiye abapadiri ayoboye n’abakirisitu, yabamenyesheje ingingo 20 zazakurikizwa mu gihe leta yaba ikomoreye insengero nk’uko iheruka ku bitangaza.
IGIHE yamenye amakuru y’uko muri iki gihe hari kuba ibiganiro n’abakirisitu ku buryo basobanukirwa neza aya mabwiriza, ndetse hagatoranywa n’abazafasha abandi mu kuyumva no kuyakurikiza.
Muri izo ngingo, harimo ko ahasengerwa hagomba kuba hafite ibikoresho byose byifashishwa mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19; ndetse ko mu kwirinda ubucucike mu nsengero, abapadiri bagomba gutanga aho bazasengera muri paruwasi yabo, ubuso bwaho n’umubare w’abantu bashobora gusengeramo bakurikije ingano yaho.
Yakomeje ababwira ko abagiye gusenga bagomba kuzajya bambara agapfukamunwa igihe cyose kandi bagashyira intera ya metero ebyiri hagati y’umuntu n’undi.
Ati “Ibyo bizasaba kwerekana imyanya abantu bicaramo.
Misa zizongerwa ku buryo abifuza kuzazijyamo bose bazabibonera uburyo ndetse misa zimwe zo mu mibyizi zikaba zasimbuza izo ku cyumweru.
Ikindi ni uko mu kiliziya hagomba gushyirwa umuti wo gukaraba wica udukoko cyangwa se za kandagira ukarabe ku buryo abantu babona uko bakaraba intoki binjiye ndetse banasohotse mu kiliziya.
Yakomeje agira ati “Kubera ko guhazwa mu biganza bitemewe, uhaza azakoresha ikiyiko kandi yambare agapfukamunwa.
Mu gihe cyo gutura, yavuze ko mu kiliziya hazaba hari ibiseke bine kugira ngo abantu badahura kandi bature vuba.
Ati “Niho bazashyira amaturo y’amafaranga.
Amaturo y’imyaka bazajya bayashyira ahantu bagende badakoze ku maturo basanze aho, nyuma Padiri ajye kuyaha umugisha, awuha n’abatuye.
Muri aya mabwiriza harimo kandi ko umubare w’abaririmba (Chorale) uzagabanuka.
Imwe mu ngingo yakunze kwibazwaho cyane mu gihe Kiliziya n’insengero bizaba bikomorewe, ni ijyanye n’uburyo bwo kugabanya umubare w’abantu bajya gusenga; Musenyeri Rukamba yanditse ko hazabaho kugena misa hakurikijwe imiryango remezo.
Ati “Umuyobozi w’Umuryango remezo azakora urutonde rw’abantu baje mu misa bo mu gace ke, agaragaza aho batuye na nimero zabo za telefoni.
Ikindi ni uko ku bana, abemerewe kuzajya bajya mu misa ari abarengeje imyaka 12 kandi nabo bakajyayo baherekejwe n’ababyeyi.
Yakomeje avuga ko nta misa izajya irenza amasaha abiri, ndetse ko mbere y’uko indi itangira, hazajya habaho umwanya wo gusukura Kiliziya w’isaha imwe.
Ku bapadiri n’abasomyi, bo ngo ntibazajya bambara udupfukamunwa ndetse ntibemerewe guhererekanya ibitabo n’indangururamajwi.
Abayoboke b’amadini bari bamaze amezi atatu batagera mu nsengero, bavuga ko bizeye ko isesengura ry’inzego z’ubuzima nta kabuza rizabemerera gusubira mu nzu z’Imana kuko ingamba abanyamadini bafashe zisobanutse.
Kayitare Jean Claude wo muri Paruwasi Gatolika ya Rutonde muri Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, yavuze ko nubwo misa zakomeje binyuze kuri radiyo na televiziyo, yishimiye kuba insengero zigiye kongera gufungura.
Ati “Hari abantu usanga gusengera mu rugo bibagora kubera ibibarangaza.
Kuba insengero zishobora kongera gufungurwa turabyishimiye cyane kandi turabishimira Imana".
Kuva muri Werurwe iki cyorezo cyagaragara mu Rwanda, abanduye ni 787 mu gihe abamaze gukira ari 370 naho abakirwaye ni 415 mu gihe babiri aribo bitabye Imana.

Ni izina ryamamaye cyane hagati y’umwaka 1940-1949 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Hilary ni izina rikomoka ku ijambo ry’Ikilatini ‘hilarius’ risobanura ibyishimo.
Ni izina ryamamaye cyane hagati y’umwaka 1940-1949 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Uretse muri Amerika, iri zina urisangana abatari bake mu bihugu bivuga ururimi rw’Icyongereza.
Mbere wasangaga hari abahungu bitwa Hilary ariko ubu iri zina rikunze guhabwa abana b’abakobwa.
Ibiranga ba Hilary
Ba Hilary ni abantu bakunda gutangiza imishinga minini kandi bagaharanira kugera ku ntego biyemeje uko byagenda kose.
Mu mibereho yabo bakunda ubuyobozi ku buryo badakozwa ibyo kuyoborwa n’abandi cyangwa gukurikira ibyo abandi babategeka.
Bagira umurava ku buryo rimwe na rimwe bagaragara nk’abanyagitsure bitewe nuko baba bashaka ko ibyo bifuza bikorwa byanze bikunze.
Bagira amategeko muri bo, kwihangana kwabo si kwinshi, bigatuma hari ababona ko ari abirasi.
Bakunda kubaho babohotse ntawubatera hejuru, ibi bikaba binafite aho bihuriye no gukunda kuyobora kuko bibaha ako gahenge ko kuba batabwirizwa icyo gukora.
Ba Hilary bagira guhangana muri bo, ni intyoza mu gutangiza imishinga kandi myiza bitewe n’ibitekerezo by’inyamibwa bagira.
Gusa hari igihe usanga nubwo baharanira ko bagera ku byo biyemeje imbaraga zo kubikora zicika iyo bageze hagati.
Bazi gufata imyanzuro n’ibyemezo bikakaye nta bwoba, bakamenya guhangana n’ibigaragara nkaho ari urukuta.
Hari ibihangange byinshi bifite izina Hilary; urugero ni Hilary Clinton, umugore w’uwigeze kuba perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Bill Clinton; umukinnyi wa filimi, Hilary Swanka n’umuririmbyi Hilary Erhard Duff.

Nubwo Mulun atasobanuye niba uwo musore yaraje kurekurwa, birerekana ko inzego z’umutekano za Uganda zigikomeje iyicarubozo n’itotezwa ku Banyarwanda nubwo mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka ibihugu byombi byiyemeje gukomeza gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano yasinyiwe i Luanda umwaka ushize, arimo guhagarika itotezwa n’iyicarubozo, no gufungura abafashwe binyuranyije n’amategeko.
Ibyabaye kuri uwo musore ni nabyo biherutse kuba kandi kuri Elly Tumwine, washimuswe n’inzego z’umutekano muri icyo gihugu tariki 16 Gicurasi akajyanwa ahantu hatazwi gukorerwa iyicarubozo, nyuma urukiko rugategeka ko agezwa imbere y’urukiko ariko inzego zamufashe zikanga kubyubahiriza.
Kuri ubu hari amagana y’Abanyarwanda bafungiye muri Uganda mu mabohero atazwi cyangwa se izindi nzu zitazwi aho bakorerwa iyicarubozo.
Inshuro nyinshi u Rwanda rwakunze gusaba Uganda guhagarika ibi bikorwa bibangamira abaturage barwo bari muri iki gihugu.
Mu minsi ishize, Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Uganda, Sam Kutesa, yatangaje ko Uganda izashyikiriza u Rwanda abaturage barwo 132 bari bafungiye muri iki gihugu mu gihe abandi 310 bo bakurikiranywe n’inkiko.
Abakurikiranira hafi umubano wa Uganda n’u Rwanda banenze impamvu Kutesa yatanze zituma abo 310 bo badafungurwa, z’uko bakurikiranyweho ibyaha bibangamira umutekano w’igihugu birimo ubugambanyi, ubutasi n’ibindi.
Abantu benshi bakunze kwibaza uko ubutaka bw’u Rwanda bwo mu bice bimwe na bimwe bwari buteye bukiri amashyamba, butaraba igihugu gituwe kandi gihingwa, abandi bagakomeza kwibaza cyane ku bugenge n’ubuhanga bukabije buvugwa ku bami bagenganga ibihugu bw’ibikorwa by’ubuhangange bagezeho kandi nta bikoresho bihambaye bari bafite.
Abantu benshi bakunze kwibaza uko ubutaka bw’u Rwanda bwo mu bice bimwe na bimwe bwari buteye bukiri amashyamba, butaraba igihugu gituwe kandi gihingwa, abandi bagakomeza kwibaza cyane ku bugenge n’ubuhanga bukabije buvugwa ku bami bagenganga ibihugu bw’ibikorwa by’ubuhangange bagezeho kandi nta bikoresho bihambaye bari bafite.
Muri iki gice, tugiye kubatekerereza bimwe mu bimenyetso ndangamateka, bigaragaza imiterere y’imwe mu misozi y’u Rwanda rwo hambere, rutaraturwa ngo rube insinsiro zisakayemo abantu.
Nkuko tubikesha igitabo “Imizi y’u Rwanda’’ n’igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’, byombi dukesha umwanditsi n’umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, tugiye gutekerereza hamwe amateka y’umudugudu wa Nyirabwana wo mu Kagali ka Kibagabaga mu Murenge wa Kimironko ho mu Karere ka Gasabo ahahoze ari ingoma ngabe y’igihugu cy’u Bwanacyambwe mu bihe byo hambere.
Hariho nka kimwe mu bimenyetso bibitse amateka akomeye agaragaza imiterere y’igihugu cy’u Bwanacyambwe mbere y’uko gihangwamo igihugu, n’ikimenyetso kigaragaza bene cyo uburyo bakuturanyije bakagitunganya kikaba igihugu kiganje.
Ubu butaka butaraba igihugu cy’u Bwanacyambwe bwari ubutaka bw’imigina n’ibishanga by’imifunzo by’amasanzure y’umugezi wa Nyabugogo n’Akagera, n’ikiyaga cya Mugesera.
Mu bihe byo hambere, igihugu cy’u Bwanacyambwe cyari gikikijwe n’ingoma y’i Gisaka cy’Abagesera b’Abazirankende mu Burasirazuba, Gasabo y’Abanyiginya mu Majyaruguru, Nduga y’Ababanda mu Burengerazuba bw’Amajyepfo, u Buliza bw’Abongera mu Majyaruguru y’u Burengerazuba n’ingoma y’u Bugesera bw’Abahondogo yari mu Majyepfo.
Igihugu cy’u Bwanacyambwe kimwe n’icy’u Buliza, byagengwaga n’Ibikomangoma by’Abongera, bakomoka kuri Mwongera wa Rurenge Sekuruza wabo.
Aho cyari giherereye kugeza ubwo aya mateka yandikwaga, ni mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, Akarere ka Kicukiro, Akarere ka Gasabo y’Amajyepfo (Mu Mirenge ya Gisozi, Kinyinya, Kimihurura, Remera na Kimironko) hamwe n’Akarere ka Rwamagana y’Iburengerazuba (Mu mirenge ya Karenge, Nyakariro, Nzige, Muyumbu na Gahengeri).
Amacishirizo y’ihangwa ry’icyo gihugu, akaba agaragaza ko cyahanzwe mu mizo ya mbere y’iyaguka ry’ibihugu byagengwaga n’Abasinga b’Abasangwabutaka, aho cyahanzwe ahasaga mu wa 450, nyuma ya Yezu Kirisitu.
Mu ihangwa ry’igihugu cy’u Bwanacyambwe, ryanzuwe n’umuhungu wa Rurenge witwaga Mwongera n’umugore we w’inkundwakazi Nyirabwanacyambwe, ari na we wakurijweho kwitirirwa icyo gihugu kikitwa’’ u Bwanacyambwe’.
Agasozi gakuru ari nako kabarwa nk’ubutaka gakondo bw’Abongera, kitwaga Nyirabwanacyambwe, niko ubu kabumbye imidugudu ya Nyirabwana, Ramiro, Rindiro na Kageyo yo mu Kagali ka Kibagabaga, mu Murenge wa Kimironko wo mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Ingoma ngabe y’Abongera ikaba yari itetse mu Mudugudu wa Nyirabwana ( Nyirabwanacyambwe) wiswe izina ry’impine, aho kuryuzuza ngo witwe ’’Nyirabwanacyambwe".
Nyuma y’imyaka amagana, ingoma ngabe yaje kwimurirwa mu Mudugudu wa Amahoro mu Kagali ka Rukiri II mu Murenge wa Remera wo mu Karere ka Gasabo ko mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ari naho hashyiriweho iherezo ryayo ubwo u Bwanacyambwe bwatsindwaga n’u Rwanda mu gitero cyagabwe na Kigeli Mukobanya ahasaga mu wa 1378, akivugana Nkuba ya Nyabakonjo watwaraga u Bwanacyambwe muri ibyo bihe.
Ubutaka bw’Umudugudu wa Nyirabwana, ni kimwe mu bimenyetso karundura, kigaragaza ko ingoma y’u Bwanacyambwe yabayeho, kandi ikagaragaza n’inkomoko y’iryo zina, n’aho yatangiriye mu bwaguke bwayo.
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple z’abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe.
Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella.
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple z’abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe.
Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella.
James na Daniella bafite igikundiro cyo ku gasongero mu bihebeye ibihangano byo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana bateguye igitaramo gikomeye bahurijemo couple z’abaramyi zikunzwe mu gihugu.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert" gitegerejwe kubera muri Kigali Arena ku wa 1 Werurwe 2020.
James na Daniella bagiteguye bagamije kumurika album yabo ya mbere bise “Mpa Amavuta’’ izaba iriho indirimbo umunani.
Cyatumiwemo abahanzi bakomeye barimo andi ma-couple azwi cyane mu muziki wo kuramya Imana arimo iya Ben na Chance; Tuyizere Papi Clever na Ingabire Dorcas; Maya na Fabrice na Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes.
Abazacyitabira kandi bazataramirwa n’abahanzi barimo Prosper Nkomezi uri mu bafite igikundiro, René Patrick, Ndayisenga Esron wamamaye muri True Promises na Gaby Kamanzi.
Couple ya James Rugarama na Daniella Mukiza ifitanye abana babiri.
Ni imwe mu zakoze umuziki ukabasha kugera ku kigero nk’icyo uyu munsi bariho.
Bavuga ko kuba indirimbo zabo ziri kwamamara cyane mu buryo bwihuse ari ubushake bw’Imana n’amasengesho yabo adasiba.
Mu minsi ishize babwiye IGIHE ko babanye igihe kinini babitsanya amabanga, nyuma bafata umwanzuro wo kugirana umubano w’urukundo no kuririmbana nka Couple.
Aba bombi iyo bavuga amateka yabo bavuga ko batangiye baririmbana ariko mu 2019 bakaza gufata umwanzuro wo gutangira kuririmba nyuma y’uko baririmbiraga mu rugo bakumva ni byiza cyane.
James ati “Twararirimbaga tutarabana ubundi tugahurira mu matsinda atandukanye.
Tumaze kubana dutangira kujya turirimbana ariko bitari mu buryo bweruye.
Uyu mwaka nibwo nk’itsinda ryacu nibwo twagiye muri studio dukora indirimbo ya mbere twise ‘Mpa Amavuta’.
Daniella avuga ko urukundo rwabo rwatangiye gututumba mu 2008 cyangwa 2009, mu 2012 bajya kwiga muri Uganda, umugabo yiga iby’Ububanyi n’Amahanga mu gihe umugore icyo gihe yigaga Ibaruramari.
Ati “Twamenyanye kera kuko twari abaturanyi Kimironko nyuma tugiye kwiga muri Uganda nibwo twaje kubana.
Mu 2008 cyangwa 2009 nibwo twamenyanye noneho mu 2012 tujya kwiga kaminuza, tuyirangiza mu 2015 aba ari nabwo tuba umuryango.
Ubu bamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo zirimo ‘Mpa Amavuta’ bahereyeho imaze no kurebwa n’abasaga miliyoni ku rubuga rwa Youtube, “Nkoresha", “Ububyutse" na “Narakijijwe".
Kuba ari couple ikora umurimo w’Imana wo kuririmba, bavuga ko ari ikintu kibafasha kuko kuba bafite icyerekezo kimwe ari ikintu gihambaye ama-couple yose yakabaye yitaho cyane.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere James na Daniella bagiye gukorera igitaramo mu Rwanda, gusa si cyo cya mbere bakoze kuva batangiye umuziki kuko hari icyo bakoreye muri Uganda mu mpera za 2017.
Kwinjira muri “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert" ku bazagura amatike mbere ni 3 000 Frw, 15 000 Frw na 30 000 Frw ku bazagura amatike mbere mu gihe abazayagurira ku muryango bizaba ari 5 000 Frw, 10 000 Frw na 20 000 Frw.

Imvugo ya Museveni yo gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri mu mubano n’u Rwanda niyo yasorejeho umwaka wa 2019, gusa usesenguye neza wagira amakenga n’ugushidikanya.
Imvugo ya Museveni yo gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri mu mubano n’u Rwanda niyo yasorejeho umwaka wa 2019, gusa usesenguye neza wagira amakenga n’ugushidikanya.
Ni inshuro ya kabiri abanyarwanda bashobora kuba bagira amakenga n’icyizere gike ku kuba Uganda yakemura ibibazo imaze igihe itera mu mubano wayo n’u Rwanda.
Ubwa mbere hari ubwo hasinywaga amasezerano ya Luanda, ubwa kabiri byashingirwa ku magambo ya Museveni asoza umwaka wa 2019.
Mu butumwa yashyize ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter mbere y’uko twinjira mu mwaka mushya wa 2020, Museveni yavuze ko yakiriye intumwa ye Ambasaderi Adonia Ayebare uherutse mu Rwanda afite ubutumwa bugenewe Perezida Kagame ku mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Museveni yavuze ko Ayebare na Perezida Kagame bagiranye ibiganiro byiza ndetse ko mu gihe cya vuba, hagiye gufatwa imyanzuro ishyira iherezo ku bwumvikane buke bumaze igihe kinini mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Vuba aha, impande zombi zigiye gufata imyanzuro ihamye mu guhosha umwuka mubi.
Ndabizeza ko Uganda izakora ibyo isabwa mu gushyira mu buryo umubano mwiza w’ibihugu byombi.
Ndashimira Perezida Kagame, abavandimwe bacu b’abanyarwanda n’abaturage ba Uganda.
Ambasaderi Adonia Ayebare wakiriwe muri Village Urugwiro ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 29 Ukuboza 2019.
Asanzwe ari Intumwa ihoraho ya Uganda mu Muryango w’Abibumbye i New York.
Ubutumwa bwanyujijwe ku rukuta rwa Twitter rw’Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu bwavugaga ko ubutumwa Ambasaderi Ayebare yari afite, “butanga icyizere" mu gukemura ibibazo bimaze igihe mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RBA kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iyo ntumwa yari i Kigali mu bikorwa bimaze igihe bigamije gushaka umuti w’ibibazo, ariko ko nyuma y’ibiganiro ikiba ari ingenzi ari ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imyanzuro yabyo.
Ati “Kuvuga rero ngo haje intumwa icyizere cyabonetse, ntabwo nibwira ko ari uko nabivuga, njye navuga ko iyo ari indi ntambwe ikomeje guterwa muri ubwo buryo bwo gushakisha icyatuma ikibazo icyo aricyo cyose cyaba gihari gishobora gukemuka kandi nyine ibyo biva mu bantu mu kuvugana, kuganira.
Ubutumwa bwa Museveni ku kibazo cya Uganda n’u Rwanda biragoye ko umuntu yabwizera 100%, ngo yishyiremo ko hari ikigiye gukorwa kuko mu gihe yabwandikaga, ibimenyetso bigaragaza ibihabanye n’ibyo yavugaga.
Mbere na mbere ubwo hasinywaga amasezerano y’amahoro ya Luanda, abanyarwanda baketse ko ikibazo gikemutse, ko nta n’umwe uzongera guhohoterwa ari muri Uganda ndetse ko n’abafungiyeyo bagiye kurekurwa.
Gusa siko byagenze, kuko byakomeje nk’uko byari bisanzwe, abafungwa bagafungwa, abakorerwa iyicarubozo rigakomeza bakajya bajugunywa ku mipaka bagizwe intere.
Ni nako Uganda kandi yakomeje umubano wayo n’imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda irimo RNC na FDLR ndetse irinangira ubwo yasabaga kubahiriza amasezerano Museveni yasinywe.
Ibi nibyo byatumye intumwa z’u Rwanda na Uganda zinanirwa kumvikana mu biganiro biheruka kubera i Kampala.
Mu gihe Museveni yandikaga ko umuti ugiye kuboneka, ku rundi ruhande ikinyamakuru Red Pepper cyari kimaze gutangaza inkuru ivuga ko abanyarwanda 200 bagamije ibikorwa by’iterabwoba binjiye muri Uganda mu mugambi wo guhungabanya iki gihugu mu bihe by’iminsi mikuru.
Muri iyo nkuru havugwamo ko bamwe muri abo bakora ibikorwa by’iterabwoba batawe muri yombi n’Urwego rushinzwe Umutekano imbere mu gihugu, ISO.
Red Pepper isanzwe iterwa inkunga n’umuvandimwe wa Museveni, Salim Saleh ni kimwe mu binyamakuru byakunze gusiga u Rwanda icyasha no guha rugari abarwanya ubutegetsi bwarwo.
Umwe mu bo cyanditse ko ari abanyarwanda bagamije ibikorwa by’iterabwoba kuri Uganda ni uwitwa Abdul Razak Subwanone, umunyarwanda uba muri Uganda aho acuruza ibyuma by’imodoka akura i Dubai.
We n’undi munyarwanda witwa Edward Nsenga ucuruza telefoni bafashwe na ISO mu mukwabu watwawemo abagera kuri 200.
Ikigaragaza umugambi wa Uganda udahinduka ni uko aba banyarwanda bakuwe mu bandi na mbere y’uko bagezwa imbere y’ubutabera ngo biregure, ubu bivugwa ko bafunzwe mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko na ISO mu nzu zayo z’ibanga ahitwa Kyengera, bashinjwa kuba intasi ziturutse mu gihugu cy’igituranyi.
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro yagiranye na Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, yavuze ko bitumvikana uburyo abanyarwanda bafatirwa muri Uganda bitwa intasi kuko bamwe muri bo batanafite ubwo bushobozi ahubwo baba bashaka imibereho kimwe n’abandi.
Ati “Ibyo kugera ahantu igihugu gihiga abanyagihugu b’abaturanyi kuri ubwo buryo ntabwo byasobanuka.
Abandi bakavuga ngo abo baba bagiyeyo, baba bagiye gutata, gutata iki kirimo abana, kirimo abagore, abagabo, kirimo abantu batazi kwandika no gusoma, abantu bari aho bashakisha uko biberaho nk’uko abanya-Uganda benshi bari hano.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko u Rwanda rutigeze rukora nk’umuturanyi warwo ngo rutangire ruhige abaturage ba Uganda.
Ibimenyetso byagiye bijya hanze nyuma y’ibyo abayobozi ba Uganda bakunze kuvuga ku mubano n’u Rwanda, bigaragaza ko abantu bakwiye kwishima mu rugero, ntibizere ko ikibazo cyakemutse ahubwo bagategereza bibaye.
Ni uko ubutumwa bwa Museveni bwakwakirwa.

Iyo raporo ivuga ko mu mwaka utaha wa 2021, Instagram izaba iri ku mwanya wa mbere mu kuba urubuga nkoranyambaga rushakirwaho amakuru cyane ku isi.
Urwo rubuga rwazanye uburyo bwinshi butuma abarukoresha barutindaho, nk’uburyo usangiza abandi inkuru shya (stories) na IGTV ituma abantu bashobora gusangira amashusho maremare kurusha uko byari bisanzwe.
Raporo yerekanye ko kuri ubu, 11 % by’abakoresha Instagram baba bagiye gushakaho amakuru mu gihe ababigenza gutyo kuri Twitter ari 12 %.
Bagaragaza ko bibiri bya gatatu by’abantu bakoresha telefone bashaka amakuru bayakura ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, ari nabyo bitanga icyizere ko umubare wabo uzagenda wiyongera.
Nko muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu bantu bari hagati y’imyaka 18 na 24, abagera kuri 26 % muri Mata uyu mwaka bifashishije Instagram bashaka amakuru kuri Coronavirus.
Ni mu gihe abashatse amakuru mu gihe nk’icyo bifashishije Snapchat ari 14 % naho TikTok ni 11 %.
Mu bakoreweho isuzuma, 26 % bavuze ko bizera amakuru kuri coronavirus bakura kuri Facebook na Twitter.

Ikinyamakuru The Star cyatangaje ko yajyanwe mu bitaro ku wa 19 Kamena 2020 agashyirwa mu cyumba cy’abanyacyubahiro, aho amaze iminsi 10 ari kwitabwaho n’abaganga.
Umwe mu bavuganye n’icyo kinyamakuru, yavuze ko nta kidasanzwe ku buzima bwa Kibaki uretse uburibwe afite mu nda yo hasi.
Yagize ati "Ibizamini byarafashwe kugira ngo bipimwe muri laboratwari.
Ibisubizo byaje kandi nta mpamvu yo guhangayika.
Abaganga bashinzwe kumwitaho bari kwita ku bubabare bwe.
Uwo musaza w’imyaka 89 y’amavuko, kuva yava ku butegetsi mu 2013 ntabwo yongeye kwigaragaza cyane, ku buryo aheruka kugaragra mu ruhame muri Gashyantare mu gusezera bwa nyuma kuri Daniel arap Moi.
Ikigo African Parks gicunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, cyatangaje ko Intare ziheruka kwimurirwa muri iyi pariki zikomeye kwiyongera, ku buryo mu myaka itanu ishize, izi nyamaswa zimaze kwikuba inshuro enye.
Ikigo African Parks gicunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, cyatangaje ko Intare ziheruka kwimurirwa muri iyi pariki zikomeye kwiyongera, ku buryo mu myaka itanu ishize, izi nyamaswa zimaze kwikuba inshuro enye.
Mu 2015 nibwo nyuma y’imyaka igera kuri 15 intare zaracitse mu Rwanda, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB gifatanyije na ‘African Parks’ bagejeje mu Rwanda intare zirindwi zirimo iz’ingore eshanu muri gahunda yo kugarura izi nyamaswa muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera.
Mu mwaka wa mbere izi ntare zari zimaze kwikuba kabiri ubwo havukaga ibyana 11.
Mu mwaka wa 2017 haje kongerwamo intare ebyiri z’ingabo zivuye muri Afurika y’Epfo, zirushaho kwiyongera.
Ibyo byagiye bigendana no kuvugurura amategeko akumira abashimuta inyamaswa, hashyirwaho itsinda rishinzwe kubashakisha ryifashishije imbwa zatojwe, hanashyirwaho uruzitiro rwa kilometero 120 rurimo amashanyarazi akomoka ku zuba rutandukanya Pariki n’ubutaka bwagenwe nk’ubuhumekero bwayo, hagamijwe kugabanya uguhura kw’abantu n’inyamaswa.
Ikigo African Parks gifatanya n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, mu gucunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera guhera mu 2010, cyatangaje ko umubare w’izi ntare ukomeje kwiyongera.
Mu butumwa cyanyujije kuri Twitter cyagize iti “Twishimiye kubasangiza ko Intare zo muri @AkageraPark zikubye inshuro enye kuva zahagarurwa mu myaka itanu ishize.
Mu mwaka ushize ziyongereyeho ibyana bine, bituma umubare wazo ugera kuri 37.
Ubu iyi pariki ni imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika kuko ifite inyamazwa eshanu zifatwa nk’izikaze kurusha izindi kuri uyu mugabane, ari zo Inkura, Intare, Imbogo, Inzovu n’Ingwe.
Gukomeza kwiyongera kw’inyamaswa byakomeje kugendana n’abasura iyi pariki, byatumye mu 2018 yinjiza amafaranga agera kuri miliyoni $2, ari nabwo bwa mbere yari ageze kuri icyo gipimo mu mateka y’iyi pariki.
Muri uyu mwaka ariko umubare w’abasura Pariki zo mu Rwanda uzagabanuka cyane kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahagaritse ingendo mpuzamahanga, ndetse n’izo mu gihugu zikorwa mu buryo bwitondewe.
RDB kuri uyu wa Gatanu yatangaje ko kuva ubukerarugendo bwongeye gufungurwa mu cyumweru gishize, ifite abantu 69 bamaze gusaba mbere y’igihe (booking) gusura Pariki y’Ibirunga.
Muri Nyungwe ni bane, naho abamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Akagera ni 215.

Gusubika imikino ya nyuma y’Igikombe cya Afurika cya 2021 ni imwe mu ngingo izigwaho mu nama y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika (CAF) izaterana mu cyumweru gitaha ku wa 30 Kamena nyuma y’uko amarushanwa menshi asubitswe bitewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Gusubika imikino ya nyuma y’Igikombe cya Afurika cya 2021 ni imwe mu ngingo izigwaho mu nama y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika (CAF) izaterana mu cyumweru gitaha ku wa 30 Kamena nyuma y’uko amarushanwa menshi asubitswe bitewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Bteganyijwe ko Igikombe cya Afurika (CAN 2021) kizabera muri Cameroun kuva tariki ya 9 Mutarama kugeza ku ya 6 Gashyantare ariko birasa naho bishobora guhinduka bitewe n’uko igihe gikomeje kugabanuka.
Kugeza ubu hamaze gukinwa iminsi ibiri gusa mu matsinda yo gushaka itike yo gukina iri rushanwa ndetse byitezwe ko umupira w’amaguru uhuza ibihugu utazasubukurwa mbere y’Ukwakira kuri uyu mugabane bitewe na COVID-19.
Komite Nyobozi ya CAF izaterana mu cyumweru gitaha, ku wa Kabiri, hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ry’amashusho, niyo izemeza ikizakorwa ndetse ishyireho uburyo bwo gusoza amarushanwa abiri ahuza amakipe kuri uyu mugabane.
Icyemezo FIFA yafashe ku wa Kane cyo gukuraho imikino mpuzamahanga yagombaga kuba muri Nzeri uretse mu Burayi na Amerika y’Epfo, cyasize CAF isigaranye amatariki make yo gusoza imikino yo gushaka itike ya CAN 2021 izahuza amakipe 24.
Haracyasigaye imikino ine muri buri tsinda nubwo ishobora gukinwa mu Ukwakira n’Ugushyingo, ariko byaba bivuze ko itangira ry’imikino yo gushaka itike y’Igikombe cy’Isi cya 2022 ryaba risubitswe.
Hari kandi umutwaro gukina Igikombe cya Afurika muri Mutarama bishobora gushyira ku marushanwa y’imbere mu bihugu kuko byasaba ko amenshi ahagarara bitewe n’uburyo uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20 wangijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umwe mu bayobozi ba CAF wasabye ko amazina ye atatangazwa, yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abongereza (Reuters) ko “CAN ishobora kwigizwa inyuma ho amezi 12", ni mu gihe Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa CAF, Abdelmounaim Bah, mu cyumweru gishize yabwiye itangazamakuru ko uburyo bwiza bushoboka ari uko CAN 2021 izaguma ku matariki yemejwe.
CAF Champions League na CAF Confederation Cup ni amarushanwa yahagaze ageze muri ½ ndetse Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika igomba gushaka uburyo asozwamo mu gihe kuri ubu ingendo z’indege zafunzwe n’ibikorwa b’imikino bikaba bitemerewe gukorwa ahenshi kuri uyu mugabane.
CAF igomba kandi gufata icyemezo niba CHAN 2020 yagombaga kubera muri Cameroun muri Mata izakurwaho burundu.
Hazafatwa kandi icyemezo ku Gikombe cya Afurika cy’Abagore cyagombaga kuba mu Ugushyingo ariko kugeza ubu imikino yo gushaka itike ikaba itararangiye.
Kuri iri rushanwa, birasa naho rishobora gukurwaho kuko CAF itarabona igihugu kizaryakira nyuma y’uko Congo yari kuryakira, yakuyemo ubusabe bwayo muri Nyakanga umwaka ushize.

Umuyobozi wa River of Joy and Hope Ministries, Prophet Sultan Eric, yahishuye ko akunda umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul [Bushali The Trigger], anasaba korali yo mu itorero rye kuririmba mu njyana zikunzwe kuko Imana ikwiye ibigezweho.
Ni ubutumwa yatanze mu materaniro yo ku wa 5 Mutarama 2019 yabereye Cosmos i Nyamirambo aho itorero riri; yibanze ku ntego y’uko abakirisitu bakwiriye gusenga mu kuri no mu mwuka.
Ubwo yari ageze mu mwanya wo kwakira amashimwe ku buhanuzi bwasohoye, Munyemana Eric [Prophet Sultan] yavuze ko akunda umuraperi Bushali ndetse ko azamuha impano.
Yatangiye aririmba ati “Ese ni muebue, ni tuebue?
’’ Abari mu iteraniro bahise basekera rimwe.

Nta kibazo mfitanye na bo, bataramana neza.

Ni Imana y’abazima n’ibizima.
Abajije injyana ikunzwe cyane, yasubijwe ko ari Trap.
Ati “Niyo ba Cardi B baririmba?
Belcalis Marlenis Almánzar azwi mu muziki nka Cardi B.
Uyu muraperikazi w’imyaka 27 ari mu bagezweho muri Amerika; akora injyana ya Trap ifatwa nka hip hop igezweho ariko yavukiye mu Majyepfo ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ahagana mu 1990.
Mu bahanzi bakora iyi njyana harimo T.
, Gucci Mane, Waka Flocka Flame, 2 Chainz, Lil Uzi Vert na 21 Savage.

Umwaka wa 2019, Bushali ni wo wamuzamuriye igikundiro, yitabiriye ibitaramo bikomeye birimo Iwacu Muzika Festival, MTN Izihirwe n’ibindi.
Bushali yatangiye umuziki mu mpera za 2013.
Izina rye ryazamuwe n’indirimbo ‘Nituebue’ yahuriyemo na B-Threy n’uwitwa Slum Drip.
