Ubucuruzi bukenewe gufashwa
Abenshi mu bakora ubwo bucuruzi bahagaritse imirimo, abakozi bakoragamo batakaza akazi.
Icyakora, abashakashatsi bavuga ko ugereranyije n’izindi nzego, ubuhinzi bwo butazagerwaho n’ingaruka nyinshi za Covid-19.
Prof Bizoza yavuze ko bitewe n’uburyo Covid-19 ikizahaje ibihugu byinshi, nta buryo buhamye bwakwizerwa ko buzazahura ubukungu, icyakora yemeza ko hari ubushobora gufasha mu kugabanya igihombo.
Leta yagiriwe inama yo gushyiraho gahunda yo kuzahura ubukungu (recovery plan), kandi inzego zibasiwe cyane akaba ari zo ziherwaho zifashwa nk’izitanga akazi kenshi nk’ubuhinzi, ubucuruzi buto n’ubuciriritse, inganda, ubwubatsi n’ibindi.
Ati “Nk’ubu Leta ishyize amafaranga menshi mu bikorwa rusange nka biriya byo kubaka imishinga minini, bizatuma ba bandi batari bafite akazi bongera kukabona.
Hakaba n’ingamba zijyanye no korohereza abantu kubona inguzanyo kuri bamwe bakora ubucuruzi kugira ngo bongere bakore.
Bizoza yongeyeho ko nubwo banki zatangiye korohereza kwishyura abari bafite inguzanyo, hakenewe uburyo bwo gufasha abacuruzi kubona ubundi bushobozi butuma basubukura ibikorwa byabo.
Mu buhinzi naho, Bizoza avuga ko hakwiriye “gushyirwamo imbaraga kuko niho abantu benshi bafite akazi, dukomeje gukaza umurego mu buryo bwo gushyigikira ubuhinzi byagabanya ingaruka.

Kuri uyu wa 26 Kamena 2020, abahanzi babashije gutsinda mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya MNI baherewe ibihembo kuri Televiziyo Rwanda, Tonzi wabaye uwa mbere ashima abateguye iki gikorwa.
Kuri uyu wa 26 Kamena 2020, abahanzi babashije gutsinda mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya MNI baherewe ibihembo kuri Televiziyo Rwanda, Tonzi wabaye uwa mbere ashima abateguye iki gikorwa.
Ibi bihembo bitangwa n’urubyiruko rwihurije hamwe, ku bufatanye n’ibigo bitandukanye ku isonga harimo RALC, yinjiyemo mu rwego rwo gushyigikira ubuhanzi nka kimwe mu biranga umuco.
Iki gikorwa cyari kirimo Intore Tuyisenge, uhagarariye ishyirahamwe ry’abahanzi, Gatabazi Bernard wari uhagarariye RALC ndetse na Rwema Dennis wari uhagarariye MNI yatangaga ibihembo.
Iki gikorwa cyatangiwemo ibihembo bya muzika ndetse bigaherekezwa n’ishimwe ry’amafaranga ku ndirimbo eshatu zaje imbere ku rutonde mu gihe cy’amezi atatu.
Indirimbo ya mbere ni iya Tonzi yitwa ‘Hejuru ya Byose’ yegukanye 2,000,000 Frw, iya kabiri iba iya Mutimawurugo Claire yitwa ‘Umunyenga w’Intsinzi’ ihembwa 700,000 Frw mu gihe iya gatatu yabaye iya Bryan Lead yitwa ‘Open my eyes’ ihabwa 300,000 Frw.
Gatabazi Bernard wari uhagarariye RALC ukora mu ishami ry’umuco, yavuze ko bakimara gushyikirizwa uyu mushinga bagasabwa kuwushyigikira, bahise babona ugendanye n’ibyo bifuza.
Ati “Iki gikorwa mu ishami ry’umuco dushinzwe guteza imbere ubuhanzi kandi umuziki nawo urimo.
Tukimara kubona abategura MNI badushyikirije uyu mushinga wabo twarishimye cyane kuko ibyo bari gukora byari biri mu murongo wacu.
“Umuziki wacu uri kugenda utera imbere mu kuzamura ubukungu bw’igihugu ariko n’abahanzi bari gutera imbere atari bya bindi bya sagihobe aho waririmbaga bakagusomya ku gacuma gusa ugatahira aho.
Rwema Dennis yasabye abanyarwanda bose gushyigikira igikorwa nk’iki kuko bizafasha mu iterambere ry’umuziki nyarwanda.
Ati “Turi gutangira ariko ibintu biri kugenda neza.
Tonzi aza guhatana yarambwiye ati ‘ntabwo ndi hano ngo ntsinde ahubwo ndashaka gutanga umusanzu wanjye mu guteza imbere iki gitekerezo’.
Abanyarwanda bose nibashyigikira iki gikorwa, umwana w’umunyarwanda azabona amahirwe yo gukora umuziki uri ku rwego ruhambaye, ntabwo azajya gukorera muri Nigeria kubera MNI ahubwo azaba ari abanyarwanda bamugiye mu bitugu, iyo niyo ntego yanjye.
Tonzi yavuze ko hakoreshejwe umucyo mu gutora ndetse ko yishimiye kwakira miliyoni ebyiri; ndetse n’amafaranga yahabwaga buri kwezi mu gihe cy’amezi atatu ashize bigiye kumufasha mu muziki we.
Ati “Ni ibintu bibera kuri internet ariko birimo umucyo, nagiyemo nshaka kureba uko bikora ariko nasanze ari byiza kandi ndashishikariza abahanzi kwitabira.
Iki gihembo kigiye kumfasha, amafaranga angana gutya bampaye muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19 ntabwo ari make, ngiye kuyifashisha nkora amashusho n’amajwi by’indirimbo.
Ni ikintu cyiza cyane.
Nashishikariza abantu gushyigikira MNI kuko kuzamuka kwayo natwe ni ukwacu.
Usibye miliyoni ebyiri Tonzi yahawe nk’igihembo cy’indirimbo ye yatowe cyane, yanashyikirijwe 60% by’amafaranga abakunzi be bakoresheje bamutora.
Mutimawurugo Claire yegukanye 700 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje mu gihe Bryan Lead we wabashije kuba uwa gatatu yegukana 300 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje ku ndirimbo ye "Open my eyes".
MNI ni urubuga rwa internet rushyirwaho indirimbo z’abahanzi batandukanye b’abanyarwanda maze abakunzi b’umuziki bagatora izo bakunze, ihize izindi nyuma y’amezi atatu igahabwa igihembo.
Umuhanzi ubwe ni we ufata iya mbere kugira ngo indirimbo ye igaragare kuri uru rubuga ashyiraho umubare w’indirimbo yifuza zose.
Gutora bikorerwa ku rubuga rwa internet ariko utoye inshuro imwe acibwa amafaranga mirongo itanu (50Frw) yishyura akoresheje telefone ngendanwa akanze *611#.
Igihembwe cya kabiri cyo gutora indirimbo eshatu cyatangiye tariki ya 1 Gashyantare 2020 kugeza tariki 30 Mata 2020.

Icyakora yaje u Rwanda rutangiye kwigaragaza, aho 95 % by’abana bagejeje igihe cyo kujya kwiga mu mashuri abanza bajyagayo na hejuru ya 90 % y’abana bavuka bahabwa inkingo.

Kapiteni w’Ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavui’, Haruna Niyonzima, yasezeranye n’umugore wa kabiri, Niyitegeka Consolée ’Cassa Rayaan’, umuhango wabereye muri Tanzania aho uyu mukinnyi asanzwe akina mu Ikipe ya Yanga SC.
Kapiteni w’Ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavui’, Haruna Niyonzima, yasezeranye n’umugore wa kabiri, Niyitegeka Consolée ’Cassa Rayaan’, umuhango wabereye muri Tanzania aho uyu mukinnyi asanzwe akina mu Ikipe ya Yanga SC.
Niyonzima Haruna yasubiye gukina muri Tanzania muri Mutarama uyu mwaka, avuye muri AS Kigali.
Bamwe mu bo hafi y’aba bombi bavuganye na IGIHE, bavuze ko ubukwe bwa Niyonzima Haruna na Niyitegeka Consolée bwabaye mbere gato y’uko igisibo cya Mwezi Ramadhan gitangira, ariko bari bahisemo kubigira ibanga.
Haruna Niyonzima yari amaze imyaka ibiri akundana n’uyu mukobwa ndetse kuri ubu babana muri Tanzania kuva asubiyeyo mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka.
Mu Rwanda, Niyonzima Haruna yabanaga n’umugore we wa mbere, Uwineza Consolée, basezeranye imbere y’amategeko mu Ukwakira 2015 ndetse bakaba bafitanye abana.
Niyonzima Haruna w’imyaka 30 (nk’uko ibyangombwa akiniraho bibigaragaza), yamenyekanye akinira Etincelles mu 2004, ari nabwo yatangiye guhamagarwa mu Ikipe y’Igihugu y’Abato.
Mu 2006 yerekeje muri Rayon Sports, gusa ntiyayitinzemo kuko yahise yerekeza muri APR FC mu 2007, ahava ajya muri Yanga SC mu 2011, iyi yavuyemo mu 2017 yerekeza muri mukeba Simba SC.
Mu mpeshyi ya 2019 nibwo yatandukanye na Simba SC, agaruka mu Rwanda, nyuma y’amezi atandatu akinira AS Kigali, yongera kugurwa na Yanga SC.

Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ibarurishamibare mu Rwanda (NISR) cyatangaje ko muri Gicurasi 2020, ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa mu mijyi byiyongereyeho 9,2% muri Gicurasi ugereranyije na Gicurasi 2019.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ibarurishamibare mu Rwanda (NISR) cyatangaje ko muri Gicurasi 2020, ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa mu mijyi byiyongereyeho 9,2% muri Gicurasi ugereranyije na Gicurasi 2019.
Muri Mata 2020, igipimo cy’ihindagurika ry’ibiciro mu mijyi cyari cyazamutse ku kigereranyo kingana na 8% ugereranyije n’igihe nk’icyo mu mwaka ushize.
Igipimo ngenderwaho cyifashishwa mu bukungu bw’u Rwanda kiboneka hifashishijwe gusa ibiciro byakusanyijwe mu mijyi.
Mu itangazo ryo kuri uyu wa 10 Gicurasi 2020, NISR yatangaje ko ibiciro byo mu mijyi byiyongereyeho 9,2% mu kwezi gushize kwa Gicurasi 2020 ugereranyije na Gicurasi 2019.
Bimwe mu byatumye ibiciro byiyongeraho 9,2% muri Gicurasi ni ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byazamutseho 11,5%, ibiciro by’ibinyobwa bisembuye n’itabi byazamutseho 19,5%, ibiciro by’inzu, amazi, amashanyarazi, gaz n’ibindi bicanwa byazamutseho 5,1% n’ibiciro by’ibijyanye n’ubwikorezi byazamutseho 23,9%.
Iyo ugereranyije Gicurasi 2020 na Gicurasi 2019, usanga ibiciro by’ibintu bitarimo ibiribwa n’ibikomoka ku ngufu byarazamutseho 8,1%.
Wagereranya ukwezi kwa Gicurasi 2020 na Mata 2020, ugasanga ibiciro byarazamutseho 2%.
Iri zamuka ahanini ryatewe n’ibiciro by’ibijyanye n’ubwikorezi byazamutseho 21,8%.
NISR igaragaza ko mu bice by’icyaro, mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi 2020, ibiciro byiyongereyeho 10,5% ugereranyije na Gicurasi 2019 mu gihe muri Mata 2020 ryari ku kigereranyo kingana na 11,7%.
Bimwe mu byatumye ibiciro byiyongeraho 10,5% mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi ni ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byazamutseho 14,4%, ibiciro by’ibinyobwa bisembuye n’itabi byazamutseho 21,9% n’ibiciro by’ibijyanye n’ubwikorezi byazamutseho 21,4%.
Ugereranyije ukwezi kwa Gicurasi 2020 na Mata 2020, ibiciro byagabanutseho 0,3%.
Iri gabanuka ahanini ryatewe n’ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byagabanutseho 3,6%.
Impinduka mu biciro byo mu mijyi no mu byaro
NISR itangaza ko muri Gicurasi 2020 ibiciro mu Rwanda byiyongereyeho 9,9% ugereranyije na Gicurasi 2019.
Ikomeza ivuga ko “Ihinduka ry’ibiciro mu Rwanda mu kwezi kwa kane (Mata 2020) ryari ku kigereranyo kingana na 10,1%.
Bimwe mu byatumye ibiciro byiyongeraho 9,9% mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi 2020 ni ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byazamutseho 13,5% ,ibiciro by’ibinyobwa bisembuye n’itabi byazamutseho 21,1% n’ibiciro by’ibijyanye n’ubwikorezi byazamutseho 23,2%.
Iyo ugereranyije ukwezi kwa gatanu (Gicurasi 2020) n’ukwezi kwa kane (Mata 2020) ibiciro byazamutseho 0,7%.
Iri zamuka ahanini ryatewe n’ibiciro by’inzu, amazi, amashanyarazi, gaz n’ibindi bicanwa byazamutseho 2,7%, n’ibiciro by’ibijyanye n’ubwikorezi byazamutseho 21,4%

Murengezi Dieudonné, umuririmbyi n’umucuranzi wa “Chorale de Kigali" yasohoye indirimbo ye ya mbere iri mu buryo bw’amajwi n’amashusho ndetse ikaba iri kuri album ye yitwa “Icyizere".
Uyu musore usanzwe ari umutoza w’ijwi na muzika mu mashuri yisumbuye, yatangiye kuririmba muri korali akiri umwana mutoya cyane ku myaka itanu.
Ni umuhanzi w’umunyempano utangaje, kuko acuranga ibyuma by’umuziki birenze bine.
Agiye gushyira hanze album yitwa ‘Icyizere’ igizwe n’indirimbo umunani, yabanjirijwe n’indirimbo yitiriwe iyi album.
Muri iyi ndirimbo atanga ubutumwa agira ati “ubwo Imana ntaho yagiye turacyafite icyizere, dore ko ibyo yakoze kera ari byo byari bikomeye kandi n’ubu ikaba igikora; ni yo yonyine yo kwiringirwa kuko ni yo iduherekeza aho abandi batinye, ikaba izi uko tuzamera ejo n’ejobundi kandi ikaba ikiduhetse ku mugongo wayo, ntidukwiye kwiheba cyangwa kwiganyira.

Ati “Guhuza amasomo agoye ya kaminuza ntibizigera bidindiza na gato umurimo Imana yatangiye muri njye, dore ko yo ubwayo ari yo idukomeza ikagumya no kutubera ikiramiro ngo tutagwa.
Yavuze ko nyuma y’iyi album agiye gushyira hanze azakurikizaho izindi kandi zifite ubutumwa bukomeye bwo kwegereza abantu Imana kuko ari yo ibitorera.
Murengezi Dieudonné ni umuhanzi, umucuranzi, umuririmbyi n’umwalimu wa muzika.

Mu rwego rwo guteza imbere imikino gakondo n’umuco nyarwanda, hagiye kuba amarushanwa yo gukina igisoro agamije kumenyekanisha no gukundisha abanyarwanda uwo mukino.
Mu rwego rwo guteza imbere imikino gakondo n’umuco nyarwanda, hagiye kuba amarushanwa yo gukina igisoro agamije kumenyekanisha no gukundisha abanyarwanda uwo mukino.
Igisoro ni umwe mu mikino gakondo yatangiye kumenyekana mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1510 ku ngoma y’Umwami Ruganzu II Ndoli.
Ni umukino ukinanwa ubuhanga bwinshi hifashishijwe insoro (zimeze nk’utubumbe duto) bagenda betereka mu twobo twabugenewe.
Ni umukino amateka agaragaza ko na Ruganzu Ndoli yawukinnye kuko hirya no hino mu gihugu hari ibimenyetso byamwitiriwe nko ku bitare bya Mpushi muri Kamonyi ahari igisoro, ikibumbiro, amajanja y’imbwa ze n’intebe yicaragaho.
Umuyobozi wa sosiyete Umutsakura yateguye ayo marushanwa, Nshimyumuremyi Justin yabwiye IGIHE ko amarushanwa yatangiye mu Ukwakira uyu mwaka, umukino wa nyuma ukazaba kuwa Gatanu tariki 22 Ugushyingo muri Olympique Hotel ku Kimironko.
Ababugu (abakina igisoro) babiri nibo bazaba bahatanira umwanya wa mbere.
Nshimyumuremyi yavuze ko igisoro ari umwe mu mikino y’umwihariko w’abanyarwanda, nyamara udahabwa agaciro kuko ufatwa nk’usuzuguritse.
Ati “impamvu yo gukora aya marushanwa ni ukuwusigasira.
Usanga indi mikino yarahawe agaciro ariko igisoro basa nk’aho bagisize inyuma kandi ari umwihariko wacu abanyarwanda.
Aya marushanwa ni uburyo bwo kugira ngo igisoro cyongere kimenyekane , cyongere gikinwe ndetse mu bihe bizaza nkuko abakina Football ibagirira umumaro n’abakina igisoro boye kujya bitwa inkorabusa cyangwa se abanebwe.
Yongeyeho ko “Hambere igisoro cyari gifatiye abanyarwanda runini.
Bagikoreshaga mu mibare .
Kubera ko bari bataragira irindi terambere rihambaye, iyo bakinaga barabaraga bati ndazana butatu nkurase burindwi , nongere nzane bune murase 12 […] kumenya iyo mibare rero bigaragaza ubuhanga bari bafite.
Uretse kumenyekanisha uwo mukino, Nshimyumuremyi yavuze ko bashaka no kugikundisha abakiri bato kugira ngo bazagisigasire.
Kwinjira muri uyu mukino wa nyuma bizaba ari ubuntu.
Uzaba uwa mbere azahembwa ibihumbi 75 Frw, uwa kabiri ahembwe ibihumbi 50 naho uwa gatatu ahembwe ibihumbi 30 Frw.
Biteganyijwe ko hazanakorwa ibindi bikorwa by’umuco birimo indirimbo gakondo, imivugo n’ibisigo, ibyivugo n’ibindi.

Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda bize muri Kaminuza (Rwanda Australia Alumni Association) zitandukanye muri Australia basanga hakwiye ubufatanye mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus gihangayikishije Isi yose.
Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda bize muri Kaminuza (Rwanda Australia Alumni Association) zitandukanye muri Australia basanga hakwiye ubufatanye mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus gihangayikishije Isi yose.
Iri huriro rifatanije na Ambasade ya Australia mu Rwanda ifite icyicaro i Nairobi ryakusanyije amafaranga yo kugura ibikoresho byo gufasha mu bikorwa abitandukanye byo kurwanya Coronavirus.
Iyi nkunga yashyikirijwe Ibitaro bya Kibagabaga ndetse n’Umurenge wa Ndera.
Ibikoresho byatanzwe n’iri huriro bifite agaciro gasaga miliyoni eshatu z’amanyarwanda bigizwe n’imiti yo kwisukura mu ntoke (hand sanitizers), amasabune (liquid soap), kandagira ukarabe, udupfukamunwa n’amazuru n’ibyapa bigaragaza amakuru yo kwirinda Coronavirus.
Bugingo Spencer wize muri Australia yatangaje ko urugamba rwo guhangana na Coronavirus rudakwiye guharirwa leta gusa.
Yagize ati “Iyi ni inkunga twishatsemo dufatanyije na Ambasadde ya Australia mu Rwanda ifite icyicaro i Nairobi.
Ni mu rwego rwo gufatanya na Leta yacu y’u Rwanda guhangana n’iki cyorezo.
Yakomeje avuga ko “Leta yakoze ibintu byinshi byiza mu kurwanya iki cyorezo bityo natwe nk’abaturage mu byiciro bitandukanye ni umukoro dufite ngo natwe dutange umusanzu wacu mu gukomeza gufatikanya kugihashya burundu.
Umuyobozi mukuru w’ibitaro bya Kibagabaga, Dr.
Mutanganzwa Avit, avuga ko ibikoresho bahawe bizubunganira ibisanzwe kuko kurwanya icyorezo bisaba imbaraga nyinshi.
Ati “Baje kunganira leta mu mbaraga ishyira mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Ibintu bazanye birakenewe kuko ni ibintu bikoreshwa bigashira.
Igihe cyose iki cyorezo tuzaba tukigifite ibyo bikoresho byose birimo udupfukamunwa, isabune, hand sanitizer tuzahora tubikenera kuko tutabifite ikwirakwira ry’iriya ndwara ryakwihuta.
Kuva umuntu wa mbere wanduye Coronavirus agaragaye mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, hamaze kuboneka abayanduye ni 900 mu bipimo 137 751 bimaze gufatwa, abakize ni 443 mu gihe 455 bakirwaye naho abantu babiri bitabye Imana.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro.
Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.

Abatuye kuri aka gasozi bavuga ko habaga igiti kinini cyane cy’inganzamarumbu cy’umunyinya cyari cyaritsemo inyoni zitandukanye, gusa ngo nta bantu benshi bari bahatuye , igice kinini cyari kigizwe n’ibihuru.
Nk’uko abantu bakuze batuye kuri aka gasozi babisobanura, bavuga ko inkomoko y’izina Kanyirarebe ryaturutse ku mugore wabanaga n’ubumuga bwo mu mutwe witwaga Nyirarebe, waje aturuka mu Gihugu cy’abaturanyi cya Uganda mu gace ka Bufumbira, maze aruhukira munsi y’icyo giti ahubaka akazu k’ibyatsi agaturamo.
Magayane Silas uri mu kigero cy’imyaka 93, yavuze ko ahagana mu 1925, iki giti yakibonaga ndetse n’akazu k’ibyatsi kari karubatswe n’uwo murwayi wo mu mutwe witwaga Nyirarebe arakazi.
Yagize ati " Nkiri muto icyo giti cyari kuri aka gasozi, uwo Nyirarebe wari umurwayi wo mu mutwe nanjye nibuka ko namubonye yari yarubatse akazu k’ibyatsi munsi y’icyo giti.
Nta muntu yahutazaga, n’abaturage baramukundaga kuko banamushyiraga ibiryo muri ako kazu akahaba gutyo, yaje kuhasazira arapfa, aka gasozi gafata izina gutyo hitwa ku Kanyirarebe".
Maniraguha Ladislas w’imyaka 48 y’amavuko na we yemeza ko izina Kanyirarebe yavutse akarisanga gusa aza gusobanurirwa ko ryavuye kuri Nyirarebe wari ufite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe.
Ati “Batubwiraga ko ryaturutse ku mugore witwaga Nyirarebe wari ufite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe wigeze gutura munsi y’igiti kinini cyari gihari, batubwiraga ko yatungwaga n’ibiryo abaturage bamuhaga, rero umuco w’ubugwaneza n’urukundo byarangaga abakurambere bacu natwe barawuturaze, turangwa n’urugwiro n’imibanire myiza n’abatugana tukabakirana urwo rugwiro"
Kuri ubu ku Kanyirarebe harangwa n’ibikorwaremezo bitandukanye birimo umuriro w’amashanyarazi, inzu z’ubucuruzi, izo guturamo n’ibindi bikorwa byinshi by’iterambere.
Abaturage baho batunzwe cyane n’ubuhinzi bw’ibirayi bakuramo amafaranga abatunga mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi, abandi bagakora ubucuruzibw’ibintu bitandukanye.

Birababaje kuko n’inka yari aragiye bazitwaye; (…) ni nk’imipango yakorewe kuko ntabwo ari abantu b’i Cyangugu baje kumwica, ni abantu b’inaha basanzwe bamuzi bamugambaniye.

Inka esheshatu abagizi ba nabi batwaye zasize inyana enye mu rugo.
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko nubwo hakomeje kuvugwa ibyo kuvura Coronavirus hakoreshejwe imiti ya hydroxychloroquine uvura Malaria cyangwa Chloroquine, nta nyigo iragaragaza ko ikora neza, ahubwo ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko biteza ibyago birimo urupfu.
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko nubwo hakomeje kuvugwa ibyo kuvura Coronavirus hakoreshejwe imiti ya hydroxychloroquine uvura Malaria cyangwa Chloroquine, nta nyigo iragaragaza ko ikora neza, ahubwo ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko biteza ibyago birimo urupfu.
Mu bushakashatsi bwatangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu mu kinyamakuru cy’ibijyanye n’ubuvuzi, The Lancet, abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko abantu barembye cyane kubera COVID-19 bavuwe hakoreshejwe hydroxychloroquine na chloroquine, ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereye kimwe n’ihinduka ry’imiterere y’umutima, ibizwi nka ‘arrhythmia’.
Abashakashatsi bagenzuye abarwayi 96 000 bo mu bitaro 671 byo ku migabane itandatu y’Isi, bashyizwe mu bitaro hagati ya tariki 20 Ukuboza 2019 na 14 Mata 2020 kubera Coronavirus.
Abashyizwe mu bushakashatsi bari baravuye mu bitaro basezerewe cyangwa bapfuye mbere ya tariki 21 Mata 2020.
Muri abo harimo 65.
9% bo muri Amerika ya Ruguru, 17.
3% bo mu Burayi, 7.
9% bo muri Aziya, 4.
6% bo muri Afurika, 3.
7% bo muri Amerika y’Epfo na 0.
6% bo muri Australia.
Mu basaga ibihumbi 96 bari mu bitaro, abagera kuri 11.
1% baguye mu bitaro.
Hafatwaga abantu nibura mu masaha 48 bageze kwa muganga bagahabwa umuti wa chloroquine wonyine cyangwa chloroquine na Macrolide (umuti ukoreshwa mu kurwanya udukoko mu mubiri cyangwa antibiotique zirimo Clarithromycin, Azithromycin, Fidoximycin na Erythromycin); hydroxychloroquine yonyine cyangwa hydroxychloroquine hamwe na Macrolide; abatarahawe umuti n’umwe muri iyo ine.
Mu igenzura havanwemo abahawe imiti nyuma y’amasaha yarengaga 48 bageze mu bitaro cyangwa se bakayihabwa barembye cyane bashyizwe ku mwuka kimwe n’abarwayi bahawe umuti wa remdesivir.
Abashakashatsi bagize bati “Ibyavuyemo by’ibanze ni uko abantu baguye mu bitaro no kugira ibibazo by’ugutera k’umutima.
Mu gihe cyakorewemo ubushakashatsi hashyizwe mu bitaro abantu 96 032 bari bujuje ibisabwa mu bushakashatsi, barimo 14 888 bahawe imiti.
Abantu 1868 bahawe chloroquine, 3783 bahabwa chloroquine na macrolide, 3016 bahabwa hydroxychloroquine, naho 6221 bahabwa hydroxychloroquine na macrolide.
Abandi 81144 bo bakurikiranwe ku bundi buryo.
Imibare yerekanye ko mu bantu bavurwaga, abagera ku 10 698 bangana na 11.
1% bapfuye, bitandukanye n’abandi bitabwagaho batari ku miti kuko bo hapfuye 9.
Ubushakashatsi bukomeza buti “Nta kimenyetso na kimwe twabonye cy’inyungu yo gukoresha hydroxychloroquine cyangwa chloroquine yaba ikoreshejwe yonyine cyangwa se ikoreshejwe hamwe na macrolide.
Inyigo zabanje zakorwaga ku bantu bake cyane cyangwa inyigo nto zitarangira.
Ubwo buryo uko ari bune basanze bufitanye isano n’umubare munini w’abantu baguye mu bitaro.
Nibura umurwayi umwe muri 11 mu itsinda ryitabwagaho mu bundi buryo yaguye mu bitaro.
Nyamara mu bahabwaga imiti, umwe mu barwayi batandatu wahawe chloroquine cyangwa hydroxychloroquine yonyine yaguye mu bitaro.
Naho umurwayi umwe muri batanu bavuwe hakoreshejwe chloroquine yongeweho antibiotic yarapfuye, mu gihe umurwayi umwe muri bane bavuwe hakoreshejwe hydroxychloroquine yongeweho antibiotic yapfuye.
Muri ubwo bushakashatsi, Umuganga w’indwara z’umutima wo mu Bitaro bya Kaminuza ya Zurich, Dr.
Frank Ruschitzka, yavuze ko habuze ibimenyetso bigaragaza ibyiza by’iyo miti, ariko ubushakashatsi burakomeje.
Yakomeje ati “Ariko, ubu dushingiye ku nyigo yacu tuzi ko amahirwe yo kuba iyi miti yafasha umuntu urwaye COVID-19 ari make.
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abantu bahawe hydroxychloroquine, ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereyeho 34 naho ibyago by’indwara z’umutima byiyongeraho 137 ku ijana.
Ku bahawe hydroxychloroquine hamwe na antibiotique, ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereyeho 45 ku ijana naho iby’indwara z’umutima byiyongeraho 411 ku ijana.
Ni mu gihe abahawe chloroquine ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereyeho 37 ku ijana naho iby’indwara z’umutima byiyongeraho 256 ku ijana naho abafashe chloroquine na antibiotic, ibyago byo gupfa byiyongereyeho 37 ku ijana maho ibyago by’indwara z’umutima bizamukaho 301 ku ijana.
Abantu batandatu batwara amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka basanzwemo Coronavirus mu Rwanda kuri uyu munsi mu gihe umwe yasezerewe mu bitaro nyuma yo gukira.
Abantu batandatu batwara amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka basanzwemo Coronavirus mu Rwanda kuri uyu munsi mu gihe umwe yasezerewe mu bitaro nyuma yo gukira.
Abarwayi bashya basanganywe ubwandu bwa Coronavirus bose ni ‘abashoferi n’abakorana na bo’.
Aba bose bakuwe ku Mupaka wa Rusumo uhuza u Rwanda na Tanzania.
Bahise bashyirwa ahabugenewe kugira bitabweho ndetse ntibagire abandi bantu banduza.
Itangazo rya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ryo kuri uyu wa Kane, ryagaragaje ko undi muntu umwe yakoze Coronavirus, asezererwa mu bitaro.
Umurwayi wa mbere mu Rwanda yabonetse ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, yari Umuhinde ukorera rimwe mu mashami ya Loni mu gihugu wari uvuye mu Mujyi wa Mumbai.
Ku wa 5 Mata 2020, nibwo bane ba mbere barimo Abanyarwanda batatu n’Umurundi umwe basezererwaga aho bari barwariye mu Kigo Nderabuzima cya Kanyinya.
Kuva icyo gihe hamaze gukira 217 mu bantu 320 banduye.
Abakiri kwa muganga ni 103.
Kuva mu minsi ishize icyiciro cy’abatwara amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka cyatangiye kubonekamo abarwayi benshi ndetse byanatumye hakazwa ingamba zo gupima no kwita ku bakora mu bwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa n’ibikoresho byambukiranya imipaka.
Abenshi muri bo ni abava muri Tanzania bajyanye ibicuruzwa mu Rwanda.
Muri Tanzania habarurwa abarwayi ba Coronavirus 509, abagera ku 183 bamaze gukira mu gihe 21 yabahitanye.
Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Mujyi wa Wuhan mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019; kuri ubu 5 141 142 bamaze kuyandura ku Isi yose, barimo 331 732 yahitanye na 2 051 407 bamaze kuyikira.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro.
Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune, guhana intera ya metero, kwambara udupfukamunwa n’amazuru mu gihe umuntu avuye mu rugo cyangwa agiye ahari abantu benshi.
Mu buzima bw’umuntu bwa buri munsi, akenera kugura ikintu akeneye kimuneza, kimukemurira ibibazo, kimuteza imbere ndetse kinamwubaka.
Mu buzima bw’umuntu bwa buri munsi, akenera kugura ikintu akeneye kimuneza, kimukemurira ibibazo, kimuteza imbere ndetse kinamwubaka.
Abantu bamwe baha agaciro kadakwiye igitabo, ntibazi ko igitabo aricyo shingiro ry’iterambere rirambye, ishingiro ry’ubuzima bwiza, ishingiro ry’ubwenge, ishingiro ry’imibereho myiza, ishingiro ryo kubaka igihugu, ishingiro ryo gusigasira igihango ndetse igitabo ni ishingiro ryo kugira igenamigambi rirambye.
Njya nibaza ibibazo bikurikira: Kuki umuntu agura umwenda w’ibihumbi ijana ariko akumva atagura igitabo cy’ibihumbi ijana?
Kuki umuntu agura mudasobwa y’ibihumbi magana atanu ariko akumva atagura igitabo cy’ibihumbi magana atanu?
Kuki umuntu agura ururabo rwo guha inshuti ye ariko akaba atamuha impano y’igitabo?
Mu mwaka wa 2016, hari inshuti yanjye yitwa Ken Chartrand twigeze kuganira turi gutembera i New York, ambwira ko mu mpano nziza ashobora guha umuntu akunda ko hadashobora kuburamo igitabo, mubajije impamvu arambwira ngo igitabo ni inshuti nziza muganira ukunguka ubwenge n’ubuhanga, kikaba urwibutso rurambye kandi rudashira.
Ken yambwiye ko igitabo ari urwibutso rw’ubushuti, ko buri kwezi agura ibitabo bibiri byo gusoma kandi ko adashobora kuryama adasomye igitabo kuko gituma aruhuka neza, akunguka ubumenyi burushijeho.
Nyuma y’ikiganiro twagiranye, nahise nkunda birushijeho igitabo, mpitamo kwimakaza umuco wo kwandika, kugura ndetse no gusoma ibitabo.
Kugeza ubu maze kwandika ibitabo bine.
Mu biro byanjye harimo ibitabo naguze nsoma kenshi, mu rugo umuryango wanjye nawuguriye ibitabo byo gusoma kandi bamaze kubikunda.
Birakwiye ko twimakaza uyu muco mwiza ufasha kubaka u Rwanda twifuza ndetse n’Afurika, tugura ibitabo, tubiha agaciro gakomeye, tubitangamo impano ku nshuti dukunda, tubisoma aho turi hose, bityo bizadufashe kurushaho gutera imbere dufite ubuhanga bwimbitse.
Ibi kandi bizadufasha kwihuta mu iterambere ndetse turusheho kumenya aho tuva, aho tugeze ndetse n’icyerekezo cy’u Rwanda na Afurika.
Bizadufasha kurushaho kuba abarinzi b’ibyagezweho mu Rwanda no muri Afurika bityo tubisigasire ndetse tunabyubakireho ibindi bikorwa byinshi kandi byiza.

Siporo by’umwihariko umupira w’amaguru ni kimwe mu bushabitsi bugezweho bwunguka amafaranga menshi mu gihe gito ku bafite impano bagize amahirwe yo guhirwa n’amaguru bakinisha cyangwa uko bitwara mu kibuga.
Siporo by’umwihariko umupira w’amaguru ni kimwe mu bushabitsi bugezweho bwunguka amafaranga menshi mu gihe gito ku bafite impano bagize amahirwe yo guhirwa n’amaguru bakinisha cyangwa uko bitwara mu kibuga.
Umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ukinira Juventus yo mu Butaliyani, aherutse kwinjiza miliyoni 105$ hagati ya Kamena 2019 na Kamena 2020.
Ibi byamushyiraga ku mwanya wa kane mu byamamare 100 byinjije amafaranga menshi ku Isi muri icyo gihe mu gihe ari we uyoboye abakina umupira w’Amaguru kuri urwo rutonde.
Amafaranga uyu mukinnyi yinjije ni ayo yakoreye mu ikipe akinira, ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi akora n’abafatanyabikorwa yamamariza.
Mu Rwanda ntabwo abakinnyi baho baragera ku rwego rwo kwinjiza amafaranga menshi bayakuye mu bucuruzi cyangwa kwamamaza ariko agaciro kabo ku isoko kari kuzamuka umunsi ku munsi.
Nubwo ari uko bimeze ariko usanga amakosa abakinnyi bo mu Rwanda cyane ab’imbere mu gihugu bakora mu gihe cyo gusinya amasezerano, ariyo atuma badashobora gutera imbere kuko arengera inyungu z’amakipe kurusha uko bo yabarengera nka bamwe mu bagize uruhare rwo kugira ngo amasezerano akorwe.
Ingero ni nyinshi nk’aho Mutebi Rachid yashatse kuva muri Gicumbi FC yibwira ko asoje amasezerano, akabwirwa ko agifite undi mwaka umwe.
Byabaye ngombwa ko yongera gukina undi mwaka mu ikipe yo mu Majyaruguru nubwo yifuzwaga na Bugesera FC na Kiyovu Sports icyo gihe.
Kuri ibi hiyongeraho kuba bamwe mu bakinnyi akenshi iyo bageze mu mwaka wa nyuma w’amasezerano bavunika, amakipe akanga kubavuza kuko aba bona agiye kubatakazaho amafaranga menshi kandi ashobora kuba atakibafite mu mibare yabo.
Hari kandi n’abifuzwa n’andi makipe, ugasanga mu masezerano harimo ingingo zituma batabona ubwinyagamburiro bwo kugenda.
Abakinnyi batandukanye baganiriye na IGIHE bagaragaje ko kuba akenshi baba bakeneye amafaranga (ubukene), guhindura ikipe bajya mu yisumbuye ku yo bari barimo no kutamenya gusoma kuri bamwe (amasezerano ari mu ndimi batazi) biri mu bituma bakora ikosa ryo gusinya amasezerano adafite ikintu kinini azabafasha mu gihe bahuye n’ikibazo.
Suzuki Mpanzi nyiri sosiyete ya Suzuki- Soccer Site Ltd ikora nk’umuhuza w’abakinnyi n’amakipe, yabwiye IGIHE ko abakinnyi aribo bizira kuko badashaka abajyanama.
Ati “Abakinnyi bamwe bigize abanyamanyanga.
Bumva ko byose babyikorera bakirengagiza ko bakeneye abajyanama [abahuza] kandi usanga n’abakinnyi bakomeye i Burayi babafite, hari n’abagira batatu.
Iyo bagezeyo babaha amasezerano bakareba umushahara n’igihe amasezerano azarangirira gusa.
“Byose byakagombye gukorwa hubahirijwe amategeko ya FIFA kuko habaho amasezerano y’igurwa ry’umukinnyi hagati y’amakipe n’ amasezerano y’umurimo hagati y’umukinnyi n’ikipe.
Twe usanga abakinnyi benshi bigira aba free-agent [bakigurisha ubwabo].
Mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi, Rutanga Eric wari wasinyiye Police FC na Kimenyi Yves wasinyiye Kiyovu Sports, babwiwe na Rayon Sports ko nta rupapuro rubarekura izabaha kuko basinyiye ayo makipe batabanje gusesa amasezerano bari bafitanye nayo.
Ni mu gihe ubwo aba bombi basinyaga muri Kamena (kuri Rutanga) na Nyakanga (kuri Kimenyi) 2019, bari basabye ko mu masezerano yabo hashyirwamo ingingo ivuga ko nibigera tariki ya 30 Kanama batarahabwa amafaranga yose bemerewe, amasezerano ashobora guta agaciro.
Uretse umubare utari muto w’abakinnyi bavunitse bari hafi gusoza amasezerano yabo bagatereranwa n’amakipe, abandi bikabaviramo gusezera ruhago burundu, hari n’abadahabwa ibyo bagombwa n’amakipe ku gihe, basaba ko abarekura ngo bagende, nabyo bikananirana.
Suzuki yavuze ko FERWAFA yakaba ariyo icyemura ibibazo nk’ibi ariko nayo iterera agati mu ryinyo ntigire icyo ifasha abakinnyi cyangwa amarerero aba yarabazamuye mu gihe amakipe makuru abasinyishije mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko.
Ati “Hari itegeko rya FIFA kandi bararizi, umukinnyi yemerewe kwandika agasesa amasezerano mu gihe ikipe itamuhaye ibyo imugomba mu gihe cyagenwe [amezi abiri], ariko ikipe iravuga ngo aracyari uwacu bikarangira abaye inzirakarengane.
FERWAFA niyo igomba kubikoraho.
Hari ibirego byinshi nk’ibi biri muri FERWAFA kandi ntabwo babikemuye.
Nyuma yo kumara amezi asaga atandatu abakinnyi ba Mukura Victory Sports badahembwa, Ntwari Evode wifuzwa n’amakipe arimo Rayon Sports, Police FC na Kiyovu Sports yasabye ko yasesa amasezerano iyi kipe ikamureka akagenda.
Muri iki cyumweru, Akanama Nkemurampaka ka FERWAFA kasabye ko impande zombi zumvikana ikipe ishaka Ntwari Evode ikazamusaba muri Mukura Victory Sports nubwo itegeko rya FIFA ryemereraga uyu mukinnyi kurekurwa nyuma yo gukurikiza inzira zose zisabwa.
Ubwo IGIHE yabazaga Umunyamabanga wa FERWAFA, Uwayezu François Régis, niba hari icyo iri Shyirahamwe rikora ku bibazo nk’ibi by’imishahara bibangamira abakinnyi, yavuze ko iyo hari umukinnyi ubagaragarije ikibazo bamufasha.
Ati “Amategeko ya FIFA akurikizwa n’abakina umupira bose.
Amasezerano ni hagati y’umukinnyi n’ikipe kandi agomba kuba ashingiye ku mategeko.
Iyo hari ibyo batumvikanyeho barabidushyikiriza hanyuma tukabafasha kubikemura.
Umuyobozi wa Espoir FC, Kamuzinzi Godefroid, we avuga ko hari abakinnyi bamwe basaba ko hari ibyahindurwa mu masezerano ndetse akenshi usanga abatabikora ari ababa batiyizeye bakumva ko icyangombwa bavugaho ari umushahara n’amafaranga bagurwa gusa.
Ati “Ubundi amasezerano ategurwa n’impande zombi.
Uwayateguye ashobora kuyategura urundi ruhande rugasanga hari ibitanoze, hakarebwa uburyo binozwa mbere y’uko asinywa.
Bibaho cyane, nagiye mbibona ku bakinnyi bamwe tugura.
Niyo mpamvu ushobora gusanga amasezerano y’umukinnyi runaka atandukanye n’ay’undi.
“Hari abakinnyi baza ntibasome byose, akirebera ku mafaranga: umushahara n’ayo agurwa, ntarebe ati ‘ese ninkenera kuva muri iyi kipe bizagenda gute?
’ Ntakenera kumenya ati ‘ese igihe nzavunikira mu ikipe bizagenda gute?
“Ari njye ugiye gusinya amasezerano nk’umukinnyi nareba ingingo zindengera nubwo ibyo umuntu yifuza byose atari ko ashobora kubibona.
Abatabyitaho ni ababa batiyizeye ubwabo ku musaruro bazatanga, umukinnyi uzi ko akenewe ashyiraho ibye ashaka ko byuharizwa.
Ubwo yasinyiraga Police FC tariki ya 8 Kamena, Rutanga Eric yayisabye ko Yanga SC cyangwa indi kipe niza imushaka izamureka akagenda ndetse niko byagenze mu cyumweru gishize ubwo yumvikanaga n’iyi kipe yo muri Tanzania yamutanzeho ibihumbi 25$.
Hakizimana Muhadjiri wamaze kumvikana na Rayon Sports kuri miliyoni 15 Frw ku mwaka umwe n’umushahara wa miliyoni 1.
2 Frw ku kwezi akomeje gutinza ibyo gusinya amasezerano kuko hari andi makipe amwifuza.
Yasabye ko bamwishyura agasinya, ariko hazaza indi kipe bakamureka akagenda, ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports nabwo ntibwabikozwa.
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bya Kigali Fashion Week byagejejwe ku yindi ntera n’ababitegura mu bufatanye n’ikigo cya BerexInvest Corporation, bigiye gutangira kubera i Burayi nyuma y’imyaka irindwi bitangijwe mu Rwanda.
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bya Kigali Fashion Week byagejejwe ku yindi ntera n’ababitegura mu bufatanye n’ikigo cya BerexInvest Corporation, bigiye gutangira kubera i Burayi nyuma y’imyaka irindwi bitangijwe mu Rwanda.
Ibi birori byaherukaga kubera i Kigali muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, aho byamaze iminsi itatu biba, hakerekanwa imodoka, imyambaro isanzwe n’itamenyerewe ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bigaragaza umwihariko n’intera ibijyanye no kumurika imideli bimaze kugeraho mu Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru, Umuyobozi wa Kigali Fashion Week, John Bunyeshuri, yatangaje ko umwaka wa 2018 uzasiga isura nshya n’iterambere ridasanzwe ku bakora n’abamurika imideli b’Abanyarwanda biturutse ku mushinga udasanzwe bafite wo gutangira kubafasha kumenyekanisha ibikorwa mu mahanga.
Yagize ati "Nk’uko twambara Gucci, Nike n’indi myenda tukumva turabyishimiye cyane, kuki abanyamahanga nabo batakwambara amashati n’imyenda byanditseho ’Made in Rwanda?
’" Yongeyeho ati "Ibirori bya Kigali Fashion Week tugiye kubigeza ahashimishije kurushaho, turifuza ko n’Abanyarwanda bakora imideli bamenyekana ku Isi n’ibyo bakora bikarenga imbibi.
Yavuze ko byibuze abakora imideli bagera ku icumi mu Rwanda bazahabwa amahirwe yo kumurika ibikorwa byabo mu birori bya Kigali International Fashion Week bizabera mu bihugu bitatu i Burayi ndetse n’abamurika imideli bagera kuri 16 akaba ari bo bamaze kwemererwa guhabwa amahirwe yo kugaragaza impano zabo.
Ku ikubitiro, ibirori bya Kigali International Fashion Week bizabera i Berlin mu Budage kuva ku itariki 12 kugeza kuri 14 Mutarama 2017, bizerekeza i Amsterdam mu Buholandi kuva ku wa 26 kugeza ku wa 28 Mutarama, hanyuma mu i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi habere ibisoza urugendo muri uwo mwaka i Burayi kuva ku itariki 19 kugeza kuri 25 Werurwe 2017.
Dieudonne Ntasinzira, Umuyobozi wa BerexInvest Corporation ikorera mu Bubiligi, yasinye amasezerano y’ubufatanyabikorwa na Kigali International Fashion Week, yavuze ko amarembo afunguye ku banyarwanda bifuza kugira ibyo bamenyekanisha yizeza umusanzu ukomeye mu guteza imbere abakora ibijyanye n’imideli mu Rwanda.
Abateguye Kigali International Fashion Week batangaje ko iki gikorwa batangije cyo kugeza hanze y’u Rwanda ibi birori, nibigenda neza i Burayi, hazarebwa uko byagezwa no ku yindi migabane nka Amerika, Aziya n’ahandi hatandukanye ku Isi.
Abanyamideli barindwi bamaze kumenyakana mu Rwanda batumiwe mu bazitabira iserukiramuco ry’imideli rikomeye muri Guinée, rizamara icyumweru ribera muri iki gihugu muri Gicurasi 2017.
Abanyamideli barindwi bamaze kumenyakana mu Rwanda batumiwe mu bazitabira iserukiramuco ry’imideli rikomeye muri Guinée, rizamara icyumweru ribera muri iki gihugu muri Gicurasi 2017.
Iserukiramuco ‘Festival International de la Mode Guinéenne’ rimaze kumenyekana muri Afurika, ni ku nshuro ya gatatu rigiye kuba.
Iry’uyu mwaka rizamara icyumweru guhera kuwa 8 Gicurasi kugeza ku itariki ya 13 Gicurasi 2017.
Abahanzi b’imideli n’aberekana imideli bazahagararira u Rwanda barimo Franco Kabano ihuriro ry’abamurika imideli mu gihugu [Rwanda Fashion Models Union], Shema Ryabasinga , Cissy Ngamije, Mucyo Sandrine, Ntabanganyimana Jean de Dieu [Jay Rwanda], Ganza Irihose Jean Fidèle [Ganza Gabey] ndetse na Sekamana Eric Louis .
Iri serukiramuco risanzwe ritegurwa na Bah Alpha Oumar Ly abicishije mu nzu y’imideli yitwa Alphao Fashion ku bufatanye na Minisiteri ya Siporo, Umuco, umurage n’amateka muri Guinée.
Mu kiganiro Bah Alpha Oumar Ly yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru Guinée Matin, yavuze ko icyerekezo iri serukiramuco rifite ari ugufasha urubyiruko rwa Afurika n’urwa Guinée by’umwihariko kwiteza imbere binyuze mu guhanga umurimo no kubyaza inyungu ubuhanzi n’impano ya buri wese.

Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ibarurishamibare mu Rwanda (NISR), cyatangaje ko muri Mata 2020, ibiciro bikomatanyirijwe hamwe mu mijyi no mu byaro, byiyongereyeho 10,1%, ugereranyije na Mata 2019.
Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ibarurishamibare mu Rwanda (NISR), cyatangaje ko muri Mata 2020, ibiciro bikomatanyirijwe hamwe mu mijyi no mu byaro, byiyongereyeho 10,1%, ugereranyije na Mata 2019.
Ihinduka ry’ibiciro mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020, ryari ku kigereranyo kingana na 13,1%, ugereranyije n’ukwezi nk’uku kwa 2019.
Itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara na NISR, kuwa 10 Gicurasi 2020, rigaragaza ko bimwe mu byatumye ibiciro byiyongeraho 10,1% mu kwezi kwa Mata 2020 ‘ni ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byazamutseho 18,7% n’ibiciro by’ibinyobwa bisembuye n’itabi byazamutseho 21,3%’.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko, iyo ugereranyije ukwezi kwa kane (Mata 2020) n’ukwezi kwa gatatu (Werurwe 2020) ibiciro byagabanutseho 1,8%, ukomatanyije mu mijyi no mu byaro.
NISR iti “Iri gabanuka ahanini ryatewe n’ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byagabanutseho 3% n’ibiciro by’amazu, amazi, amashanyarazi, gazi n’ibindi bicanwa byagabanutseho 3,3%".
Uko ibiciro byazamutse mu mijyi no mu byaro
NISR yatangaje ko ibiciro mu mijyi byiyongereyeho 8% mu kwezi gushize kwa Mata 2020 ugereranyije na Mata 2019.
Ihinduka ry’ibiciro mu kwezi kwa gatatu (Werurwe 2020) ryari ku kigereranyo kingana na 8,5%.
Ikomeza igira iti “Bimwe mu byatumye ibiciro byiyongeraho 8% mu kwezi kwa Mata, ni ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byazamutseho 15,8%, ibiciro by’ibinyobwa bisembuye n’itabi byazamutseho 17,4% n’ibiciro by’amazu, amazi, amashanyarazi, gazi n’ibindi bicanwa byazamutseho 6,5%".
Iyo ugereranyije Mata 2020 na Mata 2019, usanga ibiciro by’ibintu bitarimo ibiribwa n’ibikomoka ku ngufu byarazamutseho 4,6%.
Wagereranya ukwezi kwa kane (Mata 2020) n’ukwezi kwa gatatu (Werurwe 2020), ibiciro byagabanutseho 0,2%.
Iri gabanuka ahanini ryatewe n’ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byagabanutseho 2,1%.
NISR ivuga ko muri Mata 2020, ibiciro mu byaro byiyongereyeho 11,7% ugereranyije na Mata 2019.
Ihinduka ry’ibiciro mu byaro mu kwezi kwa gatatu (Werurwe 2020) ryari ku kigereranyo kingana na 16,5%.
NISR yagize iti “Bimwe mu byatumye ibiciro byiyongeraho 11,7% mu kwezi kwa Mata ni ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byazamutseho 20% n’ibiciro by’ibinyobwa bisembuye n’itabi byazamutseho 23,2%".
Ugereranyije ukwezi kwa kane (Mata 2020) n’ukwezi kwa gatatu (Werurwe 2020), ibiciro byagabanutseho 3%.
Iri gabanuka ahanini ryatewe n’ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byagabanutseho 3,4% n’ibiciro by’amazu, amazi, amashanyarazi, gazi n’ibindi bicanwa byagabanutseho 8%.

Ibiranga ba Clémentine
Ba Clémentine ni abakobwa bakunda ubuzima bwiza kandi ntibarangwa n’ubwoba cyangwa kugira ubuzima bwabo ubwiru cyane.
Bakunda kuguma uko bari, bagira ikinyabupfura, ni abanyamurava, baratuje kandi bagira kwihangana muri bo.
Ni abanyabwenge cyane, bagira imibare ku buryo bikunze no kubafasha kwesa imihigo y’ibintu bikomeye mu buzima bwabo.
Mu bwana bwabo usanga bakunda kuba bari bafi y’imiryango yabo bakanigumira iwabo gusa.
Ikindi ni uko iyo bakiri bato ubwenge bagaragaza usanga ntaho buhuriye n’imyaka yabo kuko baba bakora ibintu nk’iby’abantu bakuru.
Ba Clémentine ariko rimwe na rimwe bajya bagorana mu myitwarire yabo.

Mu cyumweru gishize ubwo Premier League yasubukurwaga, Sheffield United ntiyahawe igitego yatsinze Aston Villa kuko umusifuzi atabonye ko umupira warenze umurongo mu gihe n’ikoranabuhanga rya Goal-line Technology (ryerekana ko umupira warenze umurongo) ritigeze ribimenyesha umusifuzi binyuze mu itumanaho rikoresha.
Sosiyete ya Hawk-Eye ikoresha Goal-line Technology yasabye imbabazi ivuga ko “abakinnyi bakingirije umurongo" ntibigaragare ko umupira waba wageze mu izamu.
Yavuze ko ari ubwa mbere habayeho iri kosa mu mikino isaga 9000 imaze gukoreshwamo iri koranabuhanga muri Premier League.
Abasifuzi ba Premier League nibo bahembwa neza muri Shampiyona zikomeye
Nka Shampiyona y’icyitegererezo irimo amafaranga menshi kurusha izindi, Premier League y’u Bwongereza ni yo ifata neza abasifuzi kurusha izindi zose, aho bo bagenerwa umushahara w’umwaka.
Gusa ntabwo ari bose kuko biterwa n’urwego umusifuzi agezeho kandi birumvikana kuko umusifuzi ukizamuka adafatwa kimwe n’umaze kugira uburambe ndetse akaba agaragaza ubuhanga mu kazi ke.
Abasifuzi batabigize umwuga mu Bwami bw’u Bwongereza bishyurwa hagati ya £20 (asaga ibihumbi 23 Frw) na £40 (asaga ibihumbi 47 Frw) ku mukino.
Abari hafi kubigira umwuga, basifura mu byiciro byo hasi by’umupira w’amaguru mu Bwongereza, bishyurwa hafi £80 (hafi ibihumbi 95 Frw) ku mukino.
Bahabwa kandi n’ibyo bakenera bava cyangwa bajya ku mukino (amafaranga y’urugendo, ayo gufungura n’ibindi).
Hejuru y’abo bose hari aba Premier, bo bahabwa imishahara ihoraho ku mwaka ariko hakaba hari n’amafaranga umusifuzi yishyurwa kubera umukino yasifuye.
Martin Atkinson, Mike Dean na Michael Oliver buri umwe ahabwa ibihumbi 200£ (agera kuri miliyoni 237 Frw) nk’umushahara w’umwaka, hatarongerwaho ay’imikino yasifuye- 1500£ ku mukino)
Abasifuzi bo ku ruhande bahembwa umushahara w’ibihumbi 30£ ku mwaka na £850 kuri buri mukino mu gihe abakoresha VAR bahabwa ibihumbi 30£ ku mwaka na £850 ku mukino.

5 $ (asaga miliyoni 45 Frw) n’ibihumbi 42 £ (hafi miliyoni 50 Frw) ku mwaka, yiyongera ku 1,150£ (hafi miliyoni 1.
3 Frw) bahabwa kuri buri mukino basifuye.
N’abasifuzi bo mu cyiciro cya kabiri (Championship) bishyurwa amafaranga nk’ayo ku mwaka ariko bo ku mukino bishyurwa £600 (agera ku bihumbi 713 Frw).
Umushahara utangwa ku mwaka niwo uhesha agaciro imisifurire yo mu Bwongereza kuko nko mu bindi bihugu bifite shampiyona zikomeye ho abasifuzi bahembwa amafaranga menshi ku mukino basifuye gusa, ariko nta kindi bagenerwa.

Abasifuzi bo mu Rwanda bahembwa gute?
Bamwe mu bakurikirana imisifurire yo mu Rwanda bavuga ko iri ku rwego rwo hasi mu gihe hari abavuga ko kimwe mu byaba bibitera ari uko habamo ruswa bigatuma umusifuzi yica umukino.
Mu kiganiro Café Sport cya Televiziyo y’Igihugu cyabaye mu Ukuboza 2019, Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate n’uwa Kiyovu Sports, Ntarindwa Théodore, bavuze ko kuba abasifuzi bo mu Rwanda bahabwa agahimbazamushyi kadahagije ku mukino biri mu bituma batitwara neza mu kibuga.
Mu gukora kuri ibi, IGIHE yasanze abasifuzi bo mu Rwanda nta mushahara wihariye bagenerwa uretse amafaranga bishyurwa ko basifuye umukino runaka ariko nabwo ashobora kuza nyuma y’imikino itanu cyangwa icumi (yarabaye ibirarane by’igihe kirekire).
Mu Rwanda, iyo umusifuzi apanzwe ku mukino runaka, tuvuge wenda ari buve i Kigali akajya gusifura i Rusizi, aba agomba kwimenyera buri kimwe noneho amafaranga akazayahabwa nyuma.
Umwe mu baganiriye na IGIHE, yagize ati “Ubundi uba ugomba guhora ufite amafaranga kuko hari igihe runaka bayatangira ntabwo bayaduha mbere cyangwa nyuma ya buri mukino.
Niyo mpamvu ubona bigoranye ko umuntu yasifura nta kandi kazi afite.
Undi yagize ati “Kugira ngo hirindwe ko umusifuzi yamenya umukino azasifura agahita ajya gushakisha niba hari ruswa yabona kuri uwo mukino, batubwira imikino tuzasifura ku wa Kane.
Gusifura umukino w’icyiciro cya mbere wabereye i Kigali, umusifuzi ahabwa ibihumbi 17.
2 Frw ariko iyo wasifuwe n’umusifuzi mpuzamahanga, we ahabwa ibihumbi 23.
5 Frw mu gihe gusifura umukino w’abagore wabereye i Kigali, umusifuzi ahabwa 9100 Frw.
Iyo bigeze ku mikino yabereye mu Ntara, i Musanze (Kigali- Musanze) umusifuzi ahabwa ibihumbi 27.
6 Frw, i Rusizi ni 62,760 Frw, Rubavu- Rusizi ni 61,700 Frw, Kigali- Nyagatare ni 34,960 Frw, Kigali- Huye cyangwa Nyamagabe ni 27,740 Frw.
Iyo bigeze ku bakomiseri b’umukino, bo bafata menshi kurusha abasifuzi aho nk’urugero rw’uwakoze umukino wabereye i Rusizi yavuye i Kigali, ahabwa 71,760 Frw.
Ibi ntibisobanuye ko buri musifuzi aba afite umukino buri cyumweru nk’uko Gasingwa Michel uyobora Komisiyo ishinzwe Abasifuzi muri FERWAFA aherutse kubitangaza.
Ati “Buriya rero mugiye kureba hirya no hino ku isi mwasanga abasifuzi bose batanganya imikino.
Mu gusifura nta gusaranganya kubamo rwose.
Ikindi kandi, imibare dufite inaha mu Rwanda igaragaza ko abasifuzi bose bajya kunganya umubare w’imikino.
Muri uyu mwaka wa 2020, FERWAFA yari yateganyije ko ibijyanye n’imisifurire byose bizatwara miliyoni 138 Frw arimo miliyoni 116.

Bamwe mu bafuzi b’Abanyarwanda bungukira mu gusifura imikino mpuzamahanga kuko nk’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika (CAF) yishyura $1200 (agera kuri miliyoni 1.
14 Frw) ku mukino.

Iri zina riri 100 ya mbere akunzwe cyane mu Bufaransa no mu bindi bihugu nka Canada.
Kubera uburyo izina Pierre ryamamaye cyane i Burayi, usanga rigiye rigaragara mu ndimi nyinshi zo kuri uyu mugabane aho nko mu Gitaliyani yitwa ‘Pietro’, Icyespanyol ni ‘Pedro’, Ikidage ni ‘Pier’ na ‘Pyotr’ mu Kirusiya.
Ibiranga ba Pierre
Ba Pierre bakunda ubuyobozi no kubaho mu buzima bumva bisanzuye.
Ni abanyembaraga kandi bakorera ku ntego bagakora n’iyo bwabaga kugira ngo bazigereho, bagakunda no guhirwa no kuba abatunzi.
Mu bijyanye n’ubucuruzi ba Pierre babwibonamo cyane bakanabugiriramo umusaruro.
Ba Pierre bagira ubushobozi bwo kuyobora itsinda ry’abantu benshi, byagera mu gukemura ibibazo bakaba intyoza.
Bakunda kubyaza umusaruro buri kintu kibakikije dore ko batagira icyo basuzugura niyo cyaba kigaragara nkaho ari gito, bikaba ari nabyo bibafasha kuba abatunzi.
Igishimisha ba Pierre si uko bakoze akazi gusa ahubwo iyo bageze ku ntego bihaye ni cyo kibanezeza bakumva banyuzwe.
Hari ibihangange bitandukanye bifite iri zina nka Pierre Emerick Aubameyang, rutahizamu w’Ikipe ya Arsenal; Pierre Jean Marie Laval wabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bufaransa n’abandi.
Abantu benshi bakunze kwibaza ikibazo kijyanye n’ibicumbi bikuru by’imiryango bakomokamo nka gakondo y’ubutaka bwatuweho n’abakurambere mbere y’uko bororoka bagakwirakwira hirya no hino ku butaka bw’u Rwanda, ari nako babuhangaho ibihugu byaje kungwa bikabyara igihugu kimwe aricyo u Rwanda.
Abantu benshi bakunze kwibaza ikibazo kijyanye n’ibicumbi bikuru by’imiryango bakomokamo nka gakondo y’ubutaka bwatuweho n’abakurambere mbere y’uko bororoka bagakwirakwira hirya no hino ku butaka bw’u Rwanda, ari nako babuhangaho ibihugu byaje kungwa bikabyara igihugu kimwe aricyo u Rwanda.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Iyororoka ry’Abanyarwanda, Inkomoko y’imiryango migari’’ dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu muco, ubusizi n’amateka y’u Rwanda, tugiye kubatekerere za gakondo nkuru z’ibicumbi bikuru by’imiryango migari y’Abanyarwanda.
Abanyarwanda bibumbiye mu Bicumbi bikuru by’imiryango, imiryango migari ndetse n’inzu z’imiryango.
Ibicumbi bikuru by’imiryango, nibyo byabyaye imiryango migari, naho imiryango migari ibyara inzu z’imiryango.
Muri aya mateka tukaba tugiye kwanzikira kuri gakondo z’ibicumbi bikuru by’imiryango y’Abanyarwanda aribyo: Abasinga, Abazigaba n’Abanyiginya.
Gakondo z’ igicumbi gikuru cy’imiryango y’Abasinga
Abatekereza b’amateka y’u Rwanda, bagaragaza neza ko Abasinga batuye bwa mbere ku butaka bw’u Rwanda, bafite inkomoko ku Bahima babarizwa ku butaka bw’igihugu cya Uganda, aribo bakunze kwita “Abahima b’Abanyankole".
Mu iyaduka ryabo, baje bafite intego yo guhamya ubuhangange bwo gutura ku butaka bwari butwikiriwe n’amashyamba ya kimeza, babuhangaho ibihugu, bituma bakura izina ryabo mu rurimi rw’igisekuruza cyabo rw’urunyankore, bakurijeho kwitwa “Abasinga" aribyo mu Kinyarwanda bisobanuye: ‘’ Abatsinze’’.
Mu gutura kuri ubu butaka bw’u Rwanda, Abasinga binjiriye bwa mbere mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda bakomereza mu Burengerazuba bagana mu Majyepfo, bakurikiranye ubutohe bw’umwegega w’Ikiyaga cya Kivu n’amashyamba y’Ibirunga n’aya kimeza nka Gishwati, Nyungwe, Mukura na Cyamudongo.
Ayo mashyamba bayahereyeho bahiga, kugeza ubwo bayatutira, bayahangaho ibihugu.
Kubera ko ntawe bacuranwaga ngo abakome imbere kuri ubu butaka, barisanzuye baratura kugeza n’ubwo basakaje ingoma zabo mu Rwanda rw’ u Burengerazuba, mu Rwanda rw’Amajyepfo no mu Rwanda rwo Hagati ndetse bambuka na Nyabarongo basatira u Rwanda rw’i Burasirazuba.
Gakondo yabo ari nayo gicumbi gikuru batuyemo, kuri ubu ni mu Mirenge ya : Kigeyo, Mushonyi, Musasa, Ruhango, Gihango, Kivumu na Boneza yo mu Karere ka Rutsiro n’Umurenge wa Nyamyumba wo mu Karere ka Rubavu
Gakondo z’ igicumbi gikuru cy’imiryango y’Abazigaba
Abatekereza b’amateka y’u Rwanda, bagaragaza neza ko Abazigaba batuye mu ba mbere kuri ubu butaka bw’u Rwanda bakurikiye bene wabo b’Abasinga, bafite ikomoko ku Bahima babarizwa ku butaka bw’igihugu cya Uganda, aribo bakunze kwita “Abahima b’Abanyankole".
Mu iyaduka ryabo, badukiriye igice cy’i Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda bogoze ibiyaga bigari bihabarizwa, aba ariho batema amashyamba ya Cyimeza barayakonda, barayatutira bayahangamo ibihugu bishyira kera.
Batuye ako gace babungira ubutohe gakomora ku ruzi rw’Akagera n’ibiyaga bihaboneka nka Nasho, Hago, Ihema n’ibindi.
Nuko batangira kwagura ibihugu byabo bagana mu Rwanda rwo hagati no mu Majyepfo y’Iburasirazuba.
Gakondo y’imbanza y’igicumbi gikuru cy’imiryango y’Abazigaba ni mu mirenge ya: Mwili na Murundi yo mu Karere ka Kayonza, ukongeraho Umurenge wa Rwimbogo yo muri Gatsibo.
Gakondo z’ igicumbi gikuru cy’imiryango y’Abanyiginya
Abatekereze b’amateka y’Igicumbi cy’imiryango migari cy’Abanyiginya, bavuga ko cyaba gikomoka mu Majyaruguru y’Iburasirazuba bwa Afurika mu gihugu cya Ethiopia.
Inkomoko yabo ikaba ari iyo mu muryango w’Abagala bakunze kwita n’Abaromo,wari ukomeye muri icyo gihugu kandi wari nawo mugabwangoma mu myaka ya 300 nyuma ya Yezu Kirisitu.
Abanyiginya basesekaye mu Karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba no mu Rwanda, ahasaga muwa 700, ubwo bari mu iyimukayimuka nk’abandi bose ry’abatuye muri Afurika, bashaka ubwinyagamburiro bw’imiryango yabo n’amatungo yabo.
Nyuma y’igihe kitari gito, bafashe urugendo rwo mu muhora uhuza Afurika y’Amajyaruguru y’Iburasirazuba n’iy’Amajyepfo, bagaca mu bihugu bya Somaliya, Kenya na Uganda, niko gusesekara kuri ubu butaka bw’u Rwanda.
Barasukiye mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda mu Murenge wa Gatsibo wo mu Karere ka Gatsibo, basanga Abazigaba barahakabye barema ingoma y’u Rweya rw’u Mubali, yari ikomatanyije Imirenge y’Akarere ka Gatsibo, n’imirenge imwe n’imwe iri mu Majyaruguru y’Akarere ka Kayonza.
Abahasesekaye muri ibyo bihe, nibo bavuyemo Abasekuruza b’Imbanza ba Kazi wabyaye Gihanga cyahanze ingoma y’u Rwanda.
Mu gusesekara mu Rweya rw’Abazigaba, bahaserukanye, ibigwi n’imihigo y’ibyo bazanye muri aka karere, nk’uko babivuze mu izina ryabo ubwo Abazigaba babazaga izina ryabo.
Nk’aho bakavuze iry’igisekuruza cyabo cy’Abagala cyangwa se Abaromo, badukana izina rishya ryibigwi n’ibirindiro by’ahazaza habo, ry’Abanyiginya rishatse kuvuga “Abantu barambye ku butunzi n’ubupfura".
Nyuma y’imyaka isaga 300, Abanyiginya bamaze mu busembere bacumbikiwe n’Abazigaba, nibwo umucyo w’ubuhangange wabamurikiye bahanga igihugu cyabo kitwaga Gasabo, cyinjira mu ruhando rw’ibindi bihugu bigera kuri 24 byari bisanganyije ubu butaka bw’u Rwanda, baba babaye igihugu cya 25, gihangwa na Gihanga Ngomijana, umukurambere w’Abangiyinya bahanze ingoma y’u Rwanda.
I Gasabo niho Abanyiginya n’imiryango ibakomokaho baguriye ubutaka bwabo bahanga ibindi bihugu ku bisigara by’ubutaka Abasinga n’Abazigaba bari baranennye.
Ibihugu byahanzwe na bene Gihanga, muri byo dusangamo Ndorwa y’Abashambo, Kibali y’Abega, u Bugara bw’Abacyaba n’u Bugesera bw’Abahondogo.
Amateka y’impitabie ku gihugu cy’u Rwanda, adutekerereza ko gakondo nkuru y’igicumbi gikuru cy’Abanyiginya n’imiryango migari ibakomokaho, ari mu Mirenge ya Nduba, Bumbogo, Rutunga, Gikomero, Ndera na Rusororo yo mu Karere ka Gasabo, ukongeraho n’Umurenge wa Fumbwe wo mu Karere ka Rwamagana.
Nyuma yo kubagezaho Gakondo nkuru z’ibicumbi by’imiryango y’Abanyarwanda, mu bice bikurikiraho, tuzabagezaho za Gakondo nkuru z’imiryango migari y’Abanyarwanda, uko ari 24.

Yezu ntabwo ashaka ko abe baba mu kababaro, ahubwo yabahaye umuhoza, umurengezi.
Byashyizweho akadomo ku munsi wa mirongo itanu Pasika ibaye ubwo Abayahudi bahimbazaga umunsi mukuru wa Pentekosti.

Yezu ntabwo ashaka ko abe baba mu kababaro, ahubwo yabahaye umuhoza, umurengezi.
Byashyizweho akadomo ku munsi wa mirongo itanu Pasika ibaye ubwo Abayahudi bahimbazaga umunsi mukuru wa Pentekosti.
Mu gihe cya Yezu bawuhimbazaga bibuka umunsi bahaweho amategeko ku musozi wa Sinayi.
Muri iki gihe abakristu bawuhimbaza bazirikana Roho Mutagatifu amanukira ku Ntumwa.
Roho w’Imana, ni we wabwirije abahanuzi ibyo bavuze
Roho Mutagatifu atuma tugira ubugingo bw’Imana, akatubera urumuri rutwumvisha Inkuru nziza ya Yezu Kristu kandi akaduha imbaraga zo kuyikurikiza twishimye!Ku buryo bwuzuye, Roho Mutagatifu yamenyekanye nyuma ya Pasika kandi amenyekanisha Imana Data na Mwana.
Mbere ya Pasika ye, Yezu yatangaje iyoherezwa ry’undi Muvugizi (Umurengezi), ari we Roho Mutagatifu.
We watangiye umurimo we kuva mu gihe cy’iremwa ry’ijuru n’isi akaba ari We kera wabwirije abahanuzi ibyo bavuze , ubu noneho ari kumwe n’abigishwa kandi akaba muri bo (Yh 14,26), kugira ngo abigishe kandi abayobore mu kuri kose (Yh 16, 13).
Nuko rero, Roho Mutagatifu agaragazwa nk’Undi ufitanye isano na Yezu na Se.
Inkomoko ihoraho ya Roho Mutagatifu yigaragariza mu butumwa bwe ku isi.
Roho Mutagatifu wohererejwe intumwa na Kiliziya yatumwe n’Imana Data mu izina rya Yezu, yoherezwa kandi na Mwana ubwe amaze gusubira kwa Se.
Iyoherezwa rya Roho Mutagatifu nyuma y’ikuzwa rya Yezu, rihishura byuzuye ibanga ry’Ubutatu Butagatifu.
Ijambo Roho risobanura ijambo ry’igihebureyi Ruah , risobanura; umwuka, umuyaga.
Tugendeye kuri icyo gisobanuro tubona ingingo ebyiri z’ingenzi dusanga muri Bibiliya :
Iremwa rya mbere : « Imana ihuha mu mazuru yabo umwuka w’ubuzima » (Intg2,7) ; Habayeho irema ryo mu gihe cyahise, ivuka rya mbere ry’ubuzima mbere y’ibihe.
Iremwa rya nyuma : Turisanga kwa Ez 37,9), hagira hati «Uhoraho aravuga ati :Wa mwuka we, turuka mu mpande zose uko ari enye uhuhera kuri iyi mirambo maze yongere ibeho » Hazabaho irema ryo mu gihe gishya, ukuzuka kwa nyuma, ku munsi w’imperuka maze ubuzima bwongere bwigaragaze.
Ntabwo guhumeka bikorwa rimwe gusa mu mwaka
Umunsi wa mbere w’icyumweru Inzugi z’aho abigishwa ba Yezu bari bari zari zifunze kubera gutinya abayahudi.
Nuko Yezu agira atya ahagarara hagati yabo, arababwira , ati « nimugire amahoro».
(Yh20, 19-20) Ni ukuvuga ko isi nshya n’ikiremwa gishya byavutse ; ni intangiriro nshya ! Imana yafashe muntu mu biganza byayo, imurema bundi bushya, mu ibumba rishyashya ryuje urukundo n’amahoro kandi ritsinda ubwoba.
Abakristu rero, guhera ubwo ntibahwemye guhura, buri munsi wa mbere w’icyumweru.
Kuva ku cyumweru kugera ku kindi.
Kiliziya yavutse kuri iryo huriro rya buri gihe, rikiriho kugeza na n’ubu.
Abakristu bakora iryo huriro buri cyumweru, kugeza igihe Yezu azagarukira.
Ntabwo dukwiye gufata icyumweru nk’aho ari itegeko gusa, ahubwo dukwiye kugifata nk’icya ngombwa kandi cy’ingenzi mu buzima bwacu.
« Birakwiye guhumeka umwuka muzima buri gihe » Ntabwo guhumeka bikorwa rimwe gusa mu mwaka.
N’ubwo duhimbaje Pentekosti Kiliziya Insengero n’Imisigiti bifunze kubera Coronavirus, ntibikwiye ko twakwibagirwa uwo munsi w’Imana, mu rugo iwacu Roho Mutagatifu arahadusanga.
Bavandimwe hariho irema rya buri munsi , Roho w’Imana ahora arema kandi agatanga ubugingo.
Umwuka wera/Roho Mutagatifu ni ubuzima.
Umwuka ni ikigereranyo rusange cy’Imana n’ibikorwa byayo mu bantu.
Ikiriho cyose gihumeka kifitemo ubuzima.
Ni ishusho igaragara y’Imana itugabira ubuzima ! Ubwo buzima butangirira muri Batisimu bukuzurizwa mu Butatu Butagatifu.
Yezu na we yagiye akoresha icyo kigereranyo gifatika cy’umuyaga, kugira ngo yumvishe Nikodemu (natwe twese) igikorwa gishya gihebuje cy’Uwitwa Umwuka w’Imana, ari we Roho w’Imana (Yh 3, 5-8).
Roho w’Imana twasezeranyijwe
Roho Mutagatifu Yezu ubwe yagiye amuvuga ku buryo bwinshi.
Hari aho yamwise umuvugizi, bisobanura « Ubana na twe », ahandi amwita Umurengezi (Yh 14,16.
Ubusanzwe iryo zina ‘Umuvugizi’ risobanurwa ko ari Umuhoza, kuko Yezu ari we Muhoza w’ibanze.
Ni Roho Nyir’ukuri (Yh 16, 13).
Ni we uyobora ku kuri kose, kuko atavuga yitumirije ahubwo avuga ibyo yumvise byose, kandi akaduhanurira n’ibizaza.
Uwo Roho asesekara kuri buri wese akurikije icyo amukeneyeho ariko byose akabyuzuriza muri Kiliziya ye, ariyo Pawulo yita umubiri umwe.
Pawulo ati « Umubiri ni umwe kandi ugizwe n’ingingo nyinshi ariko izo ngingo zose n’ubwo ari nyinshi zigize umubiri umwe» (1Kor1,12).
Abantu ni magirirane, baruzuzanya mu ngabire buri wese afite.
Kristu niwe waduhurije hamwe mu rukundo n’amahoro bimwe isi idatanga.
Bwa bumwe abantu batereye i Babeli (Ing11,1-10) bwaragarutse, bose bakumva kimwe (Intu 2,8-11), maze biba incamarenga y’ubutumwa Yezu yahaye intumwa ze bwo kwigisha amahanga yose.
(Yh20, 21-22).
Ubwo bumwe twese nibwo duhamagariwe kugaragaza ; kuko twabatirijwe muri Roho umwe ngo tube umubiri umwe (1Kor12,13).
Nk’uko Data yantumye, nanjye ndabatumye (Yh20, 21)
Muntu nk’ ikiremwa cy’Imana kidasanzwe kiri hagati y’ibindi biremwa, yagiye agaragaza ko abisumbye ndetse akajya abikoresha icyo ashaka , ibi byaje kugera ubwo na we yicamo ibice ; hazamo agasuzuguro kuri bamwe, ubwikunde n’ubwikanyize maze yubaka umunara w’itandukaniro rye n’abo batari mu rwego rumwe.
N’ubwo isi yacu ishaka kuducamo ibice, Yezu We ashaka ko tuba umwe.
Yaba abayahudi cyangwa se Abagereki, yaba abacakara cyangwa se abigenga yaba abazungu, abarabu cyangwa se abirabura, twese twuhiwe Roho umwe (1Kor 12,13).
Uyu munsi tuributswa ko nubwo umubiri ugizwe n’ingingo nyinshi, zose zigize umuntu umwe.
Mu yandi magambo ni nk’aho twakwibutswa ko n’ubwo dutandukanye yaba ku ruhu, mu bwenge, mu bukungu,… ariko twese turi abantu.
Twese rero duhamagariwe kubahana, ntihakagire ugenera mugenzi we uko abaho.
Twese turi abantu, twese tuva amaraso y’umutuku, twese turapfa, twese tugaragaza amarangamutima, twese icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyaradukanze.
Yezu arashaka ko dusubira ku isoko y’ubumwe, urukundo n’amahoro.
Buri wese ahamagariwe kubyamamaza, ni ubutumwa ahawe.
Dusenge: Roho Mutagatifu, Nyagasani utanga ubugingo, uturuka ku Mana Data na Mwana, usengwa agasingizwa hamwe n’Imana Data na Mwana, We wabwirije abahanuzi ibyo bavuze, nakomeze atuyobore, atwumvishe natwe ubumwe dufitanye nk’abantu twaremwe n’Imana imwe, bityo imbuto z’ubwo bumwe: urukundo, ibyishimo, amahoro, kwihangana, ubugwaneza, ubuntu, ubudahemuka, imico myiza no kumenya kwifata biganze iwacu.
Roho mutagatifu natuyobore.

Apôtre Mutabazi Kabarira (Brain) yasohoye igitabo "African Poverty is a Choice" cyinjira mu mizi y’ubukene bwa Afurika n’inkomoko yabwo n’uburyo Abanyafurika babwivanamo baramutse babishatse.
Apôtre Mutabazi Kabarira (Brain) yasohoye igitabo "African Poverty is a Choice" cyinjira mu mizi y’ubukene bwa Afurika n’inkomoko yabwo n’uburyo Abanyafurika babwivanamo baramutse babishatse.
Iki gitabo cyagiye hanze mu minsi ishize, gikubiyemo ingingo zitandukanye zigaragaza ibyahejeje Afurika mu bukene, uko ibindi bihugu byabashije kwiteza imbere n’uburyo buri munyafurika abigize ibye akiheraho, uyu mugabane warenga indi yose mu bukire.
Apôtre Mutabazi mu gitabo cye "African Poverty is a Choice" avuga ko ikibazo gikomeye Abanyafurika bafite ari uko bataramenya aho ikibazo bafite gituruka, bagashaka buri gihe guhirikira ibibazo ku bandi, batarebye bo ubwabo icyo bakora ngo bikemuke.
Yagize ati “Buri muntu afite ubushobozi buri muri we n’impano arusha abandi bantu, ariko abantu benshi babaho ubuzima bwo kutayimenya no kutayikoresha mu mwuzuro wayo, ari nacyo kibazo Afurika ifite, ntabwo bajya bizera ubushobozi bifitemo.
“Usanga Umunyafurika yarageze ahantu yiyakira.
Umuntu akavuga ngo njye ndi umucuruzi ukomeye, nzajya njya kurangura mu Bushinwa nze mbicuruze bagenzi banjye njye hariya ngagare kandi aho uvuye kubirangura ababikora bavukiye icyenda nk’ayo wavukiye.
Mutabazi yagaragaje ko abantu benshi batekereza ko ubukene bwa Afurika buterwa n’ubuyobozi, nyamara we iyo asesenguye avuga ko ubuyobozi atari cyo kibazo kuko nta wakoze ibifitiye Afurika inyungu ngo asubizwe inyuma.
Ati “Abantu benshi baravuga ngo muri Afurika haba igitugu, ibyo nzapfa ntabyemeye.
Muri politiki wenda harimo gukanira kandi nabyo bifite impamvu kuko Abanyafurika kubera inzara bafite barashonje kandi bararakaye.
Ikibazo ni uko barakariye umuntu utari we.
Yavuze ko abayobozi icyo bashinzwe ari ugushyiraho imirongo migari no gufasha abagize igitekerezo kizima ariko badashinzwe gutekerereza umuntu.
Mutabazi yagaragaje ko ikibazo kiri ahantu hatandukanye harimo n’uburezi, aho umwarimu atanga bike ku munyeshuri cyangwa se umwanya munini bakawumara biga ibyo batazakoresha mu buzima.
Mu gitabo "African Poverty is a Choice" kandi Mutabazi anenga uburyo abanyabwenge ba Afurika basa nk’aho ntacyo bayimariye, aho barangiza kuminuza bakaza baje gusaba akazi aho gukoresha ibyo bize bafasha Afurika kuvumbura no gukemura ibibazo bihari.
Yanenze na Guverinoma za Afurika uburyo zifata abitwa ko ari abahanga (aba- génies) bagashyirwa mu myanya y’ubuyobozi itabafasha gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo bize.
Kuri we asanga mu buyobozi, abahanga badakwiriye kurenga 30 %, abandi bakajya gukora ibyo bize.
Ku bitwaza abakoloni ngo nibo bahejeje Afurika inyuma, Apôtre Mutabazi yabihakanye avuga ko ibyo biri mu nyungu zabo nta kosa ririmo, ahubwo ikosa riri ku banyafurika batamenya icyo bakeneye ngo babikumire.
Ati “Inzira abanyafurika turi gucamo ngo tuve mu bukene, si iyo ibihugu biri kudutera inkunga byaciyemo.
U Burayi na Amerika bizahora iteka bihari kugira ngo biduhe intwaro nituvuga ko turambiwe abayobozi twita abanyagitugu ariko nituvuga ko dukeneye Kaminuza ya Harvard cyangwa MIT ngo bayitwubakire, n’aho wababwira ko ari ku ideni bazakubwira ngo cira birarura.
Mutabazi kandi yerekana ko Abanyafurika ubwabo bakomeza kudakoresha ubushobozi bifitemo, aho atanga urugero rw’umuntu wumva ko akomeye akajya kurangura mu mahanga, nyamara atabasha gukopera ibyo ajya kurangura ngo umunsi umwe nawe azabikorere mu gihugu cye, mu gihe ariyo nzira ibihugu byinshi nk’u Bushinwa n’u Buyapani byagiye bikoresha ngo bitere imbere.
Ikindi atangaho inama kizavana Afurika mu bukene, ni ukudatekereza amafaranga mbere y’ibindi byose kuko bituma badashyira umwanya ku byagira akamaro k’igihe kirekire.
Ati “Ibintu bituma abantu bakena ni uguhora iteka batekereza babanjirije ku mafaranga.
Inzira izana ubukire, reba ikibazo wiyumvemo ko ufite ubushobozi bwo kugikemura ugikemure wishyurwe amafaranga ariko nuhita utekereza amafaranga, uzashaka inzira y’ubusamo yo guhita uyabona.
Itangazamakuru, abamenyekanisha Afurika n’ibiyikorerwamo ndetse n’abadipolomate, Mutabazi abashinja kudakoresha imbaraga ngo ibyakorewe muri Afurika bimenyekane nk’uko ahandi bikorwa, agasaba ko bikosorwa niba dushaka ko Afurika iva mu bukene.
Apôtre Mutabazi yashinze ikigo "INVENT AFRICA" kigamije gutanga inama n’ubujyanama ku mishinga n’ibindi.
Bategura inama zigamije gufasha abantu gukuza no kubyaza umusaruro ibitekerezo bibarimo n’ibindi.

Shampiyona ya Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (NBA) ikunzwe kurusha izindi ku Isi, yatangaje ko izasubukurwa tariki ya 30 Nyakanga nyuma y’uko ihagaze guhera muri Werurwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Shampiyona ya Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (NBA) ikunzwe kurusha izindi ku Isi, yatangaje ko izasubukurwa tariki ya 30 Nyakanga nyuma y’uko ihagaze guhera muri Werurwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki ya 27 Kamena nibwo hashyizwe ahagaragara imikino izakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 30 Nyakanga n’iya 14 Kanama 2020.
Amakipe 22 azitabira isubukurwa rya NBA, azakina imikino umunani (kuri buri imwe) izabera ku bibuga bya ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex i Walt Disney World Resort muri Florida.
Imikino ibiri izabimburira indi ku wa Kane tariki ya 30 Nyakanga ni uzahuza Utah Jazz na New Orleans Pelicans, ndetse n’uzahuza LA Clippers na Los Angeles Lakers mu gihe bukeye bwaho, tariki ya 31 Nyakanga, hazaba imikino itandatu irimo uwo Boston Celtics izakinamo na Milwaukee Bucks naho Houston Rockets ihure Dallas Mavericks.
Muri iri subukurwa rya NBA, buri munsi hazajya hakinwa imikino igera kuri irindwi ku bibuga bitatu bitandukanye byo muri ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Buri kipe izabarwa nk’iyakiriye imikino ine ndetse yongere kugirwa nk’iyakiniye hanze mu yindi mikino ine.
Ubwo NBA yasubikwagwa tariki ya 11 Werurwe, hari hasigaye imikino 259 mu mwaka usanzwe w’imikino ariko hazakinwa 88 gusa.
Amakipe 22 azakina iyi mikino ni umunani yari aya mbere muri buri gace (conference) [ni ukuvuga ane muri buri gace] kongeraho andi atandatu (atanu yo mu Burengerazuba n’imwe yo mu Burasirazuba) hagendewe ku manota yari afite.
Iyi mikino izasozwa tariki ya 14 Kanama mu gihe biteganyijwe ko hazabaho play-in izahuza ikipe ya munani n’iya cyenda muri buri gace hagati ya tariki ya 15 n’iya 16 Kanama mu gihe byaba bibaye ngombwa.
Iya Play-offs yitabirwa n’amakipe umunani ya mbere muri buri gace, izatangira tariki ya 17 Kanama 2020 ikageza mu Ukwakira.
Mugisha Frank [VD Frank] wakoze umuziki igihe kinini akaba n’umunyamakuru wari umaze igihe yarafashwe n’uburwayi bwa stroke bwatumye agira ikibazo cyo kugagara umubiri wose ’paralysé yatangiye koroherwa.
Mugisha Frank [VD Frank] wakoze umuziki igihe kinini akaba n’umunyamakuru wari umaze igihe yarafashwe n’uburwayi bwa stroke bwatumye agira ikibazo cyo kugagara umubiri wose ’paralysé yatangiye koroherwa.
VD Frank umaze kongera gutora agatege yasigaranye ishimwe ku Banyarwanda bamugobotse bakamufasha kwivuza.
Ku wa 10 Gicurasi 2020, VD Frank avuga ko yabyutse agasanga yarembye ndetse umunwa wahengamye ndetse n’igice kimwe cy’umutwe we kidakora.
Ubu burwayi bwamuzonze bwamufashe mu gihe hari hashize icyumweru kimwe gusa abantu bemerewe kongera kujya mu mirimo nyuma yuko hari haciyeho igihe Abanyarwanda muri rusange bari muri gahunda ya #Gumamurugo bisobanuye ko iyi ndwara yamufatiranye mu bukene nkuko nawe abyivugira.
Ibi byatumye ahita yihutira kujya kwivuza maze abwirwa ko yarwaye stroke, ubwoba bwahise bumutaha kuko yari imaze iminsi mike ihitanye muramu we “DJ Miller".
Yagize ati "Nahise mbaza abaganga nti ’ese igikurikiyeho ni iki, ngiye gupfa?
’ Kuko nari nzi ko urwaye iyi ndwara adapfa gukira, ariko abaganga bambwiye ko kuva narivuje neza kandi kare nzakira kandi neza.
VD Frank avuga ko nyuma y’inkuru yasohotse ku IGIHE ivuga ko arwaye abantu banyuranye biganjemo Abanyarwanda baba muri Diaspora bamufashije bamuha amafaranga yo kwivuza.
Ykomeje agira ati “Ndashimira buri Munyarwanda wese wamfashije, indwara yamfashe nkennye nta n’ifaranga na rimwe mfite, nta bwishingizi mfite nagizwe n’abantu basomye inkuru bamenye ko ndwaye baramfasha ndivuza none ndabona ndi gukira.
Avuga ko igihe cyose yivuje yafashwaga n’abakunzi be bari bamenye ko arwaye, ati "Byibuza kwa Kanimba kuhivuriza nahatanze ibihumbi 700 Frw, ibaze iyo bataza kumfasha wenda ubu mba ngenda ngifite ikibazo cya (Paralyse).
VD Frank avuga ko Stroke yarwaye yari yayitewe n’ibintu bitatu birimo kutaruhuka, gutekereza no gukora cyane.
Ati "Mfite imishinga inyuranye irimo gukora uruganda rwenga inzoga, rero nari ndi gutekereza uko nawushyira mu ngiro nkumva birangoye cyane sinari nkiryama nararaga ntekereza rwose.
Uyu mugabo avuga ko nyuma yo gusobanurirwa neza icyamuteye kurwara yafashe icyemezo cyo kuruhuka bihagije ndetse no kugabanya gutekereza cyane kuko yasobanukiwe ko gushakisha ibintu bitaruta ubuzima.
Inzobere mu by’ubuzima zivuga ko ‘Stroke’ ari indwara ituma udutsi dukwirakwiza amaraso mu bwonko duturika bitewe n’umubyimba watwo utabasha kwakira ingano y’amaraso acamo, bigatuma yivanga n’ubwonko cyangwa tukaziba bitewe no kuvura kwayo, bigatuma adatemberamo uko bikwiye, maze igice atageramo kikangirika.
Ikiganiro na VD Frank wamaze koroherwa

Ni kenshi abahanzi bumvikana bavuga ko mu bikibangamiye iterambere ryabo harimo no kubura ubushobozi bwo kwagura ibikorwa byabo ku buryo biva ku rwego rumwe bijya ku rundi.

Banki ya Kigali yatangaje ko ishobora kuba yafasha abahanzi kubona inguzanyo mu gihe bagaragaje imishinga yagura ubuhanzi bwabo ndetse ikabyara n’inyungu.
Byagarutsweho n’Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe Imenyekanishabikorwa muri Banki ya Kigali, Thierry Nshuti, mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyo gutangiza Iwacu Muzika Festival ibereye umwe mu baterankunga bakuru.
Yagize ati “Niba umuntu aturuka hariya akadusaba amafaranga yo kugura imodoka ikora ubucuruzi, undi akadusaba amafaranga yo kugura imashini yamufasha mu bye, birashoboka ko n’umuhanzi wize neza umushinga we neza utwereka uburyo uzunguka ashobora kuza na we agasaba inguzanyo ijyanye n’ibyo akeneye kugira ngo azamure ubuhanzi bwe bujye ku rundi rwego.
Yibukije abahanzi ko badakwiye gutegera Leta ibiganza ngo ibahe amafaranga kuko yo ishyiraho inzego z’ubukungu zubatse neza.
Ati “U Rwanda rufite ibigo by’imari birimo na Banki ya Kigali ku buryo umuhanzi wakenera gushora amafaranga ufite umushinga ugaragara yayegera bakaganira.
Banki ya Kigali yibukije abazakurikira ibitaramo bya Iwacu Muzika Festival ko hari amahirwe adasanzwe ari mu gukorana nayo by’umwihariko ku rubyiruko.
Bruce Melodie ni we watangajwe nk’umuhanzi uzabimburira abandi batumiwe mu bitaramo bya Iwacu Muzika Festival bizatangira ku 20 Kamena 2020, bikazasozwa mu ntangiriro za Nzeri 2020.
Nshuti yavuze ko muri iri serukiramuco banki izabona uburyo bwo kuganiriza abantu ku buryo bakwitwara mu bihe nk’ibyo igihugu kirimo byo kwirinda COVID-19.
Yakomeje ati “Ese umuntu yitegura gute ku buryo ibi byongeye kugaruka bitabagiraho ingaruka?
Turashaka ko urubyiruko rutugana, abahanzi bakatugana tugateza imbere ubuhanzi n’igihugu muri rusange.
Muri Mata nibwo Banki ya Kigali yashyizeho inguzanyo idasanzwe yise ‘Turi kumwe Special Loan’, igamije kugoboka abakiliya bayo muri ibi bihe byo kurwanya Coronavirus no guhangana n’ingaruka z’iki cyorezo.
Iyi nguzanyo idasanzwe igenewe abantu bafite umushahara bahembwa ku kwezi, bashobora kugurizwa amafaranga angana n’inshuro ebyiri z’umushahara wabo ariko ntirenze miliyoni 10 Frw.
Kugeza ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019, inguzanyo Banki ya Kigali yatanze zazamutseho 19.

Mu gihembwe cya kane cy’umwaka ushize wa 2019, umutungo mbumbe wa BK warenze miliyari 1000 Frw nyuma yo kuzamuka 19.
