Uruganda rutunganya ifu ikomoka ku myumbati rwa Kinazi (Kinazi Cassava Plant), rwatangaje ko rukora ibishoboka byose ngo ifu yarwo igere ku isoko ifite ubuziranenge, ariko rusaba abantu kujya bashishoza mu gihe bagiye guhaha kuko hari abashobora kunyura ku ruhande bakabagurisha itujuje ubuziranenge ku buryo yabagwa nabi.
Uruganda rutunganya ifu ikomoka ku myumbati rwa Kinazi (Kinazi Cassava Plant), rwatangaje ko rukora ibishoboka byose ngo ifu yarwo igere ku isoko ifite ubuziranenge, ariko rusaba abantu kujya bashishoza mu gihe bagiye guhaha kuko hari abashobora kunyura ku ruhande bakabagurisha itujuje ubuziranenge ku buryo yabagwa nabi.
Tariki 7 Kamena buri mwaka, Isi yizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe ubuziranenge bw’ibiribwa, buri wese asabwa kugira uruhare mu guharanira ubwo buziranenge.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima ku Isi, OMS, ritangaza ko ibiribwa bitujuje ubuziranenge bihitana abantu bagera ku bihumbi 420 buri mwaka.
OMS igaragaza ko abana bari munsi y’imyaka itanu aribo bibasirwa cyane n’ibi biribwa, kuko abapfa bagera ku bihumbi 125 buri mwaka.
Kugeza ubu imyaka umunani irashize uruganda rwa Kinazi rufite icyicaro mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo mu Karere ka Ruhango rugeza ifu ku banyarwanda n’abanyamahanga.
Uru ruganda rusaba abantu gukomeza gukoresha ifu yarwo ariko banirinda izindi fu bashobora kugura kandi zitujuje ubuziranenge ku buryo byanabaviramo gupfa.
Umuyobozi w’Uruganda, Mbabazi Christian, mu kiganiro yahaye IGIHE, yavuze ko kugeza ubu uru ruganda ruhagaze neza kuko rwakira umusaruro w’abaturage kuva mu bice bitandukanye by’Amajyepfo mu Turere dutanu, ariko ubu bageze no mu Burasirazuba mu Karere ka Bugesera, aho batangiye gukorana n’abaturage baho bakabagezaho umusaruro.
Ati “Uruganda rufite ubushobozi bwo kwakira toni 120 z’umusaruro w’abaturage ku munsi murumva ko ari mwinshi, ibi byanatumye tuva mu Majyepfo tujya no mu Burasirazuba ariko dukomeje gukangurira n’ibindi bice by’igihugu guhinga imyumbati bakagemurira uruganda, kuko usanga uruganda rugikora ku kigero cya 35% gusa.
Ubuziranenge buhagaze gute?
Mbabazi yavuze ko ku bijyanye n’ubuziranenge hari byinshi leta yakoze harimo gushyiraho ibigo bishinzwe ubwo buziranenge ku rwego rw’igihugu, ibi bikaba aribyo bigenzura ibyo bakora, bikaba ari nabyo bibaha ibyangombwa.
Ati “Ibyo bigo byose bikorana na Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda ku buryo bashobora no kuba baguhana mu gihe basanze ukora ibitujuje ubuziranenge cyangwa bakaba banagufungira.
“Nk’ubu mu gice cyacu cy’abakora ifu hari abandi usanga nabo bakora iy’imyumbati, twe nka Kinazi turi banini ariko hari abandi bato kandi badafite ibyo byangombwa.
Abo iyo bakoze nta byangombwa cyangwa nta buziranenge nibwo usanga bakoze ibyo bashatse n’igiciro bakaba bakigira gito, ariko bikarenga aho kuko abantu barya ibintu bihumanye.
Tujya tuganira na leta bakatubwira ko babikurikirana kandi nkeka ko uko ibintu biza bizagenda bikosoka.
Hari ibyago ku muntu warya ibitujuje ubuziranenge
Mbabazi yavuze ko abantu bakwiye kujya bagenzura ifu bagiye kugura, bakareba niba yujuje ibisabwa ndetse ifite n’ibirango bitangwa n’Ikigo gishinzwe Ubuziranenge.
Ati “Twebwe nk’uruganda ibyo dukwiye gukora turabikora no ku rwego rw’igihugu ni uko, hano mu ruganda dufite itsinda ku buryo nta kintu cyasohoka kitabanje kugenzurwa ko cyujuje ubuziranenge, icyo dusaba abantu ni ukurya ifu yacu ariko bakwiye kumenya ko ushobora kurya ibihumanye bikaba byakugiraho ingaruka.
Uru ruganda ruvuga ko nubwo rutarabona abantu barwiyitirira ariko hari bamwe bumva ko bashobora kuba bafata ifu ya Kinazi, bakayipfunyika mu bindi bipfunyiko byabo, bakaba bayigurisha ku mafaranga menshi mu mahanga kuko isanzwe ari nziza.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubuziranenge muri uru ruganda, Ngabonzima Viateur, yavuze ko mu ruganda bagenzura isuku y’abantu, imashini n’ibindi byose.
Ati “Ifu y’uruganda rwa Kinazi yahawe ikirango cy’ubuziranenge gitangwa n’Ikigo gitsura ubuziranenge, RSB, twanarenze imbibi ku buryo ifu yacu yemewe n’ikigo cy’Abanyamerika kigenzura ubuziranenge bw’ibiribwa, ubu ishobora gucuzwa ku isoko rya Amerika.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe umusaruro winjira muri uru ruganda, Rutagungira Eve Nicolas, we yavuze ko uruganda rukorana neza n’abaruzanira imyumbati, kuva rwatangira mu 2012.
Kugeza ubu uruganda rwa Kinazi rufite isoko mu Rwanda no ku mugabane w’u Burayi, ibijya hanze bikaba biri ku kigero kirenze 40%, aho ruteganya no kwagura rukajya muri Amerika kuko naho hari isoko rinini.
Uru ruganda rutangaza ko ifu yarwo idakorwamo ubugari gusa, ahubwo ishobora kuvangwa n’andi mafu igakorwamo keke, Capati, Pizza n’ibindi.
Hashize iminsi ibigo byagurishaga internet ya 4G Unlimited biha ubutumwa abakiliya babyo ko bigiye guhagarika kugurisha iyo Internet muri za telefone zabo.
Hashize iminsi ibigo byagurishaga internet ya 4G Unlimited biha ubutumwa abakiliya babyo ko bigiye guhagarika kugurisha iyo Internet muri za telefone zabo.
Tariki 8 Kamena Ikigo cy’Itumanaho MTN Rwanda cyatangaje ko guhera ku wa 1 Nyakanga kizahagarika kugurisha internet ya 4G Unlimited umuntu yajyaga agura agakoresha ikarangira mu gihe runaka.
4G Unlimited ni internet yatangwaga mu gihe runaka nk’icyumweru cyangwa ukwezi, umukiliya akishyura ubwo akaba azi ko icyo cyumweru cyangwa ukwezi azabimara ataguze indi.
Ikigo cy’abanya-Koreya, KTRN Rwanda ari nacyo rukumbi cyemerewe kuranguza internet ya 4G mu Rwanda, cyatangaje ko guhera tariki 1 Nyakanga 2020 internet ya 4G Unlimited muri za telefone itazongera kuboneka ku isoko.
Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe ikoranabuhanga n’itumanaho muri KTRN Rwanda, Elijah Iragaba, yatangaje ko izo mpinduka zigamije gukemura ikibazo cy’ireme rya internet batangaga ku bakoresha telefone zigezweho.
Yavuze ko ubusanzwe internet ya 4G Unlimited yatangwaga muri za telefone nubwo yari ihendutse, mu ikorwa ryayo hari imwe mu mipaka yashyizweho ku bijyanye n’uburyo yihuta mu gihe habayeho kuyisangira n’abandi (tethering) cyangwa kuyivana kuri telefone ngo ikoreshwe no kuri mudasobwa.
Iragaba yavuze ko iyo abakiliya bayifashishaga mu bindi bitari telefone, yagendaga gahoro bigatuma babyinubira.
Ati “ (4G unlimited) yakorewe gukoreshwa muri za telefone ariko hari abantu bajyaga bayisangiza ngo bayikoreshe no ku bindi bikoresho nka mudasobwa zo mu biro bigatuma babona internet ifite ireme ritari ryiza kuko hari ibyo iyo internet itagomba kurenza.
Byatumaga rero binuba.
Iragaba yijeje ko ubu internet ya 4G isanzwe yavuguruwe irimo ibyo abakiliya bakeneye byose kandi ihendutse kurushaho.
Icyakora, ibyo byumvikanisha ko ubu umukiliya azajya agura internet ya 4G agahabwa ingano runaka bitewe n’amafaranga yishyuye, igashira bitewe n’uburyo yayikoresheje.
Bivuze ko ushobora kugura internet ya 5000 Frw, wayikoresha gahoro ikaba yamara igihe kinini, wayikoresha cyane igashira vuba ariko umuvuduko wo ugakomeza kuba wa wundi.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ikoranabuhanga mu Rwego Ngenzuramikorere (RURA), Gahungu Charles, yavuze ko KTRN yabamenyesheje ukwinuba abakiliya bari bafite, bakavuga ko uko byari bimeze mbere byicaga isura ya internet ya 4G muri rusange.
Internet ya 4G Unlimited yakoreshwaga ni iyo mu bwoko bwa ‘Speed-based’ igenda ku muvuduko umwe bitewe n’igihe umukiliya yahawe kuyimarana, ubu hasigaye Internet yo mu buryo bwa ‘volume-based’ ishira bitewe n’uko yakoreshejwe.
Stade ya Rwinkwavu ni yo yubatswe bwa mbere mu Rwanda, iherereye mu Murenge wa Rwinkwavu mu Karere ka Kayonza, yubatswe iruhande rw’umuhanda.
Hirya yayo gato hahoze hacukurwa amabuye y’agaciro ndetse amateka yerekana ko ari ho hambere yacukuwe mu Rwanda n’Ababiligi.
Stade ya Rwinkwavu ni yo yubatswe bwa mbere mu Rwanda, iherereye mu Murenge wa Rwinkwavu mu Karere ka Kayonza, yubatswe iruhande rw’umuhanda.
Hirya yayo gato hahoze hacukurwa amabuye y’agaciro ndetse amateka yerekana ko ari ho hambere yacukuwe mu Rwanda n’Ababiligi.
Ni stade abenshi bitirira Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa [ Charles Leon Pierre] watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1931 kugeza 1959, bivugwa ko yakundaga kureba aho bakinira umupira w’amaguru cyane ko nawe yajyaga acishamo akawukina.
Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE yatembereye kuri iyi stade aganira n’abakuru barimo Musafiri Kabemba watangiranye n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro mu Rwanda, uyu kandi yari ahari ubwo iyi stade yatangiraga kubakwa.
Kabemba Musafiri ufite imyaka 102 yabwiye IGIHE ko igitekerezo cyo kubaka iyi stade cyagizwe n’umuzungu w’umubiligi nyuma yaho benshi mu basore bakoreshwaga mu bucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro i Rwinkwavu, mu masaha y’ikigoroba basoje akazi batagiraga ikindi kintu kibahuriza hamwe.
Amateka agaragaza ko ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro mu Rwanda bwatangiye mu 1930- 1931 ubwo gasegereti yavumburwaga mu birombe bya Rwinkwavu na Rutongo.
Ababiligi ngo bazanye abakongomani 300 barimo na Musafiri kugira ngo bafatanye n’abandi basore b’abanyarwanda kuyacukura.
Uko Stade ya Rwinkwavu yubatswe
Kabemba Musafiri avuga ko iyi stade ijya kubakwa yari ahari ariko ko atibuka neza umwaka, gusa ngo byaturutse ku muzungu w’umubiligi wari umuyobozi mukuru w’abacukura amabuye y’agaciro ndetse akanaba inshuti y’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Uyu muzungu yazanye umukino w’umupira w’amaguru nk’uburyo buzajya bufasha abacukuzi b’amabuye y’agaciro kwidagadura mu gihe bavuye muri iyo mirimo.
Ati “[Stade] yayishinze hafi mu 1940, yashinzwe n’umuzungu w’umubiligi wakundaga gukina umupira w’amaguru, Umwami Rudahigwa yarahazaga cyane nawe akishimira kubona uwo mukino, bigera aho bayishyiraho igipangu kiyizengurutse hose, twayikiniragaho nimugoroba no kucyumweru, ni nabwo Umwami yakundaga kuhaza.
“Yari stade nziza cyane ifite igipangu, hari ikipe y’abacukura amabuye y’agaciro hakaba n’ikipe y’abazungu, hari n’andi makipe yadusuraga ku cyumweru aturutse ahandi hantu hose bacukuraga amabuye, amakipe yacu yose yabaga afite abajyanama.
Uko abakinnyi bahembwaga
Kabemba Musafiri yavuze ko abakinnyi batahabwaga amafaranga ahubwo bahabwaga inka zabaga zatanzwe n’Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa.
Ati “Abakinnyi beza bahabwaga inka hamwe n’abatsinze ibitego, babanzaga kubatekera neza bakahaba ibiryo byinshi birimo inyama ubundi bakajya mu kibuga bamara gutsinda nanone bakababagira inka, undi witwaye neza nawe akagabirwa inka akayitahana".
Umwami Rudahigwa yacishagamo agakina umupira
Kabemba Musafiri yavuze ko Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa yari umwe mu bakundaga gukina no kureba uko bakina umupira w’amaguru, ngo rimwe na rimwe nawe yajyaga acishamo akawukina nubwo bitari cyane.
Ati “Hari ubwo yazaga inaha akizihirwa nawe agakina, yajyaga mu ikipe y’abacukuraga amabuye hamwe n’abandi batware, abazungu b’ababiligi nabo bakajya mu ikipe yabo ubundi bagakina gusa ntabwo byabagaho kenshi.
Kabemba yavuze ko guhera mu 1960 kuzamura imipira yaberaga kuri iki kibuga yatangiye kugabanyuka ndetse abaturage batangira gusenya urupangu bakitwarira amabuye kugira ngo bayubakishe.
Abaturage barifuza ko iyi Stade yavugururwa
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Murenge wa Rwinkwavu bavuze ko bifuza kubona iyi stade yavuguruwe ikajya iberaho imikino ikomeye, abandi basabye ko hashyirwa ibimenyetso byerekana ko ariyo stade yubatswe bwa mbere mu Rwanda.
Bankundiye Alphonsine yagize ati “Turifuza ko hashyirwa ikimenyetso cyerekana ko ari yo stade ya mbere yubatswe mu Rwanda, binabaye byiza bayivugurura natwe tukajya tuharebera imipira ikomeye.
Buregeya Emmanuel we yagize ati “Leta ikwiriye kubungabunga iyi stade n’inzu ziri hano zubatswe icyo gihe zabagamo abazungu b’ababiligi, byose bikwiriye kwitabwaho ku buryo bishyirwa mu mateka y’igihugu cyacu.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’ingoro ndangamurage z’u Rwanda, Amb Robert Masozera, yabwiye IGIHE ko bari kubarura ahantu hatandukanye hirya no hino mu gihugu hari ibyiza nyaburanga ku buryo nyuma hazakurikiraho kubibyaza umusaruro.
Ati “Rwinkwavu hari mu hantu twitayeho kimwe n’ahandi hirya no hino mu gihugu, tumaze kubona ahantu harenga 600 mu Rwanda hose kandi ntiturarangiza gukora urutonde, aho tumaze gukorera ubushakashatsi no kwandika ni 145, iriya stade ntabwo irazamo turacyareba niba akarere kabyifuza kuko tugendera ku byifuzo by’Akarere.
Yavuze ko nyuma yo kuhabarura aribwo hazakurikira icyiciro cyo gushaka uburyo hakwitabwaho hakavugururwa hakabyazwa umusaruro.
Kugeza ubu kuri iyi stade hakinirwaho ikipe ikina mu cyiciro cya kabiri y’Akagera, ariko hakunda no kubera inama zihuriza hamwe abaturage benshi.
Mu gihe hashize iminsi mike hatekerezwa ko umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda waba utangiye kugana mu cyerekezo kizima nyuma y’irekurwa ry’abanyarwanda icyenda bari bafungiweyo binyuranyije n’amategeko, ibintu byabaye nk’ibisubira i Rudubi ubwo Umunyamabanga wa Leta Ushinzwe ubutwererane n’akarere, Philemon Mateke, yavugaga uburyo atemera amasezerano yasinywe hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda.
Mu gihe hashize iminsi mike hatekerezwa ko umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda waba utangiye kugana mu cyerekezo kizima nyuma y’irekurwa ry’abanyarwanda icyenda bari bafungiweyo binyuranyije n’amategeko, ibintu byabaye nk’ibisubira i Rudubi ubwo Umunyamabanga wa Leta Ushinzwe ubutwererane n’akarere, Philemon Mateke, yavugaga uburyo atemera amasezerano yasinywe hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda.
Ni amasezerano yasinyiwe i Luanda muri Angola ku wa 21 Kanama 2019, agamije gushakira umuti ibibazo u Rwanda rwashinjaga icyo gihugu birimo gufunga abaturage barwo binyuranyije n’amategeko no kubakorera iyicarubozo, gushyigikira imitwe igamije kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano no kubangamira ubucuruzi bwarwo.
Mu butumwa yanditse kuri Twitter kuri uyu wa Kane, Mateke yahishuye ko kuva kera na kare atemeraga amasezerano basinyanye n’u Rwanda agamije guhosha umwuka mubi uri hagati y’ibihugu byombi, mu gihe ari umwe mu bagombaga kuba bakurikirana uko ashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Yagize ati “Naburiye bagenzi banjye ko nta cyiza kiva mu gusinyana amasezerano n’ikibi.
Kugarura amahoro ntibyakunze kuri Chamberlain mu 1938, ntabwo natwe bizashoboka.
Turekuye abanyabyaha babo, batwituye kurasa abaturage bacu nk’imbwa! Ni igihe cyo gusubiza kuri iyi myitwarire y’ubushotoranyi.
I warned colleagues that nothing good comes from signing a pact with the devil.
Appeasement didn't work for Chamberlain in 1938, and it won't work for us.
We release their criminals, and they repay by shooting our citizens like dogs! Time to respond to this condescending behavior
— Philemon Mateke, PhD (@PhilemonMateke) January 23, 2020
Aha mu 1938 yashakaga kuvuga ku byabaye muri uwo mwaka hakorwaga inama z’inkurikirane hagati y’ibihugu by’u Bwongereza, u Bufaransa, n’u Butaliyani, bikemerera u Budage bwari buyobowe na Adolf Hitler kwiyomekaho ibice bimwe bya Czechoslovakia, mu buryo bwo kwirinda intambara.
Hitler yasabaga igice cya Sudetenland, Neville Chamberlain wari Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bwongereza afata iya mbere aza guhura n’uwayoboraga u Bufaransa, Eduard Daladier na Benito Mussolini wayoboraga u Butaliyani, bahurira i Munich na Hitler, bemeranya ko agace ka Sudetenland komekwa k’u Budage, bataha bahamya ko habonetse amahoro.
Nyuma y’amezi atanu Hitler yarenze ku byemeranyijweho agaba igitero kuri Czechoslovakia yose arayifata.
Nubwo Mateke atatoboye ngo avuge izina ry’igihugu, ibyo Mateke yavuze bihura neza n’ibibazo birimo kuba hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda.
Naho iby’abantu barashwe yavugaga bihuye n’uko kuri uyu wa Gatatu u Rwanda rwashyikirije Uganda umurambo w’umuturage wayo, Ndagijimana Theogene, warashwe n’inzego z’umutekano z’u Rwanda zamufatiye mu bikorwa bya magendu ashaka no kwinjiza ibiyobyabwenge mu gihugu, zamuhagarika akagerageza kuzirwanya.
Amagambo ya Mateke anahura n’ay’umudepite Ruth Nankabirwa, kuri uyu wa Gatatu wabwiye bagenzi be mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ko Guverinoma ya Uganda ikwiye gukemura bwangu ikibazo ifitanye n’u Rwanda, ariko asa n’uca amarenga ku buryo bwakoreshwa.
Yagize ati “Mureke duhe amahirwe asesuye Guverinoma ya Uganda, amahirwe yo kurangiza urugendo rwo guharanira ko dusubirana umubano mwiza nk’uwo twahoranye, kuko ntabwo ushobora kwicara hano ngo utange amabwiriza ngo umupaka ufungurwe, ngo utekereze ko ayo mabwiriza azafungura umupaka.
Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Uganda, Rebecca Kadaga, yahise amubwira ko yizeye ko atarimo kuvuga ko bagomba guceceka ngo barindire umwanzuro wa Guverinoma n’igihe hari umuntu wabo urashwe.
Nankabirwa yakomeje ati “Ntabwo wakemura ikibazo gihari uyu munsi hatabayeho kubura ubundi buzima.
Gusa imvugo ya Mateke yamaganywe n’umudepite wa Uganda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, Mukasa Mbidde, wavuze ati “namaganye aya magambo ya Minisitiri niba koko iyi ariyo konti yawe y’ukuri, ndabona igitekerezo cyawe nk’ikidashinga, cyuje ubucucu, nta shingiro, ntigikwiye kandi cyuzuye amateshwa.
Komeza ubibe inyigisho zawe, ariko twe Abanya-Uganda turi maso".
I shudder at such a comment from a whole minister if this is your true handle .
I find your opinion devoid of reason,idiotic,preposterous, ludicrous, farcical and complete balderdash.
Pontificate ,but we Ugandans are watchful .

Mateke yashimangiye urwango rwe ku Rwanda
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda, Amb Olivier Nduhungirehe, yasubije Mateke ko ibikorwa bye ari iby’ubushobotoranyi kurushaho, ku buryo yagakwiye guceceka.
Ati “Umuntu wafatiwe mu cyuho arimo gutegura ibitero by’iterabwoba byishe abantu 14 bigakomeretsa abandi 16 mu gihugu cy’abaturanyi, akwiye guceceka akareka abadipolomate ba nyabo bagakora akazi kabo.
Someone who was caught red-handed, while organising a deadly terror attack that killed 14 people and wounded 16 others in a neighbouring country, should have the decency to remain silent and allow real diplomats to do their job.

Mu biganiro biheruka guhuza intumwa z’u Rwanda na Uganda mu Ukuboza 2019, u Rwanda rwagaragaje uburyo Mateke yari inyuma y’abarwanyi bagabye igitero i Musanze ahazwi nko mu Kinigi kigahitana abaturage 14.
Ubwo bari ku ngingo zijyanye n’uko Uganda ifasha imitwe yitwaje intwaro, Nduhungirehe yatanze urugero rw’igitero cyabaye mu ijoro rishyira ku itariki ya Kane Ukwakira aho abarwanyi b’umutwe wa RUD Urunana bateye mu Kinigi.
Mu iperereza ryakozwe, hari ibikoresho byafashwe birimo na telefoni zigendanwa n’ubuhamya bwatanzwe n’abafashwe, byagaragaje uruhare rwa Uganda muri iki gitero.
Nduhungirehe ati “Ibyo byose bigaragaza ko uwari uyoboye icyo gitero ari uwitwa Philemon Mateke akaba Umunyamabanga wa leta ya Uganda ushinzwe ubutwererane bw’akarere.
Byagaragajwe na za telefoni n’ubuhamya bwatanzwe n’abafashwe.
“Hari n’uwitwa Nshimiye wiyita Governor ushinzwe ibikorwa byihariye muri RUD Urunana, atuye hariya mu Karere ka Kisoro n’umuryango we, byagaragaye ko akunda kujya muri Kivu y’Amajyaruguru ahitwa Benza gutegura ibitero kandi ko ariwe wakoranaga bya hafi na Philemon Mateke.
Urwo ni urugero rumwe natanze ariko hari n’izindi nyinshi twatanze zigaragaza ko bagikomeza guha urubuga abaturwanya.
Si ubwa mbere Mateke avuzwe mu bikorwa bigamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda, kuko byavuzwe ko mu Ukuboza 2018 yakoranyaga inama yahuje FDLR na RNC i Kampala, ngo bategure igikorwa gihuriweho cya gisirikare ku Rwanda nk’uko La Forge Bazeye na Theophile Abega bari bahagarariye FDLR muri iyo nama babivuze nyuma yo gufatirwa ku mupaka wa Bunagana basubiye mu birindiro muri RDC.
Dusubize amaso inyuma
Ubushotoranyi bwa Uganda ku Rwanda si ubwa vuba, ndetse mu myaka yashize havuyemo ugukozanyaho kwabereye muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, byavuyemo intambara ya Kisangani yarangiye RPA itsinze ingabo za Uganda, ibintu byababaje Uganda ku rwego rukomeye.
Gutsindirwa i Kisangani byatumye abaturage ba Uganda n’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko bashyira igitutu ku bushobozi bwa Museveni no ku hazaza he.
Muri kwa gusuzugura u Rwanda, abadepite barakariye Museveni ariko baguma no kwikoma Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, nk’uko raporo ya International Crisis Group yo mu 2000 ibigaragaza.
Icyo gihe Museveni yabonye ko uburyo bwo gucubya abaturage be ari ukwibasira RPA mu magambo atyaye.
Mu ijambo ryo ku wa 30 Kanama 1999, Museveni yabaye nk’uwikura mu bibazo abyegeka ku bandi.
Ati “Icyo nabasobanurira ni uko abavandimwe bacu muri RPA batabashije gukura ngo bamenye uko ibintu bimwe na bimwe bikorwa.
Bumva ko kunyura iya bugufi hano na hariya bizabageza ku ntego yabo.
Ikindi maze iminsi numva ni uko RPA yashatse kwigarurira Congo ariko ko turimo kubakoma imbere.
“Ku ruhande rwacu dushishikajwe no kongerera ubushobozi abanye-Congo ariko bigaragara ko Abanyarwanda batabyishimiye.
Ariko nubwo twaba tubangamiye imigambi bafite muri Congo, ni gute bumva ko batugabaho ibitero ngo birangirire aho?
Ni ukureba hafi cyane.
Igisirikare cya Uganda nticyigeze cyakira inshuro cyakubiswe n’Abanyarwanda, aho bumvaga ko ishema n’icyubahiro byabo byahungabanyijwe, ibitangazamakuru byanzika ko UPDF yatsinzwe ndetse abasirikare bayo barenga 200 bagapfa.
Raporo ya ICG ivuga ko hahise hatangira inama z’ibanga i Kampala zikitabirwa n’abasirikare bakiri mu mirimo n’abasezerewe, ngo “bashakishe uburyo bwo kwihimura ku cyo bafataga nk’ubugambanyi bw’abari bafatanyije n’u Rwanda.
Hari aho yagize iti “Abasirikare bakuru mu Ngabo za Uganda bavuga ko umubano n’u Rwanda utazongera na rimwe kuba nk’uko wahoze nyuma y’ibyabereye i Kisangani.
Nyuma y’imyaka myinshi, Uganda ikomeje gushotora u Rwanda aho yakunze gufunga abaturage barwo ibashinja ubutasi, ibintu itigeze igaragariza ibimenyetso ishingiraho, ndetse nta n’abagejejwe mu rukiko ngo ibyaha bibahame, ariko bagiye bakorerwa iyicarubozo rikomeye, bamwe bakarekurwa baragizwe intere, bamwe bibaviramo ubumuga abandi babira ubuzima.

Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko mu Rwanda habonetse abantu batandatu basanganywe Coronavirus mu bipimo 982 byafashwe uyu munsi mu gihe abagera kuri barindwi bakize.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko mu Rwanda habonetse abantu batandatu basanganywe Coronavirus mu bipimo 982 byafashwe uyu munsi mu gihe abagera kuri barindwi bakize.
Kuva umurwayi wa mbere wa COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko gashya ka Coronavirus agaragaye ku butaka bw’u Rwanda, hamaze kuboneka abantu 314 bayanduye mu bipimo 53 317.
Muri bo harimo abantu 216 basezerewe mu bitaro nyuma yo kuvurwa bagakira.
Aba barimo barindwi bakize kuri uyu wa 20 Gicurasi 2020.
Ku wa Kabiri, hari hagaragaye abarwayi 11 bashya ndetse bose ni abashoferi b’amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka n’abo bakorana.
Aba bakigera mu Rwanda bashyizwe mu kato ndetse ni naho bapimiwe.
Kugeza ubu ibitaro byita ku barwayi ba Coronavirus bibarizwamo abantu 98, bari kwitabwaho ndetse bameze neza.
Mu Rwanda nta murwayi uraremba cyangwa ngo ahitanwe na Coronavirus yibasiye Isi.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020 ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi bitewe n’ubwiyongere bw’abayandura.
Kuva Coronavirus igaragaye bwa mbere mu Mujyi wa Wuhan mu Bushinwa, abantu 5 039 517 bamaze kuyandura, yahitanye 326 530 mu gihe 1 994 012 bayikize.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro.
Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune, kwambara udupfukamunwa n’amazuru mu gihe umuntu avuye mu rugo cyangwa ahuye n’abantu benshi.
Nubwo u Rwanda kimwe n’Isi yose bihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mbere yacyo ubukungu bwarwo bwakomeje kwiyongera mu nkingi zose bwubakiyeho, aho ubuhinzi, inganda, serivisi n’ibindi bitahwemye kuzamuka umwaka ku wundi kandi uruhare rwabyo mu musaruro mbumbe w’igihugu rukigaragaza.
Nubwo u Rwanda kimwe n’Isi yose bihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mbere yacyo ubukungu bwarwo bwakomeje kwiyongera mu nkingi zose bwubakiyeho, aho ubuhinzi, inganda, serivisi n’ibindi bitahwemye kuzamuka umwaka ku wundi kandi uruhare rwabyo mu musaruro mbumbe w’igihugu rukigaragaza.
Imibare Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare (NISR), cyatangaje kuwa 24 Werurwe 2020, igaragaza ko mu 2019, umusaruro mbumbe w’u Rwanda (GDP), wiyongereye ku rugero rwa 9.
4 %, ugera kuri miliyari 9105 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 8189 Frw wariho mu 2018.
Muri uyu musaruro mbumbe, ubuhinzi bwagize uruhare rwa 24% inganda zigira uruhare rwa 18%, Serivisi zingana 49% mu gihe ibindi bisigaye byagize uruhare ku kigero cya 9%.
Iri zamuka ry’ubukungu riratanga icyizere ko nta gihindutse ibyo u Rwanda ruteganya ko nibura mu 2035 ruzaba rufite ubukungu buciriritse bishoboka.
Icyo gihe birasaba ko ubukungu bwaba bwihuta ku 10%, bigatuma umunyarwanda yazaba yinjiza asaga miliyoni 10 Frw ku mwaka.
Rirashimangira kandi imbaraga leta y’u Rwanda ikomeje gushyira mu guteza imbere ubukungu.
Mu 1994, izamuka ry’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda, ryasubiye inyuma kuri -41.
9%, umusaruro mbumbe w’umuturage wari amadolari 146 ku mwaka.
Nubwo inzira ikiri ndende, aho iterambere ry’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda rigeze harivugira kuko nko mu myaka itanu ishize umusaruro mbumbe wavuye kuri miliyari miliyari 5 956 Frw mu 2015, ugera kuri miliyari 9105 Frw.
Usubije amaso inyuma, usanga umusaruro mbumbe w’u Rwanda mu myaka itanu ishize (2015-2019), wariyongereyeho miliyari 3149 Frw.
Iri zamuka rishingiye ahanini kuri gahunda yo guteza imbere ubuhinzi, ishoramari muri serivisi zitandukanye, ubucuruzi, inganda n’ibindi bicumbi by’ubukungu.
Izamuka ry’umusaruro mbumbe mu myaka itanu
Mu 2015 umusaruro mbumbe w’u Rwanda wazamutseho 6.
9%, aho wanganaga na miliyari 5 956 Frw zikaba zari zivuye kuri miliyari 4 915Frw mu 2014.
Mu 2016 umusaruro mbumbe wageze kuri miliyari 6, 618 Frw, aho wazamutse ku kigero cya 5.
9% ugereranyije n’umwaka wabanje.
Mu 2017 umusaruro mbumbe wageze kuri miliyari 7 597 ukaba warazamutse 6.
1%, mu 2018 wageze kuri miliyari 8189 Frw uzamutse ku kigero cya 8.
6% ugereranyije n’umwaka wabanje wa 2017.
Ubwo hatangazwa umusaruro mbumbe wa 2018, Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, yavuze ko iterambere ry’ubuhinzi, inganda, ibikorerwa mu Rwanda na serivisi byazamuye ubukungu cyane.
Yagize ati “Ngira ngo muzi gahunda ya Made in Rwanda no korohereza ibikorwa bikorerwa mu Rwanda, biragenda rero bitanga umusaruro, umusaruro w’inganda urazamuka cyane".
Minisitiri Ndagijimana yavuze ko mu bitanga umusaruro harimo ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi byaba imihanda n’inganda.
Icyo gihe ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi byazamutseho 20%, mu nganda zitunganya ibintu bitandukanye cyazamutseho kuri 13%, umusaruro w’inganda zitunganya ibiryo ni 10%, izitunganya imyenda ni 26% na 38% ku musaruro w’inganda zikora ibikoresho bikoze mu byuma.
Mu 2019, umusaruro mbumbe wageze kuri miliyari 9105 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 8189 Frw wariho mu 2018.
Bisobanuye ko hiyongereyeho miliyoni 916Frw mu mwaka umwe.
Urwego rwa serivisi rwashinze imizi
Mu 2015, urwego rwa serivisi rwazamutse ku kigero cya 7% rugira uruhare mu musaruro mbumbe wose rwa 47%.
Mu 2016 serivisi zazamutse ku kigero cya 6%.
Muri uwo mwaka serivisi zishingiye kuri hoteli na restaurant zazamutse ku rugero rwa 11% bitewe na gahunda yo kwakira inama n’ibikorwa bitandukanye.
Imirimo y’ubwikorezi yazamutse ku rugero rwa 8% ahanini bitewe n’ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere bwazamutse ku rugero rwa 15%.
Mu 2017, serivisi zazamutse ku kigero cya 8% naho uruhare rwazo mu musaruro mbumbe rugera kuri 46%.
Mu 2018 umusaruro wa serivisi wazamutse ku rugero rwa 9% naho mu 2019 uzamuka ku rugero rwa 8% ndetse zigira uruhare rwa 49% muri GDP.
Mu 2016, uwari Minisitiri w’imari n’igenamigambi, Claver Gatete yavuze ko gahunda ya leta ijyanye no kwakira inama mpuzamahanga yagize uruhare runini mu kuzamura umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu nk’aho ibijyanye na hotel na restaurant zabigizemo uruhare runini.
Guhera muri Nyakanga 2018 kugeza Gashyantare 2019, u Rwanda rwari rumaze kwinjiza miliyoni 52 z’amadolari (asaga miliyari 46 Frw) avuye mu gutegura no kwakira inama mpuzamahanga.
Mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ushize (2018/2019) igihugu cyari cyihaye intego yo kwinjiza miliyoni 74 z’amadolari mu bikorwa byo gutegura no kwakira inama mpuzamahanga, avuye kuri miliyoni 42 zinjijwe mu 2017.
Kugeza ubu muri Kigali hari ibyumba bya hoteli z’inyenyeri ebyiri kugeza kuri eshanu bisaga 5000, washyiramo ibindi byumba by’inzu zigezweho zishobora gucumbikira abantu Kigali ifite bikagera ku 10 000.
Ubucuruzi budandaza n’ubugurisha ibintu icyarimwe bw’ibyakorewe mu Rwanda bukomeje kongera umusaruro wa serivisi, aho mu 2019 bwiyongereye ku kigero cya 16%.
Ubwikorezi bwazamutse ku kigero cya 12% ahanini bitewe n’ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere bwazamutse ku kigero cya 17%.
Serivisi z’imari zazamutse ku kigero cya 8% naho serivisi za hoteli na za restaurant zizamuka ku gipimo cya 10%.
Inganda zifatiye runini ubukungu
Kuva mu 2015, urwego rw’inganda rwagize ingufu nyinshi cyane mu bukungu bw’igihugu kuko ari bwo gahunda ya Made in Rwanda, yatangiraga gushyirwa mu bikorwa mu buryo buhamye.
Icyo gihe umusaruro w’inganda wazamutse ku kigero cya 7%.
Muri buri turere kandi hashyizweho ibyanya byihariye by’inganda, ndetse no mu Mujyi wa Kigali, iki cyanya gishyirwa i Masoro mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Mu 2016 inganda zazamutse ku kigero cya 7%, gahunda ya Made in Rwanda igira uruhare rukomeye cyane kuko inganda zikora imyenda, inkweto n’ibindi bituruka ku ruhu byiyongereye ku rugero rwa 10%, izikora ibyo kurya ziyongera ku rugero rwa 8%, naho inganda zikora ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi harimo isima ziyongeraho 21%.
Mu 2017 inganda zazamutse ku kigero cya 4%, mu 2018 zizamuka ku 10% naho mu 2019 umusaruro uzamuka kuri 16%.
Mu 2019, izamuka ry’umusaruro w’inganda ryatewe ahanini n’ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi, inganda zitunganya ibintu bitandukanye n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro.
Kuri ubu mu Rwanda habarirwa inganda nto n’iziciriritse zirenga 800 zirimo inganda zitari zisanzwe mu Rwanda nk’izikora telefoni, iziteranya imodoka, izikora ibiribwa n’izindi.
Ubuhinzi bukomeje gutera imbere
Imibare ya NISR, yerekana ko mu 2015, ubuhinzi bwazamutseho 5%, ndetse bugira uruhare rwa 33% mu musaruro mbumbe.
Mu 2018, umusaruro w’ubuhinzi wazamutse ku rugero rwa 6%, mu 2019, wazamutse ku kigero cya 5%, naho umusaruro wabwo ugira uruhare rwa 24% mu musaruro mbumbe.
Ubuhinzi nka kimwe mu bitunze abanyarwanda benshi, bwakunze guhura n’imbogamizi zirimo kuba bushingiye ku mvura, yaboneka bukagenda neza yabura bukagenda nabi.
Ibi byatumye leta ishyira imbaraga muri gahunda yo kuhira aho kugeza ubu hegitari zirenga ibihumbi 68 zuhirwa.
Gukoresha inyongeramusaruro, guhuza ubutaka no guhinga igihingwa cyatoranyijwe byitaweho cyane.
Leta y’u Rwanda kandi yashyize imbere no gushyiraho inganda zongerera agaciro umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi n’ubworozi.
Umuyobozi wa NISR, Yusuf Murangwa avuga ko ‘uyu mwaka wagenze neza kuruta uko byari byitezwe’.
Ati “Ubuhinzi nabwo ntabwo bwakoze nabi 5% nubwo haba hifuzwa ko biba byiza kurushaho".
Mu 2019, ibihingwa ngandurarugo byiyongereye ku kigero cya 4%, ibihingwa byoherezwa mu mahanga byiyongera 5% bitewe n’ikawa yiyongereye ku kigero cya 7% n’icyayi cyiyongereye ku kigero cya 3%.
Kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ubukungu ku Isi hose buzagabanuka, ubw’u Rwanda byitezwe ko buzazamuka ku gipimo cya 2% mu mwaka wa 2020 buvuye kuri 9.
4 % bwazamutseho umwaka ushize.
Icyakora kubera ingamba zafashwe mu kuzahura ubukungu, biteganyijwe ko ubukungu bw’u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2021 buzazamuka ku gipimo cya 6.
3 % na 8 % mu 2022.
Kuva mu ntangiriro, Imana yagiye yiyereka Muntu mu buryo butandukanye.
Iyo tuzirikanye ku buryo Imana itwibwira mu Ijambo ryayo tuyibona mu butatu butagatifu (Imana Data, Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu).
Ni ya Mana imwe rukumbi igendana natwe igihe cyose.
Ariko kubera uburyo tutabasha kuyishyikira, iza idusanga, natwe tukayimenya neza uko tugenda turushaho kuyegera.
Kuva mu ntangiriro, Imana yagiye yiyereka Muntu mu buryo butandukanye.
Iyo tuzirikanye ku buryo Imana itwibwira mu Ijambo ryayo tuyibona mu butatu butagatifu (Imana Data, Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu).
Ni ya Mana imwe rukumbi igendana natwe igihe cyose.
Ariko kubera uburyo tutabasha kuyishyikira, iza idusanga, natwe tukayimenya neza uko tugenda turushaho kuyegera.
Ikimenyetso cy’ Ubutatu Butagatifu bw’ Imana ni isomo rikomeye kuri twe ryo kwibumbira hamwe nk’abavandimwe ngo dufatanye muri uru rugendo rusanga Imana.
Ku Munsi Mukuru Ukomeye w’ Ubutatu Butagatifu twishimira Urukundo Imana yifitemo ubwayo rwabanje na mbere y’ uko natwe iturema tukarumenya; muri urwo rukundo rw’Imana niho natwe dukomora ubushobozi bwo gukunda.
Imana ni Urukundo iteka ryose
Imana ni Urukundo iteka ryose nkuko Ijambo ry’ Imana ribivuga, bikanahurirwaho n’ abayemera bo mu madini n’amatorero menshi.
Imana ni yo rukundo rwuzuye; kandi ukunda by’ukuri agira undi akunda; naho uwikunze, ntibavuga ko afite urukundo rwuzuye, ahubwo babyita ubwikunde, inda mbi cyangwa inda nini, ubugugu, umururumba n’ibindi bibi bitaba mu Mana, ntibinagire umwanya aho iganje.
Ukunda abandi akirinda guhemuka ahubwo akagira neza, niwe bashima bavuga ko afite urukundo, kuko akunda inshuti ze, abaturanyi, ababyeyi be, abana be, umufasha we, yaba akunda abababaye cyangwa abanzi be akabababarira nkuko Imana ibitugirira, bati “afite urukundo rukomeye, rwuzuye, nta rwango agira".
Ni ko n’Imana yaturemye mu ishusho ryayo iteye.
Imana yibwiye Musa iti "Ndi Uhoraho, Uhoraho Imana igira impuhwe n’ineza, itinda kurakara, yuje ubuntu n’ubudahemuka"( Iyim 34, 6).
Imana yari Urukundo na mbere y’ iremwa ry’ ibindi biriho byose, ni Urukundo kandi izahora ari Urukundo, ntacyo ijya ibura ku rukundo rwayo.
Ni yo mpamvu na mbere yo kurema, nta rungu n’ubwigunge yigeze igira.
Ibi bidufashe kwakira ibyo twahishuriwe mu Ijambo ry’ Imana ko Imana ari imwe mu Batatu bakundana, bunze ubumwe bwuzuye, ku buryo batari Imana eshatu, ahubwo ari Imana Imwe mbere y’iremwa, ubu ndetse n’iteka ryose.
Si ukubara nk’ ababara ibyo tubonesha amaso nk’ uko tuzi imibare dushobora kumvisha ubwenge bwa muntu, kuko Imana irenze ubwenge bwa muntu, Urukundo rwayo rukaba ruturenze.
Tukaba tubyemera kuko yabiduhishuriye mu Ijambo ryayo kuruta kure uko ubwenge bwacu bwabyiyumvisha.
Urukundo Imana yifitemo ruhuza Data na Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu ntiyarwihariye, yararudukunze iturema, tunacumuye, iduha amahirwe yo kwemera kureka icyaha no gukira ingaruka zacyo, nuko iduha Mwana ngo nitumwemera dukire ingaruka mbi z’icyaha.
Ukwiye kunezezwa n’ uko Imana yadukunze
"Koko Imana yakunze isi cyane, bigeza aho itanga Umwana wayo w’ikinege, igira ngo umwemera wese atazacibwa, ahubwo agire ubugingo bw’iteka"(Yh 3, 16).
Urwo rukundo Yezu Umwana w’Imana yadukunze yumvira Imana se, ntatinye no kwitangira abo akunda ngo babeho, rwera imbuto rugatanga ubuzima bushya, ari bwo bugingo bw’iteka.
Abantu baha agaciro urukundo rwuzuye Imana ibakunda nabo bakarukunda Imana na bagenzi babo, bagira Ubuzima bw’ iteka, budahungabanywa n’urupfu rw’ umubiri abantu bose bacamo.
Turi mu gihe cyo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo giterwa n’agakoko ka coronavirus, bigatuma tutabasha kwegerana nka mbere, ariko ntibitubuze kurushaho kugaragariza urukundo abantu bose, cyane cyane abo tubana ndetse n’abari kure twifashishije itumanaho ririmo gutera imbere muri iki gihe turimo.
Umwihariko w’abakristu ni ukwemera Imana Imwe mu Batatu: Data, Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu: babatijwe mu Izina ry’Imana Data na Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu.
Twese abakristu turangwe n’Urukundo ruduhuriza mu bumwe, mu muryango umwe w’abana b’Imana.
Kuzirikana Ubutatu Butagatifu bitwibutse ko natwe duhamagarirwa kugira Urukundo ruri mu Mana ubwayo, ari na rwo idukunda.
Uzarushaho gusa n’Imana yakuremye mu ishusho ryayo niwihatira gukunda nka yo, no guharanira Ubumwe nk’ubwayo.
Ubumwe bubyara imbaraga ("Unity is strength"/ "L’ union fait la force"), kandi abagiye inama Imana irabasanga; abahujwe n’Urukundo rwitangira abandi nta kibananira.
Uwemera Imana abigaragaza aberaho gufasha abandi, agaharanira uguhuza abantu, agatsinda igitanya abantu, inabi akayitsindisha ineza.
Yezu Kristu yasabiye abamwemera kuri Se "kugira ngo bose babe umwe".
Ati: "Nk’uko wowe, Dawe, uri muri jye, nanjye nkaba muri wowe, ndasaba ko nabo bunga ubumwe muri twe, kugira ngo isi yemere ko ari wowe wantumye"(Yh 17, 21).
Bityo kunga ubumwe ku bahuje kwemera Kristu bituma n’abatemeraga bemera; naho gushyamirana mu bibwira ko bemera Kristu bikagusha abanyantege nke, kandi hagowe uwo biturukaho.
Muri iyi minsi isi yugarijwe n’ ibibazo by’ivangura mu bihugu bitandukanye nko muri Amerika ahavugwa ivangura rishingiye ku ibara ry’uruhu n’andi mavangura; twebwe rero tube intumwa z’ubumwe n’Urukundo aho turi hose, kugira ngo turwanye kandi dukumire ibyadutanya byose, ahubwo ubuvandimwe butironda busakare ku isi, kuko umuntu uko asa kose yaremwe mu ishusho ry’ Imana.
Dusenge: Mana Data Mubyeyi wacu, wowe watwoherereje Jambo wawe watumenyesheje ukuri, ukanatwoherereza Roho wawe w’ubutungane, duhe guhamya ukwemera nyako no guhora twunze ubumwe n’abantu bose waremye mu ishusho yawe y’Urukundo! Amen!
"Ineza y’Umwami wacu Yezu Kristu, n’urukundo rw’Imana Data, n’ubusabane kuri Roho Mutagatifu, bihorane namwe mwese!"(2Kor 13, 13).

Nomero ya mbere ku Isi muri Tennis, Novak Djokovic n’umugore we Jelena, bombi banduye Coronavirus nyuma y’uko uyu mugabo aheruka kwitabira irushanwa rya Adria Tour.
Nomero ya mbere ku Isi muri Tennis, Novak Djokovic n’umugore we Jelena, bombi banduye Coronavirus nyuma y’uko uyu mugabo aheruka kwitabira irushanwa rya Adria Tour.
Novak Djokovic yatangaje ko yanduye Coronavirus nyuma y’uko yaherukaga kwitabira irushanwa rya Adria Tour ryabaye muri uku kwezi muri Serbia na Croatia.
Uyu mukinnyi wa mbere ku Isi muri Tennis y’abagabo, yavuze ko we n’umugore we Jelena, bombi nta bimenyetso bagaragaza ariko bazishyira mu kato.
Abinyujije ku rubuga rwe rwa interineti, Djokovic yagize ati “Mbabajwe no kuba nanduye.
Ndizera ko ntawe bizakomereza ubuzima ndetse buri umwe azaba ameze neza.
“Ubwo twageraga i Belgrade (muri Serbia), twagiye gupimwa.
Ibisubizo byanjye bigaragaza ko nanduye Coronavirus ndetse niko bimeze kuri Jelena mu gihe ibisubizo by’abana bacu bane bigaragaza ko ari bazima.
"Ibyo twakoze byose mu kwezi gushize, twabikoze tubikuye ku mutima.
Amarushanwa yacu yari agamije guhuriza hamwe no gusangira ubutumwa bw’ubufatanye n’impuhwe mu gace kose.
Grigor Dimitrov na we wakinnye muri iryo rushanwa, yanduye Coronavirus kimwe na Borna Ćorić wakinnye n’uyu Munya-Bulgarie ku wa Gatandatu.
Viktor Troicki n’umugore we utitwe , nabo banduye Coronavirus nyuma y’uko uyu mugabo akinnye muri Adria Tour.
Icyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya Adria Tour cyabereye muri Croatia, igihugu cyagabanyije ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus bivuze ko abakinnyi bemerewe guhoberana, gukina Basketball, gufata amafoto no kwitabira ibiganiro n’abanyamakuru bari hamwe.
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bikomeye bihuza abanyamideli bizwi “Kigali Fashion Week" byongeye kubera mu Mujyi wa Kigali, byerekanirwamo imyambaro idasanzwe yakozwe n’abafite ubuhanga mu kuyiha ishusho, barimo n’abaturuka hanze y’u Rwanda.
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bikomeye bihuza abanyamideli bizwi “Kigali Fashion Week" byongeye kubera mu Mujyi wa Kigali, byerekanirwamo imyambaro idasanzwe yakozwe n’abafite ubuhanga mu kuyiha ishusho, barimo n’abaturuka hanze y’u Rwanda.
Ni ku nshuro ya karindwi Kigali Fashion Week ibaye nyuma y’izabaye mu myaka itandatu ishize.
Ibirori by’uyu mwaka byabaye mu minsi itatu, byerekaniwemo imodoka, imyambaro isanzwe n’itamenyerewe ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bigaragaza umwihariko n’intera ibijyanye no kumurika imideli bimaze kugeraho mu Rwanda.
Ibirori bisoza byabaye mu ijoro ryo ku wa Gatandatu, tariki 27 Gicurasi 2017, byitabiriwe n’abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye barimo abanyamahanga n’abayobozi mu nzengo nkuru z’igihugu na Minisitiri w’Imicungire y’Ibiza n’Impunzi, Seraphine Mukantabana wari waje gushyigikira iki gikorwa.
Imyiyereko y’abanyamideli n’imyambarire yagaragaye muri Kigali Fashion Week byanyuze benshi mu bitabiriye, hashimwa cyane uburyo u Rwanda rugeze ku ntera yo kugirana imikoranire n’abatunganya imideli bakomeye baturuka mu bihugu byo hanze.
Uwitwa Gatesi Yvette uri mu bitabiriye ibi birori waganiriye na IGIHE, yagize ati "Ibirori nabikunze cyane njye nabonye imyambaro ihebuje ku buryo nanjye nifuza kuyambara.
Ikindi nishimiye kubona ni abakora imideli bo hanze baza bakambika abamurika imideli bo mu Rwanda.
Ibi birori byari biyobowe n’umushyushyarugamba Makeda Mahedeo byagaragayemo imyiyereko y’abamurika imideli bagera kuri 60 bambitswe n’abayikora 15 barimo n’abaturutse hanze y’u Rwanda barindwi.
Kigali Fashion Week y’uyu mwaka yitabiriwe n’abakora imyuga ijyanye n’imideli bo mu bihugu nka Cameroun, Sudani, Kenya, Uganda, u Buhinde, Nigeria, u Bwongereza, u Bubiligi, Afurika y’Epfo, Ethiopia, u Buyapani, u Burundi n’ahandi.
Inzu z’imideli zirimo ’Delphine House of Fashion’, ’Tanga Designs’, ’Christa Bella’, ’Hakym Reagan’, ’Lupita Collection’, ’Cynthia Rupari’, ’Patrick Inkanda’, ’Fathia’ ni zimwe mu zerekanye imyambaro zikora muri ibi birori byatangijwe bwa mbere mu Rwanda mu 2011 bifite intego yo kuzamura abanyamideli.
Icyogajuru cyakozwe na Sosiyete y’Umuherwe Elon Musk yitwa SpaceX cyoherejwe mu isanzure gitwaye abanyamerika babiri bakora mu kigo gishinzwe ubumenyi mu by’isanzure NASA, ruba urugendo rwa mbere iyi sosiyete ikoze itwara abantu mu isanzure.
Icyogajuru cyakozwe na Sosiyete y’Umuherwe Elon Musk yitwa SpaceX cyoherejwe mu isanzure gitwaye abanyamerika babiri bakora mu kigo gishinzwe ubumenyi mu by’isanzure NASA, ruba urugendo rwa mbere iyi sosiyete ikoze itwara abantu mu isanzure.
Hari hashize imyaka icyenda nta cyogajuru gihagurutse ku butaka bwa Amerika kijyanye abanyamerika ku isanzure, gusa ubu byashobotse nyuma y’icyo gihe kinini cyari gishize.
Muri iyi myaka yose yari ishize [kuva mu 2011], abanyamerika bajyaga ku isanzure bakoresheje ibyogajuru by’Abarusiya ndetse akaba ariho banakoreraga imyitozo, ni ibintu byatwaye Amerika miliyoni 86 z’amadolari.
Iki cyogajuru cyagombaga kuba cyaroherejwe mu isanzure ku wa Gatatu w’icyumweru gishize gusa biza gusubikwa nyuma yo kubona ko mu kirere harimo imirabyo gahunda ishyirwa kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Cyohererejwe muri Leta ya Florida ahari ikigo kimwe mu icumi bya Nasa bigenzura ibijyanye n’isanzure cyitwa Kennedy Space Center.
Kohereza iki cyogajuru bitumye Amerika itera indi ntambwe mu rugendo ruganisha ku kuba ba mukerarugendo bashobora kujya ku isanzure.
Iki cyogajuru cyari gitwaye Robert Behnken w’imyaka 49 na Douglas Hurley wa 53.
Bazamara mu isanzure amasaha 19.
Cyahagurutse 21:20 z’ijoro kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ku isaha y’i Kigali.
Iki cyogajuru kiri mu mushinga wa SpaceX witwa Dragon 2, cyari kimaze imyaka 15 gikorwa.
Emilienne ni izina rihabwa abana b’abakobwa rifite inkomoko ku ijambo ry’Ikilatini “Emŭlus" bivuga kwigana.
Emilienne ni izina rihabwa abana b’abakobwa rifite inkomoko ku ijambo ry’Ikilatini “Emŭlus" bivuga kwigana.
Izina Emilienne rikunze guhabwa abantu biganjemo abo mu bihugu birimo Espagne, u Bufaransa, u Busuwisi n’u Bubiligi.
Ibiranga ba Emilienne
Ba Emilienne usanga bakunda guhindagurwa n’ibihe gusa bagira impano ikomeye yo gukemura ibibazo ibyo aribyo byose bahuye nabyo neza kandi vuba.
Ni abantu bakunda gusabana cyane kandi bakizihirwa no kubana n’inshuti zabo.
Aba bakobwa bashimishwa no gukundwa kandi bakabyerekwa binyuze mu guhabwa impano kandi zibatunguye.
By’umwihariko, ba Emilienne bakunda umuryango wabo cyane, bishimira kumva abandi no kubigiraho.
Ba Emilienne barigengesera cyane uko bagaragara inyuma, ibi bituma iyo bagiye guhitamo umwambaro bambara babanza kwitonda cyane.
Atitaye ku buzima arimo bwaba bwiza cyangwa bugoranye, Emilienne aba ahora yifuza gutembera no kubona ibindi bintu bishya mu buzima.
Aba bakobwa bakunda kureba ibigaragara inyuma cyane, ntibakunda gukora ibintu bituma babimaraho igihe kirekire kuko bakunda kureba ibindi bintu bishya.
Ni abanyempuhwe nyinshi.
Ba Emilienne na bo bakunda ukuri n’ubutabera muri byose, bakunda ubwisanzure mu buzima bwabo, bakabangamirwa no kubohwa n’amategeko runaka kuko bibabuza umudendezo wabo.
Sosiyete ya Google yatangaje ko igiye gutangiza uburyo bwo gukumira amatangazo yamamaza ku bakoresha porogaramu ya Google Chrome basura imbuga zitandukanye.
Sosiyete ya Google yatangaje ko igiye gutangiza uburyo bwo gukumira amatangazo yamamaza ku bakoresha porogaramu ya Google Chrome basura imbuga zitandukanye.
Amatangazo azibandwaho akaba ari akoresha internet nyinshi n’umuriro mwinshi wa telefone cyangwa mudasobwa by’abakiliya.
Google yatangaje ko ubwo buryo buzatangira gukoreshwa muri Kanama uyu mwaka.
Iyo sosiyete yatangaje ko baje kuvumbura ko hari amatangazo yamamaza aza iyo umuntu ari kureba ibintu runaka kuri internet, agatwara umuriro mwinshi wa telefone ye cyangwa ama-inite ya telefone nyirayo atabizi.
Google ivuga ko akenshi ayo matangazo abayakoze baba batarayakoze neza ku buryo akoresha umuriro mwinshi cyangwa internet nyinshi.
Yatangaje ko bihombya umukiliya ukoresha Google Chrome kuko ama-inite ye ashobora gushira atayakoresheje cyangwa umuriro wa telefone ye ugashira atabizi.
Amatangazo azajya akumirwa ku bakoresha Google Chrome ni ashobora gukoresha internet ya megabit 4 cyangwa se ashobora kwiharira 27 % bya internet yose yakoreshejwe n’amatangazo yamamaza.
Google chrome ni isiakiro rya Internet ryatangijwe mu 2008, rihanganye n’andi mashakiro nka Internet Explorer na Firefox yari yarabanje mu kibuga.
Chrome yakomeje guhatana iza kwigarurira benshi mu bakoresha internet.
Kugeza mu mpera za 2019, telefone miliyari eshanu ku isi zari zirimo porogaramu ya Google Chrome.
Minisiteri y’Ubutabera yatangije uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga buzajya bwifashishwa mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha, bwitezweho gukemura byinshi mu bibazo byajyaga bigaragara mu kurangiza izi manza, birimo gutinda kwa zo, uburiganya n’ibindi byaturukaga k’uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha w’inkiko.
Minisiteri y’Ubutabera yatangije uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga buzajya bwifashishwa mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha, bwitezweho gukemura byinshi mu bibazo byajyaga bigaragara mu kurangiza izi manza, birimo gutinda kwa zo, uburiganya n’ibindi byaturukaga k’uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha w’inkiko.
Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki ya 13 Gicurasi 2020, cyari kigamije gusobanura byimbitse ibijyanye n’iteka rya Minisitiri ryerekeye uburyo bwo guca imanza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga; Minisiteri y’Ubutabera yasobanuye ibizahinduka mu mirangirize y’imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha [inyandiko itegeka ko umuntu ahabwa umutungo runaka].
Umuyobozi Mukuru Ushinzwe Serivisi yo Kwegereza Ubutabera abaturage muri MINIJUST, Urujeni Martine, yavuze ko gutangira gukoresha iri koranabuhanga bifitiye akamaro impande zitandukanye zifite aho zihuriye n’ubutabera, haherewe ku muturage.
Kuva iri teka ritangajwe, hashyizweho urubuga rwa internet ruzajya rwifashishwa n’abahesha b’inkiko bose, abaturage bafite imitungo byanzuwe n’urwego rubifitiye ububasha cyangwa habarabayeho ubwumvikane hagati y’impande ebyiri ko izatezwa cyamunara, n’izindi nzego zizajya zikurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imyanzuro y’imanza zishingiye ku mitungo itezwa cyamunara.
Urujeni yavuze ko zimwe mu mpinduka zazanywe n’iri koranabuhanga ari uko nta rubanza rwa cyamunara cyangwa inyandiko mpesha bizongera kurangizwa bidakorewe mu ikoranabuhanga, kandi ko hari n’uburyo bwateganyijwe igihe habayeho ikibazo muri iryo koranabuhanga.
Ati "Bizihutisha irangizamanza n’inyandiko mpesha; ubundi hari hari ibibazo bitandukanye byaturukaga ku mpande zose, ugasanga uregwa, urega cyangwa umuhesha w’inkiko […] umwe muri bo agize uruhare mu kudindira kw’irangizarubanza.
Yakomeje avuga ko bizongera umucyo mu guca urubanza, aho umuhesha w’inkiko azaba afite inzira zose zifashishwa mu kurangiza urubanza mu buryo bukwiye, byose bikorewe mu ikoranabuhanga.
Bizafasha kandi inzego zitandukanye gukurikirana no kugenzura imikorere y’abahesha b’inkiko ku buryo bukurikije amategeko.
Umwanditsi Mukuru mu Kigo cy’Iterambere, RDB, Richard Kayibanda, ashimangira ko iri koranabuhanga rishya rizagura isoko muri cyamunara kuko buri wese azagira uburenganzira bungana n’ubwa mugenzi we mu kugura umutungo aho yaba ari hose.
Ati "Bizanakemura ikibazo cy’abakomisiyoneri bajyaga bateza akavuyo ku munsi wa cyamurana, bikanica isoko rimwe na rimwe ku buryo hari n’aho cyamunara yasubikwaga.
Mu byo umuntu unyuze muri iri koranabuhanga azajya asabwa kugira ngo yemererwe gupiganwa muri cyamunara, harimo ko azajya atanga ingwate ingana na 5% y’agaciro k’umutungo upiganirwa; akayasubizwa igihe atawegukanye, mu gihe kitarenze iminsi itatu, uwawegukanye we akazajya ayaheraho yishyura igiciro cyose.
Ingwate ya 5% iteganyijwe ku mitungo ifite agaciro gahera kuri miliyoni eshanu kuzamura, mu gihe umutungo ufite agaciro kari munsi yayo nta ngwate itangwa.
Ibindi byitezwe ko bizahindurwa n’ikoranabuhanga mu kurangiza imanza za cyamunara n’inyandiko mpesha harimo gukurikirana uburyo imanza zirangizwa mu gihugu hose ku buryo bwizewe, harebwa umusaruro bitanga.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro na cyo kizabasha gukurikirana neza itangwa ry’umusoro ku bahesha b’inkiko, hashingiwe kuri raporo y’imirimo bakoze.
RDB ivuga ko gutangizwa kw’iri koranabuhanga bizunganira gahunda yo kurushaho guteza imbere ishoramari no gukora ubucuruzi binyuze mu mucyo.
Iteka rya Minisitiri ryerekeye uburyo bwo guca imanza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, riteganya ko mu gihe hatatanzwe byibura 75% by’agaciro k’umutungo utezwa cyamunara; nyir’umutungo cyangwa ikigo cy’imari gicunga uwo mutungo bafite uburenganzira bwo gusaba ko cyamunara ihagarikwa, hagashakwa ubundi buryo cyangwa ikimurwa.
Ibyamamare muri sinema ku Isi, Leonardo DiCaprio na Barry Jenkins bari gufatanya na Netflix kuvugurura filime ya ‘Virunga’ ivuga ku gufata neza ingagi zo mu Birunga.
Ibyamamare muri sinema ku Isi, Leonardo DiCaprio na Barry Jenkins bari gufatanya na Netflix kuvugurura filime ya ‘Virunga’ ivuga ku gufata neza ingagi zo mu Birunga.
Iyi filime mbarankuru igaruka ku kubungabunga ingagi mu gace k’Ibirunga zibarizwa mu misozi y’u Rwanda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na Uganda yayobowe bwa mbere na Orlando von Einsiedel mu 2014.
Filime ‘Virunga’ yanahatanye mu bihembo bya Oscars byatanzwe mu 2014 gusa ntiyabashije gutsinda.
DiCaprio ari kuvugurura iyi filime afatanyije na Jennifer Davisson na Phillip Watson wa Appian Way, Joanna Natasegara wa Violet Films na Orlando von Einsiedel wayikozeho mbere.
Barry Jenkins na Tarell Alvin McCraney nibo bazandika iyi filime.
Aba bombi bigeze gushyirwa mu bahatanira igihembo cya Oscar mu cyiciro cy’abayoboye filime neza abikesheje iyitwa “Moonlight".
Jenkins yanditse izirimo “Flint Strong", “T-Rex" n’izindi.
Kuva mu 2014, Netflix ifite uburenganzira bwo kwerekana iyi filime ya Virunga, iri kuvugururwa ngo ishyirwe hanze.
Netflix ni Ikigo cy’Abanyamerika cyerekana amashusho atandukanye arimo filime mbarankuru binyuze kuri internet.
Irebwa mu bihugu 190 hirya no hino ku Isi, aho ifite abakiliya basaga miliyoni 182.
Leonardo DiCaprio yamamaye muri filime yamenyekanye nka ‘Titanic’.
Yigeze kwegukana Academy Award bitewe na Filime ‘The Relevant’.
Yakoze filime zitandukanye nka “Robin Hood" na “Richard Jewell".
Mu 2016 akora filime mbarankuru yitwa “The Ivory Game" ivuga ku Nzovu zo muri Afurika.
Filime mbarankuru ya Virunga iri mu bikorwa DiCaprio akora abinyujije muri Leonardo DiCaprio Foundation, byo kwitangira kwita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima n’ibidukikije.
Binyuze mu Muryango Earth Alliance, watangijwe na DiCaprio, Emerson Collective na Global Wildlife Conservation yahuje imbaraga na Komisiyo y’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi hagamijwe gutangiza Ikigega cya Virunga, kizashyirwamo miliyoni $2 ku ikubitiro.
Virunga Fund izafasha mu kurinda pariki z’ibihugu ndetse n’imiryango itandukanye izituriye.
Perezida Paul Kagame yishimiye ko Perezida wa Gabon, Ali Bongo Ondimba yorohewe akongera gusubira mu nshingano zo kuyobora igihugu nyuma y’igihe arwaye.
Perezida Paul Kagame yishimiye ko Perezida wa Gabon, Ali Bongo Ondimba yorohewe akongera gusubira mu nshingano zo kuyobora igihugu nyuma y’igihe arwaye.
Perezida Kagame yabigaragaje kuri uyu wa Mbere ku munsi wa mbere w’uruzinduko rwe rw’iminsi ibiri i Libreville muri Gabon.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru ryo muri Gabon, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko yaje gukomeza gutsura umubano mwiza uri hagati y’ibihugu byombi no gusura mugenzi we Ali Bongo uri koroherwa nyuma y’igihe arwaye.
Mu Ukwakira umwaka ushize nibwo Perezida Bongo yajyanywe mu bitaro i Riyadh muri Arabie Saoudite nyuma yo gufatwa n’indwara yo kwangirika kw’imitsi y’ubwonko.
Muri Mutarama yasubiye mu gihugu cye amaze koroherwa, akomeza gukurikiranirwa hafi n’abaganga.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko bishimishije kuba Bongo yarorohewe akanasubira mu nshingano ze.
Yagize ati “Nishimiye kuza hano muri Gabon gukomeza inzira yo kwimakaza umubano uri hagati ya Gabon n’u Rwanda.
Ni n’umwanya kuri njye wo gusura mugenzi wanjye wari umaze igihe arwaye.
Nishimiye ko yorohewe akanakomeza inshingano ze.
Yakomeje agira ati “Mu muco w’abanyafurika, inshuti dusurana mu bihe byiza no mu bibi.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko Gabon, by’umwihariko Perezida Bongo yagiye agira uruhare runini mu gushyigikira intego zigamije guteza imbere Afurika.
Ati “Gabon yagiye iharanira inyungu za Afurika, icyerecyezo n’ingamba zigamije kugera kuri icyo cyerecyezo.
Perezida Bongo yagize uruhare runini mu gukorana n’abandi bayobozi ku mugabane wacu, mu kuzamura urwego rw’iterambere ryacu".
Mu kwezi gutaha nibwo byitezwe ko muri Afurika hazatangizwa ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’amasezerano ashyiraho isoko rusange rya Afurika.
Gabon iri mu bihugu 44 byashyize umukono ku masezerano ashyiraho isoko rusange ry’ibihugu bihurira mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe, AU, azwi nka AfCFTA.
Ibihugu 22 bisabwa kuyemeza burundu ngo ashyirwe mu bikorwa byarabonetse ndetse biteganyijwe ko mu kwezi gutaha azatangizwa ku mugaragaro.
Agaruka kuri ayo masezerano, Perezida Kagame yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ibihugu byose bya Afurika bizi akamaro kayo ku buryo n’ibitarayasinya bizabikora.
Ati “N’ibihugu bitarayemeza burundu si uko bitabona inyungu cyangwa ngo bibone ko ari ngombwa ahubwo biracyafite ingorane mu bijyanye n’amategeko n’ibindi bya tekiniki bagomba kubanza gukemura mbere yo kuyashyira mu bikorwa.
Yagarutse kandi ku muti watuma amakimbirane ahora agaragara hirya no hino muri Afurika acika, avuga ko bisaba ubufatanye bw’ibihugu bigize uwo mugabane.
U Rwanda na Gabon bisanzwe bifitanye umubano mwiza.
Byombi bihuriye mu Muryango w’Ubukungu bw’Ibihugu bya Afurika yo Hagati, CEEAC.
U Rwanda na Gabon basinyanye amasezerano y’imikoranire mu 1976, aza kuvugururwa mu 2010.
Bifitanye ubuhahirane buhagaze neza dore ko indege ya RwandAir ikorera ingendo mu Mujyi wa Libreville.
Muri Kamena 2016 ibihugu byombi byakuyeho amafaranga yacibwaga umuntu ukoresheje umurongo wa telefoni mu guhamagara hagati yabyo.
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abana bafite amahirwe make yo kwandura Coronavirus ugereranyije n’abantu bakuru.
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abana bafite amahirwe make yo kwandura Coronavirus ugereranyije n’abantu bakuru.
Ubu bushakashatsi buje mu gihe hirya no hino ku Isi amashuri yafunzwe, ikibazo benshi bari kwibaza ubu ni igihe azafungurirwa.
Abahanga bagaragaje ko abari munsi y’imyaka 20 baba bafite amahirwe make ari ku kigero cya 56% yo kwandura Coronavirus kurusha abarengeje iyo myaka.
Umwarimu muri UCL Great Ormond Street Institute, Ishuri ryigisha Ubuzima bw’Abana, Russell Viner, yatangaje ko ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko “abana ari itsinda ritekanye" kuko bafite ikigereranyo kiri hasi cyo kwandura Coronavirus ndetse ko n’amahirwe yo kwicwa nayo ari make cyane.
Abashakashatsi bagenzuye inyandiko z’amapaji ibihumbi bitandatu zakoreweho ubushakashatsi kuri iyi ndwara, zirimo zimwe zatangajwe mu binyamakuru bitangarizwamo ubushakashatsi ku ndwara, zirimo 18 zivuga by’umwihariko ku bana n’uburyo babasha guhangana n’iyi virus.
Icyenda muri izo nyandiko zo zakoze ubushakashatsi bwimbitse bugaragaza uburyo iyi ndwara iherekanywa umuntu ku wundi.
Bumwe muri ubwo bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko mu ngo 31, eshatu zonyine arizo byagaragaye ko abazibamo banduye bandujwe n’abana.

Hitayezu Dirigeant yatorewe kuyobora Etincelles FC mu matora y’Inama y’Inteko Rusange y’ikipe yabereye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Mbere.
Komite Nyobozi nshya ya Etincelles FC yatowe, yasimbuye icyuye igihe yari iyobowe na Ruboneza Gédéon.
Muri aya matora yabaye hubahirjwe ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, hatorewe umwanya wa Perezida wegukanywe na Hitayezu Dirigeant ku majwi 100%.
Visi Perezida wa mbere yabaye Pasteur Ndolimana Emmanuel watowe ku majwi 85% mu gihe uwa kabiri yabaye Ndagijimana Enock.
Hemejwe ko Umunyamabanga mukuru n’abajyanama bazatorwa mu minsi iri imbere.

Iyo aza kuba akiriho, tariki 15 Gicurasi 2020 Musenyeri Alexis Kagame wahawe akazina ka Semateka aba yujuje imyaka 108 avutse.
Iyo aza kuba akiriho, tariki 15 Gicurasi 2020 Musenyeri Alexis Kagame wahawe akazina ka Semateka aba yujuje imyaka 108 avutse.
Musenyeri Alexis Kagame, yabaye umuhanga udasanzwe, umwanditsi n’umunyamateka ukomeye, akibukirwa ku bitabo byuje ubuhanga yanditse n’ibisigo birimo Indyoheshabirayi, Inganji Karinga, Umuririmbyi wa Nyiribiremwa, Isoko y’Amajyambere n’ibindi.
Yavutse kuwa 15 Gicurasi 1912 i Kiyanza mu Buliza, ubu ni mu murenge wa Ntarabana mu Karere ka Rulindo mu Majyaruguru.
Mu myaka 69 y’ubuzima bwe, Kagame yasize umusanzu ukomeye asiga u Rwanda na Afurika bamumenye nk’umunyamateka, umuhanga mu ndimi n’umuhanga mu byo gutekereza (filozofiya).
Ubuzima bwe mu buto
Kagame yakuze ari umuhanga haba mu bitekerezo no mu mivugire, yaje kuba inshuti ya hafi y’umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa waje no kumuha uburenganzira bwo gukusanya ibitekerezo by’Abiru ngo abyandikemo igitabo.
Yatangiye kwiga mu Ishuri rya Leta Mbiligi Gatolika mu Ruhengeri mu 1925, icyo gihe yari afite imyaka 13.
Yaharangije nyuma y’imyaka itatu mu 1928, asaba kujya mu iseminari nto i Kabgayi mu karere ka Muhanga mu 1929, aharangiriza mu 1933.
Yakomeje mu iseminari nkuru ari umuhanga mu buryo budasanzwe, kugeza abaye umupadiri mu 1941.
Alexis Kagame nk’umwanditsi
Mu 1943 nibwo Kagame yasohoye igitabo cye cya mbere cyagarukaga ku mateka y’u Rwanda yise Inganji Karinga, gikurikirwa n’ibindi byinshi bigaruka no ku busizi, agenda ahuza imyemerere gakondo n’ubuzima bwa gikirisitu, ingingo yanditseho cyane.
Alexis Kagame kandi yagiye akora inyingo nyinshi zirebana n’ubusizi nyabami.
Musenyeri Kagame yifashishije ibyiciro biboneka mu rurimi rw’Ikinyarwanda agaragaza ubuhanga bw’Abanyafurika mu mitekerereze, mu bushakashatsi bwamuhesheje impamyabushobozi y’ikirenga mu bya filozofiya muri Kaminuza ya Mutagatifu Gregoire i Roma, igitabo gishingiye ku iyigandimi nyarwanda, yise “La philosophie Bantu-Rwandaise de l’être", hari mu 1956.
Agarutse mu Rwanda, yatangiye kwigisha mu iseminari asohora n’ibitabo byinshi, bitari ku mateka y’u Rwanda gusa, ahubwo bigera no ku rurimi rw’Ikinyarwanda.
Mu 1959 nyuma y’itanga ry’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, ingoma ya Cyami yatangiye gusa n’ivaho, ariko Alexis Kagame we kubera ibitekerezo bikomeye yari afite ntiyagira ikindi kibazo, ahubwo ahabwa kujya kwigisha muri Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda ubwo yashigwaga mu 1963.
Icyo gihe kandi yari n’umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’Igihugu ya Zaire i Lubumbashi, ubu ni muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, aho yigishaga amateka ya Afurika y’iburasirazuba n’iyo hagati.
Kuwa 5 Nyakanga mu 1979 yahawe na leta impeta y’ishimwe ubwo yagirwaga “Officier de l’ordre national des Grands lacs", ndetse amaze kugirwa igisonga cya Musenyeri muri diyosezi ya Butare muri 1980, Papa Yahani Pawulo wa II yamugize Musenyeri w’icyubahiro ku ya 4 Nyakanga 1981, aba Musenyeri atyo nubwo atari umwepisikopi nk’abo tuzi ubu.
Kuwa 2 Ukuboza 1981 nibwo Musenyeri Alexis Kagame yitabye Imana aguye mu bitaro by’i Nairobi muri Kenya aho yari yagiye kwivuza, ndetse umurambo we leta yishingira kuwuzana mu Rwanda kubera agaciro yari afite mu gihugu.
Kagame yabaye mu Nama y’Ubuyobozi bwa Rwanda-Urundi kuva muri 1956 kugeza ku bwigenge bw’u Rwanda.
Uretse ibihembo mpuzamahanga, kuwa 3 Nzeri 2014, Musenyeri Alexis Kagame yashyikirijwe igihembo n’Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco cyiswe “Igihembo Cya Akademi", cyashyizweho hagamijwe gushima abantu bakora ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa mu kubungabunga ubusugire n’iterambere by’ururimi n’umuco by’u Rwanda.
Abantu 69 bamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga muri 280 basabye gusura ibice nyaburanga bitandukanye, nyuma y’uko ku wa 16 Kamena inama y’abaminitiri yemeje isubukurwa ry’ubukerarugendo bwo mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga ku bashyitsi baje mu ndege zihariye.
Abantu 69 bamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga muri 280 basabye gusura ibice nyaburanga bitandukanye, nyuma y’uko ku wa 16 Kamena inama y’abaminitiri yemeje isubukurwa ry’ubukerarugendo bwo mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga ku bashyitsi baje mu ndege zihariye.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo mu kigo cy’igihugu cy’iterambere (RDB), Belise Kaliza, yabwiye itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Gatanu ko hari abantu barimo n’abanyarwanda n’abandi baturage bo mu bihugu byo mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba baba mu Rwanda bagaragaje ko bashaka gusura Pariki y’Ibirunga n’izindi.
Yagize ati “Kuva twakongera gufungura ubukerarugendo mu cyumweru gishize, dufite abantu 69 bamaze gusaba mbere y’igihe (booking) gusura Pariki y’Ibirunga.
Muri Nyungwe ni bane, naho abamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Akagera ni 215, aho ejo hashize gusa bari 16".
U Rwanda ruherutse kugabanya ibiciro byo gusura ingagi, aho byagabanyijwe ku kigero cya 86% bigera ku $ 200 ku Banyarwanda na 67% ku banyamahanga batuye mu Rwanda biba $500, ku bandi hagumaho $1500 yasabwaga buri wese ukeneye kureba ingagi.
Ubusanzwe umuntu wese washakaga gusura ingagi yishyuraga amadolari ya Amerika 1500.
Ni ibiciro byashyizweho mu 2018 bivuye ku madolari 750.
Kaliza avuga ko iyi ari intambwe nziza mu korohereza abanyarwanda gusura ibyiza nyaburanga bitatse igihugu cyabo, abasaba kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe.
Ati “Urebye uko bihagaze, bimeze neza kandi twishimiye kuba twarashyizeho poromosiyo, turasaba abanyarwanda kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe".
Raporo y’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera, PSF, yagaragazaga ko muri Werurwe bwagize igihombo cya miliyari 34.
9 Frw, bivuye ku nama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe.
Ibi bihombo byaje bisanga urwego rw’ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda rufite inguzanyo za miliyari 87.
Kaliza avuga ko mu kuzahura uru rwego rw’ubukerarugendo “Icya mbere cyakozwe ari uko hagiyeho ikigega gifasha uru rwego, kongera gufungura ubukerarugendo hibandwa ku bw’imbere mu gihugu, gushyiraho poromosiyo kandi n’abakererugendo bo mu mahanga bagafungurirwa amarembo".
Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’abakora ibijyanye n’ubukerarugendo mu rugaga rw’abikorera, Frank Gisha Mugisha, yavuze ko biteguye kwakira abakerarugendo n’inama kandi hashyizweho ingamba zigendanye n’amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima yo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Yakomeje avuga kandi ko muri iki gihe cyo kuzahura urwego rw’ubukungu by’umwihariko ubukerarugendo, abanyamahoteli, abatwara ba mukerarugendo biyemeje kugabanya ibiciro kuko ari ingenzi kandi hari aho byatangiye gukorwa.
Ikigo Mantis Rwanda gifite Epic Hotel & Suites, Akagera Game Lodge na Kivu Marina Bay Hotel, kivuga ko kugeza mu mpera za Nyakanga 2020, nk’umuntu ashobora kwishyura ijoro rimwe muri hotel, irya kabiri akagabanyirizwa kuri 50%, cyangwa yakwishyura amajoro abiri akongezwa irya gatatu kuri hotel zacyo zose.
Muri ubwo buryo kandi ikigo gitanga serivisi z’indege nko ku bashaka gutembera u Rwanda cyangwa mu zindi gahunda, Akagera Aviation, cyo cyashyizeho igabanya rya 30%.
Nko kuva ku wa 1 Nyakanga kugeza ku wa 30 Nzeri 2020, abashaka gukora urugendo rw’amasaha abiri muri kajugujugu R44 y’imyanya itatu, igiciro cyavuye ku $1600 kiba $1120 naho muri A119 y’imyanya itandatu cyavuye ku $4000 kiba $2800.
Ku rugendo rw’iminota 30, igiciro cyavuye ku $500 ku ndege y’imyanya itatu kigera ku $350, naho ku y’imyanya itandatu kiva ku $1000 kigera ku $700.
Nk’urugendo rwo kuva i Kigali ukajya kureba inyamaswa muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera ugenda na kajugujugu y’imyanya itatu, igiciro cyavuye ku $1440 kigera ku $1008, mu y’imyanya itandatu kiva ku $3000 kigera ku $2100.

Guverinoma y’u Rwanda igeze kure gahunda igamije kuzahura ubukungu nyuma y’uko inzego hafi ya zose mu gihugu zigizweho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, kubera ibikorwa byafunzwe mu kwirinda ko gikwirakwira.

Ku Isi yose ubukungu bukomeje kuzahara ari nayo mpamvu za leta zafashe ingamba zitandukanye zo kwivana mu bibazo.
Nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziherutse gutangaza ko muri iki gihembwe hagati ya Mata na Kamena izaguza miliyari $2,999, kubera ihungabana ry’ibikorwa n’ingengo n’ingengo y’imari.
Banki y’Isi iherutse gukora ikigereranyo yerekana ko ubukungu bwa Afurika buzasubira inyuma mu buryo bukomeye ku nshuro ya mbere mu myaka 25 biturutse kuri Coronavirus.
Imibare ya Banki y’Isi yo kuwa 9 Mata igaragaza ko ubukungu bwo muri Afurika yo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara, bwagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus ndetse ko buzamanuka ku kigero cya -2.
1% buvuye kuri 2.
4% bwariho mu 2019.
Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Imari ku Isi, IMF, nacyo giherutse gutanga ikigereranyo ko umusaruro mbumbe w’Isi muri uyu mwaka uzamanuka ku mpuzandengo ya -3% naho uw’ubukungu bw’ibihugu byateye imbere kurusha ibindi bumanuke ku kigero cya -6%.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Ndagijimana Uzziel, ati “Ni ibintu bikomeye bidaheruka mu mateka y’Isi.
Muri Afurika yo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara, hateganyijwe ko ubukungu buzamanuka -1.
6% […] natwe rero birumvikana ko ubukungu bwacu butazagenda uko busanzwe buteganyijwe.
Dr Ndagijimana yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyagize ingaruka ku ngeri zose atanga urugero nko ku bukerarugendo aho amahoteli n’indege byahagaze mu kwirinda ko iki cyorezo cyakomeza gukwirakwira.
Raporo y’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera, PSF, iherutse kugaragaza ko muri Werurwe bwagize igihombo cya Miliyari 34.
9 Frw, bitewe n’inama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe.
Ibi bihombo byaje bisanga urwego rw’ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda rufite inguzanyo za miliyari 87.
7 Frw, aho urwego rw’amahoteli arirwo rwihariye inguzanyo nini kuko rufite izingana na miliyari 83.
Minisitiri Dr Ndagijimana yavuze ko ubu igipimo cy’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda kigaragaza ko butazazamuka ku kigero cya 8% nk’uko byari byitezwe, aho ubu imibare yagiye ivugururwa ikava kuri 5.
1%, nyuma biramanuka bigera kuri 3.
5% “ubu turi hafi kuri 2% nubwo bitari byarangira neza".
Yavuze ko ibi bipimo bidashingira ku buryo ubukungu bw’igihugu bumeze ahubwo harebwa no ku ruhando mpuzamahanga.
Ati “Uko ibintu bihinduka ku Isi, niko imibare igenda isubira inyuma".
Hagiye gutangizwa ikigega cya miliyari 100 Frw cyo mu kuzahura ubukungu
Mu ngamba zigamije kuzahura ubukungu, u Rwanda rwashyize ingufu mu buhinzi, hategurwa ibihembwe by’ihinga biri imbere ku buryo abahinzi bahabwa amafumbire n’imbuto kugira ngo hazaboneke umusaruro mwiza bityo igihugu gikomeze kwihaza mu biribwa kinasagurira amasoko.
Ikindi ni ukwihutisha imishinga yari yaratangiye itanga akazi, cyane iy’ibikorwa remezo, nk’inyubako n’ibindi.
Ati “Hari imishinga y’imihanda, iy’amazi, iy’amashanyarazi, kugira ngo amafaranga agere ku bantu".
Hari kandi gukomeza gushyira ingufu muri gahunda zo gufasha abatishoboye yaba mu kubaha imirimo, kubaha inkunga ku badashobora gukora n’inguzanyo iciriritse ishobora kwifashishwa mu gukora imirimo ibyara inyungu.
Indi gahunda yihariye igamije gufasha abashoramari n’abikorera mu byiciro bitandukanye bagizweho ingaruka n’iki cyorezo, aho leta yashyizeho gahunda yo gutangiza ikigega kibafasha kubona amafaranga yo gukoresha.
Ati “Ni ikigega cyafasha amabanki gutanga inguzanyo iciriritse yafasha ibyo byiciro byose kugira ngo bigaruke mu kazi byongere bikore, bibyare umusaruro uzagire ingaruka mu kuzamuka k’ubukungu muri rusange.
Yakomeje atangaza ko “Icyo kigega cyaranogejwe, harimo inkunga yihariye ku mahoteli kuko bigaragara ko ubukerarugendo bizamara igihe kugira ngo bwongere buzanzamuke kuko ntibiterwa n’uko ibihe byifashe mu Rwanda ahubwo uko byifashe ku Isi hose.
Dr Ndagijimana yavuze muri icyo kigega hashyizwemo ingamba zihariye zifasha amahoteli kuvugurura amasezerano y’inguzanyo afite mu mabanki akaba igihe kirekire n’inyungu zikagabanuka, ndetse ku buryo mu gihe yatangiye gufungura, abona amafaranga aciriritse kugira ngo imirimo yongere ikore.
Yavuze ko icyo kigega “kizafasha ubucuruzi ubwo aribwo bwose bwagizweho ingaruka, hari ibipimo bizagenderwaho kugira ngo ababirimo babone amafaranga aciriritse ku gihe cyiza noneho bongere bakore bihutishe imirimo".
Ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse nabyo biri mu bizahabwa inguzanyo n’ingwate kuko ingwate zikunze kuba ikibazo kuri bene ibyo byiciro.
Ni ikigega biteganyijwe ko gishobora kujyamo nka Miliyari 100 Frw avuye muri leta, ariko hagakomeza gushakwa n’abandi bashyiramo amafaranga kugira ngo cyaguke.
Ati “Turateganya ko mu gihe cy’icyumweru kimwe cyaba gitangiye".
Mu kugabanya icyuho kiri hagati y’ibyoherezwa mu mahanga n’ibitumizwayo, u Rwanda rurateganya gukomeza guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, abanyarwanda bagakangukira kubigura kugira ngo bisimbure ibyo hanze.
Leta ntiteganya kugabanya imirimo
Kuva icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyatangira, ibigo byinshi cyane iby’abikorera, byafashe ingamba zitandukanye zigamije gutuma bidafunga imiryango kubera igabanuka ry’amafaranga byinjizaga.
Ibyinshi byahagaritse abakozi, ibindi byumvikana nabo bagabanyirizwa imishahara.
Dr Ndagijimana avuga ko abikorera bagerageje guhangana n’iki cyorezo, ku buryo n’abagabanya imirimo n’imishahara, bagerageje kwita ku nyungu z’abakozi.
Ba nyakabyizi nibo Dr Ndagijimana asanga barahuye n’ikibazo gikomeye, ariko ko bishingiye ku ngamba leta yafashe mu kuzahura ubukungu, hari icyizere ko ibibazo bizakemuka vuba.
Yavuze ko nta gahunda ihari yo kuba leta yagabanya imirimo ati “turacyafite ubushobozi bwo guhemba abakozi".
Ku barimu, Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, yavuze ko aba leta bazakomeza guhembwa nk’abandi bakozi ariko ko ku bo mu mashuri yigenga bazafashwa binyuze mu buryo bwo koroshya inguzanyo n’ubundi bwashyizweho.
Tuyishimire Diogène uri mu bavugabutumwa bakunzwe mu Itorero rya ADEPR kubera amagambo y’ubuhanga akoresha mu nyigisho ze, yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana, ashyira hanze indirimbo ya mbere yise “Byanteye ubwoba".
Tuyishimire Diogène uri mu bavugabutumwa bakunzwe mu Itorero rya ADEPR kubera amagambo y’ubuhanga akoresha mu nyigisho ze, yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana, ashyira hanze indirimbo ya mbere yise “Byanteye ubwoba".
Izina rya Tuyishimire Diogène rirazwi cyane ariko rikunzwe by’umwihariko muri ADEPR.
Yamamaye cyane mu nyigisho avugamo uko Yesu afite imbaraga zidasanzwe, akamusanisha n’ibintu byose.
Agira ati “Nta kintu adasa nacyo.
Mu bana yabaye umwana w’Imana, mu bagabo aba umugabo w’abapfakazi, mu bapapa aba se w’imfubyi, mu biti aba umuzabibu w’ukuri mwe [abakirisitu] muri amashami…’’
Uyu muvugabutumwa yakuranye inzozi zo kuzaba umuhanzi ariko wibanda ku butumwa bufitiye akamaro sosiyete Nyarwanda.
Tuyishimire yakuze yiyumvamo cyane Hip hop ndetse indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘‘Byanteye ubwoba’’ icuranze muri iyo njyana.
Aganira na IGIHE Tuyishimire yavuze ko gusohora indirimbo ari inzozi ze zabaye impamo.
Ati ‘‘Nakuze nifuza kuba umuhanzi, igihe nyacyo cy’Imana nasanze ari iki ngo nsohore indirimbo yanjye ya mbere.
Mu ndirimbo ye avuga ko nubwo Isi irushya abantu ariko Imana izahindura byose bishya, akongera ati “Mu buzima nubwo tubabazwa ariko Imana izaduha guhozwa.
Yakomeje ati “Nashatse kugaragaza ko nubwo mu Isi umuntu ashobora kunyura mu buzima bukomeye ariko hari Imana ibuyobora; ubuzima bukomeye bugahinduka ubworoshye binyuze mu kwizera Imana.
“Byanteye ubwoba" ifite iminota itatu n’amasegonda 36 yakozwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Producer Trackslayer.
Tuyishimire yayiririmbye afatanyije na Dushimiyimana Emmanuel uzwi nka Manud na we ubarizwa muri ADEPR.
Yiyongereye ku bandi bahanzi bake bo mu itorero rya ADEPR baririmba mu njyana ya Hip hop.
Yashimangiye ko gukora umuziki muri Hip hop bidakwiye gufatwa nabi mu gihe atanga ubutumwa butomoye.
Yagize ati ‘‘Ubusanzwe nta njyana iva ku Mana, zose nizo abantu bihangiye, ziva mu bwenge bwabo.
Numva rero injyana atari ikibazo ahubwo ikibazo cyaba ubutumwa burimo.

Tuyishimire wo muri ADEPR
Mu mateka y’abakurambere mpangarwanda, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibirindiro, ikavugwa cyane ku bw’ibigwi n’ibirindiro yabaga yarakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari ikomokamo.
Mu mateka y’abakurambere mpangarwanda, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibirindiro, ikavugwa cyane ku bw’ibigwi n’ibirindiro yabaga yarakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari ikomokamo.
Muri iki gice tukaba tugiye kubimburira ku mateka y’igicumbi cy’umuryango mugari ufite inkomoko ku Mwami Yuhi Mazimpaka twifashishije igitabo “Iyororoka ry’Abanyarwanda, inkomoko y’imiryango migari ’’ dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu Busizi, Umuco n’Amateka y’u Rwanda.
Yuhi III Mazimpaka ni mwene Sekarongoro Gisanura cya Kigeli Nyamuheshera, Umunyiginya wo mu nzu y’Abaganzu na Nyamarembo ya Majinya, ukomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abakono, wategetse ahasaga mu wa 1642 kugeza mu wa 1675.
Ni umwami wa 18 muri 28 bategetse u Rwanda, akaba n’umwami wa 18 mu Berekeza 34 b’umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda, kugeza ubwo aya mateka yandikwaga.
Izina rye ry’ubutwari ryari “Insarikanamakuza.
Umwami Yuhi Mazimpaka ni umwe mu Bami b’u Rwanda bagize inzu z’imiryango nyinshi ugereranyije n’abandi bami, akaba akurikira Ndoba na we wagize inzu z’imiryango ntabarika.
Amateka atugaragariza ko Umwami Yuhi Mazimpaka ya Gisanura, yabyaye abana benshi, biganjemo abahungu 10 barimo Rwaka, Rujugira, Nyarwaya, Gakomba, Mureganshuro, Gapfizi, Mukungu, Mukuku, Rushara na Bukombe.
Umuryango w’Umwami Yuhi Mazimpaka wabayemo ingabo z’ibikongote ku ngoma ye n’iy’umuhungu we Cyilima Rujugira wamuzunguye ku ngoma.
Banabaye abagaba b’ingabo b’intahusha mu gihe cye.
Imitwe y’Ingabo yatwarwaga n’abahungu be, irimo Indara zatwarwagwa na Mukungu wa Yuhi Mzimpaka,
Inkoramaraso: Zatwarwaga na Mukungu wa Yuhi Mazimpaka
Abashahuzi: Batwarwaga na Nyarwaya Karuretwa wa Yuhi Mazimpaka
Ababaga: Batwarwaga na Nyarwaya Karuretwa wa Yuhi Mazimpaka
Ababanda: Batwarwaga na Nyarwaya Karuretwa wa Yuhi Mazimpaka
Inkuba: Zatwarwaga na Mureganshuro ya Yuhi Mazimpaka
Abakungu: Batwarwaga na Mureganshuro ya Yuhi Mazimpaka
Abatabaga: Batwarwaga na Yuhi Mazimpaka za Gisanura
Intaremba: Zatwarwaga na Yuhi Mazimpaka ya Gisanura
Hari n’ababaye abagaba b’ingabo ku ngoma y’umuhungu we akaba n’umuvandimwe wabo Cyilima Rujugira, aribo aba bakurikira:
Abakemba: Batwarwaga na Sharangabo ya Cyilima Rujugira,
Imvejuru: Zatwarwaga na Sharangabo ya Cyilima Rujugira,
Indirira (Rugamba): Zatwarwaga na Muciye ya Serutaro rwa Mukuku wa Mazimpaka,
Abarima: Batwarwaga na Mitunga ya Cyilima Rujugira n’umugabo we Seruhuga,
Abatanyagwa: Batwarwaga na Gihana cya Cyilima Rujugira,
Intarindwa: Zatwarwaga na Ndabarasa ba Cyilima Rujugira,
Ababito: Batwarwaga na Ndabarasa ba Cyilima Rujugira,
Indara: Zatwarwaga na Cyilima Rujugira rwa Yuhi Mazimpaka,
Ababanda: Batwarwaga na Cyilima Rujugira rwa Yuhi Mazimpaka
Aba bagabo b’Intarumikwa, ni bo babaye inkomoko y’inzu z’imiryango zo kwa  Mazimpaka zikomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya.
Inzu z’imiryango zikomoka kwa Yuhi Mazimpaka ni izi zikurikira:
Abanyiginya b’ABAKA bakomoka kuri Karemera Rwaka rwa Yuhi Mazimpaka
