Urwego rw’ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda rwanzuye kwerekeza amaso ku isoko ry’imbere mu gihugu mu rwego rwo kwizahura no guhangana n’ingaruka ruzasigirwa n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Urwego rw’ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda rwanzuye kwerekeza amaso ku isoko ry’imbere mu gihugu mu rwego rwo kwizahura no guhangana n’ingaruka ruzasigirwa n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Urwego rw’ubukeraugendo mu Rwanda ni rumwe mu zari zifashe cyane ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Benshi mu bakiliya barwo akenshi babaga ari abanyamahanga ariko ingamba zashyizweho zo kwirinda coronavirus zishobora gukoma mu nkokora urwo rwego, kuko abakerarugendo mpuzamahanga bizatwara igihe ngo batangire kugaruka.
Gahunda yo kuzahura ubukungu iri gutegurwa n’urwego rw’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli mu Rwanda, iragaragaza ko imbaraga nyinshi zigiye gushyirwa mu bukerarugendo bw’imbere mu gihugu guhera muri Gicurasi 2020 kugeza mu Ukuboza 2021.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’abibumbye ryita ku bukerarugendo, rivuga ko umubare w’abakerarugendo mpuzamahanga ushobora kuzagabanyuka ku kigero kiri hagati ya 60 na 80%.
Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, East African Business Council, EABC) rugaragaza ko muri EAC nibura miliyari eshanu z’amadolari yagombaga kwinjizwa n’ubukerarugendo azagabanuka mu 2020 kubera icyo cyorezo, mu gihe abakerarugendo bagera kuri miliyoni 6.
2 bagombaga kuza gusura akarere bashobora kugabanuka.
Izo mbogamizi zose zizagira ingaruka ku rwego rw’ubukerarugendo rw’imbere mu gihugu, ariyo mpamvu hakenewe kuvugurura ibiciro kugira ngo byorohere Abanyarwanda.
Gahunda yo kuzahura urwego rw’ubukerarugendo iri gutegurwa, igira iti “Nubwo bimwe mu bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bisanzwe bihendutse kandi hari igabanyirizwa ku bantu b’imbere mu gihugu, hakenewe irindi gabanywa ry’ibiciro.
Nk’ibiciro byo gusura ingagi byari biri hejuru cyane cyane ku baturage b’imbere mu Rwanda, mu korohereza no gushishikariza benshi kubyitabira kugabanya ibiciro birakenewe.
Muri iyo nyigo nshya kandi irashishikariza guteza imbere abantu bagiye mu bukerarugendo bukozwe mu matsinda, bakagabanyirizwa.
Aho harimo kandi no kugabanyirizwa ku bashaka gusura ibice runaka nyaburanga mu bihe byihariye by’umwaka.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) kizakorana n’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu rugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda, kugira ngo hanozwe inyigo yakurikizwa mu kugabanya ibihombo urwego rw’ubukerarugendo ruri guhura nabyo.
Amahoteli kandi aragirwa inama yo kugabanyiriza ibiciro abayagana b’abanyarwanda, abaturutse mu bihugu byo mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba n’abo mu bihugu bigize Umuryango w’Ubumwe bwa’Afurika.
Iyo nyigo ivuga ko hari amahoteli amwe kugira ngo areshye abakiliya b’imbere mu gihugu, bizaba ngombwa ko agabanya igiciro ku kigero cya 80 %.
Imbaraga kandi zizashyirwa mu bukangurambaga bugamije kureshya abakerarugendo b’imbere mu gihugu ariko hatirengagijwe ireme ry’isura y’u Rwanda mu ruhando mpuzamahanga.
Raporo y’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera, PSF, igaragaza ko muri Werurwe bwagize igihombo cya miliyari 34.
9 Frw, bivuye ku nama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe, kubera ingamba zafashwe mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Tariki ya 26 Kamena 2003, Marc-Vivien Foé ari mu bakinnyi Cameroun yifashishije ikina na Colombia muri ½ cya FIFA Confederation Cup mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Garland i Lyon mu Bufaransa.
Tariki ya 26 Kamena 2003, Marc-Vivien Foé ari mu bakinnyi Cameroun yifashishije ikina na Colombia muri ½ cya FIFA Confederation Cup mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Garland i Lyon mu Bufaransa.
Yari yiteguye kwegukana igikombe dore ko yari yaragize uruhare rukomeye mu gufasha ikipe ye kugera muri iki cyiciro kibanziriza umukino wa nyuma, aho yari yatsinze Brésil na Turikiya mu mikino ibanza.
Ntibyakunze ko arangiza umukino kuko mu buryo butunguranye, mu gice cya kabiri, uyu mugabo wari ufite imyaka 28 yaguye mu kibuga nta wundi muntu begeranye.
Marc-Vivien Foé yarabiranye ari hafi mu kibuga hagati.
Nubwo yahawe ubuvuzi bwihuse, Foé yitabye Imana nyuma yaho gato, Isi y’umupira w’amaguru ijya mu cyunamo.
Nyuma y’ibizamini bibiri by’isuzuma byakorewe umurambo we, hagaragajwe ko icyateye uru rupfu rutunguranye ari uguhagarara k’umutima.
Mu gihe kigera hafi ku myaka 10 yakinnye, uyu Munya-Cameroun yakiniye amakipe ya Lens na Olympique Lyon mu Bufaransa, atwara Shampiyona n’Igikombe cy’Igihugu inshuro ebyiri.
Yakinnye kandi inshuro ebyiri muri Premier League, bwa mbere muri West Ham United naho nyuma akinira Manchester City ubwo yari yaratijwe akaba ari nabwo yapfuye.
Marc-Vivien Foé yari umukinnyi ngenderwaho mu Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Cameroun, yayikiniye imikino 62.
Amakipe yose yakiniye yashyize amafoto ye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga mu rwego rwo kumwibuka.
Marc-Vivien Foé
1 May 1975 - 26 June 2003

Urugero rw’imiterere y’umugabo
Umusore w’imyaka 24 ukora imyitozo ngororamubiri buri umunsi, ujya mu mbyumba byabugenewe agaterura ibiremereye (Gym) ntazagira umubiri umwe nk’umugabo ufite imyaka 62 uhora wicaye mu biro aho amara amasaha arenze umunani buri umunsi.
Bitewe n’uko imibiri yabo idateye kimwe nta nubwo bakwiye kwambara kimwe ahubwo buri wese akwiriye kureba imyambaro ijyanye n’imiterere ye mbere y’uko areba igezweho cyangwa se ifite amabara akunda.
Irindi banga ni uko buri wese akwiriye kumenya umubiri we neza ndetse akamenya icyamubera n’ikitamubera bityo mu ihitamo ry’umwambaro ari bwambare akagendera ku mwenda umwerekana uko yifuza kugaragara.

Ijambo ‘‘balkanisation’’ rimaze kuba intero n’inyikirizo mu mvugo y’abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, kuva Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yatorerwa kuyobora iki gihugu.

Aba batifuza ko amahoro agaruka muri RDC, bakomeje guhimba ikinyoma ko u Rwanda rushaka kwigarura Uburasirazuba bwayo, bagamije kubiba urwango ku Banyarwanda n’Abanye-Congo bavuga Ikinyarwanda.
Ibivugwa bisa no kureba filimi mbarankuru y’intambara zabaye mu kinyejana cya 20 mu Burayi bw’Amajyepfo, mu gace kiswe ‘les Balkans’, ubu kigizwe n’ibihugu nka Bulgarie, Croatie, u Bugiriki, Roumanie, Slovénie, Albanie, Bosnie-Herzégovine, Kosovo, Macédoine y’Amajyaruguru, Monténégro, Serbie na Turquie; byari byarigaruriwe n’Ubwami bw’Abami bwa Ottoman, bukabiremamo uduhugu twinshi.
Igitandukanye muri uyu mwaka wa 2020, ni uko ibi bivugirwa mu mihanda ya Kinshasa, aho ababiyoboye badakomoka muri Hongrie cyangwa Turikiya, bahora baririmba bati ‘‘balkanisation ntikabe kuri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Mu Karere k’Ibiyaga Bigari, ijambo ‘balkanisation’ ryatangiye kuhumvikana mu mpera y’imyaka ya 1990, ubwo u Rwanda na Uganda byateraga icyahoze cyitwa Zaïre.
Abazayirwa bari bafite ubwoba ko abaturanyi babo babiri bagiye kwisubiza ibice bahoranye mbere y’uko Abanyaburayi bigabagabanya Afurika, ariko ntibyigeze biba.
Iyi mitekerereze yongeye kumvikana nyuma y’aho Joseph Kabila agiriye ku butegetsi mu 2001.
Abamurwanya bavugaga ko afite inkomoko mu Rwanda kandi akaba afite uruhare mu mugambi mpuzamahanga wo gucamo ibice RDC, ibice byayo by’Uburasirazuba bikize ku mabuye y’agaciro bikomekwa ku Rwanda.
Kujya ku butegetsi kwa Félix Tshisekedi bigaragara ko ntacyo byahinduye.
Ubu iyo ntero n’inyikirizo biri kuzamurwa n’Ihuriro ry’Amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi ya Lamuka ririmo na Martin Fayulu watsinzwe mu matora y’umukuru w’igihugu aheruka.
Ibyavuye mu matora yari ahanganiyemo na Félix Tshisekedi byagaragaje ko yabaye uwa kabiri ariko Inama nkuru ya Kiliziya Gatolika muri RDC yo yavuze ko ariwe watsinze.
Yaba Lamuka na Kiliziya ntibigeze bemera ko Fayulu yatsinzwe.
Kubiba urwango
Ku ruhande rwe nka Perezida watowe, Félix Tshisekedi, yahisemo kuzahura umubano w’igihugu cye n’u Rwanda, mbere yo kohereza umubare w’ingabo za Congo mu Burasirazuba bw’igihugu ngo zijye kurwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro yahagize akarima kayo.
Ubu Ingabo za Congo (FARDC) zimaze kwigarurira ibice byinshi byari byarayogojwe n’iyo mitwe; ku buryo n’iyo gahunda yo kwigarurira ibice bya RDC iyo iza kuba ihari, icyizere cyayo ubu kiri kubarirwa ku busa.
Abarwanya ubutegetsi mu RDC bahisemo kubiba urwango ku Banyarwanda n’Abanye-Congo bavuga Ikinyarwanda kugira ngo bace intege umubano mwiza uri kubagarirwa hagati y’u Rwanda na RDC.
Ariko n’ubundi abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi nta nyungu bafite mu kuba amahoro yagaruka muri RDC.
Mu myaka 25 ishize, ikibazo cy’umutekano muke mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC cyafashije abari abami b’intambara kwigwizaho imitungo no kwinjira mu bikorwa bya politiki cyangwa igisirikare.
Urugero rwa hafi ni umutwe wa ADF-Nalu ukomoka muri Uganda, wigize nka ba kavukire, ukaba uterwa inkunga n’uwahoze ari umunyapolitiki ku butegetsi bwa Kabila, Mbusa Nyamwisi, ubu wituriye muri Uganda.
Uyu Mbusa Nyamwisi yanahoze ari mu ihuriro Lamuka, nyuma aza kwitandukanya naryo.
Mu gihe RDC iri kugerageza kwivana mu ntambara imaze imyaka irenga 20, cyane cyane hashingiwe ku mibanire myiza n’abaturanyi bo mu Burasirazuba, abarwanya ubutegetsi bakomeje kubiba urwango ku Banyarwanda, ariko si n’Abanyarwanda, ahubwo ni abo bita ko bakomoka mu bwoko bw’Abatutsi n’Abanye-Congo bavuga Ikinyarwanda mu rwego rwo guca intege umubano mwiza hagati y’u Rwanda na RDC.
Igitangaje ni uko imvugo ya ‘‘balkanisation’’ ari ikirego kidafite ishingiro.
Mu gihe Umuhuzabikorwa w’Ihuriro ry’abatavuga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi, Lamuka, wanahoze ari Minisitiri w’Intebe, Adolphe Muzito, yagaragaje mu buryo bweruye ko ashaka gutera u Rwanda byanashoboka bakarwomeka kuri RDC; uyu ni na we ushinja u Rwanda kugambirira kwigarurira ibice by’igihugu cye.
Nubwo bashinje Joseph Kabila gufatanya n’u Rwanda muri uwo mugambi akiri ku butegetsi, ubu bakaba bageze kuri Félix Tshisekedi, ubwabo bigeze gukorana n’u Rwanda mu bihe byatambutse.
Ibi bigaragaza ikinyoma gikomeye kandi cyumvikana.
Byongeye kandi muri gahunda y’ubuhahirane busesuye mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe n’ubusabe bwa RDC bwo kwinjira mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Uburasirazuba (EAC), bigaragara ko kwigarurira ubutaka bw’ikindi gihugu byaba ari amafuti.
Aho gutanga ibisubizo by’ibibazo nyabyo Abanye-Congo bafite ubu nk’ubushomeri, kutagira inganda zihagije no kwangiza ibikorwa remezo, kwangirika kw’ibikorwaremezo n’ibindi bishobora gusunikira urubyiruko rudafite akazi kwishora mu byaha cyangwa kwinjira mu mitwe yitwaje intwaro, […] abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi muri RD Congo bahisemo gushyushya imitwe y’abaturage babo bakoresheje imitekerereze ishaje.
Gukoma mu nkokora u Rwanda cyangwa ikindi gihugu cyo mu Karere ntibyongera umusaruro; ntibirema imirimo kandi ntibinazana ubukungu.
Abavuga ‘‘balkanisation’’ ntibigeze bakandagiza ikirenge ku mupaka uhuza u Rwanda na RDC, umwe mu inyurwaho na benshi ku Isi; ntibigeze byibura banumva ubuhamya bw’abagore bahakorera ubucuruzi, bahambukira inshuro nyinshi ku munsi bashaka imibereho.
Ubukungu nyabwo bwa RDC ni abaturage bayo.
Muri Afurika yose, umutungo kamere ubyarira inyungu ibigo mpuzamahanga biwubyaza umusaruro n’abayobozi bamwe na bamwe bahabwa utuvungukira n’icyizere cyo kubarindira ubutegetsi bwabo.
Ku ngoma ya Félix Tshisekedi, RDC ifite amahirwe yo guhinduka igihugu kirimo amahoro kandi gitera imbere; ariko kugira ngo ibyo bigerweho birasaba ko bigirwamo uruhare n’impande zitandukanye zigize ubukungu nyabwo bwa RDC.

Umuhanzi w’imideli ukomeye ku Isi, Laduma Ngxokolo, yatumiwe i Kigali mu gikorwa cyiswe “Collective Rw Week of Fashion" azerekaniramo imideli akora ndetse hakanagaragazwa intera abakora umwuga nk’uwe bagezeho mu Rwanda.
Laduma Ngxokolo ukomoka muri Afurika y’Epfo mu gace ka Port Elizabeth, ni umwe mu bahanzi b’imideli bakomeye muri Afurika umaze no kumenyekana hirya no hino ku Isi bitewe n’umwimerere agaragaza mu myambaro akora ndetse no kwambika abantu b’ibyamamare batandukanye.
Laduma yamenyekanye cyane biturutse ku nzu ya "Maxhosa" yashinze muri 2010, ikora imideli y’ubudodo igaragaramo uruvangitirane rw’amabara atandukanye agaragaza ubwiza n’umwimerere w’ibyo ahanga.
Igikorwa cya “Collective Rw Week of Fashion" uyu muhanzi w’imideli yatumiwemo kizamara icyumweru, kizabera Camp Kigali, ku wa 10 Kamena 2017.
Hazerekanwa imideli itandukanye yiganjemo ikorerwa mu Rwanda ndetse n’iyakozwe na Laduma.
Umuyobozi w’itsinda ritegura iki gikorwa, Manzi Munana Derick, yabwiye IGIHE ko imyiteguro ikomeye y’iki gikorwa bayirangije igisigaye akaba ari ukwakira uyu muhanzi w’imideli ufite ibigwi akambika n’Abanyarwanda bakora umwuga wo kumurika imideli.
Ati “Kuzana umuhanzi w’imideli uzwi ku isi ku rwego nk’urwe, ni byiza cyane kuko bituma uruganda rw’imideli rutera imbere kandi rukavugwa hose, tutiyibagije ko azambika abana b’Abanyarwanda bakora akazi ko kwerekana imideli.
Iki gikorwa cya “Collective Rw Week of Fashion" kizerekanirwamo imideli y’inzu icumi zikomeye mu Rwanda ari zo Haute-Baso, Inzuki Designs, House Of Tayo, Sonia Mugabo, UZI Collections, Moshions, Amizero, Ikwiize, Maxhosa ya Laduma na AFRIEK yo mu Buholandi.
Ibikorwa bya Laduma byagiye bishimwa n’abantu bakomeye ku rwego mpuzamahanga barimo n’umuririmbyi Beyonce.
Imyambaro ikorwa n’uyu mugabo inambarwa na Jidenna waririmbye ’Classic Man’.
Yagiye yegukana ibihembo bitandukanye birimo icya Design Indaba cyitwa "Most Beautiful Object in South Africa", "Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University Rising Star Award", "Best Emerging Designer Award", "Marie Claire Prix D’Excellence" n’icya "ASFA" yatwaye mu mwaka ushize nk’umuhanzi mwiza w’imideli w’umwaka mu bakorera mu bihugu byo muri Afurika y’Amajyepfo.
Nyuma yo kwerekana imideli akora mu nzu ya “Maxhosa" mu mijyi itandukanye ku Isi irimo Milan, Toyko, New York, Paris na London, ubu Laduma Ngxokolo amaso ayahanze i Kigali.
Abagenzi batega imodoka ziva mu i Rango zerekeza muri Gare Mpuzamahanga ya Huye mu Karere ka Huye bavuga ko batewe impungenge n’uko hatashyizweho uburyo bwo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19, bagasaba ko inzego zibishinzwe zabyitaho.
Abagenzi batega imodoka ziva mu i Rango zerekeza muri Gare Mpuzamahanga ya Huye mu Karere ka Huye bavuga ko batewe impungenge n’uko hatashyizweho uburyo bwo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19, bagasaba ko inzego zibishinzwe zabyitaho.
Kugeza ubu imodoka zitwara abagenzi muri utwo duce nta buryo zashyizeho bwo kwirinda COVID-19 kuko umugenzi winjiye mu modoka atabanza gukarabywa intoki ndetse nta buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu kwishyura bukoreshwa kuko bishyuzwa bahererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki.
Izo modoka ziva mu i Rango zikanyura i Tumba zigakomeza ku Mukoni zerekeza mu Mujyi wa Huye rwagati zigakomereza muri Gare ya Huye.
Bamwe mu bagenzi bazitega babwiye IGIHE ko n’ubwo baba bambaye udupfukamunwa batewe impungenge n’uko izo modoka zishobora gukwirakwiza icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus.
Umwe ati “Muri taxi batwereka imyanya tugomba kwicaramo n’iyo tutagomba kwicaramo ariko iyo winjiye ya alcool ntayo baguha.
Urinjira ukicara komvwayeri akaza kukwishyuza wagera iyo ujya ukavamo.
Ibiceri n’inoti byose tubiherekanya mu ntoki ndetse n’iyo abuze ayo akugarurira aragenda akajya kuvunjisha akagaruka akakugarurira.
Abagenzi baganiriye n’umunyamakuru basaba inzego zibishinzwe kwiga kuri iki kibazo kuko bafite impungenge ko Coronavirus igeze mu Karere ka Huye yakwirakwira vuba.
Undi ati “Impungenge ziba zihari kuko iyo tugenda duhererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki gutyo kiba ari ikibazo ariko nka kuriya bari bafashe ingamba ngo aho umuntu ageze hose ajye akaraba intoki, taxi yo nta mazi ahari ariko byibura bagombye kugira n’iyo alcool wakwinjira ugakaraba intoki wanasohoka ugakaraba.
Mu byifuzo byabo basaba ko inzego zibishinzwe zabikurikirana nk’uko zikurukirana abantu zireba ko bambaye udupfukamunwa.
Ati “Muri taxi ntabwo byubahirizwa, izo ngamba zagombye kubahirizwa nk’uko kwambara agapfukamunwa byubahirizwa, umugenzi akinjira mu modoka akarabijwe na alcohol yajya gusohoka nabwo agakaraba ndetse bakajya banishyura hakoresheje ikoranabuhanga.
Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE na we yateze imodoka inshuro zirenze imwe ashaka kwirebera ko ibivugwa n’abagenzi ari byo asanga koko bavugisha ukuri.
Yagerageje kuvugisha abashoferi n’abakomwayeri bishyuza abagenzi ariko barabyanga.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera, yabwiye IGIHE ko icyo kibazo batari bakizi ariko bagiye kugikurikirana kigakemuka byihuse.
Ati “Ayo ni amakosa bakora ntabwo byemewe tugiye kubikurikirana.
Ni kenshi abatwara ibinyabiziga bihanangirizwa ku kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19 kuko bahura n’abagenzi benshi bikaba byatuma gikwirakwira vuba.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iherutse gutangaza ko kwishyura urugendo kuri moto cyangwa mu modoka hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga, usibye ko birinda ikwirakwira bya COVID-19 bifasha no kumenya abagenzi bashobora kuba banduye kuko imyirondoro yabo ihita iboneka muri telefone y’uwari utwaye ikinyabiziga.

Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa by’urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze.
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa by’urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze.
Iyi korali yashinzwe ku wa 15 Gashyantare 1995, yatangijwe n’abantu 18.
Izina ryayo ryamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘‘Nta kibasha’’, ‘‘Witinya’’, ‘‘Turiho ku bw’ubuntu’’, ‘‘Urakomeye’’ na ‘‘Icyampa’’.
Mu kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze ishinzwe, Korali Iriba yatangije ibikorwa byagutse byiswe “IribaWeek" bibanziriza ibyo birori biteganyijwe ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020.
Korali Iriba yinjiye mu cyumweru cy’ibikorwa bibimburira isabukuru y’imyaka 25 biteganyijwe ku 3-9 Gashyantare 2020.
Ni icyumweru cyateguwemo ibikorwa byo kubakira ubwiherero imiryango itanu itishoboye n’ibindi bikorwa by’urukundo.
Abajijwe impamvu bahisemo kubakira abatishoboye, Umuyobozi wa Korali Iriba, Mukasine Jeanne D’arc, yavuze ko bifuje kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa.
Yagize ati “Twahisemo noneho kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa kuko binazamura imibereho y’abantu, iki gikorwa kizakomeza n’ibindi twateguye.
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa 15 Gashyantare, Korali Iriba izagira umwiherero wo gushima Imana, naho ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020 kuva saa Munani, ikore igitaramo cy’amashimwe akubiye muri Zaburi ya 107, kizabera ku rusengero rwa ADEPR Taba mu Karere ka Huye.
Abazacyitabira bazataramirwa na Korali Iriba ifatanyije na Korali Itabaza.
Umuvugabutumwa uzakibwirizamo ni Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Karuranga Ephrem.
Mu myaka 25, Korali Iriba ishima buri wese wagize uruhare mu kugira ngo umurimo ukomeze gutera imbere.
Korali Iriba igizwe n’abarenga 130 bari mu byiciro bitandukanye biganjemo abatuye mu duce two mu Mujyi wa Huye turimo Matyazo no ku Itaba n’abakorera mu bindi bice by’igihugu.
Mu myaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa, Korali Iriba yashyize hanze album enye z’amajwi n’eshatu z’amashusho.
Urukiko rw’i Paris kuri uyu wa Mbere rwahamije François Fillon wahoze ari Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bufaransa n’umugore we Penelope, ibyaha byo kunyereza umutungo wa Leta babinyjjije mu guhimba imirimo itabaho.
Urukiko rw’i Paris kuri uyu wa Mbere rwahamije François Fillon wahoze ari Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bufaransa n’umugore we Penelope, ibyaha byo kunyereza umutungo wa Leta babinyjjije mu guhimba imirimo itabaho.
François Fillon yashinjwaga kwishyura umugore we asaga miliyoni y’amayero ku mirimo umugore we yagiye akora ari umwungiriza we kandi iyo mirimo atarigeze ayikora.
Ayo manyanga yatangiye kumenyekana mu 2017 ubwo Fillon yashakaga guhatanira kuyobora u Bufaransa, biza gutuma atakarizwa icyizere, hatsinda Emmanuel Macron.
Ikinyamakuru Canard Enchainé muri Mutarama 2017 cyatangaje ko Penelope yamaze imyaka 15 agaragara mu bakozi ba Leta nk’umwungiriza wa Fillon mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, biza kumenyekana ko nta kintu na kimwe kigaragaza ko hari akazi yahakoze.
François Fillon yabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bufaransa hagati ya 2007 na 2012.
Ibyaha Fillon yahamijwe biteganyirijwe igifungo gishobora kugera ku myaka itanu.
Ushobora kuyita intambara y’iminsi itandatu.
Impamvu si uko yamaze iminsi itandatu gusa ingabo z’u Rwanda ziha isomo iza Uganda (UPDF), haniyongeraho ko ihuza amatariki neza n’intambara y’iminsi itandatu Israel yamaze ihata ikibatsi ingabo z’ibihugu by’Abarabu.
Ushobora kuyita intambara y’iminsi itandatu.
Impamvu si uko yamaze iminsi itandatu gusa ingabo z’u Rwanda ziha isomo iza Uganda (UPDF), haniyongeraho ko ihuza amatariki neza n’intambara y’iminsi itandatu Israel yamaze ihata ikibatsi ingabo z’ibihugu by’Abarabu.
Hano itandukaniro ry’uko amateka y’u Rwanda ari ay’ejo bundi mu 2000, mu gihe aya Israel hari mu 1967.
Mu cyumweru nk’iki mu 2000, by’umwihariko uhereye tariki ya 5 kugera tariki ya 10 Kamena, ingabo z’u Rwanda zasakiranye n’iza Uganda, UPDF ihahurira n’uruva gusenya.
Amateka y’umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda ushatse wayahera mu 1981-1986 ubwo Yoweri Museveni yari mu rugamba rwakuyeho ubutegetsi bwa Milton Obote.
Igisirikare cyamufashije cyarimo ahanini impunzi z’Abanyarwanda barimo na Perezida Paul Kagame wayoboye ubutasi icyo gihe ndetse akanaza kuyobora urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda nyuma y’urupfu rwa Fred Rwigema wishwe rugikubita.
Kuba abanyarwanda bafashije Yoweri Museveni kugera ku butegetsi baratangije urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda baturutse muri Uganda byatumye Museveni yishyiramo ko u Rwanda igihugu cye kirufiteho ijambo, mbese ko ba basirikare bari muri NRA bazakomeza guhabwa amategeko aturutse i Kampala n’igihe bageze mu gihugu cy’inkomoko.
Nyuma yo kubohora u Rwanda no guhagarika Jenoside, Inkotanyi zamenesheje abayikoraga bahungira mu mashyamba ya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo yitwaga Zaire, hakurikiraho urugamba rwo gucyura impunzi zari zarabaye ingwate yabo muri ayo mashyamba.
Uganda yatumiwe muri urwo rugamba nk’inshuti ariko igahora ishaka ko ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa by’Ingabo z’u Rwanda biyitirirwa, mu gihe Abanyarwanda bagejeje Museveni ku butegetsi bo ayo mateka bari barayasize i Kampala.
Imvano y’intambara ya Kisangani
Nyuma haje urugamba rwo gukuraho Mobutu Sese Seko no kugeza Kabila ku butegetsi.
U Rwanda rwafatanyije na Uganda ariko icyo gihugu kiza kwibanda cyane ku gusahura imitungo kamere, kandi mu mutwe kigahorana ko ahari Umunyarwanda n’umunya-Uganda, umuturanyi wo mu majyaruguru aza mbere.
Mu Ntambara ya II ya Congo, Ingabo za Uganda zaritabiriye ariko RDF ifata bwangu imijyi itandukanye mu Burasirazuba n’Amajyepfo y’Iburasirazuba bwa RDC harimo Umujyi wa Kisangani n’ikibuga cy’indege cya Bangoka giherereye ku bilometero 12 mu nkengero zawo.
UPDF ku rundi ruhande yo yibanze ku duce dukungahaye ku mabuye y’agaciro two mu Majyaruguru y’Iburasirazuba bwa RDC.
Mu gihe imirwano yari ihagaritswe by’agateganyo, UPDF nta mujyi yari yagafashe wo kuba igumyemo.
Abayobozi b’ingabo za Uganda basabye u Rwanda kubaha Kisangani kubera ko rwari rufite n’indi mijyi nka Goma, Bukavu, Kindu, Uvira n’indi.
Abayobozi b’ingabo z’u Rwanda barabyanga.
Icyo gisubizo ntabwo cyakiriwe neza n’abayobozi b’ingabo za Uganda.
Mu nama yabereye i Goma yarimo uwari uhagarariye Mwalimu Julius Nyerere, Kahinda Otafiire wari ukuriye itsinda rya Uganda mu biganiro, yabwiye itsinda ry’u Rwanda ati “muraduha Kisangani cyangwa twembi tuyibure.
Nk’uko Colonel Akhram Hossein wo mu ngabo za Loni yabitangarije Ikinyamakuru Liberation, mu rukerera rwo ku wa 05 Kanama 2000 nibwo ingabo za Uganda zigera ku 7000 zitwaje ibitwaro biremereye, zatunguye iz’u Rwanda zizimishaho ibisasu.
Kuva ubwo rurambikana, Igisirikare cy’u Rwanda gikora ku ntwaro zacyo kirasa kitababariye ingabo za Uganda, gitwika ibifaru bya UPDF karahava, ingabo za Uganda zihatakariza abasirikare babarwa ko bageraga mu 2000.
Muri iyo mirwano, Ingabo za Uganda zaharaniraga kwambuka ikiraro kiri ku mugezi wa Tshopo gitandukanya Kisangani y’Amajyepfo yarimo Ingabo z’u Rwanda n’iy’Amajyaruguru yarimo iza Uganda, ariko ingabo z’u Rwanda zizibera ibamba.
Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru, Col Karenzi Karake (ubu ni Rtd Lieutenant General) wari uyoboye Ingabo z’u Rwanda i Kisangani, yabwiye The Washington Post ku wa 12 Kanama 2000, ko ibyabaye hagati y’ingabo z’ibihugu byombi nta gishimishije kirimo.
Yakomeje ati “Ariko ni bo baturasheho.
Twatsinze urugamba kuko abasirikare bacu bazi icyo barwanira.
Tugiye gusohoka muri Kisangani tutitaye ku byo Abanya-Uganda bashaka.
Icyo gihe yari amaze kwitegereza toni z’ibisasu, imbunda n’ibindi bikoresho ingabo za Uganda zari zimaze kuhasiga zihunga.
Umunsi urugamba rwahagaze, Gen James Kazini wari uyoboye Ingabo za Uganda i Kisangani yabanje guhamagara Col Karenzi ku cyombo amusaba ko imirwano yahagarara, ndetse Ingabo za Uganda zisubira inyuma ibilometero bisaga icumi hanze ya Kisangani.
Col Danilo Paiva wo mu ngabo za Loni i Kisangani, ni we watangaje bwa nyuma ko agahenge kabonetse, nyuma y’ubuhuza bwa Perezida wa Zambia, Frederic Chiluba wari ukubutse Kampala na Kigali kubonana na ba Perezida Museveni na Paul Kagame bakaganira ku buryo haboneka umuti urambye kuri aya makimbirane.
Kuva iyo ntambara yarangira mu myaka 19 ishize, Museveni ahorana ikidodo ku bisobanuro yasabwa ku bana ba Uganda yashoye mu ntambara idafututse akanayitsindwa, abanya-Uganda bakahagwa ari benshi.
Ibi byatumye arushaho kwijundika ibi bya cyane u Rwanda.
Uganda yasabye u Bwongereza inkunga yo gutera u Rwanda
Ku wa 28 Kanama 2000 nibwo Museveni yandikiye Umunyamabanga wa Leta w’u Bwongereza ushinzwe iterambere mpuzamahanga, Claire Short, ibaruwa amusaba ko Uganda yahabwa inkunga yisumbuye ikava kuri Miliyoni 113$ ikagera kuri Miliyoni 139 z’Amadolari, mu rwego rwo kwigaranzura igisirikare cy’u Rwanda.
Muri urwo rwandiko, Uganda yavugaga ko u Rwanda rwamaze gutegura umutwe w’ingabo ugizwe n’abasirikare 100.
000 wo guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Museveni.
Ibi ariko uwari Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda, Ambasaderi André Bumaya yabiteye utwatsi, abwira PanaPress ikorera i Dakar muri Senegal ko ahubwo ari Uganda yari mu macenga yo gushaka gutera u Rwanda.
Yagize ati “Ntituri mu myiteguro yo gutera Uganda na mba, u Rwanda rushishikajwe no gukemura ibibazo rwasigiwe na jenoside, bityo rero nta mwanya rufite wo kurwana intambara z’amafuti".
Uganda yakurikijeho guhimba ikinyoma cy’uko u Rwanda rwateraga inkunga umutwe wa PRA (People’s Redemption Army), byavugwaga ko wari uyobowe na Col Samson Mande na Antony Kyakabale ngo bashakaga guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
Museveni ntarakira ugutsindwa
Mu kiganiro kirekire Perezida Kagame yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru Jeune Afrique cyasohotse ku wa 23 Werurwe 2019 ubwo yaganiraga n’Umunyamakuru François Soudan, yabajijwe niba bidashoboka ko Museveni yaba atarakira kuba Ingabo z’u Rwanda zaratsindiye ize i Kisangani mu myaka 20 ishize.
Aha yashingiraga ku bushotoranyi budasiba bwa Uganda ku Rwanda, burimo n’iyicarubozo rikomeje gukorerwa abaturage barwo muri icyo gihugu cy’abaturanyi.
Mu gusubiza yagize ati “ Twabatsinze ubugira gatatu, ni ukuri, ahari ushobora kuba ufite ukuri.
Ariko nta gushidikanya hari ibindi bisobanuro.
Ubushake bwo gushaka kugenzura u Rwanda, kuducisha bugufi?
Birashoka.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko yubaha Museveni nka Perezida wa Uganda ariko ‘ntabwo ari Perezida w’u Rwanda nta nubwo azigera aba we.
Bigomba gukemuka.
Ntabwo dukunda abantu baduha amabwiriza, aho yaba aturutse hose, ibyo urabizi neza.
Umukuru w’Igihugu yakomeje agira ati “Mu ngano, u Rwanda ni igihugu gito, ariko mu ntekerezo no mu rwego rwa Politiki ni igihugu cya rutura.
" Yanavuze ko nta muhuza ukenewe kugira ngo ibibazo by’u Rwanda na Uganda bikemuke ahubwo ko byose bishingiye kuri Museveni.
Ati “Izingiro ry’ikibazo riri muri Uganda, riri mu biganza bya Museveni.
Peter Okoye cyangwa se Mr P wamenyekanye cyane mu itsinda rya P Square, yahishuye uko we n’umuryango we bakirutse Covid-19, aboneraho gusaba abatuye Isi kudakerensa iki cyorezo.
Peter Okoye cyangwa se Mr P wamenyekanye cyane mu itsinda rya P Square, yahishuye uko we n’umuryango we bakirutse Covid-19, aboneraho gusaba abatuye Isi kudakerensa iki cyorezo.
Ibi Mr P yabitangaje anyuze ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter aho yagize ati"Umugore wanjye, umukobwa wanjye nanjye ubwanjye twarwaye Covid-19, abafana ba Mr P mwirinde.
Uyu muhanzi yavuze ko mu byumweru bitatu bishize yarwaye, yajya kwa muganga agasanga arwaye Covid-19, byatumye yifungirana mu cyumba cya wenyine mu rwego rwo kwirinda kwanduza abandi.
Ati" Mpisemo kuvuga ibi kugira ngo wenda mwumve ko mukwiye kwirinda, mushyira intera hagati yanyu, mukaraba kenshi amazi meza ndetse n’isabune ndetse no kwambara agapfukamunwa.
“Sinjye gusa wari urwaye kuko n’abakozi babiri bo mu rugo bari barwaye, nyuma y’icyumweru kimwe umukobwa wanjye nawe yaje kurwara abaganga badutegeka ko tugomba kumushyira mu kato akaba mu cyumba cye wenyine.
Mr P avuga ko byari bimukomereye kuba mu cyumba yifungiranyemo mu kato adashobora no kubona umwana we urwaye, ashimira cyane umugore we wananiwe kwihangana agafata icyemezo cyo kujya kurwaza umwana we kabone ko yari azi neza ko nawe yagombaga kuhandurira.
“Iminsi itanu umwana wanjye yaje gukira turiruhutsa tugira ngo birarangiye, nyuma y’umunsi umwe gusa umugore wanjye byamenyekanye ko yafashwe na Covid-19.
Byari ibihe bikomeye, sinzi ko nabona uko mbisobanura gusa twanyuze mu bihe bidukomereye.
Uyu muhanzi yavuze ko ibyumweru bitatu bishize byari ibihe bikomereye umuryango we icyakora ashimira Imana ahamya ko inkuru nziza afite ari uko yaba we, umwana we, umugore we ndetse n’abakozi babiri bari barwaye bose bakize.
Yasoje ubu buhamya amenyesha Isi ko Covid-19 ihari atari ibihuha cyangwa imikino nkuko benshi bayifata asaba buri wese kwirinda uko ashoboye kose.
Ubuhamya bwa Mr P

Tariki 29 Werurwe 2020, umwarimu wigishaga kuri Lycée Saint Alexandre Sauli de Muhura, yitabye Imana azize uburwayi.
Imana ikomeze kumuha iruhuko ridashira.
Tariki 29 Werurwe 2020, umwarimu wigishaga kuri Lycée Saint Alexandre Sauli de Muhura, yitabye Imana azize uburwayi.
Imana ikomeze kumuha iruhuko ridashira.
Uyu muvandimwe yapfuye hashize icyumweru, hasohotse itangazo rya Minisitiri w’Intebe rivuga ko abantu bose bagomba kuguma mu rugo, ingendo n’utubari bigafungwa mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, kuri uyu wa 17 Mata imaze kwandura abagera ku 2208373, ikica 148730 naho 558715 bakayikira.
Ni ingamba ziyongereye ku zindi zo gusubika amahuriro y’abantu benshi nk’imikino, ubukwe ndetse abitabira imihango yo gushyingura nabo basabwa kujyayo ari bake kandi hakubahirizwa nibura intera ya metero imwe hagati y’abantu.
Mu kubahiriza aya mabwiriza, abayobozi, abarimu n’abanyeshuri ba Lycée de Muhura, ntibabashije kujya guherekeza mugenzi wabo waguye mu rugo rwe i Nyamata mu Karere ka Bugesera, kuko ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu zitemewe.
Umwe mu nshuti z’uyu mwarimu, avuga ko “Abo bakoranaga ntabwo babashije kujya kumuherekeza kubera ingamba ziriho.
Mu bantu barenga 30 bakoranaga nta n’umwe wamushyinguye.
Barabiretse bafata icyemezo cy’uko bazasura abasigaye".
Ubusanzwe bimenyerewe ko mu Banyarwanda iyo hari uwagize ibyago cyangwa ibirori bamushyigikira, bakifatanya na we ku buryo n’uri i Nyagatare adakangwa n’urugendo rujya i Rusizi, gutabara cyangwa gushyigikira umuvandimwe n’inshuti.
Nanone ariko umunyarwanda yaravuze ngo ‘amagara araseseka ntayorwa’.
Abanyarwanda bazi agaciro k’ubuzima ari yo mpamvu muri iki gihe cy’icyago Coronavirus, bemera bakazasura abasigaye, Nyakwigendera agaherekezwa na bake.
Mu gihe cyo gushyingura nabwo amabwiriza yo kwirinda amahuriro y’abantu benshi yitabwaho cyane kandi yaba abagize ibyago, ubuyobozi n’inzego z’umutekano zikabibafashamo.
Urugero nko kujya gushyingura mu irimbi rya Rusororo, abantu ntabwo bagomba kurenga 10.
Imihango itandukanye yaberaga mu nsengero ntikibaho ndetse no gusezera ku wigendeye mu rugo ntibirenza abantu nka 20, kandi gukaraba intoki no gusiga metero hagati y’abantu bikubahirizwa.
Mbere ya byose ariko, ubuyobozi bwihanganisha abagize ibyago, bukabasobanurira ko ibihe igihugu byo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus bidasanzwe, bukamenyesha umuryango wagize ibyago ko ‘utemerewe kurenza abantu 10 bajya gushyingura, mu kwirinda ko abantu benshi bahura hakagira uhandurira’.
Umuryango kandi ubwirwa ko no mu rugo abantu batagomba kuba benshi, ku buryo usanga atari nka kwa kundi buri wese wasangaga yicaye mu rugo rwagize ibyago yatabaye.
Muri iki gihe rero niho ikoranabuhanga ryerekanira ingufu zaryo kuko uri i Burayi, Amerika, Rwamashyongoshyo, i Nzega n’ahandi yifatanya n’abandi mu bikorwa bitandukanye byo gushyingura.
Mu babashije guherekeza uwapfuye, hari abafata amaforo, amashusho (videos) bakoherereza abandi mu matsinda bahuriyemo cyangwa mu gikari (inbox).
Urugero rwa hafi ni igihe Karuranga Virgile wamenyekanye nka Dj Miller yashyingurwaga mu irimbi rya Rusororo riherereye mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Buri wese yabashije gukurikira uyu muhango umunota ku wundi kuri sheni ya Youtube.
Kuri Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter n’izindi mbuga nkoranyambaga, amafoto ya Dj Miller, n’umuhango wo kumuherekeza yaracicikanye cyane ku buryo uwavuga ko benshi bifatanyije n’umuryango we ataba akabije.
Kuba abantu bariyemeje kunywana n’amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, nta wakwirengagiza uruhare inzego z’umutekano n’ubuyobozi zibigiramo.
Nk’iyo ugeze i Rusororo ubona uburyo inzego z’umutekano zifasha abantu mu kubahiriza amabwiriza.
Mu muhanda hirya no hino naho ni uko.
Abadashaka kubahiriza amabwiriza nabo inzego z’umutekano ntiziborohera.
Urugero ni abafashwe basenga bari hamwe ari benshi.
Muri Karongi mu Murenge wa Rubengera ahari abantu 65 bitwa aba Tempérants batawe muri yombi barimo gusenga n’abandi bigometse ku mabwiriza babwiwe ko bidakwiye.
Gusura abarwayi byahawe umurongo
Mu muco nyarwanda iyo umuturanyi arwaye ntumusure wumva umufitiye umwenda, yabyara ntumushyire igikoma ukibaza aho uzaca ujya guterura umwana ukahabura.
Muri iki gihe cyo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, imvugo y’uko ifuni ibagara ubucuti ari akarenge, yabaye yirengagijweho gato kuko ako karenge gashobora gukurura kabutindi kuri nyirako, abo yasuye n’abo babana bose.
Mu bitaro gusura abarwayi byabaye bihagaritswe.
Nko mu bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK), abantu bagemuriraga ibiryo abarwariye muri ibi bitaro, babigeza aho abantu binjirira, umuntu umwe urwaje wa murwayi akaba ari we ujya kubyakira.
Uyu mwanzuro ugamije ko abantu bajyaga gusura abarwayi mu bitaro bagabanya urwo rujya n’uruza, mu rwego rwo gukumira ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyakomeza gukwirakwiza.
Kugeza ubu umurwayi agomba kuba afite umurwaza umwe gusa, niyo yagira umusimbura ariko na we agomba kuba ari umwe kandi urujya n’uruza mu bitaro rwaragabanutse.
Ibi byose bigamije kugabanya ubucucike mu bitaro.
Buri munsi usanga muri CHUK hari abarwayi bari hagati ya 400-500 baba baharwariye.
Kubera kandi serivisi nyinshi zitangirwamo, bituma mu gihe gisanzwe buri munsi hari abantu bari hagati ya 1000-1500 basura ibi bitaro.
Ufite uwe urwaye kandi ashobora no kwifashisha uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga akamwoherereza amafaranga kuri telefoni akamufasha kubona ibyo yari kumushyira, na we agakomeza kuguma mu rugo, bityo twese tukazaririmba intsinzi twishimira ko twatsinze Coronavirus.
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Facebook rwatangaje ko rwashyizeho uburyo bw’iguriro rizajya rifasha abacuruzi kwamamaza no kugurisha ibicuruzwa byabo mu buryo bworoshye, mu gihe abenshi bahejejwe mu rugo n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Facebook rwatangaje ko rwashyizeho uburyo bw’iguriro rizajya rifasha abacuruzi kwamamaza no kugurisha ibicuruzwa byabo mu buryo bworoshye, mu gihe abenshi bahejejwe mu rugo n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Ibi ngo bizafasha ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse kureshya abakiliya babyo aho baherereye hose, bagure ibicuruzwa bitandukanye bifashishije uburyo bwa “Facebook Shops".
Mark Zuckerberg uyobora Facebook yavuze ko gukora iduka hifashishijwe Facebook ari ubuntu ku bigo byose bibyifuza kuko ikigamijwe ari ukwamamaza ibicuruzwa bitandukanye.
Yongeyeho ko iduka runaka niryaguka rikagira agaciro nk’ak’ikigo kinini mu bucuruzi, na bo bazunguka amafaranga kuko abantu bakoresha Facebook bagura ibicuruzwa bazaba biyongereye.
Ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse bizakoresha ‘Facebook Shops’ bizaba bifite uburyo bwo kwishyura amatangazo yamamaza, azabifasha gukurura abaguzi batandukanye bakerekeza ku iduka ryabo mu buryo bworoshye haba kuri Facebook na Instagram.
Biteganyijwe ko ubu buryo bw’iduka ryo kuri internet Facebook izanabushyira ku zindi mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo za Messenger na WhatsApp, ku buryo bizongera n’igihe abakoresha izo mbuga nkoranyambaga bamara bazikoresha.
Byitezwe ko abazashaka kugurira ibintu bitandukanye kuri Facebook bazajya babona amoko menshi y’ibintu bigezweho kandi bakaba banakwishyura ibyo bahashye bitabasabye kujya ku zindi mbuga za internet.
Imikorere yagutse y’iri hahiro Facebook yatangije izaba iri gukora neza mu mezi abiri ari imbere, aho ibigo bisaga miliyoni 160 bizaba byamaze gushyirwaho neza.
Facebook ivuga ko iri koranabuhanga rizafasha cyane ibigo byari bitangiye guhungabana kubera Coronavirus kandi rikazarushaho gukoreshwa cyane muri iki gihe Isi iri kwitabira isoko ryo kuri internet.
Kwamamaza hakoreshejwe video z’ako kanya ni bumwe mu buryo buzabyazwa umusaruro muri iri soko rya Facebook kuko abantu basaga miliyoni 800 bareba video zo kuri Facebook na Instagram buri munsi.
Hubert ni izina ry’abana b’abahungu rifite inkomoko mu rurimi rw’Ikidage,abafite iri zina bakaba bakunze kurangwa n’umunezero
Hubert ni izina ry’abana b’abahungu rifite inkomoko mu rurimi rw’Ikidage,abafite iri zina bakaba bakunze kurangwa n’umunezero
Ba Hubert bakunze kurangwa no guhorana akanyamuneza, ubabonye akabona bahora bakeye mu maso, bakunze kugira igitinyiro, kivanze n’igikundiro, bakagira ubuntu n’urugwiro.
Ba Hubert kandi bakunze kumenya kubara inkuru neza, ibi bigatuma bakurura abantu iyo hari ikintu bari gusobanura cyane cyane bashaka kugaragaza ukuri.
Abantu bafite iri zina ibyo banyuzemo bikunze kubabera isomo kandi ntibapfa gucibwa integer n’ibyo bahura nabyo.
Icyifuzo gihora ku mutima wa ba Hubert ni ukugera kuri byinshi bishoboka mu buzima birimo ubutunzi, imbaraga kandi bagakunda kumenyekana igihe bakoze ikintu kidasanzwe.
Ba Hubert boroherwa cyane no guhanga udushya ndetse n’ubushobozi bwo gukemura ibibazo byabaye ingorabahizi.
Uku gushaka kumenyekana no kugera kuri byinshi bituma ababari iruhande bumva ko bashaka kubayobora batitaye ku byo bo batekereza.
Hubert akunda kugaragara neza, ashaka gukundwa, ibyo bigatuma yiyitaho mu myambarire cyangwa ugasanga azi kuganiriza neza abantu.
Agira amatsiko, ashaka kugira ubumenyi ku bintu byose kandi nawe akunda gusangiza abantu ubumenyi afite.
Abantu bafite iri zina bakunze kurangwa no kudakunda amafaranga cyane kuko baba bumva ko aza akagenda, ibi bituma bashobora gukorera amafaranga menshi ariko agashira vuba.
Amabara y’amahirwe kuri ba Hubert ni icyatsi, umweru wera ndetse n’umweru ujya gusa n’umuhondo, umunsi w’amahirwe kuribo aba ari ku wa Mbere
Abanyarwanda ba kera bahoranye umuhango mwiza wo gusaba Imana kugira Umutima w’u Rwanda.
Bakawusabira ku musozi wa Kigali bafataga nk’igicumbi cy’Umutima w’u Rwanda.
Ese Abanyarwanda b’ubu bawusabira he?
Cyangwa se ntawo bagikeneye?
None se iyo Imbuto Foundation igarutse ku bidindiza “Ndi Umunyarwanda", aho si ibyo iba ishaka kumenya?
Reka twumve icyo Abacukumbuzi b’ireme ry’Umuco n’Amateka by’u Rwanda babivugaho mu bushakashatsi bwabo.
Abanyarwanda ba kera bahoranye umuhango mwiza wo gusaba Imana kugira Umutima w’u Rwanda.
Bakawusabira ku musozi wa Kigali bafataga nk’igicumbi cy’Umutima w’u Rwanda.
Ese Abanyarwanda b’ubu bawusabira he?
Cyangwa se ntawo bagikeneye?
None se iyo Imbuto Foundation igarutse ku bidindiza “Ndi Umunyarwanda", aho si ibyo iba ishaka kumenya?
Reka twumve icyo Abacukumbuzi b’ireme ry’Umuco n’Amateka by’u Rwanda babivugaho mu bushakashatsi bwabo.
Umusozi wa Kigali n’Igenamigambi ry’ingoma inye (Ubu twagereranya na Vision 2020 cyangwa 2050).
Kumenya icyerekezo cy’u Rwanda mu myaka ijana ni byo bitwereka neza icyo ubusugire n’ubwigenge by’u Rwanda gakondo byari bisobanuye, bityo na none tukabasha no gusobanukirwa neza n’icyari ku mutima (Philosophie) w’abakurambere baremye u Rwanda bakarwubaka, bakarurwanira ndetse benshi bakanarupfira.
Aha tugiye kubona ko ubusugire n’imibereho myiza y’Abanyawanda ku ngoma eshatu bwategurwaga n’Abami bitwa Mutara na Cyilima mbereho nk’ imyaka ijana.
Nk’uko musanzwe mubizi, mu mazina y’Abami atanu yasimburanaga mu bihe bine yakurikiranaga atya: Mutara, Kigeli, Mibambwe, Yuhi na Cyilima.
Aha biragaragara neza ko hagati ya Mutara na Cyilima hacagamo Ingoma eshatu mbere y’uko Cyilima atangiza ikindi cyiciro cy’Abami.
Inshingano z’abami Kigeli na Mibambwe zabaga ari ukwagura u Rwanda kuko ku ngoma eshatu zabaga zarabanje Inka n’Abantu byabaga byaragwiriye bityo hakaba haragombaga kuboneka uruhumekero habayeho kwagura ubutaka bw’igihugu.
Yuhi yari ashinzwe imihango y’i Bwami cyane cyane Umuriro waho utarazimaga ukaba wararangaga ubusugire bw’igihugu.
Aha murumva ko Yuhi yari ashinzwe gutunganya ibijyanye n’ubusugire bw’igihugu n’ibijyanye n’imiyoborere myiza kimwe n’Iyobokamana kugira ngo abandi bami bane babone urufatiro rukomeye bazubakiraho.
Ubwo hari aho bitaniye cyane n’ibikorwa ubu mu igenamigambi rirerire?
Yaba Yuhi, Kigeli na Mibambwe uko ari batatu babanzirizwaga kandi bagaherukwa na Mutara cyangwa na Cyilima.
Musenyeri Kagame yaragaragaje ko mu Rwanda Ingoma eshatu zamaraga imyaka 100 kuko buri yose yari imyaka yegereye 33.
Mbese ni ukuvugako kuva Mutara cyangwa Cyilima batanze kugera hongera kwima undi Mutara cyangwa undi Cyilima; muri rusange habaga hashize imyaka 100.
Umuhango wo kwaka Umutima w’Ingoma
Mutara na Cyilima bari Abami b’Inka kandi bagombaga kugira umuhango ukomeye wo mu Bwiru bakoraga ujyanye n’icyerekezo cy’u Rwanda mu ngoma eshatu zigiye gukurikiraho.
Niwo mu Bwiru bita “Inzira y’Ishora".
Hari umuhango baheragaho wo kuvugurura Ingoma z’ibwami nka Kalinga, Cyimumugizi, Kiragutse na Mpatsibihugu.
Barebaga niba mu myaka hafi ijana ishize nta kibazo izo ngoma zagize kugira ngo bibaye ngombwa babe basisazura cyangwa se ngo bazisimbuze izindi.
Iyo basangaga izo ngoma zikiri nzima cyangwa bagasanga zigomba gusimbuzwa; byanze bikunze bagombaga kuziha icyo bitaga “kuziha imitima mishya".
Iyo mihango yo kubonera Ingoma z’ingabe imitima, imwe bayikoreraga ahitwa i Karama ku murwa wa Kigali hariya ku musozi wa Mont Kigali aho bavuga ko mu mirwa yose y’Abami umurwa wa Kigali ari wo wari Imfura y’imirwa yose y’Abami.
Aho i Karama bahajyaga baje kuhatora imitima y’Ingoma z’ingabe arizo Cyiragutse, Cyimumugizi, Mpatsibihugu na Kalinga.
Mu gihe ingoma Kalinga yari Ingabe y’ubwami bw’u Rwanda, ziriya zindi uko ari eshatu zo bigaragara ko zari ingabe za buri mwami muri bariya Bami batatu bari hagati ya Mutara na Cyilima.
Bishoboka ko Cyiragutse ari ingabe ya Mibambwe maze Mpatsibihugu ikaba iya Kigeli bitewe n’uko bose bari bashinzwe kwagura u Rwanda nk’uko amazina y’izo ngoma abigaragaza.
Cyimumugizi ikaba ingabe ya Yuhi kuko ariwe wari ushinzwe imihango y’ubwami bw’u Rwanda nk’uko na none izina ryayo ribigaragaza.
Ibi rero ubona bimeze nka bya bindi by’Umwami Salomo wo muri Bibiliya igihe yajyaga gutambira ku musozi wa Gabaon nk’uko tubisoma mu 2 Abami 3:1-14.
Ubwo Salomo yariho atamba Imana yaramubonekeye imubwira kuyisaba icyo ashaka maze Salomo ayisaba ubwenge kugira ngo agire ubushishozi bwo kuyobora ishyanga rya Israel.
Uriya muhango wa Salomo wo gusaba Imana ubwenge (Umutima) bari ku musozi muremure nk’uwa Kigali urasa cyane n’ibyo Abiru b’i Rwanda bakoraga bafatanije n’Umwami nk’uko tugiye kubibona.
Iyo rero Abiru n’abandi banyamihango bageraga ku murwa wa Kigali babaga bazanye: Umutsobe w’isugi, Umukobwa w’isugi n’Umwenenyabirungu w’isugi, bakazana amata, inzoga n’imbuto bagatereka aho.
Hanyuma rero bendaga ya mata na za nzoga bagakozamo icyuhagiro icyarimwe bakuhagira igiti cy’umurama (ngo gitere uburame) babaga bazanye maze Umutsobe mukuru agapfukama agasenga avuga aya magambo:
Gahorane Imana Kigali.
Tuje kwenda imitima y’ingoma Ngo Umwami mu Rwanda agire umutima Ingoma mu Rwanda zigire umutima Abagabo mu Rwanda bagire umutima Abagore mu Rwanda bagire umutima Inka mu Rwanda zigire umutima U Rwanda rwose rugire umutima.
Aha murabona ko niba Ingoma y’Ingabe y’u Rwanda ari yo Kalinga iyo ibonye Umutima ugereranya Ubwenge n’Ubushishozi, Umwami wayimye nawe aba abonye umutima.
Na none Ingoma z’Abami ari zo Cyimumugizi, Kiragutse na Mpatsibihugu iyo zibonye umutima, ni ubutegetsi bw’imyaka ijana bw’Abami Kigeli, Mibambwe na Yuhi burangwa n’umutima.
Uwo mutima rero ni wo ugera mu baturage no mu nka.
Ibyo birangira ari u Rwanda rwose rubonye umutima kugira ngo rubone kuba umurame.
Ibyo bimeze nk’uko Umwami Salomo yasabye ubwenge Imana ikamushima ikamubwira ko izamuha n’ibyo atasabye nko kurama, ubukire, amahoro no kunesha abanzi bitewe n’uko yahisemo neza.
Ibyo Imana yamusezeranyije byose bimeze nk’ibyo Abanyarwanda bizeraga kubona bamaze kubona Umutima w’Ingoma.
Dore uko uduce tw’ubwiru dukurikira tubivuga:
Uri umurame umwami abe umurame Ingoma mu Rwanda zibe umurame  Abagabo b’i Rwanda babe umurame Abagore b’iRwanda babe umurame Inka mu Rwanda zibe umurame U Rwanda rwose rube umurame
Nyuma rero yo kubona umutima no kubona uburame; ibyo ntabwo byari bihagije kuko u Rwanda rwose rwagombaga kuzira ubusembwa, kuvogerwa no guhumana ari byo bishushanywa na ba bantu b’amasugi bazanye.
Ubusanzwe umuntu w’isugi ni umuntu ugifite ababyeyi bombi cyangwa umukobwa utarasambanyijwe.
Muri ya masengesho y’Umutsobe mukuru yakomezaga agira ati:
Aya ni amasugi umwami abe isugi Ingoma i Rwanda zibe amasugi Abagabo i Rwanda babe amasugi Abagore mu Rwanda babe amasugi Inka i Rwanda zibe amasugi U Rwanda rwose ruhorane amasugi
Usibye imihango yo mu bwiru yo gusabira u Rwanda rwose umutima, uburame n’ubusugire, mu magambo amwe n’ayo tubonye hejuru, na none icyerekezo cyari ukugira ubuhoro (amahoro) mu Rwanda rw’Umwami.
Umwami w’i Rwanda agira ubuhoro Ingoma z’i Rwanda zigira ubuhoro, Abagabo b’i Rwanda bagira ubuhoro Abagore b’i Rwanda bagira ubuhoro Inka z’i Rwanda zigira ubuhoro U Rwanda rwose rugira ubuhoro
Nyuma y’ibyo byose u Rwanda rukagira uburumbuke bw’amata, ubuki n’inturire.
Ibyo nabyo babivugaga mu mugambo ahwanye n’ayo hejuru bati
Ng’aya amata n’ubuki Kugira ngo Umwami agire amata n’ubuki Ingoma mu Rwanda zigire amata nubuki  Abagabo bagire amata n’ubuki  Abagore bagire amata n’ubuki  Inka mu Rwanda zigire amata n’ubuki.
Nyuma y’ibi, hazaga amasengesho yo gucyamura (gukebura) amahanga yose adatura umwami w’u Rwanda.
Dore amagambo bavugaga muri ubwo Bwiru:
Twacyamura u Burundi ku ngoma Twacyamura u Bushubi ku ngoma Twacyamura u Bunyabungo ku ngoma Amahanga yose adatura umwami w’u Rwanda Twayacyamura
Ibi twabigereranya na diporomasi y’ubu iba igamije gutuma amahanga yandi ayoboka iby’igihugu cyawe.
Amahame remezo y’u Rwanda gakondo
Iyi mihango yakorwaga n’Abami bitwa Mutara na Cyilima hari ibintu idusobanurira neza bigatuma tumenya Ihame-ngengabitekerezo ryubatse u Rwanda rikaruha Indangagaciro.
Ihame-ngengabitekerezo ni ryo soko y’ibikorwa n’imyitwarire by’umuntu cyangwa by’ikigo biturukamo.
Ni yo mpamvu nta muntu, nta kigo, nta shyaka nta n’ishyanga byabaho bidafite Ihame-ngenga-bitekerezo ababigize bagenderaho.
Ku gihugu Ihame-ngengabitekerezo ni ryo rigena kandi rikagenga Indangagaciro na Kirazira by’igihugu! None abakurambere baturaze u Rwanda barwubatse babikuye ku rihe hame-ngengabitekerezo ukurikije ibyo tumaze kubona?
Ihame-ngengabitekerezo rya mbere ryagenaga kandi rikagenga ibyo mu Rwanda byose; ni iritumenyesha icyo u “Rwanda rwose" ari cyo: “u Rwanda rwose" ntabwo ari ubutaka bwose bw’aho twita mu Rwanda gusa; ahubwo ni ahantu hari: Ingoma-Umwami -Abagabo -Abagore-Inka.
Ibi rero ni nabyo byerekana ibyo twabonye by’Ibanga ry’Umwami n’Ingoma, n’Ibanga ry’Inka n’Ingabo.
Aha icya mbere kigomba kumvikana mu Ihame ngenga-bitekerezo ry’abahanze u Rwanda, ni uko ahantu hose ku isi hari kuba haboneka Umwami wimye Ingoma-ngabe yahawe umutima, hakaboneka Abagabo n’Abagore ndetse n’Inka, habashaga kuboneka u “Rwanda rwose.
"Kimwe n’uko ibyo byose uwari kubivana ku butaka bw’u Rwanda haba hatakaje kuba “u Rwanda rwose.
" Impamvu ni ko ikihagira u Rwanda rwose ari izi ndangagaciro z’Abanyarwanda zihari tuzi ko izo ndangagaciro zari zubakiye ku Mana, Inka n’Ingoma.
Nk’uko Umwami yabaga ahatswe n’Ingoma maze Ingabo (Abaturage) nazo zikaba zihatswe n’Umwami; ni nako u Rwanda rwose rwabaga ruhatswe n’Imana bitewe n’uko Ingoma yimye u Rwanda ari Imana yayihaye umutima.
Nk’uko Inka ihaka isabwa kubyara icyo ihatse; ni nako Imana ihatse u Rwanda na yo isabwa guhora irubyara (irugoboka).
Burya mu Kinyarwanda ijambo“gusenga" risobanuye gukesha byose uguhatse! Ni yo mpamvu usanga n’isengesho gakondo ryo gusabira u Rwanda na ryo ari ibyo ryabaga ryerekejeho.
Nimwongere murebe amagambo arigize:
Seka seka gasani k’i Rwanda  Rusekere rugubwe neza Rusenderezemo amahoro n’amahe Rutsindire ubukenya n’ubugingo buke Rutsindire ubusame n’ubusharire Rutsindire icyago n’icyagane Rutsindire nyamunsi n’intumwa yayo  Rutsindire umwanzi wo mu kirambi N’umurozi uvuka ishyanga Garika ibiganza utugabire  Rugaba, Rugabo, Rwagisha Maze twishyuke mu Rwanda umu.
Ihame-ngengabitekerezo ry’abahanze u Rwanda ni ukugira Ishyanga aho Umwami yima Ingoma-ngabe yahawe umutima (ubushishozi) n’Imana, maze ingoma (reigns) zikagira umutima (ubushishozi) bigatuma Ingabo z’Umwami (Abagabo n’Abagore) nabo bagira umutima uzagera no ku nka na zo zikagira umutima (wo gukamwa no konsa izazo).
Murabona neza ko uru ari uruhererekane rw’Umutima uva ku MANA ukagera mu Mwami unyuze mu NGOMA-NGABE maze ukarangiriza mu NKA unyuze mu ngabo (Abagabo n’Abagore).
Uru ruhererekane kandi ni rwo rwahoze rukoze “umutima w’u Rwanda rwose".
Byongeye kandi u Rwanda rwose iyo rwabaga rubonye umutima; ni byo na none byateraga igihugu kugira uburame, ubusugire, ubuhoro n’uburumbuke ndetse no kugarura amahanga adatura u Rwanda.
Ibi rero abakurambere bacu bakoraga kera ngo bahorane Umutima w’u Rwanda (w’Ubunyarwanda) n’ubu mpamya ko bikenewe.
Kubura uwo umutima w’u Rwanda, w’ubunyarwanda ni byo byatumye abanyarwanda bishora mu mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ngo na Ruganzu Ndoli amaze kubohora u Rwanda amacakubiri yatumye rugirwa ingaruzwamuheto imyaka irenga icumi, yatangiye yigisha umutima w’u Rwanda.
Arwanya ba mutima-nda, mutima-rwana, mutima-muke, agakunda cyane mitimi-igwanye (ihuje).
Ese ubu abo ba mutima-nda sibo batumye u Rwanda rutabohoka burundu?
Imana tugira ni uko “imiyaga isubiza inyuma indege itwaye abanyarwanda itayibuza kugera iyo ijya" nk’uko Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika aherutse kubyibutsa Abanyarwanda bo mu Rwanda rutugendamo!
Naho ibidindiza Ndi Umunyarwanda byo ubanza dukwiye kubirebera mu mizi yabyo mikuru twitabaje amahame-remezo yagengaga ishyaka ry’u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda.
Ibitekerezo bya Gérard Nyirimanzi na Nyirishema Célestin, Abacukumbuzi b’Ireme ry’Umuco n’Amateka by’u Rwanda.
Babikuye mu Ubwiru, Inzira y’Ishora, vers 279-310.
Abatekereza b’amateka y’u Rwanda n’abayatekererezwa, bakunze gutangaza byinshi ku mateka y’ibigwi by’inka mu Rwanda rugari rwa Gasabo, inka yafatiweho ibintu byinshi mu mateka y’u Rwanda no mu ruhando mpuzamahanga.
Abatekereza b’amateka y’u Rwanda n’abayatekererezwa, bakunze gutangaza byinshi ku mateka y’ibigwi by’inka mu Rwanda rugari rwa Gasabo, inka yafatiweho ibintu byinshi mu mateka y’u Rwanda no mu ruhando mpuzamahanga.
Muri iki gice tugiye kubavunguriraho gato ku bigwi n’ibirindiro by’amateka y’ibigwi by’inka mu Rwanda, dore ko utabikuyeho akamanyu nibura gato gato, utashobora kubiva imuzi ngo ubigere imuzingo.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere ku Muco, ubusizi n’amateka, tubimburiye ku iyinjira ry’inka mu Rwanda n’uko zatejwe imbere zikaba urufatiro rukomeye rw’ibintu byinshi mu mateka.
Inka ifite ibisekuruza byinshi mu mateka y’Afurika, aho bisaga imyaka 3000.
Inka zahanganywe n’u Rwanda, aho zadukanywe n’Abasangwabutaka b’Abasinga n’Abazigaba ahasaga mu wa 300.
Abanyiginya bahasesekaye, bateje imbere cyane ubworozi bw’inka bituma inka zose zo mu gihugu bazitirirwa, aho mu mateka bagira bati “Gihanga niwe wahanze inka n’ingoma’’ .
Bikomoye ku kuba Abanyiginya aribo bahaye intera ndende n’urwego rw’ikirenga ubworozi bw’inka, ziba nyinshi mu gihugu.
Inka yahawe intera iyingayinga iy’umuntu.
Aho mu Bucurabwenge bw’inka, bagiraga bati “Inka ni imfura, kuko upfa ikakurerera, wabumbira ( wabura amashereka) ikakugoboka, ikakurwanyiriza indwara z’ibyorezo n’ubujyahabi".
Inka niyo yarangaga ubukire, Inka niyo yari ipfundo ry’ubuhake nk’akazi ko hambere, Intwari yo ku rugamba yagororerwaga inka, Inka yungaga inshuti, Inka yahuzaga inshuti (abahanaga inka, babaga babaye inshuti ), Inka bayikwaga umugeni nk’ikimenyetso cy’uburere bwiza.
Mu Kinyejana cya Munani nyuma ya Yezu, ni ukuvuga ahasaga mu wa 700, nibwo hadutse ishyanga rishya mu Rwanda, ari ryo ryaje kuvamo umuryango mugari w’Abanyiginya, baza n’ubundi, bagowe n’iyimukayimuka ryabo n’umutungo wabo urangajwe imbere n’inka bagendaga bashakira inzuri zitoshye kandi ngari.
Mu gusesekara mu Rwanda, binjiriye bwa mbere mu Gihugu cy’u Rweya rw’u Mubali ( mu mirenge ya Murundi na Mwili yo mu Karere ka Kayonza na Rwimbogo yo mu Karere ka Gatsibo).
Kuko ubutaka bubereye ubworozi bw’inka zabo bari babugezeho, bishimiye umukenke w’Iburasirazuba bw’u Rwanda, ugaragiwe n’ubutohe bw’umurambi w’ubutaka bwiganjemo icyogogo cy’uruzi rw’Akagera, ibiyaga bya Rwanyakiziga, Nasho, Ihema n’ibindi.
Imyaka isaga 300(700-1091), umuryango mugari w’Abanyiginya wamaze mu busembere mu ngoma y’u Rweya rw’Abazigaba, nta kindi cyera cyangwa se cyirabura bakoze, usibye guteza imbere ubworozi bw’inka, bakora ubugenge n’ubuhanga bwo kuzibangurira kugira ngo zirusheho kororoka, maze nazo zirabakundira ziroroka karahava!! Aha akaba ari naho, bakuye umwihariko w’inka zitirirwa u Rwanda z’Inyambo aribyo bivuga “Itungo ry’intoranywa’’.
Imisozi yose bacumbikiwemo, yari yiganjemo inzuri z’inka, aho gutura ari hato, ku buryo aribo ba mbere bateje imbere gutura mu nsisiro mu rwego rwo kurinda akajagari mu miturire byari kugabanya ingano y’inzuri z’inka zabo.
Mu misozi batuyemo myinshi kuri ubu ibarizwa mu Karere ka Gatsibo ¾ byayo byari inzuri z’inka.
Muri yo twavuga Imisozi ya Nyagihanga, Rugarama, Ngarama, Kabarore, Gitoki, Gatsibo na Kageyo
Imisozi batuyemo muri ibyo bihe, ari nayo baremyemo insisiro, ni mu mu Murenge wa Remera na Muhura yo mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Uko imyaka yashiraga indi igataha, niko Abanyiginya barushagaho guteza imbere ubworozi bw’inka, ari nako butuma bagira ijambo ry’icyizerabuhake mu Rweya, kugeza ubwo byabahesheje ijambo mu nzu y’ubwami bwabo, banashakamo abagore b’ibikomangoma.
Muri bo twavuga nka Nyirarukangaga rwa Nyamigezi ya Kabeja, washatswe na Kazi ka Kizira, bakabyarana Gihanga.
Abanyiginya bakomeje kugwiza ubutunzi bw’inka, amashyo n’amagana, bibaha imbaraga n’icyubahiro cy’ikirenga, kugeza ubwo ibwami batangiye kubakeka amababa ko bashobora kuzabambura ingoma, ari nabwo Gihanga yabimenyaga agashyira nzira akabahunga ajya guhanga igihugu cye mu bisigara by’ubutaka Abasangwabutaka banennye, akabuhangaho igihugu cy’i Gasabo.
Gihanga, akimara guhanga Gasabo, Umuryango mugari w’Abanyiginya akomokamo akawukura mu busembere mu ngoma y’u Rweya, yashyizeho igenamigambi ryeruye rishingiye ku nka mu kubaka igihugu cye.
Inka ihabwa umwanya ukomeye mu buzima bwose bw’igihugu, aho yifashishwaga muri Politiki z’igihugu zitandukanye nko mu Bubanyi n’amahanga, mu kubaka ubukungu bw’igihugu, mu mutekano no mu ntambara zo kwigarurira amahanga, mu mibereho myiza y’abaturage, mu mibanire n’ubumwe bw’abenegihugu n’ibindi.
Inka yayishyize mu igamigambi ry’ ububanyi n’amahanga n’ubutwererane n’abami b’ibindi bihugu bituranyi by’u Rwanda ku buryo yagombaga guhuza u Rwanda n’ibihugu by’inshuti kandi ikagabirwa abami b’ ibihugu byanga u Rwanda, bityo bikagabanya urwango, ubundi rukabasha gukora ibikorwa by’iterambere rwifuza.
Inka yabaye inkingi ya mwamba yo kurwanya umwanzi w’imbere mu gihugu.
Umwanzi w’imbere mu gihugu, burya ni ubukene.
Iyo umunyarwanda atakennye, nta nabi agira, kandi umwanzi wo hanze y’igihugu ntiyabona aho yinjirira, kuko uwakamubereye icyitso wo mu gihugu hagati, baba baramugushije ruhabo.
Nuko Gihanga, agena gahunda zo kugabira abaturage inka ku buntu, kugira ngo biteze imbere, ubundi amahoro ahinde mu miryango yabo.
Inka yashyizwe mu rwego rwo gufasha igihugu mu kugera ku mutekano n’intwaro yo guhashya amahanga adakunda u Rwanda.
Niho Gihanga, yahereyeho ashyiraho gahunda yo kugabira inka Ingabo zose z’igihugu, kugira ngo zirusheho kwitabira intambara zo kwivuna abanzi, no kugira imbaduko ku rugamba rwo kwagura igihugu.
Inka yafatiweho umurongo mugari wo kwigarurira imitima y’abaturage b’ibindi bihugu u Rwanda rwashakaga kwigarurira.
Aho buri muturage u Rwanda rwabaga rwanyaze mu bitero byo kurwagura, yahabwaga inka nyinshi zo korora zikamufasha kwikura mu bukene, bityo akinjira muri Paradizo nshya y’igihugu cy’u Rwanda, irimo amata n’ubuki, umutima akawukura kuri gakondo y’iwabo, akaganza i Rwanda.
Gahunda yo kugabira abaturage b’ibindi bihugu banyazwe n’u Rwanda, yatumye benshi mu baturage batoroka ibihugu byabo, biyizira mu Rwanda, bahabwa inka zo korora, ubundi batangira gutanga amakuru y’imbamutima y’uburyo u Rwanda ruzigarurira ibihugu bakomokamo.
Ubukungu bw’ibihugu mu bihe byo hambere, bwari abaturage ku isonga, ubundi butunzi bugakurikiraho, ari nayo mpamvu u Rwanda, rwihatiye kwigarurira abaturage b’ibindi bihugu, rwifashishije inka.
Ni umugabo utuje mu busanzwe ariko iyo ageze ku ruhimbi aba isasu! Akundwa na benshi kubera uburyo yigishamo akajyanisha gushimisha abantu no gutanga ubutumwa bwiza bw’Umwami Yesu; ibintu bituma abamukurikiye nta n’umwe urambirwa.
Ni umugabo utuje mu busanzwe ariko iyo ageze ku ruhimbi aba isasu! Akundwa na benshi kubera uburyo yigishamo akajyanisha gushimisha abantu no gutanga ubutumwa bwiza bw’Umwami Yesu; ibintu bituma abamukurikiye nta n’umwe urambirwa.
Ubusanzwe yitwa Ev.
Tuyishimire Diogène.
Mu byigisho bye, icyamamaye ni icyo aba avugamo ukuntu Yesu nta kintu adasa nacyo kuko ‘Mu bana yabaye umwana w’Imana, mu bagabo akaba umugabo w’abapfakazi, mu bapapa aba se w’imfubyi, mu biti akavuga ati ninjye muzabibu w’ukuri mwe muri amashami…’
Umurebye mu maso ntiwamukekera ko yakwigisha mu buryo bukomeye ariko we ahamya ko ari imirimo yakoze kugira ngo agarure benshi mu nzira y’agakiza.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 27, ni umuvugabutumwa mu itorero rya ADEPR.
Yatangiye no gukora umuziki aho yamaze kwinjira mu njyana ya Hip hop.
Akurondoreye iby’urugendo rw’ubuzima ab’imitima yoroshye amarira arashoka bitewe n’uko yakubititse akiri muto ntabashe kwiga amashuri yisumbuye kubera ubuzima bugoye n’ubushobozi buke, ariko ubu ashima Imana aho igejeje ikora!
Mu buhamya bwe ntajya yibagirwa kugaragaza uko yari umusinzi unakora inzoga z’inkorano ndetse n’uburyo nyina umubyara yamusamye mu gihe yigiraga kuba umubikira.
Yakuriye kwa nyina wabo kuko nyina yamutaye akajya kwishakira undi mugabo.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE yavuye imuzi iby’ubuzima bwe.
Ati “Ubundi mama wanjye yigiraga kuba umubikira, yaje guhura n’umusore amutera inda rero birangira havutse njye.
Icyakora ntabwo yandeze kuko we yahise ashaka undi mugabo kandi ntabwo twari kubana.
Ibi byatumye nkura nderwa na mama wacu muto ku mubyeyi wanjye.
Ahamya ko yakuriye mu muryango w’abantu bakora inzoga z’inkorano, byatumye ku myaka icyenda gusa atangira kunywa inzoga.
Akurira mu buzima bwo gucuruza no gukora izo nzoga.
Arangije amashuri abanza ntabwo yabonye uko akomeza ayisumbuye kuko nta bushobozi bwari buhari, ati" Nyine ishuri narivuyemo mpita ninjira mu byo gukora inzoga kuko nibyo mu rugo bakoraga.
Ubu buzima yabubayemo ariko akunda umuziki, biza kumuviramo gushaka gukora indirimbo za mbere nubwo bitamuhiriye.
Ati “Numvaga naba umukinnyi wa APR FC cyangwa nkaba umuhanzi wa Hip Hop nari umufana ukomeye wa Riderman.
Yavuye iwabo ababeshye ko agiye gukora umuziki, naho agiye gucuruza inzoga z’inkorano mu Karere ka Musanze aza guhomba bikomeye.
Ubwo yari amaze guhomba mu by’inzoga z’inkorano yacuruzaga, Ev.
Tuyishimire yisanze asigaranye amafaranga make cyane nyamara yaramaze gutoroka kwa nyina wabo.
Inzoga zari zahombye abona ubuzima bwanze afata icyemezo cyo kwiyahura ndetse aranabigerageza Imana ikinga akaboko.
Ati “Narahombye bikomeye numva ubuzima burarangiye, nahisemo kwiyahura icyo gihe ngura inzoga nyinshi ngo niyahure nasinze, naguze ikinini cy’imbeba nsinda ntiyahuye birangira ndyamye, ariko nkajya numva ko ndi bwiyahure mu gitondo.
Bukeye hari ikiganiro cyacaga kuri Radio Flash Fm cyakorwaga na Pasiteri Ntambara.
Icyo gihe yavuze ijambo ryatumye mpindura umugambi wo kwiyahura.
Tuyishimire avuga Pasiteri Ntambara yigishije avuga ko hari umwana ugiye kwiyahura kandi naramuka abiretse azaba umuntu ukomeye w’umugabo.
Umugambi we uhita upfuba binyuze kuri uyu mukozi w’Imana.
Ati “Igitekerezo cyo kwiyahura cyahise kimvamo gutyo nyuma njya kureba mama wanjye wabaga mu Bugesera.
Ageze mu Bugesera yasanze umubyeyi we azi ko umwana we yabuze, icyakora kuko ubuzima butari bwiza ntabwo yahatinze ahubwo yagiye gushakisha uko yabaho.
Iki gihe yakoze muri restaurant, aha ni naho yatangiye gukora ibikorwa byo kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana ahereye ku hantu basengeraga.
Akora muri iyi restaurant yo mu Bugesera nibwo Ev.
Tuyishimire yatangiye kujya ajya gusengana n’abantu bari baturanye akarara aho basengeraga.
Abo basenganaga bakundaga uko yigisha anasoma ijambo ry’Imana umugabo umwe basenganaga aza kumusaba ko yazajya kubwiriza muri ADEPR i Huye.
Kuva icyo gihe yahise atangira kuba umuvugabutumwa wo mu itorero rya ADEPR atangira gutumirwa cyane mu materaniro anyuranye.
Mu 2016 umugabo basenganaga yamusabye ko yamurera akava aho basengeraga bakajya babana nk’umwana na Se.
Nyuma uyu mugabo yaje kwiyemeza kumwubakira inzu birangira mu 2018 akoze ubukwe aza kurushinga n’umwe mu bakirisitu bo mu itorero rya ADEPR.
Yerekeje amaso ku muziki
Kuva mu bwana bwe yakundaga umuziki by’umwihariko injyana ya Hip Hop, ibi byatumye uyu mugabo kuri ubu yumva yawukora ndetse indirimbo ya mbere ye ikaba igomba kujya hanze mu minsi ya vuba.
Ati “Nubwo nakora iyi yonyine ngahita ndekera aho, inzozi zanjye zaba zibaye impamo kuko mpfuye ntaririmbye nagendana agahinda kuko nabikunze kuva cyera.
Avuga ko yari kuba yarabikoze cyera ariko agira ubwoba bw’ukuntu abo basengana bazabifata ahitamo kubigendamo gake.
Iyi ndirimbo ye yitegura gusohora yitwa “Mfite ubwoba" yakozwe na Trackslayer, izaba ikubiyemo ubutumwa bw’ubuzima busanzwe ariko nanone buganisha ku Mana.
Ikiganiro na Ev.
Tuyishimire winjiye mu njyana ya Hip hop
Banki y’Abaturage y’u Rwanda (BPR Plc.
) yatanze miliyoni 100 Frw zo gufasha abaturage bahungabanyijwe n’ingamba zafashwe zo gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus, inorohereza abakiliya bayo barimo n’abagizweho ingaruka.
Banki y’Abaturage y’u Rwanda (BPR Plc.
) yatanze miliyoni 100 Frw zo gufasha abaturage bahungabanyijwe n’ingamba zafashwe zo gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus, inorohereza abakiliya bayo barimo n’abagizweho ingaruka.
Amezi abiri agiye gushira u Rwanda rufashe ingamba zidasanzwe zigamije gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Nubwo ingamba zorohejwe, hari imwe mu miryango yagizweho ingaruka kuko hari ibikorwa byahagaritswe ku buryo imibereho ya bamwe yahindutse.
Ubuyobozi bwa BPR bwatangaje ko buzi neza ingaruka imiryango imwe n’imwe yagiye ihura nazo kubera ingamba zo guhashya Coronavirus, ariyo mpamvu biyemeje gutanga inkunga yabo ya miliyoni 100 Frw.
Itangazo iyo banki yashyize hanze rigira riti “COVID-19 n’ingaruka zayo ku bantu no ku bucuruzi zaratunguranye.
Banki izirikana ko hari bamwe mu banyamuryango bacu bahuye n’ingorane mu mibereho yabo ya buri munsi.
“Tunejejwe no gutangaza ko nk’umuryango mugari wa BPR twahaye Guverinoma y’u Rwanda umusanzu wa miliyoni 100 Frw, mu buryo bwo kunganira Leta muri gahunda irimo zo gufasha abagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus.
BPR yatangaje ko uretse gufasha abatishoboye, hanafashwe izindi ngamba zigamije gufasha abakiliya bayo bagizweho ingaruka na COVID-19.
Zimwe mu ngamba zafashwe harimo gushyiraho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bufasha abakiliya gukoresha konti zabo bitabaye ngombwa ko bajya gutonda imirongo ku mashami ya banki, bikaba byakongera ibyago byo kwandura Coronavirus.
Iyi banki yasabye abakiliya gukomeza gukoresha ubwo buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga burimo telefoni igendanwa bakanze *150#, gukoresha application ya banki na serivizi zayo ziboneka hakoreshejwe internet.
BPR ikomeza ivuga ko guhererekanya amafaranga bikozwe muri ubwo buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga nta kiguzi umukiliya acibwa, bikazamara amezi atatu.
Abakiliya bashobora no kugana abahagarariye iyi banki (agents) bari hirya no hino mu gihugu begereye aho batuye, bagahabwa serivisi za banki
BPR Plc ivuga ko abakiliya bari basanzwe bayifitemo inguzanyo bemerewe igihe kiri hagati y’amezi atatu n’atandatu batishyura bitewe n’imbogamiziri buri mukiliya yagiye ahura nazo.
Abakiliya ba BPR imishahara yabo yakoreshejwe mu gufasha Abanyarwanda guhangana na Coronavirus, bemerewe gusaba inguzanyo ingana n’umushahara wabo w’ukwezi batabonye, ikazatangira kwishyurwa nyuma y’ukwezi kandi bemererwa kuba bayishyura mu gihe cy’amezi 12.
BPR kandi ivuga ko abigomwe umushahara batazabasha kwishyura inguzanyo bari basanzwe bishyura, bazahabwa igihe cy’ukwezi batishyura kuko bizwi ko batazahembwa.
Iyi nguzanyo [personal loan] yishyurwa kugera ku mezi 12 bitewe n’ubushake bw’umukiliya.
BPR isobanura ko iyi nguzanyo nshya umukiliya aba ahawe ayishyura ku nyungu ingana n’iyo yari asanzwe yishyuriraho inguzanyo yari afite.
Abaye adafite inguzanyo ahabwa ku nyungu isanzwe ya banki.
BPR yanatekereje ku bakozi bakorera ibigo ariko ibikorwa byabo bikaba byarahagaze bityo bikaba bitazabasha kubahemba kandi bari basanzwe bafite inguzanyo.
Aba bemerewe kutishyura inguzanyo mu mezi atatu mu gihe ibyo bigo bikisuganya ngo byongere gutangira ibikorwa bibahembe.
Ibisabwa ku batanze umushahara w’ukwezi kwa kane bifuza inguzanyo ni ukwandikira BPR Plc kuri email [email protected] ukavuga amazina n’ibyo usaba.
Ku bakorera ibigo bifite ikibazo cyo kubahemba muri iki gihe bakwandika basaba guhabwa amezi yo gusubika kwishyura inguzanyo.
Umukoresha na we ashobora kwandikira BPR Plc asaba ko ifasha abakozi be batazabasha kwishyura inguzanyo kuko atazabahemba.
Aba banyuza ubusabe bwabo kuri email [email protected], bagasaba kwemererwa kutishyura inguzanyo mu gihe cy’amezi atatu.
Ku bakeneye ibindi bisobanuro kuri izi ngamba banki yashizeho zo gufasha abakiliya muri iki gihe cya Covid-19 cyangwa ikindi kibazo kuri serivisi za banki, bashobora guhamagara umurongo wa banki ku 1500.
Inyamaswa ni bimwe mu biremwa biri kungukira cyane mu ngamba zo kubuza abantu kugendagenda kubera coronavirus.
Muri Pariki ya Kruger muri Afurika y’Epfo, intare ziri kugaragara zigandagaje mu mihanda yo muri pariki, ahantu zitapfaga kugera mu bihe bisanzwe.
Inyamaswa ni bimwe mu biremwa biri kungukira cyane mu ngamba zo kubuza abantu kugendagenda kubera coronavirus.
Muri Pariki ya Kruger muri Afurika y’Epfo, intare ziri kugaragara zigandagaje mu mihanda yo muri pariki, ahantu zitapfaga kugera mu bihe bisanzwe.
Amafoto yakwirakwijwe kuri internet agaragaza intare zo muri iyo pariki ziryamye mu mutuzo, mu mihanda ya kaburimbo inyuramo imodoka zitwaye ba mukerarugendo basura iyo pariki.
Ubuyobozi bwa pariki ya Kruger buherutse gushyira hanze amafoto y’izo ntare ziryamye mu mihanda , buvuga ko ubusanzwe zitajyaga zihagera kubera ko hanyuraga ba mukerarugendo benshi.
Guhera tariki 25 Werurwe uyu mwaka, ibikorwa byo gusura pariki muri Afurika y’Epfo byarahagaritswe, bituma abakerarugendo bakundaga kuza muri iyo pariki babihagarika.
Umuvugizi w’iyo pariki, Isaac Phaahla yabwiye CNN ati “Ubusanzwe kuzibona ziryamye mu muhanda ku manywa ntibyakundaga kubaho kuko hahoraga urujya n’uruza bigatuma zihungira mu bihuru.
Icyakora, Isaac Phaahla yavuze ko kuba abakerarugendo batakiza kureba inyamaswa, nta byinshi byahinduye ku myitwarire yazo kuko nubundi aho zari zisanzwe ziba ari ho zikiba.
Perezida wa Afurika y’Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa yatangaje ko kuguma mu rugo hirindwa coronavirus bizakomeza kugeza mu mpera za Mata uyu mwaka.

Iyo havuzwe Umudepite nta kindi cyumvikana mu matwi ya benshi, uretse uwo umuturage aba yaritoreye ngo amuhagararire mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko atanga ibitekerezo by’impinduka zikenewe, ni nayo mpamvu babita intumwa za rubanda.
Mu nshingano z’intumwa za rubanda harimo gutora amategeko abareye abaturage, kugenzura ibikorwa bya guverinoma, kwemeza abayobozi runaka, hari n’ibihugu baba bafite inshingano zo gutora abakuru b’igihugu.
Nubwo baba baratowe n’abaturage ngo babahagararire, mu bihugu bimwe birimo n’u Rwanda, usanga hari abaturage bavuga ko baheruka babatora ntibazongere kubaca iryera cyangwa bagatora amategeko atabanogeye.
Tariki 19 Nzeri 2018 ubwo yakiraga indahiro z’Abadepite, Perezida Paul Kagame, yavuze ko bagomba kujya begera abaturage, bakabikora nk’uko babigenza iyo babashakamo amajwi.
Ati “Igihe mwese mwamaze mwiyamamaza hirya no hino mu gihugu, mwabonanye n’Abanyarwanda, uko mwabagezeho mubashakaho amajwi ariko bizakomeza kubageraho mubasanga, mufatanya gukemura ibibazo bafite.
Mu nteko habamo imirimo myinshi irimo kwiga imishinga y’amategeko, kuyisuzuma, kuyitangaho ibitekerezo n’ibindi.
Akenshi abaturage bamenya ubushobozi bw’umudepite batoye bitewe n’uburyo abavuganira, ibitekerezo atanga ku ngingo zitandukanye zizanwa mu Nteko, kubasura n’ibindi.
Hari ibihugu umudepite ugeze mu nteko ntiyongere kumvikana ku ngingo zibangamiye abaturage agaragazwa, byaba na ngombwa akaba yahagarikwa.
Nko mu 2018 muri Kenya, ikinyamakuru The Standard cyasohoye urutonde rw’abadepite batajya bavuga mu Nteko.
Havugwaga ko hari Abadepite bicara mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, ntibabe batekereza umushinga wafasha abaturage ahubwo icyo bakora, bikaba gusa gushyigikira imishinga yavuzwe n’abandi.
Iki kibazo cyazamuwe na bamwe mu badepite muri iki gihugu, batangiye bijujuta bavuga ko hari bagenzi babo bahitagamo kwisohokera, mu gihe abandi babaga bageze ku ngingo zikomeye zo gutorerwamo amategeko.
Depite Justin Bedan Njoka Muturi yabwiye abanyamakuru ati “Ntabwo nishimye kuko hari abadepite bagenzi bacu usanga birirwa bavuga ko bishimira ibyo bagezeho mu nteko, mu gihe mu by’ukuri ntacyo bigeze bakora.
Yavuze ko hari bamwe usanga batagaragara mu gihe barimo gushaka gushyiraho itegeko runaka, nyamara nyuma ryajya gutorwa ugasanga batangiye kwijujuta kandi batarigeze bagaragara mbere ngo baritangeho ibitekerezo.
Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Kenya yavuze ko 70% by’abayigize wasangaga nta jambo bafata ngo batange ibitekerezo, bamwe muri bakaba baravugaga ko babiterwa n’uko babaga bakiri bashya mu nshingano.

Dr Habineza avuga ko ubwabo nk’abadepite badashobora kwicara ngo banenge umudepite runaka utajya utanga ibitekerezo, keretse wenda bikorewe mu mutwe wa politike aturukamo.

Ati “Burya hari ibintu abantu batazi, mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko akazi gakorwa mu byiciro bitandukanye, hari imirimo ikorerwa muri komisiyo abadepite bakajya impaka ku mategeko, nyuma akazashyikirizwa inteko rusange, aha ni naho abaturage bose baba babyumva kuri radiyo.
“Hari abantu benshi usanga bazi ko dutangira akazi saa cyenda mu gihe harimo inteko rusange ariko siko biri.

Ibitaramo bya Iwacu Muzika 2020 biri gutambuka kuri Televiziyo Rwanda no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye bitewe n’uko Isi muri rusange iri mu bihe byo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, tariki ya 27 Kamena 2020, nibwo igitaramo cya kabiri cyabaye.
Kuri gahunda biteganyijwe ko umuhanzi umwe ariwe uzajya ataramira abakunzi b’umuziki Nyarwanda.
Igitaramo cya mbere cyatumiwemo Bruce Melodie, uwa kabiri yari Igor Mabano.
Yabanjirijwe ku rubyiniro n’abanyempano banyuze mu irushanwa rya ArtRwanda-Ubuhanzi rigamije guhishura impano z’urubyiruko.
ArtRwanda - Ubuhanzi yibanze ku gushaka impano zo mu byiciro birimo Ubugeni, Indirimbo n’Imbyino, Imideli, Ikinamico n’Urwenya, Filimi no Gufata Amafoto, Ubusizi n’Ubuvanganzo.
Mu banyuze muri iri rushanwa bahawe umwanya mu gitaramo cya kabiri cya Iwacu Muzika Festival 2020, harimo Octave Muhakwa umuhanzi w’imideri na Faustin Havugimana umusizi akaba n’umwanditsi w’ibitabo.
Aba bose bahawe umwanya ngo bagaragaze impano zabo, mbere babanzaga kuganira n’umunyamakuru wa RBA, Lucky Nzeyimana, wari uyoboye iki gitaramo.
Ni ikiganiro cyibandaga ku nyungu bakuye muri ArtRwanda- Ubuhanzi n’intambwe bamaze gutera.
Aba bose bashimye uburyo bungukiye byinshi muri ArtRwanda- Ubuhanzi ndetse bagaragaza ko kugeza ubu bari gukora cyane ngo inzozi zabo zibe impamo.

Nyuma y’imyaka 300 yo gusahura Afurika abaturage bayo bajyanwa ku ngufu mu mirimo y’agahato n’ubucakara muri Amerika, mu 1884 Abanyaburayi bahinduye umuvuno noneho bajya umugambi wo kugira Afurika iyabo.
Ni umushinga wakoranywe ubugome nk’uwa mbere kuko ubuzima bw’umunyafurika icyo gihe ntacyo bwari buvuze, icyari kibaraje ishinga ni ugukungahaza ibihugu byabo basahura mutungo kamere wa Afurika.
Mu 1884 Abanyaburayi birengagije miliyoni z’abanyafurika bapfiriye mu buretwa no mu nzira bajyanywe mu bucakara muri Amerika, bongera kureba ibiri mu nyungu zabo ku Mugabane wari usanzwe uri ukwawo.
Ku gicamunsi cyo kuwa Gatandatu tariki 15 Ugushyingo 1884, i Berlin mu ngoro y’ubwami bw’u Budage izwi nka Wilhelmstrasse hateraniye inama mpuzamahanga.
Iyo nama yari yatumijwe n’uwari Chancelier w’u Budage, Otto von Bismarck.

Mu mabwiriza ibihugu byaganiye i Berlin byahawe, harimo ko niba igihugu cyageze ku butaka runaka bwa Afurika, buzitwa ubwacyo ari uko kibimenyesheje bigenzi byacyo i Burayi kandi kuri ubwo butaka hakoherezwayo ingabo nke.
Intego yo kujya muri Afurika kwari ukuhazana ibyo bise ‘iterambere’, kuhasakaza ubukirisitu no guteza imbere ubucuruzi ‘bwabo’.
Kugira ngo igihugu cyemererwe ko ubutaka cyafashe ari ubwacyo, cyagombaga gisinyana n’abategetsi gakondo baho inyandiko yemera ko bemeye abakoloni ariko bakazahabwa uburinzi n’icyo gihugu cyabakolonije.
Ibyo ntibyari bigoye dore ko abategetsi benshi muri Afurika batari bazi kwandika cyangwa gusoma.
Mu gihe cyo kugabana Afurika, uduce duke tw’uwo mugabane nitwo twari twaragezwemo n’Abanyaburayi.
Abenshi bari baragiye bakambika ku nkengero z’uwo mugabane ku bice bikora ku nyanja.
Mu 1900 nibwo batangiye kwinjira imbere muri Afurika bashakisha ibyo kwifashisha mu nganda zabo nk’amabuye y’agaciro, Caoutchouc yakoreshwaga mu nganda zikora ibinyabiziga mu Burayi n’ibindi.
U Bubiligi nibwo bwabyungukiyemo cyane kuko umwami Leopold II yahawe ububasha bwo kugenzura ubutaka bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, gusa ategekwa kuhubaka ku buryo haba ahantu h’ubucuruzi hagati y’Abanyaburayi bose muri Afurika, mbese buri gihugu cy’i Burayi gishaka kuhisanzura kikabikora.
Mu bindi yasabwe ni ugukwirakwiza ubukiristu mu bice byose bigize Congo.
Nubwo Leopold II yari yemeye ko Congo izabyazwa umusaruro n’abanyaburayi bose, siko byagenze kuko amasezerano yo gucukura no gutwara umutungo kamere wa Congo amenshi yasinyishwaga sosiyete zo mu Bubiligi.
Mu 1908 byaje kumenyekana ko ku mabwiriza ya Leopold II, abaturage ba Congo bategekwaga kujya gushaka ingano runaka ya Caoutchouc bashyira abatware b’Ababiligi, batabikora bagacibwa amaboko cyangwa ibirenge.
Leopold II yaje kwamburwa Congo iherezwa Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi.
Kuva mu 1885 kugeza mu 1908, miliyoni z’abanye-Congo zari zimaze gupfa zishwe, ziciwe amaboko, zikubiswe kubera "ibikorwa by’agakiza" Léopold II yari yavuze ko abazaniye, nyamara byahe byokajya.
Kugeza mu 1914, nibura 90 % by’ibihugu bya Afurika byari mu maboko y’ibihugu birindwi by’i Burayi.
Afurika yasanze guhindura imipaka byateza ibindi bibazo bidashira
Imipaka yashyizweho n’abakoloni niyo ikigenderwaho n’uyu munsi.
Mu mabwiriza ibihugu byari byahawe, ni uko abaturage bakolonijwe n’igihugu runaka, babaga batemerewe guhahirana n’abo badahuje igihugu kibakolonije.
Akinwumi avuga ko kubera ko abenshi mu bagiye bacibwaho imipaka babaga ari abaturage bo mu bwoko bumwe, kubategeka kudahahirana kuko baciriweho imipaka byateje amakimbirane akigaragara n’ubu.
Ati “Iriya nama yangije byinshi cyane muri Afurika.
Hari ibihugu bikigerwaho n’ingaruka zayo uyu munsi.
Mu myaka ya 1960, abayobozi b’ibihugu bya Afurika byari bikibona ubwigenge bashatse guhindura imipaka yashyiriweho mu nama y’i Berlin ariko basanga byateza ibibazo byinshi kurusha ibyo byakemura.
Umushakashatsi ku mateka y’ubukoloni muri Afurika, akaba n’umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya Erfurt, Michael Pesek, yagize ati “Abayobozi benshi ahagana mu 1960, bavugaga ko baramutse bayihinduye byaba ari ukwiteza ibibazo byinshi.
Inzobere zivuga ko icyo gihe nibura amakimbirane yari ashingiye hagati mu baturage atari hagati y’ibihugu.
Guhindura imipaka byari kwiyongeraho andi makimbirane hagati y’ibihugu, ibintu bikazamba kurushaho.
Mu mwaka wa 2010 ubwo hizihizwaga imyaka 125 ishize inama y’i Berlin irangiye, abari bahagarariye ibihugu bya Afurika muri uwo munsi wizihirijwe Berlin bavuze ko Afurika ikeneye impozamarira y’ibyangijwe n’ubukoloni ndetse bavuga ko ibyakozwe ari ibyaha byibasiye inyokomuntu.
Nubwo basabye impozamarira, nta na kimwe cyakozwe.
Pesek yemeza ko bidatunguranye kuba ntacyo Afurika yahawe.
Ati “Hari ibindi byagiye bivugwa byo guha impozamarira Afurika kubw’ubucakara ndetse n’impozamarira kubwa Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi.
Nyamara ntawe ujya ukomoza ku myaka isaga ijana abanyaburayi bamaze muri Afurika bayikoloniza.
Ghana nicyo gihugu cya Afurika cyabashije kwigobotora bwa mbere ingoyi cyashyizweho n’inama y’i Berlin, kibona ubwigenge.
Mu 2000 hafi ibihugu byose byahoze bikolonijwe muri Afurika byari bimaze kubona ubwigenge.

Kimwe mu biranga abayoboke bo mu madini atandukanye yo hirya no hino ku Isi cyane cyane aya gikirisitu igihe bagiye gusenga, ni ugufunga amaso n’ubwo baba batazi impamvu babikora.

Umuyobozi wa Zion Temple mu ntara y’amajyepfo Pasiteri Eric Ruhagararabahunga avuga ko n’ubwo ntaho uyu muco wo gusenga umuntu ahumirije wanditse muri Bibiliya, ko ariko ufasha usenga kutarangara.
Ati “Ntaho twahita tubibona muri Bibiliya ako kanya ariko guhumiriza bigufasha kutarangara, usenze ureba hari igihe urangara, ikinyuraho cyose uba ukireba rero ntabwo uba witaye cyane kuri uriya muntu uri gusabana nawe, niyo mpamvu rero akenshi umuntu afunga amaso, n’ubwo ntaho Bibiliya ivuga ngo muzasenge mufunze amaso".
Ruhagararabahunga yongeyeho ko iyo usenze uhumirije Imana ibona ko ibyo uvuga bikuvuye ku mutima “Urumva ko iyo usenze uhumirije icya mbere nturangara ikindi n’uriya uri kuramya biratuma abona ko ukomeje mu byo ukora, bituma Imana ibona ko uyihanze amaso".
N’ubwo gusenga bifasha usenga kutarangara, Pasiteri Ruhagararabahunga, avuga ko umuntu usenga areba kandi akabikora neza nta kosa aba akoze.
Umutoni Sandrine, Umukirisitu usengera muri Kiliziya Gatolika avuga ko kuri we gusenga ahumirije bigira icyo byongera ku isengesho.
Ati “Iyo mumpirije mba numva niyumva mu isengesho, nkumva ibyo ndi kuvuga bimvuye ku mutima, ariko iyo uri kureba hari ibintu byinshi bikurangaza ni yo waba uri ahantu hatari kunyura abantu".
N’ubwo abakirisitu bavuga ko uyu muco wo guhumiriza ubafasha kutarangara, ku rundi ruhande abahanga mu mateka bo bavuga ko umuco wo gusenga umuntu ahumirije ukomoka mu bihe by’abami, aho umuntu atashoboraga kujya imbere y’umwami cyangwa undi muyobozi ngo amuhange amaso.
