Sosiyete ya Twitter yatangaje ko yamaze gusiba konti zisaga ibihumbi 170 zakwirakwizaga ubutumwa bukubiyemo amatwara y’u Bushinwa, Turikiya n’u Burusiya.
Sosiyete ya Twitter yatangaje ko yamaze gusiba konti zisaga ibihumbi 170 zakwirakwizaga ubutumwa bukubiyemo amatwara y’u Bushinwa, Turikiya n’u Burusiya.
Hari konti 23,750 zasibwe zakoreshwaga cyane muri ubwo buryo n’izindi 150 000 zafashaga mu kugeza ubwo butumwa kuri benshi.
Twitter yatangaje ko muri konti zasibwe, izifite aho zihuriye n’icengezamatwara ry’u Burusiya zigeze ku gihumbi mu gihe iza Turikiya zigera ku 7340.
Ibyari biri kuri izo konti byasibwe ariko bishyirwa mu bubiko bwa Twitter ku buryo byakwifashishwa mu bushakashatsi.
Umwaka ushize, Twitter nabwo yavumbuye konti z’u Bushinwa zakoreshwaga mu icengezwamatwara ubwo habaga imyigaragambyo muri Hong Kong.
Twitter yatangaje ko uburyo bakoresheje bavumbura izo konti umwaka ushize aribwo bwakoreshejwe no muri iki gihe.
Konti zasibwe, Twitter ivuga ko zakwirakwizaga icengezamatwara rishimagiza ibyo u Bushinwa buri gukora muri Hong Kong, ibitekerezo by’u Bushinwa kuri Coronavirus no kuri Taiwan.
Ubusanzwe ibyandikwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zirimo Twitter, YouTube na Facebook biragenzurwa cyane mu Bushinwa.
Twitter yatangaje ko konti zasibwe zijyanye na Turikiya ari izabaga zigamije kugaragaza neza isura ya Perezida Recep Tayyip Erdogan mu gihe iz’u Burusiya zasibwe ari izabaga zigamije gucengeza imyumvire n’ingengabitekerezo y’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi muri icyo gihugu no kwibasira abatavuga rumwe na Leta.

Igitangaje, ntabwo ari benshi bifashisha icyo gikoresho nkoranabuhanga mu gihe bishyura amafaranga ya internet ituma icyo gikoresho gikora, turacyahata inzira amaguru tujya mu maduka kugura ama-inite yo gukoresha, tukirirwana amafaranga mu mufuka hato akaba yanakwibwa ngo tugiye guhaha.
Airtel iri guhindura iyo migirire ya kera, itangiza uburyo bwa MyAirtel app aho serivisi hafi ya zose ushobora kuzishyurira kuri telefone yawe bitabaye ngombwa ko uva aho uri.
Serivise ziri muri ‘My Airtel App’ zirimo izo kugura ama-inite, internet, kwishyura ibyo ukeneye byose nk’amazi, amashanyarazi, ifatabuguzi rya televiziyo, kohereza amafaranga haba mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, byose bigakorwa hifashishijwe ikarita ya banki cyangwa Airtel Money.
Iyi porogaramu ya telefone ikumenya guhera ku munsi wa mbere ukiyikoresha, ibiri kuri nimero yawe ya telefone ibimenya uko biri kose ku buryo igihe ugiye kuyikoresha bitakugora.
Iyi porogaramu ibika ibyo wayikoreyeho bitewe n’icyo wishyuye cyangwa waguze, icyo wohereje n’ibindi, ku buryo iyo wongeye kugira icyo ukoraho wakoreyeho ubushize, ikwereka ibisigaye.
Urugero niba uguze megabytes zo gukoresha kuri internet, zishira uzireba ku buryo utajya mu ihurizo ryo kwisanga internet yashize.
Ni uburyo bukorwa mu kanya gato kurusha kubikorera kuri internet.
Hari n’uburyo bwo kwiyoherereza inyemezabwishyu y’icyo umaze kugura ukoresheje iyo porogaramu.
Iyi porogaramu ya MyAirtel app ikomeje gushimwa na benshi batangiye kuyikoresha.
Ntabwo ari ngombwa gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kwishyura urenze telefone yawe, manura iyo porogaramu ubuzima bworohe.
‘My Airtel App’ ikora igihe cyose (amasaha 24 ku minsi 7), inafasha abayikoresha gukurikirana buri gihe ibibera kuri konti za bo za banki na Airtel Money bitabagoye na gato, ndetse ikaba idasaba kuba umuntu afite internet mu gihe ari kuyikoresha.
Umutekano w’iyi ‘Application’ wizewe ku rwego rwo hejuru kuko itemerera undi muntu kuba yakoresha imyirondoro yawe agamije kwiba amafaranga ufite kuri konti iyo ari yo yose, cyangwa gukora ikindi kintu cyabangamira umukiliya wa Airtel uyikoresha.
Akarusho kandi ni uko kugura ama-inite ukoresheje iyi porogaramu biguhesha uburenganzira bwo guhabwa inyongera ndetse koherereza undi muntu byo bikaguhesha inyongera ya 5% by’ama-inite yose wohereje.
Iyi porogaramu izorohereza abajyaga bagorwa no gufata mu mutwe za kode zitandukanye mu kugura cyangwa gukoresha serivise za Airtel, kuko buri kimwe cyose cyorohejwe muri ‘My Airtel App’ igisigarana.
Umuntu ukeneye gukoresha iyi porogaramu ajya muri ’Play Store’ kubakoresha telefoni za ’Android’ cyangwa ’App Store’ ku bakoresha iOS; ukandika mu ishakiro "My Airtel", hakaza ifite amagambo ya ’Airtel Africa’, ubundi ukayishyira muri telefone yawe nk’uko bikorwa ku zindi porogaramu.

Facebook yatangaje ko yari ikeneye gukora impinduka mu buryo uru rubuga rugaragarira abarukoresha.
Yagize iti “Tumaze gukura cyane uhereye ubwo Facebook yashingwaga mu myaka 16 ishize, twubatse ibishya ku rubuga, tubasha gukorana n’ibikoresho bitandukanye by’ikoranabuhanga na porogaramu nshya ndetse dutangira gukoresha indimi amagana.
Mu minsi ishize twibanze cyane mu guhindura uburyo Facebook ikoreshwa kuri telefoni igendanwa, ariko tuza gusanga iyo kuri mudasobwa yarasigaye inyuma.
Byari bikenewe kuyijyanisha n’ibihe.
Ikindi gishya ni uburyo umuntu ashobora kubaka amatsinda abantu bahuriramo, paji za Facebook no kwamamaza byihuse kurusha mbere.

Icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyatumye ibikorwa byinshi bifungwa, ndetse n’ubwo Guverinoma iheruka gufata umwanzuro ko bimwe bifungurwa nyuma y’iminsi isaga 40, byasabwe gukoresha abakozi bake, kandi bigafungura hagati ya saa kumi n’imwe za mu gitondo na saa mbili z’ijoro.
Minisiteri y’Imari n’Igenamigambi yakoze gahunda igamije kuzahura ubukungu bw’u Rwanda, zirimo gushyigikira ibikorwa by’ubuvuzi, kwita ku batishoboye, gutera inkunga ibigo bya leta, inkunga ya leta mu kigega cyo kuzahura ubukungu n’izindi ngamba zigamije guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus.
Bumwe mu buryo burimo kwifashisha mu korohereza ibigo byagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus, harimo uburyo bwo kuvanaho imwe mu misoro, aho kubara avansi y’umusoro ku nyungu z’ibigo n’iz’abantu ku giti cyabo, bizashingira ku byacurujwe uyu mwaka.

Indi gahunda yihariye igamije gufasha abashoramari n’abikorera mu byiciro bitandukanye bagizweho ingaruka n’iki cyorezo, aho leta yashyizeho gahunda yo gutangiza ikigega kibafasha kubona amafaranga yo gukoresha.
Ati “Ni ikigega cyafasha amabanki gutanga inguzanyo iciriritse yafasha ibyo byiciro byose kugira ngo bigaruke mu kazi byongere bikore, bibyare umusaruro uzagire ingaruka mu kuzamuka k’ubukungu muri rusange.
“Icyo kigega cyaranogejwe, harimo inkunga yihariye ku mahoteli kuko bigaragara ko ubukerarugendo bizamara igihe kugira ngo bwongere buzanzamuke kuko ntibiterwa n’uko ibihe byifashe mu Rwanda ahubwo uko byifashe ku Isi hose.
Dr Ndagijimana yavuze muri icyo kigega hashyizwemo ingamba zihariye zifasha amahoteli kuvugurura amasezerano y’inguzanyo afite mu mabanki akaba igihe kirekire n’inyungu zikagabanuka, ndetse ku buryo mu gihe yatangiye gufungura, abona amafaranga aciriritse kugira ngo imirimo yongere ikore.
Yavuze ko icyo kigega “kizafasha ubucuruzi ubwo aribwo bwose bwagizweho ingaruka, hari ibipimo bizagenderwaho kugira ngo ababirimo babone amafaranga aciriritse ku gihe cyiza noneho bongere bakore bihutishe imirimo".
Ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse nabyo biri mu bizahabwa inguzanyo n’ingwate kuko ingwate zikunze kuba ikibazo kuri bene ibyo byiciro.
Ni ikigega biteganyijwe ko gishobora kujyamo nka Miliyari 100 Frw avuye muri leta, ariko hagakomeza gushakwa n’abandi bashyiramo amafaranga kugira ngo cyaguke.
Ati “Turateganya ko mu gihe cy’icyumweru kimwe cyaba gitangiye".
Mu kugabanya icyuho kiri hagati y’ibyoherezwa mu mahanga n’ibitumizwayo, u Rwanda rurateganya gukomeza guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, abanyarwanda bagakangukira kubigura kugira ngo bisimbure ibyo hanze.
Myugariro w’Ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavubi’ na Buildcon FC yo muri Zambia, Usengimana Faustin, yarushinze kuri uyu wa Gatandatu hamwe na Umuraza Daniella Bayingana bamaze imyaka 10 bakundana.
Myugariro w’Ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavubi’ na Buildcon FC yo muri Zambia, Usengimana Faustin, yarushinze kuri uyu wa Gatandatu hamwe na Umuraza Daniella Bayingana bamaze imyaka 10 bakundana.
Umuhango wo gusezerana imbere y’Imana wabaye kuri uyu wa 16 Ugushyingo 2019 muri Parkland Remera, aho wari witabiriwe n’imiryango y’aba bombi bashyigikiwe n’inshuti n’abavandimwe.
Mu baherekeje Usengimana ntihagaragayemo benshi mu bakinanye na we mu makipe yanyuzemo biganjemo abenshi bari mu Ikipe y’Igihugu Amavubi yitegura umukino wa Cameroun.
Ibirori by’uyu myugariro n’umukunzi we bemeranyije kubana akaramata byari binogeye ijisho.
Ku wa 9 Ugushyingo 2019, ni bwo Usengimana Faustin yasabye ndetse anakwa Bayingana Daniella mu muhango wabereye mu Busitani bwa Kaminuza ya UTB Ishami rya Rubavu, aho uyu mukobwa avuka.
Byakurikiye igikorwa cyo guhamya isezerano ryabo imbere y’amategeko, bashyiriyeho umukono mu Murenge wa Kimironko mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Usengimana yatangiye gukundana na Daniella mu 2009, bivuze ko aba bombi bamaranye imyaka 10 bari mu rukundo, ibidakunze kugaragara mu byamamare yaba hano mu Rwanda n’i mahanga.
Abakurikirana imbuga nkoranyambaga za Usengimana n’umukunzi we, ntibahwema kubona iby’urukundo rwabo cyane ko usanga buri umwe adahisha kwerekana ko yanyuzwe n’ubuzima babanyemo.
Babigaragazaga bifashishije amafoto berekanaga aherekejwe n’amagambo aryohereye cyane aranga abari mu rukundo.
Aba bombi kandi bahuriye ku mpakanizi igira iti #TEAM15FORLife, ijambo bakunda gukoresha bombi ku mbuga nkoranyamabaga zabo.
Usengimana Faustin yakiniye amakipe atandukanye mu Rwanda arimo Rayon Sports yanazamukiyemo na APR FC, aha hose akaba yaragiye atwara ibikombe.
Ari mu itsinda ry’abakinnyi Rayon Sports yifashishije ikora amateka yo kugera mu matsinda mu irushanwa rya CAF Confederations Cup mu 2018.
Usengimana Faustin kandi yanakiniye Ikipe y’Igihugu mu byiciro byose yaba iy’Abatarengeje imyaka 17 yakinnye Igikombe cy’Isi muiri Mexique, iy’Abatarengeje imyaka 20 na 23 n’Ikipe y’Igihugu Nkuru.
Nyuma yo kuva muri Kuwait, kuri ubu Usengimana akina muri Zambia muri Buildcon FC, akaba ari no mu mu bakinnyi b’inkingi za mwamba muri iyi kipe.

Jonathan Steingard, inkingi ya mwamba mu itsinda rya riririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana mu Njyana ya Rock rizwi Hawk Nelson, yavuze ko atacyizerera mu Mana.
Mu butumwa burebure uyu muririmbyi yasangije abamukurikira kuri Instagram yagaragaje atari umwe mu bizera Imana.
Ati “Maze igihe kinini nterwa ubwoba no kubasangiza ibi ariko ubu ndiyumvamo ko ari cyo gihe cyiza kuri njye kuba navugisha ukuri.
Ndizera ko iri atari iherezo ry’ikiganiro ahubwo ari intangiriro.
Yakomeje avuga ko kuba yarakuriye mu muryango usenga, akaba umwana w’umupasiteri agacuranga ndetse akaba n’umuririmbyi muri band ya gikirisitu akanitwa umukirisitu mu bintu byinshi yagiye anyuramo mu buzima bwe yaje gusanga ‘ubu atacyizerera mu Mana’.
Arongera ati “Amagambo aheruka make mu nteruro yari akomeye kuyandika, nashakaga no koroshya iyi nyandiko nkabyandika bitandukanye n’uko nabikoze ariko ntabwo byari kuba ukuri nk’uko bimeze gutya.
Uyu muhanzi ntabwo yigeze avuga niba ateganya kureka kuririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana.
Steingard yari amaze igihe kinini atekereza uburyo azabyandikamo.
Ngo yatangiye ashidikanya we ubwe aza kubiganiriza inshuti ze za hafi.
Yaje gutungurwa no gusanga hari abandi bakuriye mu nsengero nkawe batinya kubivuga kubera ko babura buri kimwe.
Abo basanzwe babana muri band bamushyigikiye bavuga ko intego yabo ari ugufasha abantu no kubatera imbaraga mu byo bakora mu kuri kuko Imana iri kumwe nabo kandi iri mu ruhande rwabo.

I’ve been terrified to post this for a while - but it feels like it’s time for me to be honest.
I hope this is not the end of the conversation, but the beginning.
I hope this is encouraging to people who might feel the same but are as afraid to speak as I am.
I want to be open.
I want to be transparent with you all - and also open to having my heart changed in the future.
I am not looking for a debate at all - just a chance to share my story in the hopes some good can come from it.

Abakerarugendo n’abandi babishaka ubu bashobora gusura ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga bari mu rugo, ni nyuma y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo mu gihugu kimwe n’ahandi byabaye bihagaritswe by’agateganyo mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Abakerarugendo n’abandi babishaka ubu bashobora gusura ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga bari mu rugo, ni nyuma y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo mu gihugu kimwe n’ahandi byabaye bihagaritswe by’agateganyo mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Muri iki cyumweru Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB), ku bufatanye na The Ellen Fund, Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund na Habitat XR, batangaje ko bazanye uburyo abantu bashobora gusura ingagi zo mu birunga bifashishije uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga buzwi nka ‘Virtual Reality (VR)’.
Ubu buryo bwatangijwe kuwa 22 Mata 2020, ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi wahariwe kurengera Isi n’ibiyiriho, butuma abantu basura ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga, bibereye mu rugo.
Umunyamerikakazi akaba n’Umunyarwenya Ellen DeGeneres, uri no kubaka ikigo kizajya urimo kubaka ikigo kizajya gifasha mu bikorwa byo kubungabunga Ingagi muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga mu Rwanda, yavuze ko ubu buryo bwo gusura ingagi ‘budasanzwe kuko ari nk’aho uba uri kumwe n’ingagi’.
Iyi filimi y’iminota itandatu n’amasegonda atatu ikwereka imbonankubone ingagi zo mu birunga mu buryo butangaje ziri aho zisanzwe ziba mu birunga kandi ziri mu buzima busanzwe bwa buri munsi.
Bugufasha kuryoherwa n’ubwiza bwo gusura ingagi zo mu birunga mu Rwanda ukamera neza neza nk’uri kumwe na zo kuko amajwi yazo n’ay’inyoni z’aho ziri byose uba ubyumva nk’uri kumwe nazo.
Iyi filimi kuyireba ni ubuntu, ushobora kuyireba ku mbuga nka Oculus, Within, Samsung VR, Littlstar na VeeR.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo na Pariki z’igihugu muri RDB, Belise Kariza, avuga ko urwego rw’ubukerarugendo ku Isi rwashegeshwe bikomeye na Coronavirus, yatumye ibihugu bihagarika by’agateganyo gusura ingagi.
Avuga ko bibabaje kuba badashobora kwakira abashyitsi baje kureba no kwishimira ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda ariko ari mu nyungu za buri wese kuguma mu rugo mu gihe bakomeje gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa mu gukora no gusangiza abantu ibyiza nk’ibiri muri iyi filimi yo gusura ingagi uri mu rugo.

Ishyaka ritavuga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi, National Democratic Congress ryamaze gutangaza ko uwahoze ari Umukuru w’iki gihugu, John Mahama ari we uzaba arihagarariye ahanganye na Perezida uriho, Nana Akufo-Addo.
Muri iki gihugu hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu n’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko tariki 27 Ukuboza ndetse n’amatora y’abandi bayobozi batandukanye ateganyijwe mu Ukwakira.

Amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu ateganyijwe tariki 27 Ukuboza.
Umuvugizi w’ishyaka "Kwa Na Kwa" ry’uwahoze ari Perezida w’iki gihugu Francois Bozizé, yatangaje ko aziyamamariza kuyobora iki gihugu.
Hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihu mu Ukuboza.
Ishyaka ritavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, Seychelles National Party ryamaze gutanga Ramkalawan nk’umukandida ku mwanya wa Perezida aho azaba ahanganye na Perezida Danny Faure aziyamamariza indi manda.
Ku wa Mbere tariki 4 Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yashyize mu murimo mishya bamwe mu bayobozi banyuranye.
Bamporiki Edouard yagizwe Umunyamabanga wa leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco.
Ku wa Mbere tariki 4 Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yashyize mu murimo mishya bamwe mu bayobozi banyuranye.
Bamporiki Edouard yagizwe Umunyamabanga wa leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco.
Nyuma yo guhabwa uyu mwanya Bamporiki Edouard yashimiye Perezida Kagame amwizeza ko atazamutenguha ndetse azasohoza ubutumwa amutumye.
Abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, Bamporiki yagize ati “Witaba kare ugatumwa kure, Watumwa n’Umukuru ugashima ushingura ugana iyo utumwe.
Ubutumwa mumpaye Nyakubahwa Mutoza w’Ikirenga Paul Kagame nzabusohoza bwemye, nzaharanira kutaruta ubutumwa kuko buruta intumwa.
Nzaba Mudahusha ku ruhembe muntumye kurasaniraho.
U Rwanda nirweme.
Ubu butumwa buri mu Kinyarwanda cyiza, bwumvikanisha uburyo uyu mugabo wari usanzwe ari umukuru w’Itorero ry’Igihugu yishimiye inshingano nshya yahawe.
Usibye kuzishimira, ikindi Bamporiki yavuzemo ni uko atazigera ashaka kuruta ubutumwa ahawe kuko buruta intumwa.
Aha akaba yumvikanishaga ko atazitwaza umwanya abonye ngo akomere kuruta inshingano ze.
Bamporiki yamenyekanye nk’umukinnyi wa filime, ikinamico akaba n’umwanditsi w’ibitabo, imivugo n’ibisigo, azwi cyane mu ikinamico urunana aho akina yitwa Tadeyo cyangwa se Kideyo, aho akina ari se wa Budensiyana na Solina, inshuti ya Bushombe na Sitefano b’i Nyarurembo.
Yavutse tariki 24 Ukuboza 1983, i Nyamasheke mu Ntara y’Iburengerazuba, ari naho yaje kwiga amashuri abanza ndetse n’ayisumbuye, nyuma yiga amategeko mpuzamahanga muri Kaminuza yigenga ya Kigali ULK.
Yakuze akunda cyane kwandika imivugo, bituma yitabira amarushanwa atandukanye mu bigo by’amashuri.
Afite imyaka 11 gusa y’amavuko, yakoze umuvugo witwa “Iyo badatsembwa tuba dutwenga" ari nawo watumye amenyekana nk’umusizi akiri umwana.
Amaze kuba umusore yagiye abona umwanya wo kuvuga imivugo mu birori bitandukanye byo ku rwego rw’igihugu, nko ku munsi mukuru w’Intwari n’indi minsi mikuru itandukanye.
Bamporiki wari usanzwe yumva ikinamico “Urunana" akiri muto, akifuza kuba umwe mu bakinnyi bayo, mu 2003 yashakishije aho umushinga uyitegura ukorera, arahamenya maze agezeyo arabinginga ngo bareke ajye akinamo.
Aza kubyemererwa maze ahabwa umwanya yitwa Tadeyo.
N’ubwo abantu bagiye bumva Tadeyo akina ari umusaza ndetse ufite abana bakuru n’abuzukuru, yari muto kuko icyo gihe yari afite imyaka 20 y’amavuko, bamwe mu bakinaga byumvikana ko ababereye umubyeyi baramurutaga.
Mu bindi bijyanye n’ubuhanzi, Bamporiki yakunze kugaragara muri filime zitandukanye ndetse ahabwa ibikombe n’ibihembo muri sinema, haba mu z’abandi yagiye akinamo ndetse no mu zo yagiye yandika akanazikinamo.
Muri z’abandi yagaragayemo harimo iyitwa ’Munyurangabo’ y’uwitwa Isaac Chung ukomoka muri Amerika, iyitwa ’Rwanda take two’ ya Pia nawe wo muri Amerika, n’iyitwa ’Imitoma’ ya Kwezi John.
Mu mafilime yanditse ku giti cye akanakinamo harimo iyitwa ‘Ukuri kuri he’ ndetse na ‘Long Coat’ (Ikote rirerire).
Mu 2006 yitabiriye Iserukiramuco ry’amafilime rya Cannes mu Bufaransa, mu 2010 yitabira iryabereye i Rotterdam mu Buholandi, mu 2011 yitabira iryabereye muri Turikiya ryitwa “Crimes and punishment".
Mu 2008 yabonye igihembo yakuye i New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akaba yarahembewe kwandika filime nziza (Best Script) abikesheje filime “Long Coat", yagaragayemo abahanzi b’Abanyarwanda nka Nirere Shanel, Mani Martin n’umukinnyi Jimmy Gatete.
Mu 2011 yabonye igihembo cy’umukinnyi mwiza (Best Actor) mu iserukiramuco rya Heart Land.
Nyuma y’ubuhanzi mu byiciro bitandukanye, Bamporiki mu 2013 yatorewe kuba intumwa ya rubanda, aba Umudepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda.
Ku itariki ya 30 Kanama 2017, Bamporiki yahawe imirimo mishya agirwa Umuyobozi w’Itorero ry’Igihugu.
Bamporiki ni umugabo wubatse, wambikanye impeta y’urudashira na Uwingabire Claudine tariki ya 18 Ukuboza 2010.
Bamporiki yize amasomo atandukanye, arimo ajyanye na sinema yize i Burayi ahitwa Plague, aza no kwiga muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ibijyanye no kubaka amahoro no kurwanya amakimbirane.
Mu masomo asanzwe yize muri Kaminuza yigenga ya Kigali ULK aho yakuye impamyabumenyi y’icyiciro cya gatatu mu mategeko mpuzamahanga.

Icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze kwandurwa n’abarenga miliyoni enye kigahitana abasaga ibihumbi 287, ku Isi yose, kiravumirwa ku gahera n’abakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi, nubwo bamwe mu bafite ibigo by’ikoranabuhanga bakomeje kubyinira ku rukoma.
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze kwandurwa n’abarenga miliyoni enye kigahitana abasaga ibihumbi 287, ku Isi yose, kiravumirwa ku gahera n’abakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi, nubwo bamwe mu bafite ibigo by’ikoranabuhanga bakomeje kubyinira ku rukoma.
Bitewe n’ingamba zitandukanye zo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, ibihugu bitandukanye byafashe cyane cyane gahunda ya ‘guma mu rugo’, abaturage benshi barifashisha ikoranabuhanga mu gusaba serivisi, kugura no gutuma ibicuruzwa ndetse no kuganira no gukora inama.
Bitewe no gukorera mu rugo, ibigo bitanga serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga rifasha abantu kuganira no kuba bakora inama ari benshi byarungutse.
Urugero ni nka Zoom ikomeje gufasha abantu benshi gukora inama.
Nubwo hari ibibazo by’umutekano byakomeje kuvugwa kuri Zoom, ntibyabujije abayikoresha ndetse n’igiciro cyayo kwiyongera, aho cyikubye inshuro zirenga ebyiri kuva mu Ukuboza.
Umubare w’abakoresha Zoom wavuye kuri miliyoni 10 ku munsi ugera kuri miliyoni 200.
Ikoreshwa mu nzego zose kuva ku bakora inama z’abaminisitiri kugeza ku bashumba bifuza kuvugana uko umukamo uhagaze n’ibindi.
Hari kandi abakoresha ubundi buryo.
Muri Werurwe, Microsoft Teams, yavuze ko abayikoresha mu kuganira, gukora inama n’irindi tumanaho bageze kuri miliyoni 44, rikaba ari izamuka rya 40%.
Teamviewer nayo ikoreshwa mu kuganira no gukora inama, nayo itangaza ko irimo gukoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi mu buryo budasanzwe naho ubuyobozi bwa ‘Slack’, buvuga ko abayikoresha umunsi ku munsi bakomeje kwiyongera.
Uburyo bwo kureba filime n’indi myidagaduro, bwakuruye benshi muri iki gihe cya guma mu rugo.
Urubuga rwa Netflix kuri ubu rwabaye ubuzima kuri bamwe mu bakunda imyidagaduro cyane cyane abakunda kureba filime, ni rumwe mu zungutse cyane.
Netflix ni Ikigo cy’Abanyamerika cyerekana amashusho binyuze kuri internet.
Yerekana ibiganiro byo mu bihugu bitandukanye biciye kuri internet birimo nka filime mbarankuru n’iz’ubundi bwoko, ariko bigasaba kubanza kuba umufatabuguzi.
Netflix irebwa mu bihugu 190 hirya no hino ku Isi, aho ifite abakiliya basaga miliyoni 182.
Yabonye abayikoresha bashya bagera kuri miliyoni 16 muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Uburyo bwo kwerekana amashusho bwa Disney+, ni irindi koranabuhanga ryungutse kubera Coronavirus, kuko nko mu mpera za Werurwe bwatangijwe mu bindi bihugu birimo n’u Bwongereza.
Icyo gihe Disney+ yari ifite abakiriya barenga miliyoni 33, ubu ifite abagera kuri 55, bituma ihanganye ku isoko na Netflix.
Ikigo Spotify, gifasha abantu kubona umuziki, filime n’ibindi muri guma mu rugo cyabonye abakiliya miliyoni 130 baguze ifatabuguzi.
Ibigo bifite ikoranabuhanga rifasha abantu kubona imyitozo ngororamubiri bakora muri iki gihe cya Coronavirus, biri mu byungutse cyane.
Urugero ni ClassPass, urubuga rutuma abantu babona imyitozo bakora.
Uru rubuga ruvuga ko abarukoresha biyongereye cyane.
Urundi rubuga rwa Peloton, rwerekana amashusho ajyanye no kunyonga igare.
Nubwo byasabye ko Peloton ifunga studio zayo nyuma yo kugaragaramo uwanduye Coronavirus, ibyo yinjije byazamutseho ibirenga 60%.
Ushyira amashusho kuri YouTube, Joe Wicks, na we yungukiye kuri Coronavirus kuko yaciye agahigo akajya no mu gitabo ‘Guinness World Record’ kubera kwerekana amashusho y’imyitozo ngororamubiri igihe kirekire ndetse ibigo bikomeye muri siporo biravugwa ko byatangiye kumurwanira.
Urubuga Amazon rwo guhahiraho, na rwo rwagize ibihe byiza mu gihe cya Coronavirus.
Uru rubuga rwashinzwe na Jeff Bezos, umuherwe wa mbere ku Isi, agaciro karwo kageze kuri miliyari 24 z’amadolari muri Coronavirus.
Agaciro k’imigabane ya Amazon ku isoko karazamutse cyane.
Amazon yahaye akazi abandi bantu 175 000 bo kuyifasha guhaza abakiliya babaye benshi muri iki gihe cya guma mu rugo.
Agaciro k’ibyacurujwe kageze kuri miliyari 75.
5 z’amadolari ni ukuvuga ko kiyongereyeho 27% mu mezi ya Coronavirus.
Abantu bareba filime kuko ntaho barimo kujya.
Nko mu Bwongereza, kugurisha imodoka byasubiye hasi ku rwego ruto ruheruka kubaho mu 1946.
Sosiyete itwara abantu, Uber, yagabanyije abakozi mu biro byayo.
Aba ariko ntabwo barimo abashoferi bikorera ndetse na bo barimo guhangana n’iki cyorezo.
Mu bindi bigo by’ikoranabuhanga byungutse kubera Coronavirus, ni ibicuruza imikino (Gaming), aho abantu benshi bayihugiraho.
Banki y’u Rwanda Itsura Amajyambere, BRD, yabaye iya mbere yo mu Rwanda igenzuwe n’Ikigo Mpuzamahanga gikurikirana ibijyanye n’imyenda n’Ubushakashatsi mu by’Imari, Fitch Ratings, iyiha inota rya ‘B+’ rigaragaza ko imari yayo ihagaze neza ndetse n’ahazaza hayo hameze neza.
Banki y’u Rwanda Itsura Amajyambere, BRD, yabaye iya mbere yo mu Rwanda igenzuwe n’Ikigo Mpuzamahanga gikurikirana ibijyanye n’imyenda n’Ubushakashatsi mu by’Imari, Fitch Ratings, iyiha inota rya ‘B+’ rigaragaza ko imari yayo ihagaze neza ndetse n’ahazaza hayo hameze neza.
Ubusanzwe Fitch yatangaga amanota kuri za Guverinoma nk’u Rwanda.
Nko mu 2016 Fitch Ratings yahaye u Rwanda inota rya ‘B+’ ishingiye ku kuba izamuka ry’ibiciro ku masoko ryari riri hasi kandi u Rwanda rukaba rwarabashaga kurigumisha ku gipimo gikwiye bigendanye n’iterambere ry’ubukungu.
Hiyongereyeho kuba amafaranga y’umwenda rwari rufite yari make ugereranyije n’icyiciro ruherereyemo.
Ku wa Mbere w’iki cyumweru, iki kigo gikorera muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, cyahaye BRD inota rya B+ bitewe n’uburyo iyi banki ifite ubushobozi bwo kuba itahungabana biturutse ku nguzanyo yatanze no kuba ari banki ifite ibigo cyangwa ibigega biyishyigikiye cyangwa se nayo ubwayo ifite imikorere ihamye.
Iri nota ryahawe BRD rigaragaza intambwe iyi banki imaze gutera, uburyo imaze kwaguka ndetse n’intumbero yayo mu kuba banki ihagaze neza mu mutungo.
BRD itangaza ko rizagira uruhare rukomeye mu kuyifasha kureshya abandi bafatanyabikorwa mu rwego rw’imari ku buryo byagira uruhare mu iterambere ry’u Rwanda.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa BRD, Kampeta Sayinzoga, yavuze ko kuba iyi banki yahawe iri nota bizayifasha kugera ku ntego yayo yo guhindura imibereho y’Abanyarwanda.
Ati “Twavuye kure kandi dutewe imbaraga n’iri gereranya rije mu bihe bikomeye.
Rishingiye ku bufasha bukomeye BRD yahawe n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo mu kuyihindura banki ihamye.
Abakozi ba BRD bari gukora ubutaruhuka kugira ngo bagere ku byo abafatanyabikorwa bayo bayitezeho no gukoresha neza igishoro.
BRD ni banki ya leta yashinzwe muri Kanama 1967 nubwo yahawe ibyangombwa bitangwa na Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda muri Kanama 2009.
Ifite imari shingiro igera kuri miliyari 7.
Ifitwemo imigabane n’inzego zitandukanye zirimo Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ifite 97% binyuze mu Kigega Agaciro Development Fund gifitemo imigabane ingana na 55% n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubwiteganyirize, RSSB, gifitemo imigabane ingana na 42%.
Iri mu rugendo rwo gufasha u Rwanda muri Gahunda y’Igihugu yo kwihutisha Iterambere (NST1) ndetse no gushyira mu bikorwa Intego z’iterambere rirambye.
Imikorere yayo yagiye ihinduka mu myaka ishize ibasha gukuraho ibihombo yakunze kugira aho byagabanutse ku kigero cya 77% mu 2019 ugereranyije n’imyaka ibiri yari yarabanje.
Ibi byaturutse mu kuvugurura uburyo inguzanyo zatangwagamo.
Yanogeje kandi uburyo bwo gukurikirana abakiliya bayo byanayifashije mu kugabanya inguzanyo zitishyurwa aho zavuye kuri 19.
34% mu 2018 zigera kuri 7.
52% mu mpera za 2019.

Kuri uyu munsi kandi hakorwa urugendo rwo kwibuka.
Buri mwaka tariki ya 7 Mata ni umunsi abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batangira ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Kuri uyu munsi kandi hakorwa urugendo rwo kwibuka.
Bamwe mu bitabira uru rugendo ruzwi nka Walk to remember biganjemo urubyiruko, bakunze kuvugwaho kutaruha uburemere n’agaciro rukwiye, aho abenshi bivugwa ko bambara imyambaro idakwiriye, abandi bakagenda baganira, abandi bashyize mu matwi ’ecouteur’ bagenda biyumvira imiziki, ibyo abenshi babona nk’ibidakwiye.
Urubyiruko rutandukanye rwiganjemo abanyeshuri bari mu biruhuko, batanze ibitekerezo by’imyitwarire ikwiye kuranga umuntu uba witabiriye urugendo rwo kwibuka, mu rwego rwo kuruha agaciro rukwiye.
Kayisire Kevin utuye i Nyarutarama yagize ati “ Walk to Remember ni urugendo rwo kwibuka ariko abenshi bajyayo basa n’abagiye guhura n’inshuti zabo.
Ibyo ntibikabe ahubwo mbona ibyiza ari uko bazirikana kwambara amabara asanzwe akoreshwa mu igihe cyo kwibuka nk’umukara, Ibara risa nk’ivu cyangwa umweru naho hasi bakambara imyenda itabafashe cyane ku buryo biteza ikibazo.
Elie Gashagaza utuye i Gikondo we yatubwiye ko imyambarire idafite icyo ivuze cyane ahubwo ko abantu bitabira uru rugendo bakwiriye kwita ku myitwarire yabo mu gihe barukora birinda kuganira cyangwa ngo basakuze ku buryo byateza umutekano muke.
Isimbi Ines utuye Kicukiro na mugenzi we Kevin Mujiji utuye Kimironko bombi bagarutse ku ihame ry’uko buri wese ugiye mu rugendo rwo kwibuka, akwiye kumva uburemere bw’icyo gikorwa n’ubusobanuro bwacyo bityo akambara ku buryo atanengwa n’abo bari kumwe.
Umutoni Fiona, umwe mu bakurikiranira hafi itegurwa ry’urwo rugendo akaba anafite inshingano zo kwandika urubyiruko rwitabira yabwiye IGIHE ko hari imyambaro idakwiriye gukoreshwa n’abitabira urugendo rwo kwibuka nk’ipantaro icitse (Dechirée), imyambaro ifite ibara ry’umutuku, imyenda iriho ibishushanyo bitera ubwoba nk’uduhanga, amaraso, intwaro n’ibindi.
Uwitabira uru rugendo kandi ngo ntabwo akwiriye kwambara ingofero cyangwa se utwuma bashyira mu matwi bumva indirimbo.
Abari n’abategarugori kandi ngo ntibakwiriye no kwishyiraho ibyongera ubwiza byinshi.
Uyu mwaka, urugendo rwo kwibuka ruratangira saa kumi n’imwe n’igice z’umugoroba aho abarwitabira bahagurukira ku ngoro y’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko berekeza kuri Stade Amahoro ahari bukomereze ijoro ryo kwibuka.
Muri uyu mwaka, ibihugu bine byo muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba birateganya kuzagira amatora.
Ibyo birimo Somalia, Tanzania, Ethiopia n’u Burundi.
Ni amatora arimo ay’abakuru b’ibihugu n’ay’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yombi azashyira ku munzani ireme rya demokarasi muri ako gace.
Muri uyu mwaka, ibihugu bine byo muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba birateganya kuzagira amatora.
Ibyo birimo Somalia, Tanzania, Ethiopia n’u Burundi.
Ni amatora arimo ay’abakuru b’ibihugu n’ay’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yombi azashyira ku munzani ireme rya demokarasi muri ako gace.
Ni igihugu cyakunze kurangwa no guhererekanya ubutegetsi mu mahoro guhera igihe cyaboneye ubwigenge.
Ishyaka riri ku butegetsi Chama Cha Mapinduzi riracyahabwa amahirwe yo kugumana ubutegetsi.
Mu gihe hitegurwa amatora rusange azaba mu Ukwakira 2020, abatavuga rumwe na Leta n’imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta bafite impungenge ko Guverinoma ya Perezida John Pombe Magufuli ishobora kubangamira ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
The East African yatangaje ko kuri ubu Guverinoma yakuyeho ibikorwa by’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, bivuze ko nta bikorwa byo gukoresha inama bishoboka mu mashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta.
Hari abantu bafunzwe, abanyamakuru bamwe baburirwa irengero abandi barafungwa nk’urugero rw’umunyamakuru Eric Kabendera cyangwa Paul Magotti wari impirimbanyi y’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Uko kubangamira abatavuga rumwe na Leta kwatumye amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta yanga kwitabira amatora y’inzego z’ibanze yabaye mu Ugushyingo umwaka ushize, bituma ishyaka CCM riyatsinda ku kigero cya 99%.
Umunyapolitiki utavuga rumwe na Leta, Tundu Lissu aherutse kuvuga ko guhagarika ibikorwa y’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, ari ikimenyetso ko amatora ya 2020 atazaba mu mucyo.
Perezida Magufuli yatowe mu 2015 afite intego yo kurwanya ruswa.
Nubwo yatangije intambara ku baryi ba ruswa, ashinjwa kubangamira demokarasi mu gihugu, gupfukirana amajwi y’abamunenga no kubibasira.
Amatora atenganyijwe muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, mu gihe hakiri urujijo niba Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza azongera kwiyamamaza nyuma ya manda ya gatatu yafashe mu 2015 igateza imvururu.
Ikindi gihangayikishije ni ukumenya niba Guverinoma ye ifite ubushobozi bwo gutegura amatora anyuze mu mucyo, kuko imiryango n’ibihugu byinshi byateraga inkunga icyo gihugu, byarayihagaritse bishinja Nkurunziza guteza akaduruvayo mu gihugu.
Nubwo Nkurunziza yatangaje ko atazongera kwiyamamaza, ababirebera hafi bavuga ko ashobora kwisubiraho cyangwa agashyiraho umuntu azajya atagekeramo.
Nta kimenyetso cyerekana ko Nkurunziza agiye kuva muri politiki y’u Burundi mu gihe muri Gashyantare umwaka ushize, yimuye ibiro bya Perezida akabijyana mu Mujyi wa Gitega ari naho avuka.
Raporo y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yo muri Nzeri 2019, igaragaza ko nta cyizere cy’imigendekere myiza y’amatora mu Burundi mu 2020, mu gihe hakiri Perezida wigaragaza nk’igitangaza’.
Loni ivuga ko ari Perezida wigwijeho ububasha bwose we n’ishyaka rye CNDD FDD, n’ibyaha bishinjwa urubyiruko rw’ishyaka rye ruzwi nk’Imbonerakure rushinjwa guhutaza uburenganzira bw’abaturage n’abatavuga rumwe na Leta.
Icyakora Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Burundi, Ezechiel Nibigira, aherutse kubwira Inteko rusange ya Loni, ko mu gihugu hari umwuka mwiza uzatuma amatora agenda neza.
Amatora yo muri Somalia ni ingenzi cyane ku mutekano w’akarere.

Hashize imyaka 50 Perezida atorwa n’itsinda ry’abantu bake baba batoranyijwe, kubera ubwoba bw’uko hateguwe amatora rusange abaturage bakitabira, bishobora guteza imvururu n’umutekano muke.

Abashakashatsi mu Bushinwa bavumbuye ubundi bwoko bw’ibicurane by’ingurube bishobora guhinduka icyorezo.
Ubushakashatsi bwasohowe mu kinyamakuru cyandika kuri siyansi, PNAS bugaragaza ko ibyo bicurane byo mu bwoko bwa G4, bifitanye isano n’ubundi bwoko bw’ibicurane by’ingurube byadutse mu 2009 bikaba icyorezo.
Abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza zo mu Bushinwa no mu kigo cy’u Bushinwa gishinzwe kugenzura ibyorezo, bagaragaje ko icyo cyorezo gifite ubushobozi buhambaye bwo kwanduza ikiremwamuntu.
Hagati ya 2011 na 2018, abashakashatsi bafashe ibizamini mu ngurube 30 000 mu mabagiro icumi atandukanye mu Bushinwa no mu nzu zivura inyamaswa, bituma babasha kuvumbura ubwoko 179 bwa virus zitera ibicurane by’ingurube.
Inyinshi muri izo ngurube bazisanzemo ubwoko bushya bwa virusi y’ibicurane bwatangiye kwigaragaza guhera mu 2016.
Ubwoko bushya bw’ibicurane by’ingurube buzwi nka G4 nibwo basanze bukomeye cyane ndetse bufite ubushobozi bwo kwanduza cyane ikiremwamuntu.
Ubushakashatsi kandi bwagaragaje ko ubudahangarwa umubiri uvana mu bicurane bisanzwe budashobora guhangara ubwoko bushya bwa G4.
Mu bakozi bashinzwe iby’ibicurane by’ingurube bafashwe ibizamini nyuma yo gushyirwa hafi y’aho izo virusi zavumburiwe, byagaragaye ko umwe mu icumi yanduye.
Ibizamini byafashwe kandi byagaragaje ko hafi 4.
4 % by’abaturage bose bahuye n’iyo virusi banduye.
Inzobere zivuga ko iyo virusi ishobora kwandura iva mu nyamaswa ijya mu bantu ariko ntibaramenya niba ishobora kuva ku muntu umwe ijya ku wundi, ari nazo mpungenge bafite.
Abakoze ubushakashatsi basabye ko habaho uburyo buhamye bwo gukurikirana abantu bakora ahororerwa cyangwa ahicirwa ingurube.

Sosiyete ya Amazon yanze kwemerera Polisi ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kwifashisha porogaramu yayo, ikoreshwa mu guhuza isura y’umuntu n’ifoto iri mu mwirondoro we.
Ni ikoranabuhanga ryari risanzwe rikoreshwa n’ibigo bitandukanye mu gihe bari mu iperereza ku muntu runaka, bashaka guhuza isura bafashe n’iy’umuntu bakeka.
Imikorere y’iyo porogaramu yari isanzwe ikemangwa ariko byarushijeho mu minsi ishize ubwo umwirabura George Floyd yicwaga anizwe n’umupolisi.
Hari amajwi yakomeje kwiyongera asaba ko Polisi ibuzwa kongera gukoresha iyo porogaramu kuko yibasira abirabura cyane kurusha abazungu.
Amazon ihagarikiye Polisi nyuma y’icyumweru sosiyete IBM nayo ihagaritse porogaramu yayo ku bayikoresha bashaka kumenya abantu bari mu kivunge ndetse n’abashaka kumenya umuntu bashingiye ku ibara ry’uruhu rwe.
Amazon yatangaje ko yahagaritse ikoreshwa rya porogaramu yayo kugira ngo Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Amerika ibanze ishyireho amategeko y’uburyo iryo koranabuhanga rizajya rikoreshwa.
Iyo sosiyete yatanze igihe kingana n’umwaka kugira ngo Inteko ibe yatoye itegeko ryerekena uburyo bwiza iyo porogaramu yajya ikoreshwa ntawe ibereye.

Ni amasezerano azatuma ibihugu birebwa nayo birimo u Rwanda byoroherwa no kubona imiti igera kuri 20 ivura kanseri, bikazatuma bizigama nibura 59% by’amafaranga byagombaga gukoresha mu kugura iyo miti.
Muri ayo masezerano, imiti yose izaba yujuje ibisabwa n’Ikigo gishinzwe ibiribwa n’imiti muri Amerika, US FDA, n’amabwiriza y’Ikigo cy’u Burayi gishinzwe iby’Imiti (EMA).
Iyo miti izaba iri ku isoko ku giciro gishya kandi kiganirwaho mu buryo bwihariye ku bihugu byemeranyijweho.
Umuyobozi w’Ihuriro nyafurika ryo kurwanya kanseri, akaba na Minisitiri w’Ubuzima wa Nigeria, Prof Isaac Adewole, yavuze ko mu gihe ubwandu bwa kanseri bukomeza kwiyongera kuri uyu mugabane, ari ngombwa ko hongerwa uburyo bufasha ibihugu kuyivura ku rwego rwo hejuru kandi budahenze.
Yakomeje ati "Urebye uburyo bukenewe mu kuvura kanseri zikomeje guteza imfu nyinshi, aya masezerano mashya azadufasha guteza imbere ubuzima no kugabanya umubare w’abapfa muri Afurika bazize kanseri.
Imiti ikubiye muri ayo masezerano ireba ubwoko 27 bwa kanseri zitandukanye zinahitana benshi muri Afurika zirimo kanseri y’ibere, iy’inkondo y’umura n’iy’ubugabo.
Izo kanseri ni zimwe mu zivurwa, kandi zihariye 38% by’uburwayi bwa kanseri mu bihugu birebwa n’aya masezerano.

Ibyo bikiyongeraho ko nk’abantu barwaye kanseri bo muri ako karere usanga bafite ibyago byo gupfa bikubye inshuro ebyiri abo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kuko bo usanga batinda kwisuzumisha ndetse bamwe ntibabone ubuvuzi bukwiye.
Aya masezerano mashya arareba ibihugu 23 byo muri Afurika, byihariye 74% bya kanseri nshya ziboneka muri Afurika, mu mwaka.
Ibindi bitatu ni ibyo muri Aziya.
ACS na CHAI byatangiye gukorera hamwe mu 2015 hagamijwe guteza imbere ubuzima n’ubuvuzi bwa kanseri muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara, mu bufatanye na guverinoma n’ibigo bivura kanseri.
Ni ubufatanye bugamije gushakira umuti uguhenda kw’imiti, kunoza uburyo igera ku bayikeneye no guharanira ko habaho ubucuruzi budahenze ku miti ifite akamaro kurusha ikaboneka bitagoranye kandi ku giciro cyoroheje.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa CHAI, Dr.
Iain Barton, avuga ko nubwo hari intambwe imaze guterwa mu kugeza imiti ku bayikeneye muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara, hakiri akazi gakomeye gakeneye gukorwa.
Yakomeje ati “Ubu bufatanye ni intambwe ikomeye mu kugeza kuri benshi imiti yo ku rwego rwo hejuru ivura kanseri, bikazatuma turushaho gusatira ubuvuzi bwa kanseri budaheza ku bantu bose.
Mu mwaka wa 2017 nabwo ACS na CHAI byasinye amasezerano n’ibigo Pfizer na Cipla, hagamijwe koroshya uburyo imiti 16 ivura kanseri yarushaho kugera mu bihugu bitandatu byo muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara.
Haje kwiyongeraho ibindi bitatu mu Ugushyingo 2019.
Binyuze muri ayo masezerano, ibihugu byabashije kubona imiti idahenze, ku buryo byashoboye kuzigama 56% ku kiguzi byagombaga gukoresha.
Ni uburyo bwatumye ibihugu biri muri iyi gahunda birushaho kwita ku barwayi benshi.
Abayobozi b’ibigo bya Mylan, CHAI na ACS bagaragaje ko biteye ishema gufatanyiriza hamwe, hagamijwe kuramira ubuzima bw’abarwaye kanseri zikomeje guhitana benshi ku Isi.
Ibindi bihugu byinjiye muri ubu bufatanye birimo Botswana, Cameroon, Eswatini, Ethiopia, Ghana, Cote d’Ivoire, Kenya, Lesotho, Liberia, Malawi, Mali, Mozambique, Namibia, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Afurika y’Epfo, Sudan, Tanzania, Uganda, Zambia na Zimbabwe.
Mu bihugu bya Aziya harimo Vietnam, u Buhinde na Myanmar.

Dore ibiranga ba Claudia
Mu miterere ba Claudia bafite ingabire yo kugira inama bagenzi babo, kubahumuriza igihe bagize ikibazo no kuba abarimu beza mu bintu bitandukanye igihe byabaye ngombwa.
Claudia aha agaciro urukundo kuko mu miterere ye aba yumva yakunda kandi agakundwa.
Ni abantu bakunda ku buryo babuze urukundo bishobora no kubaviramo kudakora akazi kabo neza.
Uretse kuba basanzwe bitonda bakagira n’impuhwe, ba Claudia rimwe na rimwe barakubagana.
Ba Claudia ntibakunda kuba abayobozi b’umuryango kuko iyo ukoze icyo badashaka cyangwa batakubwiye ntibibashimisha.
Ushobora no kuvuga ko rwose ba Claudia baba bakarishye cyane iyo bari gutanga amabwiriza ajyanye n’ikinyabupfura.
Ni abantu uzasanga ahanini bakunda kuba ari bonyine bitewe n’ibitekerezo by’urukundo n’urushako bibahora mu ntekerezo.
Ba Claudia bashobora kwitangira abakunzi babo mu buryo bushoboka bwose, bahoza umutima ku bana n’abagabo babo ku rwego bashobora no kumva babangamiwe bikomeye.

Uburyo bwo gupima ibindi byiciro bwakajijwe
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, RBC, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin, yavugiye kuri radiyo y’igihugu ko mu barwayi bose muri rusange, hejuru ya 70% babonetse muri kasho mu Karere ka Ngoma, hamwe hashyirwa imfungwa mu gihe zigikorerwa dosiye n’Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha, ahabonetse abarwayi 72.
Yagize ati “Iri tsinda rero ryagaragaye ku munsi w’ejo turacyari kurikoraho ubusesenguzi bwimbitse ngo turebe aho ubu burwayi bwaba bwaraturutse, ariko iby’ibanze twamaze kubona ni uko bifitanye isano ya hafi na ruriya rujya n’uruza rw’ingendo zambukiranya imipaka ndetse na bariya batwara imodoka baca muri ziriya nzira ko hari uburyo bahuye, ubwo amakuru arambuye aragenda akomeza [kugaragara] uko abaganga babishinzwe babikurikirana.
Yavuze ko mu gushakisha aho ubwo burwayi bwakomotse, bigendana no gushakisha abahuye n’aba bafungwa ngo nabo bapimwe, ndetse n’ahandi hacumbikiwe ahantu henshi muri za kasho hakorwe igikorwa nk’icyo cyo gupima.

Nyampinga Foundation, ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye, kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Kamena 2020 basuye Umudugudu wa Nyarugunga utuwe n’imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.
Nyampinga Foundation, ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye, kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Kamena 2020 basuye Umudugudu wa Nyarugunga utuwe n’imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.
Muri uru rugendo, aba bakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda bari bahagarariwe na Miss Jolly Mutesi ndetse na Nishimwe Naomie ufite iri kamba muri uyu mwaka wa 2020.
Urugendo rwabo rwari rugamije gushyikiriza imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba ibikoresho byo kwirinda Covid-19 bigizwe ahanini n’udupfukamunwa 1000.
Aba bakobwa bakigera muri uyu mudugudu bakiriwe n’ubuyobozi bwawo ndetse n’ubw’Umurenge wa Nyarugunga kimwe n’ubuyobozi bw’abasezerewe mu ngabo mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Mu ijambo ry’ikaze babwiwe n’umuyobozi w’umurenge wa Nyarugunga Uwamahoro Geneviève, yashimiye ba Nyampinga kuba babagendereye abashimira ubushake bagize bwo gufasha abamugariye ku rugamba.
Yabijeje ko ubufasha batanze buzafasha imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba cyane ko udupfukamunwa bahawe tuzafasha abagorwaga no kutubona ndetse n’usanzwe agafite akaba abonye ako guhinduranya mu gihe yaba yakameshe.
Yasabye abaturage bo muri uyu mudugudu gukomeza gukurikiza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19 cyane ko ari icyorezo gihangayikishije igihugu cyane n’Isi muri rusange.
John Bagabo komiseri muri komisiyo yo gusubiza mu buzima busanzwe abari abasirikare mu mujyi wa Kigali, yashimye bikomeye igikorwa cy’aba bakobwa ndetse asaba aba bamugariye ku rugamba n’imiryango yabo kumva impanuro z’aba bakobwa cyane ko nubwo ari bato ariko hari byinshi babigisha.
Yashimiye aba bakobwa kuba batekereje ku bamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, asaba abagiye guhabwa ibikoresho byo kwirinda Covid-19 kugerageza kubikoresha neza cyane ko nk’abafite ubumuga ari bamwe mu bafite imbaraga nke z’umubiri bityo igihe iki cyorezo cyaba kibagezeho kikaba cyabibasira.
Yagize ati" Nibyiza ko bazanye udupfukamunwa two kudufasha kwirinda Covid-19 kandi bakaba banaje kudukangurira kumenya kudukoresha neza no gukomeza kwirinda, natwe rero tugomba gufatanya n’abandi kwirinda iki cyorezo kuko ni urugamba rukomeye.
Jolly Mutesi wabaye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda ari nawe uhagarariye Nyampinga Foundation mu Rwanda, yibukije abamugariye ku rugamba bari muri uyu muhango ko nk’abana babo bahora babatekereza kandi babazirikana.
Ati "Nimwe mwafashe imbunda mujya ku rugamba muduha igihugu cyiza nk’iki, ntacyo dufite twabaha ngo tubashimire gusa turabazirikana, turashimira cyane buri umwe muri mwe ndetse tukazirikana byimazeyo abatakarije ubuzima ku rugamba bari bagenzi banyu.
“Mukwiye ishimwe ry’icyubahiro, turabakunda cyane kandi dufite ishimwe ku bwanyu.
Muri ababyeyi bacu mukaba n’ababyeyi b’Igihugu ntabwo tuzabatenguha ikivi cyanyu tuzacyusa.
Nyampinga Foundation ni ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye icyakora yatangiranye abanyamuryango batandatu barimo; Bahati Grace, Kayibanda Aurore, Kundwa Doriane, Akiwacu Colombe, Jolly Mutesi ndetse na Nishimwe Naomie ndetse na Muganwa Larry, umugabo watangiranye na bo.
Miss Iradukunda Elsa, Iradukunda Liliane na Nimwiza Meghan ntabwo bahise binjira muri Nyampinga Foundation, Miss Jolly Mutesi akaba yongeye gushimangira ko ari uko igihe batangizaga uyu mushinga aba bakobwa bari bafite ibindi bikorwa wenda byabazitiye ariko ahamya ko nibabohoka bazaba bakinguriwe imiryango.
Ihuriro rya ba Nyampinga b’u Rwanda ryahaye abamugariye ku rugamba ibikoresho byo kwirinda COVID-19
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb.
Nduhungirehe Olivier, yanyomoje amakuru yakwirakwijwe ko u Rwanda rwafunguriye amarembo abaturage barwo bashaka kujye muri Uganda, ashimangira ko nta cyahindutse ku muburo rwabahaye ku kaga bashobora kugirira muri icyo gihugu.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb.
Nduhungirehe Olivier, yanyomoje amakuru yakwirakwijwe ko u Rwanda rwafunguriye amarembo abaturage barwo bashaka kujye muri Uganda, ashimangira ko nta cyahindutse ku muburo rwabahaye ku kaga bashobora kugirira muri icyo gihugu.
Ibi Nduhungirehe yabitangaje kuri uyu wa 3 Mutarama 2020 yifashishije Twitter, avuguruza inkuru yatangajwe n’ikinyamakuru Chimp Reports cyo muri Uganda cyanditse ko ‘U Rwanda rworoheje uburyo bwo kunyura ku mupaka bajya muri Uganda’.
Ati “Iki ni ikindi gihuha cya @Gilespies n’ikinyamakuru cye [sinshobora no kubibara byose].
Umuburo u Rwanda rwahaye abaturage barwo bifuza kujya muri Uganda ntiwahindutse.
Nta kintu cyigeze gihinduka guhera muri Gashyantare 2019.
Ayo makuru Chimp reports yayatangaje ivuga ko yaganiriye n’abantu batandukanye bagiye bambuka bakajya muri Uganda, babanje “gutanga impamvu zumvikana.
Muri Gashyantare 2019 nibwo u Rwanda rwafashe umwanzuro wo gusaba abanyarwanda kutajya muri Uganda kubera umutekano wabo, nyuma y’uko bigaragaye ko abajyayo n’ababayo bashimutwa, bafungwa ndetse bagakorerwa iyicarubozo bazira ubusa.
Icyo kinyamakuru gitangaje ibi nyuma y’uko Perezida Museveni, ubwo yasozaga umwaka ushize wa 2019, yavuze ko igihugu cye cyiteguye gukora ibyo gisabwa mu gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri mu mubano wa Uganda n’u Rwanda, ariko abasesenguzi bakomeza kugira amakenga n’ugushidikanya.
Museveni kandi yavuze ko yakiriye intumwa ye Ambasaderi Adonia Ayebare, wakiriwe muri Village Urugwiro ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 29 Ukuboza 2019 afite ubutumwa bugenewe Perezida Kagame ku mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Museveni yavuze ko Ayebare na Perezida Kagame bagiranye ibiganiro byiza ndetse ko mu gihe cya vuba, hagiye gufatwa imyanzuro ishyira iherezo ku bwumvikane buke bumaze igihe kinini mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Vuba aha, impande zombi zigiye gufata imyanzuro ihamye mu guhosha umwuka mubi.
Ndabizeza ko Uganda izakora ibyo isabwa mu gushyira mu buryo umubano mwiza w’ibihugu byombi.
Ndashimira Perezida Kagame, abavandimwe bacu b’abanyarwanda n’abaturage ba Uganda.
Ku wa 31 Ukuboza Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iyo ntumwa yari i Kigali mu bikorwa bimaze igihe bigamije gushaka umuti w’ibibazo, ariko ko nyuma y’ibiganiro ikiba ari ingenzi ari ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imyanzuro yabyo.
Ati “Kuvuga rero ngo haje intumwa icyizere cyabonetse, ntabwo nibwira ko ari uko nabivuga, njye navuga ko iyo ari indi ntambwe ikomeje guterwa muri ubwo buryo bwo gushakisha icyatuma ikibazo icyo aricyo cyose cyaba gihari gishobora gukemuka kandi nyine ibyo biva mu bantu, mu kuvugana, kuganira.
Ubwo hasinywaga amasezerano y’amahoro ya Luanda mu mwaka ushize, abanyarwanda baketse ko ikibazo gikemutse, ko nta n’umwe uzongera guhohoterwa ari muri Uganda ndetse ko n’abafungiyeyo bagiye kurekurwa.
Gusa siko byagenze, kuko byakomeje nk’uko byari bisanzwe, abafungwa bagafungwa, abakorerwa iyicarubozo rigakomeza bakajya bajugunywa ku mipaka bagizwe intere.
Uganda kandi ntiyahagaritse umubano wayo n’imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda irimo RNC na FDLR ndetse irinangira ubwo yasabwaga kubahiriza amasezerano Museveni yasinye.
Ibi nibyo byatumye intumwa z’u Rwanda na Uganda zinanirwa kumvikana mu biganiro biheruka kubera i Kampala.
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi (FIFA) ryatangaje ko rigiye kugoboka amashyirahamwe y’imikino yose muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19, riyagenera inkunga ya miliyari $1.
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi (FIFA) ryatangaje ko rigiye kugoboka amashyirahamwe y’imikino yose muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19, riyagenera inkunga ya miliyari $1.
Mu nama ya FIFA yabaye ku wa Kane hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ry’amashusho, hafashe icyemezo cyo kongera ubufasha bw’amafaranga buhabwa amashyirahamwe 211.
Perezida wa FIFA, Gianni Infantino, yatangaje ko inkunga yo kugoboka amashyirahamwe muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19, ingana na miliyari $1.
Ati “Nishimiye gutangaza ko Inama ya FIFA yemeje ko hazatangwa miliyari $1.
5 ku mashyirahamwe yacu y’imikino muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19.
“Amakipe n’amashyirahamwe biri mu bihe bigoye, mu bice bimwe by’Isi, umupira w’amaguru nturasubukurwa, tugomba kubafasha.
Iyi nkunga izatangwa mu byiciro bitatu birimo izahita itangwa ako kanya, igenewe iterambere ry’umupira w’amaguru mu bagore n’izatangwa nk’inguzanyo.
Buri shyirahamwe rizahabwa miliyoni $1, kongeraho ibindi bihumbi $500 agenewe umupira w’abagore mu gihe buri mpuzamashyirahamwe izahabwa miliyoni $2.
Amashyirahamwe y’imikino yahawe kandi uburenganzira bwo gusaba inguzanyo.
Buri shyirahamwe rishobora gusaba inguzanyo iri hagati y’ibihumbi $500 na miliyoni $5, ariko hazagenzurwa uburyo rizayakoreshamo.
Inkunga FIFA izatanga cyangwa inguzanyo amashyirahamwe azaka, bigenewe umuryango w’umupira w’amaguru ni ukuvuga amakipe, abakinnyi, amarushanwa cyangwa abandi bagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus.
Mu rwego rwo gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’iki gikorwa, hazashyirwaho komisiyo ibishinzwe izaba iyobowe na Olli Rehn usanzwe ari Umuyobozi wungirije wa Komisiyo y’Imiyoborere muri FIFA ndetse akaba ari Umuyobozi wa Banki ya Finland.
Abantu batandatu bakize Coronavirus mu Rwanda mu gihe batatu bayisanganywe mu bipimo 1074 byafashwe kuri uyu munsi, bituma umubare w’abanduye ugera kuri 339.
Abantu batandatu bakize Coronavirus mu Rwanda mu gihe batatu bayisanganywe mu bipimo 1074 byafashwe kuri uyu munsi, bituma umubare w’abanduye ugera kuri 339.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa 26 Gicurasi 2020 hafashwe ibipimo 1074 bya Coronavirus, byagaragaje ko abantu batatu banduye mu gihe abasezerewe mu bitaro nyuma yo gukira bo ari batandatu.
Itangazo rya Minisante rivuga ko abasanganywe ubwandu bose "bahise bashyirwa mu kato bakihagera.
Muri iyi minsi ubwandu bushya bwiganje mu bashoferi b’amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka mu bihugu bihana imbibi n’u Rwanda.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Ngamije Daniel, yatangaje ko abasanganwa ubwandu benshi ari abashoferi b’amakamyo.
Yakomeje avuga ko “Ibipimo bizahoraho, tuzahora dupima tureba ko indwara idakwirakwira.
Ingamba zihari ntabwo twafunguye imipaka, muri bo abahagera turabasuzuma, ntaho baducikira.
Ku mipaka yose hari amatsinda yakira abantu bose baje, bagapimwa, usanzwe yaranduye akajya kwitabwaho ahabugenewe.
U Rwanda rukomeje gukaza ingamba mu gukumira ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo, aho nk’abantu baba mu Rwanda bari mu mahanga bemerewe gutaha ariko bagera mu gihugu bagahita bashyirwa mu kato k’iminsi irindwi bari ahantu hateganyijwe biyishyurira serivisi zose, indi minsi irindwi bakayimara bari mu kato mu ngo zabo ariko nabwo bakurikiranwa n’inzego z’ubuzima.
Ni mu gihe ubu kwambara agapfukamunwa byamaze kuba ibwirizwa rusange ku muntu wese ugiye mu ruhame ari nako abantu basabwe kwirinda kujya mu kivunge ahubwo n’aho bari bakaba batandukanye ku buryo amahirwe yo kwanduzanya aba ari make.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro.
Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Umunyapolitiki utavuga rumwe na Leta y’u Rwanda, Faustin Twagiramungu, yihuje ku mugaragaro n’Ihuriro MRCD, riyobowe na Paul Rusesabagina, mu bufatanye bwiswe ubwo guhuza imbaraga mu kurwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, hakoreshejwe inzira zose.
Umunyapolitiki utavuga rumwe na Leta y’u Rwanda, Faustin Twagiramungu, yihuje ku mugaragaro n’Ihuriro MRCD, riyobowe na Paul Rusesabagina, mu bufatanye bwiswe ubwo guhuza imbaraga mu kurwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, hakoreshejwe inzira zose.
Amasezerano hagati y’ishyaka RDI Rwanda Rwiza, rya Twagiramungu na MRCD, igizwe na RRM ya Nsabimana Callixte ‘Sankara’, ufungiwe mu Rwanda, PDR Ihumure na CNRD Ubwiyunge ya Gen.
Irategeka Wilson wiyomoye kuri FDLR, yasinywe kuri uyu wa Kabiri i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi.
MRCD niyo Nsabimana ‘Sankara’, yari abereye umuvugizi na Visi Perezida wa kabiri.
Ifite ishami rya gisirikare ryitwa FLN, ikaba ari umutwe w’iterabwoba wagabye ibitero mu Majyepfo y’u Rwanda, bigahitana abaturage icyenda, 19 bagakomereka ndetse n’imitungo myinshi igasahurwa indi ikangizwa.
Uwari umuvugizi w’uyu mutwe Nsabimana yumvikanye ku maradiyo ya BBC na VOA, n’imbuga nka YouTube yigamba ibyo bitero, avuga ko ari ibya FLN iyobowe na Habimana Hamada.
Umusesenguzi mu bya politiki y’ibiyaga bigari, akaba impuguke mu itangazamakuru, Albert Rudatsimburwa, avuga ko kuba Twagiramungu yahisemo kwihuza ku mugaragaro n’umutwe w’iterabwoba, MRCD, bisobanura ko atakiri muri politiki gusa ahubwo yinjiye no mu iterabwoba.
Avuga ko Twagiramungu yifuza guhirika ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda ariko akaba yarabuze uko abigenza, bityo akaba yihuje n’abandi babimazemo iminsi, ariko ku bwe iri huriro ntacyo ryageraho.
Ati “Ni amagambo gusa, ni ukuvugira kuri radiyo hirya no hino ariko ntacyo bivuze, nta n’ikintu gifatika gihari".
Inenge kuri Rusesabagina na Twagiramungu
Rudatsimburwa avuga ko aba bagabo bose bafite inenge izingiye ku ‘bushobozi buke’ butuma ubufatanye bwabo ntacyo bwageraho.
Mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, Paul Rusesabagina yari umuntu usanzwe, yavukiye i Murama ya Gitarama ku wa 15 Kamena 1954, ariko nyuma yagiye gutura i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Uburyo abantu bamuzi bwahinduwe cyane na filimi Hotel Rwanda yamukinweho nk’uwarokoye abantu 1268 muri Hôtel des Mille Collines, abayobejwe nayo batangira kumuhundagazaho ibihembo kugeza kuri ‘Presidential Medal Award of Freedom’, yahawe na Perezida George W.
Bush wa Amerika mu Ugushyingo 2005.
Rudatsimburwa agaruka ku mateka ya Rusesabagina akavuga ko atari umunyapolitiki, ahubwo yari umuntu wakoreraga hôtel akaza kugirwa igitangaza na filimi bityo agatangira kwibaza ko uwo muntu uri muri filime ari we kandi atari we.
Ati “Ni ukwisumbukuruza gusa kandi nta bushobozi afite uretse ko yabonye abantu bamwumva kuko bibaza ko ari wawundi wo muri filime ariko mu banyarwanda nta kintu avuze, ntacyo bamuziho uretse ibyo ahwihwisa mu maradiyo gusa n’ahandi".
Akomereza kuri Twagiramungu, akavuga ko we yabaye umunyapolitiki kuva kera ariko ubu akaba ari ‘umunyapolitiki wasigajwe inyuma n’amateka’, kuko uko u Rwanda rwateye imbere ntacyo bimubwiye akiri mu bya kera yari yaramenyereye ku ngoma zindi.
Mu nteruro imwe Rudatsimburwa ati “Nta hantu bishobora kubageza kuko nta ruhare bafite no ku banyarwanda".
Umuzimu wasaritse abarwanya u Rwanda bazawukira?
Si ubwa mbere abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, bifatanyije bagashyiraho amahuriro ngo bahuze imbaraga bagere ku mugambi wabo ariko bikarangira bishwanyutse ntacyo bigezeho.
Ingero ni nyinshi cyane.
Ntawe utazi uko RNC ya Kayumba Nyamwasa yashwanyutse.
Uguterana amagambo hagati ya Dr Théogène Rudasingwa na Kayumba Nyamwasa, bari bahuriye muri RNC, mbere y’uko bacikamo ibice, byatumye n’abo bizezaga ibitangaza bacika intege.
Aha niho havutsemo amashyaka atemewe mu Rwanda arimo na RRM ya Nsabimana, nayo yacitsemo ibice mbere y’ifatwa rye kubera ubwumvikane buke, gusuzugurana no kutemera uburyo abayobozi bishyira mu myanya.
Hari kandi n’amatiku hagati y’abasivili n’abahoze mu gisirikare.
RRM igizwe n’abantu ahanini bavuye mu Rwanda bahunze ibyaha bakoze cyangwa andi makosa.
Twagiramungu ubwe nawe yashinze ihuriro ry’amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta y’u Rwanda (CPC), ryari rigizwe na FDLR, UDR, RDI, CNR, na PS Imberakuri, igice cya gatatu.
Abarigize baje kunaniranwa nawe bamushinja igitugu.
Muri rusange iyo ugiye kwitegereza umuzimu wasaritse aya mashyaka, ni ugupingana no kuryana, buri wese arwanira kuba ku isonga no guhabwa ibyubahiro by’umukuru w’ishyaka cyangwa uzayobora igihugu igihe bageze ku butegetsi.
Rudatsimburwa yongeraho izindi mpamvu abashinga aya mahuriro ntacyo bageraho ari uko ikibagenza ari inyungu zabo bwite, kwitwaza iturufu y’amoko n’intege nke basanganywe.
Ati “Ubundi mu mvugo zabo usanga nka Rusesabagina afite akantu ko kuzana iby’amoko, RNC usanga ikibazo bafite ari umuyobozi mukuru.
Ni uguhuza gusa ariko ubona ko bafite intege ziri hasi cyane, bakibaza ko guhuza imbaraga byatuma bazamura urwego rw’imbaraga zabo ariko akenshi ubona ko kuba ari abantu bifitiye gahunda zabo bwite, birangira akenshi bashwanye kuko hari aho batazahuza".
Rudatsimburwa akomeza agira ati “Ntibafite ingengabitekerezo ifatika yatuma babona n’imfashanyo, birangirira aho.
Mu by’ukuri (Twagiramungu), aba ashaka kwihuza n’abandi kuko nta bushobozi na buke afite, niwe wenyine wibaza ko izina gusa rikurura ariko hashize imyaka 25 uriya muntu ntabwo azwi, ntawe yakurura, nta na benewabo yakurura.
Avuga ko FPR Inkotanyi yashobotse bitewe no guhuza mu bitekerezo byari bifitiye akamaro abanyarwanda bose yaba abari impunzi n’abandi bari mu gihugu babaho mu buzima bw’ingoma ya Habyarimana.
Ati “Niyo mpamvu FPR yakuruye abantu n’ubushobozi bw’abo bantu.
Ikindi harimo n’abantu bafite ubunararibonye bw’uko niba byanze muri politiki hari uko babikora bakurikije ubushobozi bwo gushoza intambara.
Abandi ntabyo bafite, akenshi banafashwa n’abantu bashaka kugirira u Rwanda nabi ariko nabo kubera aho u Rwanda rugeze nta ngaruka yindi bifite uretse gukerereza iterambere ryabo".
U Budage ntibwakwicarana n’abahoze ari aba-Nazi
Twagiramungu n’abandi bafatanyije kurwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, ntibasiba kumvikana bavuga ko bazagaruka mu Rwanda habaye ibiganiro.
Rudatsimburwa asanga ntaho ibi biganiro byahera kuko u Rwanda rudaheza kandi ruhora rushishikariza impunzi n’abari mu mahanga gutaha, bityo n’abo bashaka ibiganiro bakwiye gutaha niba hari icyo bahindura ku cyerekezo cy’u Rwanda, bakagikora.
Icyakora avuga ko harimo n’abantu kuganira na bo byagereranywa no kuvuga uti ‘u Budage bw’iki gihe bukwiye kwicarana n’abahoze ari aba-Nazi cya gihe cya Hitler’ kuko abuzukuru babo babisabye.
Abo Twagiramungu yifatanyije nabo harimo abashyiriweho impapuro mpuzamahanga zibata muri yombi, Rudatsimburwa avuga ko nta kabuza uyu musaza agomba gufatwa nk’umuterabwoba kuko kuba yifatanyije nabo bivuze ko yemera ibyo bakora.
Kugeza ubu ikibazwa ni ikidasanzwe ubufatanye bwa MRCD na RDI Rwanda Rwiza buzanye ku buryo bidatinze abantu batazumva iri huriro ryatewe n’umuzimu wasaritse abarwanya u Rwanda, nabo bagacikamo ibice.
Umunya-Nigeria Victor Osimhen ni we wegukanye igihembo cyitiriwe umunya-Cameroun Marc-Vivien Foé witabye Imana mu 2003 aguye mu kibuga.
Umunya-Nigeria Victor Osimhen ni we wegukanye igihembo cyitiriwe umunya-Cameroun Marc-Vivien Foé witabye Imana mu 2003 aguye mu kibuga.
Igihembo cyitiriwe Marc-Vivien Foé cyashyizweho na RFI mu 2009 mbere yo gufatanya na France 24 kugitegura mu 2011, gihabwa umukinnyi w’Umunyafurika witwaye neza kurusha abandi mu bakina muri shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere mu Bufaransa ‘Ligue 1’.
Ku majwi 284, Umunya-Nigeria Victor Osimhen ukinira Lille LOSC ni we wegukanye icy’uyu mwaka wa 2020 ahigitse Umunya-Algèrie Islam Slimani wa AS Monaco n’umunya-Maroc Yunis Abdelhamid wa Stade de Reims.
Uyu rutahizamu w’imyaka 21 n’amezi atandatu, usimbuye Umunya-Côte d’Ivoire Nicolas Pépé wegukanye iki gihembo mu mwaka ushize, yabaye umukinnyi muto w’Umunyafurika witwaye neza muri Ligue 1.
Ibitego 13 yatsinze mu mwaka ushize w’imikino akanatanga imipira ine yavuyemo ibitego kuri bagenzi be mu mikino 27, byamuhesheje kugira amanota 284 arushije Islam Slimani w’imyaka 32 na Yunis Abdelhamid w’imyaka 32.
Victor Osimhen yabaye umukinnyi wa gatanu wa Lille wegukanye iki gihembo mu nshuro 12 kimaze gutangwamo, nyuma ya Gervinho (2010, 2011), Vincent Enyeama (2014), Sofiane Boufal (2016) na Nicolas Pépé (2019).
Abantu 79 barimo abanyamakuru, abakurikirana umupira cyane n’abahoze ari abakinnyi nibo batoye uhabwa igihembo cy’uyu mwaka wa 2020, aho buri wese yahitagamo abakinnyi batatu.
Uwa mbere yahabwaga amanota atanu, uwa kabiri atatu mu gihe uwa gatatu yahabwaga inota rimwe.
Abakinnyi begukanye iki gihembo cyitiriwe Marc-Vivien Foé kuva gitangiye gutangwa:
Ku wa 25 Kamena 2009 nibwo igihangange mu muziki wa Pop, Michael Jackson, yitabye Imana.
Ubu imyaka 11 irashize nyakwigendera atakibarizwa ku Isi y’abazima.
Ku wa 25 Kamena 2009 nibwo igihangange mu muziki wa Pop, Michael Jackson, yitabye Imana.
Ubu imyaka 11 irashize nyakwigendera atakibarizwa ku Isi y’abazima.
Michael Jackson wafatwaga nk’Umwami w’Injyana ya Pop ku Isi yitabye Imana afite imyaka 50.
Uyu muhanzi yasize urwibutso rukomeye mu mfuruka z’Isi yose bitewe n’urukundo yagwije imbere ya benshi rushingiye ku ijwi rye ryiza n’imbyino ze zirimo ubuhanga.
Umunsi yitaba Imana Isi yacitse ururondogoro ku bwo kubura uyu mugabo wari umaze imyaka isaga 30 yarayigaruriye, kugeza ubwo ishakiro ry’amakuru rya Google ryahagaze bitewe n’abantu benshi cyane barikoreshaga, bashaka kumenya amakuru y’impano.
Michael Jackson yapfuye ubwo yiteguraga ibitaramo yagombaga gukorera mu Bwongereza.
Muri icyo gihe yari afite ikibazo cyo kubura ibitsotsi, ku buryo umuganga we Dr Murray yabanzaga kumuha imiti kugira ngo agoheke.
Mbere y’amasaha make kugira ngo apfe, yari yabuze ibitotsi burundu, asaba uyu muganga wahembwaga ibihumbi $150 ku kwezi, kumuha umuti witwa Propofol ubundi uhabwa abantu bagiye kubagwa kugira ngo basinzire.
Isuzuma ryakorewe umurambo wa Michael Jackson ryagaragaje ko iyo miti ari yo yamuhitanye ndetse umuganga we akatirwa igifungo cy’imyaka ine.
Indirimbo zirenga ijana Michael Jackson yakoze zarakunzwe kandi n’ubu ziracyakunzwe, ibintu bimwambika ikamba ry’Umwami wa Pop.
Benshi bibuka Michael Jackson nk’umuhanzi n’umubyinnyi w’umuhanga n’umuhate we mu guharanira Isi nziza abinyujije mu ndirimbo ze zakunzwe nka "Heal the World", "Will you be there" n’izindi.
Umunsi wa nyuma wa Michael Jackson ku Isi…
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 25 Kamena 2009, Michael Jackson yararembye bikomeye yihutanwa mu bitaro.
Ikinyamakuru TMZ cyariho kizamura kwizerwa kwacyo mu kwandika amakuru yihuse y’imyidagaduro nicyo cya mbere cyanditse ko uyu muhanzi ari muri koma.
Bitewe n’izina rikomeye yari amaze kugira, benshi ntibizeye ko Michael Jackson ari mu bihe bitamworoheye kandi ashobora kuva ku Isi y’abazima.
Umunyamakuru w’imyidagaduro wa BBC, Ian Youngs, wakurikiraniraga hafi iby’uyu muhanzi w’icyamamare yatangaje ko hari hashize igihe bivugwa ko uyu muhanzi arwaye kanseri y’uruhu, nubwo nyuma uruhande rwe rwabihakanye.
Muri iryo joro abanyamakuru benshi ku Isi bahise batangira gukurikirana cyane iby’ubuzima bwa Jackson.
Ibiro bya BBC i Los Angeles byahamagaye abavugizi, inshuti n’abakorana na Jackson ariko nta n’umwe wagize icyo yemeza kuko bamwe bakuragaho telefoni zabo.
Iby’ubuzima bwe byari bimaze iminsi bizwi ko atameze neza, ariko iby’iryo joro nta makuru afatika Isi yabashije kubona.
Nyuma gato, TMZ yahise yandika ko Michael Jackson yapfuye.
Hari hashize ibyumweru bike avuye mu bitaramo i Londres ndetse ku wa 25 Kamena mu masaha y’igicuku yari yakoze imyiteguro i Los Angeles y’igitaramo yiteguraga.
Urupfu rwa Jackson ni inkuru yatunguranye gusa muganga we nyuma yemeje ko yari amaze imyaka myinshi adashobora gusinzira kereka ahawe imiti imusinziriza.
Dr Conrad Murray, umuganga we bwite wahembwaga $150,000 ku kwezi, yari amutegereje mu rugo atashye.
Mu cyumba cye habaga harimo amacupa y’ibinini, uducupa tw’imiti banywa cyangwa bitera, inshinge n’ibindi.
Dr Murray yabwiye polisi ko yari amaze iminsi aha Jackson umuti witwa Propofol - umuti uterwa abagiye kubagwa ku bitaro - mu majoro 60 kugeza tariki 22 Kamena 2009 kugira ngo abashe gusinzira.
Mu masaha ya mu gitondo kare tariki 25 Kamena, Dr Murray yahaye Jackson indi miti kugira ngo asinzire, ariko ngo ntiyakoze kuko Jackson yari afite igishyika cy’ibitaramo yateguraga.
Byageze saa Yine n’iminota 40 z’igitondo Jackson atarasinzira.
Dr Murray yabwiye Polisi ko Jackson yamwinginze ngo amuhe ’amata’ kugira ngo asinzire - aha ngo yasobanuraga Propofol- kuko bifite ibara rijya gusa.
Dr Murray avuga ko yari afite ibikoresho byose bituma abasha gukurikirana umutima, umwuka mu maraso n’ibindi kuri Jackson ndetse ko yamugumye iruhande nyuma gato akajya kwiyuhagira.
Nyuma y’akanya amuvuye iruhande yagiye koga ariko agarutse ngo yasanze Jackson adahumeka.
Gusa iby’amasaha yavuze bishidikanywaho hagendewe ku majwi ye yafashwe kuri telefoni aho yavugaga ko ibyo byabayeho mbere gato ya saa sita z’amanywa.
Uyu muganga avuga ko yakurikijeho kugerageza gusubiza umwuka uyu muhanzi ndetse ngo ntiyari no gusaba ubutabazi kuko nawe aribyo yageragezaga.
Icyo yakoze ni uko yahamagaye umwe mu bashinzwe umutekano wa Jackson.
Dr Murray avugwaho ko yabanje gusaba ushinzwe umutekano kuvana mu cyumba ibikoresho by’imiti byose.
Abana ba Jackson, Prince na Paris bari mu rugo ibi byose biba, ariko bahiye ubwoba.
Ubwo abatabazi bageraga mu rugo bavuga ko batabashije kumenya Jackson kuko yagaragaraga nk’umuntu wazonzwe, unanutse cyane.
Arebye uko yari ameze, Umutabazi Richard Senneff yavuze ko yabonaga ari nk’umurwayi w’indembe igeze mu minsi ya nyuma.
Bahise bamujyana ku bitaro bya UCLA medical center aho bakomereje ibikorwa byo kumugarurira umwuka.
Hashize isaha imwe n’iminota 13 bemeje ko byarangiye.
Muri icyo gihe abafana be n’abanyamakuru bari bamaze kugera ku bitaro.
Saa Munani n’iminota 44 z’amanywa TMZ niyo yatangaje inkuru bwa mbere ko Jackson yapfuye, hari saa sita na 44 z’ijoro mu Rwanda.
Abenshi ku Isi bari bagikeneye kumenya niba koko Michael Jackson byarangiye, abantu basuye internet mu buryo budasanzwe.
Google yageze aho itabasha gutanga amakuru (results) ku bayibajije Michael Jackson kuko uburyo ikoresha bwibeshye ko kuyibaza kenshi iri jambo ari igitero bwagabweho.
Twitter, Los Angeles Times, TMZ, Wikipedia na Messenger zose zagize ibibazo bya tikinike kubera abazisuye benshi uwo mugoroba.
Hashize imyaka ibiri, Dr Conrad Murray yahamijwe icyaha cy’ubwicanyi butagambiriwe afungwa igihe kituzuye neza imyaka ibiri muri ine yakatiwe.
Iby’urupfu rwa Jackson n’iby’ibyaha yashinjwaga byo gufata abana bato ku ngufu byavuzweho byinshi mu myaka 10 ishize, muzika ye nayo izaguma mu mitima ya benshi.
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco, RALC yasohoye igitabo gikubiyemo ingamba zizafasha abahanzi bo mu Rwanda guteza imbere isoko ry’ibihangano byabo.
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco, RALC yasohoye igitabo gikubiyemo ingamba zizafasha abahanzi bo mu Rwanda guteza imbere isoko ry’ibihangano byabo.
Iki gitabo kigamije gufasha abahanzi mu ngeri zitandukanye kubyaza umusaruro impano zabo, bikava ku rwego rwo hasi bikajya ku rwego rw’igihugu na mpuzamahanga.
Nubwo gisohotse uyu mwaka, cyarangije kwandikwa umwaka ushize.
Umwanzuro wo kwandika iki gitabo cyiswe ‘Marketing Strategies for the Promotion of Cultural and Creative Industries in Rwanda’, waje nyuma yo kubona ko hari Abahanzi nyarwanda benshi bakora ibihangano byiza ariko ntibirenge umutaru cyangwa ngo bibabyarire inyungu.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Agateganyo wa RALC, Nsanzabaganwa Modeste, yabwiye IGIHE ko bizeye umusaruro ku bahanzi n’ibihangano byabo nyuma yo gushyira hanze icyo gitabo.
Ati “Hari impano y’umuhanzi, akajya mu nganzo agahanga ariko hakavuka ikibazo cy’icyo akoresha ibyo bihangano.
Iyo agize Imana umuntu umwe cyangwa babiri barabibona bakabireba cyangwa kabyumva ariko kugira ngo azazamure bya bihanganano abishyire ku isoko ry’igihugu cyangwa mpuzamahanga, bikaba ikibazo kandi ari ibintu ubona bishobora gukundwa.
“Nibwo twavuze ngo reka twegeranye inyandiko zikubiyemo inama zajya zifasha kugira ngo igihangano kizamuke kigere ku rwego rw’igihugu na mpuzamahanga.
Umuhanzi ntahange avuga ngo ndahangira gusa aho ndi mu mudugudu, ahange ahangira isi yose.
Ku isi hose, ubuhanzi bwinjiza miliyari ibihumbi bibiri z’amadolari buri mwaka, bugatanga akazi ku bantu miliyoni zisaga 29.
Nsanzabaganwa yavuze ko ikibazo kigikomereye abahanzi nyarwanda ari uburyo bwo gutunganya no kumenya kubyaza umusaruro ibihangano byabo.
Ati “ Twasanze ikintu umuhanzi ashoboye neza ari uguhanga, inganzo arayifite, agahanga ukabona koko ari mu nganzo ariko kugira ngo iyo mpano izagere ku bantu benshi bashoboka, ari rya koranabuhanga, kubitunganya, kubicuruza mu buryo bugezweho […] aho hantu hose haracyarimo ikibazo.
RALC ifite gahunda yo gushyira icyo gitabo no mu zindi ndimi zikoreshwa mu Rwanda nk’Ikinyarwanda, Igifaransa n’Igiswayire kugira ngo kizarusheho kugirira Abanyarwanda n’abaturarwanda benshi akamaro.
Iki gitabo kigaragaza ibibazo byihariye bya buri cyiciro cy’ubuhanzi mu Rwanda n’ingamba zafasha mu kubikemura.
Kije gikurikira izindi ntambwe nyinshi Inteko imaze gutera mu guteza imbere ubuhanzi n’inganda ndangamuco mu Rwanda zirimo gufasha abahanzi kwibumbira hamwe, gutera inkunga ibikorwa by’ubuhanzi n’ibindi.
Iki gitabo kigaragaza ishusho y’inganda ndangamuco mu byiciro bitandukanye birimo muzika, sinema, ubugeni n’ubukorikori, ikinamico, urwenya, imbyino, ubwiza n’imideri, ubwanditsi n’ubusizi.
RALC yashishikarije Abanyarwanda muri rusange, by’umwihariko abahanzi, kugira inyota yo gusoma iki gitabo kuko kirimo amakuru menshi yabafasha gutera imbere ku rwego mpuzamahanga; bityo ubuhanzi n’inganda ndangamuco bikabasha gutunga ababikora n’ababishoramo imari mu buryo burambye.
Ibyo bizatuma barushaho kugira uruhare mu guteza imbere ubukungu bw’Igihugu.
Kugeza ubu iki gitabo kiboneka mu isomero rya RALC no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco ikoresha hamwe no ku rubuga rwa murandasi rw’Inteko (www.
Vuba aha icyo gitabo kizashyirwa mu masomero anyuranye mu gihugu kugira ngo kibagereho kigere kuri benshi.
Nyuma y’umwaka umwe asezeye gukina umupira w’amaguru, uwahoze ari rutahizamu wa Chelsea, Real Madrid na Bayern Munich, Arjen Roben, yatangaje ko agiye kugaruka mu kibuga akinira FC Groningen yakinnyemo akiri muto.
Nyuma y’umwaka umwe asezeye gukina umupira w’amaguru, uwahoze ari rutahizamu wa Chelsea, Real Madrid na Bayern Munich, Arjen Roben, yatangaje ko agiye kugaruka mu kibuga akinira FC Groningen yakinnyemo akiri muto.
Arjen Robben w’imyaka 36, yasezeye gukina umupira w’amaguru muri Nyakanga 2019 nyuma yo kwegukana ibikombe 30 mu makipe yose yakiniye.
Gusa yizeye kugaruka mu kibuga mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2020/21 kugira ngo afashe FC Groningen yagizweho ingaruka n’ihagarikwa ry’umupira w’amaguru kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Arjen Robben yagize ati “Ni inzozi zanjye kwambara umwambaro wa Groningen na none.
“Ntabwo ndamenya neza niba ibi bizakunda.
Icyo nemeza nzi ni uko bitazaterwa no kwiyemeza cyangwa ishyaka ryanjye.
“Ikipe ishobora gukoresha ubufasha ubwo aribwo bwose muri iki gihe kugira ngo isohoke mu ihungabana ry’ubukungu ryatewe na Coronavirus.
“Ibi byumweru bishize, nagize ibiganiro byinshi n’abayobozi b’ikipe birashoboka ko numvise ugusaba kw’abafana bacu: Arjen, kurikiza ibyo umutima wawe ushaka!"

Arjen Robben wakiniye u Buholandi imikino 96 nyuma yo gukina bwa mbere muri Groningen afite imyaka 16, tariki ya 3 Ukuboza 2000.
Groningen yari iya icyenda ubwo shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere mu Buholandi, Eredevsie ya 2019/20, yahagarikwaga ikanafatwa nk’itarakinwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Imikino ya mbere y’umwaka utaha w’imikino byitezwe ko izakinwa muri Nzeri hafi nyuma y’amezi atandatu Groningen itsinzwe na PSV Eindhoven mu mukino iheruka gukina.
Ibikorwa bitandukanye mu Burayi bikomeje gufungurwa bijyanye n’ingamba zigezweho mu gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho kuri iyi nshuro u Bufaransa bwakomoreye abakeneye gusura Tour Eiffel.
Ibikorwa bitandukanye mu Burayi bikomeje gufungurwa bijyanye n’ingamba zigezweho mu gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho kuri iyi nshuro u Bufaransa bwakomoreye abakeneye gusura Tour Eiffel.
U Bufaransa buri mu bihugu byahungabanyijwe cyane na Coronavirus, aho habarwa abantu 29 731 bishwe n’iki cyorezo na 161 348 bacyanduye, gusa ubukana bwacyo bukomeje kugabanuka, ari nako ibikorwa byinshi bisubukurwa.
Kwemerera abantu kongera gusura aha hantu nyaburanga ni kimwe mu bimenyetso by’isubukurwa ryitondewe ry’ibikorwa, hagamijwe ko ibikorwa byinjiza amafaranga byongera gukora ariko ubuzima bw’abaturage bukabungwabungwa.
Uburyo bwo guhana intera hagati y’umuntu n’undi n’ikoranabuhanga ryifashishwa mu gushakisha abahuye n’umuntu ufite Coronavirus, ni byo bihanzwe amaso.
Tour Eiffel ni hamwe mu hantu hasurwa cyane na ba mukerarugendo mu Murwa Mukuru Paris, mu gihe ahandi hasurwa cyane nk’Inzu Ndangamurage ya Louvre, yo igifunzwe kugeza ku wa 6 Nyakanga.
Mu rwego rwo kurinda abasura uyu munara muremure cyane muri Paris, ibyuma bizamura abantu kuri uyu munara ureshya na metero 324 birafunzwe, abantu basabwa kuzamuka bakoresheje ingazi, ndetse ahantu habiri muri hatatu abantu bashobora guhagarara bari kuri uyu munara niho hafunguwe gusa.
Nk’uko urubuga rusangwaho amakuru ya Tour Eiffel rubigaragaza, abantu bemerewe kuzamuka ingazi 674 bakagera ku nyubako ya kabiri.
Byongeye, kugira ngo hirindwe ko abantu bahura, bazamukira ku ruhande rumwe bakamanukira ku rundi.
Gusura uyu munara abantu basabwa kwishyura amayero 10.
40 cyangwa amadolari ya Amerika $11.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’uyu munara, Patrick Branco Ruivo, avuga ko kuva ibikorwa byafungwa muri Werurwe abantu ntibemererwe kuhasura, Tour Eiffel yahombye miliyoni $30, igihe imaze ifunzwe kikaba ari cyo cya mbere kirekire ifunzwe nyuma y’Intambara ya Kabiri y’Isi.
Mu gusura uyu munara uganwa na miliyoni z’abantu mu bihe bisanzwe, kwambara agapfukamunwa n’amazuru ni itegeko ku bahasura bose bafite guhera ku myaka 11 kuzamura, kandi abantu bagomba guhagarara bahanye intera.
Y bishatse kuvuga New York, L.
A isobanura Los Angeles na Chicago ni bimwe mu birango dukunze gusanga ku myenda irimo imipira y’imbeho n’ingofero kandi ukabona abantu bayambaye barabyishimiye, ariko mu by’ukuri bari kwamamaza iyi Mijyi yo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Y bishatse kuvuga New York, L.
A isobanura Los Angeles na Chicago ni bimwe mu birango dukunze gusanga ku myenda irimo imipira y’imbeho n’ingofero kandi ukabona abantu bayambaye barabyishimiye, ariko mu by’ukuri bari kwamamaza iyi Mijyi yo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Nyuma y’igihe babyitegereza bakabona bidakwiye guhora abantu bagenda bamenyekanisha imijyi y’amahanga, urubyiruko rwibumbiye mu nzu y’imideli yitwa DCIB (Dawn Central Investiment Bureau), rwahisemo gukora imyambaro ifite ikirango cya KGL, bifatwa nk’impine ya Kigali, Umurwa Mukuru w’u Rwanda umaze kumenyekana ku Isi yose kubera isuku n’iterambere rikomeje kwihuta.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Tuyishimire Desiré, umwe mu basore babiri bashinze iyi nzu y’imideli yavuze ko intego yabo ari ukumenyekanisha Umujyi wa Kigali, babinyujije mu gutanga umusanzu muri gahunda ya leta yo guca caguwa, hatezwa imbere imyenda ikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ati “Nyuma yo kumva no gusobanukirwa gahunda ya Leta y’u Rwanda twabonye ko ari ngombwa ko dutanga umusanzu wacu nk’urubyiruko, tugashishikariza abantu gukunda imyenda ikorerwa mu gihugu cyacu.
Yakomeje avuga ko nyuma yo kwitegereza baje gusanga abantu benshi bahitamo kwambara umwambaro runaka kubera ikirango cyawo, bituma batekereza gukora ifite icya ‘KGL’ kuko bazi neza ko Abanyarwanda bakunda umujyi wabo kandi ubateye ushema.
Ati “Twabonye ko igihe mu Rwanda hazaba hari ikirango abantu bakunze, ntabwo bazajya bajya gushaka icyo mu mahanga.
Murabizi umwana ntabwo akura ngo ahite yuzura ingobyi, niyo mpamvu twahereye ku ngofero, uko ubushobozi buzagenda buza, tuzakora amakoti, imipira n’ibindi.
Tuyishimire yavuze ko kugeza ubu byinshi ku ngofero zabo bikorerwa mu Bushinwa, kuko batarabasha kugira ubushobozi bwo kugura imashini zidoda n’izishyiraho ikirango bitewe n’uburyo zihenda.
Bateganya ko mu myaka itanu iri imbere byose bazaba baratangiye kubikorera mu Rwanda, ibi bikazagerwaho bitewe n’uburyo ikirango cyabo kizakundwa n’ubushobozi bw’inganda zikora imyenda mu Rwanda.
Ati “Mu myaka itanu iri imbere turabona uretse Abanyarwanda aho bari hose ku Isi n’abanyamahanga turabona bazaba bambara imyenda yacu ifite ikirango cya KGL.
Turashaka gushimangira iterambere ry’umujyi wacu wa Kigali binyuze mu myambaro.
Uru rubyiruko ruvuga ko uretse kuba rwifuza kurushaho kumenyekanisha Kigali, rufite n’intego yo gutanga akazi kenshi ku rungano rwabo, rugasaba Abanyarwanda kubanza kwikunda mbere yo gukunda iby’abandi kugira ngo inzozi zabo ari nazo z’igihugu zo guteza imbere ‘Made in Rwanda’ zigerweho.

MultiChoice Group Ltd yo muri Afurika y’Epfo yasinyanye amasezerano na Netflix Inc na Amazon.
com Inc, azatuma ibyo bigo binyuza serivisi zabyo z’amashusho kuri dekoderi nshya ya DStv, bikazatuma abantu bishyura ifatabuguzi risanzwe rya televiziyo bakareba Netflix na Amazon Prime Video.
MultiChoice Group Ltd yo muri Afurika y’Epfo yasinyanye amasezerano na Netflix Inc na Amazon.
com Inc, azatuma ibyo bigo binyuza serivisi zabyo z’amashusho kuri dekoderi nshya ya DStv, bikazatuma abantu bishyura ifatabuguzi risanzwe rya televiziyo bakareba Netflix na Amazon Prime Video.
Ni icyemezo cyatangajwe ku wa Gatatu, mu gihe icyo kigo gicuruza amashusho ya televiziyo mu buryo bw’ifatabuguzi umuntu yishyura (Pay-TV) gikomeje kwagura ibikorwa byacyo.
Impinduka ubu buryo buzagira ku biciro by’ifatabuguzi rya Multi-Choice rigurwa buri kwezi zizatangazwa mu byumweru biri imbere.
Gusa biteganywa ko icyo kigo kizajya kibona komisiyo, ku mafaranga azinjizwa aturutse ku bafatabuguzi ba ziriya serivisi ebyiri zigiye kwiyongera kuri dekoderi za MultiChoice.
Ubusanzwe abantu barebaga Netlix na Amazon mu buryo bwa internet, umuntu akishyura ifatabuguzi ubundi akareba uko abyifuza.
MultiChoice Group Ltd ivuga ko kongera muri serivisi zayo izindi ebyiri mpuzamahanga z’amashusho, bigaragaza ubushake bwayo bwo gukomeza kuba igihangange mu kugira urunyurane rw’amashene.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa MultiChoice, Calvo Mawela, yavuze ko bamaze igihe baha abafatabuguzi serivisi bareba, ku buryo byagaragaye ko uburyo bakoramo butanga umusaruro.
Yakomeje ati "Uko uru rwego rugenda rutera imbere, dutekereza ko ubu turi mu mwanya mwiza wo kungukira ku mpande ebyiri – isoko rya Pay-TV rikomeje gukura muri Afurika n’amahirwe arimo gukura yo gucuruza amashusho kuri internet (over-the-top, OTT), aho serivisi za OTT no gushyira hamwe amashene bishobora gutanga umusaruro.
Multi-Choice kandi irimo kwitegura gushyira ku isoko serivisi za DStv ariko noneho zidakoresha igisahani ngo umuntu agerweho n’amashusho meza, uburyo buzashyirwa ahagaragara mu minsi iri imbere.
Icyo kigo ubu kimaze kugira abafatabuguzi miliyoni 19.

Muri Mata uyu mwaka kandi Perezida Macron yashyizeho itsinda ry’inzobere rishinzwe gucukumbura uruhare rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.

Ati “Oya ntawe twigeze twanga rwose.
Ibyo ntabwo ari byo ntawe twigeze twanga.
Ntawe bigeze bohereza.
Na Perezida Macron yarabivuze umwaka ushize ko ubu turimo duteza imbere umubano kugira ngo ugaruke mu nzira nziza, ko igihe nikigera bazohereza ambasaderi.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ambasaderi ni u Bufaransa bumushyiraho si u Rwanda rumushyiraho.
U Bufaransa igihe cyose buzamushyiraho tuziga kuri ubwo busabe.
Umubano ushingiye kuri za ambasade hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa utangirira mu 1962 u Rwanda rukibona ubwigenge.
Mu kwezi gushize Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Abafaransa gishinzwe Iterambere (Agence Française de Developpément , AFD), yaje mu Rwanda yizeza gukomeza gufatanya mu bikorwa by’iterambere.
