Mu gihe ibitaramo byahagaritswe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, abanyamuziki nabo bayobotse inzira yo gutaramana n’abakunzi babo bifashishije ikoranabuhanga.
Mu gihe mu Rwanda hamaze iminsi umurindi w’ibitaramo by’abahanzi batandukanye, Itorero Inganzo Ngari ryamaze gutegura ibitaramo bya buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru mu rwego rwo gususurutsa abakunzi b’umuziki gakondo.
Ibi bitaramo bizajya bitambuka ku rukuta rwa Youtube rw’iri torero bizatangira kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 26 Kamena 2020.
Ibi bitaramo by’Itorero Inganzo Ngari byatekerejweho nyuma yuko ibyo risanzwe rikorera kuri Hôtel des Mille Collines buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru byakomwe mu nkokora n’ingamba zo kwirinda no gukumira COVID-19.
Nahimana Serge ubarizwa mu Itorero Inganzo Ngari yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi bitaramo babiteguye kugira ngo bashimishe abakunzi b’imbyino gakondo bari batakibona aho bataramira bakanyurwa.
Yagize ati “Twari dusanzwe dutaramira abakunzi bacu muri Hôtel des Mille Collines buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru, twanze gukomeza kwicisha irungu abakunzi b’umudiho gakondo niyo mpamvu twahisemo kubategurira ibi bitaramo.
Iki gitaramo kizaba cyiganjemo indirimbo zigaragaza uturango tw’umuco w’u Rwanda mu mbyino zizwi mu duce tunyuranye tw’urukiga [izo mu murera no gice cya Byumba], mu Buganza, mu Mutara w’Indorwa, mu Buhoma, mu Bufundu, mu Gisaka, mu Buganza n’ahandi.
Uretse imbyino muri ibi bitaramo, Inganzo Ngari zizashyiramo igice cy’ibisakuzo, kwivuga, kuvuza ikondera no guca imigani.
Ushaka kuzakurikira iki gitaramo wanyura hano
Umunsi ku wundi, ikoranabuhanga rikomeje guhindura ubuzima bw’abatuye Isi, ndetse ubu umuyoboro wa internet yihuta ya 5G niwo uhanzwe amaso nk’ugiye kugira uruhare rukomeye mu guhindura ubuzima bw’abantu.
Umunsi ku wundi, ikoranabuhanga rikomeje guhindura ubuzima bw’abatuye Isi, ndetse ubu umuyoboro wa internet yihuta ya 5G niwo uhanzwe amaso nk’ugiye kugira uruhare rukomeye mu guhindura ubuzima bw’abantu.
Ni umuyoboro ugereranywa nk’intambwe nshya ndetse na none nk’itafari rizaganisha ku rugendo ruhindura buri kimwe, uhereye ku buvuzi bwifashishije ikoranabuhanga nk’aho umuganga ashobora kubaga umuntu kandi batari kumwe, ikoranabuhanga mu modoka, mu buzima busanzwe ku buryo waba uri ku kazi ugacana imbabura wasize mu rugo n’ibindi bizwi nka Internet of Things.
Ni byinshi, ariko wakwibaza impamvu abantu muri iki gihe bashishikariye 5G! Ni iki cyayo cyiza gitandukanye n’ibisanzwe cyangwa se ni ibiki izahindura mu buzima bwa muntu?
Mu Kinyarwanda cyoroshye, 5G wayisobanura nk’icyiciro cya gatanu cy’ikoranabuhanga ryihutisha amakuru kurusha ibisanzwe.
Gusa iyo tuvuze kwihuta bisobanurwa kwinshi.
Nko muri Amerika, sosiyete y’itumanaho ya Verizon iherutse gukora igerageza kuri 5G, isanga ishobora kwihuta nk’igihe umuntu amanura ibintu (download), akabona gigabits 1.
0 ku isegonda (1.
Ni ukuvuga ngo ni nk’inshuro ziri hagati y’icumi na 100 z’umuvuduko usanzwe, ndetse ni umuvuduko mwinshi utanabona no ku miyoboro ya fibre optique, bisobanuye ko uyifashishije ushobora kumanura kuri internet ibintu amagana ku muvuduko wo hejuru.
Ntabwo ari umuvuduko gusa.
Niba uri kuri internet ugakanda ku kintu runaka ugiye gusoma, hari umwanya bifata kugira ngo rwa rupapuro wakanzeho rufunguke (mu cyongereza bizwi nka Latency).
Ubusanzwe bishobora kumara milliseconde 20 [mu isegonda rimwe harimo milliseconde 1000) kugira ngo rwa rupapuro rufunguke, ariko kuri 5G ni munsi ya milliseconde imwe.
Bifate nk’aho ari nk’igihe bitwara kugira ngo telefoni yawe itere umurabyo mu gihe uri gufotora.
Ikindi cyiza cyayo ni uko yo ifite ubushobozi bwo kuba wacomekaho ibikoresho byinshi by’ikoranabuhanga kurusha ibyo washyira kuri internet isanzwe, ukayifashisha mu rugo wenda ucometseho firigo yawe ikaza kuguha amakuru ko ibintu birimo harimo ibyakonje cyane cyangwa se ibigiye kubora n’ibindi.
Wumvise ibyo ikora, uhita wibaza ku giciro cyayo.
Ubu mu Rwanda ntabwo ihari wenda ku buryo twarebera ku bintu byo hafi yacu, ariko nko muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, sosiyete z’itumanaho ziri kwishyuza nibura amadolari 10 yiyongera ku yari asanzwe yishyurwa n’umuntu ku kwezi; uru ni urugero rwa Verizon.
Kugira ngo ukoreshe 5G bisaba ko uba ufite igikoresho kiyakira, ntabwo ari ikibonetse cyose.
Urugero nka telefoni, nyinshi ziri gusohoka zigezweho zakira 5G, kimwe n’uko hamaze iminsi hasohoka izakira 4G.
Umwaka ushize Sumsung yashyize ku isoko Samsung Galaxy S10 ishobora kwakira 5G.
Ikindi ni uko telefoni nyinshi zashyizwe ku isoko mu ntangiriro z’umwaka ushize usanga zikoresha ikoranabuhanga rizifasha kwakira no gutanga amakuru ryakozwe na Qualcomm, [Snapdragon X50], rizibashisha no kwakira 5G.
Uyu mwaka byitezwe ko hazashyirwa ku isoko telefoni nyinshi zakira 5G kurusha ushize.

Hari igice cy’Isi cyigize abagenzuzi
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe ku buryo abona impamvu umugabane wa Afurika u Rwanda rurimo ukunze gufatwa nk’uhoramo ibibazo, udatera imbere ukagira n’abayobozi babi.
Yasubije ko ikibazo gikomeye atari Afurika nk’umugabane ahubwo ari abantu bamwe bigize abagenzuzi b’isi, bumva ko nta cyiza cyakorerwa ahandi hatari iwabo.
Yagize ati “Hari igice cy’Isi gihora gishaka kugaragara nk’ahakorerwa ibintu byiza gusa, hakaba n’ikindi gice kiberamo ibibi gusa.
Icyo gice cya mbere cyumva ko ari cyo gishinzwe kugenzura ikindi.
Bumva ko bafite inshingano zo gukomeza kugenzura.
Mu yandi magambo, twe bo mu gice kibi, uko wagerageza gukora neza kose ntushobora kuva muri icyo gice ngo wenda ujye mu gice cy’abakora ibyiza.
Aho niho yahise asabwa gukomoza no ku magambo Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe, Donald Trump, wigeze gushinjwa kuvuga, ko ibihugu bya Afurika ari umwanda.
Perezida Kagame asanga igikenewe atari ukujya guhangana n’abafata nabi Afurika ahubwo ko ingufu zikwiriye gushyirwa mu kurwanya ibituma uwo mugabane usuzugurwa.
Ati “Uburyo bwiza ntabwo ari ukurwanya uwo muntu ubona ibihugu byacu mu buryo bubi, ahubwo icyiza ni ukurwanya ruswa, ubukene, n’ibindi bintu bibi byose abantu bashingiraho baducira imanza zitari zo.
Dukwiriye kwibanda ku bintu bidushyira ku rundi rwego aho ntawibeshya ku cyo duharanira n’abo turi bo.
Manda ya gatatu: ‘Njye nashakaga kugenda’
Mu mwaka wa 2015, Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda ryo mu 2003 ryaravuguruwe, ingingo zimwe ziravugururwa zirimo n’iyemerera Perezida Kagame kwiyamamariza manda ya gatatu.
Ni igikorwa cyakozwe nyuma y’ubusabe bw’abaturage basaga miliyoni eshatu n’igice bari bandikiye Inteko Ishinga Amategeko bifuza ko ingingo ikumira Perezida kongera kwiyamamaza yavugururwa.
Itegeko Nshinga ryaravuguruwe, mu 2017 haba amatora ya Perezida, Paul Kagame w’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi ayatsinda ku majwi 98%.
Perezida Kagame yabwiye Time Magazine ko we atifuzaga manda ya gatatu, ko yabikoze nyuma yo kubisabwa na benshi.
Ati “ Njye nashakaga kugenda.
Nanavuze impamvu ariko abantu bamwe barahagurutse bati ‘Perezida waduhaye andi amahirwe, ukaduha undi mwanya?
Ntabwo dushaka ko ba bantu batwikoreje imitwaro babona inzira yo kugaruka ku buyobozi bw’igihugu cyacu ngo bongere bangize ibintu.
’ Haje ibitekerezo byinshi, nagombaga kubyumva nkanabyubahiriza.
Yabajijwe niba ishyaka FPR Inkotanyi ryaba riri gushaka uzamusimbura igihe manda ye izaba irangiye, Perezida Kagame avuga ko ibyo byaba atari byo.
Kagame yagize ati “Ibyo byaba ari nk’ubwami cyangwa ibimeze nkabyo.
‘Sinagiye ku buyobozi nkoze amanyanga’
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe ku bikunze gutangazwa n’imiryango mpuzamahanga iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu, ivuga ko mu Rwanda nta bwisanzure buhari, ko abatavuga rumwe na Leta batotetezwa n’ibindi.
Iki kinyamakuru cyitsaga cyane ku kuba bamwe mu batavuga rumwe na Leta barangiwe kwiyamamaza mu matora ya Perezida aherutse.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko rimwe na rimwe abayobozi n’abaturage bo muri Afurika bafatwa uko batari.
Ati “Ntabwo nagiye ku buyobozi habayeho amanyanga, nta manyanga nakoze mu rugendo rwo kubohora igihugu cyanjye.
Hari igishoro natanze kandi igishoro cyanjye ntabwo ari ukwibasira uburenganzira bw’abaturage.
Siko nteye.
Yakomeje agira ati “ Abantu bajya batekereza ko abayobozi ba Afurika babereyeho kugirira nabi abaturage babo cyangwa ko abaturage bakiri inyuma batazi ikibabereye.
Inshuro nyinshi abaturage bacu bagiye bafata umwanzuro, hakaza umuntu akavuga ngo ‘oya, oya muri guhitamo nabi".
"Ni ukuvuga ngo wa mugenzuzi nahoze mvuga ni we ufite ububasha bwo kuvuga uburyo bwiza ibintu bikwiriye gukorwamo, ngo uyu ni we muntu ukwiriye kuba umuyobozi wanyu.
Abanyarwanda bazi icyo bashaka, bazi kwifatira umwanzuro kandi mu gihe babikoze ntekereza ko abantu bakwiriye kubyubaha.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko nta munyamahanga waharaniye ubwigenge bw’abanyarwanda kumurusha ku buryo hagira umubwiriza ibyo akwiriye gukora.
Ati “Nzi ibyo nkora, nzi ibimbereye.
Ntabwo nkeneye kubibwirwa n’uwo ari we wese.

Ishyirahamwe Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutegura Inama zikomeye (ICCA) ryashyize u Rwanda n’Umujyi wa Kigali by’umwihariko, ku mwanya wa kabiri mu bihugu byakiriye inama mpuzamahanga nyinshi muri Afurika mu 2019.
Ishyirahamwe Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutegura Inama zikomeye (ICCA) ryashyize u Rwanda n’Umujyi wa Kigali by’umwihariko, ku mwanya wa kabiri mu bihugu byakiriye inama mpuzamahanga nyinshi muri Afurika mu 2019.
Raporo ya ICCA y’umwaka ushize yerekana ko u Rwanda rwari ku mwanya wa kabiri n’ubundi inyuma y’Umujyi wa Cape Town muri Afurika y’Epfo, ku rutonde rwasohotse ku wa 13 Gicurasi 2019, rugaragaza uko imijyi yishimiwe mu kwakira inama mpuzamahanga mu 2018.
Icyo gihe u Rwanda rwari rwazamutseho umwanya umwe kuko mu 2017 rwari ku wa gatatu inyuma y’imijyi ya Cape Town muri Afurika y’Epfo [yongeye kwisubiza uwo mwanya] na Marrakesh muri Maroc.
Raporo yerekana uko ibihugu byakiriye inama mpuzamahanga mu 2019 yasohotse kuri uyu wa 12 Gicurasi 2020 yerekana ko u Rwanda rwisubije umwanya wa Kabiri.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kumenyekanisha Ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku Nama (RCB), Nelly Mukazayire, yavuze ko ari amakuru meza yerekana ko urwego rw’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku nama rukomeje gutera imbere.
Ati “Aya ni amakuru meza na gihamya ko ingamba z’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku nama ziri kugira agaciro.
Tuzakomeza gushaka uko twakora neza dufatanyije n’abanyamuryango bacu, n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu kugira ngo tuzakomeze kuza mu myanya myiza mu myaka iri imbere.
Uru rutonde rukorwa hashingiwe ku nama mpuzamahanga zizwi igihugu cyakiriye by’umwihariko iziba mu gihe runaka [inshuro imwe cyangwa ebyiri mu mwaka].
Izi nama zigomba kuba zibera mu bihugu nka bitatu bitandukanye, zikitabirwa n’abantu basaga 50.
ICCA kugeza ubu ifite abanyamuryango bagera kuri 50 muri Afurika, igihugu cya Afurika y’Epfo nicyo kiri ku mwanya wa mbere mu kwakira neza inama mpuzamahanga.
Ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku nama mu Rwanda bwinjiza angana na 20% by’amafaranga yose igihugu gikura mu bukerarugendo angana na miliyoni $56.
Muri Kigali hari ibyumba ibihumbi 10 n’ahantu heza hafite ubuso bwa metero kare ibihumbi 50 hakira inama.
U Rwanda rwari rwihaye intego yo kwinjiza miliyoni $88, mu bukerarugendo bwa 2019.
Cyakora ku byari biteganyijwe mu 2020 kugeza ubu hamaze kubaho igihombo cya 10% bitewe n’inama zagombaga kuba hagati ya Werurwe na Mata zasubitswe kubera COVID-19.
Mu nama zikomeye u Rwanda rwiteguraga kwakira zigakomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya COVID -19 harimo inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu na za guverinoma z’ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza CHOGM yigijwe inyuma.
Mu bituma u Rwanda ruza imbere mu bihugu byakira neza inama mpuzamahanga harimo kuba ari igihugu gitekanye, kirangwa n’isuku, kikaba cyaranoroheje uburyo bwo gutanga visa n’ibindi.
Imibare ya ICCA yerekana ko habaye inama 13 254 mu 2019 ari nazo nyinshi yabaruye kuva itangiye gutangaza urwo rutonde.
Umwaka wa 2019 usa n’utazasibangana mu mitwe yitwa ko irwanya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, kuko usize abo udahitanye imigambi yabo iri mu kangaratete ndetse abandi bari mu mazi abira, kuko isaha iyo ari yo yose ibintu byabahindukiraho.
Umwaka wa 2019 usa n’utazasibangana mu mitwe yitwa ko irwanya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, kuko usize abo udahitanye imigambi yabo iri mu kangaratete ndetse abandi bari mu mazi abira, kuko isaha iyo ari yo yose ibintu byabahindukiraho.
Kuva mu myaka ishize, umutwe wavugwaga cyane wari FDLR kuva mu myaka ya 2000, aho yashinzwe n’abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Habanje gushingwa RDR, haza ALIR 1 na ALIR 2, nyuma yo kuba FDLR baza gutandukana havuka CNRD na RUD-Urunana.
Magingo aya FDLR na RUD Urunana ni imitwe ikomeje kubangamira umutekano w’u Rwanda, nubwo nayo itorohewe muri uyu mwaka urimo kugana ku musozo.
Umuyobozi wa FDLR yaguye muri gereza abandi bagwa mu bihuru
Muri Mata 2006 nibwo Dr Ignace Murwanashyaka wayoboraga FDLR yafatiwe mu Majyepfo y’u Budage avuye gusura abarwanyi muri RDC.
Mu 2015 urukiko rwa Stuttgart rwamuhamije ibyaha hamwe na Straton Musoni wari umwungirije.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko Murwanashyaka yaguye muri gereza atarangije igifungo cy’imyaka 13 yakatiwe, maze urwamutwaye rutangira kototera abamukoreye mu ngata.
Bidateye kabiri, muri uko kwezi kwa Mata nibwo Nsekanabo Jean Pierre uzwi nka Lt.
Col Abega Kamara wari ushinzwe iperereza muri FDLR na Nkaka Ignace uzwi nka La Forge Fils Bazeye wari umuvugizi wayo, bagejejwe imbere y’urukiko kugira ngo baburane ku ifungwa n’ifungurwa ry’agateganyo.
Abo bombi inkuru y’ifatwa ryabo yabaye kimomo mu Ukuboza 2018, ko bafatiwe ku mupaka wa Bunagana bavuye muri Uganda mu nama yabaye hagati ya tariki 15-16 Ukuboza, yahuje abahagarariye RNC ya Kayumba Nyamwasa na FDLR.
Bivugwa ko byari ku butumire bw’ubuyobozi bwa Uganda, hagamijwe kunoza umubano hagati y’iyo mitwe y’iterabwoba n’inzego za gisirikare za Uganda no kunoza imikoranire mu migambi yo guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Uganda ushinzwe ubutwererane bw’akarere, Philemon Mateke, byatangajwe ko ari we wari umuhuza wabo, na we uyu mwaka umusize atorohewe kuko nubwo Perezida Yoweri Museveni akomeje kumuryamaho, amakuru y’iperereza akomeje kumushyira hanze ko yari n’inyuma y’igitero abarwanyi ba RUD Urunana bagabye i Musanze ahazwi nko mu Kinigi mu ijoro ryo ku wa 4 Ukwakira, kigahitana abaturage 14.
Ibya FLN byasubiwemo
Umwaka ushize waranzwe n’ibitero binyuranye byagiye byigambwa n’umutwe wa FLN, wari ufite Nsabimana Callixte wiyise Sankara, nk’umuvugizi wawo.
Muri Nyakanga 2018 abantu bitwaje intwaro zirimo n’imbunda bateye abaturage mu Murenge wa Nyabimata babasahura amatungo, ibiribwa, imyenda n’amafaranga.
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 19 Kamena 2018 nabwo abantu bitwaje imbunda, bishe barashe abantu babiri muri Nyaruguru, bakomeretsa batandatu barimo n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyabimata, Nsengiyumva Vincent, batwika n’imodoka ye na moto y’umuturage.
Mbere yaho tariki ya 10 Kamena 2018, amabandi yitwaje intwaro gakondo hamwe n’imbunda, yateye abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Ngera mu Karere ka Nyaruguru arabakomeretsa abatwara n’imitungo irimo amafaranga, televiziyo, inkweto n’ibindi.
Ibyo bitero byatangiye kujya byigambwa n’umutwe wa FLN, mu ijwi rya Nsabimana Callixte nk’umuvugizi.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko Nsabimana yafatiwe muri Comores.
Ubwo yagezwaga imbere y’urukiko ku wa 23 Gicurasi 2019, Nsabimana yabwiye urukiko ko nta byinshi afite byo kwireguza kuko ibyaha 16 akurikiranyweho bimwe yabikoze ku giti cye ibindi bigakorwa n’umutwe yari abereye umuvugizi.
Ubu afunzwe by’agateganyo mbere yo gutangira kuburana mu mizi, aregwa ibyaha birimo iremwa ry’umutwe w’ingabo ritemewe, Icyaha cy’iterabobwoba ku nyungu za politiki, gukora no kugira uruhare mu bikorwa by’iterabwoba, gutanga amabwiriza mu gikorwa cy’iterabwoba, kuba mu mutwe w’iterabwoba, icyaha cyo kugambana no gushishikariza abandi gukora iterabwoba n’ibyaha by’ubwicanyi n’ubwinjiracyaha bw’ubwicanyi.
Aregwa kandi gufata bugwate, gukwiza amakuru atariyo cyangwa icengezamatwara rigamije kwangisha leta y’u Rwand amu bihugu by’amahanga, guhakana Jenoside, kwiba yitwaje intwaro, gutwika, kugirana umubano na leta y’amahanga hagamijwe gushoza intambara, gukora cyangwa gukoresha impapuro mpimbano, gukubita no gukomeretsa ku bushake no gutanga, kwakira no gushishikariza kwakira ibikomoka ku iterabwoba.
Amakuru ataremezwa ahamya ko Herman Nsengimana wasimbuye Nsabimana muri FLN, na we mu minsi ishize yacakiriwe mu mashyamba ya RDC hamwe n’abandi barwanyi benshi.
Abakuru ba FDLR bishwe umusubizo
Muri Nzeri 2019 nibwo Ingabo za Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, FARDC, zemeje ko zishe Lieutenant General Sylvestre Mudacumura wayoboraga umutwe wa FDLR, yicirwa mu gace ka Bwito mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyaruguru.
Nyuma y’iminsi mike, nibwo FARDC, binyuze mu bikorwa byiswe ‘Sokola 2’ yeretse itangazamakuru bane mu barwanyi ba FDLR, bahoze ari abarinzi ba Gen Mudacumura.
Mudacumura yahoze mu Ngabo z’u Rwanda mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, yabaye mu mutwe w’abarindaga Perezida Juvenal Habyarimana ndetse yari umuyobozi wungirije wawo.
Nyuma yo gutsinda urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu n’ingabo zari iza RPA, Gen Mudacumura na bagenzi be bafashe iy’ishyamba, aho bakoreye ibyaha ndengakamere ku baturage bo mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC.
Mbere yo kwicwa, Mudacumura yashakishwaga n’urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha akekwaho ibyaha icyenda byiganjemo iby’intambara n’iyicarubozo yakoze hagati y’umwaka wa 2009 na 2010.
Yagizwe Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo za FDLR nyuma y’itahuka rya rya General Paul Rwarakabije wawuyoboraga mbere ye.
Urukiko Mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rw’i La Haye mu Buholandi rwamushyiriyeho impapuro zisaba ko atabwa muri yombi 13 Nyakanga 2012.
Gusa yari atarafatwa.
Isasu ryavuze mu birindiro bya P5
Umutwe wa P5 umaze igihe ufite ibirindiro mu mashyamba ya RDC, ni umwe mu itarahiriwe n’imigambi yo gutera u Rwanda, nyuma yo gushingwa n’ihuriro ry’amashyaka atanu ariyo Amahoro People’s Congress, Forces Démocratiques Unifieés – Inkingi (FDU-Inkingi); People’s Defence Pact-Imanzi (PDP-Imanzi), Rwanda National Congress (RNC) na PS Imberakuri ya Bernard Ntaganda, maze uragizwa Kayumba Nyamwasa.
Uyu mutwe Kayumba aheruka kuwusaba kuvana abarwanyi bawo muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo ngo wegere umupaka wa Uganda aho bivugwa ko wari wizeye guhabwa inkunga ifatika kurusha izo wahabwaga uri hafi y’u Burundi, ariko inzira ntiyabwira umugenzi.
Ku wa 19 Mata ngo nibwo bimutse, bageze Kalehe bahura n’umutwe wa MRCD uyoborwa na Gen Irategeka, bababwira ko ngo bo batangiye akazi muri Nyungwe.
Bamaze kuruhuka ngo bakomeje urugendo "rutabahiriye na gatoya," kuko bageze muri Gatoyi i Masisi, bahuye n’ibico byinshi bya FARDC, bararaswa, bamwe bafatwa mpiri abandi bishyikiriza Monusco.
Ubwo bari imbere y’urukiko i Kigali, abenshi bahurizaga ku kuvuga ko bashyikirijwe u Rwanda ku wa 18 Kamena 2019, nubwo hari abo byamenyekanye ko batashye bucece bakanagera mu kigo kinyuzwamo abavuye ku rugerero i Mutobo, ariko mu iperereza bikaza gutahurwa ko urugendo rwabo rutacukirizwa aho, berekezwa mu nkiko.
Ubu abarwanyi 25 bayobowe na Rtd Major Mudathiru Habib bari kuburanira mu rukiko rwa gisirikare mu Rwanda, ndetse uyu we yarashwe ukuguru ku buryo kwangiritse bikomeye, ariko ntabura kurandatwa n’ingabo z’u Rwanda yiteguraga kugabaho igitero.
Gen Musabyimana wa RUD Urunana yarishwe
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 4 Ukwakira rishyira ku wa 5 Ukwakira 2019, abagizi ba nabi biganjemo abitwaje intwaro gakondo bateye mu Murenge wa Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze bica abaturage 14 abandi barakomereka.
Ku wa 6 Ukwakira nibwo Polisi y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko inzego z’umutekano zishe abagizi ba nabi 19 ndetse abandi batanu mu bagabye icyo gitero, bafatwa mpiri.
Nyuma y’urupfu rw’abambari be, ku wa 10 Ugushyingo 2019 Gen Musabyimana Juvenal uzwi nka Jean Michel Africa wayoboraga RUD Urunana, yishwe na FARDC.
Uyu yaguye mu gitero gikomeye FARDC yagabye mu gace ka Binza hafi y’umupaka w’iki gihugu na Uganda.
Uyu mugabo wabaye mu ngabo za ex-FAR, yari umwe mu barwanyi b’umutwe wa FDLR/FOCA mbere y’uko ucikamo ibice akajya muri RUD-Urunana.
Vuruguvurugu muri RNC
Mu gihe abiyemeje gufata intwaro ngo barwanye u Rwanda bakomeje gutikira umunsi ku munsi, abibumbiye mu mutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC nabo umwaka wa 2019 ubasize ahabi.
Uyu mwaka usize mu rungabangabo umuryango wa Benjamin Rutabana, wabuze kuva muri Nzeri ubwo yajyaga mu bikorwa by’uwo mutwe muri Uganda, ugashinja Kayumba Nyamwasa n’abandi bayobozi ba RNC kuba inyuma y’ibura rye.
Rutabana ngo yahagurutse i Bruxelles ku wa Gatatu tariki 4 Nzeri 2019 agana Entebbe muri Uganda.
Yabanje guhagarara i Dubai mbere yo kugera ku kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe ku wa 5 Nzeri saa 13:50.
Yakomeje kuvugana kuri telefoni n’umugore we Diane Rutabana, ku wa 8 Nzeri ntiyongera kumva ijwi rye.
Amakuru ahamya ko Rutabana yagiranye ubwumvikane buke na bagenzi be b’abayobozi muri RNC kuko yarakajwe n’uko abarwanyi ba P5 bari mu nkiko i Kigali, mu gihe ubwo bajyaga gutabwa muri yombi, Kayumba yahaye itegeko Major Habib Mudathiru wari ubayoboye kubavana muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo bakajya ku mupaka wa Uganda, aho bazahabwa inkunga zihagije kurusha izo bahabwaga hafi y’u Burundi.
Icyo gihe ngo Kayumba yarenze ku nama zatanzwe na Rutabana, nyamara abo barwanyi bajya kwimuka, barakoresheje $12000 yoherejwe na Ben Rutabana kuri Western Union i Bujumbura.
Uburakari bwa Rutabana agashaka kwaka ibisobanuro Kayumba wagushije ingabo zabo mu biganza by’uwo bahanganye, ngo byaba impamvu yatumye ashaka ‘kumwumvisha’, kuko umusirikare muto yari ashatse kubaza byinshi ‘Jenerali’, ndetse bikekwa ko ubwo Rutabana yajyaga muri Uganda yari agiye mu bikorwa bya gisirikare, arenze ku gushaka kwa Kayumba.
Hejuru y’ibyo, bamwe mu bayobozi ba RNC muri Canada baheruka guhambirizwa bashinjwa gusuzugura ubuyobozi bukuru bw’ishyaka.
Mu birukanwe muri RNC harimo Simeon Ndwaniye wari Umuhuzabikorwa w’akarere ka Windsor na Jean Paul Ntagara wari Umuhuzabikorwa wungirije w’Intara ya Canada akaba n’umubitsi wayo, wari uherutse guhagarikwa ashinjwa gufatira umutungo w’ihuriro.
Harimo kandi Achille Kamana wari komiseri ushinzwe ubukangurambaga mu ntara ya Canada akaba n’umuhuzabikorwa w’akarere ka Ottawa-Gatineau, na Tabitha Gwiza wari komiseri ushinzwe abari n’abategarugori mu ntara ya Canada n’umubitsi mu karere ka Windsor.
Uyu Gwiza ni mushiki wa Ben Rutabana waburiwe irengero wari na komiseri ushinzwe kongera ubushobozi muri RNC, bakaba abavandimwe ba Adeline Rwigara.
Gwiza avuga ko kugeza ubu ikibazo cy’ibura rya Rutabana ahinduka umwanzi muri RNC, ku buryo urebye uko abakuru muri RNC babyitwaramo, ubona ko ari bo bari hejuru y’ibura rya Ben Rutabana.
Kugeza ubu amakuru anakomeje kuvugwa ko Kayumba Nyamwasa na we yaba atorohewe ku buyobozi bwa RNC, ku buryo isaha n’isaha ashobora kwirukanwa ku buyobozi bw’uyu mutwe mu bijyanye n’igisirikare, kimwe n’abandi bafatanya kuyobora.
Ntabwo ikibazo kirarangira
Nubwo hari abagerageje guhungabanya umutekano bakabyishyurira ikiguzi kiri hejuru, bigaragaza ko urugendo rukiri rurerure, ku buryo inzego zishinzwe umutekano ari ngombwa kugarira zigakomeza.
Umutwe wa FDLR uheruka kwimika Pacifique Ntawunguka "Omega".
Mu kiganiro yahaye urubyiruko rugera kuri 200 rubarizwa mu muryango w’abanyeshuri barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, mu 2016, Umujyanama wa Perezida wa Repubulika mu by’umutekano, Gen James Kabarebe, yahishuye uburyo Gen Ntawunguka wamubwiye ko azagaruka mu Rwanda ari uko nta mututsi ukirurimo.
Hari kandi n’umuyobozi mukuru wa FDLR, Gen Byiringiro Victor Rumuli bakunze kwita Victor Rumuri cyangwa Michel Byiringiro.
Uretse abo, mu minsi ishize nibwo Faustin Twagiramungu uba mu Bubiligi, yumvikanye ashishikariza abantu batandukanye kwinjira mu mitwe irwanya Leta y’u Rwanda, aho ubu ari umwe mu bayobozi b’ihuriro MRCD rifite umutwe wa FLN.
Ni umutwe ahuriramo na Paul Rusesabagina wamenyekanye kubera Hotel Rwanda.
Ku wa Gatanu nibwo Perezida wa Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, aho iyi mitwe yose yabonye urubuga rwo gucura imigambi yayo, Felix Tshisekedi, yatangarije Inteko Ishinga amategeko ko mu bikorwa byo kurwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro ikorera muri icyo gihugu, ingabo z’igihugu zimaze gufata abarwanyi 1712 b’umutwe wa CNRD.
Yavuze ko ubwo yageraga ku butegetsi, ibice bitandukanye by’igihugu byari byugarijwe n’ibikorwa by’imitwe yitwaje intwaro, ariko uyu munsi, kubera guhamagararira iyi mitwe gushyira intwaro hasi n’ibikorwa bya FARDC, amahoro amaze kugaruka muri Kasai, ndetse no muri Tanganyika ni mu gihe cya vuba.
Gusa ngo ikibazo gikomeye gisigaye mu majyaruguru mu bice bya Beni na Butembo, muri Ituri, mu bice bya Minembwe, Uvira, Baraka na Fizi, Shabunda na Kalehe.
Yakomeje ati “Ku baturuka Kalehe, ndashaka gushimira ingabo zacu zimaze gusenya 95% by’ibirindiro by’umutwe witwaje intwaro wa CNRD, aho abarenga 1712 bafashwe, barimo 245 bitwaje intwaro n’abayobozi 10 mu bya politiki b’uwo mutwe w’abagizi ba nabi.
Yashimangiye ko ibikorwa Guverinoma ye yatangije byo gutsinsura imitwe yitwaje intwaro bidateze guhagarara, kugeza igihe iyi mitwe izavira burundu ku butaka bw’igihugu.
U Rwanda rwasabye u Burundi ibisobanuro nyuma y’igitero giheruka kugabwa mu Karere ka Nyaruguru n’abantu bitwaje intwaro, kikagwamo bane mu bakigabye ndetse abasirikare batatu b’u Rwanda bagakomereka byoroheje.
U Rwanda rwasabye u Burundi ibisobanuro nyuma y’igitero giheruka kugabwa mu Karere ka Nyaruguru n’abantu bitwaje intwaro, kikagwamo bane mu bakigabye ndetse abasirikare batatu b’u Rwanda bagakomereka byoroheje.
Ni igitero cyagabwe ku wa Gatandatu tariki 27 Kamena 2020, n’abantu bitwaje intwaro bagera mu 100, bitwaje imbunda zirimo mashinigani (machine guns) n’izirasa za rockettes, bafite umugambi wo kugirira nabi abatuye mu Mudugudu w’icyitegererezo wa Yanze, uri mu kilometero kimwe gusa uvuye ku mupaka w’u Burundi.
RDF yatangaje ko baturutse mu Burundi ari na ho basubiye nyuma yo kuraswa berekeza mu birindiro by’Ingabo z’u Burundi biherereye ahitwa mu Gihisi ho muri Komini Bukinanyana, mu Ntara ya Cibitoke.
Basize inyuma abarwanyi babo bane bapfuye, ibikoresho bya gisirikare birimo imbunda na radiyo za gisirikari n’ibikombe by’ibiribwa byanditseho "Force de Defense Nationale du Burundi", batatu mu bakigabye bafatwa mpiri.
Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda yandikiye Guverinoma y’u Burundi binyuze mu nzira za dipolomasi, isaba ibisobanuro kuri icyo gitero no kuba abakigabye bagahungira mu Burundi, batabwa muri yombi.
Yemereye IGIHE ko yandikiye Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga y’u Burundi, "isaba ibisobanuro ku gitero cyagabwe n’abantu bataramenyekana baturutse mu Burundi, inasaba Guverinoma y’u Burundi gufata ingamba zose zishoboka kugira ngo abagize uruhare muri ibyo byaha bahungiye mu Burundi, bafatwe mu maguru mashya bagezwe imbere y’ubutabera, cyangwa boherezwe mu Rwanda kugira ngo babazwe ibyo bakoze.
Ni ibaruwa yohererejwe u Burundi ku munsi icyo gitero cyagabweho, gusa ntabwo u Burundi burasubiza.
Nyuma y’icyo gitero, Umuvugizi w’Ingabo z’u Rwanda, Lt Col Innocent Munyangango yagize ati "Turizeza Abanyarwanda ko abakoze ibi bakurikiranwa bakamenyekana.
Turimo gushakisha, binyuze mu nzira za dipolomasi, amakuru yizewe kuri ibi bitero bihora bigaruka.
Ingabo z’u Burundi zahakanye uruhare muri icyo gitero, nyamara mu itangazo ryazo ntizihakana cyangwa ngo zemeze ko cyabayeho, ahubwo zigifata nk’ibyatangajwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hirengagijwe gihamya zose zagaragajwe.
Itangazo ryasohowe na Colonel Biyereke Floribert, rigira riti “Ingabo z’Igihugu z’u Burundi ziramenyesha Abarundi n’amahanga ko ubutaka bw’u Burundi budashobora kuba indiri y’imitwe yitwaje intwaro igamije guhungabanya umutekano mu bihugu by’Abaturanyi.
Ahubwo abasirikare b’Abarundi basabwa gucunga neza umutekano ku mbibi u Burundi busangira n’ibihugu by’abaturanyi.
Amakuru yatangajwe mu Burundi avuga ko abagabye icyo gitero bafite ibirindiro mu ishyamba rya Kibira muri komini za Bukinanyana na Mabayi.
Ni ishyamba ry’inzitane rifatanye na Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda.
Bajya kugaba igitero ngo babanje guhurira ku Gihisi, ndetse ubwo bari basubijwe inyuma niho bongeye guhurira, barimo abarwanyi babiri bakomeretse cyane bajya kuvurwa bari mu modoka y’igisirikare cy’u Burundi,"bafata umuhanda wa Ndora- Bubanza mu Burundi.
Mu karere ka Nyaruguru cyane cyane mu nkengero z’ishyamba rya Nyungwe, kuva mu myaka ishize hakunze kugabwa ibitero n’abantu bitwaje intwaro, Ingabo z’u Rwanda zabasubiza inyuma bagahungira mu Burundi.
Rumwe mu ngero za vuba ni ubwo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 1 Nyakanga 2018 ahagana 23:30’ abagizi ba nabi bitwaje intwaro bateye mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, Umurenge wa Nyabimata.
Bibye ibintu by’abaturage birimo amatungo n’ibiribwa, banarasa hejuru bagamije gutera ubwoba abaturage.
Icyo gihe Polisi y’u Rwanda yagize iti "Abo bagizi ba nabi bateye baturutse mu gihugu cy’u Burundi banyuze mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe, ari nayo nzira banyuze basubirayo.
Ibi bikaba bibaye nta n’ibyumweru bibiri bishize mu karere kamwe habaye igitero nk’iki.
Uretse ibyo, hari ibindi bitero byagiye bigabwa muri Nyaruguru mu murenge wa Nyabimata, byishe abaturage ndetse bitwika imodoka, binasahura abaturage.
Ni ibitero birimo ibyagabwe n’umutwe witwara gisirikare wa FLN, wari ufite Nsabimana Callixte “Sankara" nk’umuvugizi.
Ibyo byose byuzuza amakuru ahamya ko mu Burundi hari ibikorwa bikomeye by’imitwe ya FDLR, FLN na RNC, aho nko mu bantu 33 bari kuburana imbere y’Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gusirikare ku byaha birimo kurema imitwe y’ingabo itemewe no kugirana umubano na leta y’amahanga bigiriwe gushoza intambara, hafi ya bose binjiye mu mitwe yitwaje intwaro banyuze mu Burundi, kandi bahabwa ubufasha n’abarimo abayobozi bakuru ba girisikare, barimo Colonel Ignace Sibomana, Chief J2 (ushinzwe ubutasi mu ngabo) mu Burundi.
Mu buhamya bwakomeje gutangwa n’abafatiwe muri iyo mitwe, ni uko Uganda yakomeje kuba nk’icyicaro cyinjirizwamo abashaka kujya muri iyo mitwe igamije gutera u Rwanda, mu gihe u Burundi bwabaye irembo ribageza mu mashyamba ya Congo, n’ahantu ho kunogereza imigambi cyangwa kwinyagamburira igihe mu mashyamba byanze, icyo bite "withdraw route" mu Cyongereza.
Mu mezi atatu abanza ya 2020, u Rwanda rwohereje mu mahanga icyayi kingana na toni 9.
3 zifite agaciro k’amafaranga asaga miliyari 25 Frw, yiyongereye ku kigero cya 27% ugereranyije n’ayinjiye mu gihe nk’iki mu mwaka wari wabanje, naho ingano y’ibyoherejwe yo yiyongera kuri 15%.
Mu mezi atatu abanza ya 2020, u Rwanda rwohereje mu mahanga icyayi kingana na toni 9.
3 zifite agaciro k’amafaranga asaga miliyari 25 Frw, yiyongereye ku kigero cya 27% ugereranyije n’ayinjiye mu gihe nk’iki mu mwaka wari wabanje, naho ingano y’ibyoherejwe yo yiyongera kuri 15%.
Imibare itangazwa n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe guteza Imbere Ibyoherezwa mu Mahanga bikomoka ku Buhinzi, NAEB, igaragaza ko hagati ya Mutarama na Werurwe 2020, icyayi cyoherejwe mu mahanga ari ibiro 9.
436 bifite agaciro k’amadolari 27.
861 ni ukuvuga asaga miliyari zisaga 25.
Imibare yo mu 2019 igaragaza ko mu mezi atanu ya mbere y’uyu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari watangiye muri Nyakanga 2019, inyungu yavuye mu buhinzi bw’icyayi yari yazamutseho 8% igera kuri miliyoni $ 36.
08, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyari 33.
Kuva muri Nyakanga kugeza mu Ugushyingo 2019, umusaruro w’icyayi cy’u Rwanda wazamutseho 12% naho icyoherejwe mu mahanga cyiyongereyeho 4%, ugereranyije n’igihe nk’icyo mu mwaka wa 2018.
Hagati ya Nyakanga na Ugushyingo 2019 habonetse umusaruro wa toni 12.
017 z’icyayi, ziruta toni 10.
769 zabonetse mu gihe nk’icyo mu mwaka wa 2018.
Icyo gihe byagaragazwaga kandi ko icyayi cy’u Rwanda cyatunganyijwe cyiyongereyeho 4%, kiva kuri toni 12.
180 zabonetse mu 2018 zigera kuri toni 12.
617 mu 2019.
Mu gihe nk’icyo kandi mu 2019, icyayi cyoherejwe mu mahanga cyinjije $36,088,761, bingana n’izamuka rya 8%, zivuye kuri $ 33,562,294 mu mwaka wabanje.
Imibare ya NAEB igaragaza ko intego ari uko mu mwaka wa 2024, icyayi cy’u Rwanda kizaba cyinjiriza igihugu miliyoni 209 z’amadolari.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, aherutse gutangaza ko kubera Coronavirus, muri iki gihe ibyoherezwa mu mahanga bishobora kuzagabanuka, ariko ko mu gihe iki cyorezo kizaba cyarangiye, ibintu bishobora kujya mu buryo.
Yavuze ko ku isoko muri iki gihe ibiciro by’ikawa bihagaze neza nubwo ubu atari igihe cy’umusaruro, gusa iby’icyayi byo biri kugenda bigabanuka ku isoko.
Mu kugabanya icyuho kiri hagati y’ibyoherezwa mu mahanga n’ibitumizwayo, u Rwanda rurateganya gukomeza guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, Abanyarwanda bagakangukira kubigura kugira ngo bisimbure ibyo hanze.
Minisitiri Dr Ndagijimana yavuze ko ubu igipimo cy’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda kigaragaza ko butazazamuka ku kigero cya 8% nk’uko byari byitezwe, aho ubu imibare yagiye ivugururwa ikava kuri 5.
1%, nyuma biramanuka bigera kuri 3.
5% “ubu turi hafi kuri 2% nubwo bitari byarangira neza".
Umuhanzi Kagame Charles ukorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo mu Itorero rya LifeHouse muri Australia yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise “Ntuzibagirwe".
Umuhanzi Kagame Charles ukorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo mu Itorero rya LifeHouse muri Australia yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise “Ntuzibagirwe".
Indirimbo nshya Kagame Charles yasohoye ni iya gatatu ye ashyize hanze mu mezi arindwi amaze yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana,.
“Ntuzibagirwe" igizwe n’iminota itanu n’amasegonda ane, yatunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Producer Boris.
Ubutumwa buyirimo buvuga ku muntu wasubijwe ariko agasabwa ko nagera muri ayo masezerano atagomba kwibagirwa Imana yabikoze.
Kagame Charles yavuze ko yinjiye mu muziki ngo akorere Imana yivuye inyuma kandi n’umutima ukunze.
Yagize ati “Nahisemo gukora umuziki uhimbaza Imana kuko ari umuhigo nahigiye Imana nkiri muto ko nzayiririmbira, ngasakaza ubutumwa bwo kugira neza kwayo.
Ni ibintu nkora nta nyungu runaka mbishakamo ahubwo bigamije kugarurira abantu benshi kuri Kirisitu.
Kagame Charles ni umuramyi winjiye mu muziki yiyongera ku bandi basanzwe bawukorera hanze y’u Rwanda.
Uyu muhanzi ufatira icyitegererezo ku muramyi Israel Mbonyi, mu mishinga ye ya bugufi arateganya gutunganya amashusho y’indirimbo ze kugira ngo zikomeze kugera kuri benshi.
Kuva atangiye kuririmba, Kagame Charles amaze gusohora indirimbo eshatu zirimo “Ahindura ibihe" yatangiriyeho, “Tubagarure" na “Ntuzibagirwe" ari nayo nshya.
Tariki 20 Mata 1994 nibwo inkuru mbi yakwirakwiye ko umwamikazi wa nyuma w’u Rwanda, Rosalie Gicanda yishwe n’ingabo za Leta yakoraga Jenoside, azizwa ko ari umututsi.
Tariki 20 Mata 1994 nibwo inkuru mbi yakwirakwiye ko umwamikazi wa nyuma w’u Rwanda, Rosalie Gicanda yishwe n’ingabo za Leta yakoraga Jenoside, azizwa ko ari umututsi.
Gicanda yashakanye n’Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa Charles Léon Pierre Kuwa 13 Mutarama 1942.
Yabayeho nabi asuzugurwa nyuma y’urupfu rw’umwami Rudahigwa, ubwo yatangiraga i Bujumbura ku buryo bw’amayobera tariki 25 Nyakanga 1959.
Nyuma yo gutanga kw’umugabo we byajyanye n’ihurura ry’abarwaniraga Repubulika, ariko barushaho gutesha agaciro ingoma ya Cyami n’ibimenyetso byayo.
Mu 1961 Perezida Kayibanda Grégoire yirukanye mu rukari Umwamikazi Gicanda.
Yaje gutura mu Mujyi wa Butare mu Karere ka Huye, ari naho abahoze ari abasirikare ba Habyarimana hamwe n’Interahamwe bamusanze bakamwica kuwa 20 Mata 1994.
Urupfu rw’Umwamikazi Rosali Gicanda
Muri Repubulika ya mbere n’iya kabiri, umwamikazi Gicanda nubwo yari mu gihugu, yabayeho nta gaciro afite nk’uwahoze mu buyobozi bukuru bw’igihugu.
Gicanda wari umuyoboke ukomeye wa Kiliziya Gatolika, yabayeho mu buzima bworoheje mu mujyi wa Huye, abana n’umubyeyi we ndetse n’abandi bagore bake bamufashaga mu mirimo itandukanye.
Ubwo Jenoside yatangiraga, Umwamikazi Gicanda yagiye yishingikiriza Jean Baptiste Habyarimana wari Perefe wa Butare, warwanyije cyane umugambi wo gutsemba Abatutsi.
Tariki 17 Mata, Perefe Habyarimana yatawe muri yombi, nyuma aza kwicwa.
Umwamikazi Rosalia Gicanda yatangiye guterwa ubwoba ko nawe agiye kwicwa n’umuryango we.
Raporo ya Human Rights Watch yasohotse mu 1999, ivuga ko Umwamikazi Gicanda wari ufite imyaka 66 yasabye Joseph Kanyabashi wari Burugumesitiri wa Komini ya Ngoma i Butare kumurinda, undi akabyanga.
Tariki 20 Mata ahagana saa tanu z’amanywa , abasirikare bayobowe na Lt Pierre Bizimana binjiye mu rugo rw’umwamikazi Gicanda ku mabwiriza yari yatanzwe na Capt Ildephonse Nizeyimana wari umuyobozi ushinzwe ubutasi n’ibikorwa mu ishuri rikuru rya gisirikare, ESO ubwo Jenoside yakorwaga.
Abo basirikare bamaze kwinjira mu rugo rw’umwamikazi, baramufashe we n’abandi bagore batandatu babanaga barabatwara.
Muri urwo rugo hasigaye mama wa Gicanda wari ufite imyaka 80 n’undi mukobwa wo kumwitaho.
Abasirikare bafashe Gicanda n’abo bari bafatanywe bajyana inyuma y’ingoro y’inzu ndangamurage y’u Rwanda barabarasa, barapfa.
Ku gicamunsi abasirikare bagarutse mu rugo rwa Gicanda gusahura, hashize iminsi ibiri baragaruka bica umubyeyi we.
Raporo ya Huma Rihgts Watch ivuga ko hari umupadiri wasabye ko umubiri wa Gicanda washyingurwa mu cyubahiro, burugumesitiri Kanyabashi yohereza abagororwa bo kuwujyana bawushyingura hafi y’urugo rwe.
Umwe mu baganiriye n’umukobwa wabashije kurokoka witaga ku mubyeyi wa Gicanda, ngo yamubwiye ko mbere y’uko Gicanda n’abo bari kumwe bicwa babanje kuvuga isengesho bishyira mu maboko y’Imana.
Muri 2012, urukiko rwashyiriweho u Rwanda rwakatiye Capt Ildephonse Nizeyimana igifungo cya burundu ashinjwa kwica Umwamikazi Gicanda n’abandi batutsi muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nizeyimana yari yafatiwe muri Uganda mu 2009.
Mu 1998 Lt Pierre Bizimana yakatiwe urwo gupfa n’urukiko rwa gisirikare i Kigali ariko icyo gihano kiza guhindurwamo igifungo cya burundu nyuma y’uko u Rwanda rukuyeho igihano cy’urupfu.
Umwamikazi wicishaga bugufi, akagira impuhwe
Ababanye n’abazi neza Umwamikazi Gicanda, bavuga ko yari umubyeyi wicisha bugufi kandi agakunda abantu bose atarobanuye.
Mu buhamya Perezida Paul Kagame yatanze mu 2017 avuga ku mateka y’ubuto bwe kuva afite imyaka ine y’amavuko ubwo yatangiraga ubuzima bw’ubuhunzi, yashimiye na Gicanda nk’umwe mu bamufashije akabasha kurokoka.
Ubwo buhamya bugaragara mu nimero 2944 ya Jeune Afrique yasohotse ku wa 11 Kamena 2017, yiswe amabanga y’ubuto [Secrets de Jeunesse] bw’abakuru b’ibihugu barimo Perezida Kagame, Ali Bongo Ondimba, Umwami Mohammed VI wa Maroc na Alpha Condé.
Perezida Kagame yasobanuye ko mu 1961 mbere gato y’uko u Rwanda rubona ubwigenge, ubwo yari afite imyaka ine, Abahutu bari batuye ku musozi wa Tambwe bashyigikiwe n’ubuyobozi, bigabije aho umuryango we wari utuye batwika inzu zaho ndetse bagirira nabi Abatutsi.
Icyo gihe umubyeyi we yatangiye kumutegura ngo bahunge.
Hahise haza imodoka, umushoferi wayo ashyikiriza umubyeyi wa Perezida Kagame ibaruwa ivuga ko atumwe n’Umwamikazi Gicanda wari utuye i Nyanza mu rugendo rw’iminota nka 45 uvuye aho bo bari batuye.
Rosalie Gicanda yari amusabye kubahungisha muri ibyo bihe by’amakuba.
Perezida Kagame n’abantu bari baturanye binjiye muri iyo modoka mu gihe igihiriri cy’ababahigaga cyaturukaga ku wundi musozi, gihita cyirara mu byo bari batunze.
Icyo gihe ngo basanze Umwamikazi i Nyanza, mbere y’uko bafata inzira bakerekeza mu Mutara aho naho ubwicanyi bwabasanze bakabuhungira muri Uganda.
Gicanda yavukiye i Rwamagana mu 1928.

Reporo y’Ikigo cyitwa Boston Consulting Group (BCG), ku butunzi bw’abatuye Isi, yerekanye ko umubare w’abatunze miliyoni imwe y’amadolari kuzamura wiyongereye, aho wikubye gatatu mu myaka 20 ishize.
Iyi raporo yasohotse kuri uyu wa Kane, yerekanye ko mu mpera za 2019, abarenga miliyoni 24 ku Isi yose, buri umwe afite ubutunzi bubarirwa nibura muri miliyoni imwe y’amadolari cyangwa kurenzaho ugereranyije na miliyoni 8.

Mu myaka 20 ishize kandi, ubutunzi bw’abantu ku giti cyabo ku Isi yose bwikubye hafi gatatu buva kuri miliyari ibihumbi $80 mu 1999 bugera kuri miliyari ibihumbi $226, mu mpera za 2019.

Kuva umurwayi wa mbere agaragayeho Coronavirus mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, abantu 297 bamaze kuyisanganwa, muri bo abagera kuri 203 basezerewe mu bitaro nyuma yo gupimwa, ibizamini bikerekana ko nta bwandu bagifite mu mibiri yabo.
Kuri ubu mu bitaro byita ku banduye Coronavirus harimo abarwayi 94.
Ni umubare muto ugereranyije n’abasezerewe [203] kuva aba mbere bavuye mu Kigo Nderabuzima cya Kanyinya ku wa 5 Mata 2020.
Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Mujyi wa Wuhan mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019; kuri ubu 4 856 183 bamaze kuyandura ku Isi yose, barimo 318 375 yahitanye na 1 888 116 bamaze kuyikira.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro.
Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune cyangwa gukoresha alukoro yabugenewe, kwambara udupfukamunwa n’amazuru ahantu hose.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena 2020, yahaye icyizere insengero cyo kongera gufungura mu minsi 15 iri imbere, nyuma y’amezi atatu zidasengerwamo kubera ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena 2020, yahaye icyizere insengero cyo kongera gufungura mu minsi 15 iri imbere, nyuma y’amezi atatu zidasengerwamo kubera ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umwanzuro w’inama y’abaminisitiri uvuga ko “Insengero zizakomeza gufunga, abanyamadini barashishikarizwa gukomeza gushyiraho ingamba zo gukumira no kwirinda Covid-19, mu rwego rwo kwitegura kuba insengero zafungurwa mu minsi 15 iri imbere hashingiwe ku bizava mu isesengura ry’ubuzima".
Ni umwanzuro ufashwe nyuma y’uko mu cyumweru gishize Ihuriro ry’Amadini n’Amatorero mu Rwanda, RIC, ryandikiye Urwego rw’Imiyoborere (RGB), ryerekana zimwe mu ngamba ryiteguye kubahiriza hirindwa icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu gihe leta yaba ibakomoreye bagakomeza ibikorwa byo gusenga.
Tariki 28 Gicurasi uyu mwaka, iri huriro ryandikiye Minisitiri w’Intebe risaba ko amateraniro yo gusenga n’ibindi bikorwa by’imiryango ishingiye ku myemerere byakoroherezwa kugira ngo nabyo bitangire gukora.
Tariki 5 Kamena uyu mwaka, habaye inama yahuje abahagariye guverinoma n’ubuyobozi bwa RIC, yari iyobowe na Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof Shyaka Anastase.
Iyo nama yari igamije kungurana ibitekerezo ku byifuzo bya RIC bijyanye n’ibikorwa byo gusenga muri iki gihe cya Coronavirus.
RIC yasabwe gutegura no kwerekana ingamba zigaragaza uko biteguye kwirinda Coronavirus mu nsengero, kiliziya n’imisigiti, kugira ngo zisuzumwe n’inzego za leta.
Ingamba abanyamadini bagaragaje mu kwirinda Coronavirus
Ubuyobozi bwa RIC bwandikiye RGB buyimenyesha ingamba bwatekereje zirimo gusukura inyubako zisengerwamo nka Kiliziya, urusengero cyangwa umusigiti mbere na nyuma yo guteraniramo, hakoreshejwe isabune n’amazi meza.
Hari kandi gushyiraho uburyo bwo gukaraba intoki, kandagira ukarabe cyangwa hand sanitizer, kugura utumashini dupima umuriro kandi abantu bagapimwa mbere yo kwinjira mu nyubako basengeramo, kwicaza mu rusengero basiga nibura metero imwe hagati y’umuntu n’undi, no kwambara udupfukamunwa mu bihe by’amateraniro.
Hari kandi gushyiraho abashinzwe gusukura ubwiherero n’abashinzwe gufasha abantu kubukoresha muri gahunda yo kubahiriza umuco wo gukaraba mbere na nyuma yo kubujyamo no kumenyesha imiryango igize RIC amabwiriza ajyanye na COVD-19 agomba gukurikizwa n’imiryango ishingiye ku myemerere.
Hari kandi ko iteraniro rimwe ritagomba kurenza amasaha abiri, ahasengerwa hakaba ari ahari hasanzwe habera amateraniro kandi hujuje ibisabwa.
Harimo no guteganya nibura isaha hagati y’amateraniro abera mu cyumba kimwe kugira ngo haboneke umwanya wo gusukura.
Inyandiko ikomeza igira iti “Muri ibi bihe haba hasukuwe amateraniro amwe gusa, (ayo ku cyumweru ku aba-porotesitanti, abagatolika, abarokore).
Ku wa Gatandatu ku Badivantisite b’umunsi wa karindwi, no ku wa Gatanu ku Bayisilamu.
Andi materaniro yazatekerezwaho nyuma hashingiwe ku buryo abayoboke bagenda bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda coronavirus n’uko icyorezo kizagenda gishira mu gihugu.
RIC ivuga ko usoma misa n’undi wese uyoboye gahunda, yakwemererwa kutambara agapfukamunwa mu gihe ahagaze imbere kandi hakubahirizwa nibura intera ya metero ebyiri.
Hari kandi ko buri rusengero rugabanya umubare w’abantu bayobora indirimbo hubahirizwa intera ninini nibura metero ebyiri mu gihe baririmba, gusuhuzanya abantu bahana amaboko no guhobera bikaba bibujijwe, gusangira cyangwa gukoresha mikoro rusange na byo ntibibe byemewe.
"Guhazwa byakorwa hakoreshejwe kwakira mu biganza, uhaza n’uhazwa bambaye udupfukamunwa kandi hagati yabo hari intera ya metero imwe.
Hari no gukomeza kwita ku ntera ya metero imwe abantu bajya gufata ukarisitiya".
Mu byo amadini yagaragaje, harimo ko “amateraniro ya nijoro, ibiterane binini by’ivugabutumwa ntibyemewe, gusengera mu byumba by’amasengesho rusange ntibyemewe, amateraniro y’abana ntiyemewe, amateraniro yo mu matorero-remezo ntiyemewe n’ibikorwa byo gusengera abantu barambikwaho ibiganza.
RIC Kandi yabwiye RGB ko byaba bibujijwe guhanahana ibikoresho, urugero gufata ibitabo by’indirimbo, Korowani na Bibiliya.
Mu rwego rwo kwirinda guhanahana icyibo cyangwa igiseke cy’amaturo, RIC ivuga ko hagomba gushishikarizwa abayoboke guturira kuri Mobile Money, Money Transfer, Bank Transfer no gushyiraho ibiseke bitazengeruka mu bantu.
Bavuga ko mu gihe cyo gushyingura umurikistu witabye Imana, byakorwa hubahirizwa amabwiriza rusange ya leta, isakaramentu ryo gushyingirwa mu rusengero ntirigomba kurenza abantu 50.
Kuri iyi ngingo ariko inama y’abaminisitiri yemeje ko ‘Imihango yo gushyingirwa mu nsengero iremewe ariko ikitabirwa n’abantu batarenze 30.
Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu izatanga amabwiriza arambuye kuri iyi ngingo’.
RIC yagaragaje ko abashyingirwa n’ababaherekeje bagomba ngo gukurikiza amabwiriza yose, bashishikarizwa kandi ntibakore ibirori nyuma yo gushyingirwa.
Batisimu ku bizera ba Gatolika yajya ikorwa uyihabwa n’uyitanga bambaye udupfukamunwa kandi igakorwa muri misa y’abantu bake hanubahirizwa intera ikwiye.
Mu gihe ibi bikorwa kandi byasubukurwa, abanyamadini bemeye ko umubatizo ku baporotestanti, abarokore n’abadivantisite b’umunsi wa karindwi kuko bo bashyirwa mu mazi menshi muri rusange, waba uhagaritswe.
RIC ivuga ko Abayisilamu basabwa buri muntu kujya gusari yitwaje umukeka we muto wo gusengeraho, kugenda yitwaje ibikoresho byo gutawaza, gukoresha korowani yo muri telefoni no kudakora muri korowani cyangwa ibindi bitabo biri mu musigiti.
Ibinezaneza ku bayoboke b’amadini
Abayoboke b’amadini bari bamaze amezi atatu batagera mu nsengero, bavuga ko bizeye ko isesengura ry’inzego z’ubuzima nta kabuza rizabemerera gusubira mu nzu z’Imana kuko ingamba abanyamadini bafashe zisobanutse.
Kayitare Jean Claude wo muri Paruwasi Gatolika ya Rutonde muri Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, yavuze ko nubwo misa zakomeje binyuze kuri radiyo na televiziyo, yishimiye kuba insengero zigiye kongera gufungura.
Ati “Hari abantu usanga gusengera mu rugo bibagora kubera ibibarangaza.
Kuba insengero zishobora kongera gufungurwa turabyishimiye cyane kandi turabishimira Imana".
Bazambanza Enock wo mu itorero ry’Abadivantisiti b’Umunsi wa karindwi, avuga ko mu materaniro hari inyigisho nyinshi bigira hamwe ariko kuba yari wenyine bitamushobokeraga.
Ati “Dufatanya kwiga ijambo ry’Imana, tugasengera hamwe nk’umuryango wayo.
Ni ibinezaneza byinshi kuba Imana ikoze ibitangaza tukaba tugiye gusubira mu nzu yayo".
Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe ya Burnley yo mu cyiciro cya mbere mu Bwongereza, bwamaganye bikomeye icyapa cyanditseho amagambo “White Lives Matter Burnley" cyanyujijwe hejuru ya Stade ya Etihad n’indege ntoya ubwo iyi kipe yatsindwaga na Manchester City ibitego 5-0 ku wa Mbere.
Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe ya Burnley yo mu cyiciro cya mbere mu Bwongereza, bwamaganye bikomeye icyapa cyanditseho amagambo “White Lives Matter Burnley" cyanyujijwe hejuru ya Stade ya Etihad n’indege ntoya ubwo iyi kipe yatsindwaga na Manchester City ibitego 5-0 ku wa Mbere.
Kuva Premier League isubukuwe mu cyumweru gishize, abakinnyi bose bo mu makipe 20 y’icyiciro cya mbere, amazina yabo yasimbujwe ubutumwa “Black Lives Matter" ku mugongo w’imyambaro yabo mu rwego rwo kurwanya irondaruhu rikorerwa abirabura.
Mu mukino wabaye mu ijoro ryo ku wa Mbere ku kibuga Etihad cya Manchester City, hagaragaye indege ntoya yari ifite icyapa cyanditseho amagambo “White Lives Matter Burnley" .
Ibi bikaba byafashwe nko kurwanya gahunda imaze kwamamara ku Isi yose yo kurwanya irondaruhu rikorerwa abirabura.
Burnley yatanze itangazo yitandukanya n’abatambukije ubwo butumwa ndetse ivuga ko bazabiryozwa.
Ati “Turifuza kubasobanurira neza ko ababikoze nta mwanya bafite kuri Turf Moor (ikibuga cya Burnley).
“Ibi, ntaho bihuriye n’aho Burnley FC ihagaze kandi tuzakorana bisesuye n’ubuyobozi kugira ngo hamenyekane ababikoze bahagarikwe burundu.
“Turi inyuma ya gahunda ya Premier League ya ‘Black Lives Matter’ nk’uko byakozwe no mu yindi mikino kuva uyu mushinga ‘Project Restart’ wo gusubukura imikino utangiye, abakinnyi bacu n’abayobozi bapfukamye mbere y’umukino wa Manchester City.
“Twiseguye kuri Premier League, kuri Manchester City n’abitanga kugira ngo bateze imbere ‘Black Lives Matter.
Uyu mukino wabaye ku wa Mbere warangiye Manchester City itsinze Burnley ibitego 5-0 ikomeza kugira icyizere ko gutwara igikombe cya Premier League bishoboka nubwo Liverpool ikeneye amanota atanu mu mikino umunani gusa isigaye.
Kapiteni wa Burnley, Ben Mee, yavuze ko atewe isoni n’ibyabaye ariko we n’ikipe ye ntaho bahuriye n’ababikoze.
Ati “Ntewe isoni n’uko umubare muto w’abafana bacu bahisemo kwerekana ariya mugambo ku kibuga.
Aba bantu bakeneye kuza mu kinyejana cya 21, bakiyigisha.
Ubwo twiteguraga gusohoka twumvise bivugwa ko bigiye kuba.
“Ikipe yagerageje kubihagarika.
Nari numvise ko ari umubare muto w’abantu babiteguye kandi ndizera ko bitazaba ukundi.
Ntabwo navuga ko hari aho bihuriye n’ikipe yanjye.
Ntabwo nshaka kubibona muri uyu mukino.
Shanjay Bhandari uyobora umuryango Kick It Out urwanya irondaruhu mu Bwongereza, yavuze ko “Intego ya Black Lives Matter atari ukugabanya agaciro k’ubuzima bw’abandi bantu ahubwo ari ukugaragaza ko hari ibyo abirabura babuzwa nk’ikiremwamuntu bitewe n’ibara ry’uruhu rwabo.
Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana ni umugabo w’imyaka 64, akaba inararibonye muri Politiki y’u Rwanda dore ko ayizi neza kuva mu myaka ya 1973 ubwo yari asoje ayisumbuye, kugeza mu 1989 aruvamo no mu 1994 arugarukamo ari kumwe na FPR Inkotanyi yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana ni umugabo w’imyaka 64, akaba inararibonye muri Politiki y’u Rwanda dore ko ayizi neza kuva mu myaka ya 1973 ubwo yari asoje ayisumbuye, kugeza mu 1989 aruvamo no mu 1994 arugarukamo ari kumwe na FPR Inkotanyi yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ni inzobere mu buvanganzo bw’ururimi rw’Icyarabu dore ko abifitemo impamyabumenyi y’icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza yakuye muri Arabie Saoudite.
Ubwo yari asoje amasomo muri Arabie Saoudite, yagarutse mu Rwanda mu 1983, agirwa Imam wa Kigali ndetse n’Umuyobozi w’ishuri Institut Islamique Al Hidaayat, ikigo gitanga ubumenyi butegura abazaba abavugabutumwa b’idini ya Islam.
Mu 1989 yagiye muri Uganda nk’umwarimu muri Islamic University ari naho yinjiriye mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi akibereye umunyamuryango magingo aya.
Nyuma y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana yabaye Perefe wa Cyangugu, aba Minisitiri w’abakozi ba Leta, aba Minisitiri w’umutekano n’umujyanama wa Perezida, umudepite uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EALA) n’ibindi.
Yagiranye ikiganiro kirambuye na IGIHE, asobanura byinshi mu bibazo u Rwanda rwagiye runyuramo nyuma ya Jenoside, avuga ku bunararibonye bwe muri politiki nk’uburyo yiyamamaje ahanganye na Perezida Kagame ku buyobozi bw’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, uko yeguye muri EALA, ahazaza ha EAC n’ibindi.
‘Local Defense Forces bibonye ukundi’
Abakuru barabyibuka; Abagabo b’imyenda y’umutuku werurutse, mu bice by’icyaro hari ababitaga uruyumba kubera imyenda n’ingofero bambaraga zasaga n’ibishyimbo byitwa gutyo.
Abo ni bamwe mu bari bagize urwego rushinzwe umutekano mu baturage ‘Local Defense Forces, LDF) rwagiyeho gato nyuma ya Jenoside, rugaseswa rukongera gusubizwaho mu myaka ya 1997/1998.
Urwo rwego rusubiraho Sheikh Harerimana yari Minisitiri w’Umutekano mu gihugu.
Rwari rugamije gufasha abaturage kwicungira umutekano, rugahabwa imyitozo y’amezi agera kuri atatu, rukoherezwa iwabo mu giturage gucunga umutekano.
Mu mabwiriza, itsinda ry’abagize LDF hari ubwo ryahabwaga imbunda zo gucunga umutekano ku mugoroba, bwacya zigasubizwa kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ibegereye.
Sheikh Harerimana yavuze ko urwo rwego rwabatengushye, kuko intego zarwo zahindanyijwe n’imyitwarire mibi ya bamwe, bagiraga uruhare mu guhungabanya umutekano w’abo bashinzwe kurinda.
Mu myaka ya 2000 hari nk’aho abo basore bashinjwa kuba barishe barashe abagore batatu b’abacuruzi muri Byumba, muri iyo Perefegitura ahitwa Kivuye nanone mu kabari harasirwa abantu batanu bikozwe n’abagize Local Defense Forces n’ibindi.
Harerimana yagize ati “Abaturage nibo bicaraga bakavuga bati uriya mwana n’uriya nibo dushaka ko bajya muri Local Defense y’aha iwacu.
Tuza kugira ibyago imyumvire ntiyaba myiza , abo basore n’abahungu bagombaga no gutanga raporo kuri Polisi ibegereye, hari ubwo bahabwaga n’intwaro nimugoroba zo kurinda agace batuyemo mu gitondo zigasubira kuri polisi, hari aho bitwaye nabi, bakumva ko babaye igitangaza.
Abagize Local Defense bamwe bishoboye mu byaha nk’ubujura, gufata abagore n’abakobwa ku ngufu n’ibindi.
Bamwe mu bafatwaga barirukanwaga cyangwa bagahanwa ariko isura yabo iza gukomeza guhindana ku buryo bari basigaye bafatwa ukundi n’abaturage bashinzwe kurinda.
Sheikh Harerimana ati “ Uzi ko umuturage yanamubwiraga ngo kuki witwara uko, ati se ni wowe wampaye uyu mwenda?
Bibonye ukundi kutari ko, bitari muri gahunda za Leta.
Nicyo gituma akenshi bagendaga bakurwamo, bagahindurwa, bigeze basanga ahari muri sisiteme ibashyiraho hashobora kuba harimo ibibazo, haza gufatwa icyemezo ko basimbuzwa.
Mu byo akeka ko byateraga abo basore kwitwara nabi, Sheikh Harerimana avugamo kuba batarahembwaga kuko bakoraga nk’abakorerabushake.
Local Defense Forces yasimbuwe na DASSO mu 2013, hajyamo abasore n’inkumi bize kandi batojwe neza ndetse banagenerwa umushara ku kwezi.
Nubwo DASSO nayo atari shyashya mu baturage, Sheikh Harerimana abona ko akazi kabo gakorwa neza n’ukoze amakosa akayakora ku giti cye kandi akabibazwa.
Yahatanye na Perezida Kagame ku kuyobora FPR Inkotanyi
Mu 2013, mu matora y’abayobozi b’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi , Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana yiyamamaje ahatanye na Perezida Paul Kagame ku buyobozi bukuru bw’uwo muryango.
Mu majwi yabaruwe, Sheikh yagize amajwi 0.
5 %, atsindwa na Perezida Kagame wagize amajwi 99.
Hari abavuze ko yiyamamaje yikinira kugira ngo Perezida Kagame atiyamamaza wenyine, ariko Sheikh arabihakana.
Uyu musaza uganira kandi agashyenga yagize ati “Ko nabishakaga da! Ntabwo kwari ukwerekana ko hari demokarasi gusa , oya narabishakaga.
Nashakaga kuyobora umuryango ariko ngira amahirwe make ndatsindwa kandi ntsindwa nabi cyane.
Yongeyeho ati “Burya iyo utsinzwe ukanabyemera ntako bisa, n’aho narabyemeye.
Bamaze gutangaza amajwi, umanza narabonye nk’arindwi cyangwa umunani ku bihumbi, kandi naje no kumenya nyuma ko n’ijwi rye yari yarimpaye.
Mu 2015, Sheikh Harerimana yeguye ku mwanya wo guhagararira u Rwanda mu Nteko ya EALA, ku mpamvu yise ize bwite.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko nta kindi cyari cyibyihishe inyuma uretse kuba inshingano yari yarahawe n’umuryango FPR Inkotanyi zari zirangiye.
Ati “Njye ndi umunyamuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi uyemera, aho ndi hose mba ndi mu butumwa bwa FPR Inkotanyi.
Aho mba nagiye nk’aho muri EALA nari ndi intumwa ya FPR Inkotanyi.
Ubutumwa rero nari ndimo bwari burangiye ndagaruka, ubu ndi mu bundi butumwa na none kandi ndi kubukora neza n’ibyishimo byinshi.
Nk’umuntu wabaye igihe kinini mu nteko ya EALA y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, yabajijwe no ku hazaza h’uyu muryango wugarijwe n’ibibazo kuri ubu byo kurebana ay’ingwe hagati y’ibihugu bimwe biwugize, no kugenda gahoro kw’imishinga ihuriweho igamije kuwuteza imbere.
Sheikh Harerimana asanga ahanini ikidindiza uyu muryango ari ubwigenge bwa buri gihugu ku myanzuro imwe n’imwe ifite inyungu rusange, ku buryo hagomba kubaho ubwumvikane busesuye buri gihugu kikabanza kubyumva aho gutora ngo byose bigendere ku byo benshi bemeje.
Nubwo harimo ibyo bibazo n’iby’amikoro adahagije, Sheikh Harerimana yizera ko ibihugu bigize EAC bizagera ku ntego byihaye.
Ati “Aho twari tugeze hari hakwiriye kongeramo imbaraga kugira ngo ibintu byihute tuzagere kuri ya ntego imwe yo kugira igihugu kimwe […] Icyakora EAC nkurikije uko yatangiye, aho igeze n’ubushake buhari iracyariho kandi izahoraho na ziriya ntego izazigeraho.
Uyu mugabo w’abana batanu yagiriye inama urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda, gukomereza ku byiza igihugu cyagezeho birinda kwirara.
Ati “Ntabwo byaturutse mu iraha ryinshi cyane, ntabwo byaturutse mu mudendezo, wasasiwe amaraso y’abanyarwanda, hari abawitangiye.
Ntitubifate nk’ibintu byoroshye.
Kuri ubu Sheikh Harerimana ni umwe mu bagize Urwego Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye, akaba na Komiseri mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi.
Inkuru bifitanye isano: Abacengezi, ubujura mu basirikare.
Ikiganiro na Sheikh Harerimana ku mutekano nyuma ya Jenoside
Umunyakenyakazi Julian Peter yasangije abandi ubuzima bugoranye yanyuzemo nyuma yo kuvuka agasanga atagira imyanya myibarukiro, agira n’icyo asaba ababyeyi b’abana bafite ikibazo nk’icye.
Umunyakenyakazi Julian Peter yasangije abandi ubuzima bugoranye yanyuzemo nyuma yo kuvuka agasanga atagira imyanya myibarukiro, agira n’icyo asaba ababyeyi b’abana bafite ikibazo nk’icye.
Julian Peter yavutse mu 1991, avukira muri Kenya mu gace kari mu majyepfo ashyira uburasirazuba bwa Nairobi kazwi nka Ukambani.
Mu kuvuka kwe umurebye yari umwana nk’abandi bose, ndetse imyaka ntiyatinze atangira amashuri abanza ayihutamo agera mu yisumbuye.
Ubwo yari afite imyaka 17 yiga mu mashuli yisumbuye yaje kugira ikibazo cy’ukuguru ajya kwa muganga kwivuza.
Nyuma yo kugera kwa muganga, ikibazo cya mbere muganga yamubajije ni igihe cya nyuma aheruka kugira mu mihango, Julian amusubiza ko atarayijyamo na rimwe.
Kubona umukobwa w’imyaka 17 utarajya mu mihango na rimwe ni ikintu kidasazwe.
Ibi byatumye muganga afata icyemezo cyo kumunyuza mu cyuma ngo arebe ikibazo afite, amafoto y’iki cyuma yaje yerekana ko imyanya myibarukiro ya Julian ifunze uhereye inyuma.
Nyuma yo kugerageza kumubaga bikanga yaje guca mu cyuma bwa kabiri abaganga basanga nta na nyababyeyi agira ari nabwo bavumbuye ko afite ikibazo cya Mayer-Rokitansky-Küster-Hauser syndrome (MRKH).
MRKH syndrome ni ikibazo umwana w’umukobwa agira akaba yavuka adafite bimwe mu bice bigize imyanya myibarukiro ye birimo nyababyeyi, udusabo tw’intanga ngore, ndetse n’umwanya uhuza nyababyeyi n’igice cy’inyuma uzwi nka Cervix ukaba ufunze.
Ibi bishobora kujyana n’ibindi bibazo birimo kugira impyiko zikoze nabi cyangwa umuntu akaba yagira n’imwe.
Akimara kumva iyi nkuru y’uko afite MRKH byari amarira menshi kuri we “nararize umunsi wa mbere, uwa kabiri n’uwa gatatu, nari mfite imyaka 17 kandi ndi gato"
Julian avuga ko yatangiye kwiyakira ubwo yari afite imyaka 24 kuko ari nabwo yatangiye gufunguka akavuga ikibazo afite.
Julian aganira na BBC yavuze ko yagowe no gukura yumva abantu bamubwira ko iki kibazo cye gifite aho gihuriye n’amarozi akunze kurangwa mu gace akomokamo ka Ukambani ndetse bamwe bakongeraho ko nyirakuru abifitemo uruhare.
N’ubwo yabwirwaga aya magambo yose Julian, avuga ko yageragezaga kuyirengagiza “bavuga ibyo bashaka kuvuga, igifite agaciro ni uko mbifata, iyo nza kubyumva byari gutangira kungiraho ingaruka kandi nashoboraga gutangira kumva ko ibyo bavuga ari ukuri".
Nyuma y’imyaka 10 ubwo Julian yari afite imyaka 27 yaje kongera kubagwa kugira ngo muganga afungure umwanya uzajya umufasha gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina uzwi nka Cervix.
Agorwa no kurambana n’abakunzi be
Julian avuga ko agorwa no kugira umusore bakundana “nabaye mu rukundo, gusa sinjya ndeka ngo ibintu bigere kure mbere y’uko nicarana nabo ngo mbabwire ikibazo cyanjye".
Yakomeje agira ati “niba bashaka kubyakira bazabyakira, ariko urabizi uko abantu ari bantu, ijanisha rinini ry’abantu nagiye mbibwira barampuze abandi bakanshinja kubeshya kuko bumva ko nabivugaga mu rwego rwo kubihunza".
Julian avuga ko kuva yabagwa mu 2018 ubu ashobora kuba yakora imibonano mpuzabitsina ariko akaba yumva n’ubundi nta mpamvu yo kuyikora cyane ko atiteguye no gushinga urugo, kuko kuri we yumva azashaka umwana arera.
Julian agira inama ababyeyi bafite abana bahuje ikibazo na we kubaba hafi bakabereka ko atari ryo herezo ry’ubuzima kandi bakabatera n’ingabo mu bitugu kuko kwiyakira bitoroha mu gihe ufite MRKH.
Inkomo y’umusaraba ukunze gukoreshwa cyane mu madini yemera Yezu Kirisitu nk’umucunguzi ntikunze kuvugwaho rumwe n’abantu batandukanye ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko ari ikimenyetso cya Gipagani kurusha uko waba icya Gikirisitu.
Inkomo y’umusaraba ukunze gukoreshwa cyane mu madini yemera Yezu Kirisitu nk’umucunguzi ntikunze kuvugwaho rumwe n’abantu batandukanye ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko ari ikimenyetso cya Gipagani kurusha uko waba icya Gikirisitu.
Ku madini aha agaciro cyane umusaraba ndetse akawufata nk’ikimenyetso cy’ibanze kiranga imyemerere yabo, bashingira ku kuba ari wo Yezu/Yesu Kirisito yabambweho bityo ukaba ari ikimenyetso cy’ugucungurwa kwabo.
Ibimenyetso byinshi biri mu nzu ndangamurage y’Abongereza birimo ibigaragaza Imana kazi y’Abagiriki ba kera iri iruhande rw’Umusaraba byerekana ko umusaraba wabayeho ibinyejana byinshi mbere y’ivuka ry’amadini ya Gikirisitu ndetse bikemezwa ko ufite inkomoko mu Abanya-Babuloni ba kera mbere y’uko ukwira mu bindi bice by’Isi.
Umusaraba wa mbere y’Ubukirisitu wakoreshwaga nk’ikimenyetso mu madini gakondo y’Abanyamisiri, Abanya-Syria n’Abagiriki.
Uyu musaraba wa mbere wari mu bwoko bubiri uzwi nka ‘Tau Cross’ wabaga ukoze nk’inyuguti nkuru ya T’ yo mu Kigiriki ndetse n’undi witwaga ‘fylfot cross’.
Uyu musaraba wa Tau niwo wakoreshwaga cyane n’abapagani gusa nyuma uza gutangira gukoreshwa n’Abakirisitu bo mu Misiri.
Umusaraba waje kuba gute ikimenyetso gikomeye kiranga Abakirisitu ?
Mu kinyejana cya 4, Umwami w’Abami Constantine yemeye Ubukirisitu ndetse yemeza ko hakwiye gushakishwa ahantu hari n’ibintu bifite amateka y’ingenzi mu buzima bwa Yezu.
Muri iki gikorwa cyo kuvumbura ahantu hafite amateka ku buzima bwa Yezu nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru ko Nyina wa Costantine witwaga Helene yavumbuye ibice by’umusaraba, ndetse biza kwemezwa ko ari iby’umusaraba wa Yezu kuko habaye igitangaza cy’uko ubwo byavumburwaga hari umugore wabikozeho arakira.
Kuva icyo gihe kubambwa kwa Yezu no gupfira ku musaraba byatanze isura nshya ku musaraba kuko gusa watangiye kwifashishwa mu nsengero ndetse nyuma ya Costantine ugirwa ikimenyetso kiranga Ubukirisito.
N’ubwo kugeza uyu munsi amadini menshi afata umusara nk’ikimenyetso gikomeye kuko ari wo Yezu yabambweho, hari andi makuru avuga ko Icyo Yesu Kirisito yabambweho ari igiti gisanzwe cy’Inginga aho kuba umusaraba.
Izi mpaka z’icyo Yesu yaba yabambweho mu by’ukuri ntizigarukira mu nyigisho z’amadini gusa kuko na Bibiliya iyo zigeze ku murongo uvugamo umusaraba ziranyuranya.
Bibiliya ntagatifu ikunze gukoreshwa cyane muri Kiliziya Gatolika,ivuga ko igihe Yezu Yesu yicwaga, abamwitegerezaga baramunnyeze, maze bamushinyagurira bamusaba ko niba afite ubushake yakwikura kumusaraba.
Hari aho igira iti “Wowe usenya Ingoro y’Imana, ukongera kuyubaka mu minsi itatu, ikize ubwawe niba uri Umwana w’Imana, maze umanuke ku musaraba.
Abatware b’abaherezabitambo na bo bakamuseka, n’abigishamategeko, n’abakuru b’umuryango, bati ‘Yakijije abandi, none ntashoboye kwikiza ubwe!’Harya ngo ni Umwami wa Israheli, ngaho namanuke ku musaraba tumwemere!".
Ibi Bibiliya ntagatifu ivuga ibihuza na Bibiliya Yera ariko byagera kuri Bibiliya ikoreshwa n’Abahamya ba Yehova yo aho kuvuga ijambo umusaraba ivuga Igiti cy’Umubabaro.
Bagira bati “Wowe ngo wari gusenya urusengero ukarwubaka mu minsi itatu, ngaho ikize! Niba uri Umwana w’Imana, manuka kuri icyo giti cy’umubabaro!"
Abo muri mu madini atemera ibijyanye n’umusaraba bavuga ko Bibiliya Yera na Bibiliya Ntagatifu ubwo zashyirwaga mu Kinyarwanda, bashafe ijambo ry’Ikigiriki ‘Stauros’ risanzwe rivuga ingiga y’igiti akaba ariryo bahinduramo umusaraba.
Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika, CAF, yaciye amarenga ko ishobora gutangiza Irushanwa Nyafurika rihuza amakipe y’abagore yatwaye ibikombe bya shampiyona, nyuma y’igihe rikinwa mu bagabo gusa.
Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika, CAF, yaciye amarenga ko ishobora gutangiza Irushanwa Nyafurika rihuza amakipe y’abagore yatwaye ibikombe bya shampiyona, nyuma y’igihe rikinwa mu bagabo gusa.
Nta gushidikanya ko umupira w’amaguru mu cyiciro cy’abagore ukomeje gutera imbere muri Afurika, ndetse bibarwa ko ibihugu 35 kuri uyu mugabane bifite shampiyona z’abagore, ku buryo gutangiza irushanwa Nyafurika ry’amakipe yatwaye ibikombe bya shampiyona byaba byoroshye.
Inyandiko y’ibyigwa mu nama ya Komite Nyobozi ya CAF iteganyijwe ku wa 30 Kamena 2020, nk’uko yagiye ahagaragara, igaragaza ko mu bizaganirwaho harimo n’ingingo irebana no "gushyiraho Champions League mu bagore.
Kugeza ubu nta rushanwa Nyafurika rihuza amakipe y’abagore mu mupira w’amaguru (uretse ku rwego rw’ibihugu) ku buryo CAF imaze kubona ko yaba ari intambwe nziza mu guteza imbere uyu mukino.
Muri urwo rwego, mu mwaka ushize CAF yafashe icyemezo cyo kongera amakipe akina Igikombe cya Afurika cy’ibihugu mu bagore, ava ku makipe umunani aba 12.
Gusa igikombe cyo muri uyu mwaka gishobora kudakinwa kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo yagaragaje ubushake bwo kucyakira, ariko nta cyemezo cya nyuma cyafashwe kuri iryo rushanwa riba rimwe mu myaka ibiri.
Ni na kimwe mu bizaganirwaho muri iyo nama ya Komite Nyobozi ya CAF, icyemezo kikazatangazwa nyuma yayo.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha (RIB) rwemeje ko hari ibyaha bikekwa kuri Minisitiri w’Ibikorwa Remezo, Ambasaderi Claver Gatete, ku buryo arimo gukorwaho iperereza nubwo ibyo byaha bitatangajwe.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha (RIB) rwemeje ko hari ibyaha bikekwa kuri Minisitiri w’Ibikorwa Remezo, Ambasaderi Claver Gatete, ku buryo arimo gukorwaho iperereza nubwo ibyo byaha bitatangajwe.
Umuvugizi wa RIB, Dominique Bahorera yabwiye IGIHE ko amakuru y’ikurikiranwa rya Minisititi Gatete ari ukuri.
Akurikiranwe adafunzwe, ari mu mirimo ye isanzwe.
Yagize ati "Nibyo Minisitiri Gatete hari ibintu arimo gukurikiranwaho, ntabwo ari ibihuha ariko uyu munsi turacyari mu iperereza ry’ibanze ntabwo turagira amakuru ahagije yatuma hatangazwa muri rusange ibyo yaba akurikiranyweho.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE yemeza ko Minisitiri Gatete akekwaho ibyaha birimo guhombya leta bishingiye ku nzu iherereye ku Kacyiru yaguzwe na Leta ku giciro gihanitse bikayihombya amafaranga asaga miliyari ebyiri; ikibazo cy’isoko ryahawe ikigo cyo muri Kenya cyitwa ’Out of The Box’ mu buryo bwanyuranyije n’amabwiriza agenga itangwa ry’amasoko no gukoresha imari ya Leta muri gahunda ze bwite.
Amakuru IGIHE yumvise ni uko Gatete yanze kumvira inama z’Ikigo gishinzwe imyubakire (RHA) zo kudaha isoko ‘Out Of The Box’ kandi hari sosiyete zishoboye mu Rwanda kandi zidahenze, akabirengaho asaba Minisiteri y’imari n’igenamigambo kwishyura iyo sosiyete.
Gatete kandi avugwaho gukoresha imari ya Leta muri gahunda ze bwite, nk’aho yasabye ubuyobozi bw’umujyi wa Kigali gutunganya agahanda kagana iwe kagashyirwamo kaburimbo kandi bitari muri gahunda z’umujyi.
Mu isoko ryahombeje Leta miliyari ebyiri, hari abatawe muri yombi barimo Caleb Rwamuganza wahoze ari Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Imari n’Igenamigambi (Minecofin) Gatete yahoze yobora, na Christian Rwakunda wahoze ari Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ibikorwa Remezo (Mininfra), ari nayo Gatete yaje kwimurirwamo kugeza ubu.
Banagejejwe imbere y’urukiko rwemeza ko bakurikiranwa bafunzwe.
Mu iburana ku ifungwa n’ifungurwa, bavuze ko ibyo bakoze babaga babisabwe na Minisitiri Gatete.
Bavuze ko Minisitiri Gatete ari we wagiye ategeka abo bayobozi ko hatumizwa inama zihuse zo kuganira n’umushoramari wari ufite inzu kugira ngo bumvikane igiciro kandi bikorwe mu gihe gito.
Nka Eric Serubibi wahoze ayoboye Ikigo Gishinzwe Imyubakire na we ufunzwe, yabwiye urukiko ko Gatete yamubwiraga ko ari kugenda gake muri iyo dosiye.
Ngo yamubwiye ko nibatabikora vuba ingengo y’imari ishobora kutaboneka kandi iyo nzu yihutirwa ngo yimukiremo ikigo cya Leta.
Abaregwa babwiye urukiko ko batakabaye bafunzwe bonyine, mu gihe uwabategekaga ibyo bakora we ntacyo ubutabera bumubaza.
Serubibi n’umwuganira mu mategeko bagaragarije urukiko ubutumwa bwa WhatsApp Gatete yamwandikiye amushimira kuri raporo y’iyo dosiye yari amaze kumuha, agira ati "Urakoze ariko dukeneye ko buri kimwe cyose kiba cyarangiye mu gihe cyagenwe.
Serubibi n’abamwunganira bavuze ko ibyo byerekana ko ibyo yakoze byose yabaga yabitumwe n’abamukuriye kandi yabahaga raporo.
Mu nama ya Komite nyobozi yaguye y’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi yateranye ku wa Gatanu ushize ikayoborwa na Perezida Paul Kagame, ari na we muyobozi mukuru w’Umuryango, abakoresha nabi umutungo wa Leta bagarutsweho cyane ndetse barihangirizwa.
Yagize ati "Ntabwo waziza abantu amakosa asanzwe, abantu bakora amakosa ariko ibi bindi by’agahimano, byo kwangiza, ukangiza umutungo w’igihugu, ukangiza ibikwiriye kuba bifasha abaturage ukabigira ibyawe, byo birahagarara byanze bikunze.
Byanze bikunze, ubu byarangiye.
Inama yarangiye abakekwaho ibyaha basabwe kwitaba RIB umunsi ukurikiyeho abandi bagahita bafungwa ako kanya cyangwa se ku wa Mbere.
Iserukiramuco Mpuzamahanga “Africa in Colors" byari byitezwe ko ryari kubera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 rikaza gusubikwa kubera ibibazo bya COVID-19, ryasubukuriwe kuri Internet aho riri kubera kuva muri Kamena kugeza mu Ukuboza uyu mwaka.
Iserukiramuco Mpuzamahanga “Africa in Colors" byari byitezwe ko ryari kubera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 rikaza gusubikwa kubera ibibazo bya COVID-19, ryasubukuriwe kuri Internet aho riri kubera kuva muri Kamena kugeza mu Ukuboza uyu mwaka.
Iri serukiramuco ryatumiwemo abantu batandukanye barimo abazatanga ibiganiro, mu bamaze kumenyekana harimo Kareem Biggs Burke, mubyara wa Jay-Z uri no mu buyobozi bwa Roc Nation, sosiyete y’uyu muraperi.
Uyu byitezwe ko azatanga ikiganiro ku bijyanye no kwigisha urubyiruko ibijyanye n’imikino y’ikoranabuhanga [video game], hakareberwa hamwe akamaro kayo ndetse n’uko yagira uruhare mu iterambere rya Afurika.
Briant Biggs washinze ikigo cya Unanimous Games azatanga ikiganiro tariki 9 Nyakanga 2020.
Si Biggs uzaba atanga ibiganiro muri iri serukiramuco gusa kuko muri iki cyiciro hatumiwe abantu banyuranye kandi bafite amazina akomeye.
Mu bakurikiranira hafi iyi mikino nka Kevin Meltzer washinze Big5games, Desire Koussawo n’abandi.
Avuga kuri Briant Biggs, Raoul Rugamba umwe mu bagize igitekerezo cyo gutangiza iri serukiramuco ndetse uri no mu bayoboye ikipe iri kuritegura yagize ati" Tukimumenyesha ko azaza kudufasha yarabyishimiye ndetse yavuze ko azifashisha iri serukiramuco kugira ngo harebwe uburyo yaba we cyangwa sosiyete ari mu buyobozi bwayo ya Roc Nation ya Jay-Z bashora imari muri Afurika by’umwihariko mu ruganda rw’imyidagaduro.
Ibiganiro aba bazagiramo uruhare bizaba tariki 9 Nyakanga 2020 mu gihe tariki 11 Nyakanga hazaba amarushanwa y’imikino izwi nka E Sports kugeza ubu yatumiwemo ibihugu icumi.
Usibye ibijyanye n’iyi mikino, iri serukiramuco rizarangira mu Ukuboza 2020 riri kubamo ibindi bikorwa nk’aho kuva tariki 24 Kamena 2020 kugeza 27 Kamena 2020 hari gutangwa amahugurwa ku ikoranabuhanga rya 3D.
Hitezwe ko nyuma y’ibi bikorwa hazakurikiraho ibitaramo byaba ibya muzika ndetse n’ibyo kumurika imideri bikomeye byose byitezwe ko bizaba hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Rugamba yavuze ko baritekereje bagendeye ku kuba imyidagaduro muri Afurika itaratangira kubyazwa umusaruro uhagije ndetse n’abayihuriyemo usanga badafite uburyo bwo guhuza imbaraga.
Yagize ati "Ku Isi yose miliyari ibihumbi bibiri z’Amadorali ya Amerika zinjira zivuye mu ruganda rw’imyidagaduro ndetse ni uruganda rutanga akazi ku barenga miliyoni 26.
Muri Afurika uru ruganda rwinjiza 2% ugereranyije no ku Isi hose.
Ngiyo impamvu yatumye dutekereza uburyo twazamura uruganda rw’imyidagaduro muri Afurika.
Iri serukiramuco ziritabirwa n’abantu batandukanye bafite aho bahuriye n’imyidagaduro muri Afurika bakazatanga ibiganiro binyuranye mu rwego rwo gushakira hamwe uko uru ruganda rwatanga umusaruro uhagije kuri uyu mugabane.
Nyura hano ujye ukurikirana ibikorwa bya "Africa in Colors"

Damini Ogulu uzwi cyane mu muziki nka Burna Boy uri no mu bahanzi bakunzwe cyane muri iki gihe, yegukanye ku nshuro ya kabiri yikurikiranya igihembo mu cyiciro cy’umuhanzi utari umunyamerika witwaye neza muri BET Awards.
Ni mu bihembo byatanzwe kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 28 Kamena 2020, bitangwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga kubera icyorezo cya COVID19 cyatumye gukora ibitaramo bitarimo gukunda.
Byatangwaga ku nshuro ya 20.
Muri ibi bihembo bya BET Awards 2020, mu cyiciro by’abanyamahanga hari hariho abahanzi bo muri Afurika, aho mu cyiciro cy’umuhanzi mwiza utari uwo muri Amerika ‘Best International Act’ harimo Burna Boy wo muri Nigeria, Innoss’B wo muri RDC, Sho Madjozi wo muri Afurika y’Epfo, Dave na Stormzy bo mu Bwongereza ndetse na Ninho na S.
Pri Noir bo mu Bufaransa.
Muri iki cyiciro Burna Boy ni we wabashije kwegukana igihembo ahigitse aba bahanzi bose.
N’ubwo ibi bihembo byatangiwe kuri internet ariko, Naomi Campbell uzwi cyane mu ruganda rw’imideli ni we wavuze ko uyu muhanzi yegukanye iki gihembo ku nshuro ye ya kabiri yikurikiranya, dore ko n’umwaka ushize yagitwaye.
Naomi akimara kuvuga ko uyu muhanzi yegukanye iki gihembo yarengejeho amagambo agira ati “Ndakwishimiye, wari ukwiriye iki gihembo cyane.
Afrobeat ku Isi yose.
Burna Boy na we yahawe umwanya avuga ko yishimiye kuba yegukanye iki gihembo, ashimangira ko Afurika ikwiye guhabwa agaciro.
Ati “Murakoze cyane BET.
Nshaka gufata aka kanya nkavuga ko igihe kimwe mu 1835 hari hari gahunda yo guhindura Afurika umuryango ufite ubwiganze, igihe ni iki kubera ko kugira ngo ubuzima bw’Abirabura bugire agaciro, Afurika igomba kubanza kukagira.
Mu mwaka ushize Burna Boy yari ari muri iki cyiciro n’ubundi ahatanye n’abahanzi barimo Mr Eazi, Aya Nakamura na Dosseh bo mu Bufaransa ndetse na Dave na Giggs bo mu Bwongereza, aha nabwo yarabahize.
Kwegukana iki gihembo muri iki cyiciro uyu mwaka, Burna Boy byamugize umuhanzi wa mbere ubashije guca agahigo ko kucyegukana kabiri yikurikiranya.
Mu bindi bihembo byatanzwe muri BET Awards 2020, harimo icy’umuhanzi w’umugabo witwaye neza muri Hip Hop cyatwawe na DaBaby, icy’umuhanzi w’umugabo witwaye neza muri R&B/Pop cyatwawe na Chris Brown, icya album y’umwaka yabaye Please Excuse Me For Being Antisocial ya Roddy Ricch, BET HER Award yatwawe na Béyonce muri ‘Brown Skin Girl’ yahuriyemo n’abahanzi nka Blue Ivy, WizKid & Saint Jhn n’ibindi.
