Perezida Paul Kagame yatangaje ko politiki yo guteza imbere abagore imaze gutanga umusaruro mwiza mu iterambere ry’igihugu, akifuza na we yazasimburwa n’umugore ku kuyobora u Rwanda.
Perezida Paul Kagame yatangaje ko politiki yo guteza imbere abagore imaze gutanga umusaruro mwiza mu iterambere ry’igihugu, akifuza na we yazasimburwa n’umugore ku kuyobora u Rwanda.
Yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza ubwo yagaragazaga uko igihugu gihagaze mu ijambo yagejeje ku bitabiriye inama ya 17 y’Umushyikirano.
Imbere y’ibihumbi byitabiriye iyo nama, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko guteza imbere abagore byahinduye byinshi mu buzima bw’igihugu ku buryo bisigaye binigaragaza ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Yagize ati “ Mwabonye muri iyi minsi ibijyanye n’uburinganire abagore n’abagabo ku Isi yose ibihugu ijana na mirongo turi mu ba mbere 10, mu by’ukuri hari aho bagera ngirango abantu bakarambirwa u Rwanda bagashaka kurugabanyiriza ubundi twagakwiye kuba turi mu ba mbere batanu ariko turi mu ba mbere 10 nabyo turabyemera.
Perezida Kagame yagaragaje ko uwo mwanya atari mwiza cyane kuko u Rwanda rwigeze kuza mu bihugu bitandatu bya mbere mu guteza imbere uburinganire bw’abagabo n’abagore, gusa agaragaza ko n’aho ruri atari habi.
Yavuze ko politiki y’uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye ijya kujyaho, akamaro kayo kagaragaraga kandi n’abandi bamaze kubibona.
Ati “Iyi politiki imaze imyaka twayikoze tuyemera kandi twumva akamaro kayo kandi ifite umusaruro ugaragarira n’abandi babona ko bikora ariko dukore n’ibindi tugera mu ba mbere batanu.
Hari akazi ko gukora kenshi bafatanyije n’abagabo.
Abadamu bamaze kugira aho bagera, dushyiremo umuvuduko dufatanye mu bucuruzi mu buyobozi, ubutabera, abashinzwe umutekano, abashinzwe byose.
Ashingiye ku byagezweho ku bufatanye n’abagore, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko yifuza ko umunsi umwe umugore yazayobora u Rwanda.
Ati “Njye nifuza rimwe ko uyu mwanya mwampaye ubukurikira uzatwarwa n’umugore, abagabo bari hano niba ndi bubakire simbizi ariko nabo bashobora kuba ari byo bashaka.
Perezida Kagame yasabye abanyarwanda gukomeza kongera imbaraga mubyo bakora, kuko hari byinshi byagezweho benshi batumvaga ko byashoboka.
Kuva mu 2003 Itegeko Nshinga rigena ko mu myanya yose itorerwa mu buyobozi no muri guverinoma, abagore bagomba kugiramo 30%.
Perezida w’Urwego Ngishwanama rw’inararibonye mu Rwanda, Rutaremara Tito yigeze gusobanura ko gushyira abagore mu buyobozi ari “ubushake bwa politiki bujyanye n’ibibera mu Rwanda.
Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, abagore banganaga hafi na 70% by’abaturage bose.
Muri Guverinoma, abagore bangana na 50 %, mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko mu Mutwe w’Abadepite mu Rwanda bangana na 61.
3% bavuye kuri 14% mu 1994.
U Rwanda nirwo ruyoboye ibindi bihugu byo ku Isi mu kugira abagore benshi mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Mu bucamanza ni 49.
6% mu gihe mu buyobozi bw’inama njyanama z’uturere abagore ari 41%.
Mu burezi abakobwa bitabira amashami y’imibare, ubumenyi n’ikoranabuhanga bavuye kuri 56.
7% muri 2015 bagera kuri 63.
9% muri 2018, na ho abitabira amashuri y’imyuga n’ubumenyingiro bavuye 41.
8% muri 2015 bagera kuri 43.
8% muri 2018, mu gihe abagore bigisha muri aya mashuri bavuye kuri 32.
9% muri 2010 bakagera kuri 42.
7% muri 2018.
Abagore 59.
99% bafite ubutaka basangiye n’abo bashakanye mu gihe 24.
63% bafite ubutaka bihariye.
Ibi bigatuma 38% by’abagore bakorana n’ibigo by’imari, batanze ingwate ku butaka bwabo.
Abagore bakorana n’ibigo by’imari na bo bikubye 2 mu myaka 4, aho bavuye kuri 36% muri 2012 bagera kuri 63% muri 2016.
Simba SC ikinamo Umunyarwanda Kagere Meddie, yegukanye igikombe cya gatatu cyikurikiranya cya Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere muri Tanzania nyuma yo kunganya ubusa ku busa na Tanzania Prisons mu mukino wabaye kuri iki Cyumweru kuri Stade Sokoine i Mbeya.
Simba SC ikinamo Umunyarwanda Kagere Meddie, yegukanye igikombe cya gatatu cyikurikiranya cya Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere muri Tanzania nyuma yo kunganya ubusa ku busa na Tanzania Prisons mu mukino wabaye kuri iki Cyumweru kuri Stade Sokoine i Mbeya.
Muri uyu mukino w’umunsi wa 32, umuholandi Sven Vandenbroeck yari yagiriye icyizere Kagere Meddie wakinnye iminota yose y’umukino.
Simba SC yari ikeneye inota rimwe kugira ngo yegukanye igikombe nyuma y’uko Azam FC yanganyije na Biashara United igitego 1-1 ikagira amanota 59 mu gihe Yanga SC yatsinze Ndanda FC ibitego 3-2 ku wa Gatanu, ikagira amanota 60.
Umunyezamu wa Tanzania Prisons, Jeremiah Kasubi na Aishi Manula urinda izamu rya Simba SC bagize uruhare rukomeye mu gutuma uyu mukino urangira nta gitego kiwubonetsemo.
Kunganya byatumye Simba SC igira amanota 79 mu mikino 32, yegukana igikombe harimo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota 19 mu gihe hasigaye imikino itandatu.
Ni ku nshuro ya gatatu yikurikiranya iyi kipe yegukanye iki gikombe mu gihe ari ku nshuro ya 21 yegukanye shampiyona ya Tanzania, irushwa inshuro eshanu na Yanga SC igifite inshuro 26.
Kuri Kagere Meddie, ni igikombe cya kabiri cya shampiyona yegukanye ari kumwe na Simba SC nyuma yo kuyigeramo mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2018/19, avuye muri Gor Mahia FC yo muri Kenya.
Biteganyijwe ko Simba SC izashyikirizwa igikombe mu mikino iri imbere bitewe n’ibiganiro bizahuza ubuyobozi bwayo n’abayobora Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Tanzania (TFF).
Rwangabo Byusa Nelson wazanye mu muziki amazina ya Nel Ngabo agiye gushyira hanze album ye ya mbere yise ‘Ingabo’; yatuye ingabo zose zarwanye urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu harimo na se mu gitaramo azaririmbamo wenyine.
Rwangabo Byusa Nelson wazanye mu muziki amazina ya Nel Ngabo agiye gushyira hanze album ye ya mbere yise ‘Ingabo’; yatuye ingabo zose zarwanye urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu harimo na se mu gitaramo azaririmbamo wenyine.
Ni igitaramo kizabera kuri internet kuri shene ya Youtube ya MK1 TV ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gitaha tariki 4 Nyakanga 2020 guhera saa Kumi n’Ebyiri.
Iyi album ya mbere y’uyu musore yayise ‘Ingabo’ izaba iriho indirimbo 13.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko iki gitaramo kivuze ikintu gikomeye kuri we kuko aricyo cya mbere agiye gukora cyamwitiriwe.
Ati “Ni igitaramo kivuze byinshi kuri njye.
Nicyo cya mbere cyanjye, ubundi najyaga mu bitaramo by’abandi.
Nta kujenjeka, ndi gukora ibishoboka byose ngo nezeze abakunzi b’umuziki wanjye.
Yakomeje avuga ko ashobora gufatanya n’abandi bahanzi ariko bakazamufasha mu ndirimbo bahuriyemo.
Mu bahanzi bazamufasha harimo Butera Knowless na Platini [P] aba bose bazajya ku rubyiniro bamufashe mu ndirimbo bahuriyemo ubundi akomeze wenyine.
Nel Ngabo azaririmba indirimbo 10 zirimo izizwi n’izindi nshyashya zitaramenyekana.
Yavuze ko imyiteguro ayigeze kure ndetse umuntu wese uzakurikira igitaramo cye nta kabuza azaryoherwa.
Aherutse kuvuga ko yatekereje izina ‘Ingabo’ kuko ariyo yatangiye urugamba rwe muri muzika.
Ati “Iyi album yitwa Ingabo.
Isobanuye byinshi kuri njye, niyo yatangije urugamba rwanjye muri muzika.
Nayituye Ingabo zitanze kugira ngo tube turi mu gihugu cyiza nk’icyo dufite uyu munsi by’umwihariko umubyeyi wanjye (Papa) kuko n’umwe muri abo.

Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yatangaje ko ikiguzi cyo guherekanya amafaranga hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga cyari cyaravanyweho mu rwego rwo guca intege ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19, kigiye gusubizwaho nyuma y’iminsi 90 yari yaratanzwe.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yatangaje ko ikiguzi cyo guherekanya amafaranga hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga cyari cyaravanyweho mu rwego rwo guca intege ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19, kigiye gusubizwaho nyuma y’iminsi 90 yari yaratanzwe.
Ni icyemezo kizatangira kubahirizwa kuva tariki ya 22 Kamena 2020, aho ikiguzi cyo gukura amafaranga kuri konti ya banki ashyirwa kuri Mobile Money cyangwa akurwa kuri Mobile Money ashyirwa kuri konti ya banki kizongera kubahirizwa.
Ibi bizajyana kandi n’ikiguzi cyajyaga gitangwa mu gihe abantu bahererekanya amafaranga hagati yabo ndetse no kwishyura ibicuruzwa na serivise hakoreshejwe imiyoboro y’ibigo by’itumanaho.
BNR ivuga ko ishingiye ku kuba iminsi 90 yari yaremeranyije n’ibigo bitanga serivise z’itumanaho n’amabanki yo kuba havanyweho ikiguzi cy’izo serivise yararangiye, kandi ko ari ngombwa gukomeza gushyigikira ukudahungabana kw’imari muri izo serivise nkenerwa […] ikiguzi cy’izo serivise kigomba gusubizwaho.
BNR yibukije abantu bose bakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi cyangwa batanga serivise n’abandi bose bafite ibyo bagurisha ko basabwa gukomeza guhitamo uburyo bwo guhererekanya amafaranga no kwishyurana hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga.
BNR kandi yijeje ko izakomeza gukorana n’izindi nzego za leta, ibigo bitanga izo serivise n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa mu gukemura inzitizi zibangamira ihererekanya ry’amafaranga hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga.
Ibizitabwaho cyane ni ibikorwaremezo, ikiguzi cya serivise, ubukangurambaga, imikorere inoze no guhanga udushya mu mitangirwe y’izo serivise.
Tariki ya 18 Werurwe 2020, ni bwo hasohowe itangazo ryashyizeho igihe cy’amezi atatu, yatangiye kubahirizwa ku wa 19 Werurwe 2020, cyo guhererekanya amafaranga nta kiguzi cyongeweho.
Ibi byakozwe mu rwego rwo korohereza abantu kubahiriza gahunda ya Guma Mu Rugo hagamijwe gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Umubare w’amafaranga yehererekanyijwe mu Rwanda hifashisijwe ikoranabuhanga hagati ya Mutarama na Mata 2020, wageze kuri miliyari 40 Frw; bivuze ko yiyongereye ku kigero cya 450% avuye kuri miliyari 7.
2 Frw zahererekanyijwe mu cyumweru cya mbere cya Mutarama 2020.
Nk’uko bigaragara muri raporo yakozwe n’ikigo insight2impact ku bufatanye na RURA, mu cyumweru cya mbere cya gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo umubare w’abahererekanya amafaranga mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga wageze kuri miliyoni 1.
2, uvuye ku bantu 600 000 mu cyumweru cyari cyabanjirije Guma mu Rugo.
Mu cyumweru cya nyuma cya Mata 2020, abantu miliyoni 1.
8 bahererekanyije amafaranga mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda.
Guhera tariki 9 Werurwe kugeza tariki 15 Werurwe, hahererekanyijwe miliyari 10.
7 Frw ariko mu cyumweru cyarangiye tariki 22 Werurwe amafaranga yahererekanyijwe mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga yari ageze kuri miliyari 24 Frw.
Kwishyura ibicuruzwa hifashishije ikoranabuhanga nabyo byariyongereye.
RURA na Insight2impact bagaragaza ko uhereye rwagati muri Gashyantare uyu mwaka ukageza rwagati muri Mata, agaciro k’amafaranga yishyurwa ibicuruzwa mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga kiyongereyeho 700% mu cyumweru.
Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR) igaragaza ko kwishyurana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga byihutisha ubukungu kandi amafaranga atakara mu bucuruzi akagabanuka cyane.
Imibare yo mu 2017 igaragaza ko nibura buri mwaka BNR itakaza miliyari ebyiri zo gukoresha inoti nshya n’ibiceri bisaza kubera guhererekanywa mu ntoki.
U Rwanda rufite intego ko mu mwaka wa 2024, amafaranga abarirwa ku kigero cya 80 % y’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu azajya ahererekanywa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, avuye kuri 34.

Ni uburyo bwatangiranye ariko n’abakoresha Twitter kuri iOS.
Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Twitter rwatangiye kugerageza uburyo bushya uretse kuba abantu basangiza abandi amagambo n’amafoto muri tweet, noneho bashobora gushyiraho ijwi ryabo.
Ni uburyo bwatangiranye ariko n’abakoresha Twitter kuri iOS.
Ubuyobozi bw’uru rubuga, kuri uyu wa Gatatu bwatangaje ko rimwe na rimwe iyo umuntu ashaka kugira icyo atangaza kuri Twitter hari ubwo inyuguti 280 zishobora kuba zidahagije, uburyohe bw’ikiganiro bugatakarira mu gusoma no gusemura ikivugwa.
Bukomeza buti "Rero guhera uyu munsi turimo kugerageza uburyo bushya buzatuma umuntu ashobora gukora byinshi igihe yifashisha Twitter – ugakoresha ijwi ryawe.
Inzira izajya ikoreshwa mu gutangaza tweet ukoresheje ijwi ntaho itaniye no gukoresha amagambo.
Bizajya bisaba kujya ahandikwa, ukabona akantu gashya kongewemo gafite ishusho y’imirongo igaragaza amajwi.
Ukanzeho hahita haza ifoto ukoresha kuri twitter n’ahantu ho gufatira amajwi ahagana hasi, ukahakanda ugatangira gufata ijwi ushaka gutangaza.
Muri ubu buryo bushya, ubutumwa utangaza mu buryo bw’amajwi buba bufite amasegonda atarenga 140, ni ukuvuga iminota ibiri n’amasegonda makumyabiri.
Umuntu ashobora gukomeza kuvuga, ku buryo iyo amasegonda yagenwe arangiye bitifunga, ahubwo hirema urukurikirane rw’amajwi rimwe munsi y’irindi (thread) hakurikijwe uburebure ntarengwa bwashyizweho, bigakora tweets zitarenga 25.
Iyo usoje ukanda ahanditse “Done", ubundi bakagusubiza aho watangiriye handitse “Tweet", ugasangiza abagukurikira ibitekerezo ariko noneho wifashishijwe amajwi.
Twiter yakomeje iti "Abantu bazabona ubutumwa bwawe aho barebera ibyo abandi batangaje (tweets).
Igihe ushaka kubwumva, ukanda mu ifoto.
Ni uburyo bwatangiye kwifashishwa ku bakoresha iPhone kuko zubakiye kuri porogaramu ya iOS.
Ijwi rifungukira ahagana hasi, ugakomeza kuryumva n’igihe waba urimo gusoma ibindi byatangajwe kuri Twitter cyangwa igihe unavuye muri iyi application ya Twitter kuri iOS ukaba ugiye mu bindi, kereka urihagaritse.
Twitter yakomeje iti "Gukora Tweets zo mu majwi biraza kugaragara ku bantu bake bakoresha Twitter kuri iOS mu ntangiriro, ariko mu byumweru biri imbere buri wese ukoreha iOS azaba ashobora gutangaza ubutumwa binyuze mu ijwi.
Buri wese azaba ashobora kubwumva no gusubiza.
Kuri iyi nshuro ariko bizaba bishoboka gusa gukoresha ijwi nka tweet, ntabwo birashoboka ko ukoresha ijwi mu gusubiza ku byo undi yatangaje (reply) cyangwa kubisakaza wongeyeho igitekerezo cyawe (Retweet with Comment).
Ubuyobozi bwa Twitter buvuga ko hari ibintu umuntu atabasha kuvuga cyangwa gusobanura akoresheje amagambo yanditse, ku buryo yizera ko kwifashisha amajwi bizatuma abantu barushaho gusabana.
Ni uburyo buzafasha cyane nk’abakeneye kubara inkuru zabo, abanyamakuru bashaka gutangaza inkuru zishyushye cyangwa umuntu uwo ari we wese ubonye icyo akeneye kubwira abandi mu buryo bw’amajwi .

Ni umwe mu bagize Guverinoma bashya ariko izina rye si rishya mu mitwe ya benshi kuko mu gihe gito gishize amaze kunyura mu nshingano zinyuranye kandi zikomeye, kuko uyu mugabo nyuma y’imyaka ine ari umudepite, mu 2017 yagizwe Perezida w’Itorero ry’Igihugu, umwanya yavuyeho muri uku kwezi akagirwa Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco.
Ni umwe mu bagize Guverinoma bashya ariko izina rye si rishya mu mitwe ya benshi kuko mu gihe gito gishize amaze kunyura mu nshingano zinyuranye kandi zikomeye, kuko uyu mugabo nyuma y’imyaka ine ari umudepite, mu 2017 yagizwe Perezida w’Itorero ry’Igihugu, umwanya yavuyeho muri uku kwezi akagirwa Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco.
Ku myaka 36 ntabwo byoroshye ko umuntu uwo ari we wese aba agize ubunararibonye nk’ubwa Bamporiki, gusa inshingano ze yagiye azitwaramo neza, abenshi bakamutega amatwi kubera Ikinyarwanda akunda gukoresha kirimo amagambo atazwi na benshi ndetse akagira imivugire yihariye ituma abamutega amatwi batarambirwa.
IGIHE yaganiriye na Bamporiki ku ngingo zitandukanye uhereye ku murimo w’ubuhanzi kuko yamamaye nka Tadeyo mu Urunana ndetse afite imivugo n’amafilime anyuranye azwimo, kugeza no ku nshingano nshya zimutegereje muri Guverinoma nk’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’umuco, umwanya mushya wahanzwe muri iyi minisiteri, akaba ari nawe wa mbere ugiye gukora izo nshingano.
IGIHE: Mu minsi ishize wagizwe Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco nyuma y’igihe uyobora Itorero.
Wabyakiriye ute?
Bamporiki: Byarantunguye ku buryo gusobanura uko nabyakiriye, ntabwo byoroshye.
Kugirirwa icyizere n’Umukuru w’Igihugu ubwabyo biraremereye, igihe cyose babikubwirira biba bifite uburemere bukomeye.
Icyizere cy’Umukuru w’Igihugu ku muntu gifite agaciro utabonera igiciro.
Buriya urabona ko nabaye umudepite, abadepite ni imyanya nayo ikomeye ariko bo baritegura.
Umuntu afata icyemezo akava mu nzu ye akajya kwiyamamaza ku rwego rw’akagali bakamutora.
Icyizere umuntu agirirwa n’umukuru w’igihugu kiza igihe yabitekerereje, birumvikana kinagenda igihe yabitekerereje bitewe n’uko abona inshingano ziri gukorwa cyangwa icyo yari agutegerejemo uko uri kugikora, ariko byose biratungurana.
Ibyo dusabwa ni uko igihe utumwe ukataza ukajya mu butumwa aho gutinda ubaza.
IGIHE: Itorero usize rihagaze rite?
Bamporiki: Nkigera mu itorero rero nagiye inama na bagenzi banjye ko tubona bimaze kugera ahantu heza, kuvuga amahame y’intore, kuvuga intekerezo z’intore, twemeranya ko twashyira imbaraga noneho mu bikorwa, mu rugerero, urugerero ruciye ingando, tubyumvikanaho gutyo dutangira kujya muri icyo cyiciro.
Nasanze urugerero ruciye ingando rumaze umwaka umwe baratoje abantu 416, iyo nayo ni intambwe nasanze abo nasanze baragezeho kandi ntekereza ko bazanakomeza.
Mu Itorero nta muntu wavuga ngo iki ninjye wagikoze kuko inama nkuru y’abakomiseri ihana ibitekerezo, twakoraga nk’abacurabwenge.
Byari bikiri ahantu rero utavuga ngo wabona icyo wirata kuko itorero abakoroni barariciye cyera cyane, nta muntu n’umwe twari kumwe mu itorero wari uriho icyo gihe ngo avuge ngo arabikora uko babikoraga, usibye kujya gushaka abakuru nabo batari benshi no kureba ibitabo twagize umugisha wo kwandikirwa n’abanyabwenge b’u Rwanda rugikubita, nabyo bitari byinshi.
IGIHE: Hari intambwe mubona Itorero rikeneye gutera?
Bamporiki:  Ngira ngo twari tumaze igihe twubaka itorero ry’umudugudu no kubaka itorero mu muryango, ku buryo ababyeyi baba abatoza b’abana, icyo umubyeyi akoze akamenya ko ari gutoza abana kuko umwana ntabwo yigira muri vuga numve, yigira muri kora ndebe.
Rero tuzabikomeza kuko inshingano mpawe nta nubwo ziri kure cyane y’itorero, ntekereza ko dufite inshingano nka minisiteri ngiyemo, nk’itorero ry’igihugu gukomeza kubaka itorero ry’umuryango.
Kuko nitugira umuryango muzima, tuzagira abasirikare bazima, tuzagira abaganga bazima, tuzagira abanyeshuri n’abarimu bazima, tuzagira abagore n’abagabo bazima n’abayobozi bazima kuko buri muco w’abantu buriya uba nk’ifumbire igaragaza ngo izeramo iki, abayobozi beza dufite buriya ntabwo bari kure y’umuco ababyebyi babo babarereyemo.
Abantu bahemukiye igihugu twagize ntabwo biri kure y’uburere batabonye cyangwa babonye batari bakwiriye kubona "bubi".
Ntabwo twari twagera aho dushaka kuko ntituragera aho umuntu mu muryango yumva atewe ishema no kuba umutoza wo mu muryango, umwana yumve ko ari intore, umwarimu abanze yumve ko ari umutoza mbere yo kuba umwarimu.
IGIHE: Iyo witegereje umuco nyarwanda ubona uhagaze ute?
Bamporiki:  Umuco wacu uri heza, kuko ubundi umuco abantu bakwiriye kumva ko ari ibintu bitatu: ni umurage, ni ibihahano n’ibihangano.
Iyo ubiteranyije bibyara umuco.
Rero niwumva umuntu akubwira ko umuco ufite ibibazo, muganiriye cyane wakumva ariwe ufite ikibazo kuko wenda we yumvira umuco mu murage gusa, mu bihahano gusa cyangwa mu bihangano gusa.
Umuco nyir’izina ni uburyo dufata bya bintu bitatu tukabihuza bikaba umuco.
Ku banyarwanda rero ubu ikintu kinini cyane gishobora ko runaka afite umuco ni uburyo indangagaciro twahisemo ko ari iz’abanyarwanda tuzigira ubuzima aho kuzishyira mu magambo n’igipindi.
Naho ibijyanye n’ibyo twambara n’ibyo tunywa, n’uko turya, uko tubyina n’uko turirimba, ni ibyambitse umuco.
IGIHE:  Mu mpinduka perezida yakoze harimo guhuza ibijyanye n’umuco na minisiteri y’urubyiruko.
Twavuga ko ari amahirwe ku rubyiruko?
Bamporiki: Ni ukorohereza urubyiruko kuko ubundi urubyiruko ni inkingi ya mwamba mu kubaka iki gihugu cyacu.
Ariko inkingi ya mwamba idashingiye kuri za ndangagaciro z’abanyarwanda no mu muco, bishobora kugeraho umusaruro utaba mwinshi.
Umutoza w’ikirenga rero amaze igihe kinini atwereka ko hari ikibazo mu ndangagaciro zacu, mu rurimi rwacu kandi nibyo, mu muco wacu, iyo ushaka impinduka rero uzikorera mu rubyiruko kuko nirwo ruzahatinda ruhabyarire abana.
Umuntu ufite imyka 80 afite umumaro we ariko ufite imyaka 20 hari ibyo azashyira mu bikorwa imyaka myinshi kurusha wawundi ufite imyaka 80.
Kuba rero umuco uhujwe n’urubyiruko ni ukuvuga ngo reka imbaraga zegerane, ibyo dushaka byose bijye hamwe twe kugira icyo tujya gushaka ahandi kandi na rwa rubyiruko rukanguke rwumve ko u Rwanda rwahisemo gukora ibishingiye ku muco warwo kandi urubyiruko rushyizwe imbere.
IGIHE: Ni iyihe mirongo migari mushyize imbere mu nshingano nshya?
Bamporiki: Icyo numva umuntu wese abwiwe gukorana n’urubyiruko, ni ukureba imbaraga zitari mu ngamba.
Kuva umutoza w’ikirenga akimara kungirira icyizere muri iryo joro nahise mbona imbaraga nyinshi zitari mu ngamba, noneho nsanga gukerera u Rwanda mu bwitange bishoboka ariko bigatunga uwitanga.
Hari imbaraga nyinshi abantu bashobora kwigaho neza zaba iziri i Iwawa, iziri mu muhanda kandi ugasanga hari ibikorwa izo mbaraga zishobora gukora.
Ariko turamutse twumva ko kwitangira u Rwanda ukazagira aho ushyira muri ’nari umugabo yawe’ ko witangiye u Rwanda mu gihe cy’umwaka, ntekereza ko harimo imbaraga nyinshi cyane kandi nanone buhoro buhoro imbaraga z’uwitanga zishobora gutunga uwitanga niko mbitekereza.
Ikindi iki gihugu gifite amateka akwiye gukinwamo amakinamico na filimi.
Buriya kugira umujyi mwiza nka Kigali abantu badafite ahantu bashobora kujya kureba amakinamiko cyangwa aho kwidagadurira bijyanye n’umuco wabo.
Bishobora kuzadufata igihe kirerekire ariko nanone kugaragaza ko dufite ubushake bwo kugemura izo mbogamizi, ntekereza ko ari ikintu cy’ingenzi kugira ngo twe gusigara inyuma.
IGIHE: Uzahuza ute inshingano nshya n’ubuhanzi umaze kumenyekanamo?
Bamporiki: Aho gutekereza ko nzajya kuvuganira ibihangano byanjye ni umwanya mwiza wo kuvuganira ibihangano by’abakeneye ubuvugizi.
Ni igihe cyiza cyo gutanga inama ku bahanzi, ni igihe cyiza cyo gukora ubuvugizi bubyara umusaruro ariko iyo uri umwanditsi uba ushobora no kwandika, ibyo wanditse ukabiha abafite umwanya wo kubibyaza umusaruro.
Njya mu Nteko abantu bambwiraga ko ari byiza kureka gukira Urunana, nkumva kudakina Urunana biranyambura kuba njyewe.
Narabikomeje kugeza n’uyu munsi, nzanabikomeza kuko umwanya bintwara ntabwo ari munini cyane, kandi birongera bikangira njye kandi numva nkwiye gukora inshingano umutoza w’ikirenga yanyoherejemo ndi njyewe yatumye.
IGIHE: Ururimi ruyunguruye n’amateka yo hambere ukunda kwifashisha ubikura he?
Bamporiki: Nta nakimwe cyanjye, buriya Ikinyarwanda ni umutungo wa twese, ntawavuga ngo amateka ni aya se cyangwa aya sekuru.
Njye ntekereza ko nkunda kuganira n’abakuru, ntabwo natambuka ku mukecuru ntamuvugishije, kuko umukecuru w’imyaka 80 iyo muvuganye umunota umwe ahita aguha umushinga wazandika, umusaza ni uko.
N’ibitabo bitera bamwe ubute urabisoma ugasanga birimo intekerezo z’abanyarwanda.
Nibyo rero ushobora kugera imbere y’abantu mwaganira bakumva umeze nk’aho uri kuzana ibishya ariko icyo wabarushije ari ugushirika ubute ukabishakisha aho biri.
Urumva nakinnye ikinamico, iyo ugeze imbere y’abantu uko utanga ubutumwa bishobora kuba binahura n’impano ufite yo kuba imbere y’abantu.
IGIHE:  Nk’umuhanzi wigeze utekereza ko umunsi umwe ushobora kuzisanga muri guverinoma?
Bamporiki: Ibyo rero usibye no gutekereza kuba muri guverinoma, no kuba muri Kigali byari inzozi.
Urumva kuba i Kigali ni ukuva i Cyangugu ukaharara rimwe ugasubirayo.
Ariko njye nari ngiye kuviramo ku Kibuye nza i Kigali bwa mbere, ngeze ku Kibuye nabonaga bihagije, nari nzi ko ari i Kigali kandi umujyi wa Kibuye wari muto.
Nta kintu nari guheraho no gutekereza ko nayobora Akagali kuko kuyobora bishingira ku kwiyobora.
Hari igihe rero njye namaze mbona no kwiyobora bigiye kunanira.
Njyewe ubundi numvaga mfite umuhigo umwe wo kuvuga ngo icyampa uko nasanze kwa data, kwa Mwitende hameze, nkazasiga hari icyo mpahinduye.
Nibyo nabwiraga bashiki banjye na Mama, nkababwira nti “ntabwo ubu buzima twabubyariramo abana ngo ni uko kubyara ari ukubyara.
IGIHE: Ni irihe somo rikomeye wize bijyanye n’ubuzima umaze kunyuramo?
Bamporiki: Njyewe ubuzima bwanjye nkunda kubuganiriza cyane cyane abakiri bato kuko mbishyira mu mvugo yoroshye yo kuvuga ko nimba ukuntu nari umuntu utari ufite icyizere nshobora kugirirwa icyizere, hari igihe nabayeho ntifitiye icyizere, bivuze ko umuntu wese adacitse intege nta kintu atageraho, wenda atakirwaniye ahubwo akagiharanira kuko hari igihe nabyo tubyitiranya.
Urugendo rwa muntu ni rurerure ariko kudatsindwa n’ikigeragezo cy’uyu munsi bitanga imbaraga, bikaba igishoro cy’ibizaza.
Hari ibintu byinshi nagiye nanirwa ariko hari ibyashoboraga kunaniza ku buryo nta muntu uyu munsi wari kuba anzi.
Ni ukuvuga ngo urugendo rwarimo ibizazane byinshi by’imibereho, ariko sinemere guheranwa nabyo.
Iyo waburaye karindwi ukabona ifunguro ku wa munani, usibye kubyibuka gusa ko wigeze kuburara ariko kuburara ntibigena ubuzima bwawe bwo mugihe cyo kubona uko ubayeho.
Iyo wagenze n’amaguru ibilometero birebire wagereranya no kujya i Cyangugu ukagaruka ubuzima bwawe bwo kubona wirukanka, iyo ugeze igihe cyo gutunga imodoka iyo ugiye kuyatsa ntikwibutsa ko wigeze kugenda n’maguru.
IGIHE: Ni murage ki wifuza gusiga nyuma y’ubuzima bwawe kuri iyi si?
Bamporiki: Tutagihari abantu bazajya batuvuga kurusha uko batuvuga duhari.
Icyo gitaramo rero umuntu azavugwamo adahari wenda ngo unisobanure cyangwa usabe imbabazi, numva icyo abantu bazavuga ari icyazabafasha muri icyo gihe.
Kuvuga ngo ’higeze kubaho umuntu witwa Bamporiki, abona ko nituba turiho tutazamenya amateka arayandika kugira ngo bizadufashe, kandi wenda mu makosa yakoze yabaye make ugereranyije nibyo yagerageje gutunganya’, nibyo bintu ndwana nabyo.
Nitekereza nk’umuntu uzatuma abana bazaba bahari, nkwiye kuzaba ndi isomo batiriwe bajya mu gitabo.
Numva nirinda kuzagira paji mu gitabo cy’ubuzima bwanjye umuntu yazageraho akumva yayica kuko ntakiri kumufasha.
Icyampa sinzagire igihe na kimwe ntatira igihango, kutazagira igihe na kimwe umusanzu natanze mera nk’utaruzi icyo nakoraga noneho nkamera nk’ugiye gusenya ibyo nubakaga, nanjye ndi mu bubaka, nicyo nifuza kandi numva Imana y’i Rwanda izamfasha kuko ihorana natwe.
IGIHE: Kubera iki iyo uvuze Imana ukunda kongeraho y’i Rwanda?
Bamporiki: Ubukoloni bwaraduhemukiye tumera nk’abantu bazaniwe Imana itari ihari kandi Imana ntushobora kuyizana mu bantu yaremye kuko ntiyabarema idahari.
Imana y’i Rwanda n’Imana ya Israel n’Imana ya Amerika ni imwe.
Uko bavuga iyabo n’uko tuvuga iyacu buriya igitandukana ni indimi n’uko tuyitekereza, ariko yo ntihinduka.
Imana y’i Rwanda mvuga ni Imana y’Abanyarwanda, ni Imana y’abakurambere bacu, ni Imana y’abariho uyu munsi n’abazaza, ibyo ntanuwabipfa n’undi.
Umuntu ashobora kunezezwa no kuvuga Imana ya Israel ariko mba numva ari uguhemuka kuko Imana ya Israel, Abayisiraheli barahagije kuvuga Imana yabo, hanyuma Imana y’i Rwanda tukavuga ko ari Imana y’i Rwanda, ni nabwo tubona ko hari ibyo yadukoreye hari n’ibyo yadukorera.
Ariko iyo ukomeje kuyifata nk’iy’abandi hari n’igihe wumva ihugiyeyo, ukumva ko ibanza gukora iby’Abisiraheli ikabona kuza mu Rwanda, ibyo rero ni ukuyipfobya.
IGIHE: Wigeze umenya imvano y’izina Bamporiki?
Bamporiki: Papa ambyara yari yaratangiye umwuga wo gucukura amabuye y’agaciro, za zahabu, colombeti, babaga bacukura mu migezi y’iwacu.
Noneho abazungu baguraga ibyo bitaga imyambi baza kumushima ko afite ubuhanga bwo kumenya iyo zahabu abandi byarababaniye.
Noneho aho kubimukundira, papa yapfuye ari muto, yashatse afite imyaka 18 apfa afite 31, urumva imyaka mfite ntabwo yayigize, ari nabyo byajemo iherezo rye ritari ryiza kuko bamuhaye acide iramwica, yavukiye ahantu mu bakene agira ubuhanga bwo kumenya ibya zahabu noneho barabimwangira.
Noneho mushiki wanjye w’imfura yitwaga Nyirangirinshuti, yamubyaye afite inshuti, umukurikira yitwa Uzamushaka, njye nza ndi uwa gatatu anyita Bamporiki kuko yambyaye abantu bari kumwangira icyo ashoboye bo badashoboye.
Yari afite abantu batamukundira ibyo ashoboye badashoboye, twaraganiriye na Sogokuru arambwira ati ’nicyo cyatumye so akwita gutyo.
IGIHE: Mu gihe cyo kuruhuka ni iki ukunda gukora?
Bamporiki: Mu bintu binduhura ni ukujya kuri chantier (ahantu barimo kubaka), yaba ari iyanjye, ariko njye nshobora gusura aho bari kubaka inzu na nyirayo adahari.
Icya kabiri kinduhura ni ukumva inanga yaba umuntu ari kuyicuranga ako kanya cyangwa kumva izo bacuranze kera ziri mu bubiko.
Nagira umugisha nkabona nk’umuntu mukuru njya kuganiriza.
IGIHE: Hari abahanzi bagezweho ukunda?
Bamporiki: Abahanzi bacu ubundi bameze neza kuko ubona ko buri wese mu njyana ye ashaka ikintu cyamuzamura, cyazamura igihugu, cyamutunga.
Ariko kubijyanye nanjye nk’umuntu indirimbo zinkora ku mutuma n’indirimbo zo mu rusengero.
Buriya ngira abantu benshi baririmba indirimbo z’Imana.
IGIHE: Ni ayahe makipe ufana?
Bamporiki: Mu Rwanda mfana APR FC kubera ko natangiye kumva umupira APR ariyo ikomeye cyane cyane Gatete Jimmy cyane ko yabaye n’inshuti yanjye.
Na Manchester United, kuko nabonaga Rooney nkabona usibye uruhu ubundi akina nk’umuntu wa za Nyamagabe, ukabona afite ingufu z’abanyarwanda banyoye amata.
Ibya volleyball na Baketball mbireba nk’abandi bose ariko umupira w’amaguru wo narawukinnye niga mu mashuri y’isumbuye i Kibogora, ndi umuzamu utari mubi mu gihe cyanjye.
Umupira w’amaguru rero ni umukino uko nkurebye haba kuri stade cyangwa kuri televiziyo, mbona isomo rishya ku bintu bijyanye n’ubumwe.
Buriya iyo tuvuga ubumwe bw’abanyarwanda, iyo ndi kureba umukino buri munsi mbona ikosa rikozwe ubumwe ntibutange umusaruro kuko bubuze.
Iyo igitego kigiyemo utabonye igitego gusa ukareba inzira, ubona ko abantu bashyize hamwe byatanga umusaruro.
Nkunda umupira sinabona uko mbivuga.
Umuyobozi wa Gasogi United, Kakooza Nkuriza Charles (KNC), yaburiye Rayon Sports ko ashobora kuyitwara Hakizimana Muhadjiri nyuma yo kuyipapura umunye-Congo Bola Lobota Emmanuel
Umuyobozi wa Gasogi United, Kakooza Nkuriza Charles (KNC), yaburiye Rayon Sports ko ashobora kuyitwara Hakizimana Muhadjiri nyuma yo kuyipapura umunye-Congo Bola Lobota Emmanuel
Ku wa Kabiri nibwo ubuyobozi bwa Gasogi United bwatangaje ko bwasinyishije Bola Lobota Emmanuel wifuzwaga na Rayon Sports ndetse na Raja Cassablanca yo muri Maroc.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Radio 10 kuri uyu wa Gatatu, KNC yavuze ko bakoze ibyo basabwaga bikarangira batwaye uyu mukinnyi.
Ati “Ibintu bya ’transfer’ biba bigoye.
Umuntu agomba kwifuza uko abishaka, umuntu ashobora guca ku ibagiro akumva arifuza inyama ariko siko yabona amafaranga yo kuzigura ngo ajye kuzitanga.
Rayon Sports ishobora kuba yarabaye nk’uwo muntu maze abahaha bakaza bakigurira.
Twe twakoze ibyo twasabwaga.
KNC yakomeje avuga ko mu gihe abafana ba Rayon Sports bakomeje gukusanya amafaranga yo kugura Hakizimana Muhadjiri, bashobora kwisanga na we yaguzwe na Gasogi United.
Ati “Na Muhadjiri muvuga dushobora kumutwara, reka mbivugire aha ababyumva mubyumve.
Bashobora kumuteranyiriza twebwe tukamutwara.
Umuyobozi wa Gasogi United avuga ko iyi kipe yamaze guhindura imikorere kuri ubu yifuza gutwara kimwe mu bikombe bikinirwa mu Rwanda cyangwa byose.
Ati “Mbere na mbere ibyishimo tubigire intego, icya kabiri ni uguhatanira igikombe twahinduye imikorere ntabwo bikiri bya bindi.
Bola Lobota Emmanuel wavuye muri AS Vita Club, yabaye umukinnyi wa gatandatu mushya Gasogi United isinyishije kuva hasojwe shampiyona y’umwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20.
Abandi iyi kipe yaguze ni Iradukunda Bertrand wavuye muri Mukura Victory Sports, Beya Beya Hervé wavuye muri AS Maniema, Nzitonda Eric wavuye muri Gicumbi FC, Bugingo Hakim wakinaga muri Rwamagana City FC n’umunyezamu Mfashingabo Didier wa Etoile de l’Est.
Muri iki gihe abakurikirana uruganda rwa sinema ku Isi bari gutembagazwa n’abana bo muri Nigeria kubera uburyo bigana ibyakinnwe muri filime; bakifashisha ibikoresho bisanzwe byo mu rugo.
Muri iki gihe abakurikirana uruganda rwa sinema ku Isi bari gutembagazwa n’abana bo muri Nigeria kubera uburyo bigana ibyakinnwe muri filime; bakifashisha ibikoresho bisanzwe byo mu rugo.
Ni abana bafite ubuhanga buhambaye kandi muri bike bafite bakagerageza kubyaza umusaruro impano yabo yo gusetsa.
Ikorodu Bois ni itsinda ry’abantu bo mu muryango umwe; barimo Muiz Sanni, w’imyaka 15, Malik Sanni ufite 10 ndetse na mubyara wabo w’imyaka 13 witwa Fawas Aina.
Bafashwa na mukuru wabo witwa Babatunde Sanni w’imyaka 23 utunganya amashusho y’ibyo baba bakoze akabishyira kuri Twitter na Instagram.
Iri tsinda ryatangiye kwamamara muri Mata uyu mwaka ubwo basubiragamo filime ‘Money Heist’ yari igezweho muri icyo gihe.
Ryerekanye ko iyo bigeze ku guhanga udushya bitagombera kuba ufite amafaranga menshi.
Muri iyi filime aho bakoresheje telefoni z’umugozi mu guhamagara, bo bakoresha télécommande imeze nkazo, aho bambara masque, bo bambara ingofero bakayigeza mu maso, aho bambara ecouteur, bo bahimba izikozwe mu bikombe gutyo gutyo.
Ahakoreshwamo imodoka bo bakoresha igipupe cyayo, ahakoreshwa igisasu giturika umuriro ukaka bo barawucana bakoresheje ibikarito gutyo gutyo.
Batangiye gusangiza abantu amashusho y’ibyo bakora mu 2017.
Babatunde Sanni yabwiye CNN ko babitekereje nyuma yo kubona ko abantu bakeneye guseka binyuze mu byo bakora.
Ati “Inzu yacu imeze nk’inzu y’urwenya.
Turakina cyane.
Naratekereje nti kuki ibi bintu twirirwa dukora hano mu rugo tutabisangiza Isi?
Ni ukubera iki tutabisangiza abantu ku mbuga nkoranyambaga?
Aba bana bakomoka mu Mujyi wa Ikorodu muri Nigeria, bafite abantu babakurikira kuri Instagram barenga ibihumbi 700.
Ibyamamare birimo LeBron James wamamaye cyane muri Basketball n’umuraperi Roddy Ricch bagiye babereka ko babashyigikiye bagasangiza ababakurikira amashusho yabo.
Aba basore mu cyimbo cyo gukoresha imodoka ahenze n’ibindi byifashishwa muri filime, bo bakoresha ingorofani, amasahani, ibiyiko n’ibindi.
Iyo hari ubufasha bashaka bafashwa n’umuryango wabo cyangwa se abaturanyi.
Ubu ntabwo baratangira kwinjiza amafaranga ariko hari igihe bahabwa inkunga biturutse ku bantu baba bishimiye ibyo bakora.
Batangiye gukabya inzozi!
Aba bana bamaze kwigana filime zitandukanye zirimo ‘Bad Boys for Life’ yakinnyemo Will Smith, ‘Money Heist’ yanatumye ubwamamare bwabo butumbagira, ‘Jumanji: The Next Level’ ndetse iherutse ni ‘Extraction’.
Nyuma yo kwigana ‘Extraction’ bashimwe bikomeye na Chris Hemsworth uri mu bakoze iyi filime na Russo Brothers bahise babemera kuzajya i Hollywood mu gihe iyi filime izaba iri kwerekanwa.

Abatekereza b’amateka y’u Rwanda n’abayatekererezwa, bakunze gutangarira ibikorwa by’umwami Kigeli Rwabugili, wazengereje amahanga, akayagusha ruhabo, kugeza ubwo ashaririwe no kumva izina “Rwanda’’ mu matwi yabo.
Abatekereza b’amateka y’u Rwanda n’abayatekererezwa, bakunze gutangarira ibikorwa by’umwami Kigeli Rwabugili, wazengereje amahanga, akayagusha ruhabo, kugeza ubwo ashaririwe no kumva izina “Rwanda’’ mu matwi yabo.
Muri iki gice cy’uruhererekane rw’inkuru twise “Ibigwi n’ibirindiro’’ Aho tuzajya tubakusanyiriza amateka y’ibihangange byabaye mu rwa Gasabo bifite ibikorwa bikomeye, tugiye kubavunguriraho gato ku bigwi n’ibirindiro by’umwami Kigeli Rwabugili, dore ko utabikuyeho akamanyu nibura gato gato, utashobora kubiva imuzi ngo ubigere imuzingo.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahaya igitinyiro’’ cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere ku Muco, ubusizi n’amateka, tugiye kubatekerereza bimwe mu bigwi n’ibirindiro by’umwami Kigeli Rwabugili, aho tubimburiye ku bigwi bye mu gitero cy’imigogo, na n’ubu kikirahirwa n’amahanga, by’umwihariko abakigabweho b’Abanyankore b’Abahinda.
Mu gitero cyiswe icy’Imigogo Rwabugili yagabye muri Nkore, cyabaye mu gihe Abanyaburayi bari batangiye gusesekara muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ngo bayikoronize, icyo gihe agace k’igihugu cya Uganda Nkore yabarizwagamo kari karatangiye kugendagendwamo n’Abongereza barimo kwiga inzira bazanyuramo batangira kuhakoroniza no kuhasakaza ibikorwa byabo.
Mu Rwanda ho bari bakihasunasuna byo kuhatinya kubera amateka yaho y’abayobozi n’abaturage b’indwanyi.
Impano za mbere Abongereza bahaye Abanyankore ni imbunda n’amasasu yo kwirwanaho bahashya umwanzi ubashotoye.
Zimwe mu mbunda Abanyankore bari bafite ni izo bitaga ‘Makoba’.
Izo mbunda babahaye zigera ku 300 nizo zabashutse batangira kwigerezaho ngo bagiye gutera u Rwanda rwabazengereje imyaka myinshi, dore ko hari ikindi gitero Rwabugili yari aherutse kubagabaho mu myaka ibiri yari ishize, ni ukuvuga mu wa 1892.
Bitewe nuko ibice byo mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda byari byaramaze kwigarurirwa burundu n’u Rwanda, icyari kiraje ishinga Rwabugili, ni ibihugu byo mu Burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda byari bitarigarurirwa ibindi byigaruriwe n’ababanjirije Rwabugili, byaratangiye kwigomeka.
Abanyankore bari batangiye kwiga uburyo bagaba ibitero by’ubushotoranyi ku Rwanda, bikaba n’uburyo bwo kubihimuraho kuko bari barabumvishije mu gitero cyaherukaga.
Ubushotoranyi bwakozwe na Ntare IV Rugingiza rwa Migereka umwami wa Nkore watwaraga icyo gihe, aho yambutse umupaka aza kunyaga Inyambo z’i Rwanda, agatwika ingoro ya Rwabugili yari i Rutaraka muri Nyagatare.
Icyo gihe Rwabugili yari yaragabye ibitero mu Burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda ku Ijwi ryari ryarigometse, arabimenya ko umwami wa Nkore Ntare Rugingiza rwa Migereka yamuteye akanyaga Inka ze zari Rutaraka muri Nyagatare.
Umugenga wazo Kinyamakara cya Ndezi ari na we wayoboraga ingoro ya Rwabugili yari i Rutaraka mu Ndorwa, yari mu ruzinduko, nuko banyaga inka za Rwabugili n’umwe mu baja be barimo Nyiranziza muka Mpore ya Semandira.
Umutasi wabanje gutatira Ntare yari umuhungu we Muhanika wa Ntare.
Amakuru y’icyo gitero cy’Abanyankore, Rwabugili yayabariwe n’ umuhima Bukomangando wabaciye mu rihumye akabonera akito kuri ibyo bitero ko kwihakirwa kuri Rwabugili, kuko yari amuziho ubuhangange n’ubudatsindwa.
Rwabugili uburakari buramusaba yibaza uko ari bubigenze abifatira ingamba, kuko ntabwo yagombaga kugaruka igitero cyo ku Ijwi atagisoje.
Yaje gutegura igitero cyagabwe ku Banyankore muri Gashyantare umwaka wa 1894, cyiswe “Igitero cy’Imigogo" kuko cyitabiriwe n’Imitwe ibiri y’Ingabo z’Abanyankore zitwa: "Ingogo n’imigogo".
Umwami Kigeli Rwabugili wari i Bunyabungo n’Ingabo ze, yabanje kohereza yo Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje, n’umutwe yari ayoboye witwaga “ Ibisumizi" .
Mu gushyika aho urugerero rw’Abanyankore rwari rukambitse i Kagitumba, Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje yasanze atari ukunyaga Inka gusa, ahubwo biteguye no kurwana.
Nyamuhenda n’Ibisumizi, bakabona Abanyankore barimo bohereza mu kirere ibintu biturika byaka umuriro bikabayobera kuko batari bagasobanukirwa n’imikorere y’imbunda zari zadutse vuba muri Afurika.
Bitewe nuko gusubira inyuma ku rugamba no kuruhunga bitari mu ndangagaciro z’Abanyarwanda, biyemeje kururwana, nubwo babonaga harimo udushya twinshi turimo n’imbunda zitari zimenyerewe muri aka karere.
Icyo gitero Abanyankore bagabye mu Rwanda, nicyo kiswe mu mateka y’u Rwanda na Nkore “Ehururu ya Rwanda".
Urugamba rwaremeye mu Kibande cya Ruhumba rwa Kiyojo.
Nyamuhenda n’Ibisumizi yari ayoboye, Abanyankore bahabarasira kubamara kuko bo bari bakirwanisha imiheto n’imyambi, abandi bafite imyuko iruka umuriro!
Nyamuhenda abonye ko Ingabo zigiye kumushirana, aravunura ahagarika urugamba ajya guhamagaza indi mitwe y’ingabo.
Nuko atanga ubutumwa ibukuru aho Rwabugili yari, amutangariza amacumu y’urugamba.
Rwabugili yazibiranyijwe n’uburakari butagira ingano, bitewe n’agasuzuguro kangana gutyo Abanyankore basuzuguye u Rwanda none bakaba bagiye no gutsindwa urugamba rwo kubarwanya, bitarigeze bibaho mu mateka y’abami b’u Rwanda.
Rwabugili yafashe imitwe y’Ingabo yose yari ku Ijwi n’i Bunyabungo yageraga kuri 30, ahamagaza n’indi yari inyanyangiye ku ngerero zitandukanye hirya no hino mu gihugu yose igera kuri 50, baravunura batera Nkore.
Bageze i Rutaraka ku ngoro ya Rwabugili, basanga harabaye amatongo, bahicara umwanya munini biga imigendekere y’urugamba bagiyemo.
Abanyankore babonye Ingabo z’uruvunganzoka z’Abanyarwanda, zitangiye kubanyanyagiramo, batangira gushya ubwoba, ariko birema agatima ku bwo kwiringira imbunda bari bafite kandi bibwiraga ko Abanyarwanda bari bataragera ku ikoranabuhanga nk’iryo.
Abanyankore batangira kurasa mu kirere no gukanga kwinshi, ariko Abanyarwanda barimo kubiga no kwitegereza ibyo barimo.
Rwabugili akitegereza iyo myuko yohereza imiriro mu kirere, niko kubaza Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje, ati “Ko ndeba bariya Banyankore bohereza imiriro mu kirere, kandi nkaba mbona igera ku butaka yazimye, babicishije iki ?
Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje, amutekerereza uburyo bagiye bakabahagarara imbere bahanganye nk’abagiye kurasana nk’uko bisanzwe mu mirwanire ya gakondo, noneho batangira kubarasa mu mutwe no mu gituza abantu batangira kwikubita hasi n’intwaro zabo, ari nako urushunzi rw’amaraso rwisuka ku butaka, bapfa umusubizo.
Mu gice gikurikira, tuzabaramburira imigendekere y’urwo rugamba rwongereye ibigwi bya Rwabugili n’igitinyiro cy’u Rwanda kirushaho kwiyongera….
Nyuma y’iminsi amashuri mu gihugu cya Tanzania yarafunzwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, kuri uyu wa Mbere yongeye gufungurwa nk’uko biri mu mabwiriza yatanzwe na Perezida John Magufuli.
Nyuma y’iminsi amashuri mu gihugu cya Tanzania yarafunzwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, kuri uyu wa Mbere yongeye gufungurwa nk’uko biri mu mabwiriza yatanzwe na Perezida John Magufuli.
Umwanzuro wa Magufuli watumye Tanzania iba igihugu cya mbere muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba gifunguye amashuri n’ibintu bihuza abantu benshi nyuma yo kubifunga mu mezi atatu ashize, kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Nubwo amashuri yasubukuwe, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri icyo gihugu yasabye ko ku bigo by’amashuri hakomeza gushyirwaho uburyo bwo kwirinda nko gushyiraho ahantu ho gukarabira mbere yo kwinjira mu bigo n’ibindi.
Ibigo by’amashuri byari byagiye byifashishwa mu kwakira abakekwaho coronavirus, Minisiteri y’ubuzima yasabye ko haterwa imiti yica udukoko mbere y’uko amashuri afungurwa.
Ibigo kandi byasabwe gukora ubukangurambaga bugamije kumvisha abanyeshuri impamvu zo kwirinda icyo cyorezo.
Muri buri shuri, buri somero ry’ibitabo, buri buriro, aho abanyeshuri baryama, mu bwiherero, mu biro n’ahandi hifashishwa n’abanyeshuri, amashuri yasabwe kuhashyira uburyo bwo gukaraba mbere yo kwinjira.
Colonel Muammar al-Gaddafi, ni umwe mu bagabo b’abanyapolitiki bakomeye Isi yagize ariko basize amateka avangavanze, aho kuri bamwe afatwa nk’intwari mu gihe abandi bamufata nk’umwiyemezi, umunyagitugu n’andi mazina amutwerera kuba nyirabayazana w’irimbuka rye.
Colonel Muammar al-Gaddafi, ni umwe mu bagabo b’abanyapolitiki bakomeye Isi yagize ariko basize amateka avangavanze, aho kuri bamwe afatwa nk’intwari mu gihe abandi bamufata nk’umwiyemezi, umunyagitugu n’andi mazina amutwerera kuba nyirabayazana w’irimbuka rye.
Gaddafi yayoboye Libya imyaka isaga 40, yubaka izina imbere mu gihugu no hanze yacyo nk’umwe mu banyagitugu bahizwe kenshi n’amahanga akamubura.
Ni umugabo wari warakangaranyije byinshi mu bihugu byo ku Isi, byagera muri Afurika ho bikaba ibindi bindi kuko uwerekanaga ku mugaragaro ko atamushyigikiye, yashoboraga kumugirira nabi akoresheje ubushobozi yari afite.
Ambasaderi Prof Joseph Nsengimana ni umwe mu bahagarariye u Rwanda mu Muryango wa Afurika yunze Ubumwe mu gihe Gaddafi yari mu marembera.
Prof Nsengimana guhera Nzeri 2009 kugeza mu 2014 aho yari ahagarariye u Rwanda mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU) anaruhagarariye Addis Abeba muri Ethiopia.
Yaruhagarariye muri AU avuye kuruhagararira i New York mu Muryango w’Abibumbye aho yageze mu 2006.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 70 wanabaye Umujyanama wihariye wa Perezida kuva mu 2000 kugeza 2006, iyo myaka yamaze muri dipolomasi yamuhaye kumenya byimbitse imiyoborere itandukanye ku Isi irimo n’iya Gaddafi utaravugwaho rumwe.
Yateze utwuma dufata amajwi intumwa z’u Rwanda
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bitiyumvisemo cyane Libya, by’umwihariko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Prof Nsengimana yavuze ko ahanini byashingiraga kuri iyo myitwarire ya Gaddafi yo gushaka kwigira mpatsibihugu.
U Rwanda rwashyigikiye umugambi w’Akanama gashinzwe amahoro ka Loni wo gukora ibishoboka byose muri Libya hakagaruka amahoro, igikorwa cyari gishyigikiwe n’ibihugu birimo u Bufaransa, u Bwongereza na Qatar cyaje gusiga Gaddafi yishwe.
Uruhande u Rwanda rwafashe rufite impamvu.
Hari amakuru yizewe IGIHE ifite y’uko ahagana mu 2010, Polisi y’u Rwanda yatahuye ko hari intwaro muri Ambasade ya Libya mu Rwanda zashoboraga kwifashishwa mu bikorwa bimwe na bimwe byo gutera ama-gerenade mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Umwe mu bakozi b’iyi Ambasade niwe watanze aya makuru, hanyuma Polisi ikoze iperereza izitahura muri iyo nyubako.
Mu kiganiro Archives du Rwanda gitambuka kuri IGIHE, Prof Nsengima yavuze ko imyitwarire ya Gaddafi yatangiye kurakaza u Rwanda ubwo yategaga utwuma dufata amajwi intumwa zarwo zirimo na Perezida Pasteur Bizimungu.
Nubwo Nsengimana atibuka neza igihe byabereye, mu isesengura IGIHE yakoze yasanze bishobora kuba byarabaye muri Nzeri 1999, ubwo Gaddafi yizihizaga imyaka 30 amaze ahiritse ubutegetsi.
Intumwa z’u Rwanda zitabiriye ibyo birori nk’abandi batumirwa, bageze muri Libya Perezida Bizimungu ahabwa inzu yo gucumbikamo nk’uko bigenda ku bakuru b’ibihugu.
Iyo nzu ni nayo yahuriragamo intumwa zamuherekeje mu gihe hagiye gukorwa nk’inama.
Umunsi wo kugaruka mu Rwanda, baje kuvumbura ko bari baratezwe utwumwa dufata amajwi (recorders).
Ati “Yaje (Gaddafi) no kudusura muri iyo nzu.
Umunsi wo gutaha basubiyeyo kureba ibyo bari bibagiriwe mu nzu basanga bari gushwanyuza intebe bakuramo utwuma dufata amajwi.
Rero ikintu nk’icyo kikwereka uwo yari we.
Akenshi iyo umuntu ari mu nzu arisanzura akavuga icyo atekereza.
Prof Nsengimana yabajijwe niba nta ngaruka u Rwanda rwaba rwarahuye nazo nyuma kubera ayo majwi yari yafashwe, asubiza ati “Nta wamenya ariko ibyo ni ibintu hagati y’abakuru b’ibihugu bidakorwa, iyo ubibonye gutyo bituma umenya uwo muntu uwo ari we.
" Prof Nsengimana yasobanuye ko Gaddafi utavuga ko yari akunzwe cyangwa yanzwe na bose muri Afurika, ari nayo mpamvu igihe ibihugu byafataga umwanzuro wo gushyigikira abashaka kumuhirika, byinshi bya Afurika byamwihoreye.
Ati “Ku banyafurika bamwe babyakiriye uko biri, ariko bavuga bati n’ubundi ntacyo yari kuzatumarira kuko yazanagamo ayo macakubiri muri AU.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Financial Times mu 2017, Perezida Paul Kagame yavuze ko Gaddafi yahoraga yifuza kugaragara nk’umwami wa Afurika, agasuzugura abandi.
Yagize ati “Colonel Gaddafi yari umuntu mubi.
Njye nakundaga gushwana nawe kurusha undi muntu uwo ariwe wese.
Yifuzaga kugaragara nk’umwami wa Afurika ubundi agategeka abandi ababwira ibyo bagomba gukora.
Hari ubwo numvaga kubyihanganira binaniye.
Perezida Kagame yagaragaje uko hari ubwo Gaddafi yajyaga amwita umukozi w’ibihugu bikomeye ku Isi, inshuti y’Abanyamerika n’Abongereza, ibihugu bitacanaga uwaka na Gaddafi.
Yakomeje agira ati “Naramubwiye, njyewe uko nteye, mu buzima bwanjye, uko nakuze, ntabwo njya nifuza kuba umugaragu w’undi muntu, bivuze ngo urakorera mu nyungu ze, ntabwo uri kwikorera.
Ubwo Gaddafi yari amaze kuva ku butegetsi, mu 2012 u Rwanda rwinjiye mu kanama gashinzwe amahoro n’umutekano muri Loni ruranakayobora.
Rwitabiriye kenshi inama ziga ku bibazo bya Libya n’uburyo igihugu cyasubirana nyuma ya Gaddafi.
Gaddafi ibihugu byamubonaga ugutandukanye Prof Nsengimana yavuze ko urebye neza wasanga Gaddafi ntaho yari atandukaniye na mpatsibihugu kuko aho yageraga hose yabaga ashaka kwerekana imbaraga.
Prof Nsengimana yagize ati “Yari afite icyerecyezo yavugaga ko ashakira Afurika ariko icyo cyerecyezo cyari gishingiye ku cyifuzo cye cyo kuba igihangange muri Afurika.
Ntabwo yari ku neza ya Afurika kuko yabanje gushaka kuyobora Umuryango uhuza ibihugu by’Abarabu, agenda ashaka kwerekana ubuhangange bwe Abarabu baramunanira, nibwo yaje kubishakira muri Afurika.
Yavuze ko aho yageraga hose yashakaga kuyobora, bikarushaho kuba bibi kuko yashakaga guhanganisha ubuhange bwe n’ubw’abazungu.
Ibyo bigaragarira mu 1988, ubwo yagiraga uruhare mu ihanurwa ry’indege y’Abanyaburayi muri Ecosse igahitana abantu 259 mu cyiswe ‘Lockerbie bombing’.
Nubwo bakomeje kumuhiga bakamubura, Prof Nsengimana avuga ko abanyaburayi batigeze bibagirwa icyo gikorwa.
Ibyo byatumye umubare w’abamuhiga n’abamwanga ukomeza kuba mwinshi.
Ambasaderi Nsengimana avuga ko hari ubwo Gaddafi yigeze kujya i Addis Abeba ku cyicaro cy’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU), agasanga abadipolomate bahaba batabayeho neza akiyemeza kubafasha ariko icyicaro cya AU kikimukira mu Mujyi wa Sirte muri Libya.
Ati “Ubwabyo byari uguteranya abanyafurika.
Ibyo byose byatumaga atumvikana cyane muri AU kandi bishingiye ku bifatika.
Hari n’ibihugu yategekaga, byaba bitumviye agahirika ubutegetsi nko muri Tchad.
“Ibintu bya mpatsibihugu byari bimurimo, icyo ashatse nicyo yumvaga igihugu kigomba gukora niba kitagikoze bagahangana akoresheje ubushobozi yari afite.
Ambasaderi Prof Nsengimana yavuze ko kuba nyuma ya Gaddafi harabaye imvururu muri Libya, byasaga nk’ibyigaragaza na mbere hose ukurikije imiyoborere yamuranze.
Kugeza ubu haracyari ikibazo cy’intambara muri Libya aho Guverinoma yemewe ku rwego mpuzamahanga ibarizwa i Tripoli ihanganye n’ingabo za General Khalifa Haftar kandi buri ruhande hakaba hari ibihugu by’amahanga birushyigikiye.
Nsengimana yemeza ko nubwo hakiri intambara, Guverinoma yemewe ifite amahirwe yo gutsinda.
Ati “Ibintu biragenda bijya mu buryo, Haftar imbaraga ze ziragenda zikendera.
Arimo atakaza Sirte, n’imbaraga zamushyigikiraga ndakeka ko ugereranyije n’izo Leta yemewe ifite, Leta yemewe iragenda igira imbaraga.
Col Muammar Gaddafi yayoboye Libya kuva mu 1969 aza kwicwa ku wa 20 Ukwakira 2011 n’ingabo zari zirangajwe imbere n’ibihugu bikomeye.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa 16 Kamena 2020, yatanze iminsi 15 kugira ngo hazafatwe icyemezo ku ngingo yo kongera kwemerera abayoboke b’amadini atandukanye guterana.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa 16 Kamena 2020, yatanze iminsi 15 kugira ngo hazafatwe icyemezo ku ngingo yo kongera kwemerera abayoboke b’amadini atandukanye guterana.
Kuva mu minsi ishize, hari ibiganiro biri kuba hagati y’Ihuriro ry’Amadini n’Amatorero mu Rwanda, RIC na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda harebwa niba koko amadini yiteguye kongera gukora ariko yubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus.
Nubwo ibi biganiro bikomeje ariko ubusesenguzi buzakorwa ku buryo icyorezo gihagaze mu Rwanda nibwo buzatanga ishusho niba insengero zemererwa gukomorerwa.
Mu kiganiro Urubuga rw’Itangazamakuru, Dr Ngamije Daniel, yavuze ko hari ibiganiro Guverinoma izafata umwanzuro ku ifungurwa ry’insengero yamaze kureba uko icyorezo cya COVID-19 kizaba kimeze mu gihugu.
Yagize ati “Hari ibiganiro birimo hagati ya Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Urwego rw’Imiyoborere, RGB n’abanyamadini batandukanye.
Hari ibyo basabwe kunoza baracyabiganiraho igihe nikigera bazahabwa amabwiriza akwiriye hakurikije icyo amakuru azaba atubwira.
Yakomeje ati “Niba se nko muri Kigali muri kubona turi gushyira imidugudu itandatu mu muhezo urumva ko ibyo byose bikwiye gushyirwa hamwe kugira ngo imyanzuro izafatwe ikwiriye igihe cyayo kigeze.
Minisitiri Dr Ngamije yijeje ko guverinoma izakomeza kwigana ubushishozi uko COVID-19 gihagaze kugira ngo n’ibindi bikorwa bitarafungurwa bikomorerwe.
Mu madini imyiteguro irarimbanyije
Nubwo amadini ataramenya niba azakomorerwa cyangwa niba azakomeza gufunga, insengero nyinshi ziganjemo iza Kiliziya Gatolika zatangiye gukorwamo impinduka zizabafasha gusenga bubahirije amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19.
Mu myiteguro yo kongera kwakira abayoboke bayo, Kiliziya Gatolika yatangiye gushyiraho ibimenyetso bigaragaza uburyo abakirisitu bashobora kuzajya bahana intera mu gihe baje mu misa.
Ibi bimenyetso bigaragara hanze ya za kiliziya ndetse n’imbere ku buryo abazajya gusenga bazajya bicara cyangwa bagahagarara bahanye intera ya metero hafi ebyiri.
Uretse guhagarara bahanye intera Padiri Mukuru wa Paruwasi ya Regina Pacis, Ntagungira Jean Bosco, mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko bamaze gutegura uburyo buri mukirisitu uzajya mu misa azajya yambara agapfukamunwa, abanze gusuzumwa umuriro, akarabe intoki hakoreshejwe umuti wica udukoko (hand Sanitizer), yinjire mu kiliziya yicare ahateganye n’ikimenyetso kiri kuri buri ntebe.
Padiri Ntagungira avuga buri mukirisitu uzajya uza gusenga gomba kutwiza agapapuro kariho amazina ye na nimero z’irangamuntu.
Mu gihe imyiteguro irimbanyije muri Kiliziya gatolika andi madini nayo yatangiye gutera intambwe zigana muri iyi nzira, agaragaza uko yiteguye kwakira abayoboke bayo nakomorerwa.

Byabaye mu ijoro ryo ku wa Gatandatu tariki 27 Kamena 2020.
Amakuru atangwa n’inzego z’ibanze avuga ko icyo gitero cyagabwe n’abarwanyi ba FDLR.
Ikinyamakuru Actualité kivuga ko abatuye agace ka Fizi badatuje kubera imitwe yitwaje intwaro yaba ituruka imbere mu gihugu no mu mahanga, ihakorera.
Umuyobozi wa Lulenge, Samuel Mulumba, yamaganye ibitero by’abantu bitwaje intwaro mu gace ke, ahamagarira ingabo kurinda umutekano w’abantu n’imitungo yabo.
FDLR imaze igihe ikorera muri iki gihugu.
Ishinjwa ibikorwa by’ubugizi bwa nabi birimo ubwicanyi, gufata abagore ku ngufu, ubujura n’ibindi bibangamiye umutekano w’abaturage.

Nyuma y’igiterane cyabaye kuri iki Cyumweru, Umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Moshi uherereye mu Majyaruguru ya Tanzania ibyo byabereyemo, Kippi Warioba, yavuze ko atewe impungenge n’uko umubare w’abapfuye ushobora gukomeza kwiyongera biturutse kuri uwo mubyigano.
Ati “Kugeza ubu abantu 20 bapfuye ariko imibare ishobora kwiyongera kuko hari abakomeretse.
" Abakomeretse habarurwa 16.
Ibyo byago byabaye ubwo abantu benshi bari bitabiriye igiterane cyayobowe n’umupasiteri ukunzwe cyane muri icyo gihugu, Boniface Mwamposa, uyoboye itorero Arise and Shine Ministry ryo muri Tanzania.
Jennifer Temu wari muri ayo materaniro yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abafaransa, AFP, ko ikibazo cyaje kuvuka ubwo Mwamposa wiyita intumwa y’Imana, "Apôtre", yasukaga ibyo yise amavuta yera hasi abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo.

Sosiyete y’itumanaho MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko guhera kuwa 3 Kamena 2020, itangira korohereza abamotari kwishyurwa hifashishijwe uburyo bwa MoMoPay, mu gushyigikira ingamba za Leta y’u Rwanda zo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu guhererekanya amafaranga, hirindwa coronavirus.
Sosiyete y’itumanaho MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko guhera kuwa 3 Kamena 2020, itangira korohereza abamotari kwishyurwa hifashishijwe uburyo bwa MoMoPay, mu gushyigikira ingamba za Leta y’u Rwanda zo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu guhererekanya amafaranga, hirindwa coronavirus.
Ubu buryo kandi MTN Rwanda ibutangije nyuma y’amabwiriza yatanzwe n’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere, RURA rusaba abamotari bose kwishyurwa hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga.
Binyuze muri MoMoPay, abagenzi bazajya babasha kwishyura abamotari amafaranga y’urugendo mu buryo bworoshye kandi bwizewe.
Gukoresha ubwo buryo birasaba gukanda *182*8*1#, ugashyiramo kode umumotari akoresha kuri MoMoPay ubundi ushyiremo amafaranga y’urugendo ugiye kumwishyura wemeze.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi muri MTN Rwanda, Chantal Kagame yavuze ko MTN Rwanda yiyemeje kuba ku isonga mu guteza imbere ihererekanya ry’amafaranga ryifashishije ikoranabuhanga no gukumira icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Yagize ati “Twishimiye gufasha abamotari kwakira amafaranga yabo bifashishije MoMoPay.
Mu gihe twubahiriza ingamba zashyizweho na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, twiyemeje kugendana na gahunda y’igihugu yo kudahererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko mu gukomeza gushishikariza abamotari gukoresha ubwo buryo bishyurwa, hagiye kujya hatangwa ibihembo kabiri mu cyumweru ku bahiga abandi mu kubukoresha.
Ibihembo bazahabwa bizaba birimo moto nshyashya, casques, kugabanyirizwa ibiciro ku bikomoka kuri peteroli moto zabo zikoresha kuri sitasiyo za lisansi n’ibindi.
MTN Rwanda kandi yiyemeje gufasha abamotari kubona udupfukamunwa tuzajya dutangirwa kuri sitasiyo za lisansi zitandukanye zikorana na MTN mu mujyi wa Kigali.
MTN Rwanda kandi mu bufatanya na banki ya NCBA, yiyemeje gutanga inguzanyo ku bakiliya bayo muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda icyorezo hifashishijwe MoKash, mu bo iyo nguzanyo igenewe harimo n’abamotari.
Ku bari barafashe inguzanyo bakananirwa kuyishyura mu gihe cy’iminsi 30 yagenwe, MTN Rwanda na NCBA babakuriyeho amande y’ubukererwe ndetse bongererwa indi minsi 30 yo kuba bishyuye.
Umukiliya utabashije kwishyura ideni rye mu minsi 60 cyangwa 90, ntabwo azajya agabanyirizwa ingano y’amafaranga yemerewe kuguza nkuko byari bisanzwe.
Mu gihe kandi inguzanyo ntarengwa igiye kugabanywa, umukiliya azajya ahabwa iminsi 30 yo kwitegura.
MoKash ni uburyo bwo kubitsa, kubikuza no kugurizwa buboneka kuri MTN Rwanda ukanze *182*5#).
Inguzanyo yo kuri MoKash yishyurwa mu gihe cy’iminsi 30, hiyongereyeho inyungu ya 9 %, naho uwabikijeho amafaranga yungukirwa 7 % ku mwaka.
Hashize imyaka 929 (1091-2020) u Rwanda rubaye igihugu gihamye gituwe na bene Kanyarwanda.
Amateka y’igihugu cyacu muri iki kinyagihumbi gishize ni maremare bitavugwa, dore ko rwayobowe n’abami 28 bafatanyije n’abagabekazi 27 kuva mu 1091 kugera mu 1961 mu gihe cy’akaga kiswe ’revolisiyo’, ubwo ingoma ya cyami yasimburwaga na Repubulika.
Hashize imyaka 929 (1091-2020) u Rwanda rubaye igihugu gihamye gituwe na bene Kanyarwanda.
Amateka y’igihugu cyacu muri iki kinyagihumbi gishize ni maremare bitavugwa, dore ko rwayobowe n’abami 28 bafatanyije n’abagabekazi 27 kuva mu 1091 kugera mu 1961 mu gihe cy’akaga kiswe ’revolisiyo’, ubwo ingoma ya cyami yasimburwaga na Repubulika.
Hifashishijwe ibisigo by’Abasizi bisingiza Abami n’ingoma zabo ndetse n’Abacurabwenge bari abarinzi b’amateka n’intekerezo z’igihugu, hiyongereyeho n’Abiru bari abanyamabanga n’abagaragu b’ingoma, hakusanyijwe amateka y’u Rwanda kuva mu ntango yarwo ubwo Gihanga I Ngomijana yashyiragaho imfatiro z’igihugu kugera ubwo Ingoma cya cyami yasimburwaga na Repubulika.
Mu bakoreye mu ngata Gihanga I Ngomijana harimo ubuvivi bwe Ndoba watwaye u Rwanda ahasaga mu wa 1213 kugera 1246 arangwa n’ibitekerezo bihanitse mu bumenyi mu by’ibidukikije, inyamaswa n’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Muri make Ndoba yari afite ubuhanga karemano muri siyansi, dore ko ari nawe dukesha ibirangamuryango nko kuba Abasinga barangwa na Sakabaka, Abashambo bakarangwa n’Intare, Abenengwe bakarangwa n’Ingwe mu gihe Abega barangwa n’Ibikeri, byose ni we tubikesha.
Hari kandi na Ruganzu Bwimba watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1312 kugera mu 1345 wabaye imbimbuzi mu ndwanyi zaranze amateka y’u Rwanda mu guhirimbanira ubuhangange bw’igihugu.
Niwe wagabye igitero cya mbere atera Gisaka yashakaga gusibanganya u Rwanda we arayitanga arayitera.
Ni we dukesha kurwanira ishyaka igihugu, cyane cyane mu guhangana n’abagomera umurage wa Gihanga w’igihugu gisangiwe.
Nta n’uwarenza ingohe Cyilima Rugwe, watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1345 kugera mu 1378, umutekerereza w’ubutabera bwunga mu mateka y’u Rwanda.
Ni we washyizeho Inkiko z’Umuryango, iz’Abunzi n’iza Gacaca agena n’uko ibihano bizajya bitangwa ku bagomye.
Yashakaga ko u Rwanda ruba igihugu kizira icyaha, abyubakira ku guhana igihango nk’uburyo bwo gukumira icyaha kitaraba.
Nta n’uwakwibagirwa Ruganzu II Ndoli, watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1510 kugera mu 1543 wari indwanyi karundura, wadukanye amatwara yo guhangana n’amahanga adakunda u Rwanda akayagusha ruhabo, akarwagura kurusha abandi bami bose dore ko yarwometseho ibihugu icyenda.
Hari inzobere kandi muri dipolomasi Mutara Semugeshi, watwaye u Rwanda mu 1543 kugera mu 1576, ni we mwami dukesha politiki ya mbere y’ububanyi n’amahanga, yubatse kandi imiyoborere ihamye mu kwegereza ubuyobozi abaturage aho yashyizeho inzego zisaga 75 nk’Intebe y’Abasizi, Abatware b’Ubutaka, Abatware b’Inyambo, Intebe y’Abahaditsi (abavuzi b’amatungo - vétérinaire), Intebe y’Abahoryo (Agronome), Intebe y’Abamotsi (abari bashinzwe itangazamakuru ry’ibwami) n’izindi.
Ni we washyizeho uburyo bw’imisimburanire y’Abami ku ngoma bijyanye n’inshingano zabo nk’aho Umwami Mutara yabaga ashinzwe kwagura ubworozi bw’inka yakurikirwaga na Kigeli wari umwami w’intambara, Mibambwe wari ushinzwe uburumbuke, Yuhi wari umwami usigasira amahoro bityo bityo.
Ntitwakwibagirwa n’abandi nka Cyilima Rujugira (1675 – 1708), wadukanye intero y’u Rwanda rutera rudaterwa, Yuhi Gahindiro (1746-1802) wazanye gahunda z’ubugiraneza nka Girinka na Kigeli Rwabugili (1859-1895) wacecekesheje ibihugu byashakaga kwiyomora ku Rwanda.
Mu mateka y’Isi n’ibihangange byayibayemo nk’Abami b’u Rwanda, benshi baburiwe irengero, amasura yabo aribagirana kuko nta buryo bwariho bwo gufata amafoto no kuyashyingura ariko ibikorwa byabo bikaba bikibukwa kuko basize imusozi amavugwa y’ibikorwa bihanitse.
Umushakashatsi ku mateka y’u Rwanda, Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, yahereye aho maze akusanya ibitekerezo by’ubuzima bwaranze aba bakurambere, yifashisha abahanga mu gushushanya bahanga amafoto y’abami b’u Rwanda, cyane umwami wa mbere wafotowe yari Kigeli Rwabugili mu 1894, abandi bamubanjirije ntawe uzi neza uko basaga.
Aya mafoto mpangano y’Abami b’u Rwanda n’Abagabekazi babo, yakozwe n’umunyabugeni Mugisha Paul wize ku Nyundo, yashyizwe hanze bwa mbere mu gitabo ‘‘Intwari z’Imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro" cyasohotse muri Gicurasi 2018.
Uko ubumenyi n’ikoranabuhanga bigenda bikwira ku Isi yose rero, abahanga bagiye bitabaza inyurabwenge maze bakazimbura amasura y’abo bantu babayeho mu myaka ibihumbi kugira ngo bajye bayifashisha mu kubavuga ibigwi no kubagiraho icyitegererezo, ariko batari za baringa cyangwa umuntu udashobora kubonwa.
Ni muri urwo rwego hariho amafoto ya Yesu, Mariya, Yozefu, intumwa za Yesu 12, Musa wavanye Abayisiraheli mu Misiri n’abandi.
Nsanzabera avuga ko ‘‘Abo bagize ibikorwa bakora ku Isi n’ubu bikiri intangarirwa, kandi amafoto yabo mpangano akaba yaramamaye mu buryo buhanitse ndetse ntashidikanyweho ko aribo koko.
Nk’abakoze ishusho ya Yezu, icyo bakoze ni ukureba ku bikorwa bye, amateka yamuranze n’imyitwarire ye ku Isi, barema amafoto mpangano ye kugira ngo buri wese ajye abasha kumubona mu buryo bugenekereje.
Mu gushushanya amafoto mpangano agenekereje y’abami b’u Rwanda, hagendewe ku bushakashatsi bushingiye ku bikorwa byabaranze, uruhererekane-mvugo rw’ibyabaye ku ngoma zabo, imishyingiranire y’umuryango w’abami b’u Rwanda n’indi miryango migari y’Abanyarwanda, igenantekerezo (Philosophie) n’imyitwarire yaranze Abami b’u Rwanda ndetse n’ikigero cy’imyaka y’ubukure mu iyimikwa ryabo.
Nsanzabera ati “Ese niba umwami runaka yarakoze ibikorwa bikomeye mu kubaka u Rwanda, aho ntiyasaga atya?
Iyo ni imwe mu ngingo yitaweho cyane mu kugenekereza amafoto y’abami b’u Rwanda.
Kuko kenshi imirimo y’umuntu isa n’isura ye, ikanahamya umutima wamuranze mu bihe byose.
Aya mafoto mpangano yanashingiye ku kigero cy’ubukure cy’abami n’abagabekazi.
Hari aho atandukanye mu kigero cy’ubukure bitewe n’uko hari abagiye bimikwa bafite imyaka ibiri, abari abasore b’ibihame, abahawe ingoma bakiri ingimbi n’abayihawe bakuze cyane.
Ni nako byagenze ku Bagabekazi kuko hari abagiye bapfakara bakiri bato, umwami agatanga, bakiri ibirongore, abandi ugasanga bari bakiri abagore b’amariza n’ibindi.
Intego ya Nsanzabera ni uko ababyifuza bakoresha amafoto mpangano mu nyandiko na filime zirebana n’amateka y’u Rwanda mu kwerekana amashusho y’abami n’abagabekazi.
Aya mafoto ni uburiza bw’andi yaranze u Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye, azasohoka mu bindi bitabo.

Amezi arenga ane arashize Nyampinga w’u Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba, ariko nyuma yo gutorwa ibikorwa yari yiyemeje byakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyibasiye Isi, nubwo avuga ko yatangiye kwiga uburyo bwiza bwo kubishyira mu ngiro.
Uyu mukobwa kuva atangiye kwiyamamaza kugeza yegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda, umushinga we wari ugufasha abantu barwaye agahinda gakabije, bizwi nka ’depression’.
Yavuze ko ari indwara iri mu banyarwanda ariko badakunze kumenya, ku buryo azagerageza kuyirwanya binyuze mu kugaragaza ko ihari n’uburyo abantu bayirinda.
Nyuma y’uko yambitswe ikamba muri Gashyantare 2020, nyuma y’iminsi mike icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyahise kigera mu Rwanda gikoma mu nkokora umushinga yiyemeje.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Miss Nishimwe yagize ati "Nibyo icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyarambangamiye gusa natangiye gutekereza uko nakomeza umushinga wanjye, ndashaka guhura n’abantu barwayeho depression tukagirana ibiganiro bizatambutswa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zanjye, mu rwego rwo kubisangiza abantu.
Uyu mukobwa yongeyeho ko ubu ari mu myiteguro ya nyuma yo gutangira ibi biganiro kuko abo bazabigirana benshi yamaze kubabona, ndetse nyuma yo kumva umushinga we hari benshi bahuye na ’dépression’ bakomeje kumwandikira.
Yakomeje ati “Abo tuzaganira ndabafite kuko nyuma y’uko bamenye umushinga wanjye hari abatangiye kunyandikira n’ubu baracyanyandikira, ndashaka gutangira ibiganiro nabo mu minsi iri imbere bakatuganiriza ku rugendo rwabo kuva barwaye kugeza bakize.
Ntekereza ko ubuhamya bwa bamwe buzafasha abandi"

Guverinoma y’u Rwanda n’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi kuri uyu wa Mbere basinye amasezerano y’inkunga ya miliyoni 52 z’amayero (miliyari 55.
5 Frw) yo gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’ingaruka zatewe n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda n’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi kuri uyu wa Mbere basinye amasezerano y’inkunga ya miliyoni 52 z’amayero (miliyari 55.
5 Frw) yo gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’ingaruka zatewe n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Minisiteri y’Imari n’igenamigambi yatangaje ko ayo mafaranga azifashishwa muri gahunda zigamije kwita ku mibereho myiza y’abaturage no guteza imbere urwego rw’ubuhinzi.
Ku ruhande rwa EU iyo nkunga yatanzwe na Ambasaderi w’uwo muryango mu Rwanda, Nicola Bellomo naho ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda yakirwa na Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana.
Aya mafaranga u Rwanda rwahawe agize inkunga ya miliyoni 460 z’amayero Komisiyo ya EU yemereye u Rwanda muri Nzeri 2014.
Iyo nkunga izafasha Guverinoma y’u Rwanda muri gahunda yayo yo guteza imbere imibereho myiza y’abaturage n’ubuhinzi muri gahunda yayo yo kuzahura ubukungu bwashegeshwe n’ingamba zo kwirinda coronavirus.
Inkunga izashyirwa mu bikorwa bitandukanye byibanda ku bufasha bw’amafaranga n’ibiribwa bigenewe abaturage no guteza imbere ubuhinzi hagamijwe kwihaza mu biribwa.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana yagize ati “Ingaruka za Coronavirus ku bukungu n’imibereho myiza byatumye dufata ingamba zisumbuye zigamije kwihaza mu birindwa, kugabanya ubukene no guteza imbere ubukungu budaheza.
Ubufatanye mu iterambere n’inkunga y’ingoboka EU yageneye u Rwanda mu guhashya coronavirus, igaragaza icyizere n’umubano mwiza uri hagati ya EU na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda.
Ambasaderi wa EU mu Rwanda, Nicola Bellomo yagize ati “Inkunga yacu ni imwe mu nkunga yagutse yiswe #TeamEurope.
Ni uburyo bwo kwerekana ubufatanye.
Bikubiye kandi mu ntego za EU mu gufasha ibihugu by’inshuti mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Inkunga u Rwanda rwahawe izatangwa mu byiciro bibiri.
Icya mbere kizatangwamo miliyoni 36 z’amayero, ikindi gitangwemo miliyoni 15.
5 z’amayero mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri y’ingengo y’imari, 2019/2020 na 2020/2021.
Uretse miliyoni 52 z’amayero zahawe Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, EU yatanze indi nkunga ya miliyoni 1.
8 z’amayero agenewe imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta ikorana bya hafi n’inzego z’ibanze mu guhangana n’ingaruka za coronavirus ku mibereho myiza y’abaturage.
Ambasaderi w’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi mu Rwanda, Nicola Bellomo, aherutse gushima uko u Rwanda rurimo guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, yizeza ko uyu muryango uzakomeza gufatanya na rwo muri uru rugamba no mu zindi gahunda z’iterambere.
Yakomeje ashimira ingamba u Rwanda rwafashe mu gukumira no guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, zirimo gahunda ya guma mu rugo, gukaraba intoki, guhana intera n’izindi nyinshi.
Ambasaderi Bellomo yavuze ko bishimira ubufatanye burambye hagati ya EU n’u Rwanda, bushingiye nanone ku bufatanye hagati y’imigabane ya Afurika n’u Burayi.
Yavuze kandi ko muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus barimo gukorana n’u Rwanda mu kurebera hamwe uko inkunga yakwifashishwa guhangana n’iki cyorezo.
Mu mwaka wa 2020/21, u Rwanda ruteganya kuzakoresha ingengo y’imari ingana miliyari 3245.
7 Frw ivuye kuri 3017.
1 Frw yakoreshejwe mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ushize.
Minecofin iherutse gutangariza abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ko ingengo y’imari ya 2020/21, izibanda mu guhangana n’ingaruka icyorezo cya Coronavirus, cyagize mu bukungu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage, ikazakoreshwa mu gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda y’igihugu yo kuzahura ubukungu izakoreshwamo agera muri miliyari 882 Frw mu myaka ibiri y’ingengo y’imari, ni ukuvuga uyu wa 2019/20 n’utaha wa 2020/21 uzatangira muri Nyakanga.
Mu nyandiko y’igenamigambi ryo kuzahura ubukungu bwashegeshwe n’ingaruka za Coronavirus, gahunda y’imibereho myiza y’abaturage izatwara 133 616 548 506 Frw.
Kwita ku batishoboye, gushyigikira ibikorwa by’ubuvuzi, ubuhinzi, gutera inkunga ibigo bya leta, imishinga y’ibikorwa remezo, inkunga ya leta mu kigega cyo kuzahura ubukungu n’izindi ngamba, bizitabwaho mu kuzahura ubukungu.

Yari afite udufaranga duke mu mufuka we ndetse nta muntu azi aho yari agiye.

Mu myaka 13 ishize, Emmanuel Tuombe, nibwo yageze mu ishuri ry’Ikoranabuhanga na Mines ryitwa South Dakota School of Mines & Technology, avuye mu Rwanda.
Yari afite udufaranga duke mu mufuka we ndetse nta muntu azi aho yari agiye.
Icyo yari afite ni icyizere, ibyiringiro n’umuhate wo kugera ku ntsinzi.
Twihuse muri Gashyantare 2020.
Tuombe warangije mu bijyanye na Mines, yageze i Washington D.
C kwakira igihembo nk’umwe mu barimo kuzana impinduka [Game Changer] muri Amerika, ni mu nama ya ba rwiyemezamirimo n’abahanga ibishya yabereye muri Perezidansi ya Amerika, White House, mu Ukwakira [ukwezi kwitwa Black History Month].
Tuombe uvuga indimi esheshatu, yakuriye mu Rwanda, ahamya uburyo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, u Rwanda rwahanganye no kongera kwiyubaka mu nguni zose yaba mu mbamutima no ku isura yarwo kuko rwari rwasenyutse burundu.
Tuombe yafashe icyemezo akiri muto ko azaba Enjeniyeri.
Ntiyitaye aho yari ari kuko yari afite ku mutima kugira impinduka nziza akora muri sosiyete ye.
Yaje guhabwa buruse ajya kwiga mu yahoze ari Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda, mu Ishami rya Engeneering.
Ubwo yari umunyeshuri, yabaye n’umukorerabushake mu mushinga w’amazi ari naho yaje guhurira n’umwarimu muri South Dakota Mines civil and environmental engineering, Dr.
James Stone.
Uyu Stone avuga ko Tuombe yari umuntu ugira amatsiko cyane akaba umunyeshuri w’umuhanga wabazaga ibibazo nka miliyoni.
Yakoze ku mutima cyane uyu mwarimu uwo mushinga urangiye, Stone, amugira umwungiriza mu bushakashatsi, nk’uwarangije muri civil and environmental engineering muri Mines.
Tuombe yageze muri Mines mu 2006, agujije amafaranga kugira ngo abashe kugenda.
Muri iyi kaminuza, yasibaga kurya ndetse ntasesagure kugira ngo inzozi ze zo kubona impamyabumenyi z’icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza azigereho.
Ati “Nari umwarimu wungirije ariko nagombaga gucunga neza buri faranga mfite.
Uba uri mu bihe byo gukotana.
Naribwiye nti ngiye kuba igihe kinini muri iri shuri.
Nari mfite intego".
Yabaye kandi mu muryango w’abanyeshuri b’abanyamahanga ndetse no mu kigo Ivanhoe Center cy’aho yigaga.
Yaganiraga n’abarimu ndetse n’abayobozi b’amatorero.
Stones yibuka Tuombe akora ku mushinga w’ingaruka z’ubucukuzi bwa Uranium ahitwa Harding County, SD, nk’ubushakashatsi bwe asoza amasomo.
Ati “Ndibuka ubwa mbere Emmanuel ajya gukora ubushakashatsi mu gace ka Cave Hills.
Yatangajwe n’uko ari ahantu hadakomye ariko hadatuwe n’abantu.
Iwabo hari ubutaka bumeze nk’ubwo, icyakora ubucucike bw’abaturage buri hejuru ugereranyije n’aho yarebaga muri Harding County.
Yakomezaga avuga ngo ‘abantu bose bari hehe?
Tuombe yarangije kwiga muri Civil Engineering mu 2007, abona akazi mu kigo kiri i Colorado.
Yahavuye ajya gukorera i Memphis, Tenn akomereza Virginia.
Mu 2015, yasubiye muri Memphis, aho yatangirije ikigo cye cyitwa ABES Engineering, Inc.
Ati “Nari mbizi ko bitazoroha.
Ariko nabonye ibibi birenze mu buzima.
nari mfite ibyiringiro ko buri cyose gishoboka".
Tuombe akomeza agira ati “Kandi byarakunze.
Kuva mu ntangiriro, ABES yarakuze kandi itera imbere, ikorana n’Umujyi wa Memphis mu mishinga myinshi.
Ndabizi ko ibikorwa byanjye bikeneye gukomeza gukura.
Niteguye gufatanya n’ibigo bikomeye kugira dushobore gukora ikinyuranyo kinini mu buzima bw’abaturage".
Urugendo rwo muri White House
Kuri ubu ntabwo Tuombe azi neza uwatanze izina rye ngo ahembwe nk’umuntu urimo kuzana impinduka [Game Changer].
Ubwo yakiraga ubutumire bwo muri White House, kwakira igihembo, yaratangaye yibaza niba ari ukuri, ndetse abanza gushidikanya kubibwira abantu benshi.
Ati “Natangiye kwemera ko byari ukuri ubwo nahageraga, ubwo nahuraga n’umuntu wo muri Minisiteri y’Ingufu.
Undi muntu yari umuvumbuzi.
Perezida yaraje avuga uburyo ba rwiyemezamirimo ari urutirigongo rw’iki gihugu.
Cyari ikintu kidasanzwe cyane".
Tuombe avuga ko yahise abona ko ahagararariye benshi barimo abantu nka we, abimukira n’abanyeshuri bagiye kwiga muri Amerika kugira ngo biteze imbere ndetse n’abandi babegereye.
Tuombe, yigeze kuba umuyobozi w’abenjeniyeri batagira umupaka igice cy’u Rwanda, ubu aherutse gutangiza ikindi gice muri Gabon, ashaka ko abanyeshuri n’abimukira bafite ibigo by’ubucuruzi bumva ko buri kimwe gishoboka.
Nyuma yo kwakira igihembo, Tuombe, agira ati “Nahuye n’abantu bakomeye ntatekerezaga ko nzahura nabo".
Yicaranye ku meza n’abaherwe batunze za miliyari z’amadolari, ahura n’abahanze udushya ndetse amenyana n’abayobora ibigo by’ubucuruzi hirya no hino ku Isi.
Uku guhura kwaganiriwemo byinshi ku bufatanye bw’ahazaza.
Ntiyarekeye aho.
Tuombe afite inzozi kandi yizeye ko umunsi umwe azahura n’abahanze udushya nka Bill Gates na Warren Buffet.
Ati “Ndashaka kuzicarana mu cyumba n’abantu bakomeye, tugasangira ibitekerezo kandi tukagira impinduka.
Birashoboka.
Bishobora gutwara indi myaka 13 ariko ni cyo ndangamiye.
Ndarota ibihambaye".
Tuombe asaba abandi kugira inzozi zihambaye nka we kandi bakajya barebera ku nkuru y’urugendo rwe.
Avuga ko inkuru ye ishobora kuba umusemburo w’ibyiringiro n’inzozi byabo.

Umunya-Kenya Charles Njagua Kanyi wamamaye mu muziki nka Jaguar yatawe muri yombi akurikiranyweho icyaha cyo gushishikariza urubyiruko gukora urugomo mu isoko rya Mwariro riherereye mu Mujyi wa Nairobi muri Kenya.

Bizimana ufite impano ikomeye yo guteka, ubu akora Kigali Marriott Hotel.
Mu gikorwa cyahuje abatetsi baturutse mu bihugu bitandukanye yishimiye kuza ku mwanya wa gatatu mu karere byamushyize mu mwanya ukomeye nyuma yo gutsinda abo bari bahatanye bavuye mu Rwanda, muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na Uganda.
Bizimana yagiye muri Kigali Marriott Hotel nk’umutetsi kuva muri 2017.
Icyo gihe bari bashyize ingufu mu byo bakoraga ku rwego rukomeye mu gutegura indyo nziza.
Ashimira Kigali Marriott Hotel kuba yaramufashije kugera kuri uru rwego, akavuga ko adateze guhagarara kugera inzozi ze zibaye iz’umunyarwanda umeze nka Gordon Ramsay.

Yagize ati “ Na mbere nagiye ngira icyifuzo cyo kuzaba umutetsi ukomeye ubwo nari nkiri muto, njye n’umuryango wanjye umunsi umwe twagiye gusangira ifunguro muri Hotel Mille Collines aba ari naho mbona umutetsi bwa mbere waje akatubaza ubumenyi dufite ku biryo, ako kanya nakuruwe n’uburyo ameze, ingofero ndetse n’ishati nziza y’umweru yari yambaye (ukabona aranasekamo gake), Narishimye cyane kuva aho nibwo igitekerezo cyaje muri njye numva ari byiza.

Avuga ko icyo gihe yagize amahirwe yo kubona ubumenyi no gukorana n’abandi mu birori bitandukanye, bituma akomeza kubyishimira.
Ku bijyanye n’ibiryo akunda guteka, Bizimana avuga ko akunda ibizwi nka Indian food.

Yavuze ko akunda n’ibiryo bya gakondo birimo ihene ivanze n’ibitoki, aya akaba ariyo mahitamo ye ya mbere igihe icyo aricyo cyose.
Ku bijyanye n’igihembo yatsindiye n’icyatumye agira ubushake bwo kwitabira amarushanwa, Bizimana yavuze ko byatewe n’uko no mu 2018, hari mugenzi we wo muri Kigali Marriott Hotel wari wacyegukanye.
Ati “Nari hano mu gihe cyashize ubwo aya marushanwa yabaga mu 2018, cyari cyakiriwe na Kigali Marriott Hotel, icyo gihe umwe mu batetsi bacu witwa Sindayigaya yaritabiriye ndetse aza kugitsindira mu karere aza ku mwanya wa mbere, nibwo nibwiye ko nshaka kujyamo.

Avuga ko kuba muri batatu ba mbere bo muri Gorilla Highland Silver Chef 2019, aho yanabonye impamyabushobozi nk’umutetsi mwiza mu Rwanda, muri Uganda no muri RDC bizamufasha cyane mu kazi ke.
Ku bijyanye n’uko umuryango we waba umufasha gukunda akazi ke, Bizimana yagize ati “Umuryango wanjye ni wo nimero ya mbere mu kumfasha, baransengera, baramfasha cyane kandi baranyishimira, yaba umugore wanjye ndetse n’abana banjye.
Naho ibijyanye n’uko iyo ari mu rugo yaba afata akanya agateka cyangwa abiharira umugore, Bizimana avuga ko akunda gutekera umuryango we mu gihe atakoze, kandi ko aba yumva ari ibintu yakora buri munsi ariko biterwa n’uko agira umwanya muto.
