“Ibyishimo ni igisobanuro n’impamvu y’ubuzima, nibyo imigambi yose n’intumbero mu kubaho kwa muntu.
" Aya magambo yavuzwe n’Umugiriki w’umuhanga mu by’imitekerereze w’ibihe byose Aristotle mu myaka 2000 ishize.
N’ubwo hashize igihe kinini abivuze, bigaragara ko ibyishimo mu buzima bw’umuntu bigifite ubusobanuro bunini ndetse ni impamvu y’ibyo abantu bakora byose byaba ibibi n’ibyiza.
Hifashishijwe inyandiko y’Inzobere mu mibereho ya muntu n’Umutoza mu bijyanye no kubaho, Tom Casano, IGIHE yateguye inama icyenda zagufasha kubaho wishimye.
Ha agaciro ibyiza: Kugira ngo ugere ku byishimo by’igihe kirekire, ni byiza ko utoza ubwonko bwawe kudatekereza ikibi ahubwo ugahora ugambirira icyiza.
Abahanga mu by’imitekerereze bavuga ko iyo ufashe iminota ibiri ugatekereza ku byiza wishimira mu buzima bwawe, ukabikora ubugira gatatu ku munsi, mu gihe cy’iminsi 45 ubwonko bwawe buba bumaze kubifata nk’umuco bityo ntube ugiha umwanya munini ibitagenda.
Iga gukoresha neza amafaranga: Hari benshi bumva ko gutunga amafaranga menshi ari byo bizana ibyishimo, nyamara ahubwo uko uyakoresha ari wo musingi wo kubaho ubuzima burangwa no kwishima.
Nta shiti ko ibituma abantu batishima muri iyi minsi, ibyinshi bishingiye ku bibazo by’amafaranga bituruka ku kugira menshi, kugira make no kuyakoresha nabi.
Wagira amafaranga menshi cyangwa make ushobora kwishima igihe uzi kuyakoresha neza ndetse ugafata n’umwanya wo kwishimisha igihe hari icyo wagezeho.
Fasha abandi: Rimwe na rimwe nyuma yo kugera kuri byinshi hari igihe mu mutima usigara wumva umeze nk’uwakoze ubusa kubera ko utagize icyo ukora mu guhimdura ubuzima bw’abandi.
Gufasha abandi bituma wiyumva neza kuko uba ubona ko hari icyo umariye abandi, ibi bikakubera isoko y’ibyishimo.
Iga kunyurwa: Nusubiza amaso inyuma urasanga hari byinshi mu buzima bwawe byagakwiye kuba bigutera ishema nko kuba ubasha kubona aho uryama hari abatahafite, kubona ibyo kurya hari ababibuze no kuba ugihumeka hari abavuye mu bugingo.
Si byiza guhumwa amaso n’umuco mubi wo kutanyurwa kuko wumva ko n’ubundi wari ubikwiriye.
Iga kubabarira kandi wibagirwe: Kurwara inzika bizakuvuna cyane ndetse no kurusha uwo uyirwariye, kumenya ko nta kosa rinini ritari iryo kubabarirwa bizagufasha kubona imbaraga zo kubabarira n’abaguhemukiye cyane.
Igihe wateye intambwe yo kubabarira ni byiza ko wibagirwa, ntuhore ucyurira uwaguhemukiye kandi umubwira ko wamubabariye.
Ba uwo uri we: Nk’uko Steve Jobs washinze uruganda rwa Apple yabivuze kumenya uwo uri we kandi ukabaho nkawe bizana ikinyuranyo mu buzima bwawe kuko ibyo ukora uba utabyihingamo ndetse ntuhangayikire gutekereza uko abantu babifata baramutse bamenye uwo uri we bya nyabyo.
Yagize ati “Igihe cyawe kirabaze ku bw’ibyo wigitakaza ubaho ubuzima bw’undi, emera uwo uri we, ube uwo uri we uzumva ikinyuranyo mu buryo wari ubayeho.
Wimara igihe cyawe cyose mu kazi: Akazi gatwara amasaha menshi y’umuntu ariko si cyo kintu cyonyine ukwiye guhugiraho ubuzima bwawe bwose.
Ni ingenzi cyane gufata umwanya ugakora bimwe mu bindi ukunda nko gukina imikino itandukanye, kureba filimi, gutembera no kuganira n’inshuti.
Iyi mirimo yose ukora hanze y’akazi igufasha kurwanya umunaniro uba wakuye mu kazi no kubona ibyishimo.
Emera ko udashoboye byose: Ubuzima bw’umuntu abumara ashaka gukora neza 100% ibintu byose, ibi bituma rimwe na rimwe wihatira gukora ibyo udashoboye, byakunanira ukagira agahinda ndetse haba hari uwo wabikoreraga ukumva ko umutengushye.
Ukuri k’ubuzima ni uko ntawushobora byose kandi na we ni byiza ko ubona ko hari ibyo udashoboye ukemera kubana n’uko kuri.
Gabanya guhangayika: Birashoboka ko udashobora kurwanya guhangayika ku kigero 100% kuko ubwabyo hari umusaruro bitanga urimo kugutera gukora cyane no kwitondera imyanzuro ufata.
Gusa iyo uku guhangayika gukabije ukagera aho n’utuntu duto tugutera gutekereza cyane, ugahorana ubwoba no ku bintu udashobora guhindura, ibi bishobora kukubuza ibyishimo kandi mu nta mpamvu ifatika.

Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda (INMR) kivuga ko hari amazina yaturutse ku bantu bakomeye babaga ahantu runaka.
Nka “Kacyiru" bivugwa ko ryatanzwe hagendewe ku mugabo witwaga Cyiru; wari umutware na “Rwabutabura" ryatanzwe riturutse ku witwaga Rwabutabura wari utuye ahitwa iryo zina muri iki gihe, ubu ni mu Karere ka Nyarugenge.
Umushakashatsi ku muco n’amateka Nsanzabera Jean De Dieu avuga ko ‘Kacyiru (agasozi k’icyiru)’ byitiriwe agasozi katangiweho ‘Ibyiru’ byinshi, bikomotse ku manza zacirwaga Abanyabwanacyambwe banze kuyoboka ingoma ya Mukobanya, nyuma yo kuhigarurira ahasaga mu wa 1378 ubwo yicaga Nkuba ya Nyabakonjo umwami w’u Bwanacyambwe.
‘Gacuriro’ hiswe hatyo kubera uruganda rucura amacumu yo kwagura u Rwanda rwubatswe na Kigeli Mukobanya.
Andi mazina yatanzwe afatiwe ku bikorwa byo kubaka u Rwanda nk’ubworozi bw’inka.
“Kicukiro" risobanuye umusozi amacukiro (ibirundo by’amase y’inka).
Mu bihe byo hambere, Kicukiro izwi nka kamwe mu turere tw’umujyi wa Kigali kororerwagaho inka nyinshi.
Niho hari hubatse ibiraro by’inka za Kigeli Mukobanya n’umuhungu we Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi.
Hari ahazwi nka ‘Kabusunzu’ hiswe hatyo kubera umupfumu w’umuhanga wari waraturutse i Karagwe witwa ‘Gasunzu’ nyuma aho atuye bahita ‘Kagasunzu’ nyuma umunyamakuru wo kuri Radiyo Rwanda yagiye gutara amakuru avugira kuri Radiyo ko ari ‘Kabusunzu’ rihama rityo.
Hazwi nk’i Nyamirambo hiswe hatyo biturutse ku mirambo myinshi yahabonetse ubwo abanyoro bateraga u Rwanda.

MTN Rwanda yatangaje ibiciro bishya byo kohererezanya amafaranga kuri telefoni nyuma y’uko hari hashize amezi atatu iyi serivisi itangirwa ubuntu mu Rwanda mu kwimakaza ikoreshwa ry’ikoranabuhanga hirindwa ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ibiciro bishya byo kohererezanya amafaranga kuri telefoni nyuma y’uko hari hashize amezi atatu iyi serivisi itangirwa ubuntu mu Rwanda mu kwimakaza ikoreshwa ry’ikoranabuhanga hirindwa ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) yaraye itangaje ko ikiguzi cyo guherekanya amafaranga hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga kigiye gusubizwaho ndetse kigomba gutangira kubahirizwa kuva tariki ya 22 Kamena 2020.
Mu biciro bishya MTN yatangaje, ni uko mafaranga ari munsi ya 1000 Frw, umuntu azajya acibwa 20 Frw.
Naho ku mafaranga ari hagati ya 1001 Frw na 10000 Frw ikiguzi ni 100 Frw.
Ku mafaranga ari hagati ya 10001 Frw na 150000 Frw, uwohereza azajya acibwa amafaranga 250 Frw.
Ku mafaranga ari hagati ya 150001 Frw na 2000000 Frw, ho ikiguzi ni 1500 Frw.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko ku zindi serivisi zirimo nko kugura umuriro w’amashanyarazi, amafaranga yo guhamagara, kwishyura lisansi, parikingi, ifatabuguzi rya televiziyo na Yego Moto ho nta mafaranga azajya acibwa umukiliya.
Umubare w’amafaranga yehererekanyijwe mu Rwanda hifashisijwe ikoranabuhanga hagati ya Mutarama na Mata 2020, wageze kuri miliyari 40 Frw; bivuze ko yiyongereye ku kigero cya 450% avuye kuri miliyari 7.
2 Frw zahererekanyijwe mu cyumweru cya mbere cya Mutarama 2020.
Nk’uko bigaragara muri raporo yakozwe n’ikigo insight2impact ku bufatanye na RURA, mu cyumweru cya mbere cya gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo umubare w’abahererekanya amafaranga mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga wageze kuri miliyoni 1.
2, uvuye ku bantu 600 000 mu cyumweru cyari cyabanjirije Guma mu Rugo.
Mu cyumweru cya nyuma cya Mata 2020, abantu miliyoni 1.
8 bahererekanyije amafaranga mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda.
Guhera tariki 9 Werurwe kugeza tariki 15 Werurwe, hahererekanyijwe miliyari 10.
7 Frw ariko mu cyumweru cyarangiye tariki 22 Werurwe amafaranga yahererekanyijwe mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga yari ageze kuri miliyari 24 Frw.
Akenshi usanga abantu barwaye indwara zikomeye badakunda ko bimenyekana muri rubanda kubera impamvu zitandukanye ahanini zirimo kuba baba baramaze kwiheba, babarira iminsi ku ntoki, ariko kuri Faustin Kagame si uko!

Uyu mugabo ubitse amateka ahambaye y’u Rwanda mu bihe bikomeye rwanyuzemo byose, yakoze imirimo itandukanye mu myaka 72 amaze ku Isi.
Magingo aya, Faustin Kagame wabaye Umujyanama w’Umukuru w’Igihugu arwaye Alzheimer itera umuntu kwibagirwa.
Ubu burwayi kuri Faustin Kagame, ni igihombo gikomeye ku Rwanda bigendanye n’ubumenyi yibitsemo mu myaka yose ye y’ubuzima bwe, aho yafatwaga nk’inzu y’ibitabo y’agaciro y’u Rwanda.
Faustin Kagame ni uwo mu muryango umwe na Padiri Alexis Kagame nawe wanditse amateka akomeye mu Rwanda nk’umunyamateka uhambaye uko ibihe byagiye bisimburana.
Faustin yavutse ku wa 15 Gashyantare 1947 mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda ahahoze hazwi nka Ruhengeri.
Se yitwaga Faustin Kabano, yari umuntu uzwi cyane muri icyo gihe.
Padiri Alexis Kagame wavukanaga na nyina, Pascasie Kabogora, ni umwe mu bitabiriye ibirori by’umunsi w’ivuka rya Faustin Kagame.
Mu gushaka guha icyubahiro Padiri Alexis Kagame witabiriye uwo munsi mukuru, ababyeyi bahisemo kumwitirira uruhinja rwari rumaze kuvuga, maze yitwa Faustin ‘Kagame’ atyo!
Faustin yari afite imyaka 12 ubwo u Rwanda rwatangiraga kwinjira mu bihe bibi byaganishije no kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994.
Mu 1959, umuryango we ni umwe mu yameneshejwe mu gihugu izira ko ari Abatutsi.
Ababyeyi be bahungiye muri Uganda gusa Faustin arasigara aho yoherejwe i Butare muri Kaminuza akitabwaho na Padiri Alexis Kagame aho ngo yamubereye mama na papa icyarimwe.
Aho ni ho yigiye amateka y’u Rwanda ya mbere y’ubukoloni ayigishijwe na Alexis Kagame, amenya atyo byinshi ku banyarwanda kuva ubwo kugeza magingo aya.
Ibihe bye mu buhungiro
Nyuma yaje guhungira mu Burundi mu 1963, nyuma akomereza muri ‘Union Soviétique’ [u Burusiya bw’ubu].
Yize muri Kaminuza yitiriwe Patrice Lumumba; mu Bubiligi, muri Congo-Brazzaville no mu Busuwisi.
Niho yavuye mu ntangiriro za 1994 yiyunga ku basore n’inkumi bari bakereye kubohora u Rwanda bari ku Mulindi wa Byumba, aherekeza abasirikare 600 ba FPR Inkotanyi bari berekeje ku Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ku Kimihurura gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano ya Arusha.
Ku wa 7 Mata, Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yatangiye ari muri Kigali mu nyubako y’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko, aho yaboneye ubugome ndengakamere yakoranywe.
Icyo gihe yakoreraga ikinyamakuru cyo mu Busiwisi, Hebdo, aho yanditse urupfu rw’agashinyaguro abatutsi bicwaga mbere y’uko ahungira mu gace kagenzurwaga na FPR.
Iminsi ni mitindi, nta we ujya inama n’ubuzima
Faustin Kagame ni umwe mu bagabo wabaza amateka yo mu bihe bitandukanye by’u Rwanda akayakubwira neza kurusha undi uwo ariwe wese.
Ni umugabo kandi uvuga ashize amanga, akagaragaza ikimuri ku mutima.
Gusa magingo aya, ubuzima bwe ntibuhagaze neza.
Bitewe n’ubuzima yanyuzemo, yubatse umubano ukomeye hagati ye n’abandi bantu benshi, ibintu bigarukwaho cyane na Medhi Ba, Umwanditsi Mukuru wa Jeune Afrique dukesha iyi nkuru.
Medhi agaragaza uburyo Faustin Kagame ari umwe mu bantu b’abahanga yamenye ku bijyanye n’amateka y’u Rwanda.
Yanditse ko ku wa 05 Ugushyingo yamwandikiye ku rukuta rwa Facebook ye ko u Rwanda rukwiye guhanga umwanya mushya wa Minisiteri y’Amateka hanyuma [Faustin Kagame] akayiyobora.
Ati “Naravuze nti u Rwanda rukwiye guhanga Minisiteri y’amateka.
Nkubona nk’umuntu wayibera umuyobozi wa mbere.
Ndavuga amateka muri rusange.
Y’abantu bazi iby’ahahise, ahuza n’abakurambere bavuga amateka uko ari.
Nyuma y’iminsi umunani nyuma y’ubwo butumwa, Medhi Ba yavuze ko yaguye mu kantu, umutima we ukenda guhagarara ubwo yamenyaga ko umwe mu bantu b’ingenzi babumbatiye amateka y’u Rwanda, Faustin Kagame, arwaye Alzheimer.
Yabimubwiye mu mvugo igaragaza ko nta gikuba cyacitse, yumvikana nk’umuntu utihebye.
Medhi ati “Mu gihe njye amarangamutima yari akomeje kunsaba, nabuze aho nkwira, yongeyeho ati “murumuna wanjye - niko yakundaga kunyita, ndashaka ko ubivugaho.
Faustin Kagame yarenze ibifatwa nk’imiziro mu Banyafurika byo guhisha indwara barwaye yemera ko ivugwa.
Umwanditsi wo muri Mali, Amadou Hampâté Bâ, mu 1960 ubwo yari mu Nteko Rusange ya Unesco yavuze ko muri Afurika umusaza upfuye ari nk’inzu y’ibitabo ihiye.
Medhi ashima Imana ko Faustin akiri muzima ariko ko inzu y’ibitabo imurimo igenda ifatwa n’umuriro gahoro gahoro.
Akomeza avuga ko ugendeye ku mateka y’uyu mugabo, akwiye kwandikwaho igitabo kivuga ku buzima bwe cyangwa se agakorwaho filimi.
Mehdi Ba wahishuye uburwayi bwa Faustin Kagame, ni umwanditsi mukuru w’urubuga rwa internet rwa Jeune Afrique.
Yabaye umukozi wayo muri Sénégal, aho yatangazaga amakuru yo mu Burengerazuba bwa Afurika (Mauritanie, Gambie, Guinée-Bissau, Mali) ndetse nyuma yakoreye mu Rwanda no mu Burundi.

Yabonesheje urupfu n’amaso ye
Ntazinda avuga ko ubwo bari ku musozi wa Nyarusange aho bari barahungiye, batewe n’Interahamwe, zibarasaho bamwe mu bo bari kumwe barapfa.
Ati “Ndibuka twari mu rugo rw’uwitwa Kananga [yaje kujya mu Gisirikare], yaje yiruka atubwira ati ‘za Nterahamwe ziraje’.

Twaramanutse tujya mu kibaya ahantu ntari nzi hitwa Mburabuturo maze za Nterahamwe zikajya zirasa aho twari mu kibaya, amasasu menshi.
Ni ubwa mbere nari numvise amasasu avugira hafi yanjye, rikarasa umuntu uri hirya yawe, ukabona ukuboko kuracitse, ukuguru kurasandaye.
Ni ubwa mbere nari mbonye ibyo bintu, mbonye umuntu wapfuye.
Icyo gihe nibwo umwe mu bantu bahagurukanye mu rugo baburaniye, na n’ubu ntaramenya niba ariho yaguye.
Nyuma yo kuraswaho amasasu menshi, imvura yaje kugwa bituma Interahamwe zijya kugama.
Ati ‘‘ [Interahamwe] zagiye kugama mu gasantere kari ruguru bafata Umututsi wahungaga; twarazamutse natwe, tugeze hejuru dutunguka aho bari, wa muntu bari bafashe, abona ko natwe turi bagenzi be duhunga.

Umushinjacyaha wungirije mu Rukiko Rukuru rw’i Paris, Aurélia Devos, ategerejwe i Kigali mu iperereza ku ruhare rwa Félicien Kabuga muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umushinjacyaha wungirije mu Rukiko Rukuru rw’i Paris, Aurélia Devos, ategerejwe i Kigali mu iperereza ku ruhare rwa Félicien Kabuga muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Félicien Kabuga ufatwa nk’umucurabwenge n’umuterankunga mukuru wa Jenoside aherutse gufatirwa mu Bufaransa aho yari amaze imyaka yihishe ubutabera ku ruhare rwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Biteganyijwe ko Aurélia Devos azagera i Kigali mu minsi iri imbere ku iperereza ryimbitse ku byo Kabuga ashinjwa.
Devos asanzwe ashinzwe ishami rishinzwe kurwanya ibyaha byibasiye inyokomuntu.
Devos agiye kuza mu Rwanda mu gihe hategerejwe itariki y’ubujurire bwa Félicien Kabuga, aho ashaka ko urukiko rwisubiraho ku mwanzuro rwafashwe wo kumwohereza muri Tanzania kuburanira ahakorera Urugereko rwasigariyeho urukiko mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho u Rwanda, IRMCT.
Urukiko rw’i Paris tariki 3 Kamena nibwo rwategetse ko Félicien Kabuga yoherezwa muri Tanzania kuhaburanira.
Ni umwanzuro wafashwe nyuma y’uko tariki 27 Gicurasi, urukiko rwari rwamaganye icyifuzo cy’abunganizi be cy’uko yarekurwa akava muri gereza ya “La Santé" afungiyemo mu Mujyi wa Paris agashyirwa mu nzu acunzwe hifashishijwe inzogera y’ikoranabuhanga hanyuma akitabwaho n’abana be.
Mu 1997 nibwo Kabuga yashyiriweho na ICTR impapuro zisaba ko atabwa muri yombi kubera ibyaha birindwi akurikiranweho, birimo ibya Jenoside n’ibyaha byibasiye inyokomuntu.
Ubwo IRMCT yasimburaga ICTR mu 2012, byashimangiwe ko Kabuga nafatwa azoherezwa i Arusha akaba ariho aburanira.
Ibyaha Kabuga akurikiranweho birimo icyaha cya Jenoside, ubufatanyacyaha mu cyaha cya Jenoside, gukangurira abantu gukora Jenoside, ubwinjiracyaha bwa Jenoside n’ibindi bifitanye isano na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Kabuga afatwa nk’uwagize uruhare runini mu gutera inkunga umugambi wa Jenoside, anatanga umusanzu mu gushinga radio RTLM yabibaga urwango.
Ubwo RTLM yashingwaga, Kabuga yatanzemo 500 000 Frw ndetse ikimara gutangizwa, ni we wabazwaga imikorere yayo ya buri munsi nka Perezida wayo, Ferdinand Nahimana aba Umuyobozi wayo (Directeur), Jean Bosco Barayagwiza aba umuyobozi wungirije (Directeur adjoint).
Abo nabo bahamijwe ibyaha bya Jenoside.
General Salou Djibo wigeze guhirika ubutegetsi muri Niger, yatangaje ko aziyamamaza mu matora ya Perezida ateganyijwe uyu mwaka.
General Salou Djibo wigeze guhirika ubutegetsi muri Niger, yatangaje ko aziyamamaza mu matora ya Perezida ateganyijwe uyu mwaka.
Gen Djibo kuri iki Cyumweru yatangaje ko aziyamamaza ahagarariye ishyaka Peace Justice Progress (PJP).
Djibo ni we wari uyoboye ingabo zahiritse ku butegetsi Perezida Mahamadou Tandja muri Gashyantare 2010, ubwo yashakaga kuguma ku butegetsi nyuma ya manda ebyiri yemererwaga n’Itegeko Nshinga.
Nyuma yo guhirika Tandja, Gen Djibo yahaye ubutegetsi Mahamadou Issoufou wari umaze gutsinda amatora ya Perezida.
Uyu musirikare wo ku rwego rwo hejuru yasezeye imirimo ya gisirikare mu mwaka ushize wa 2019, nkuko BBC yabitangaje.
Djibo yifuza gusimbura Mahamadou Issoufou uzasoza manda ebyiri yemerewe n’amategeko mu Ukuboza uyu mwaka.

Ngarukiye Daniel umenyerewe mu muziki gakondo akirigita inanga, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Umwali w’ i Rwanda’, irimo ubutumwa bugaragaza umwihariko w’Abanyarwandakazi.
Ngarukiye Daniel umenyerewe mu muziki gakondo akirigita inanga, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Umwali w’ i Rwanda’, irimo ubutumwa bugaragaza umwihariko w’Abanyarwandakazi.
Mu gitero cya mbere cy’iyi ndirimbo aragira ati “Ikizakubwira Umwali w’i Rwanda arangwa n’umutuzo kandi no mu buhanga arahanga ntahangarwa.
Iyo aserukiye u Rwanda iyo mu mahanga abahiga ubuhanga kuko no mu buranga abahiga bose, kuko ari uwo kwa Gihanga Ngoma 100.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yatekereje gukora iyi ndirimbo agendeye ku myitwarire y’Abanyarwandakazi ituma bahesha ishema igihugu cyabo.
Avuga ko yari amaze kubona uburyo abakobwa b’ahandi bitwara mu buryo buteye inkeke, ashaka kwerekana uko Abanyarwandakazi bitwararika bidasanzwe.
Ati “Akanyoni katagurutse ntikamenya iyo bweze, nagize amahirwe yo kugera imahanga mbona abantu baho uko babayeho, nsanga imico yabo ifite itandukaniro ryinshi n’iyacu.
Narebye ukuntu abakobwa baho baba bameze mbona batandukanye n’ab’iwacu cyane.
Ni uko rero bimpa igitekerezo cyo kuririmba ‘Umwali w i Rwanda’ mvuga umwihariko we haba mu buhanga, uburanga n’ubwitonzi.
Avuga ko nk’aho aba mu Bufaransa abana b’abakobwa ku myaka 14, 15, 16 usanga banywa itabi batitaye ko ribicira ubuzima ndetse n’aho abantu bateraniye ntibatinya kurinywa kimwe no mu muhanda bagenda, ndetse no mu myambarire “hari igihe bambara ukibaza niba bambaye bikakuyobera.
Ni ibintu bitandukanye no ku Banyarwandakazi kuko hari benshi bagikomeye ku muco, aho umukobwa arangwa n’ubuhanga n’ubwitonzi.
Ngarukiye Daniel ni umwe mu bahanzi bake bafite ubuhanga buhanitse mu gucuranga inanga.
Iyi mpano ayikomora kuri sekuru Semivumbi Simake wari intore y’intyoza mu guhamiriza kwa Rudahigwa i Nyanza mu Rukari.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe na Didiertouch mu gihe amashusho yatunganyijwe na Karpetpixelz.
Mu rugendo rukomeje rwo kurushaho gufasha abanyarwanda, by’umwihariko abakiriya ba yo, Airtel-Rwanda yatangije porogaramu ya telefone izajya ifasha abakiriya ba yo bose kurushaho gukoresha serivisi ibagezaho bitabasabye kuva aho bari cyangwa ngo bagire undi bitabaza.
Mu rugendo rukomeje rwo kurushaho gufasha abanyarwanda, by’umwihariko abakiriya ba yo, Airtel-Rwanda yatangije porogaramu ya telefone izajya ifasha abakiriya ba yo bose kurushaho gukoresha serivisi ibagezaho bitabasabye kuva aho bari cyangwa ngo bagire undi bitabaza.
Iri koranabuhanga rikubiye muri porogaramu yiswe ‘My Airtel App’, rifasha urikoresha kuryoherwa na serivisi zose zitangwa na Airtel bitamugoye na gato kandi ziri ahantu hamwe.
Serivise ziri muri ‘My Airtel App’ zirimo izo “kugura ama-inite, internet, kwishyura ibyo ukeneye byose nk’amazi, amashanyarazi, ifatabuguzi rya televiziyo, […] kohereza amafaranga haba mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, byose bigakorwa hifashishijwe ikarita ya banki cyangwa Airtel Money.
Umukiriya wa Airtel kandi azaba ashobora kureba uko ibikorwa byo kwishyura byagenze no kugenzura ibyakorewe kuri simukadi ye ya Airtel byose yinjiriye ahantu hamwe.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Airtel Rwanda, Amit Chawla, yavuze ko ibihe bidasanzwe isi irimo byo guhangana n’ingaruka za COVID-19 byatumye habaho impinduka zikomeye by’umwihariko mu bucuruzi n’ibindi bikorwa bihuza bantu benshi, bityo ko izo mpinduka zikwiye kubyazwa amahirwe, abantu bagaterana imbere na zo.
Ati “ Twashyizeho iyi porogaramu nyuma y’igihe kinini dukora ubushakashatsi ku byo abakiriya bakunze gukenera, tumaze no kumva neza ko bakeneye urubuga bakoreraho ibintu byose, bitabatwaye umwanya kandi bakabikora ku buryo buboroheye.
Yakomeje avuga ko gukoresha iyi porogaramu nshya bizarushaho gufasha abakiriya ba Airtel Rwanda kumenyera serivise zifashisha ikoranabuhanga rikomeje gushyirwa imbere mu bikorwa bitandukanye mu Rwanda.
Ati “Gukoresha iyi porogaramu yo kwihereza biroroshye, birizewe kandi bizorohereza abakiriya ba Airtel gukora ibintu byinshi harimo kureba ama inite bafite kuri telephone zabo, interineti bafiteho, ayo bafite kuri Airtel Money, banabashe kongeramo ama inite, kureba no kugura pack zihari zitandukanye.
‘My Airtel App’ ikora igihe cyose (24/7), izanafasha abayikoresha gukurikirana buri gihe ibibera kuri konti za bo za banki na Airtel Money bitabagoye na gato, ndetse ikaba idasaba kuba umuntu afite internet mu gihe ari kuyikoresha.
Umutekano w’iyi ‘Application’ wizewe ku rwego rwo hejuru kuko itemerera undi muntu kuba yakoresha imyirondoro yawe agamije kwiba amafaranga ufite kuri konti iyo ari yo yose cyangwa gukora ikindi kintu cyabangamira umukiriya wa Airtel uyikoresha.
Ibi kandi bijyana n’uko telefone zose zigaragaweho kuba imiterere ya zo yakorohereza abajura kwiba uyikoresha, itemera kuyijyamo.
Akarusho kandi ni uko kugura ama-inite ukoresheje iyi ‘application’ biguhesha uburenganzira bwo guhabwa inyongera ndetse koherereza undi muntu byo bikaguhesha ubwasisi bwa 5% by’ama-inite yose wohereje.
Iyi application izorohereza abajyaga bagorwa no gufata mu mutwe za kode zitandukanye mu kugura cyangwa gukoresha serivise za Airtel kuko buri kimwe cyose cyorohejwe muri ‘My Airtel App’.
Ubuyobozi bwa Airtel Rwanda buvuga ko gukoresha iyi application bizarushaho kugabanya guhura kw’abantu muri ibi bihe byo guhangana na COVID-19.
Umuntu ukeneye gukoresha iyi porogaramu ya ’My Airtel App’ ajya muri ’Play Store’ kubakoresha telefoni za ’Android’ cyangwa ’App Store’ ku bakoresha iOS; ukandika mu ishakiro "My Airtel", hakaza ifite amagambo ya ’Airtel Africa’, ubundi ukayishyira muri telefone yawe nk’uko bikorwa ku zindi porogaramu.
Umaze kuyishyiramo, urayifungura, ukuzuzamo nomero yawe, ubundi ugakurikiza amabwiriza ajyanye n’ibyo bagusaba.
Mu gutangaza ku mugaragaro imikorere y’iyi porogaramu, Airtel Rwanda yaboneyeho no gushimira uburyo abanyarwanda muri rusange bari kwitwara muri ibi bihe byo guhangana na COVID-19, ndetse yongera kubasaba kurushaho kubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri ibi bihe bidasanzwe.
Ishyirwa hanze ry’ububasha bwo kwihereza bwahawe abakiriya ba Airtel ni kimwe mu bikorwa bigaragaza umuhati wa Airtel mu kugeza ku mukiriya serivise nziza zijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga no kubaha ubushobozi bwo kwicungira ibikorwa byose byo ku murongo wabo wa Airtel, nta wundi bitabaje.
Mu mateka y’abakurambere mpangarwanda, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibigwi n’ibirindiro, ikagira amavugwa ku bw’ibigwi n’ibirindiro babaga barakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari bakomokamo.
Mu mateka y’abakurambere mpangarwanda, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibigwi n’ibirindiro, ikagira amavugwa ku bw’ibigwi n’ibirindiro babaga barakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari bakomokamo.
Ni imiryango yagiye igira amaboko akomeye kubera kugira imiryango migari igizwe n’abantu benshi kandi bagwije ubugabo igitinyiro n’ubuhangange.
Muri iki gice tukaba tugiye kubatekerereza amateka y’igicumbi cy’umuryango mugari ufite inkomoko ku mwami Ndoba, iki kikaba ari igice gikurikiraho mu bindi bizakurikiraho mu kubatekerereza imbumbe y’imiryango migari yabayemo ibihangange ikanagira n’inzu zikomeye mu mateka y’u Rwanda.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Iyororoka ry’Abanyarwanda, inkomoko y’imiryango migari ’’ dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu Busizi, umuco n’amateka y’u Rwanda, tugiye kwinjira mu muryango mugari w’abakomoka kwa Ndoba, mu mavu n’amavuko yawo n’inzu z’ibihangange zawukomotseho.
Ndoba ni mwene Ndahiro Ruyange rwa Yuhi Musindi, umwami wo mu mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya na Monde ya Gahutu, ukomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abega, yategetse ahasaga mu wa 1213 kugeza mu wa 1246.
Ni umwami wa 5 mu bami 28 bategetse u Rwanda, akaba n’umwami wa 5 mu Berekeza 34 b’umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda.
Umwami Ndoba ni umwe mu Bami b’u Rwanda bagize inzu z’imiryango nyinshi ugereranyije n’abandi bami, akaba ari na we wagize inzu z’imiryango ntabarika mu bami bose bamubanjirije n’abamuherutse.
Ndoba, yakomotsweho n’inzu z’imiryango zigera kuri 13 zabaye ibihangange mu mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya kugeza ubwo aya mateka yandikwaga na n’ubu akivugwa.
Yagize n’imimaro myinshi mu bigaragara mu gushyira mu bikorwa umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda.
Amateka atugaragariza ko Umwami Ndoba ya Ndahiro, yabyaye abana benshi, biganjemo Abahungu 11 aribi Mujiji, Mugunga, Mukobwa, Muturagara, Munyiga, Nyamuhanzi, Mupfumfu, Cyambwe, Biharage, Cyoba na Neza.
Aba bagabo b’Intarumikwa, nibo babaye inkomoko y’inzu z’imiryango zo kwa Ndoba zikomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya.
Inzu z’imiryango zikomoka kwa Ndoba ni:
Abanyiginya b’ABAJIJI bakomoka kuri MUJIJI wa NDOBA ;
Abanyiginya b’ABENEMUGUNGA bakomoka kuri MUGUNGA wa NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABAKOBWA bakomoka kuri MUKOBWA wa NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABATURAGARA bakomoka kuri MUTURAGARA wa NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABENEMUNYIGA bakomoka kuri MUNYIGA wa NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABENENYAMUHANZI bakomoka kuri NYAMUHANZI ya NDOBA;
Abanyiginya b’ABENEMUPFUMFU bakomoka kuri MUPFUMFU wa NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENECYAMBWE bakomoka kuri CYAMBWE cya NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENEBIHARAGE bakomoka kuri BIHARAGE bya NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENECYOBA bakomoka kuri CYOBA cya NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENENEZA bakomoka kuri NEZA ya NDOBA
Abanyiginya b’ABENEGAHAYA bakomoka kuri GAHAYA ka RWASA rwa TURAGARA ,
Abanyiginya b’ABATARE bakomoka kuri KAREMERA NTARE RUSATSI rwa SINZI wa NYAMUHANZI wa NDOBA.
Abakomoka muri iyi miryango bararumbutse cyane muri uru Rwanda, ku buryo babumbye hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’abakomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya.
Ngaho iyo mwama mukuru wa Ndoba mu mizi yanyu mikuru ( Urabe wumva muntu w’i Rwanda, ibyo nibyo bisekuruza by’iwanyu mu muryango wo kwa Ndoba).
Kimwe mu byo abakristu ba mbere bazize mu ntangiriro ya Kiliziya ni ugushyira mu bikorwa iri jambo Yezu yivugiye ubwe ati “Ndababwira ukuri koko: nimutarya umubiri w’umwana w’umuntu ntimunywe n’amaraso ye, ntimuzagira ubugingo muri mwe" (Yh 6, 53).
Ibyo rero byatumye babarega, barabahiga, barabatoteza ngo barya abantu.
Icyakora iyo urebye neza, kwari ukudasobanukirwa neza n’ayo magambo ya Yezu bwite.
Kimwe mu byo abakristu ba mbere bazize mu ntangiriro ya Kiliziya ni ugushyira mu bikorwa iri jambo Yezu yivugiye ubwe ati “Ndababwira ukuri koko: nimutarya umubiri w’umwana w’umuntu ntimunywe n’amaraso ye, ntimuzagira ubugingo muri mwe" (Yh 6, 53).
Ibyo rero byatumye babarega, barabahiga, barabatoteza ngo barya abantu.
Icyakora iyo urebye neza, kwari ukudasobanukirwa neza n’ayo magambo ya Yezu bwite.
Nk’uko Papa Piyo wa 12 yabisobanuye mu Ibaruwa ye “Mystici Corporis Christi", Ukaristiya ni umubiri wuje ikuzo wa Yezu Kristu udusabanya na we.
Ni igihango gikomeye Yezu yadusigiye kugira ngo tujye tumwibuka kandi bitume twigiramo ubugingo (reba 1Kor 11, 24-25).
Igisobanuro cy’ijambo
Ijambo “Ukaristiya", rikomoka ku ijambo ry’ikigereki “Eucharistia", riva ku nshinga “Eucharistein bivuga gushimira; rikavuga kandi kimwe n’irindi jambo “Eulogein".
Aya magambo yibutsa ugushimira kw’Abayahudi, igihe bamamazaga ibikorwa by’Imana cyane cyane mu gihe cya Pasika (Lk 22, 19; 1 Kor 11, 24).
Ukaristiya ni isengesho rikuru, risingiza Imana kandi rikayishimira.
Nk’uko Gatigisimu ibitubwira “Ukaristiya ni isakramentu ririmo Yezu Kristu ubwe rwose n’umubiri we n’amaraso ye, mu bimenyetso by’umugati na Divayi, akatubera icyarimwe igitambo, ifunguro n’inshuti tubana".
Gutura igitambo cy’Ukaristiya rero, ni ugusangira isengesho ryo kwibuka gushimira Imana ibyo yadukoreye.
Kuva kera, gushimira Imana biri mu muco w’abantu bayo.
“Uramenye ntuzibagirwe Uhoraho Imana yawe, wagukuye mu gihugu cya Misiri, mu nzu y’ubucakara, akagutambutsa ibihe bikomeye wanyuzemo" (reba Ivug 8, 14b-16b).
Ishingiro ry’Ukaristiya muri Bibiliya
Ukaristiya ni urwibutso Yezu yadusigiye avuga ati“Ibi mujye mubikora munyibuka" (1Kor 11, 24-25; Lk 24, 13-31).
Bityo igihe cyose duhazwa, tuba dusangira na Kristu Pasika (reba Lk 22, 19).
Mu Ivanjiri ya Yohani, Yezu yagize ati “Ni jye mugati muzima wamanutse mu ijuru.
Urya uwo mugati azabaho iteka; kandi umugati nzatanga ni umubiri wanjye, kugira ngo isi igire ubugingo" (Yh 6, 51).
Ni byo koko! Twacungujwe amaraso y’igiciro gikomeye.
Amateka yo gutambagiza Isakramentu
Gutambagiza Isakramentu ritagatifu ry’Ukaristiya ni ukwakira Yezu aho dutuye, tukamuha icyubahiro, tukamupfukamira, tukamuramya kandi tukamusingiza.
Ibyo bikatwibutsa uburyo Yezu yatambagijwe nk’Umwami w’abami i Yeruzalemu (reba Mt 21, 1-21).
Umuhango wo gutambagiza Isakramentu ushingiye ku gitangaza cyabereye i Lanciano mu Butaliyani ahagana mu Kinyejana cya 8, aho Yezu yabonekeye Umusaserdoti wari ufite ugushidikanya ko Yezu ari muzima mu Ukaristiya.
Igihe kimwe arimo gutura igitambo cy’Ukaristiya, Umugati wahindutse inyama na Divayi ihinduka amaraso.
Mu 1208, Yezu yabonekeye umwana w’umukobwa witwa “Yuliyana" aramubwira ati “Igihe cyose nshaka kujya ntambagizwa, bakambona kuko ndi umwami".
Nibwo mu 1247, hahimbajwe bwa mbere umunsi mukuru w’isakramentu ritagatifu (i Liège).
Uwo munsi waje kwemerwa na Papa Urbano wa IV mu 1264, maze mu 1318 Papa Yohani wa XXII asaba ko kuva ubwo hatambagizwa Isakramentu ritagatifu hanze ya Kiliziya ku isi hose.
Nk’uko tubisoma muri Bibiliya, umutambagiro w’Isakramentu ritagatifu wibutsa uburyo dukwiye guha agaciro gakomeye ubushyinguro butagatifu, twagereranya uyu munsi na Taberinakoro (reba 1Bami 8): Ubwo Umwami Salomoni yatambagizaga ubushyinguro butagatifu abuvana mu ihema akajya kubwimika mu Ngoro y’Imana yari amaze kuzuza.
Ukaristiya mu buzima bwacu
Ukaristiya ni ikimenyetso cy’urukundo mu bantu “Uko yagakunze abe bari munsi, abakunda byimazeyo" (Yh 13, 1), maze adusigira umubiri we ngo tubeshweho na we muri uru rugendo rwacu hano ku isi nk’uko kandi byari byaragenuwe kuva na kera ngo “Byuka urye kuko urugendo rukiri rurerure" (1 Bami 19, 7).
Bityo Ukaristiya ni ifunguro ry’abagenzi.
Burya umuntu asa n’ibimutunga.
Abakristu dukwiye guharanira gusa n’uwo duhabwa.
Ntiducike intege z’uko muri ibi bihe nta buryo buraboneka hirya no hino bwo guturira hamwe igitambo cy’Ukaristiya nk’umuryango mugari w’abakristu.
Nyagasani yagendanye natwe kandi azakomeza.
Mu bihe byiza n’ibibi ntajya adusiga.
Twigire ku Bayisiraheli igihe bari impunzi i Babiloni.
Nta Muherezabitambo, nta Jambo ry’Imana, nta Kiliziya, nta Rusengero bari bafite ariko basengeraga mu mitima yabo, mu mahema yabo, bagakumbura Yeruzalemu cyane kuko batigeze bibagirwa ibyiza baharonkeye (reba Zab 137).
Dukomeze dusenge kandi tugire icyizere ko tuzongera gusangira Ukaristiya mu Ngoro y’Imana.
Umwanzuro: Ni byo koko, Yezu ni Muzima mu Ukaristiya, ni ukwemera kubihamya.
Ku buryo butagaragarira amaso yacu, Yezu Kristu ni muzima mu Isakramentu ry’Ukaristiya.
Mutagatifu Sirilo w’i Yeruzalemu yagize ati“Ntukibaze niba ibi ari byo cyangwa atari byo ko Yezu ari muri Ukaristiya, ahubwo akira mu mutima wawe amagambo ya Yezu kuko ari We Kuri kudapfa".
Nyuma y’igihe kirekire kandi aya magambo yaje gushimangirwa na Mutagatifu Tereza w’Avila, aho yagize ati “Ukaristiya ni cyo gitangaza gisumba ibindi mu byo Yezu yakoze.
Nta Ukaristiya isi yareka kubaho".
Ukaristiya nk’umubiri wa Kristu duhabwa wari warashushanyijwe n’igitambo cya Izaki, n’ituro ry’intama ya Pasika ndetse na Manu y’abakurambere bacu.
Dusenge: Nyagasani Yezu Kristu, wowe wadusigiye urwibutso bw’ububabare bwawe mu Isakramentu ry’agatangaza, turakwinginze: Muri uyu mwaka w’Ukaristiya duhimbaje mu bihe bidasanzwe, ngwino iwacu utambagire mu mitima yacu, utambagire mu ngo zacu, utambagire aho dukura umugati utunga imibiri yacu maze uduhe kuzirikana kuri urwo rukundo ruhebuje wadukunze, ukatubera igitambo, ifunguro n’inshuti tubana Igihe cyose.
Turakwinginze ngo udukize ibyaha byacu byose n’ibyago byose, ubidukirishe umubiri wawe n’amaraso yawe, maze uduhe guhora dukomeye ku mategeko yawe no kutagira ubwo twakwitandukanya nawe bibaho.
Padiri Victor AMERIKA
Raporo y’Inama ya Loni ishinzwe ubucuruzi n’iterambere (UNCTAD), yagaragaje ko ishoramari mvamahanga (FDI, Foreign Direct Investment), rizagabanukaho 40% muri uyu mwaka ku isi yose kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Raporo y’Inama ya Loni ishinzwe ubucuruzi n’iterambere (UNCTAD), yagaragaje ko ishoramari mvamahanga (FDI, Foreign Direct Investment), rizagabanukaho 40% muri uyu mwaka ku isi yose kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iyi raporo yatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri, yerekana ko ishoramari mvamahanga rizagabanuka rikava kuri miliyari 1540 z’amadolari ryariho mu 2019 rikagera munsi ya miliyari 1000 z’amadolari, bikaba ari ubwa mbere kuva mu 2005.
Ishoramari mvamahanga byitezwe ko rizagabanuka hagati ya 5-10% mu mwaka utaha hanyuma ryongere kuzamuka mu 2022.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa UNCTAD, Mukhisa Kituyi, yabwiye itangazamakuru ati “Ubukungu bw’Isi yose buri ahantu habi harenze uko byagenze mu 2008, ubwo habagaho ibibazo by’ubukungu".
Yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyagize ingaruka mu byo abantu bashyira ku isoko, ibyo abaguzi bakenera ndetse no kuri gahunda z’ishoramari mvamahanga.
Ibihugu bikennye bizagirwaho ingaruka cyane n’igabanuka ry’ishoramari mvamahanga.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ishoramari muri UNCTAD, James Zhan, yagize ati “Ubukungu buri mu nzira y’amajyambere byitezwe ko buzasubira hasi mu bijyanye n’ishoramari mvamahanga kubera ko buryishingikiriza mu musaruro ndetse no mu byo rikenera".
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo abagize inteko ishinga amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batoye ku bwiganze, icyemezo cyo gutakariza icyizere Perezida Donald J.
Trump akaba ashobora kubura amahirwe yo kurangiza manda ye isigaje umwaka umwe.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo abagize inteko ishinga amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batoye ku bwiganze, icyemezo cyo gutakariza icyizere Perezida Donald J.
Trump akaba ashobora kubura amahirwe yo kurangiza manda ye isigaje umwaka umwe.
Gutora ingingo ya mbere yo gukoresha nabi ububasha Trump ahabwa n’itegeko, byatowe n’abadepite 230 kuri 427 bari bari mu nteko; mu gihe iyo kubangamira imirimo y’inteko ishinga amategeko yatowe n’abadepite 229.
Aya matora asobanuye ku buryo butaziguye ko perezida Trump atakarijwe icyizere n’intumwa za rubanda cyo gukomeza kuyobora Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, nubwo urubanza rwa nyuma ruzacibwa na Sena, aho ishyaka ry’aba-Républicains rifite ubwiganze.
Umuyobozi w’aba -Républicains muri Sena ya Amerika, Mitch McConnell, yavuze ko yifuza ko ibiganiro kuri uyu mwanzuro ukomeye byazaba bigufi.
Gusa nta kigaragaza ko Sena izahitamo gukura ku buyobozi Perezida Trump kuko abasenateri benshi ari abo mu ishyaka rye.
Gukuraho Perezida Trump bisa n’ibirimo amacenga menshi.
Umunsi ku wundi amakuru agenda yisukiranya, agaragaza ko hari abantu benshi babyihishe inyuma, ndetse n’inzira z’ubwiru zinyurwamo ngo iki cyemezo gifatwe.
Ese byatangiye bite?
Muri Nzeri uyu mwaka, nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru avuga ko umwe mu bakozi bashinzwe ubutasi, wahoze anakorera ikigo cy’ubutasi cya CIA, yagejeje ikirego ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, arega Perezida Trump gukora ibikorwa atemererwa n’amategeko.
Mu kirego cye, avuga ko umwe mu bayobozi bo mu biro bya perezida [White House] wamuhaye amakuru; yari atewe impungenge n’ibyavugiwe mu kiganiro kuri telefone cyo muri Nyakanga 2019, hagati ya Perezida Donald Trump na Perezida wa Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky.
Muri iki kiganiro, Perezida Trump yasabye icyo gihugu cy’amahanga kwivanga mu matora ateganyijwe mu mwaka utaha wa 2020, muri Amerika.
Yanashyize igitutu ku gihugu cy’amahanga, agisaba gukora iperereza kuri umwe mu bazahangana nawe mu matora yo muri 2020; byose bigakubirwa mu cyaha cyo gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa n’itegeko nk’umukuru w’igihugu.
Umwunganizi mu mategeko wa Trump, Rudolph Giuliani n’intumwa nkuru ya leta, William Barr, bashyirwa mu majwi ko bafite uruhare rutaziguye muri ibi bikorwa; ndetse ko n’abayobozi bakuru mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu bashatse gukingira ikibaba Trump kuko bazi neza uburemere bw’ibyavuzwe na Trump.
Inzira iteganywa n’amategeko kugira ngo umukozi wo mu biro bishinzwe iperereza atange ikirego cy’ibikorwa biri gukorwa, kandi bitandukanye n’amategeko yarakurikijwe.
Uwatanze iki kirego yakigejeje ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, uyu nawe wagombaga kukigeza ku muyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, nyuma yo gusuzuma uburemere bwacyo.
Gusa umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, Joseph Maguire, ntiyigeze ashyikiriza iki kirego inteko ishinga amategeko, nkuko yabisabwaga n’amategeko; ahubwo yahisemo kugisha inama ibiro bishinzwe ubujyanama muri minisiteri y’ubutabera; ibi nabyo byanzura ko icyo atari ikibazo cyihutirwa nyamara izi mpande zombi nta na rumwe rufite ububasha bwo gufata uwo mwanzuro.
Kuwa 19 Nzeri, nibwo hamenyekanye ko kudashyirwa ahagaragara kw’iki kirego, byagizwemo uruhare na perezida Trump wifuzaga ko Ukraine itangira iperereza kuri Hunter Biden, umuhungu wa Joe Biden, wo mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, wahoze ari Visi Perezida.
Kutavuga rumwe kuri iki kibazo byakomeje kwiyongera, kugera ubwo kuwa 25 Nzeri, 2019, ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byemeye ko raporo ikubiyemo ibiregwa Trump n’amajwi y’ikiganiro kuri telefone hagati ya Trump na Zelensky bishyirwa ahagaragara.
Kuva icyo gihe Trump n’abamushyigikiye batangiye kwamagana ibikubiye muri icyo kirego, bavuga ko bidafite agaciro kandi uwabitangaje nta bumenyi buhagije afite kubyo yaregeye.
Ni iki mu by’ukuri Trump yaganiriye na Zelensky?
Ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White house] byashize hanze ikiganiro Trump yagira na perezida wa Ukraine, byibwira ko bishobora kuzagaragaza neza Trump, ndetse bigahosha umwuka mubi wari utangiye kuzamuka, gusa ibi si ko byagenze.
Ibyo biganiro bigaragaza ko Trump yashatse guhuza inkunga Amerika iha Ukraine, no gusaba Ukraine gukora iperereza kuri Hunter Biden; ndetse n’ubugambanyi bwabaye mu matora yo muri 2016.
Zelensky wagaraje gushaka kumvikana, ahanini bitewe nuko yifuzaga ko Amerika imugurisha ibisasu bya “Javelin anti-tank missiles", Trump yamubwiye ko Rudy Giuliani ari we muntu yizeye babiganiraho.
Ni iki abagize inteko ishinga amategeko bibanzeho mu gusesengura impamvu batakariza icyizere Trump?
Amakuru avuga ko Nancy Pelosi, uyobora inteko ishinga amategeko yifuzaga kumva ibirego byose bishinja Trump gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa nka perezida; gusa abademokarate bibanze ku ngingo yo gutakariza icyizere Trump bareba cyane ku kibazo cya Ukraine, aho kureba ibibazo byose bigaragaza imyitwarire idahwitse ye.
Adam Schiff, uyobora akanama karebana n’ubutasi mu nteko ishinga amategeko, yagaragaje ibibazo bine bifuzaga gukoraho iperereza.
Icya mbere bifuzaga kumenya niba Trump yarongeye gusaba ubufasha igihugu cy’amahanga mu kwivanga mu matora.
Icya kabiri bashakaga kumenya niba ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byaremeye ko bigirana inama na Ukraine, ari uko Ukraine yemeye gutangiza iperereza mu cyimbo cya Trump.
Icya gatatu, bifuzaga kumenya niba Ukraine yari ifite impamvu yo kwizera ko itazahabwa inkunga ya gisirikare, kugeza igihe itangirije iperereza rya Trump.
Icya kane, bifuzaga kumenya niba hari impamvu zifatika zateye Trump kwitwara atyo.
Trump yisobanura ate?
Perezida Trump n’abamushyigikiye bemeza ko nta kidasanzwe yakoze.
Bemeza ko nta nta gitutu bashyizeho Ukraine ngo ibakorere ibitemewe n’amategeko.
Ni iki Joe Biden ahuriyeho na Ukraine?
Dusubije amaso inyuma ubwo Joe Biden yari Visi Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwagerageje gutera inkunga Ukraine mu makirimbirane ifitanye n’u Burusiya.
Abanyaburayi na Amerika bahisemo gushaka uburyo bakuraho Viktor Shokin, wari umushinjacyaha mukuru wa Ukraine, kuko basangaga ruswa yibasiye abayobozi bakuru muri iki gihugu, ari imbogamizi mu gukomeza imbaraga za Ukraine.
Viktor Shokin yafatwaga nk’ufite uruhare runini muri icyo kibazo; yakuwe ku mwanya we, mu mavugurura yakozwe bitegetswe na Amerika n’abanyaburayi; aho Joe Biden yivugiye ko ariwe wategetse ko hafatirwa inkunga ya miliyari imwe y’amadorari kugeza igihe Ukraine ishyize mu bikorwa icyifuzo cyabo.
Hunter Biden ahurira he n’iki kibazo?
Hunter yamaze igihe kinini cy’ubuzima bwe akora ubucuruzi mu izina rya se (Joe Biden).
Yagiraga uruhare rutaziguye mu biganiro byari bigamije kwinjiriza inyungu ubucuruzi bwa se, ndetse akaba n’umuyobozi muri banki yaterwaga inkunga na se.
Hunter Biden yahawe umwanya mu nama y’ubuyobozi y’ikigo cya Amtrak, mu buryo atari akwiye na gato; ndetse anashyirwa mu nama y’ubuyobozi y’ikigo cy’ingufu cya Ukraine [Burisma].
Ibikorwa bya Hunter byaramenyekanye cyane muri politiki y’abademokarate.
Igihe yari mu Bushinwa ari kumwe na se mu ruzinduko rw’akazi; yagiranye ibiganiro n’umuyobozi wa banki ya Private Equity, aho bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru mu biro bya perezida batangiye gukeka ko ari gushaka uburyo bwo kwishakira inyungu ze bwite; ibintu bitari byarigeze bikorwa mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu.
Hunter kandi ngo yari azi neza ko imyitwarire ye irebwa nk’ikibazo mu myaka yabanje, mu gihe cy’amatora.
Kwinjirira amatora ya Amerika
Trump akeka ko ikigo cyitwa ‘Crowdstrike’ gifitanye umubano na Ukraine kandi ko cyahishe ububiko bw’amabanga ya komite nyobozi mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, bibye hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2016.
Trump yifuzaga ko Ukraine iha Amerika ubwo bubiko bw’amabanga.
‘Crowdstrike’ ni ikigo cyo muri Amerika, cyashinzwe ku bufatanye n’umurusiya wahungiye muri Amerika akiri umwana.
Iki kigo cyahawe akazi na komite nyobozi y’ishyaka ry’abademokarate kugira ngo kibafashe kumenya uburyo ubutumwa bwa bamwe mu bayobozi b’abademokarate bwinjiwemo mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2016.
Trump ahangayikishijwe nuko iki kigo kitigeze giha ububiko bw’amabanga cyasesenguye FBI cyangwa undi uwo ariwe wese, nyamara muri Ukraine nta hantu ho guhisha ubwo bubiko bw’amabanga hahari, kandi nta n’impamvu ifatika yatuma babuhisha.
Trump atsimbarara ku ngingo ivuga ko u Burusiya butigeze bwinjira mu mabanga y’abademokarate; ahubwo ari ibinyoma byahimbwe n’ikigo ‘Crowdstrike’ kuko aricyo cyahishe ibimenyetso mu rwego rwo guhimbira ibyaha ubutegetsi bwe n’u Burusiya.
Gutakariza icyizere Perezida bikorwa bite?
Hifashishijwe ingero kuri Nixon na Clinton baheruka kweguzwa, komite ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko mu nteko nshingamategeko niyo igira uruhare runini muri iki gikorwa.
Iyi komite yumva abatangabuhamya, igategura ibirego irega perezida mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko, n’ingingo zijyana nabyo, igakora amatora, byakwemezwa bikoherezwa mu nteko rusange y’abagize inteko nshingamategeko bagakora amatora nabo, ingingo imwe cyangwa zose zatorwa ku bwiganze, Perezida agatakarizwa ikizere.
Kuri perezida Trump we, ikibazo cye cyanyuze mu nzira ebyiri mu gihe kimwe, aho urwego rw’ubutasi rwakoze iby’ibanze, rukora raporo ruyoherereza komite ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko, ari nayo yateguye ibirego bishinjwa Trump.
Nyuma y’ibyemejwe n’abagize inteko nshingamategeko umutwe w’abadepite, umutwe wa Sena niwo uzaca urubanza rwa nyuma rwemeza niba Trump yeguzwa cyangwa agakomeza kuyobora Amerika.
Mu rubanza rwa Sena, uhagarariye perezida mu mategeko niwe uburana kuko perezida ubwe ntagomba kuba ari muri icyo cyumba cy’iburanisha.
Perezida w’urukiko rw’ikirenga niwe ugena uburyo icyemezo cya Sena gishyirwa mu bikorwa, ariko Sena nayo ishobora gutora ivuguruza icyemezo cye.
Kugira ngo kandi icyemezo cya Sena gitorwe, bisaba ko 2/3 by’abasenateri bacyemeza (aba-senateri 67 ku 100).
Sena ya Amerika irimo aba-senateri 53 bo mu ishyaka ry’aba-Repubulikani, bisobanuye ko kugira ngo Trump akurwe ku buyobozi, 20 muri bo basabwa gutora bihuje n’abademokarate.
Trump akuwe ku buyobozi byagenda bite?
Itegeko rivuga ko perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akuweho, asimburwa na visi perezida; Ubu Mike Pence niwe wasimbura Trump.
Igihe baba baviriyeho rimwe, umukuru w’inteko nshingamategeko Nancy Pelosi niwe wayobora; gusa bisa n’ibidashoboka kuko aba-republicains ntibiteguye gukora icyatuma Pelosi ahabwa umwanya wa perezida.
Uza ku mwanya wa kane mu rukurikirane rw’abasimbura Trump ni Mike Pompeo, umunyabanga wa leta; gusa uyu nawe afite aho ahuriye n’ibibazo bya Ukraine.
Uwa gatanu ni ushinzwe imari ya leta Steven Mnuchin, ari nawe udafite imbogamizi n’imwe yamubuza kuba perezida wa Amerika.
Mu ntangiriro za Gicurasi uyu mwaka, abarwanashyaka 23 ba Parti socialiste (PS) mu Bufaransa bahoze muri Guverinoma ya François Mitterand, bandikiye umunyamabanga wa mbere w’iryo shyaka Olivier Faure, bamusaba kwihaniza umukandida wabo mu matora y’abadepite b’u Burayi, washinje Mitterand n’ubutegetsi bwe uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Mu ntangiriro za Gicurasi uyu mwaka, abarwanashyaka 23 ba Parti socialiste (PS) mu Bufaransa bahoze muri Guverinoma ya François Mitterand, bandikiye umunyamabanga wa mbere w’iryo shyaka Olivier Faure, bamusaba kwihaniza umukandida wabo mu matora y’abadepite b’u Burayi, washinje Mitterand n’ubutegetsi bwe uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Abo bari abaminisitiri bikomaga Raphaël Glucksmann wavuze ko Mitterand yagize uruhare muri Jenoside yabaye mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Ni amagambo yavuze amaze kwiyamamaza muri Toulouse ku wa 6 Mata.
Hubert Védrine wabaye Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Ibiro bya Mitterand, aba Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Bufaransa ndetse ubu uyobora Institut François Mitterrand, na we aheruka kwikoma abashinja Sebuja uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nyuma y’imyaka 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe, umwuka mubi ugenda ugaruka mu ishyaka ry’aba-socialistes, ushingiye ku ruhare rutaremerwa u Bufaransa bwagize mu itegurwa ry’umugambi wa Jenoside n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryawo.
Icyo gihe iri shyaka rikomokamo Mitterand ni ryo ryari riyoboye igihugu.
Nk’uko Jeune Afrique yabitangaje, uwahoze ari umunyamabanga wa PS ashinzwe ibibazo mpuzamahanga, Maurice Braud, aheruka kuvuga ko ibyabaye mu 1994 bitatinzweho cyane na PS, kubera ko ryari rifite ibindi birihangayikishije nk’ingaruka zo gutsindwa amatora y’abadepite mu 1993.
Ibiro byari bishinzwe ububanyi n’amahanga muri PS bisa n’aho ari byo byonyine byemeye kuvuga ku kibazo cya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi.
Uwari ubibereye umunyamabanga mukuru, Pervenche Berès, yagaragaje ukutemeranya na gahunda za Elysée na Operation Turquoise yatangiye ku wa 22 Kamena 1994.
Mu itangazo uru rwego rw’ishyaka PS rwasohoye ku wa 16 Kamena, rwavuze ko politiki y’amacakubiri yo mu Bufaransa [guhera mu 1990] yabwamburaga uburenganzira bwo kugira uruhare mu gikorwa cya gisirikare.
Biragoye kuganira kuri iyi ngingo mu ba socialistes
Ubwo hibukwaga ku nshuro ya 20 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe, iki kibazo cyazamuye umwuka mubi hagati y’abantu ba hafi ba François Mitterrand n’ishami ry’urubyiruko muri PS, Mouvement des jeunes socialistes (MJS).
Mbere y’iminsi mike ngo ajye i Kigali, uwari kuba ahagarariye guverinoma y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, Minisitiri w’ubutabera Christiane Taubira, yasubitse urugendo nyuma y’amagambo Perezida Paul Kagame yavugiye mu kiganiro na Jeune Afrique.
Yagarutse ku ruhare rutaziguye rw’u Bubiligi n’u Bufaransa muri politiki yagejeje kuri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ndetse icyo gihugu kindi kiza kugira uruhare mu kuyishyira mu bikorwa.
Ku wa 5 Mata MJS yasohoye itangazo yamagana uko kwisubiraho kwabaye ku munota wa nyuma.
Riti “U Bufaransa bugomba kwemera uruhare rwose bwagize mu gushyigikira ubutegetsi bwateguye jenoside kuva mu 1990 kugeza mu 1994".
Ni ubutumwa ariko bwanenzwe n’abantu ba hafi na Mitterrand.
Paul Quilès wayoboye komisiyo y’Inteko Ishinga amategeko y’u Bufaransa mu isesengura ryo mu 1998 ku ruhare rwabwo mu Rwanda, yavuze ko habayeho ibiganiro hamwe na MJS ku cyicaro cy’ishyaka, hasobanurwa izo ngingo.
Uwari Perezida w’itsinda ry’ubucuti bw’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko y’icyo gihugu hagati ya 2007-2012, Marylise Lebranchu, ahamya ko atari ubwa mbere umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa uteje umwiryane hagati y’abantu bakabaye bashyigikirana.
Mu 2010 mu gihe umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa wari uhagaze neza ku butegetsi bwa Nicolas Sarkozy wanagiriye uruzinduko i Kigali muri Gashyantare uwo mwaka, Marylise wari umudepite w’umu socialiste yagombaga kujya mu Rwanda ayoboye rya tsinda ry’ubucuti kuva ku wa 7 kugeza ku wa 10 Kamena.
Ati "Mbere yo kugenda, nakiriye telefoni ya Hubert Védrine [wabaye Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Elysée], wakuraga icyasha cyose ku Bufaransa, hamwe n’indi ya Paul Quilès.
Twashyizweho igitutu,"
Mu mvugo za MJS cyangwa Raphaël Glucksmann ndetse n’abahoze ari abantu ba hafi ba Mitterrand, bisa n’aho icyuho kirimo hagati aho bigoye kuzikiba.
Jean-Christophe Cambadélis wigeze kuba umunyamabanga wa mbere muri iri shyaka (2014- 2017), aheruka kugira ati “Hari byinshi boshobora kuvugwa ku bikorwa by’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, ariko ntabwo twabyita kugira uruhare muri Jenoside.
Olivier Faure uri muri uyu mwanya na we asa n’uwamaze kwerekana aho ahagaze.
Muri Mata 2019 yanze gushyira umukono ku nyandiko yasinyweho n’andi mashyaka, yasabaga Perezida Emmanuel Macron kujya mu Rwanda “kuvugisha ukuri" kuri Jenoside.
Mu ibaruwa yo ku wa 15 Werurwe Olivier Faure yandikiye Benjamin Abtan uyobora umuryango wo mu Burayi urwanya ivangura, EGAM, ari na wo watangije icyo gitekerezo, yitandukanyije n’icyo gikorwa avuga ko “cyaha agaciro gahunda z’ubutegetsi bw’igitugu, bwica bukanafunga abatavuga rumwe nabwo.
Ku wa 20 Gicurasi, Olivier Faure yakiriye Hubert Védrine na Paul Quilès, aho abo batatu bemeranyije ku mwanzuro ko “nyuma y’amatora y’u Burayi, ishyaka PS rizatangiza ibiganiro ku bagize uruhare muri Jenoside mu Rwanda.
Tuzasaba ifungurwa ry’ishyinguranyandiko z’ibihugu byose n’inzego zagize ruhare muri ayo makimbirane, kuva ku ntangiroro yayo kugeza ku iherezo.
Kugeza ubu ayo madosiye ntiyafunguwe.
Muri Nyakanga hagati ariko Olivier yagize ati “Ntabwo uyu mushinga utatangira ariko nshyigikiye icyo gitekerezo.
Paul Quilès we yavuze ko yifuza biganiro, ariko binafite imirongo bigenderaho.
Ati “Nifuza ibiganiro aho ibintu byose tuzabishyira ku meza, ariko byibanda mbere na mbere, ku mateka bigendana n’igihe.
Bitari ibiganiro bishingiye kuri raporo ya Mucyo [yasohotse mu 2008 yakozwe na komisiyo yigenga yashyiriweho gushaka ibimenyetso ku ruhare rw’u Bufaransa mu gutegura no gushyira mu bikorwa umugambi wa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994], ivuga ko u Bufaransa hari amakosa bwakoze.
Abahanzi b’imideli bibumbiye muri Collective Rw bamuritse imyambaro n’imirimbo bahanze yiganjemo iyo mu Rwanda mu birori bikomeye byabaye mu ijoro ryo kuwa 10 Kamena 2017.
Abahanzi b’imideli bibumbiye muri Collective Rw bamuritse imyambaro n’imirimbo bahanze yiganjemo iyo mu Rwanda mu birori bikomeye byabaye mu ijoro ryo kuwa 10 Kamena 2017.
Ibi birori by’imideli CollectiveRW Fashion Week byabereye mu ihema rya Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village[KCEV], byateguwe n’ikompanyi Collective Rw.
Iyi yashinzwe mu 2015, ihuriwemo n’abanyamideli bo mu Rwanda bagamije guteza imbere imideli yahangiwe mu Rwanda ndetse no kuzamura ireme ry’abakora uyu mwuga bakamenyekana ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Ibirori bya Collective Rw byitabiriwe n’abahanzi b’imideli batangije iki gikorwa Sonia Mugabo, Teta Isibo, Mathew Rugamba, Linda Mukangoga na Candy Basomingera.
Muri uyu mwaka hiyongereyemo abashya barimo inzu z’imideli za Amizero, Moshions na Uzi Collections.
Imideli yerekanywe irimo amakanzu, amashati, amapantaro, inkweto, ibikapu byo mu moko yose, ingofero n’imirimbo inyuranye byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Iyi mideli yerekanwe muri ibi birori harimo iyakorewe mu Rwanda n’iyahanzwe n’abanyamideli mpuzamahanga.
Ibirori byatangiye saa kumi n’imwe n’igice, abantu babanje gusangira, kungurana ibitekerezo no kwishima babifashijwemo n’umuziki uyunguruye wacurangwaga mu busitani bwa KCEV.
Ku isaha ya saa tatu z’ijoro nibwo MC Regis Isheja na Kemiyondo Coutinho bari bayoboye ibirori batangije igikorwa ari nabwo abahanzi b’imideli icumi batangiye kwerekana ibyo bahanze.
Mu ihema rya Akagera hari umuteguro ubereye ijisho ku buryo buri mutumirwa wese yarebaga ibirori nta kimukoma imbere.
Abanyamideli biyerekanaga banyuranamo mu nzira zari zateguwe hagati mu bakunzi b’imideli ku buryo wabonaga ko batojwe kandi biteguye neza.
Saa yine z’ijoro icyiciro cya mbere cy’imideli cyari gisojwe habaho undi mwanya wo gusangira, kungurana ibitekerezo no gukata umuziki.
Saa tanu z’ijoro ikindi cyiciro cy’imideli cyahise kimurikwa herekanwa ibyakozwe n’abahanzi bo muri Inzuki Designs, Haute Baso, House of Tayo na Sonia Mugabo.
Umuhanzi w’imideli ukomeye muri Afurika y’Epfo Laduma Ngxokolo na we yerekanye imideli yahanze yiganjemo iyerekana akarango k’imyambaro yo mu muco w’iwabo.
Yabaye n’umwe mu bahanzi berekanye imideli yishimiwe ku rwego rukomeye muri ibi birori.
Icyumweru cyahariwe imideli cya CollectiveRW Fashion Week cyatangiye kuwa 6 Kamena 2017 kuri Repub Lounge iherereye ku Kimihurura.
Mu ntangiriro abanyamideli bahawe amasomo arimo kubigisha kuba abanyamwuga no kumenya gukoresha iyi mpano.
Umuhanga mu mideli witwa Rachel Young ni we wabahaye aya masomo.

Muri iki gitabo atangamo ingero z’uburyo abagore bagize uruhare mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu n’umusanzu bakomeje gutanga nyuma ya Jenoside ngo u Rwanda rwongere kuba igihugu cyubashywe.

Icyiciro cya gatatu cy’umushinga wo guteza imbere urwego rw’amashanyarazi, ni icya nyuma mu mushinga mugari wagombaga gutwara miliyoni 375 z’amadolari, inguzanyo ya mbere yo gutangiza uwo mushinga ikaba yaratanzwe mu Ukuboza 2017, iya nyuma yatanzwe umwaka ushize.
Uwo mushinga ugomba kurangirana na 2020, ugamije gufasha mu iterambere ry’urwego rw’amashanyarazi mu Rwanda nkuko biri muri gahunda y’Igihugu y’Iterambere, NST1, mu ntego yo kugeza amashanyarazi kuri bose bitarenze mu 2024.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr.
Uzziel Ndagijimana, yavuze ko inkunga bahawe izafasha mu guharanira ko serivisi z’amashanyarazi zikomeza gutangwa nta kirogoya.

Mu mpera z’uyu mushinga mu Ukuboza 2020 byitezwe ko ingo 61 % mu Rwanda zizaba zigerwaho n’amashanyarazi, bitange icyizere ku kugera ku 100 % mu mwaka wa 2024.
