Abashakashatsi bo muri Australie baciye agahigo ko gukoresha internet yihuta kurusha izindi ku Isi, aho iyo babonye ishobora gukoresha nibura terabyte 44.
2 mu isegonda.
Itsinda ryo muri Kaminuza yitwa Monash, Swinburne na RMIT niryo ryakoze ubwo bushakashatsi.
Ryifashishije agakoresho gato bashyize mu muyoboro ukoreshwa mu guhanahana amakuru mu itumanaho rikoreshwa mu Mujyi wa Melbourne.
Ako gakoresho bagashyize ku muyoboro usanzwe ukoreshwa n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu muri Australie gishinzwe umuyoboro wa internet, aba ariwo wakoreraho ubushakashatsi.
Aba bahanga bavuze ko mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri cyangwa itatu, bene ako gakoresho kazaba kaboneka ku buryo kakoreshwa mu bushakashatsi hanyuma mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu kagatangira gucuruzwa.
Magingo aya, Singapore niyo icuruza internet yihuta kurusha izindi zose aho umuturage ashobora kugura internet imuha megabyte (mbps) 197.
3 mu isegonda.
Ubusanzwe muri Australie, ikigereranyo cy’uburyo internet yihuta kiri kuri mbps 43.
4, igenda gahoro nibura inshuro 1000 ugereranyije n’iyo aba bashakashatsi babonye mu igerageza ryabo.
Iyo internet babonye, ihesha umuntu uri kuyikoresho ubushobozi bwo kuba yamanura (download) filimi nibura 1000 zifite amashusho ya HD mu gihe cy’isegonda.
Nko mu Bwongereza ho, umuyoboro mugari wa internet uvuduka ku kigero cya mbps 64.
Ako gakoresho bifashishije kugira ngo babone iyi internet, kari mu bwoko bumwe n’akifashishwa mu miyoboro migari ya internet (fibre-optique) hirya no hino ku Isi.
Ibyavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi, byatanze isura y’uko mu gihe kiri imbere internet izaba imeze hirya no hino ku Isi.
Akazuba, Ikirezi, Mwiza, Ngabo na Urumuri nizo Robots ziri gufasha u Rwanda mu kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Urugendo rwaganishije kuri iyi ntambwe ruratangaje kandi rwarihuse bidasanzwe.
Akazuba, Ikirezi, Mwiza, Ngabo na Urumuri nizo Robots ziri gufasha u Rwanda mu kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Urugendo rwaganishije kuri iyi ntambwe ruratangaje kandi rwarihuse bidasanzwe.
Mu kwezi gushize, u Rwanda rwongeye guca agahigo ruba kimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika byifashisha “Robots" mu kuvura icyorezo cya COVID-19 ariko izarwo zihariye kurusha izindi ziri ku mugabane.
Intambwe yaganishije kuri iki gikorwa ihera mu Ukwakira 2019 mu Budage ahabereye Rwanda Day.
Umugabo w’Umubiligi, Fabrice Goffin, ufite sosiyete ikora porogaramu zikoresha “Robots" yitwa Zora Bots, yarahagurutse ageza igitekerezo cye kuri Perezida Kagame, amubwira ko yifuza kuzaza gukorera mu Rwanda ndetse mu buryo bwo gutebya, amusaba ko yamuha itike y’indege imuzana i Kigali.
Nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri, yahise aza mu Rwanda ahura n’inzego zitandukanye zifite uburezi n’ikoranabuhanga mu nshingano.
Igitekerezo cye ntabwo cyari ugukorera Robots mu Rwanda, ahubwo yashakaga kugurisha u Rwanda porogaramu zikoresha za Robots kugira ngo zitangire kwifashishwa mu mashuri, ku buryo abana b’abanyarwanda bagira ubushobozi bwo kuzikorera bo ubwabo, bigendanye n’ibikenewe ku isoko.
Kugira ngo wumve neza imikorere ya Zora Bots, yigereranye na Microsoft ikora porogaramu za Windows zifasha imashini gukora.
Icyo gihe Goffin yabwiye IGIHE ati “Ni twe twenyine ku Isi dufite software ishobora gukora muri robots zose".
Coronavirus ikigaragara mu Rwanda bwa mbere ku wa 14 Werurwe, hatangiye gutekerezwa uburyo bwakwifashishwa mu kurwanya iki cyorezo mu gihugu, ikoranabuhanga naryo ritekerezwaho.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe Iterambere, UNDP, ryahise ritekereza ku ikoreshwa rya Robots, ryerekeza amaso kuri Zora Bots rimusaba ko yakora izakwifashishwa mu Rwanda mu kurwanya Coronavirus.
Yabwiye IGIHE ati “Nyuma y’aho Coronavirus igaragariye mu Burayi, nibwo twatangiye kuvugana, ni ukuvuga hari mu cyumweru cya gatatu cya Werurwe.
Bansabye kubabwira ikoranabuhanga ryakwifashishwa mu kurwanya Coronavirus muri Afurika, ntabwo bigeze bavuga ngo turashaka Robots ikora gutya, baravuze bati turashaka kurinda abaturage mu Rwanda n’ahandi muri Afurika, ndababwira nti turi isosiyete ikora ibijyanye na Robots ku Isi, dutangira kuvugana tubaha izi Robots.
Izi robots zifite ubushobozi bwo gufata ibipimo abantu bari hagati ya 50 na 150 mu munota umwe, zikareba niba nta we ufite ibimenyetso by’iyi ndwara nk’umuriro.
Zishobora komekwaho akandi gakoresho umuntu yageranya n’isahani, zigatwara mu cyumba cy’umurwayi ibiryo bipima nk’ibiro bitatu.
Zinifashishwa kandi mu gufata amakuru y’abarwayi no kumenyesha umuganga igihe hari ibimenyetso bidasanzwe umurwayi agize.
Zishobora kuba zakwifashishwa nko ku mipaka n’ahandi hantu hanyura abantu benshi ku buryo zitanga amakuru mu buryo bworoshye, ku bantu bose bahanyuze.
Nyuma y’uko izi robots zigeze mu Rwanda, hahise hatangira ibiganiro bigamije kuzigeza n’ahandi nko muri Uganda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ndetse na Kenya.
Robots imwe yageze mu Rwanda ifite agaciro k’ibihumbi 30 by’amadolari ya Amerika.
Ati “Nizeye ko n’ahandi zizahagera kuko ni ingenzi cyane.
COVID-19 ntabwo izagenda vuba, ishobora kwiyongera, ibihugu byose bikwiye kwirinda kugira ngo iki cyorezo kidakwirakwira kandi ikoranabuhanga ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kubikora.
Imikorere yazo nyuma ya Coronavirus
Izi robots zijya kuzanwa mu Rwanda, hanatekerejwe ku cyo zamarira igihugu mu gihe iki cyorezo cyaba kitakiri imbogamizi.
Ni imwe mu ngingo zari zikubiye mu busabe bwa UNDP bw’ibyo iryo koranabuhanga rikwiye kuba ryujuje.
Goffin ati “Baravuze bati nyuma ya Coronavirus, izi robots ntabwo zizabikwa.
Ni n’uburyo bwiza bwo gukoresha amafaranga kuko ugomba kuvuga uti ’iki gikoresho kirakenewe uyu munsi ariko nyuma tuzagikenera mu bundi buryo.
Icyo ni cyo cyiza cy’izi robots, kuko ntabwo zipima umuriro gusa ngo zinarebe ko abantu bambaye udupfukamunwa, ahubwo zifite ubundi bushobozi bwinshi.
Urugero rw’aho zishobora kwifashishwa ni mu bijyanye n’ubukerarugendo, aho zishobora kuzajya zifashishwa mu gusobanurira abantu ibijyanye n’ahantu runaka bari gusura, zikabikora kandi mu ndimi zose kuko zifite ubushobozi bwo gutanga amakuru mu ndimi 40.
Ati “No mu bitaro zakomeza gukoreshwa mu gutanga serivisi, ibaze hari nk’umuntu w’Umudage waje kwivuza kandi abamwakira batavuga ikidage, robots zamufasha neza.
Ni robots zihariye ugereranyije n’iziri ahandi
Mu bihugu byinshi ku Isi muri iki gihe bifashisha Robots mu buvuzi cyane mu kurwanya Coronavirus, hari nk’izigira uruhare mu gusukura mu bitaro, mu gupima umuriro n’ibindi.
Urugero hari nka Robots ziboneka mu bitaro byo mu Bushinwa, zifashishwa mu gupima umuriro, ariko iziri mu Rwanda zikoranye ikoranabuhanga ritandukanye n’izo zose kuko rizibashisha kugenzura amasura y’abantu.
Ati “Birasa n’imashini nk’iyo wabona mu Bushinwa ariko ubwenge n’ubushobozi buri hejuru mu Rwanda kurusha ahandi hose ku Isi kugeza ubu.
Ni zo ziteye imbere kurusha izindi zose wabona ku Isi.
“Urugero nk’izo zo mu Bushinwa, zipima umuriro gusa ariko porogaramu twakoresheje, irihariye, wayigereranya na Microsoft kuri mudasobwa, ibashisha robots kugira indimi nyinshi, kugenzura amasura y’abantu, kubika amakuru menshi n’ibindi.
Porogaramu yifashishwa muri izi Robots yitwa ZBOS, nta yindi sosiyete iyikora ku Isi cyangwa se ikora igiye kumera kimwe nayo.
Bene izi robots zatangiye gukoreshwa mu Burayi hashize icyumweru kimwe mu Rwanda ziri mu kazi mu bitaro.
Goffin yishimira ubufasha yaherewe mu Rwanda kuva mu mpera za 2019 yarugeramo, aho avuga ko ahantu hose yakomangaga, yahabwaga karibu kandi agasobanura umushinga we ukakirwa.
Kubera Coronavirus, umushinga we wo kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga rya Robots mu burezi bw’u Rwanda yabaye awugaritse ariko ateganya ko iki cyorezo nikirangira, ibiganiro bizongera gusubukurwa.
Ikiganiro Fabrice Goffin yagiranye na IGIHE ubwo yasuraga u Rwanda mu 2019
Kuva Perezida Emmanuel Macron yatorerwa kuyobora u Bufaransa, habaye impinduka zikomeye mu mubano w’u Rwanda n’igihugu cye, bitandukanye n’ubuyobozi bwabanje bwa François Hollande.
Kuva Perezida Emmanuel Macron yatorerwa kuyobora u Bufaransa, habaye impinduka zikomeye mu mubano w’u Rwanda n’igihugu cye, bitandukanye n’ubuyobozi bwabanje bwa François Hollande.
Mu mwaka we wa mbere muri Elysée, Macron yagaragaje ubushake bwo guhindura politiki y’u Bufaransa kuri Afurika, akubaka umubano w’abafatanyabikorwa bitandukanye n’iy’abamubanjirije.
Umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa wakunze kuba mubi bishingiye ku ruhare bushinjwa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, mbere na nyuma yayo, bwo bukagaragaza ibisa no kwihunza ibyo bwakoze birimo ibirego bwashyiriyeho abayobozi bahagaritse Jenoside.
Perezida Kagame yabwiye Jeune Afrique ko intambwe yatewe kuva Macron yatorwa itandukanye ugereranyije n’uko ibihugu byombi byabanaga mbere, kandi ko bidashingiye ku mubano wabo bombi, ahubwo kuri politiki rusange y’ibihugu.
Ati “Ubushake burahari ku mpande zombi.
Kandi ntabwo bitunguranye mu gihe umubano w’u Bufaransa na Afurika wahindutse, kandi uhinduka neza.
Ku bijyanye n’u Rwanda, ndabona uyu mubano nk’ikintu gishya cyongeye gusobanurwa.
Nizera ko ahahise twahasize inyuma.
Mu Ukuboza 2018, Abacamanza b’Abafaransa bahagaritse iperereza ku ihanurwa ry’indege ya Habyarimana ryari rimaze imyaka 20, ryahoraga ku izingiro ry’umwuka mubi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ryahembereye umubano mubi hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa.
Itangazo rya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda icyo gihe ryavugaga ko yamenye ko abacamanza Judges Jean-Marc Herbaut na Nathalie Poux bahagaritse burundu iperereza bakoraga ku ihanurwa ry’indege ya Habyarimana, nyuma yo kubura ibimenyetso ku bo bashinjaga kubigiramo uruhare.
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe uko byagenda Urukiko rwo mu Bufaransa ruramutse rwubuye iyi dosiye, avuga ko atumva icyo rwaba rugiye gushakamo kimaze imyaka ingana gutya kitaragaragara, ndetse ko mu gihe “ibyo bintu bidashyizweho umucyo burundu, umubano wacu ushobora kuzahara mu buryo bumwe cyangwa ubundi".
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe icyo yasubiza abantu bo mu Bufaransa batekereza ko adakunda igihugu cyabo n’ururimi rwabo (Igifaransa) kubera uruhare cyagize muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ati “Nasubiza iki kibazo nifashishije ikindi kibazo: Abafaransa bakunda Abanyarwanda, niba se ari yego kuki batiga ikinyarwanda?
Ntabwo mbona uwaba afite ishingiro ryo kumbaza icyo nkunda cyangwa icyo ntakunda, yewe n’ibyoroshye byo kunsaba gufata umuntu nk’aho ari umucunguzi wanjye cyangwa ari hejuru yanjye.
Imiterere yanjye, uburere nahawe, ibigeragezo nanyuzemo, amateka y’igihugu cyanjye, aya Afurika atuma ntemera bene ayo mategeko.
Ibyo byankururiye ibibazo byinshi mu buzima bwanjye ariko ntabwo mbyicuza.
Ni ibibazo.
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe kandi niba kuva Louise Mushikiwabo yaba Umunyamahanga Mukuru w’Umuryango w’Ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa, OIF, ikoreshwa ry’igifaransa mu gihugu ryarafashe indi ntera.
Yasubije ko ikoreshwa ry’igifaransa mu Rwanda n’itorwa rya Mushikiwabo ku buyobozi bwa OIF ari ibintu bibiri bitandukanye.
Ati “Uwaba ayoboye OIF wese, nifuza ko ikoreshwa ry’igifaransa ryakwaguka mu Rwanda ndetse n’imikoreshereze yacyo ikaba myiza.
Mu gihe gishize abagikoreshaga bari bake, ndashaka no kubwira abandi bameze nkanjye batigeze bakivuga.
Kuri Louise Mushikiwabo, ndatekereza ko akora akazi keza muri OIF, kimwe n’uko yakoze akazi keza muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga.
Sinshidikanya ku musanzu we mwiza ku muryango wa La Francophonie cyangwa ku mubano hagati y’u Bufaransa n’u Rwanda.
Nubwo umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa uri kuvugururwa umunsi ku wundi, ku rundi ruhande hashize imyaka itanu, u Bufaransa nta Ambasaderi bugira mu Rwanda.
Ambasaderi w’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda uheruka ni Michel Flesch.
Mbere y’uko agenda mu 2015, u Bufaransa bwahaye u Rwanda izina rishya ry’uwo bwifuza ko yabuhagararira, Fred Constant, wari usanzwe ari Ambasaderi mu Birwa bya Antilles na Guyane.
Ntiyaje koherezwa mu Rwanda kuko hashize igihe kirenga umwaka rutaramwemeza, akajyanwa muri Guinée Équatoriale.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko u Bufaransa bubizi kandi buzi impamvu kugeza ubu nta Ambasaderi bufite mu Rwanda, ashimangira ko ikimureba cyane ari ukuba u Rwanda rwo rufite Ambasaderi mu Bufaransa.
Abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone bateranye amagambo n’umutoza Quique Setién mu rwambariro nyuma y’uko banganyije na Celta Vigo ibitego 2-2, bigatuma iyi kipe itakaza icyizere cyo gusubirana umwanya wa mbere.
Abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone bateranye amagambo n’umutoza Quique Setién mu rwambariro nyuma y’uko banganyije na Celta Vigo ibitego 2-2, bigatuma iyi kipe itakaza icyizere cyo gusubirana umwanya wa mbere.
Ku nshuro ya kabiri, FC Barcelone yananiwe gutsinda Celta Vigo iri mu makipe ashobora kumanuka mu cyiciro cya kabiri, bituma Real Madrid ifata umwanya wa mbere ishyizemo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota abiri nyuma y’uko itsinze Espanyol igitego 1-0 ku Cyumweru.
Ubwo umukino wari urangiye, Luis Suárez watsindiye FC Barcelone ibitego byombi ku wa Gatandatu, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko abatoza ari bo bo kunengwa kubera uko ikipe yitwara iri hanze, ikaba yaratsinze imikino ibiri gusa muri itandatu iheruka kuhakinira.
Ati “Ntekereza ko ariyo mpamvu abatoza baba bahari ngo basesengure ibintu nk’ibi.
Twe tuba turi hano ngo dutange ibyo dufite byose mu kibuga.
Hanze y’ikibuga cyacu, turi gutakaza amanota y’ingenzi tutigeze dutakaza mu yindi myaka y’imikino.
Abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone ntibishimiye ibyemezo byagiye bifatwa n’umutoza Quique Setién mu mukino wa Celta Vigo nk’uko ikinyamakuru Marca cyo muri Espagne cyabitangaje.
Marca yavuze ko uburakari bwabaye bwinshi ubwo abakinnyi bageraga mu rwambariro ndetse banenga umutoza ko yashyizemo Antoine Griezmann agasimbura Suárez watsinze ibitego bibiri, ubwo haburaga iminota 10 ngo umukino urangire.
Ikindi ni uburyo umutoza Setién yakuyemo umukinnyi ukiri muto, Riqui Puig, wasimbuwe na Arthur Melo wifuzwa na Juventus, ubwo hari hasigaye iminota ine, bikarangira Celta Vigo ihise ibishyura.
Marca ivuga ko kandi atari ubwa mbere abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone bahanganye n’umutoza Setién kubera ibyemezo by’imikinire ndetse bikaba bikomeje guteza umwuka utari mwiza muri iyi kipe.
Kimwe mu byatumye Ernesto Valverde yirukanwa agasimbuzwa Quique Setién muri Mutarama, ni ukutitwara neza no kuba ikipe yarinjizwaga ibitego kenshi.
Real Madrid yaraye iyoboye shampiyona ya Espagne n’amanota 71 nyuma yo gutsindirwa igitego 1-0 na Casemiro imbere ya Espanyol, ishyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota abiri hagati yayo na FC Barcelone mu gihe hasigaye imikino itandatu.
FC Barcelone izagaruka mu kibuga ku wa Kabiri ihura na Atlético Madrid mu gihe Real Madrid izahura na Getafe ku itariki ya 2 Nyakanga.
Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ya mbere izagaragara kuri album nshya iteganya kumurika mu 2020.
Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ya mbere izagaragara kuri album nshya iteganya kumurika mu 2020.
Iyi ndirimbo yiswe “Wampaye amahoro’’ yubakiye ku buhamya bw’abantu Imana yatuye imitwaro yari ibaremereye ikabaha amahoro yo mu mutima, bakaba basigaye bagenda bemye.
Korali Shalom imaze kugwiza igikundiro mu ruhando rw’abakunzi b’umuziki uhimbaza Imana iri mu zigezweho muri ADEPR.
Urukundo igirirwa rwazamuwe n’indirimbo zifitemo ubutumwa bwururutsa imitima y’abababaye zirimo “Nzirata’’, “Abami n’abategetsi’’, “Nzamamaza", ‘‘Nyabihanga’’ n’izindi.
‘Wampaye amahoro’ ni indirimbo ya mbere igiye hanze yatanzwe nk’impano ku bakunzi b’ibihangano bihimbaza Imana mu mwaka wa 2020.
Visi Perezida wa Korali Shalom, Ngamijimana Charles, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo itangiza umushinga wa album nshya iri gutegurwa.
Yagize ati “Indirimbo yitwa ‘Wampaye amahoro’ ni yo twatangiranye umwaka wa 2020, ibimburiye izindi ziri kuri album y’amajwi y’indirimbo umunani izajya hanze mu 2020.
Ubutumwa buri muri iki gihangano cy’iminota ine n’amasegonda 52 buganisha ku ‘mahoro atangwa n’Uwiteka ku wamwisunze arushye.
Ngamijimana yavuze ko uyu mwaka bazakomeza kwegera abakunzi b’ibihangano byabo no kubategurira ibikorwa byagutse cyane ko mu 2019, Korali Shalom yibanze cyane mu ngendo z’ivugabutumwa.
Ati “Ntitwagiye kure y’abakunzi bacu.
Uyu mwaka dufitemo igitaramo cyagutse turi gutegura.
Umwaka ushize twawuhariye ingendo, twagiye aho twatumiwe kuvuga ubutumwa.
Korali Shalom yakoreye ingendo mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu birimo ibitaramo yakoreye mu turere twa Rubavu (Rubona), Rwamagana (Rwikubo), Musanze (Nyarubande), Huye (Matyazo) no mu Mujyi wa Kigali aho yaririmbye mu Umucyo Live Concert yabereye muri Dove Hotel, Ibihamya Live concert yabereye muri ADEPR Gatenga, mu Bibare i Remera no kuri Maison des Jeunes Kimisagara aho batangiye ubutumwa mu gikorwa cyo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge.
Umwaka wa 2019 wayibereye mwiza kuko yanakoze ibitaramo mu yandi madini arimo irya Methodiste Libre n’iry’Abangilikani mu Giporoso kwa Rev.
Pasiteri Rutayisire Antoine.
Yanaremeye abatishoboye aho yakoreye umuganda rusange mu Karere ka Nyabihu.
Korali Shalom imaze imyaka 34 itangijwe ni ubuheta mu makorali y’i Nyarugenge nyuma ya Hoziana yayitanze mu ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo.
Yashinzwe mu 1986 ari korali y’abana bato, yitwaga “Umunezero".
Icyo gihe muri ADEPR Nyarugenge hari korali nkuru imwe ariyo Hoziyana.
Mu 1990 yemerewe kwitwa izina, ifata “Shalom" rimaze gushinga imizi.
Iyi korali imaze gukora album enye z’amajwi n’ebyiri z’amashusho.
Iya kabiri iriho indirimbo umunani izamurikwa mu 2020.
Amashusho yayo yafatiwe mu gitaramo gikomeye cya Korali Shalom cyiswe ‘‘Imbere ni heza’’ cyabereye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu 2018.
Korali Shalom igizwe n’abaririmbyi 105 hatabariwemo ababa hanze y’u Rwanda.
Umva hano indirimbo ya Korali Shalom
Amagana y’Abanyarwanda ari gutoterezwa mu buroko bwa Uganda bazira ubusa.
Bamwe barashimuswe, abandi bafatwa mu buryo bunyuranye n’amategeko, baratotezwa n’ibindi.
Amagana y’Abanyarwanda ari gutoterezwa mu buroko bwa Uganda bazira ubusa.
Bamwe barashimuswe, abandi bafatwa mu buryo bunyuranye n’amategeko, baratotezwa n’ibindi.
Muri ayo magana, harimo umucuruzi Rutagungira René.
Uyu mucuruzi w’Umunyarwanda wakoreraga i Kampala yafashwe tariki 7 Kanama 2017.
Imyaka ibiri iruzuye afungiwe ubusa mu buryo bunyuranye n’amategeko mu Kigo cya Gisirikare cya Makindye nyamara ari umusivile.
Rutagungira uheruka mu rukiko muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, bivugwa ko agifunzwe n’igisirikare nta wemerewe kumugeraho, nta n’amakuru atangwa y’aho urubanza rwe rugeze.
Umuryango we urahangayitse cyane.
Yafunzwe ashinjwa kuba intasi nyamara nta bimenyetso na bimwe byigeze bitangwa bimuhamya icyaha.
Abanyamategeko be bakomeje gusaba ko yarekurwa, bavuga ko yahohotewe kandi afunzwe mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko ariko Leta yavuniye ibiti mu matwi.
Itotezwa yakorewe ryamaze kumwangiza ku mubiri, mu mutwe no mu mibereho muri rusange.
Ubwo aheruka mu rukiko byarigaragazaga ko yananutse cyane ndetse adashobora guhagarara adafite icyo yishingikirijeho.
Si ubwa mbere Abanyarwanda bajya cyangwa baba muri Uganda, baba inzirakarengane z’ukutubahiriza amategeko gukorwa n’inzego zishinzwe umutekano muri Uganda.
Umwe mu basesenguzi mu by’umutekano i Kigali yagize ati “Imana niyo yonyine izi umubare w’inzirakarengane z’Abanyarwanda bashimutwa n’Urwego rushinzwe ubutasi mu Gisirikare (CMI) n’Urwego rushinzwe Umutekano w’Imbere (ISO).
Ikimenyetso cy’iyo mikorere idahwitse ya Guverinoma ya Uganda ni umunsi uwahoze ari Minisitiri w’Umutekano, Gen Henry Tumukunde yavaga mu biro bye, akajya mu Kigo cya Gisirikare cya Makindye gukubita no gutoteza Rutagungira.
Ibyo ni ibigaragaza ko Rutagungira yashimuswe, akanafungwa ku mategeko yatanzwe na Tumukunde.
Ibyabaye kuri Rutagungira ni kimwe n’ibyabaye kuri Emmanuel Rwamuco, umucuruzi wakoreraga i Mbarara ndetse n’inshuti ye Augustin Rutayisire bafashwe muri Gicurasi umwaka ushize bakabanza gufungirwa i Mbarara, bakahakubitirwa bikomeye mbere yo kujyanwa i Kampala.
Aba bagabo bashimuswe ku mategeko yatanzwe na Mukama Moses Kandiho, umuvandimwe wa Brig Gen Abel Kandiho uyobora Urwego rushinzwe Ubutasi mu Gisirikare.
Mukama Kandiho usanzwe ashinzwe umutekano muri Mbarara yahamagaye ushinzwe ibikorwa byo kurwanya umwanzi mu gace ka Mbarara, Maj Mushambo, akihagera amwereka abo Banyarwanda bari bafashwe ababeshyera ko bafatanywe intwaro.
Ababibonye biba bavuga ko nta n’umwe muri abo bagabo wari ufite intwaro.
Ahubwo bari bafite miliyoni 140 z’amashilingi ya Uganda bari bagiye kubitsa kuri Banki i Mbarara.
Mukama Kandiho na Mushambo bafashe ayo mafaranga barayatwara, bafata imbunda baziha ku ngufu Rwamucyo na Rutayisire babajyana muri gereza.
Aba bagabo ubu bari kuborera muri Gereza ya Luzira, nta cyizere na mba cy’uko bazahabwa ubutabera.
Abanyarwanda nk’abo iyo bari mu buroko, bafatwa nabi bikabije, uburenganzira bwabo bugahonyorwa, bagatotezwa, bakicishwa inzara.
Nka Rutagungira we, umwe mu bavandimwe be yavuze ko nyuma yo gukubitishwa kenshi amashanyarazi no gushyirwa mu mazi y’urubura, ubu ibiganza bye nta kintu bishobora gufata kuko byagagaye.
Amategeko ya Uganda avuga ko ukekwaho icyaha adakwiriye kumara amasaha arenga 48 ataragezwa imbere y’urukiko ngo yisobanure ku byo ashinjwa.
Nyamara iyo bigeze ku Banyarwanda bamara amezi ndetse n’imyaka bafunzwe bitubahirije amategeko, bafungiwe ahantu hatazwi cyangwa mu buroko bwa CMI.
Ubuhamya bw’abagira amahirwe bakava muri ayo menyo ya rubamba bakajugunywa ku mupaka, bwuzuyemo ibindi bintu bibi byinshi bakorerwa.
Kuri ubu ikigezweho, ni ukubakubita kugeza bataye ubwenge no kubapfuka amaso bakabajyana mu bihuru kubajugunyayo.
Vuba aha, tariki 23 Kamena, Eric Rugorotsi yajugunywe mu mugezi witwa Umuyanja uherereye Ntungamo.
Yahajugunywe n’abakozi b’Urwego rushinzwe Umutekano w’Imbere mu Gihugu (ISO), ategekwa koga agakiza ubuzima bwe cyangwa agahitamo kurohama.
Yabwiwe ko naramuka ahuye na polisi cyangwa urundi rwego rushinzwe umutekano aza kuvuga ko yarekuwe n’abakozi ba ISO.
Ikindi Rugorotsi yahishuye ni uko abamutotezaga ari abantu bavuga Ikinyarwanda neza cyane.
Ibyo ni ibishimangira ibyo Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ihora ivuga by’uko ubutegetsi bwa Uganda bukorana cyane n’Umutwe w’Iterabwoba wa RNC.
Muneza Sylvie avuga ko abamenye bwa mbere ko bafite virusi itera Sida mu Rwanda bahuye n’ibibazo birimo ihezwa n’akato, bamwe ikabica kubera ko imiti igabanya ubukana bwayo yari itaragera kuri bose ariko nyuma Guverinoma ikaza kubigira iby’ibanze bagafashwa.
Muneza Sylvie avuga ko abamenye bwa mbere ko bafite virusi itera Sida mu Rwanda bahuye n’ibibazo birimo ihezwa n’akato, bamwe ikabica kubera ko imiti igabanya ubukana bwayo yari itaragera kuri bose ariko nyuma Guverinoma ikaza kubigira iby’ibanze bagafashwa.
Amateka agaragaza ko umuntu wa mbere ufite Virusi itera Sida ku Isi yakorewe isuzuma ribyemeza mu 1981 ariko mu Rwanda ibipimo byayo bihagera mu 1987.
Muneza w’imyaka 47 watangiye ubuhamya mu Nama Mpuzamahanga ya 20 yiga ku Cyorezo cya Sida n’Indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina muri Afurika, ICASA, iteraniye i Kigali ku wa 2-7 Ukuboza 2019, avuga ko yayanduye mu 1998.
Bisobanuye ko iyi virusi yamenye ko ayifite nyuma y’imyaka 11 umuntu wa mbere mu Rwanda bigaragaye ko ayirwaye.
Kuri ubu ayimaranye imyaka 21 ariko ni umubyeyi ushikamye ubona uguwe neza.
Uyu mugore udafite umugabo, yamenye ko afite virusi itera Sida nyuma yo kumarana igihe inkorora idakira ariko agiye kwa muganga aza gusanga ari igituntu arwaye, atangizwa imiti yacyo.
Yakomeje ati “Ni bwo icyo gihe bahise bampima, basanga mfite virusi itera Sida.
Muri icyo gihe kumva virusi itera Sida byari ikibazo gikomeye cyane ko nta muti cyangwa urukingo yari ifite.
Nkimara kumva ko nyifite ndabyibuka icyo gihe nashatse kwiyahura mu modoka ngo ingonge.
Nubwo yatekereje kwiyahura kubera kudahita yiyakira ntabwo ubuzima bwarangiriye aho kuko Imana yakinze ukuboko agataha amahoro.
Gusa muri icyo gihe yahuye n’akaga kuko abaturanyi bamuhaye akato bikomeye.
Ati “Mu baturanyi no mu miryango yanjye hari harimo akato kenshi cyane, kunyegera byari ikibazo.
Bumvaga ko nabanduza.
Muri icyo gihe, abantu benshi twari duturanye barimo kugenda bapfa bazize Sida, imfubyi zari zihari ari nyinshi, biba ngombwa ko mu buzima bubi nari ndimo negerana n’imfubyi za Sida n’abandi bari bameze nkanjye.
Muneza icyo gihe ubuzima bwe bwari mu kaga kuko yari asigaranye ibilo 20 gusa, imisatsi ye yaramaze gucurama kubera ingaruka za Virusi itera Sida yari amaranye igihe atabizi.
Kubera kunywa imiti y’igituntu neza byatumye ubuzima bwe butangira kugaruka.
Ati “Abaturanyi bagenda batuvamo bazize Sida, imfubyi ziraho ari nyinshi biba ngombwa negeranya abana bagizwe imfubyi na Virusi itera Sida n’abandi bari bameze nkanjye dushinga ihuriro ryitwa IGIHOZO.
Iri huriro ryashinzwe ari iry’abafite virusi itera Sida n’abagizwe imfubyi na yo.
Muneza avuga ko we na bagenzi be bari kumwe mu Mujyi wa Kigali byabaye ngombwa ko bihuza n’abandi bari hirya no hino mu gihugu kugira ngo nibagira n’ubufasha bakenera kuri Guverinoma bubagereho byoroshye.
Ati “Leta twayeretse ikibazo cy’ingutu twari dufite, by’umwihariko icy’imiti igabanya ubukana cyari kigoye, akato n’ihezwa byadukorerwaga mu baturanyi byari bigoye n’abana b’imfubyi za Sida.
Nyuma yo gushinga iryo huriro Leta yabafashije kubona imiti igabanya ubukana ku buntu, abenshi batangira kuyinywa ndetse banafashwa kwivuza indwara z’ibyuririzi zari zugarije abatari bacye muri icyo gihe.
Umuryango Imbuto Foundation uyobowe na Madamu Jeannette Kagame wagize uruhare rukomeye mu gufasha abafite virusi itera Sida kubona ubwishingizi no kwivuza izo ndwara zari zugarije benshi mu bari bayimaranye igihe batabizi.
Ati “Muri icyo gihe nibwo twakomeje kwicara tureba ibibazo byari bihari ari byinshi, icyo gihe abana bavukanaga Virusi itera Sida ari benshi ariko Nyakubahwa Jeannette Kagame yafashe iya mbere mu gufasha umubyeyi ufite virusi itera SIDA kubyara umwana utanduye.
Ni igikorwa cyafashije u Rwanda by’umwihariko mu kugabanya umubare w’Abanyarwanda bashya bandura Virusi itera Sida.
Muneza avuga ko uyu munsi nta kibazo afite ndetse ashimishwa no gusangiza abandi ubuhamya bw’ubuzima yanyuzemo.
Ubushakashatsi buheruka gutangazwa mu Ukwakira 2019, bwerekenye ko umubare w’abantu bashya bandura Virusi itera Sida mu Rwanda ugenda ugabanuka uko imyaka ishira, by’umwihariko ukaba waravuye kuri 3/1000 (barenga ibihumbi 10) mu 2014 ukagera kuri 1/1000 (barenga 5400) mu 2019.
Bivuze ko habayeho igabanuka risatira 50% mu myaka itanu ishize.
Mu mwaka wa 2000 abana hafi 10% bavukanaga Virusi itera Sida.
Iyo mibare yaragabanutse ku buryo umuntu 1% ni we uyivukana.

Ihuriro ry’Urubyiruko Champions Competition Arts Promoters (CCAP) ryatangije irushanwa ryo guteza imbere impano z’abakiri bato no gukomeza gushishikariza urubyiruko gutangira kubaka ejo hazaza habo bakibyiruka.
Ihuriro ry’Urubyiruko Champions Competition Arts Promoters (CCAP) ryatangije irushanwa ryo guteza imbere impano z’abakiri bato no gukomeza gushishikariza urubyiruko gutangira kubaka ejo hazaza habo bakibyiruka.
CCAP yatangije iki gikorwa ku mugaragaro kuwa 2 Mata 2017 mu birori byabereye ku nyubako y’Umurenge wa Remera binyuze mu irushanwa ryiswe “CCA Style Awards" rigamije guteza imbere urubyiruko rufite impano yo gukora imideli (Fashion Designing) no kuyerekana mu ruhame (Modelling).
Rutamu Omar ukuriye CCAP yatangaje ko ibi bikorwa bigamije gutinyura urubyiruko rufite impano.
Ati “Twe tugamije guteza imbere urubyiruko kugira ngo rureke kwitinya kandi rugire uruhare mu kubaka igihugu no kugera ku nzozi zabo, muri CCAP twakira impano zose maze duharanira kuziteza imbere.
Irushanwa rya CCA Style Awards ryahuje amatsinda umunani ahatanira gutwara icyo gihembo, yiyerekana imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka; agera kuri atatu niyo yatoranyijwe ahabwa amahirwe yo gukomeza mu irushanwa.
Abakomeje mu kindi cyiciro barimo Planet Fashion Agency, Young Generation Models Agency na 1000 Hills Agency.
Ku nshuro ya mbere, ibi bikorwa byatewe inkunga n’Umurenge wa Remera ndetse na Goshen Finance.
Abitabiriye ibi birori basusurukijwe n’umuhanzikazi ukunzwe by’umwihariko mu njyana gakondo Mariya Yohana wari waje gushyigikira urubyiruko.
